original: #DeadSmugglerJournal
translate: #DeadSmugglerJournal

original: I hate these jobs
translate: 我讨厌这种工作

original: Dropped off and told to guard the cargo until the next ship picks you up
translate: 把货物卸下后，被告知看守货物直到下一次船只来接应

original: And in this bloody cave no less
translate: 而且还得在这该死的山洞里

original: I sometimes think the Imperial dungeons would be preferable
translate: 有时我甚至觉得帝国的地牢更好一些

original: Read on
translate: 继续阅读

original: Leave
translate: 离开

original: We spent some time exploring the cave today and it seems there is a side tunnel
translate: 今天我们花了一些时间探索这个山洞，看起来有一个侧洞

original: It's blocked off but if we had a pickaxe, I'm certain we could clear in with ease
translate: 但被堵住了，如果我们有铁镐，我相信我们可以轻松清理

original: Bryn says the area gives him the chills and that we better keep away
translate: 布林说这个地方让他感到寒意，我们最好远离

original: Coward!
translate: 胆小鬼！

original: Golden dead!
translate: 金色的亡者！

original: Bryn got attacked by a crab the size of a warhound today!
translate: 布林今天被一只比战狼还要大的螃蟹袭击了！

original: Nearly took his leg off!
translate: 差点截掉他的腿！

original: Neither of us have seen anything like it before and we can only pray it was alone!
translate: 我们俩之前都没见过这样的事情，但愿它只是单独行动的！

original: Hope the ship won't be delayed much longer
translate: 希望船不会延误太久

original: Bryn is gone
translate: 布林消失了

original: Tore him up, they did!
translate: 他们把他打得不成样子！

original: No way out and no one is coming for me!
translate: 出不来，也没有人来救我！

original: Light is failing
translate: 光线越来越暗

original: Mother
translate: 母亲

original: #IntroSurgeonJournal
translate: #启程外科医生日记

original: Surgeon's Journal
translate: 外科医生的日记

original: Written on the day of departure from mainland
translate: 写于离开大陆的那天

original: Left Adler's Helm today with a full cargo of passengers
translate: 今天带着满载乘客离开了阿德勒船舵

original: Mercenaries by the looks of it
translate: 看起来是雇佣兵

original: Paid well
translate: 薪水给得很好

original: Ship was dispatched by Guild before we could fully restock medical supplies
translate: 船在我们补充完医疗物资之前就被公会派走了

original: Hopefully we won't need them
translate: 希望我们用不上它们

original: Then again, our passengers make me uneasy
translate: 再说，我们的乘客让我感到不安

original: Writtern 5 days ago
translate: 写于五天前

original: Brawl in mess - had to set nose
translate: 餐厅里的打斗 - 我不得不给鼻子复位

original: Men seem on edge
translate: 人们看起来都很紧张

original: Also, Igan came to me today with a bite-wound that he sustained whilst working in the hold
translate: 此外，伊甘今天来找我，身上有咬伤，是在船舱工作时受的伤

original: Didn't see creature and I would say it was a rat's bite if it weren't for the size and some aspect of the dentition that I find hard to explain properly
translate: 没有看到那个生物，如果不是因为它的体型和一些难以解释的齿痕，我会说那只是老鼠的咬伤

original: I recommend captain sends detail to capture and kill creature
translate: 我建议船长派遣人员捕捉并消灭那个生物

original: Written two days ago
translate: 写于两天前

original: Was visited today by navigator Aslam
translate: 今天被导航员阿斯拉姆拜访

original: He asked for Whitefern - a sedative
translate: 他要我找白蕨——一种镇静剂

original: Claimed he had trouble sleeping
translate: 他说自己睡眠不好

original: Suspected he was not fully forthcoming and when pushed, he mumbled something about the stars being 'odd'
translate: 我怀疑他没有完全坦白，被逼问时，他嘟囔着说星星“有些奇怪”

original: Not sure what he meant and he left before I could push him further
translate: 我不太明白他的意思，他在我追问之前就离开了

original: Written today
translate: 写于今天

original: Men are about to break
translate: 人们快要崩溃了

original: We cannot maintain our course for Idra
translate: 我们无法继续航向伊德拉

original: Captain advised me today to make ready the surgery and to expect casualties
translate: 船长今天建议我准备手术，并预料会有伤亡

original: I suspect he intends to inform our passengers that he refuses to land on the island
translate: 我怀疑他打算告知乘客他拒绝在岛上着陆

original: If this is my last
translate: 如果这是我最后的时刻

original: The entry trails off
translate: 这条记录戛然而止

original: # Chapter_0
translate: # 第一章

original: #IntroBerrynGuard
translate: # 介绍·贝瑞恩岗哨

original: A guardsman dressed in the livery of the noble house Berryn scowls at you
translate: 穿着伯林家族仆从服饰的卫兵对你皱眉

original: Armsmaster Lyra awaits you at the main entrance
translate: 武器大师莉拉在大门等候你

original: You best talk to her if you've not already done so
translate: 你最好找她谈谈，如果你还没有这么做的话

original: A guardsman dressed in the livery of the noble house Berryn
translate: 穿着伯林家族仆从服饰的卫兵

original: The guard scowls somewhat at you
translate: 保安对你皱了皱眉

original: Armsmaster Lyra awaits you at the main entrance
translate: Armsmaster Lyra awaits you at the main entrance

original: You best talk to her if you've not already done so
translate: You best talk to her if you've not already done so

original: You'll find the kitchen in the eastern end of the courtyard
translate: 你会在庭院的东端找到厨房

original: The garden and hedge-maze is to the west
translate: 花园和迷宫在西边

original: And I needn't remind you that it's a poor idea to enter the maze without a lantern
translate: 而且我无需提醒你，在没有灯笼的情况下进入迷宫是个糟糕的想法

original: Have a good evening m'lord
translate: 晚安，大人

original: Have a good evening m'lady
translate: 晚安，女士

original: #IntroCato
translate: #IntroCato

original: Cato stands - with poorly concealed effort
translate: 卡托站了起来，努力掩饰着

original: And {PLAYER}
translate: 和 __PLACEHOLDER_0__

original: You stand, and meet his gaze
translate: 你也站了起来，对视着他

original: Return her to me
translate: 把她还给我

original: There is no other outcome of this affair
translate: 这件事没有其他结果

original: Shake his hand, and leave
translate: 与他握手，然后离开

original: Remain silent, and leave
translate: 保持沉默，然后离开

original: You have my word, Cato
translate: 你有我的一言为定，卡托

original: LEAVE
translate: 离开

original: Cato Berryn
translate: 卡托·贝林

original: Cato Berryn sits tall in a tasteful, but modest reception room
translate: 卡托·贝林坐在一间雅致但不过分的接待室里，坐姿挺拔

original: He looks less imposing than you remember - and with a few more crow's feet
translate: 他看起来没有你记忆中的那么威严——多了几道眼角皱纹

original: Nonetheless, he's lost none of his composure or air of casual authority
translate: 不过，他依然保持着从容不迫和随意的权威感

original: Continue
translate: 继续

original: You take a seat across a formidable desk from him
translate: 你坐在他面前那张气势逼人的办公桌对面

original: This study, like the rest of the villa, is half-lit, giving a morose cast to its opulence
translate: 这个书房，和别墅的其他部分一样，半明半暗，给奢华的环境蒙上了一层阴郁的色彩

original: The older man's face creases into a tired, but genuine smile, which momentarily lifts some of the room's oppressive mood
translate: 那位年长的男人脸上浮现出疲惫但真诚的笑容，这暂时缓解了房间压抑的气氛

original: It's a mercy to see you again - your own man and in your prime
translate: 再次见到你真是幸运——你仍是自己，而且正处于巅峰状态

original: Cato says, before a frown consumes his smile
translate: 卡托说，话音未落，笑容就被皱眉取代

original: It's just a shame our reunion is overshadowed by the fates of those we love
translate: 只是遗憾我们重逢的时刻被我们所爱之人的命运所笼罩

original: But perhaps, together, we can yet improve our collective circumstances?
translate: 但也许，我们能一起改善我们的共同处境？

original: It's a mercy to see you again - your own woman and in your prime
translate: 再次见到你真是幸运——你仍是自己，而且正处于巅峰状态

original: Why have you summoned me?
translate: 你为什么召唤我？

original: So, you know my Father is dead
translate: 所以，你知道我父亲去世了

original: Cato leans forward, hands clasped beneath his chin
translate: 卡托向前倾身，双手托着下巴

original: I shan't deny it
translate: 我不会否认

original: I was saddened to hear of his passing
translate: 听到他去世的消息，我感到很悲伤

original: Despite everything, I remember him fondly
translate: 尽管一切都不顺利，我还是怀念着他

original: You drove him to drink and mercenary work
translate: 你让他酗酒，让他去做雇佣兵的工作

original: No need to dwell on the past
translate: 不必再纠结于过去

original: Cato leans back again, and his eyes go distant
translate: 凯托又靠回椅背，眼神变得遥远

original: He failed in his duties
translate: 他在职责上失败了

original: For an arms-master, there is no greater shame than a lapse of vigilance
translate: 对一名武器大师来说，最大的耻辱莫过于疏忽大意

original: He drove himself into exile
translate: 他让自己流亡在外

original: Lyra shifts slightly behind Cato
translate: 利拉微微向凯托身后挪动了一下

original: If he failed, then it was never possible to succeed
translate: 他失败了，那就永远没有成功的可能

original: Say nothing
translate: 什么也别说

original: A pregnant pause
translate: 一个意味深长的沉默

original: He failed her
translate: 他辜负了她

original: Your father's exile was a sorrow to me
translate: 你父亲的流亡对我来说也是一种悲伤

original: Yet he could not remain in the household - for Embla's sake
translate: 但他无法留在家中——为了埃姆拉

original: The loss of a mother is tragedy enough, without being reminded of it
translate: 母亲的离去已经足够令人悲伤，不必再被提醒

original: Embla?
translate: 埃姆拉？

original: Do not hide behind your daughter
translate: 不要躲在女儿身后

original: The past is done with!
translate: 过去已经结束了！

original: Tell me why I'm here!
translate: 告诉我，我为什么在这里！

original: That may be so
translate: 这或许是真的

original: But it is done
translate: 但已完成

original: I regret his loyalty could not be rewarded
translate: 我遗憾他的忠诚未能得到回报

original: Sometimes...the tapestry's weave is not so easy to discern
translate: 有时……挂毯的编织并非那么容易辨认

original: Cato's face is still mild, yet you sense his tone hardening
translate: 卡托的脸色依旧温和，但你感觉到他的语气变得强硬

original: Fine
translate: 好吧

original: I'm sure we've both moved on
translate: 我相信我们都已经向前走了

original: By exiling him, you condemned me as well
translate: 通过放逐他，你也同样被定罪了

original: Your anger is understandable
translate: 你的愤怒是可以理解的

original: The hardships you must have suffered on the road are written in your face
translate: 你旅途中的艰辛已在你的脸上留下了痕迹

original: Such is the cost of mercenary work, I suppose
translate: 这大概就是雇佣兵工作的代价吧

original: But do not presume to understand the forces that were at play
translate: 但不要妄图理解那些正在起作用的力量

original: And still are
translate: 以及现在依然在起作用的

original: Just tell me why I'm here, old man!
translate: 老头，就告诉我我为什么在这里！

original: Cato is caught off-guard for a moment, before letting out a deep breath
translate: 卡托一时措手不及，随后深吸了一口气

original: Then the years have bestoweed you with wisdom
translate: 那么岁月赋予了你智慧

original: I am glad, for it has forsaken the House of Berryn
translate: 我很高兴，因为这已经抛弃了伯林家族

original: Why have you called me here?
translate: 你为什么把我叫来？

original: Embla is missing
translate: 伊姆布拉失踪了

original: Cato's voice quivers momentarily, betraying his stoic features
translate: 卡托的声音暂时颤抖了一下，暴露了他坚毅的面容

original: Now I beg of you, {PLAYER}
translate: 现在我恳求你，{PLAYER}

original: Help me find my daughter
translate: 帮我找到我的女儿

original: Help her return home, where she belongs
translate: 帮她回家，那是她应该去的地方

original: Why me?
translate: 为什么是我？

original: What's happened to her?
translate: 她怎么了？

original: Is it not obvious?
translate: 难道不明显吗？

original: You've clearly grown to inherit your fathers resourcefulness - and besides - Embla has trusted you since before either of you could speak
translate: 你显然继承了你父亲的机智——而且，埃姆拉从你们俩还不会说话的时候就开始信任你了

original: And now the fool has got herself into trouble?
translate: 而现在这个蠢货自己闯了祸？

original: She left without notice, a week ago
translate: 她一周前悄悄离开了

original: From the scant clues we had, we believe she boarded a ship bound for one of the Outer Isles, Idra
translate: 根据我们有限的线索，我们相信她登上了开往外岛伊德拉的一艘船

original: She went of her own free will
translate: 她是自愿离开的

original: At the time I thought little of it
translate: 当时我以为没什么大不了的

original: Cato begins to glower
translate: 塞托开始皱眉

original: Since then, however, there have been 'reports'
translate: 但从那以后，却有了‘报告’

original: Grave ones
translate: 严重的报告

original: Reports?
translate: 报告？

original: Something has been building in her for years
translate: 她体内已经酝酿了多年

original: An 'aptitude' of sorts
translate: 一种‘天赋’

original: But I suspect you already knew?
translate: 但我想你已经知道了？

original: In any case, it's grown much stronger lately and drives her in ways I cannot understand
translate: 无论如何，最近变得更加强烈，驱使她的方式我无法理解

original: I suspect she is looking for... answers
translate: 我怀疑她是在寻找……答案

original: But why Idra?
translate: 但为什么是伊德拉？

original: An aptitude?
translate: 一种天赋？

original: What am I to do?
translate: 我该怎么办？

original: An aptitude of the worst kind
translate: 最糟糕的一种天赋

original: It does not spring from the canonical Imperial praxis
translate: 这并非源自帝国的标准实践

original: Instead it comes from elsewhere
translate: 而是来自其他地方

original: It is the kind the Empire does not suffer to exist
translate: 这种东西帝国是不允许存在的

original: I hope it's only answers that she seeks
translate: 希望她只是在寻找答案

original: I see
translate: 我明白了

original: What can I do?
translate: 我能做些什么？

original: Why indeed?
translate: 确实如此？

original: There is little on the island save the port of Horryn
translate: 岛上除了霍林港外几乎什么都没有

original: If Idra was her destination, she must have landed there
translate: 如果伊德拉是她的目的地，她肯定是在那里登陆的

original: Horryn?
translate: 霍林港？

original: What of her 'aptitude'?
translate: 她的“天赋”怎么样？

original: Yes
translate: 是的

original: An old Imperial port and home to a few hundred whalers, traders and the occasional smuggler
translate: 一个古老的帝国港口，住着几百名捕鲸者、商人和偶尔的走私者

original: We can only speculate as to what drew her there, but it's our only lead
translate: 我们只能猜测是什么将她引向那里，但这却是我们唯一的线索

original: How can I help her?
translate: 我能怎么帮助她？

original: You mentioned her 'aptitude'?
translate: 你提到过她的“天赋”？

original: Hire mercenaries, travel to Idra and begin your search in the port of Horryn
translate: 招募雇佣兵，前往伊德拉，在霍ryn港开始你的搜寻

original: From there, I trust you to do what needs be done
translate: 从那里起，我信任你们去做必须做的事

original: Spare no cost, just bring back my daughter
translate: 不惜一切代价，只要能找回我的女儿

original: Mercenaries?
translate: 雇佣兵？

original: The man is a grizzled veteran - he may have slowed with age, but his experience and reliability more than make up for it
translate: 这个男人是一位饱经风霜的老兵——他可能因年岁而有些迟缓，但他的经验和可靠性弥补了一切

original: He's also much respected by similar men - and so will be instrumental in hiring a reliable crew
translate: 他也很受同类人的尊敬——因此在招募可靠的船员时将会起到关键作用

original: I'll take it into consideration
translate: 我会考虑的

original: I trust your instincts, but I beseech you consider him - he's no great dinner guest, but he's been irreplaceable elsewhere
translate: 我信任你的直觉，但恳求你考虑他——他可能不是一个理想的晚餐嘉宾，但在其他地方无可替代

original: Is that so?
translate: 真的吗？

original: Very well
translate: 好吧

original: Cato shows you his upturned palms, beseeching,
translate: 卡托摊开手掌，恳求道

original: I know this thing I ask of you is fraught with danger
translate: 我知道我要求你们做的事情充满了危险

original: But this is your chance at improving your fortune - materially, and in honour
translate: 但这给了你们改善命运的机会——物质上的，还有荣誉上的

original: What say you?
translate: 你们怎么看？

original: I accept - for Embla's sake
translate: 我接受——为了埃姆拉

original: Very well - For my family's name
translate: 好吧——为了我家族的名誉

original: I'll do it
translate: 我会做的

original: For the gold
translate: 为了金币

original: What makes you think I care?
translate: 你认为我会在乎？

original: A chill draught causes a nearby candle to flicker, and you see the cold mirrored in Cato's features
translate: 附近的烛火因一阵冷风而摇曳，你看到卡托脸上映出的冷意

original: You are not to blame for the decline in your family's fortune
translate: 你不必为家族衰落负责

original: But you could be responsible for restoring it
translate: 但你有可能恢复它

original: We'll see
translate: 我们拭目以待

original: I will be
translate: 我会的

original: Cato smiles softly, visibly relieved, and for a moment he looks like the man you remember
translate: 卡托微微一笑，明显松了口气，有一瞬间他看起来像你记忆中的那个人

original: Have you any final questions or matters to discuss?
translate: 你还有最后的问题或事项要讨论吗？

original: Time is, as I'm sure you appreciate, of the essence
translate: 时间，正如我相信你所理解的那样，至关重要

original: Let's just get on with it
translate: 我们还是直接开始吧

original: If nothing else, the port will be dangerous enough
translate: 至少港口本身就很危险

original: That is why I have summoned a Roland Greyeye to me - a crude but effective sell-sword - that I've made good use of before
translate: 这就是我召唤罗兰·灰眼的原因——一个粗犷但有效的佣兵——我以前用过他

original: He shall accompany you on this task
translate: 他将陪同你完成这项任务

original: Roland Greyeye?
translate: 罗兰·灰眼？

original: I work alone!
translate: 我独自行动！

original: I met the man just before seeing you
translate: 我就在见到你之前遇见了那个人

original: No one, and no word has left Idra in days
translate: 几天来，没有人离开伊德拉，也没有任何消息传出

original: Rumor has it even the Imperial augurs are in the dark
translate: 据说连帝国的占卜师都是一片茫然

original: I know not how this touches the fate of my daughter, but she must be returned to me, one way or another
translate: 我不知道这如何影响我女儿的命运，但她无论如何都要回到我身边

original: Any idea why she left?
translate: 你知道她为什么要离开吗？

original: #IntroCellar
translate: #IntroCellar

original: Empty bottles litter the floor of this room
translate: 这个房间的地面上散落着空瓶子

original: You chuckle to yourself as you imagine the kitchen staff in their wine tasting sessions
translate: 你暗自发笑，想象着厨房工作人员在品酒会中的情景

original: No doubt, much revelry has taken place here
translate: 毫无疑问，这里一定发生过许多狂欢

original: Then a cool gust of air from the passage to the north
translate: 然后从北方通道吹来一阵凉风

original: The wine cellar lies that way and you can almost hear faint sobbing
translate: 酒窖就在那边，你几乎能听到微弱的哭泣声

original: Ghosts no doubt
translate: 灵魂不疑有之

original: #IntroChef
translate: #IntroChef

original: Ha!
translate: 哈！

original: The old wretch is too cowardly to come himself so he sends you instead?
translate: 这个老家伙胆小如鼠，亲自来肯定不行，派你来倒是挺合适的

original: The brandy will be the end of him I say
translate: 我说，朗姆酒会要了他的命

original: Then again, who am I to deny the old fool his few pleasures
translate: 当然，谁让我这个老家伙不拒绝他这点乐趣呢

original: You'll find a crate of fine Gorremian brandy in the north-east corner of the wine cellar
translate: 你将在酒窖东北角找到一箱优质的哥雷米朗姆酒

original: Hold on!
translate: 等一下！

original: Let me see what you made!
translate: 让我看看你做的！

original: Armand excitedly licks his lips
translate: 阿朗芒兴奋地舔了舔嘴唇

original: Present the Sandwich for inspection
translate: 请呈上三明治接受检查

original: The chef offers a short bow and a tired but sincere smile
translate: 厨师鞠了个短躬，露出疲惫但真诚的笑容

original: I am chef Armand and my humble kitchen is at your disposal m'lord
translate: 我是厨师阿朗芒，我的卑微厨房随时为您服务，大人

original: I am chef Armand and my humble kitchen is at your disposal m'lady
translate: 我是厨师阿朗芒，我的卑微厨房随时为您服务，女士

original: Sadly I was told of your arrival only minutes ago and my oven must be fired up again
translate: 可惜我刚刚才得知你们的到来，我的烤炉必须重新点燃

original: You must be famished?
translate: 你一定饿坏了？

original: Indeed I am
translate: 的确如此

original: Splendid!
translate: 真棒！

original: The pantry is west of the wine cellar, and the cheese is kept in the northernmost room
translate: 储藏室在酒窖的西边，奶酪存放在最北端的房间

original: Return when you have the cured ham and cheddar and I shall provide bread and instructions
translate: 等你把熏火腿和切达奶酪拿来，我再提供面包和指示

original: Now, venture forth into the underworld!
translate: 现在，踏入地底世界吧！

original: Where is the cellar?
translate: 酒窖在哪里？

original: Kydeon has asked me to fetch him a bottle of brandy
translate: 凯德恩让我给他拿一瓶白兰地

original: Perfect!
translate: 太好了！

original: First of all, here is some bread
translate: 首先，这里有一些面包

original: Now, the cauldron is quite empty and just warm enough for you to use
translate: 现在，锅已经空了，温度也刚刚好供你使用

original: Remember
translate: 请记住

original: You need both the bread, ham and cheese to make the perfect sandwich!
translate: 你需要面包、熏火腿和奶酪才能做出完美的三明治！

original: Now, go give it a try and bring me the result!
translate: 现在，去试试看，把结果带给我！

original: I shall see if you have it in you!
translate: 我要看看你是否有这方面的天赋！

original: Chef Armand wanders back and forth, tending the fire and keeping his kitchen tidy
translate: 厨师阿曼德来来回回地走动，照料着炉火，保持厨房整洁

original: He has the gait of a man who has been on his feet for far too many hours
translate: 他走路的样子仿佛已经站了太久

original: I have the ham and cheese!
translate: 我有熏火腿和奶酪！

original: Present the sandwich for inspection
translate: 请呈上三明治供我检查

original: Where is the cellar again?
translate: 酒窖在哪里？

original: Use the hatch in the floor over there!
translate: 用那边地板上的舱门！

original: Armand points towards a wooden hatch by the wall
translate: 阿尔曼指向墙边的一个木制舱口

original: It's quite dark down there, but there should be a lantern in a chest near the stairs
translate: 那里很暗，但楼梯附近应该有一个装着灯笼的箱子

original: Good luck!
translate: 祝你好运！

original: #IntroMadSailors
translate: #IntroMadSailors

original: Sailors
translate: 海盗

original: The sailors stare at you wide-eyed and terrified
translate: 海盗们瞪大眼睛，惊恐地盯着你

original: Dead Emperors!
translate: 残暴的皇帝们！

original: It's coming for us!
translate: 它朝我们来了！

original: It whispers to me!
translate: 它在我耳边低语！

original: One of them draws a weapon with shaking hands
translate: 其中一人颤抖着手抽出武器

original: Get away from me!
translate: 你离我远点！

original: Calm yourself - You're guild sailors!
translate: 平静下来——你们是公会的海盗！

original: Half-insane with terror, the sailors scream and lunge at you!
translate: 被恐惧折磨得半疯癫，海盗们尖叫着扑向你！

original: Attack
translate: 攻击

original: The men stop dead in their tracks - seemingly shocked back from their momentary lapse of sanity by your words
translate: 他们突然停下了脚步——显然，你的话让他们从片刻的疯狂中清醒过来

original: The pair blinks towards you in a moment of indecision and then stumbles up to the main deck and the tumult that seems to be taking place there
translate: 这对人犹豫片刻，然后踉跄着走上主甲板，那里似乎正在进行一场混乱

original: #IntroMonster
translate: #IntroMonster

original: You dash towards the ship's fractured rail, dodging holes in the deck and wounded men, beseeching you for help
translate: 你冲向船舷的缺口，避开甲板上的破洞和受伤的船员，恳求他们得到帮助

original: Roland hangs by one arm from the side of the ship
translate: 罗兰一只手臂悬挂在船舷边

original: Try to grab him!
translate: 尽力抓住他！

original: Before Estavo can smirk in satisfaction, a tentacle whips into the lifeboat, leaving a dark smear against the now buckling hull
translate: 在埃斯塔沃露出满足的笑容之前，一只触手猛然抽打向救生艇，留下一道深色的痕迹在现在已经开始变形的船身上。

original: Looking up, you see the remaining tentacles high above you, poised for the coup de grace
translate: 向上望去，你看到剩余的触手高高悬在你上方，准备给予致命一击。

original: Abandon ship!
translate: 舍弃船只！

original: You lunge for Roland's arm, but he loses his grip and your fingers close only around thin air - you missed him by an inch
translate: 你扑向罗兰的胳膊，但他已经失去了抓握，你的手指只抓住了虚无的空气——你差了一英寸。

original: He falls wordlessly downwards
translate: 他无声地坠落。

original: You regard the tentacles with morbid fascination
translate: 你以病态的兴致凝视着那些触手。

original: Their colouration seems to shift and swim, and their tips are cruelly barbed
translate: 它们的颜色似乎在变化，顶端残忍地长着倒钩。

original: They sway, almost hypnotically, before crunching into the ship again
translate: 它们摇晃着，几乎具有催眠效果，然后又狠狠地撞向船只。

original: One of the tentacles narrowly misses you, but the impact sends you flying overboard
translate: 一条触手险些击中你，但冲击力将你弹出了船外。

original: The impact of the water winds you, the waves pummel you down, the currents beseech you to go deeper
translate: 水的冲击让你头晕目眩，波浪将你打下，水流逼迫你潜得更深。

original: Ever deeper
translate: 深入入黑暗。

original: Peaceful blackness
translate: 安静的黑色。

original: The Terror of Idra
translate: 伊德拉的恐怖。

original: You rest your sword-arm, and survey the carnage
translate: 你放下剑臂，审视着眼前的屠杀。

original: Then suddenly a loud crash as something collides violently with the hull
translate: 突然，一阵巨响，船身剧烈震动，幸存的佣兵和船员们努力保持平衡。

original: Surviving mercenaries and crewmen alike fight to keep their footing as the ship lurches
translate: 突然，巨大的怪异触手从水中冲出，围绕着船只。

original: Suddenly, huge, monstrous tentacles burst from the water around the ship
translate: 在恐惧袭来之前的一瞬间，你好奇埃斯塔沃此时在想些什么，怪物们正俯视着他。

original: For a split-second, before the terror sets in, you wonder what Estavo must be thinking as the monstrosities loom over him
translate: 你沿着主甲板踱步，伊德拉的海岸线清晰可见。

original: You pace the main deck, as the coast of Idra sails into clear view
translate: 你可能保住了船员们的生命，但他们仍然紧张兮兮。

original: You may have kept the crew alive, but they're still tense and skittish
translate: 你可能保住了船员们的生命，但他们仍然紧张兮兮。

original: The ships captain catches your eye, and nods in gratitude
translate: 船长的目光与你相遇，他点头表示感激

original: There is a scream from the crow's nest
translate: 鸟巢里传来一声尖叫

original: Momentarily, you understand why - huge, monstrous tentacles have burst from the water around the ship
translate: 你恍然大悟，原来巨大的怪兽触手从船周围的水中猛然伸出

original: You hear the captain cry out in terror as one of them wraps around his leg and plucks him from the deck
translate: 你听到船长发出恐怖的尖叫，其中一个触手缠住了他的腿，将他从甲板上扯了下来

original: After reaching their full height, the tentacles curve inwards and smash into the ship
translate: 触手伸展到最大高度后，弯曲着向船体撞击

original: Some pierce straight through the deck - Others snap the masts like they were matchsticks
translate: 有些触手直接穿透了甲板，而另一些则像折断火柴一样折断了桅杆

original: You stand frozen in place
translate: 你呆立在原地

original: Through a haze of splintered wood and panicked screams, you notice Roland
translate: 在木屑和惊恐的尖叫声中，你注意到罗兰

original: He throws himself out of the way of a tentacle, but begins to fall overboard as the ship lurches once more
translate: 他躲开了一个触手，但随着船再次摇晃，他开始向船舷外坠落

original: Go to Roland's aid!
translate: 去救助罗兰！

original: Leave Roland to his fate
translate: 让罗兰自生自灭

original: Through a haze of splintered wood and panicked screams, you watch as the tentacles rise for another strike
translate: 在木屑和惊恐的尖叫声中，你看着触手再次准备攻击

original: You notice a few of the mercenaries are rushing towards the lifeboats
translate: 你注意到有几个佣兵正朝救生艇跑去

original: Join the mercenaries
translate: 加入佣兵

original: Observe the tentacles
translate: 观察触手

original: You reach the lifeboat just as the mercenaries begin lowering it into the sea
translate: 就在佣兵们开始将救生艇放下的时候，你抵达了救生艇

original: Estavo brandishes his sword at you
translate: Estavo挥剑指向你

original: I think not
translate: 我可不这么认为

original: Get in!
translate: 快上船！

original: Estavo bellows
translate: Estavo大声喊道

original: If you're ok with doubling our fee, of course
translate: 如果你同意把费用翻倍，当然可以

original: You watch as he is swallowed by the raging sea
translate: 你看着他被狂暴的大海吞噬

original: The ship is listing fatally - and you see the great tentacles high above you, poised for the coup de grace
translate: 船只倾覆得极为危险，而你看到高高在上的巨大触手，正准备致命一击

original: As you jump, you hear the terrible rending of wood giving in to flesh
translate: 你在跳起的一瞬间，听到木材被肌肉撕裂的可怕声音

original: Roland plummets wordlessly over the ship's rail
translate: 洛兰默然从船舷上坠落

original: Meanwhile, you notice a few of the mercenaries are rushing towards the lifeboats
translate: 同时，你注意到有几个雇佣兵正朝救生艇跑去

original: Follow the mercenaries
translate: 跟随雇佣兵

original: Sink
translate: 沉没

original: #IntroMutiny
translate: #叛变开场

original: The mercenary leader, Estavo, flicks his dark eyes to you, but keeps his blade fixed on the desperate captain
translate: 雇佣兵首领埃斯托瓦将他深邃的眼睛转向你，但手中的刀依然对准了绝望的船长

original: There's a reason he's known as 'Fireblood' to his men
translate: 他之所以被称为“烈血”是因为他的手下都这么称呼他

original: Estavo
translate: 埃斯托瓦

original: You'll get your money but let me handle this
translate: 你会拿到报酬，但让我来处理这件事

original: Estavo - enough of the theatrics
translate: 埃斯托瓦 - 别再演戏了

original: A cruel smile twitches into life on Estavo's wind-weathered face
translate: 埃斯托瓦的风霜脸颊上浮现出一丝残忍的微笑

original: There's only one rich noble girl
translate: 只有一个富有的贵族小姐

original: But we can always find more sailors
translate: 但我们总是能找到更多的水手

original: The ship's captain bristles at these words
translate: 船长听了这话，怒气冲冲

original: Captain, why have we not dropped anchor?
translate: 船长，我们为什么不抛锚？

original: Mutiny
translate: 造反

original: You emerge onto the deck, and see two groups of men facing each other with weapons drawn
translate: 你出现在甲板上，看到两组人马面对面持械对峙

original: The ship shakes violently in the grip of a storm as lightning tears across the sky
translate: 船在暴风雨中剧烈摇晃，闪电划破天空

original: There is desperation in the captain's voice
translate: 船长的声音充满绝望

original: We are seasoned sailors - we do not balk at shadows!
translate: 我们是老海员，我们不畏惧阴影！

original: You need to be alive to rescue this girl you speak of!
translate: 你要救那个女孩就必须活着！

original: We're out of time
translate: 时间不多了

original: Sail us in, or argue the point with Estavo
translate: 操纵船只靠岸，否则就和埃斯塔沃争论吧

original: You speak sense, Perhaps it is better to turn around?
translate: 你说得有道理，或许我们应该掉头？

original: Estavo!
translate: 埃斯塔沃！

original: Have at it!
translate: 攻击吧！

original: A few of the ship's crew lower their weapons
translate: 几个船员放下了武器

original: The captain's eyes flit between you, and Estavo's murderous grin
translate: 船长的眼睛在你和埃斯塔沃那杀气腾腾的微笑之间来回闪烁

original: He sheathes his blade and speaks softly, his voice barely audible over the snapping sails
translate: 他收起刀，低声说道，声音几乎被哗哗作响的帆布盖住了

original: So be it
translate: 既然如此

original: May the deep have mercy
translate: 深渊保佑

original: You gain 300 XP
translate: 你获得300经验点

original: Hah!
translate: 哈哈！

original: Theatrics you say?
translate: 你说这是戏剧？

original: It is not my men who cower like children!
translate: 不是我的手下像孩子一样畏缩！

original: For what?
translate: 为什么？

original: Shadows in the water?
translate: 水中的阴影？

original: Shadows will not keep me from my pay!
translate: 阴影不会阻止我拿到报酬！

original: I refuse to stand by and let you butcher the crew
translate: 我拒绝袖手旁观，看着你屠杀船员

original: Do as you wish
translate: 按你的意思办

original: Estavo's grin begins to show teeth as he hears your words
translate: 当你的话传入耳中，埃斯塔沃的笑容开始露出牙齿

original: The color drains from the Captain's face
translate: 船长的脸色瞬间变得苍白

original: There is a moment's silence then a crash and a shudder as something strikes the ship's hull
translate: 有一阵沉默，然后传来一声巨响和船身的震动，似乎什么东西击中了船体

original: In the confusion, a mercenary's throwing dagger flies; lodging in a sailor's throat
translate: 在混乱中，一名佣兵的投掷匕首飞出，插在了一名水手的喉咙里

original: Fight the crew
translate: 抵抗船员

original: Estavo lets out a short, hoarse laugh
translate: 埃斯塔沃发出一声短促而嘶哑的笑声

original: Danger, I don't mind
translate: 危险，我不介意

original: Working for fools - that's how people get killed
translate: 给傻瓜打工——这就是人们送命的方式

original: Before you can reply, Estavo whistles, and his men charge at you and the ship's crew!
translate: 就在你还没来得及回应，埃斯塔沃吹了一声口哨，他的手下们冲向了你和船员们！

original: Fend off the mercenaries
translate: 抵挡佣兵

original: Amidst the din of the storm and their frantic arguments, you bellow for the attention of the assembled crewmen and mercenaries
translate: 在暴风雨的喧嚣声和他们激烈的争论中，你高声呼喊，试图吸引船员和佣兵们的注意

original: Both the ship's Captain, and the leader of the mercenaries you hired - a coarse, thug of a man named Estavo - turn their attention to you
translate: 船长和你雇佣的佣兵们的首领——一个粗鲁的打手埃斯塔沃——都把注意力转向了你

original: They look ready to use the unsheathed weapons in their hands at the slightest provocation
translate: 他们手中的武器已经出鞘，只要稍有挑衅就会使用

original: Address the ship's captain
translate: 与船长对话

original: Address the mercenary leader
translate: 与佣兵首领对话

original: You direct your attention to the ship's captain
translate: 你将注意力转向那艘船的船长

original: You know him to be a reasonable, but suggestible man
translate: 你了解他是个理性但容易被说服的人

original: At present, his usually placid eyes are wild with panic - or anger
translate: 目前，他平时平静的眼睛充满了惊慌——或者愤怒

original: I paid you for passage to the shore - did I not?
translate: 我已经付了你登岸的船费——不是吗？

original: Why have we not dropped anchor?!
translate: 为什么我们还没有抛锚？

original: The captain lowers his weapon, and speaks earnestly
translate: 船长放下武器，认真地说

original: The coast of Idra is cursed!
translate: 伊德拉海岸被诅咒了！

original: We'd heard tales, and assumed them grog-drenched rumors only - but there is something between us and the shore that will drag us all to a watery grave!
translate: 我们听说过这些传说，以为只是醉酒后的谣言——但现在我们和岸边之间有什么东西会将我们所有人都拖向水中的坟墓！

original: What are you talking about?
translate: 你在说什么？

original: What have you seen?
translate: 你看到了什么？

original: We must sail on, to land and the girl
translate: 我们必须继续航行，前往岸边和那个女孩

original: Something dire stalks these shores
translate: 有一种可怕的生物在这片海岸上徘徊

original: We cannot approach without risking the ire of that horror
translate: 我们无法靠近，否则会激怒那个怪物

original: A jittery mutter of agreement rises from the sailors causing Estavo's eyes to darken even further
translate: 水手们紧张地附和，埃斯塔沃的眼神变得更加阴沉

original: What horror?
translate: 是什么怪物？

original: Captain!
translate: 船长！

original: Take us closer or there will be consequences!
translate: 把船开近一些，否则会有后果！

original: Naught but glimpses
translate: 只是瞥见而已

original: My men have seen the shadow of something deep in water, stalking us
translate: 我的船员们看到了水下某个深邃阴影的影子，它在追逐我们

original: Nothing natural moves like that
translate: 没有什么自然的东西会那样移动

original: Estavo glares murderously at the captain
translate: 我怒视着船长。

original: You renege on our deal based on a glimpse?
translate: 你基于一瞥就反悔我们的交易？

original: Foolish superstition!
translate: 荒谬的迷信！

original: Take us in now!
translate: 现在带我们上岸！

original: Do as you wish!
translate: 你想怎么做就怎么做！

original: Estavo turns his steely gaze from you to the captain
translate: 埃斯塔沃将他冰冷的目光从你转向船长。

original: Let me spell this out for you, sea-dog - we contracted to rescue the girl
translate: 让我来为你解释一下，海狗——我们是受雇来救那个女孩的。

original: But if you don't get us to the shore, we'll gut you for free
translate: 但是如果你不把我们带到岸边，我们会免费把你开膛破肚。

original: The mercenaries you hired all shift their weight in anticipation of making good on that promise
translate: 你雇佣的雇佣兵们都开始移动，准备兑现他们的诺言。

original: Captain - he's right
translate: 船长——他说得对。

original: Do what you were hired to do!
translate: 做你受雇要做的事情！

original: Convince the man!
translate: 劝服那个人！

original: Something changes in the Captain's expression
translate: 船长的表情有所变化。

original: He stands tall
translate: 他站得笔直。

original: I will not order my ship and my men to certain doom!
translate: 我不会命令我的船和我的手下走向必死的命运！

original: We shall not get any closer to the coast while I have command
translate: 在我掌舵期间，我们不会靠近海岸。

original: I'm sorry captain
translate: 对不起，船长。

original: You leave us no choice
translate: 你让我们别无选择。

original: I defer to your judgement, captain
translate: 我服从你的判断，船长。

original: Estavo - stand down
translate: 埃斯塔沃——退下。

original: I believe you - but my contract with these men does not mention your survival
translate: 我相信你，但与这些人的契约中并没有提到你的存活

original: #IntroRats
translate: #IntroRats

original: You stop dead as you narrowly avoid stepping in a rust-red puddle
translate: 你突然停下了脚步，险些踩到一个铁锈红色的水坑

original: The stench of blood fills your nostrils and as you look around in the dim light of the hold, you realize someone, or something fought for their life here
translate: 血腥的气味充斥着你的鼻腔，昏暗的船舱内，你意识到这里曾发生过一场生死搏斗

original: The same moment the thought hits you, a hiss sounds from the shadows!
translate: 就在这时，阴影中传来一声嘶嘶声！

original: You squint towards the shadows as a hunched, feral looking form slowly slinks forwards
translate: 你眯起眼睛，朝着阴影望去，一个蜷缩着、野兽般的样子缓慢地向前爬行

original: Tiny, disgustingly human-like hands, yellow fangs and a grotesquely dexterous pink tail leave no doubt of the creature's rodent nature
translate: 小巧、令人作呕的人类般的手脚，黄色的獠牙和畸形的粉色尾巴，清楚地表明了这生物的啮齿类本性

original: Though as it emerges from the shadows, it becomes abundantly clear that what may have started life as a common ship-rat, has now grown into something that has no right to exist
translate: 然而，当它从阴影中出现，你立刻明白，这可能曾是一只普通的船鼠，现在已经变成了不该存在的东西

original: A second hiss sounds behind you and the abominations lunge at you!
translate: 你身后再次传来一声嘶嘶声，这些怪物向你扑来！

original: #IntroRoland
translate: #IntroRoland

original: Roland
translate: 罗兰

original: You emerge onto the ship's lower deck
translate: 你出现在船的下层甲板上

original: As your eyes adjust to the darkness you become aware of a hulking figure standing in the shadows
translate: 你的双眼逐渐适应了黑暗，你注意到阴影中站着一个魁梧的身影

original: {PLAYER}!
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__！

original: Here at last
translate: 就在这里

original: growls a rough voice
translate: 一个粗犷的声音低吼道

original: Who’s there?
translate: 谁在那里？

original: Show yourself!
translate: 出现！

original: Freeze and listen carefully
translate: 停下，仔细听

original: Lunge at the figure
translate: 向那身影扑去

original: Have you lost your bloody mind?!
translate: 你是不是疯了！

original: Nobody is going to feel calmer for seeing you
translate: 没有人看到你会感到安心

original: Until you hear screams, stay here
translate: 直到你听到尖叫声，就待在这里

original: You're right
translate: 你说得对

original: Follow me!
translate: 跟我来！

original: Fine, and be careful - I hear it's bad luck to kill a guild-sailor
translate: 好吧，但要小心 - 我听说杀死公会水手是坏运气

original: Feeling jumpy?
translate: 你是不是神经紧张？

original: the brute growls with a smile
translate: 这个野蛮人笑着咆哮着

original: Roland?!
translate: 罗兰？！

original: Why're you skulking in the shadows?
translate: 你为什么躲在阴影里？

original: You tend to have that effect on people
translate: 你总是有这样的效果

original: Where are we?
translate: 我们现在在哪里？

original: And you'll regret not stopping our boys from murdering them, if you don't get to the damn deck
translate: 如果你不赶快到甲板上去，你会后悔没有阻止我们的人杀了他们

original: Besides, we'll need an escape route
translate: 而且，我们还需要一个逃生路线

original: Agreed
translate: 没问题

original: They deserve disciplining, not death
translate: 他们应该受到惩戒，而不是死亡

original: Listen
translate: 听着

original: I've been doing this since you were at the teat
translate: 自从你还在吃奶的时候我就在做这个了

original: Let’s go
translate: 我们走

original: For all the good it will do
translate: 这一点都没有用

original: Wait here, Roland
translate: 罗兰，待在这里

original: There are two doors ahead - take the left, and we should be able to sneak past them without any trouble
translate: 前面有两扇门，走左边，我们应该可以不引起注意地从它们旁边溜过去

original: Anything else I should know?
translate: 还有其他需要注意的事情吗？

original: Famous last words
translate: 最后的话

original: The figure in the shadows twists nimbly past your clumsy lunge, before thick arms wrap around your neck in a vice-like grip
translate: 阴影中的身影敏捷地绕过了你笨拙的扑击，随后粗壮的双臂像铁钳一样紧紧地扼住了你的脖子

original: Your assailant could surely snap your neck in an instance
translate: 你的对手随时都可以扭断你的脖子

original: Just as your vision begins to narrow and your legs go limp, he relases you and you stumble forewards before spinning around
translate: 当你的视野开始变窄，双腿变得无力时，他松开了你，你踉跄着向前走了一步，然后转身

original: Who's there?
translate: 谁在那儿？

original: It’s Roland
translate: 是罗兰

original: Where the tides have you been?
translate: 你去哪儿了？

original: Why are you skulking around?
translate: 你鬼鬼祟祟地在做什么？

original: Below decks, planning our landing
translate: 在船舱里，策划登陆计划

original: Why
translate: 为什么？

original: Mind your own fucking business!
translate: 管好你自己的逼逼乱讲！

original: What's going on?
translate: 发生什么事了？

original: The brute chuckles
translate: 粗壮的家伙咯咯笑着

original: Shadows suit a face like this just fine
translate: 对于这张脸来说，阴影再合适不过了

original: No matter
translate: 没关系

original: There is trouble and you’re needed on deck
translate: 甲板上有麻烦，你需要上去

original: Now
translate: 现在

original: What for?
translate: 为什么？

original: What’s all that noise?
translate: 什么 noise？

original: Have we arrived?
translate: 我们到目的地了吗？

original: Let's get this over with
translate: 让我们快点结束这件事

original: The island is in sight, but the damn guilders refuse to land
translate: 岛屿已经近在眼前，但该死的商船就是不肯靠岸

original: They want to turn back
translate: 他们想要掉头回去

original: If we turn back - we lose our shot at the girl
translate: 如果我们掉头回去，我们就失去了抓住那个女孩的机会

original: Did they say why?
translate: 他们说原因了吗？

original: Ha
translate: 哈

original: the old veteran grunts in what passes as laughter for him
translate: 老兵哼了一声，那勉强算是他的笑声

original: Only superstitious bilge
translate: 只有迷信的胡言乱语

original: They claim they saw something in the water
translate: 他们声称在水中看到了什么东西

original: Either way, our boys are about to show them some very real steel
translate: 不管怎样，我们的小伙子们就要给他们一些非常真实的钢刀

original: If we can't land - we lose our shot at the girl
translate: 如果我们不能靠岸，我们就失去了抓住那个女孩的机会

original: I knew I'd regret chartering a guilder ship
translate: 我就知道租用商船是个错误

original: And no-one gets paid
translate: 而没有人会得到报酬

original: Listen here, I know our boys better than most
translate: 听好了，我知道我们的小伙子们比任何人都更了解

original: We've hired them to go to Idra and kill
translate: 我们雇佣他们去伊德拉杀戮

original: If we don't pay them, things will go bad quickly
translate: 如果我们不付钱，事情会很快变得糟糕

original: But the sailors are bloody terrified
translate: 但水手们简直吓破了胆

original: They claim something is hunting us
translate: 他们声称有东西在追杀我们

original: Wait
translate: 等一下

original: There're a few sailors up ahead, rattled as a pair of rabbits
translate: 前方有几个水手，紧张得像两只兔子

original: We're not here to make friends, if that's what you're suggesting
translate: 我们来这里可不是为了交朋友，如果你的意思是这个

original: Is there a way past them?
translate: 有没有办法绕过他们？

original: Spill sailor-blood and the guild will want to make you pay
translate: 如果流下水手的血，公会会要求你赔偿

original: Take the left door ahead, and spare us some trouble, and a pay cut
translate: 前方选择左边的门，这样可以避免麻烦，还能少拿一些报酬

original: Perhaps
translate: 或许

original: Anything else you feel compelled to tell me?
translate: 还有什么你非说不可的？

original: Let's just get off this bloody boat
translate: 让我们赶紧离开这该死的船

original: Motioning for you to take the lead, Roland falls in behind you.'
translate: 伦多尔示意你带头，自己跟在你后面。

original: From above agitated shouts can be heard
translate: 上方传来愤怒的喊叫声

original: #IntroShipAwaken
translate: #IntroShipAwaken

original: The Zephyr
translate: 海风号

original: On the wine-dark, raging seas of the Outer Isles, a lone caravel struggles against the winds and waves towards the accursed island of Idra
translate: 在外岛狂暴的海面上，一艘孤独的卡拉维尔船逆风逆浪，艰难地驶向被诅咒的伊德拉岛

original: The moan of creaking timbers
translate: 木头吱吱作响的声音

original: The tang of preserved fish
translate: 保存鱼的咸味

original: Your eyes slowly adjust to the darkness of the ship's dimly lit hold
translate: 你的眼睛逐渐适应了船舱昏暗的光线

original: Suddenly, something strikes the hull and the ship rocks violently
translate: 突然，船身被什么东西击中，船剧烈地摇晃起来

original: Your heart begins to pound and a feeling of unease grows in your stomach
translate: 你的心脏开始剧烈跳动，胃里涌起一种不安的感觉

original: Rise, well rested and ready to go
translate: 充分休息，准备出发

original: Get up, mouth dry and head pounding
translate: 起身时口干舌燥，头昏脑胀

original: Rouse yourself from deep meditation
translate: 从冥想中醒来

original: You get to your feet and become aware of agitated voices shouting up on deck
translate: 你站起身来，意识到甲板上有激动的声音在大声喊叫

original: Something is not right
translate: 有些不对劲

original: You should make your way up top and get a bearing on the situation
translate: 你应该上到甲板，弄清楚情况

original: Be on your way
translate: 动身吧

original: WARNING
translate: 警告

original: You are about to skip the intro and go straight to the mainland
translate: 你即将跳过开场，直接前往大陆

original: This is for PLAY-TESTING only and it is not the intended experience!
translate: 仅用于测试，这不是预期的游戏体验！

original: Never mind!
translate: 没关系！

original: SKIP INTRO
translate: 跳过开场

original: #IntroShipLockedDoor
translate: #开场船门锁住

original: A Locked Door
translate: 一扇锁住的门

original: To your surprise, you realize that this door has been locked from the outside!
translate: 令你惊讶的是，这扇门是从外面锁上的！

original: It doesn't budge - perhaps you could slip the lock with a thin blade or use something to smash it?
translate: 门纹丝不动——或许可以用薄刀片开锁，或者用东西砸开？

original: Use Dagger
translate: 使用匕首

original: Use Club
translate: 使用木棍

original: As the door swings open, you can now clearly make out cries from the deck above
translate: 门打开的一瞬间，你清晰地听到了甲板上的呼喊声

original: You should make haste
translate: 你应该赶快行动

original: You slip the dagger through a gap in the door and lift the bar that was locking you in
translate: 你将匕首从门缝中塞了进去，然后提起那把锁住你的门闩

original: The door begins to creak open
translate: 门开始吱嘎作响，缓缓开启

original: Using the club, you smash the lock in a fell swoop
translate: 用战锤，你一击将锁砸碎

original: #IntroVilla
translate: #IntroVilla

original: One you recognize immediately
translate: 你一眼就认出来了

original: Valeria Berryn - the mistress of the house
translate: 瓦莱里娅·伯林 - 这座房子的女主人

original: You remember her as a gray ghost
translate: 你还记得她是一个灰白色的幽灵

original: Absent and unwell
translate: 离开已久，身体欠佳

original: The other statue depicts the girl you once knew so well
translate: 另一座雕像描绘的是你曾经非常熟悉的女孩

original: Embla Berryn - daughter of the house, and now a woman grown strong and clear-eyed - her likeness has none of her mother's cowed timidness
translate: 伊姆拉·伯林 - 这座房子的女儿，如今已成长为一个坚强而目光锐利的女性，她的模样完全不像她母亲那般胆怯和羞涩

original: How is mistress Valeria these days?
translate: 瓦莱里娅女主人最近怎么样？

original: How fares Embla?
translate: 伊姆拉最近怎么样？

original: The mistress is 'vacationing' in the countryside
translate: 女主人正在乡间度假

original: Lyra answers curtly
translate: 琉拉简短地回答

original: And what of Embla?
translate: 那伊姆拉呢？

original: Lyra's eyes flicker ever so slightly
translate: 琉拉的目光微微闪烁了一下

original: We should hasten to Master Berryn - he's long been impatient to see you
translate: 我们应该尽快去找伯林先生 - 他对你久等了

original: But what of mistress Valeria?
translate: 但女主人瓦莱里娅呢？

original: Memories
translate: 回忆

original: The opulence is faded, the shadows longer - clearly much has changed since the last time you were here
translate: 华丽已褪去，阴影更长 - 显然，自你上次来这里以来，这里已经发生了很大的变化

original: Try to remember how long it's been
translate: 尽量回想一下已经过去了多久

original: I didn't come here to reminisce
translate: 我不是来这里缅怀过去的

original: The Statues
translate: 雕像

original: Flanking the doorway are two marble statues
translate: 门口两侧各有一尊大理石雕像

original: The craftsmanship is stunning, but the sight of the two women depicted fills you with sadness
translate: 工艺精湛，但那两尊女子雕像让你感到悲伤

original: Examine them
translate: 检查一下

original: It's been years, perhaps decades since you were here, not since your father was the house arms-master
translate: 或许是几年，或许是几十年前你在这里，而不是你父亲担任府邸武师的时候

original: Not since
translate: 而不是

original: You must have your wits about you and perhaps now is not the time to dwell on painful memories?
translate: 你必须保持清醒，也许现在不是回忆痛苦往事的时候？

original: Not since your father's exile
translate: 从你父亲被放逐之后

original: You were no more than 12 when you were driven from the household
translate: 当时你还不满十二岁就被赶出了家族

original: Hard were the years that followed; the mercenary life is bloody and unforgiving
translate: 那些年是艰难的；雇佣兵的生活血腥且无情

original: Those years stole your childhood, and eventually they took your father too
translate: 那些年夺走了你的童年，最终也夺走了你父亲的生命

original: But your father had always insisted, to his dying breath, that his failure had been his own - that he had gotten the fate he deserved
translate: 但你父亲临终前一直坚持，他的失败是他自己的过错——他得到了应有的命运

original: The memories are painful nonetheless
translate: 这些回忆依旧痛苦

original: The villa of Lord Cato Berryn
translate: 卡托·伯林侯爵的别墅

original: Fat insects buzz lazily about in the warm and peaceful evening
translate: 肥大的昆虫在温暖宁静的傍晚懒洋洋地飞舞

original: Still, there is a chill that creeps into your very core; as if somewhere, you are fighting for your life in the dark depths
translate: 但一种寒意却从你心底蔓延开来；仿佛在某个地方，你正与黑暗深处搏斗

original: #IntroVIllaKitchen
translate: #别墅厨房入口

original: You enter the kitchen and a pair of scullions offer a hurried bow
translate: 你进入厨房，两名小厮匆忙行礼

original: It's all so much quieter, emptier, and gloomier than you remember
translate: 这里比你记得的要安静、空旷和阴郁得多

original: Of course, Old Magda is no longer where she used to be - sitting by the oven, kind, red-faced and tending a shank of lamb
translate: 当然，老玛格达不再坐在炉边，慈祥、红脸膛地给烤肉浇油了

original: Reminisce
translate: 回忆

original: You remember the matronly woman as she sat, humming to herself, pouring fat over the roasting meat
translate: 你还记得那个慈祥的女人坐在那里哼着歌，往烤肉上倒油脂

original: Child, come here, will you?
translate: 孩子，过来一下，好吗？

original: Magda was always a beacon of kindness in a childhood where such qualities were few and far between
translate: 在那个缺乏仁慈品质的童年里，玛格达总是你心中的光

original: Go to Magda
translate: 去找玛格达

original: Magda clasps you gently with her tubby hand
translate: 玛格达用她粗壮的手轻轻握住了你

original: Have you eaten yet?
translate: 你吃过饭了吗？

original: Before you can answer, she produces a small bundle of treats from her apron and hands it to you
translate: 在你还没来得及回答之前，她从围裙里掏出一小包零食递给你

original: As son to the Master-at-Arms for the great House Berryn, you did not go wanting - materially, at least
translate: 作为大伯林家族武官的儿子，至少在物质上，你从不缺乏

original: As daughter to the Master-at-Arms for the great House Berryn, you did not go wanting - materially, at least
translate: 作为大伯林家族武官的女儿，至少在物质上，你从不缺乏

original: Thank you
translate: 谢谢

original: Magda looks at you with kind eyes as you pick at the bundle
translate: 你一边吃着零食，一边看着玛格达慈祥的眼睛

original: He's here again
translate: 他又来了

original: Down in the cellar
translate: 在地窖里

original: He's not so good, m'child
translate: 你孩子，他不太好

original: Sleeping now, but it would be best if you got him to bed afore his men see him like this
translate: 现在他在睡觉，但最好还是把他送回床上，别让他士兵们看到他这个样子

original: Again
translate: 再次

original: The knot in your stomach is as real now as it was when you were
translate: 你胃里的结现在和你小时候一样真实

original: I'll go get him
translate: 我去把他叫来

original: Don't worry, he won't make a fuss
translate: 别担心，他不会闹事

original: He just needs time
translate: 他只需要时间

original: You know, {PLAYER}, deep wounds take a long while to heal
translate: 你知道的，{PLACEHOLDER_0}，深伤需要很长时间才能痊愈

original: The old woman turns back to her meat and resumed her meandering humming
translate: 那个老妇人转过身去继续摆弄她的肉，哼唱着不着调的曲子

original: The sound of a man clearing his throat snaps you back out of your reminiscing
translate: 一声男子清嗓子的声音把你从回忆中拉了回来

original: May I help you m'lord?
translate: 您需要什么帮助吗，大人？

original: May I help you m'lady?
translate: 您需要什么帮助吗，女士？

original: the man in a chef's outfit offers in a hoarse voice
translate: 穿厨师装的男子用嘶哑的声音提议道

original: #IntroVillaLyra
translate: #IntroVillaLyra

original: I suppose you do but I'll escort you nonetheless
translate: 虽然你可能需要，但我还是会护送你

original: A flicker of a smile plays across her face and she beckons for you to lead the way
translate: 她脸上露出一丝微笑，示意你带路

original: Lyra
translate: 琉拉

original: A woman stands before the main entrance to the villa
translate: 一名女子站在别墅的主要入口前

original: Her posture speaks of a graceful, coiled power - that of a duelling ace
translate: 她的姿态透露出一种优雅的力量，如同决斗高手

original: No doubt she is the new master-at-arms for house Berryn
translate: 毫无疑问，她是伯林家族的新武艺总管

original: As you approach, she offers a quick, neat bow, just low enough to be respectful
translate: 当你走近时，她微微鞠了一躬，低到足以表示尊重

original: Greetings {PLAYER}
translate: 你好，{PLACEHOLDER_0}

original: Master Cato welcomes you back to House Berryn
translate: 塞托大师欢迎你回到伯林家族

original: The Master is eager to meet with you and is ready at your leisure
translate: 主人迫不及待地想见你，并随时准备与你会面

original: However, if you wish to refresh yourself first, he suggests you visit the kitchen for some food and then perhaps walk the grounds and gardens?
translate: 然而，如果你想先恢复一下，他建议你去厨房吃点东西，然后再出去走走？

original: I wish to see Cato right away!
translate: 我想立刻见卡托！

original: I shall explore a bit
translate: 我打算先探索一下

original: Why have I been summoned?
translate: 为什么我会被召唤？

original: The Maze?
translate: 迷宫？

original: That is for the Master himself to answer
translate: 这是主人自己回答的

original: And he will soon enough
translate: 但他很快就会回答

original: For now though, please, get some food and look around
translate: 不过现在，请先去吃点东西，四处看看

original: Just as your vision begins to narrow and your legs go limp, he releases you and you stumble forewards before spinning around
translate: 当你的视线开始变得模糊，腿也变得无力时，他松开了你，你踉跄着向前走，然后转身

original: I would rather go directly to Cato
translate: 我宁愿直接去见卡托

original: If it pleases you, the Master is in his office, just ahead
translate: 如果您不介意，主人现在在他的办公室里，就在前面

original: And note
translate: 而且请注意

original: Once you meet with the Master, things may move quickly and you may not have another chance to walk the grounds
translate: 一旦你见到主人，事情可能会很快发展，你可能就没有机会再出去走走了

original: Yes, I remember the way
translate: 是的，我记得路

original: I'd prefer to go alone
translate: 我宁愿独自去

original: On second thought, I'd rather explore a bit more first
translate: 再想想，我还是想先多探索一下

original: Excellent
translate: 很好

original: Though I'm sure you still know your way around the grounds, the kitchen is in the building to the east, and the garden and hedge maze, is to the west
translate: 虽然你肯定还熟悉这里的地形，但厨房在东边的那栋建筑里，而花园和迷宫则在西边

original: Come back and check in with me in once you've stretched your legs
translate: 回来后记得向我报告一下

original: Are you ready for Master Cato or do you wish to wander around a bit more?
translate: 你准备好见卡托主人了吗，还是想再四处逛逛？

original: Have you eaten?
translate: 你吃过饭了吗？

original: Or perhaps see the hedge maze if the darkness does not scare you?
translate: 或者也许去看看迷宫，如果你不怕黑暗的话？

original: It would scare me less if you joined me?
translate: 如果你陪我一起去，我会不那么害怕。

original: Let's go see the Master
translate: 我们去看看大师吧。

original: There you are
translate: 你来了。

original: If your nostalgia is appeased, the Master will see you now
translate: 如果你的乡愁得到了安慰，大师现在可以见你了。

original: Let's go see Cato
translate: 我们去见卡托吧。

original: Just a moment!
translate: 请稍等一下！

original: I have a few more things to do
translate: 我还有一些事情要做。

original: This estate was your home for many years; despite the circumstances you left it
translate: 这座庄园曾是你多年的家园；尽管你离开时情况特殊。

original: Perhaps the Master feels it would do you good to revisit some old memories?
translate: 大师或许觉得重温一些旧日记忆对你有好处？

original: Lyra's eyes narrow in a barely perceptible frown
translate: 莉拉的眼神微微皱起。

original: Or some old ghosts
translate: 或者一些旧日幽灵。

original: What does Cato want with me?
translate: 卡托想要找我干什么？

original: Perhaps it would
translate: 或许是这样。

original: Under no circumstance
translate: 绝无仅有。

original: Now if you will excuse me
translate: 现在，如果你不介意的话。

original: #IntroVillaMaze
translate: #IntroVillaMaze

original: You stand at the center of the maze
translate: 你站在迷宫的中心。

original: It feels much less impressive than you remember - the ornamental pond was once an ocean, the rock at its heart a wind-swept island
translate: 这里给人的感觉远没有你记忆中的那么壮观——装饰性的池塘曾经是一片海洋，中间的岩石曾是一座风中的岛屿。

original: You found me, day-dreamer
translate: 你找到我了，白日梦者

original: You remember the tone of her voice, and can almost see the impish, 10-year old girl wading through the pond
translate: 你还记得她的语调，仿佛能看见那个调皮的十岁小女孩在池塘边嬉戏

original: Why do you always come here?
translate: 你总是来这里为什么？

original: I like the water
translate: 我喜欢水

original: It's so calm
translate: 水面如此平静

original: Embla shoots you a mischievous look
translate: 伊姆布拉投来狡黠的一瞥

original: You notice the faintest tang of ozone
translate: 你注意到一丝微妙的臭氧味

original: She makes a slow motion hop through the water, her fingers trailing the pond's surface
translate: 她缓缓跃过水面，手指轻触着水面

original: Where water and skin meet, strange colors bleed and spread across the surface
translate: 水与肌肤相接之处，奇异的色彩在水面上蔓延开来

original: Embla, you'll get in trouble, stop it!
translate: 伊姆布拉，你这样做会惹麻烦的，停下来！

original: Embla moves her fingers across the water's surface like a painter's brush
translate: 伊姆布拉的手指在水面上轻描淡写，如同画家的笔触

original: Colors spill across the pond and for a sleeping moment, you fancy that you can see cloud-topped mountains
translate: 色彩在池塘中流淌，恍惚间你仿佛看到了云顶的山峦

original: Or was it the ramparts of an impossibly large city, reaching towards the heavens?
translate: 或许是那座不可思议庞大的城市的城墙，直指天际？

original: The silence is shattered by a shout, along with the beguiling images
translate: 周围的宁静被一声喊叫打破，那些迷人的景象也随之消散

original: Mistress Embla!
translate: 女主人伊姆布拉！

original: The Master requests you in the house, immediately!
translate: 大师在府邸召唤你，立刻前往！

original: That's my father
translate: 那是我的父亲

original: Something's wrong
translate: 有什么不对劲

original: It's mother
translate: 是母亲

original: She's 'ill' again
translate: 她又病了

original: I think I cause it - with what I can do
translate: 我觉得是我造成的——凭借我的能力

original: It poisons her mind
translate: 它侵蚀了她的理智

original: How long until mother isn't...mother?
translate: 还要多久母亲才不再是……母亲？

original: Or until father isn't lord, or your father isn't Master-at-Arms?
translate: 或者父亲不再是领主，或者你的父亲不再是首席武官？

original: How long will any of it last?
translate: 还有这一切能持续多久？

original: Why're you talking like this?
translate: 你为什么说得这么奇怪？

original: I don't know
translate: 我不知道

original: No one does
translate: 没有人知道

original: Everything falls apart in the end
translate: 最终一切都会分崩离析

original: Do you ever feel like everything is a lie?
translate: 你有没有觉得一切都只是谎言？

original: Like there's a veil that covers everything, but in some parts it's thin enough to see through?
translate: 好像有一层帷幕覆盖了一切，但在某些地方却薄得足以穿透？

original: Embla starts as your father steps breathily into the enclosed garden
translate: 伊姆拉从你父亲喘着气走进封闭花园的那一刻开始

original: He's red-faced from exertion and anger
translate: 他满脸通红，显然是因为劳累和愤怒

original: Young lady, you can't run off like this, the whole estate is looking for you!
translate: 少女，你不能这样跑掉，整个庄园都在找你！

original: Your mother is ill and needs you
translate: 你母亲病了，需要你

original: Your father shoots you a stern glance
translate: 你父亲投来严厉的目光

original: I'll deal with you later
translate: 我会晚点再处理你

original: Embla says nothing as your father grabs her by the arm and hauls her past you, back to the house
translate: 伊姆拉一句话不说，就被你父亲抓着胳膊，从你身边拖回了房子

original: She doesn't meet your eyes as you pass
translate: 她在经过时没有与你对视

original: Finding yourself back in the present, a chill has crept into your bones
translate: 当你回到现实，寒意已经渗入你的骨髓

original: You best move on
translate: 你最好快点行动

original: You stand before the gate to the hedge maze
translate: 你站在迷宫之门之前

original: It stirs old feelings of both dread and elation
translate: 这勾起了你既恐惧又兴奋的旧日情感

original: The sounds and smells of the estate grounds - as they were long ago - call to you from distant memory, You feel you could easily plunge into their depths
translate: 庄园地界的声响和气味——就像很久以前一样——唤起了你遥远的记忆，你感觉可以轻易地投身其中

original: Let yourself go, and remember
translate: 放开自己，回忆吧

original: Which day-dream is it this time?
translate: 这次又是哪个白日梦？

original: Are you valiantly defending me from rebels again?
translate: 你又在保护我免受叛军的攻击吗？

original: Embla throws a pine cone at you, snapping you from your reverie
translate: 埃姆拉向你扔了一个松果，把你从沉思中唤醒

original: She's 10 years old, and you're a year her senior
translate: 她十岁了，你比她大一岁

original: Let's play hide and go seek in the maze, I'll hide!
translate: 让我们在迷宫里玩捉迷藏吧，我要躲起来！

original: You faintly hear someone yell her name from the distance
translate: 你隐约听到有人从远处喊她的名字

original: You better run Star-child!
translate: 你最好快跑，小星星！

original: Only my mother ever calls me that
translate: 只有我母亲曾经这样叫过我

original: Embla says, frowning
translate: 埃姆拉皱着眉头说

original: Where did you hear it from?
translate: 你是在哪里听到的？

original: Before you can reply, she flings another pine-cone at you and darts off into the maze
translate: 在你回答之前，她又向你扔了一个松果，并迅速跑进了迷宫

original: Give chase
translate: 追上去

original: You hear a man's voice yell Embla's name again - much closer now
translate: 你听到一个男人的声音再次喊埃姆拉的名字，这次声音更近了

original: Either way, she's lost to you in the winding passages of the hedge maze
translate: 不管怎样，她在蜿蜒的迷宫通道中已经失去了踪迹

original: Your memory tugs at you, urging you on to the center of the maze
translate: 你的记忆在拉扯你，催促你向迷宫的中心前进

original: #IntroVillaStealth
translate: #IntroVillaStealth

original: Lyra closes the doors to the dining hall
translate: 莉拉关上了餐厅的大门

original: Let's not keep master Cato waiting
translate: 别让卡托大师久等了

original: The finality in her voice leaves no room for discussion
translate: 她的声音中透着决绝，不容商量

original: Lyra clears her throat behind you
translate: 莉拉在你身后清了清嗓子

original: Not that way
translate: 不是那条路

original: If you don't mind, the master's office lies through here
translate: 如果不介意的话，主人的办公室在这边

original: She motions to the left
translate: 她朝左边做了个手势

original: Do you mind if I look around a bit?
translate: 你介意我四处看看吗？

original: Master Cato has summoned you and I don't intend to keep him waiting
translate: 卡托大师已经召唤你了，我可不想让他久等

original: Besides, there is no need for you to disturb the servants in their tasks
translate: 更何况，你大可不必打扰仆人们的日常工作

original: I'll be silent as the night!
translate: 我会像夜色一样静悄悄！

original: Lyra goes still for a fraction of a second as if sensing something beyond just your perception
translate: 莉拉微微一瞬，仿佛感知到了什么超出常人的东西

original: Then her eyes narrow and a mischievous smile plays across her features
translate: 然后她的眼神变得锐利，脸上浮现出狡黠的笑容

original: Through the dining hall lies the hearth
translate: 餐厅里有一处火炉

original: A beast lurks there
translate: 有一头野兽潜伏在那里

original: I wager you cannot make your way past the servants in the dining hall and sneak up on this beast without being noticed?
translate: 我打赌你无法在不被发现的情况下，从仆人们的视线中接近那头野兽

original: What shall we wager?
translate: 我们赌什么？

original: On second thought
translate: 想起什么

original: We'll decide that once we see if you can be as quiet as you claim
translate: 等我们看看你是否真的如你所说的那般悄无声息再决定吧

original: The dining hall and hearth lies ahead
translate: 餐厅和火炉就在前面

original: And mind your steps
translate: 踏步要小心

original: I'll only give you one chance!
translate: 我只给你一次机会！

original: And the glory shall be yours, sneak-thief!
translate: 跟踪者，荣耀将属于你！

original: She feigns a silent applause and leads you on your way
translate: 她假装鼓掌，然后领你上路

original: Lyra spins around and for a moment you fear she's going to punch you
translate: 琉拉转过身，你一时担心她要打你

original: Abruptly she leans in and whispers in your ear
translate: 突然，她凑近耳边低语

original: In that case, we shall save it for when you return from your assignment
translate: 那么，我们等你完成任务回来再做这件事

original: Now let's go
translate: 现在，我们出发

original: Lyra continues to walk in silence
translate: 琉拉继续沉默地走着

original: You're unsure if she heard you, but then again you get a strong feeling it's better to let the issue lay
translate: 你不确定她是否听见了，但你又觉得还是不要多说为妙

original: Continue with your tail between your legs
translate: 你垂头丧气地继续走

original: Very well!
translate: 好了！

original: Lyra places a coin in her open palm
translate: 琉拉将一枚硬币放在摊开的手掌上

original: Attempt to grab it
translate: 尝试去抓它

original: Despite several attempts, you fail to snatch the coin from her
translate: 尽管尝试了好几次，你还是没能从她手中抢到硬币

original: You fail because you are waiting for the right moment to strike
translate: 你失败了，因为你一直在等待最佳时机

original: Instead, you must strike in the void between moments
translate: 相反，你必须在两个瞬间之间的空隙中出手

original: Ponder this
translate: 深思熟虑

original: Now, let’s go
translate: 现在，我们出发

original: Lyra laughs and pats Roland on the shoulder
translate: 莉拉笑着拍了拍罗兰的肩膀

original: {PLAYER}, I present Roland Grayeye
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__，我向你们介绍罗兰·灰眼

original: A man you should pray to always fight alongside and never against
translate: 一个你们应该祈祷永远并肩作战而不是对抗的人

original: Roland offers up a large, battle-worn hand and his grasp is surprisingly soft as you clasp it
translate: 罗兰伸出了一个大而饱经战事的手，你握住它时，惊讶地发现他的手出奇地柔软

original: You realize he’s making an effort not to harm you with the gesture
translate: 你意识到他正努力避免以这种方式伤害你

original: Good to see I’m not alone in waiting on the rich and noble
translate: 很高兴看到我不是唯一一个等待富人和贵族的人

original: His mouth contorts into something resembling a smile
translate: 他的嘴扭曲成了一种类似微笑的表情

original: Have you been summoned as well?
translate: 你也被召唤了吗？

original: You whirl around to the left, grasping instinctively at the weapon that isn't hanging by your side
translate: 你向左转身，本能地去抓悬挂在你身侧的武器

original: Blood rushes to your head and your mouth goes dry
translate: 血液涌向你的头部，你的嘴巴变得干燥

original: You see nothing
translate: 你看不到任何东西

original: In the corner of your eye you register Lyra rolling her eyes
translate: 你眼角瞥见莉拉翻了翻白眼

original: A slow rumbling laugh sounds from the opposite corner as a hulking shadow emerges
translate: 对面角落里传来低沉的笑声，一个巨大的阴影从中浮现

original: Don’t feel bad
translate: 别难过了

original: All it would have bought you, was time to see the killing blade
translate: 它能给你带来的，只是多一点时间看到致命的刀刃

original: You whirl around to the right, grasping instinctively at the weapon that isn't hanging by your side
translate: 你向右转身，本能地去抓悬挂在你身侧的武器

original: The figure standing in the shadows behind you is laden with the promise of violence
translate: 站在你身后阴影中的那个人充满了暴力的威胁

original: In the corner of your eye you register Lyra biting her lip in gleeful anticipation
translate: 你眼角瞥见莉拉咬着嘴唇，充满愉悦的期待

original: The figure's slow laugh has the texture of an avalanche as he slowly emerges from the shadows
translate: 那个身影的缓慢笑声如同雪崩一般，他缓缓从阴影中走出

original: You’d be dead either way
translate: 无论怎样你都会死

original: But at least you’d get a chance to see the blade
translate: 至少你有机会见识一下那把剑

original: The servant offers a startled shriek as she spots you
translate: 仆人发现你后惊叫一声

original: The plate she drops echoes through the vaulted dining hall
translate: 她手中的盘子掉落在地，回声在拱形的餐厅中回荡

original: Lyra emerges from the shadows behind you, apparently amused by your clumsiness
translate: 莉拉从你身后阴影中走出，显然对你的笨拙感到好笑

original: With feigned sadness she pats your cheek
translate: 她假装悲伤地拍了拍你的脸颊

original: I had expected more from you
translate: 我原本对你寄予厚望

original: She leads you from the dining hall back to the foyer
translate: 她带着你从餐厅带回了前厅

original: The room around you lies silent and seemingly empty save the crackling of burning logs
translate: 周围的房间静悄悄的，似乎空无一人，只有燃烧木柴的噼啪声

original: The fire casts a dim light and dancing shadows
translate: 火光昏暗，投下摇曳的影子

original: A single goblet stands half empty on a small table
translate: 小桌上半空着一个酒杯

original: Lyra’s warm breath on your ear startles you as she whispers near imperceptibly
translate: 她在你耳边低语，温暖的气息让你一惊

original: We have walked into a trap
translate: 我们落入了陷阱

original: The beast has laid an ambush for us
translate: 那怪物为我们设下了埋伏

original: Can you sense him preparing to strike?
translate: 你能感觉到它在准备攻击吗？

original: Hairs stand up on your neck
translate: 你的后颈毛发竖起

original: If it is from latent danger or something else, you cannot tell
translate: 是因为潜在的危险还是其他原因，你无法分辨

original: No!
translate: 不！

original: Do not look!
translate: 不要看！

original: She whispers, louder now
translate: 她的声音更大了，低声说

original: Close your eyes
translate: 闭上眼睛

original: Let your sensing be the absence of action
translate: 让你的感知成为无为

original: Become empty for the ambience to flow into you
translate: 使心灵空灵，让氛围自然融入

original: Now, is he to our right or left side?
translate: 现在他是在我们右侧还是左侧？

original: Empty your mind
translate: 清空你的思绪

original: Lyra leads you back through the dining hall
translate: 琉拉领着你重新穿过餐厅

original: A slight sense of urgency has crept into her step
translate: 她的步伐中多了一丝急迫感

original: Follow
translate: 跟上

original: Wait!
translate: 等一下！

original: What about the wager?
translate: 关于赌注呢？

original: Roland's good eye, shifts momentarily to Lyra who interjects
translate: 罗兰敏锐的目光短暂地转向了插话的琉拉

original: One of my master's foremost skills is his ability to recognize and attract resourceful individuals
translate: 我主人最擅长的一项技能就是识别并吸引有才能的人

original: Roland is one such individual
translate: 罗兰就是其中之一

original: As are you, it seems
translate: 看来你也一样

original: Now, my master has waited long enough, and you two will have enough time to get to know one another later
translate: 现在，我的主人已经等得足够久了，你们俩稍后再慢慢熟悉也不迟

original: Lyra offers a short bow to Roland who returns it in a surprisingly respectful manner
translate: 琉拉微微鞠了一躬，罗兰以一种出乎意料的尊敬态度回应

original: We must go
translate: 我们必须走了

original: Ah; The wager!
translate: 哦；那个赌注！

original: What is a fitting prize for such a feat?
translate: 对于这样的成就，有什么合适的奖品吗？

original: The glory alone will suffice
translate: 仅凭荣耀就足够了

original: Teach me something!
translate: 教我点什么！

original: A kiss?
translate: 一个吻？

original: #IntroVillaVeteran
translate: #IntroVillaVeteran

original: Tell me boy, what would yer father say if he knew you considered yourself the better of his old friends?
translate: 告诉我，男孩，如果你的父亲知道你认为自己比他的老朋友更好，他会怎么说？

original: Though his voice is full of gravel, there's now a glint in his eyes, as though the old coals have begun to warm up
translate: 尽管他的声音沙哑，但眼中却闪过一丝光芒，仿佛旧日的火苗开始重新燃烧

original: Tell me girl, what would yer father say if he knew you considered yourself the better of his old friends?
translate: 告诉我，女孩，如果你的父亲知道你认为自己比他的老朋友更好，他会怎么说？

original: Kydeon!?
translate: 基德昂！？

original: Is that you?
translate: 是你吗？

original: I have no time for the ghosts of my father's past
translate: 我没有时间去理会父亲过去的幽灵

original: Say nothing, and keep walking
translate: 不要说话，继续走

original: Disappointment clouds the man's face, and he calls after you
translate: 男人的脸上布满了失望，他喊着你的名字

original: Very well, I suppose you're no longer the lad I remember
translate: 好吧，我想你已经不再是那个我记忆中的少年了

original: Lyra awaits at the main entrance
translate: 莉拉在正门等候

original: She'll take you to the Master, for better or worse
translate: 她会带你去见大师，无论结果如何

original: Kydeon smiles sadly
translate: 基德昂露出悲伤的微笑

original: An old soldier's greeting
translate: 一个老军人的问候

original: Something one mercenary would say to another as a prayer to not dwell on painful memories
translate: 一个佣兵对另一个佣兵祈祷般的话语，希望不要沉溺于痛苦的回忆

original: The kind that comes with the work
translate: 这是工作的一部分

original: Your father and I
translate: 你父亲和我

original: Kydeon halts momentarily and looks at you
translate: 基德昂顿了一下，看着你

original: Your father and I would always part with those words
translate: 你父亲和我总是用这些话告别

original: Now, I've held you long enough
translate: 现在，我已经够久地握住你了

original: If it’s the hedge maze you mean, just head west and then north
translate: 如果是你指的迷宫，那就往西走，然后向北

original: Then again you must have known that?
translate: 再说，你当时应该就知道了吧？

original: Had to drag you out o’ there enough times
translate: 我已经够多次把你从那里拉出来了

original: I won't betray my Master's confidence by saying more
translate: 我不会为了多说几句而背叛主人的信任

original: Best you see him yourself

original: Kydeon

original: Return his challenging stare

translate: 你还没去看过她吗？

translate: 她就在我身后楼梯上！

translate: 当你见到卡托大师时，他会好好咬你的耳朵，{PLAYER}

translate: 莉拉，新的军械官正在大门外等你

translate: 她会护送你 - 不要要求她不要

translate: 如果你以为我脾气不好

original: The joke fails to hide the note of anxiety in the grizzled House guard's voice

original: I shall look for this Lyra

original: #IntroWineCellar
translate: #Intro酒窖

original: Your father jolts upright, the bloodshot whites of his eyes glaring out of the darkness

original: Mistress Valeria
translate: 阿莉维娅女爵

original: Help him stand

translate: 犹豫地，依靠着你，你父亲终于站了起来

translate: 但我辜负了他：阿莉维娅付出了代价，心智破碎，那个孩子的孽种

translate: 你还记得地窖昏暗光线中，你还没看清他扭动的身影时就闻到了他的气味

original: Mistress Valeria!

translate: 他们派我来这里是因为他们不在乎我，所以他们更不在乎霍里恩。

original: Look
translate: 看

translate: 第一章总督介绍
