translate: 你被迎入一个豪华而宏大的接待大厅，音乐声鼎沸，宾客们身着华丽的服饰，令人垂涎的香气扑鼻而来

original: The man addressing you is covered in stately marks of office, but his finery, like his smile, look ill suited to him
translate: 正在与你交谈的男子身上布满了庄重的官职标志，但他的华服，就像他的笑容一样，似乎与他不太相称

original: The man casts a glance around the lavish occasion, then bows
translate: 男子环视这个豪华的场合，然后鞠了一躬

original: The Governor and Imperial Steward of Idra, Varain Kalthuun, welcomes you to the last bastion of civilisation - who might you be?'
translate: 伊德拉的总督兼帝国总管，瓦瑞恩·卡尔图恩，欢迎你们来到文明的最后一道堡垒——你们是哪位？

original: Mercenary
translate: 武士

original: your worst niughtmare
translate: 你最恐怖的噩梦

original: something else
translate: 其他东西

original: Yes, well, more the merrier I say
translate: 嗯，好吧，越多越好，我说

original: This is the place to be
translate: 这里是最佳去处

original: I'd offer you a tour but discovering it for yourself is half the fun
translate: 我可以给你们做个导览，但自己探索的乐趣也是其中一半

original: Anything I can help you with before you make merry?
translate: 在你们尽情享乐之前，我能帮你们什么忙吗？

original: I can think of one or two things
translate: 我能想到一两件事

original: I'll go explore
translate: 我要去探索一下

original: GO ORF
translate: 去吧，兽人！

original: Quite so
translate: 当然

original: I'm sure I will bump into you shortly - until then, I only ask you stay out of any room with a closed door
translate: 我相信很快就会再见到你 - 在那之前，只希望你不要进入任何有关闭房门的房间

original: If you need anything... hah!
translate: 如果你需要什么... 哈哈！

original: You won't
translate: 你不会的

original: I'm sure we'll see one another again soon
translate: 我相信我们很快就会再见面

original: Of course
translate: 当然

original: Truly frightful business
translate: 真是可怕的事情

original: I always said that dingy Priory would wreak havoc somehow
translate: 我一直说那个破烂的修道院迟早会出问题

original: Not much to be done now, of course, other than leave whatever is happening well alone
translate: 当然，现在除了让事情自行发展，别无他法

original: It'll blow over
translate: 这事迟早会平息的

original: Qs again
translate: 再问一遍

original: Can you elaborate?
translate: 你能详细说明一下吗？

original: Horryn MORE
translate: 恐怖更多

original: Yes sure here are some thoughts: some kind of natural disaster, precipitated by their own folly - idk
translate: 是的，当然，这里有一些想法：某种自然灾害，由他们自己的愚蠢引发 - 不知道了

original: It could all be tainted
translate: 这一切可能都被污染了

original: QUARANTINING
translate: 隔离

original: What will the mainland say about it?
translate: 主岛会怎么说？

original: Backto Qs
translate: 回到问题

original: Coward!!
translate: 胆小鬼！

original: OCCASION
translate: OCCASION

original: justification for just keeping the status quo
translate: 保持现状的理由

original: Saviour xomplex
translate: 救世主综合体

original: Once this strangeness blows over, this will be the elite men and women who rebuild into true greatness
translate: 等这怪事过去之后，这里将是真正的精英，重建真正的伟大

original: Back to Qs
translate: 回到问题列表

original: Who's here, anyone famous?
translate: 谁在这里？有谁是名人吗？

original: WHO'S WHO
translate: 谁是谁？

original: well we got bob, jimmy, the count, the duck, jessie and nefarious the magister
translate: 我们有鲍勃、吉米、伯爵、鸭子、杰西和法师尼法瑞厄斯

original: Return to qs
translate: 回到问题列表

original: Help coming?
translate: 有人来帮忙吗？

original: Nah
translate: 没有

original: They don't care
translate: 他们不关心

original: Monsters in seas even if they could get here
translate: 即使他们能到这里，海里的怪物也来了

original: They know I can handle things, and I will
translate: 他们知道我能处理这些事情，而且我会处理好

original: Qs
translate: 问题列表

original: How can I help?
translate: 我能怎么帮忙？

original: Have you heard about Horryn?
translate: 你听说过霍林吗？

original: What's the occasion?
translate: 有什么特别的场合吗？

original: Is help coming?
translate: 有人来帮忙吗？

original: I'm done here
translate: 我已经完成了这里的事情

original: #Chapter1Governor
translate: #第一章总督

original: #Chapter1IagoIntro
translate: #第一章艾戈介绍

original: You lured me here, just to rob me, like a petty criminal?
translate: 你只是为了抢劫我，就像一个小偷一样把我引诱到这里？

original: Oh, you poor fool - if only you knew who you were dealing with
translate: 哦，可怜的傻瓜——如果你知道你在和谁打交道就好了

original: The Queen has many friends in the Freymark
translate: 国王在弗雷姆卡尔有很多朋友

original: Freinds who prefer their dealings be kept from Imperial eyes
translate: 这些朋友更喜欢自己的事务不被帝国的眼睛看见

original: So when she bids me unfurl the black sails, I do
translate: 所以当她命令我升起黑色的帆时，我就照做了

original: With pleasure I must add
translate: 我很高兴补充说

original: Iago smiles broadly
translate: 艾戈露出灿烂的笑容

original: Who are these 'friends'?
translate: 这些“朋友”是谁？

original: Iago puts his fingertips to his chin in mock umbrage
translate: 艾戈用手指轻轻触碰下巴，做出一副假装生气的样子

original: You imply I exaggerate my exploits?
translate: 你暗示我夸大了我的功绩？

original: No doubt I owe you my life, but I will not suffer my honor being questioned!
translate: 我当然欠你一条命，但我不允许我的荣誉受到质疑！

original: I meant no offense
translate: 我没有冒犯的意思

original: Your honour is intact
translate: 你的荣誉完好无损

original: My patience is not
translate: 我的耐心却已经到了极限

original: Iago barks a wry laugh
translate: 艾戈发出一种苦涩的笑声

original: I consider myself above the petty politics of the Imperials and Freythen
translate: 我认为自己高于帝国和弗雷森的琐碎政治

original: But - I am loyal to my 'Queen' - who currently sympathises with the Thanes of Freymark
translate: 但——我忠于我的“女王”——目前她同情弗雷姆卡尔的thane们

original: But if we must discuss politics, let us do so again somewhere warmer, with wine in our bellies
translate: 但如果必须讨论政治，那就让我们到一个更暖和的地方，喝着酒再谈吧

original: Seeming to suddenly remember, Iago asks,
translate: 好像突然想起了什么，伊阿哥问道，

original: Things are not right here on Idra, are they?
translate: 伊德拉这里出问题了，不是吗？

original: What foulness has transpired here?
translate: 这里发生了什么肮脏的事情？

original: Horryn is lost
translate: 哈罗因失踪了

original: To what, no-one yet knows
translate: 而且没人知道她去了哪里

original: Horryn's gone dark
translate: 哈罗因已经失联了

original: Iago looks askance at you
translate: 伊阿哥斜睨了你一眼

original: Well, that won't do, will it?
translate: 那可不行，对吧？

original: In any case, we should make haste to the queen's lair
translate: 无论如何，我们最好赶快去女王的巢穴

original: Not many places are safer than wherever she is
translate: 她所在的地方应该比其他地方更安全

original: Before we go, I must ask
translate: 在我们出发前，我必须问一下

original: Let's go
translate: 我们走吧

original: Iago
translate: 伊阿哥

original: Blessed stranger, I owe you my life!
translate: 圣洁的陌生人，我的生命是你赐予的！

original: When we could not spot the signal as expected, I feared we were trapped!
translate: 当我们没有如预期般看到信号时，我担心我们被陷害了！

original: But you are not my usual contact - tell me, to whom do I owe this debt of gratitude?
translate: 但你不是我的通常联系人——告诉我，我欠谁这份恩情？

original: Though the gratitude appears genuine, there is a distinct tone of caution in his voice
translate: 虽然感激之情显得很真诚，但他的话语中却带着明显的谨慎

original: We are allies of the 'Queen'
translate: 我们是‘女王’的盟友

original: I'm a professional
translate: 我是个专业的 {PLAYER}

original: That's all
translate: 这就是全部了

original: You thank me too soon
translate: 你太早谢我了

original: Give up your arms!
translate: 放下你的武器！

original: Yes I guessed as much!
translate: 是的，我猜得没错！

original: Non the less, I owe you my life
translate: 不过，你救了我的命

original: Had it not been for you we would have been trapped and, I fear, lost to that foul abomination from the deep!
translate: 要不是因为你，我们会被困住，我恐怕会被那深海中的可憎生物吞噬！

original: How so?
translate: 为什么？

original: Nevertheless, I owe you my life
translate: 不过，你救了我的命

original: A foul leviathan of the depths came upon us as soon as we spotted Idra!
translate: 似乎有一头深海的利维坦一见到伊德拉号就出现了

original: But my ship is fast and the wind was at my back
translate: 但我的船速度很快，风也在我的背后

original: Had it not been, we would be ffeding the fish now
translate: 要不是这样，我们现在恐怕已经成了鱼饵了

original: Go on
translate: 继续说

original: Spare me the drama!
translate: 别给我演戏了！

original: Bless the stars, we made it to the realtive safetfy of the outer searocks
translate: 多亏了星辰的庇佑，我们终于到达了外礁的相对安全地带

original: The leviathan it seems, will not give chase into shallow waters
translate: 看来，利维坦不会追到浅水区

original: However, we had gone from the frying pan, into the fire!
translate: 不过，我们从火坑跳进了沸水

original: Go on!
translate: 继续说

original: Oh spare me the drama!
translate: 好吧，别给我演戏了！

original: Imperials prowl the shores and costs of Idra due to the nature of the cargo we carry and the friends we keep
translate: 帝国军队在伊德拉的海岸和海域巡逻，因为我们的货物和结交的朋友

original: We did not dare approach land until the signal was given!
translate: 我们直到收到信号才敢靠近陆地！

original: I don't have time for this drama!
translate: 我没时间玩这些把戏！

original: You've fallen into my trap!
translate: 你掉进我的陷阱里了！

original: Now give up your arms!
translate: 现在放下武器投降吧！

original: You may sail with me, if you wish it?
translate: 如果你想的话，可以和我一起航行？

original: We'll stay close to the coast, it should be perfectly safe
translate: 我们会靠近海岸航行，应该非常安全

original: Thank you - I accept
translate: 谢谢 - 我接受

original: We'll meet you there
translate: 我们会在那里见面

original: I know it was angry, possessed of many tentacles, and had a deep hunger for handsome, daring sailors
translate: 我知道它很愤怒，长着许多触手，对英俊大胆的水手有着深深的渴望

original: Beyond that, the thing is a bloody terrifying mystery to me
translate: 至于其他，对我来说那东西是个血腥恐怖的谜

original: That about lines up with my experience
translate: 这大概和我的经历相符

original: I doubt it's that discerning, but yes
translate: 我怀疑它不会那么挑剔，但可以

original: Iago grins rakishly
translate: 奥古斯汀邪气地笑着

original: We need your ship!
translate: 我们需要你的船！

original: What do you know of the leviathan?
translate: 你对利维坦了解多少？

original: What cargo do you carry?
translate: 你携带的是什么货物？

original: It's time we got going
translate: 我们该出发了

original: I understand your desire - she's quite the beauty
translate: 我理解你的渴望——她确实非常美丽

original: Sleek, trusty - happy so long as she has a few strong hands on her
translate: 精致，可靠——只要她有几个有力的手在她身上，她就很开心

original: But I guess you had something more specific in mind?
translate: 但我想你可能有更具体的想法？

original: I need to sail into the Black Priory
translate: 我需要驶向黑修道院

original: To get off this rock, for good
translate: 想要离开这块岩石，一劳永逸

original: Try asking me again - and a little more politely - after we've visited my lady the Queen
translate: 试着在我见过我的女王 lady 之后再问我，而且要礼貌一些

original: And when you can reassure me that the many-legged sea-bastard won't smash us into smithereens
translate: 而当你能够让我放心，那些多脚的海怪不会将我们粉碎成碎片时

original: I will
translate: 我会考虑

original: I'll ask however I please
translate: 我会以任何方式询问

original: #Chapter1MinorEncounters
translate: #第一章次要遭遇

original: Dead Sailors
translate: 死亡水手

original: Corpses litter the ground
translate: 地面上散布着尸体

original: Tragically, these sailors appear to have made it to shore only to be brutally murdered
translate: 可悲的是，这些水手似乎到达了陆地，却被残忍地杀害

original: The horrid wounds and grusome dismemberments tells you that this must have been the work of mad men
translate: 恶毒的伤口和惨不忍睹的肢解表明这一定是疯子所为

original: The work of those bloody reavers no doubt
translate: 无疑是那些流寇所为

original: Rolands growls
translate: 洛兰低吼

original: Rats
translate: 老鼠

original: As you enter the darkened lighthouse, you spot a pair of hideously transformed creatures that must once have been rats!
translate: 当你进入黑暗的灯塔时，你注意到一对曾经可能是老鼠的可怕变形生物！

original: They scurry off into the darkness leaving you with a pounding heart
translate: 它们匆匆逃入黑暗，让你的心脏砰砰直跳

original: You must be carefull as you advance
translate: 你必须小心前进

original: #Chapter1Mistress
translate: #第一章女主人

original: There are many beautiful women, elegantly and richly dressed and coiffed, mincing around the room - but one stands clearly apart
translate: 有许多美丽、优雅且富丽堂皇的女士在房间里踱步 - 但其中一位显然与众不同

original: Not because she’s somehow on another plane of beatific loveliness - quite the opposite - she’s dressed as plainly as could be considered ‘polite’, her hair is piled high - but more like a stack of bird nests than the latest court fashion
translate: 不是因为她某种超凡脱俗的美丽 - 相反 - 她的打扮极为朴素，几乎可以说是‘得体’的极限，她的头发高高堆起 - 但更像是鸟巢堆叠而不是最新的宫廷时尚

original: It also appears she’s applied her makeup with the intention of looking as fierce as possible
translate: 看起来她化妆的目的是让自己看起来尽可能凶猛

original: Don’t tell me” she sighs
translate: “不要告诉我，”她叹了口气。

original: You forgot your ball gowns
translate: 你忘了你的晚礼服了。

original: We’re not here for the party
translate: 我们不是来参加派对的。

original: Are you the governor’s mistress?
translate: 你是总督的情妇吗？

original: LEDGERS
translate: 账本

original: Well, I know where keeps his ledgers
translate: 嗯，我知道他把账本藏在哪里。

original: They’re either heavily forged or going to clearly show where the Imperial coin has been going
translate: 这些账本要么加固得很重，要么会明显显示出帝国钱币的流向。

original: Would that help?
translate: 这会有所帮助吗？

original: PAYMENT
translate: 结算

original: Yes, yes
translate: 是的，是的。

original: I can easily help you liberate some of his more valuable office of state accoutrement
translate: 我很容易就能帮你夺取他一些更有价值的办公用品。

original: Or, to put it in language someone such as you might understand - I can help you rob him blind
translate: 或者，用你可能能理解的语言来说，我可以帮你让他倾家荡产。

original: about her
translate: 她环视四周。

original: Elemai, is my name
translate: 我叫Elemai。

original: And I prefer the term ‘consort’, but you have the truth of it
translate: 而我更喜欢用“情妇”这个词，但你已经说出了真相。

original: Well - to whom do I owe the pleasure?
translate: 那么，我有幸见到的是谁？

original: I'm a mercenary
translate: 我是一名佣兵。

original: why here
translate: 为什么在这里？

original: And you gate-crashed our little soiree - to what, drum up business?
translate: 你擅自闯入我们的小聚会，是为了什么？难道是为了招揽生意？

original: Kill the governor?
translate: 杀死总督吗？

original: Sabotage the canapes?
translate: 破坏开胃小点心？

original: I need to commandeer a boat
translate: 我需要夺取一艘船

original: Maybe you can help
translate: 或许你能帮忙

original: I'm just investigating
translate: 我只是在调查

original: I'm here to kill the Governor
translate: 我是来杀总督的

original: I'm here to get you out
translate: 我是来救你的

original: why boat?
translate: 为什么要船？

original: Oh, I’m scandalised
translate: 哦，我感到震惊

original: To get into the Black Priory
translate: 要进入黑修道院

original: priory
translate: 修道院

original: That place is both locked up tight, and yet also the source of all this...unpleasantness...if I understand correctly
translate: 那个地方既被严密封锁，又是这一切……不快之事……的源头，如果我理解正确的话

original: We're on a rescue mission
translate: 我们正在进行一次救援任务

original: It's a private matter
translate: 这是一件私事

original: Someone needs to pay
translate: 有人需要付出代价

original: rescuie her
translate: 抢救她

original: What would you say to rescuing me into the bargain?
translate: 你愿意顺便救我吗？

original: I can make it worth your while
translate: 我可以让你获利

original: If you don't get in our way, sure
translate: 如果你不要挡我们的路，可以

original: I'm going to need to ask you something first
translate: 我首先要问你一个问题

original: Absolutely not
translate: 绝对不行

original: It won't be safe
translate: 这里不安全

original: ABOUT GOVERNOR
translate: 关于总督

original: You mean, aside from the fact he’s a colossal coward, an inveterate dandy and a hopelessly profligate spender?
translate: 你的意思是，除了他是个巨大的胆小鬼、顽固的花花公子和一个无药可救的挥霍者之外？

original: At least he lets me walk all over him
translate: 至少他让我为所欲为

original: I mean, literally - that’s his favourite - the damn pervert
translate: 我的意思是，字面上——那可是他最喜欢的——那个该死的变态

original: That's enough about him
translate: 再说他也不过如此了

original: Yes, aside from that
translate: 是的，除此之外

original: HAPPY?
translate: 开心吗？

original: Happy?
translate: 开心吗？

original: HAPPY?!
translate: 开心吗！？

original: She laughs wildly, throwing her head back, before grabbing another fluted glass of wine from a passing servant
translate: 她狂笑起来，向后仰头，然后从经过的服务生手中抓起另一只酒杯

original: I live in a prison of endless, half-hearted debauchery
translate: 我生活在无尽的半心半意的放纵中

original: What more could a girl want?
translate: 女孩还能想要更多吗？

original: So come with us
translate: 所以跟我们走吧

original: Did the Governor kidnap you?
translate: 总督绑架你了吗？

original: Much as I’ve come to loathe him, no - I came here of my own volition
translate: 尽管我已经对他恨之入骨，不，我是自愿来的

original: Plan was to elevate my social standing then leave him for dust
translate: 计划是提高我的社会地位，然后把他抛诸脑后

original: But the light went out on that plan just as they did in Horryn
translate: 但在霍林，那个计划也烟消云散了

original: Understood
translate: 明白了

original: I would ask another question
translate: 我会再问一个问题

original: THE PLAN
translate: 计划

original: You mean to carve a path through our guards, crew the ship and somehow guarantee I’ll make it back to the mainland in one piece?
translate: 你的意思是打算穿过我们的守卫，驾驶船只， somehow 保证我能完好无损地回到大陆？

original: Precisely
translate: 恰当其分

original: DETAILS
translate: 细节

original: Then I’m in!
translate: 那我就加入你们了！

original: But - should we discuss details?
translate: 但是 - 我们需要讨论细节吗？

original: The Governor is still an Imperial agent after all - what's to say we won't be thrown in jail soon as set foot on the mainland?
translate: 治安官仍然是帝国的代理人 - 万一上了岸就会被抓进监狱吗？

original: We're going to need insurance
translate: 我们需要保险

original: You said you could make it worth my while?
translate: 你说过你能让我觉得值得？

original: It's not going to be an issue
translate: 这不会成为问题

original: QUESTIONS
translate: 问题

original: You can but ask
translate: 你可以问

original: You're not happy here?
translate: 你不满意这里的生活？

original: What can you tell me about the Governor?
translate: 你能告诉我关于治安官的更多信息吗？

original: #Chapter1Monolith
translate: #第一章 石碑

original: Your eyes are drawn in by the mesmerizing spiral symbol
translate: 你的目光被迷人的螺旋符号吸引

original: For a brief moment it almost seems to shift
translate: 瞬间似乎有所变化

original: Driina brushes her hand across it
translate: Driina 轻轻抚过它

original: I've seen these spirals before
translate: 我见过这些螺旋

original: The fishermen of Idra paint them on the prows of their boats for luck
translate: 爱德拉的渔民会在船头涂上它们以求好运

original: Foolish superstitions
translate: 荒谬的迷信

original: You avert your eyes and instead shift the small pile of offerings with your foot
translate: 你移开目光，用脚踢了踢那堆祭品

original: It occurs to you that these can't be more than a few weeks old
translate: 你想到这些祭品可能还不到几周

original: Or perhaps days
translate: 或者几天

original: A Standing Stone
translate: 竖立的石碑

original: A grim monolith rises from the rugged landscape
translate: 一块阴沉的巨石从崎岖的地面上拔地而起

original: Ancient and weathered, the stone must have stood here for centuries
translate: 年久风化，这块石头显然已经矗立在这里好几个世纪了

original: Painted on it are crude spiral-shaped runes and at the base of the monolith lie piles of eggshells, flowers and fishbones
translate: 石碑上绘有粗犷的螺旋形符文，而在巨石底部则堆满了蛋壳、花朵和鱼骨

original: Examine closer
translate: 更仔细地查看

original: #Chapter1Palace_Guards
translate: #第一章王宫卫兵

original: A large, stately villa set amidst sprawling gardens is ringed by a large, iron fence
translate: 一座宏伟的别墅被广阔的花园环绕，四周被一排铁栅栏包围

original: Even from this distance, you can hear the faint noise of merrymaking - and judging from the state of the gardens, this party has been going on for quite some time
translate: 即使从远处也能听到微弱的欢声笑语——从花园的状态来看，这场派对已经持续了相当长一段时间

original: You approach the main gate
translate: 你走近大门

original: There are two lightly armed guards - looking better suited to a pageant than a battle - looking dejected and tired
translate: 有两名轻装的守卫——看起来更适合作为庆典而非战斗——显得沮丧且疲惫

original: One of them half-heartedly tilts his halberd - colourfully adorned with various tassels - at you as you near
translate: 当你走近时，其中一名守卫勉强举起一把色彩斑斓、装饰着各种流苏的长柄斧

original: Halt
translate: 停下

original: Do you have an invitation?
translate: 你有邀请函吗？

original: Invitation?
translate: 邀请函？

original: To what?
translate: 邀请函是给谁的？

original: You don't need to see my invitation
translate: 你不需要出示邀请函

original: I have business with the Governor
translate: 我有事要找总督

original: Attack them
translate: 攻击他们

original: FLEE
translate: 逃跑

original: should we really flee?
translate: 真的要逃跑吗？

original: Yah
translate: 哦

original: There's a refugee camp - they could really do with the help
translate: 有一个难民营地 - 他们真的需要帮助

original: Do it
translate: 做吧

original: I'm about to raise hell in here
translate: 我马上要在这里闹翻天了

original: Your call, lads
translate: 你们决定吧，伙计们

original: LEMME IN
translate: 让我进去

original: The two guards exchange glances
translate: 两个守卫交换了一下眼神

original: The guard that has so far remained silent looks pleadingly at the other
translate: 目前保持沉默的那个守卫乞求地看着另一个

original: Music continues to waft from the villa, while stately silhouettes glide past them the wall windows
translate: 从别墅里传来音乐，而庄重的身影从墙上的窗户掠过

original: I'm coming in, either way
translate: 我不管怎样都要进来

original: I've got a better idea
translate: 我有更好的主意

original: IN
translate: 进去

original: It's not worth our trouble anyway
translate: 无论如何这都不值得我们费劲

original: Thanks
translate: 谢谢

original: Wise choice
translate: 明智的选择

original: Gov Qs
translate: 总督大人

original: Mistress?
translate: 女主人？

original: Garrison?
translate: 驻军？

original: The guard addressing you sighs, while his counterpart looks disinterestedly into the distance
translate: 哨兵对你叹了口气，而他的同伴则无趣地望向远方

original: Look, whatever has happened in Horryn, there’s still order here
translate: 看来，无论霍里恩发生了什么，这里还是有秩序的

original: And you’ll need at least some kind of reason for us to let you - an armed, and complete stranger - into the villa
translate: 你至少得有个理由，让我们这个武装的陌生人进入别墅

original: You don’t seem very...dutiful
translate: 你看起来不太……尽职

original: I have urgent business with the Governor
translate: 我有急事要见总督

original: Good luck with that
translate: 祝你好运

original: The Governor is not exactly studiously poring over paperwork these days
translate: 总督最近可没花太多时间在公文上

original: What is this 'business', anyway?
translate: 这‘生意’究竟是什么？

original: I bear word from his Chamberlain
translate: 我带来了总管的口信

original: It's between me and him
translate: 这件事只有我和他清楚

original: Let me through
translate: 让我进去

original: I really don't have time for this
translate: 我真的没时间浪费

original: Times are strange, but we’re still soldiers of the Empire, with orders to keep anyone from disrupting the ball
translate: 时代不同了，但我们仍是帝国的士兵，任务是防止任何人干扰舞会

original: And to wear these damn parade colours
translate: 还要穿这些该死的阅兵服

original: Tell us who you are, and perhaps we'll consider it
translate: 告诉我们你是谁，或许我们会考虑

original: Mercenaries
translate: 武士

original: And I would see the governor, invitation or no
translate: 我无论如何也要见总督

original: We're working for the Chamberlain
translate: 我们是为总管工作的

original: None of your business, peasant
translate: 你管不了这些，农夫

original: Barris!
translate: 巴里斯！

original: He's alive?
translate: 他还活着？

original: After Horryn, we promised we'd help him
translate: 在霍里恩之后，我们答应要帮助他

original: He is
translate: 他就是

original: He's administrating the refugee camp
translate: 他在管理难民营

original: BARGING IN
translate: 冲进来啦

original: The second guard stands a little more to attention
translate: 第二个守卫站得稍微端正了些

original: The first one give you an appraising glance, making no disguise of his interest in your weapons
translate: 第一个守卫打量了你一番，毫不掩饰他对你的武器的兴趣

original: I don’t want any trouble
translate: 我不想惹麻烦

original: But you’ll make it for us if you barge in
translate: 但你如果闯进来，我们会更麻烦

original: It won't be worse than Horryn
translate: 不会比霍里恩更糟

original: So move
translate: 所以快走

original: This is not normal
translate: 这不是正常的

original: Can't you see that?
translate: 你看不出来吗？

original: You’ve been to Horryn?!
translate: 你去过霍里恩？！

original: Yeah and it's not pretty
translate: 是的，那地方很糟糕

original: Have you news?
translate: 你有消息吗？

original: We’ve been desperate to go...to help
translate: 我们急着要去……帮忙

original: But the Governor forbade it - said something about 'protecting the last bastion of Imperial rule on Idra'
translate: 但总督禁止我们去——他说了些关于‘保护伊德拉最后一处帝国统治堡垒’的话

original: What’s happening there?
translate: 那里发生了什么？

original: Not sure
translate: 不确定

original: Why didn't you go?
translate: 你为什么不进去？

original: The GOvernor wouldn’t let us
translate: 长官不允许我们进去

original: He said it’s more important to maintain order of the ‘administrative hub’ than some ‘backwater village full of luddites.’
translate: 他说管理中枢的秩序比那个“落后村庄里满是反对技术的人”更重要。

original: You really believe that?
translate: 你真的相信那句话？

original: RULES
translate: 规则

original: I mean...the Imperium still stands
translate: 我的意思是……帝国依然屹立

original: We can’t just...the rules!
translate: 我们不能……无视规则！

original: The old rules don't apply
translate: 旧的规则不再适用

original: Do you really trust the Governor still?
translate: 你真的还信任长官吗？

original: I need to know more about the situation here
translate: 我需要更多了解这里的状况

original: SUGGESTIONS
translate: 建议

original: I know what you’re getting at
translate: 我知道你想说什么

original: Don’t think we haven’t joked about it
translate: 不认为我们没开过玩笑

original: But it's hard to know if any of us would actually go through with it
translate: 但很难知道我们中有谁会真正去做

original: You could leave
translate: 你可以离开

original: There’s no law left on this island, trust me
translate: 这座岛上已经没有法律可言，相信我

original: He'll bring ruin on you all
translate: 他会给你们所有人带来灾祸

original: Unless you act now
translate: 除非你现在就行动

original: Let me in
translate: 让我进去

original: I'll take care of everything
translate: 我来处理一切

original: ABOUT THE CAMP
translate: 关于营地

original: Refugees?
translate: 难民？

original: From… Horryn?
translate: 从……霍里恩？

original: Yeah
translate: 嗯

original: Horryn is gone
translate: 霍里恩已经离开

original: He's...become extravagant
translate: 他……变得挥霍无度

original: More so than usual
translate: 比平时更甚

original: He's not left the Villa in days
translate: 他……总是有些古怪，但我要坦白告诉你——我和那些家伙们，对他的处理方式……不太满意

original: He was always..eccentric, but I'm not afraid to tell you - the lads and I, we're not happy with how he's handling... whatever is going on
translate: 所以你自己来解决吧

original: So take matters into your own hands
translate: 再谈谈政府的事

original: More about the gov
translate: 听我说——你所说的可是叛国

original: Listen to me - what you're talking about is treason
translate: 听我说——你所说的可是叛国

original: Or at least...it would be, if his mistress wasn't on board to vouch for us
translate: 或者至少……如果他的情妇愿意为我们作证的话

original: She's an innocent in this - I won't let her blood be on our hands
translate: 她在这事上无辜——我不会让她的血沾在我们身上

original: I'll get her on side
translate: 我会让她站在我们这边

original: How will I signal you?
translate: 我怎么联系你？

original: KILL
translate: 杀死

original: She wears a ring
translate: 她戴着一枚戒指

original: Have her send it to us via a servant if she wishes to be a part of this
translate: 如果她想参与此事，可以派人通过仆人将信件送到我们这里

original: I'll be going in then
translate: 那我就进去

original: What is it?
translate: 什么事？

original: Tell me more about the Governor
translate: 告诉我更多关于总督的情况

original: What do you know about the mistress?
translate: 你知道这位女主人的情况吗？

original: What's the mood among the garrison?
translate: 堡垒里的人士士气如何？

original: #Chapter1RatQueenDEFFUNCT
translate: #第一章：_rat_queen_defunct_

original: The lady in front of you holds herself with a disciplined ease, her chin tilted proudly up
translate: 你面前的女士举止优雅而有纪律，下巴高傲地抬起

original: This is clearly her kingdom - though you'd guess she'd look as confident anywhere else
translate: 这显然是她的王国 - 虽然你可能会猜到她在任何地方都会显得自信

original: Now she is lounging on a “throne” made out of crates and covered in a black sail as they are hiding in a cave
translate: 现在她正躺在由木箱制成的“王座”上，上面覆盖着黑色帆布，他们正躲在洞穴里

original: You've seen the alternative
translate: 你已经见识过其他的选择

original: I hardly meant to make this festering sewer system my palace, but needs must
translate: 我几乎没想到要把这个腐烂的下水道系统变成我的宫殿，但形势所迫

original: I have more questions
translate: 我还有更多问题

original: I'm in
translate: 我同意了

original: A little kingdom called ___
translate: 一个叫做___的小王国

original: Or at least, it used to be - until the Empire swallowed it whole
translate: 或者至少曾经是 - 直到帝国将其吞并

original: Now I'm an itinerant Queen, ruling over a few ships and fair but apparently illegal trade
translate: 现在我只是一个游走的女王，统治着几艘船和公平但显然非法的贸易

original: I have further questions
translate: 我还有进一步的问题

original: I'll help you
translate: 我会帮助你

original: Not overly fond
translate: 并不特别喜欢

original: The Freythen rebels pay good coin, but more importantly they do good work
translate: 弗雷then叛军出价不菲，但更重要的是，他们做事认真

original: I feel very good about my business, but I'd feel even better doing it in broad daylight, free from the Imperial yoke
translate: 我对我的生意感到很满意，但如果在大白天进行，不受帝国压迫，我会更安心

original: I would ask something else
translate: 我想要其他东西

original: Count me in
translate: 我愿意加入

original: What's next?
translate: 接下来呢？

original: I visited once, a while ago
translate: 我以前来过，时间有些久远了

original: It's a strange place
translate: 这是个奇怪的地方

original: I always wondered why a place of learning - as they claim - was so well fortified
translate: 我一直很好奇，为什么一所号称是学习的地方会如此坚固地防御

original: If you're going in - just consider what they might be trying to keep from escaping
translate: 如果你们要进去 - 只需考虑他们可能在试图防止什么逃脱

original: May I ask
translate: 我可以问一个问题吗？

original: Let's work together
translate: 我们一起工作吧

original: Naturally
translate: 当然

original: Find the Harbourmaster's office
translate: 找到港务长的办公室

original: Get the codebook
translate: 获取密码本

original: Bring it to me, and together we'll signal the ship and leave this sorry sewer
translate: 带给我，然后我们一起向船发出信号，离开这个可悲的下水道

original: Well then, what have we here?
translate: 那么，这是什么？

original: Come to seek an audience with the Rat Queen?
translate: 是来见鼠后吗？

original: Speak fast, and true
translate: 快点，说真话

original: I stumbled upon this place
translate: 我是偶然发现这个地方的

original: I've never heard of you
translate: 我从未听说过你

original: The Rat Queen!?
translate: 女王rats！？

original: What kind of name is that?
translate: 这是什么名字？

original: Just so?
translate: 就这样？

original: How curious: you're clearly not from Idra; you've not made the mistake of attacking us; you claim not to know me
translate: 真是奇怪：显然你不是来自伊德拉；你没有攻击我们；你声称不认识我

original: I would guess you're a mercenary, seeking answers or fortune now that Horryn lies under shadow
translate: 我猜你是雇佣兵，现在霍林被阴影笼罩，你寻求答案或财富

original: Well deduced
translate: 猜得不错

original: Wrong
translate: 错了

original: We intend to break into the Black Priory
translate: 我们打算潜入黑修道院

original: Partly
translate: 部分正确

original: Our real goal is to infiltrate the Black Priory
translate: 我们真正的目标是渗透黑修道院

original: As it should be
translate: 正如所料

original: Although - if you did not seek me out, how came you here?
translate: 虽然——如果你没有主动找上我，你怎么会来到这里？

original: I'm investigating the fall of Horryn
translate: 我在调查霍林的沦陷

original: Exploring
translate: 探索

original: I found you by chance
translate: 我是偶然发现你的

original: It's my proper title
translate: 这是我的正式头衔

original: And if you want to stay in the good graces of myself - and my subjects here - I suggest you use, and respect it
translate: 而如果你想留在我的恩宠中——以及这里我的臣民们——我建议你使用，并尊重它

original: I meant no disrespect
translate: 我没有冒犯的意思

original: My respect is earned
translate: 我的尊重是通过行动赢得的

original: You're ambitious, I like that
translate: 你有野心，我喜欢这一点

original: And maybe stupid, unless you have a boat
translate: 要不就是愚蠢的，除非你有船

original: Well, we did have
translate: 嗯，我们确实有

original: Perhaps you could help us with that
translate: 或许你能帮我们解决这个问题

original: And if we don't?
translate: 要是我们不呢？

original: But that's not your ultimate goal, is it now?
translate: 但这不是你的最终目标，对吧？

original: Sharp
translate: 锋利

original: We need to break into the Black Priory
translate: 我们需要潜入黑修道院

original: No
translate: 不

original: We're here to rescue someone from the Priory
translate: 我们是来从修道院解救某人的

original: The Queen leans forward, some intent you can't place glittering in her eyes
translate: 国王向前倾了倾身子，你猜不透她眼中的意图闪烁

original: That's a charming term for 'looting'
translate: 这是“洗劫”的委婉说法

original: You needn't play coy with me
translate: 你不必对我故作神秘

original: As long as that's all it is?
translate: 只要只是这样？

original: Ultimately, we're on a rescue mission to the Black Priory
translate: 最终，我们的任务是去黑修道院解救某人

original: We're here to retrieve a girl from the Black Priory
translate: 我们是来从黑修道院救回一个女孩的

original: Ah
translate: 哦

original: It seems in this loss, we are alike
translate: 看来在这次损失中，我们是同类

original: What's your plan?
translate: 你的计划是什么？

original: Any ideas how we could get a new one?
translate: 有没有什么办法能弄到一个新的？

original: Then, by all means, try and walk through the front door
translate: 那么，你大可以试着从正门进去

original: Just let me know so that I can make sure to watch
translate: 请让我知道，这样我可以确保留意

original: Maybe a boat makes sense
translate: 或许租一艘船是个好主意

original: Can we charter yours?
translate: 我们可以租用你的吗？

original: You see, this is what I was wondering
translate: 你看，这就是我想弄清楚的

original: My ships were smashed by the Leviathan - or whatever that abomination of the sea is called
translate: 我的船被海怪毁了——或者说，那海上怪物叫什么名字

original: Thankully, it does not seem to venture too close to shore
translate: 幸运的是，它似乎不会靠近岸边

original: There is a way we can get one though - and it's imperative that we do so quickly
translate: 但我们可以通过其他方式获得一艘，而且我们必须尽快行动

original: We have some cargo here that the Imperial Rescue Mission - slow, but inevitable - would be all too happy to confiscate, along with my liberty
translate: 我们这里有一些货物，帝国救援队——虽然行动缓慢，但终将没收——会非常乐意没收，包括我的自由

original: I can get a boat
translate: 我可以弄到一艘船

original: There is one off-shore, awaiting the coded signals that I don't have, because they're stuck in a Harbourmaster's Office that's overrun by twisted creatures
translate: 有一艘在近海，正等待着我无法接收到的编码信号，因为它们被困在一个被扭曲生物占领的港口管理办公室里

original: If the Imperials find the signal book, it's over for me - and no ship for you
translate: 如果帝国人找到信号簿，我就完了——你们也得不到船

original: Help me get it back, and I promise we'll ferry you into the Priory before we escape with the cargo
translate: 帮我拿回来，我保证在我们带着货物逃跑之前，会把你送到修道院

original: Might even come back to pick you up, if you survive
translate: 或许我会回来接你，如果你能活下来的话

original: I have to ask
translate: 我必须问一下

original: Say no more
translate: 不用说了

original: I applaud your enthusiasm - but I'm not so sure about your blind trust
translate: 我赞赏你的热情——但我不确定你这种盲目的信任

original: Fine, I'll ask some questions
translate: 好吧，我会问一些问题

original: You want this doing, or not?
translate: 你要我做这件事，还是不要？

original: Go on?
translate: 继续？

original: Why are you living down here?
translate: 你为什么住在这里？

original: Where did you come from?
translate: 你从哪里来？

original: How do you feel about the Empire?
translate: 你对帝国有什么看法？

original: What do you know about the Priory?
translate: 你知道修道院的什么情况？

original: #Chapter1Roland
translate: #第一章 罗兰

original: Howling laughter fills the air as the mad-men charge towards you!
translate: 狂笑在空气中回荡，疯子们朝你冲来！

original: The man licks his sore lips excitedly
translate: 那人兴奋地舔着肿胀的嘴唇

original: You… you hear it too?
translate: 你……你也听到了？

original: The call?
translate: 呼唤？

original: I do!
translate: 我听到了！

original: Where... or what, is it coming from?
translate: 来自……或者说是哪里？

original: Straining to see through the dense fog, you finally spot them
translate: 努力穿过浓雾，你终于看到了他们

original: A group of men prowling the shoreline like carrion-eaters looking for dead flesh
translate: 一群男人像腐肉觅食者一样在岸边徘徊，寻找腐肉

original: They are unkempt and dressed in rags with bare torsos and broad shoulders adorned by a strange mixture of sailor's tattoos and crude symbols
translate: 他们衣衫褴褛，裸露着上半身，宽阔的肩膀上纹着奇怪的水手文身和粗糙的符号

original: They carry an assortment of cruel-looking, rusted tools turned to weapons
translate: 他们手持各种看似残忍、锈迹斑斑的工具，变成了武器

original: Gibbering chatter, laughter and whimpering drifts across the fog in a steady stream, Whoever these men are, their minds are long gone
translate: 呻吟、笑声和哭泣声在雾中持续不断地传来，无论这些人是谁，他们的理智早已丧失殆尽

original: You sit still until a group of them passes you by
translate: 你静静地坐着，直到他们的一群人从你身边走过

original: Perhaps you might be able to slip past them?
translate: 或许你可以悄悄溜过去？

original: Call out to the men
translate: 向那些人喊话

original: Leave quietly
translate: 悄悄离开

original: The spiral patterns look oddly familiar though you are certain you’ve never seen it before
translate: 螺旋图案看起来有些熟悉，尽管你确定从未见过它

original: It’s something deeper
translate: 这是一种更深层次的东西

original: Something primal
translate: 一种原始的力量

original: It draws you in!
translate: 这让你无法抗拒！

original: Here - to this place
translate: 来到这里

original: This is the beginning and the end
translate: 这是开始，也是结束

original: The Reavers notice you staring
translate: 掠夺者注意到了你在盯着他们

original: You hear it don’t you?
translate: 你听到了吗？

original: The call of... what?
translate: 这呼唤着……什么？

original: The men fan out and regard you with a cruel glare
translate: 男人们四散开来，用残忍的目光注视着你

original: I’m going to enjoy this
translate: 我要享受这一刻

original: one of them snarls as he draws a rusty dagger
translate: 他一边抽刀一边咆哮

original: I'm going to put you down like a rabid dog!
translate: 我要像对付疯狗一样解决你！

original: Let's be civil about this!
translate: 让我们文明一点处理这件事！

original: You see a figure, thrashing violently at something, obscured by the low fog
translate: 你看到一个身影，在低雾中猛烈挣扎，试图摆脱什么东西

original: Whatever this person is doing, it's producing loud crunching, wet squelches, and a stream of curses
translate: 无论这个人正在做什么，都发出巨大的咔嚓声、湿漉漉的咕噜声，还伴随着一连串的咒骂

original: Move closer
translate: 走近一些

original: You see the scene for what it is
translate: 你终于看清了眼前的情景

original: Roland, soaked through and spattered with ichor, is laying waste to a number of grotesque looking creatures with a piece of driftwood
translate: 洛朗德全身湿透，满身是血，用一段木头残片痛击着那些畸形生物

original: He snarls like a wounded beast and his eyes are black with rage
translate: 他像受伤的野兽一样咆哮，眼中满是怒火

original: As the last of the horrid beasts falls twitching back into the shallows, Roland snaps his gaze to you - dead eyes staring at some distant point on the horizon behind you
translate: 当最后一只可怖的怪物抽搐着倒回浅水区时，洛朗德的目光转向你——空洞的眼珠盯着你身后远方的某个点

original: Eventually, the tension drains from his muscles, and he lowers his makeshift weapon
translate: 最终，他身上的紧张感消散，放下了手中的临时武器

original: Thought I was carrion they did
translate: 我以为他们会把我当作腐肉

original: I nearly was
translate: 我差点就那样了

original: I didn't think you'd make it
translate: 我没想到你能撑过来

original: Seems I've got a few lives left in me, for all they're worth
translate: 看来我还剩下几条命，虽然微不足道

original: Roland sighs deeply and slumps down onto a nearby rock
translate: 洛兰深深地叹了口气，瘫坐在附近的岩石上

original: You tried to save me
translate: 你试图救我

original: You bloody idiot
translate: 你这个该死的白痴

original: Not exactly the thanks I was expecting
translate: 确实不是我期望的感谢方式

original: The mission needs you
translate: 任务需要你

original: Was half hoping I wouldn't
translate: 我差点希望不会这样

original: He looks around at the driftwood and chunks of flesh, bobbing around your ankles
translate: 他环视着漂浮在你脚踝周围的木头和肉块

original: It's about time I payed my debts
translate: 是时候偿还我的债务了

original: You wanted to die?
translate: 你真的想死？

original: I'm counting on you to get this job done
translate: 我指望你能完成这项任务

original: I think it's best we part ways
translate: 我认为我们最好分道扬镳

original: There's no room for being a bloody hero in work like this
translate: 这种工作没有成为英雄的余地

original: It's just shit, blood, and bad men doing worse things to others
translate: 这就是一切，屎、血和坏人对无辜者的更坏行径

original: It's about time I paid my debts
translate: 是时候偿还我的债务了

original: And yet, here we are
translate: 而我们却在这里

original: You sound like you didn't want to be saved
translate: 听起来你并不想被救

original: Spoken like a true mercenary!
translate: 真正的佣兵就是这样说的！

original: There might be hope for one of us after all
translate: 我们之中或许还有人有机会

original: Well, now there's work to be done
translate: 好吧，现在该行动了

original: What do you mean?
translate: 你的意思是？

original: As you say
translate: 就像你说的

original: But heed this: if you want to survive you need to drop the bloody heroics
translate: 但是要注意：如果你想活下去，就必须放下那些该死的英雄主义

original: This business makes your hands dirty - and nothing gets them clean again
translate: 这份工作会让你的手变得肮脏——而且再也洗不干净

original: Trust me on that
translate: 你信我就好

original: Speaking of which, I suppose I still work for you
translate: 说到这个，我大概还是为你工作的

original: We should get going
translate: 我们应该出发了

original: I'm counting on you
translate: 我指望你了

original: Let's get going
translate: 我们出发吧

original: Roland looks out across the uncaring sea
translate: 罗兰眺望着冷漠的大海

original: Not many get to be my age in our line of work
translate: 在我们这个行当，能活到这个年纪的人不多

original: The things that I've seen - that I've done
translate: 我见过的事物——我做过的事

original: Memories like that prey upon you
translate: 这样的回忆会折磨你

original: Like bloody wolves circling a camp, with the fire dying out
translate: 就像血腥的狼群在营地周围徘徊，火焰渐渐熄灭

original: Second you let your guard down, they pounce
translate: 你稍微放松警惕，它们就会扑上来

original: Your time isn't over yet, old man
translate: 老头，你的日子还没到头

original: Why don't you retire?
translate: 你为什么不退休呢？

original: So would you rather I'd let you die?
translate: 那你宁愿我让你死掉？

original: I tried, once
translate: 我试过一次

original: The quiet only made the memories louder
translate: 只是安静让那些回忆更响亮

original: You wait, expecting Roland to elaborate
translate: 你等着，希望罗兰能多说些

original: He merely stares blanky ahead
translate: 他只是茫然地盯着前方

original: We need to be on our way
translate: 我们得赶紧上路

original: No I
translate: 不，不是

original: Rolands words catch in his throat
translate: 罗兰的话卡在喉咙里

original: He thinks for a moment and then looks up at you with a determined look
translate: 他想了想，然后用坚定的眼神看着你

original: When my time is up, my time is up
translate: 等到我的时间到，我的时间就到

original: Do you understand?
translate: 你明白吗？

original: Alright Roland
translate: 好吧，罗兰

original: Roland nods solemnly, brushes a sticky glob of ichor off his arm, and trudges over to you
translate: 罗兰庄重地点点头，擦掉手臂上黏黏的黏液，然后蹒跚地走到你面前

original: His lips part as if to speak, but he hesitates
translate: 他的嘴唇张开，好像要说话，但又犹豫了

original: Let's just go
translate: 我们还是走吧

original: The brute scowls at you for a moment
translate: 那个粗壮的家伙对你皱了皱眉

original: If that's what you want, I'm not going to stop you
translate: 如果那是你想要的，我不会阻止你

original: Maybe I'll rest at that Lighthouse awhile
translate: 或许我会在那座灯塔附近休息一阵

original: No hard feelings
translate: 没有敌意

original: On second thoughts, I'm going to need you
translate: 再想想，我恐怕需要你了

original: Roland does not seem to hear you
translate: 罗兰似乎没有听到你的话

original: Instead he is staring intently ahead
translate: 反而他正专注地向前看着

original: There are men in the fog
translate: 雾中有人

original: I thought I heard them earlier
translate: 我刚才好像听到了他们的声音

original: I'm certain they're not from the Zephyr and I'd wager they're less than friendly
translate: 我确定他们不是从‘西风号’来的，而且我敢打赌他们不友好

original: I don't care if you're itching for a fight or not, but either way - we should tread carefully
translate: 无论你是不是急着开战，总之我们得小心行事

original: I don't care if you're itching for a fight or not, but either way - you should tread carefully
translate: 无论你是不是急着开战，总之你得小心行事

original: Rolands slinks off into the thick fog
translate: 罗兰悄无声息地钻进了浓雾中

original: He smiles a toothless grin
translate: 他露出了没有牙齿的笑容

original: That’s the question ain’t it?
translate: 这不正是问题所在吗？

original: The men lower their weapons
translate: 他们放下了武器

original: When you’re ready, Father is waiting for you
translate: 当你准备好了，父亲就在那里等着你

original: In Horryn
translate: 在霍里恩

original: Without another word the men turn and wander off into the fog
translate: 没有再多说一句话，他们转身走进了浓雾中

original: Soon they are gone
translate: 很快他们就消失了

original: I’ll have you talking once I stick this knife in your gut!
translate: 等我用这把刀捅进你肚子的时候，你就会说话了！

original: The largest of the group steps menacingly towards you
translate: 小组中最大的人威胁性地向你走来

original: If it's a fight you want
translate: 如果你想要一场战斗

original: Look closer at the men's tattoos
translate: 更仔细地看看那些人的纹身

original: I'm here to join you!
translate: 我来加入你们！

original: #EvilMercs
translate: #邪恶雇佣兵

original: A group of warriors dressed in drab armor with crudely painted wolf skulls on their chests
translate: 一群穿着灰暗盔甲的战士，胸膛上涂着简陋的狼头图案

original: They are picking their way through the rocky terrain like prowling felines and you have no doubt these are killers who excel at their job
translate: 他们像潜行的猫科动物般小心翼翼地穿过崎岖的地形，毫无疑问，他们是出色的杀手

original: #IdraCostalPassCombat
translate: #伊德拉海岸关卡战斗

original: Your ploy is for naught
translate: 你的计谋毫无用处

original: One of the cackling cultists points in your direction and a cry of alarm goes up!
translate: 一个尖笑的邪教徒朝你指去，一声警报响起！

original: The beast abruptly halts its feasting and eyestalks eagerly spin around
translate: 这头野兽突然停止了进食，其眼球stalk迅速转动

original: As it spots you, it offers a deafening roar before charging!
translate: 它一看到你，便发出震耳欲聋的咆哮，然后冲向你！

original: You carefully pick your way forwards when movement on the top of the cliffs catches your eyes
translate: 你小心翼翼地向前移动，当悬崖顶上有了动静时，你的眼睛一亮

original: Robed and hooded figures emerge as they appear to be dragging something towards the edge of the cliff
translate: 他们披着斗篷，似乎在拖着什么东西向悬崖边缘靠近

original: More of the rabid dogs
translate: 更多狂吠的狗

original: spits Roland
translate: 罗兰吐了口唾沫

original: No doubt the same mad-men you saw earlier
translate: 毫无疑问，就是你刚才看到的那些疯子

original: To your horror you realize what the party is dragging
translate: 你惊恐地意识到，队伍拖着的是什么

original: A naked man and woman, bound and gagged, are struggling desperately as they are mercilessly pushed towards the edge of the cliff
translate: 裸体的男人和女人被捆绑并堵住了嘴，他们拼命挣扎，正被无情地推向悬崖边缘

original: whispers Kat, almost too loud
translate: 凯特几乎压低声音说

original: We have to do something!
translate: 我们必须做点什么！

original: Terror rises in you as you understand what is about to unfold
translate: 你感到恐惧，明白即将发生的事情

original: You need to do something!
translate: 你们必须做点什么！

original: Look around
translate: 四处查看

original: One of the cultists shouts and points towards the surf in elation
translate: 一个邪教徒喊叫着，兴奋地指向海面

original: Utter terror fills the eyes of the moribund couple
translate: 即将死去的夫妇眼中充满了恐惧

original: You follow their gaze and turn to see, emerging from the surf, a creature of sheer horror
translate: 你顺着他们的目光望去，只见一个恐怖的生物正从海浪中浮现

original: Larger than any sea-creature you’ve fought so far, a hulking shape greedily waddles towards the base of the cliffs
translate: 比你之前遇到的任何海洋生物都要大，一个庞大的身影贪婪地向悬崖底部挪动

original: Pincers snapping and tentacles squirming greedily
translate: 钳子咔嚓作响，触手贪婪地扭动

original: Before you can react further the cultists hurl the two naked forms from the cliffs
translate: 在你反应过来之前，邪教徒们将那两个裸体的身躯从悬崖上扔了下去

original: The pair impact the ground below with a sickening splat and with surprising speed, the hulking beast falls upon their remains
translate: 那对身躯重重地摔在下方的土地上，令人作呕。那庞大的生物以惊人的速度扑向他们的残骸

original: Standing transfixed you watch as the horror consumes the remains of the unfortunate wretches
translate: 你呆立在那里，看着那恐怖的生物吞噬不幸者的残骸

original: Sickening snaps and wet pops fill the air as the creature feeds
translate: 那生物进食时发出令人作呕的咔嚓声和湿响

original: All the while, the robed cultists stand swaying and chanting on the ledge above
translate: 整个过程中，披着长袍的邪教徒们在悬崖边缘摇晃着，念诵着咒语

original: Attack the terror
translate: 攻击那恐怖的生物

original: Carefully attempt to sneak away
translate: 小心翼翼地尝试悄悄撤离

original: Sink to your knees and join in the worship
translate: 跪倒在地，加入他们的崇拜之中

original: You don’t dare to breathe as you slowly pick your way back the way you came
translate: 你不敢喘息，慢慢地沿着来路退回

original: As soon as you feel certain you’re out of sight, panic takes over and you run as fast as you can
translate: 一旦你觉得安全，恐慌便占据你的心，你尽可能快地跑起来

original: By the time you stop you’re utterly exhausted but at least you are still alive
translate: 到你停下时，你已经精疲力尽，但至少你还活着

original: Dropping to your knees, you close your eyes and begin mock-chanting
translate: 跪倒在地，闭上眼睛，开始模仿着念诵

original: Tears press on but you find that, strangely enough, words begin to take form
translate: 眼泪几乎要涌出，但你发现，奇怪的是，词语开始成形

original: Words that make sense then and there but that you will never again be able to recall
translate: 那些当时有意义的词语，但你永远无法再次回忆起来

original: A spiral burns in your mind - it calls you
translate: 你的脑海中旋涡般燃烧着火焰——它在召唤你

original: A jolt passes through you and you open your eyes wide to find the horrid creature and cultists gone
translate: 一阵颤动感从你体内穿过，你睁开眼睛，发现那可怖的生物和邪教徒都不见了

original: How long were you gone?
translate: 你究竟离开了多久？

original: It felt like minutes!
translate: 仿佛只过了几分钟！

original: Or was it hours?
translate: 或许是几个小时？

original: Days?
translate: 甚至可能是几天？

original: Nonetheless, the terror from the deep seems to have spared you
translate: 不过，那来自深渊的恐惧似乎对你有所怜悯

original: You rise painfully on unsteady legs and leave
translate: 你痛苦地站起身，摇摇晃晃地离开

original: #IdraCostalPassEnter
translate: #伊德拉海岸关卡入口

original: Said many a short-lived young fool
translate: 许多短命的年轻傻瓜曾说过

original: Let’s just be on our bloody way!
translate: 我们还是赶紧上路吧！

original: The winding coastal road constricts as steep cliffs press in from the north
translate: 蜿蜒的海岸之路变得狭窄，北侧陡峭的悬崖迫近

original: The dense fog reduces visibility to a mere stone’s throw and you feel an uneasiness rise in your stomach
translate: 浓重的雾气使能见度降至仅能看清几步远，你的胃里涌起不安

original: You swallow hard as you ponder the dangers that may lay ahead
translate: 你咽了咽口水，思索着前方可能存在的危险

original: Then, as in response to your concern, a bizarre monstrous growl echoes through the cliffs ahead of you
translate: 就在这时，仿佛回应你的担忧，前方悬崖中传来一声怪异的野兽般的咆哮

original: Frozen mid-step you scan the mists when the unmistaken stench of rotting flesh is wafted towards you
translate: 你僵在原地，扫视着雾气，当腐烂肉臭味飘来时，你更加确定

original: Something large and deadly lies ahead
translate: 前方有某种巨大而致命的存在

original: Though you feel well armed and prepared, the creature in the mist is no doubt dangerous
translate: 尽管你装备齐全，准备充分，雾中的生物肯定非常危险

original: Your road lies ahead but you must proceed with caution
translate: 你的道路在前方延伸，但必须小心谨慎地前行

original: Though you do not know what lies ahead, your gut instinct tells you that you must be cautious
translate: 虽然你不知道前方是什么，但你的直觉告诉你必须小心行事

original: You wonder if perhaps for now, you would be better off spending a bit more time preparing and arming yourself?
translate: 你或许现在应该多花些时间准备和武装自己？

original: Roland places his hand on the hilt of his weapon as he scowls into the mist
translate: 罗兰把手按在武器的护手柄上，皱着眉头盯着雾气

original: Keep your wits about you
translate: 警惕些

original: I fear we may have our work cut out for us
translate: 我担心我们的工作会很艰巨

original: Whatever lies ahead I fear it is yet beyond our mettle
translate: 无论前方有什么，我都担心这超出了我们的能力范围

original: What do you recommend?
translate: 你有什么建议？

original: I don’t need your advice old man!
translate: 老头，我不需要你的建议！

original: Not so keen to die anymore?
translate: 不再那么渴望死了？

original: I say we forge ahead
translate: 我说我们还是继续前进吧

original: But let’s keep our wits about us
translate: 但我们还是得保持警惕

original: I’m inclined to agree with the big man
translate: 我倾向于同意这位大个子的意见

original: Kat adds as she looks around nervously
translate: 卡特紧张地环顾四周，补充道

original: I say we turn back for now
translate: 我说我们暂时回头吧

original: We need more time to prepare for whatever lies ahead
translate: 我们需要更多时间来准备应对前方的未知

original: I agree
translate: 我同意

original: Roland shoots you a look that is somewhere between hurt and enraged
translate: 罗兰看着你，眼神中既有受伤也有愤怒

original: Then, as he opens his mouth to say something he’s interrupted by yet another terrible howl
translate: 然后，正当他开口要说些什么时，又传来了另一个可怕的嚎叫

original: Let’s just be on our way
translate: 我们还是快走吧

original: # Chapter_1_Forest
translate: # 第一章 森林

original: #Chapter1ForestDeadHorse
translate: #第一章森林中的死马

original: As you finish up the grisly task you are rewarded with a large quantity of rotting horse-flesh
translate: 你完成了这令人作呕的任务，得到了大量腐烂的马肉

original: Utterly inedible to humans but perhaps a treat for some other beastie?
translate: 对人类来说完全无法食用，但或许对某些其他生物来说却是一道美味？

original: A dead horse
translate: 一匹死马

original: The bloated corpse has begun to fester and fat flies buzz over it
translate: 胀肿的尸体已经开始腐烂，苍蝇在上面嗡嗡飞舞

original: Carve flesh from the corpse
translate: 从尸体上割下肉来

original: As you begin carving up the rotting corpse, the stench of decay is nearly overwhelming
translate: 当你开始割这具腐烂的尸体时，腐烂的气味几乎让人难以忍受

original: Clouds of flies swarm you and crawl over every unexposed part of your skin
translate: 成群的苍蝇围绕着你，爬遍你裸露的每一寸皮肤

original: No doubt to the insectile fiends great delight, you are overwhelmed by nausea and end up on your knees, vomiting profusely
translate: 肯定让那些昆虫恶魔感到欣喜，你被恶心得几乎跪倒在地，呕吐不止

original: There is however only one way forward and having purged yourself adequately, you return to the work of cutting up the poor animal
translate: 不过前方只有一条路可走，你清理干净后，重新回到解剖这可怜动物的工作中

original: Nonetheless, you steel yourself and make good progress
translate: 你咬紧牙关，继续前进

original: #Chapter1ForestRottenMeat
translate: #第一章森林中的腐肉

original: You heave large chunks of the disgusting flesh into the feeding pile
translate: 你将一大块恶心的肉块扔进喂食堆里

original: Almost immediately you hear a number of hisses from deeper inside the cave
translate: 几乎立刻，你听到洞内深处传来几声嘶嘶声

original: Dinner is apparently served
translate: 晚餐显然已经准备好了

original: Hide and observe
translate: 隐藏起来，观察一下

original: Slavering scaled beasts lumber into the chamber with their forked tongues greedily sampling the air
translate: 腮上长着鳞片的生物拖着沉重的步伐进入房间，它们贪婪地用分叉的舌头嗅着空气

original: A feeding frenzy erupts as the pack tears into the rotting flesh
translate: 一场进食狂潮爆发，狼群开始撕咬腐烂的肉块

original: Soon hissing snores echo throughout the caves

translate: 尽管那股恶臭几乎要窒息你的感官，但这两条蜥蜴显然贪婪地在啃食着这些肉块

original: Examine the pile more closely

translate: 根据脚印的数量和破碎骨头的量，这些生物似乎经常在这个地方集体觅食

original: Beyond that, you would rather just get away from the stench

original: You’ve heard that reptiles like these tend to eat large quantities when food is readily available before waddling off to sleep for days afterwards
translate: 你听说这些爬行动物在食物丰富时会大量进食，然后在接下来的几天里懒洋洋地睡觉

original: Perhaps this can be used to your advantage?
translate: 或许这对你有利？

original: The lingering stench also gives you the impression that this particular species has a preference for rotted flesh
translate: 这股残留的恶臭让你觉得这种生物特别偏爱腐肉

original: This is madness!

original: Mother Katak

translate: 一位老妇人坐在婴儿床旁，她银白色的头发散乱地垂在肩上

original: It sounds off

original: Little Allyn?

original: Oh, he's such a lovely little boy!

original: Almost like my little piglet here

original: She pats the crib

original: The strange, piping sound coming from it sounds nothing like a child

original: I’ll help of course

original: No need to fret

original: the old woman says with a chuckle

original: What do you need?

translate: 他们就住在不远处：大橡树北边，穿过那些恶臭的池塘！

original: But beware!

original: The scaled ones are fierce and guard their un-born well!

original: the old woman chuckles

original: Do you mean these lizard eggs?

original: I suppose I'll do my best

original: Makes the flesh of the unborn oh so tender

original: And potent you know!

original: Now off you go!

original: Me babe needs his sleep

original: The crone is babbling incoherently while tears stream down her face

original: Suddenly she seems to notice you

original: You did this!!

original: You took my boy from me!

original: There is nothing more for you here

original: The crone hums to herself as she gently rocks the crib back and forth
translate: 老巫婆自言自语着，轻轻地摇晃着摇篮。

original: I have the eggs!

original: Want to trade?
translate: 想交易吗？

original: #SantaFury2
translate: #SantaFury2

original: Come to think of it, a bit of bloodshed might be just what I need right now!
translate: 想起来，也许来点流血事件正合我意。

original: Come on then, you bastard
translate: 那就来吧，你这个混蛋。

original: There are people, groups even, you just do not talk about and I’m not about to start with you

original: So monumental are they, that even though they’re in front of your very nose, you’re unable to perceive them
translate: 这些秘密如此巨大，即使它们就在你眼前，你也无法察觉。

original: The rest of Carylla’s group looks at her anxiously
translate: 喀丽拉的队友们焦急地看着她。

original: Cary, you shouldn't

original: one of them whispers to her
translate: 其中一人低声对她说。

original: Carylla’s eyes narrow

original: Have no fear Pieter
translate: 别怕，皮特。

original: This one’s at the end of the road
translate: 这个已经走投无路了。

original: Wait, I had some more questions first!
translate: 等一下，我还有些问题要问！

translate: 你这个贱人，准备受死吧！

original: I’m paid well to not ask questions and that’s a particularly dangerous question to ask

original: Let’s just say, someone was willing to put a lot of gold towards recovering this

original: Carylla pats the bag hanging by her side

original: So, shall I gut you now?

original: I had some more questions first

original: Who's paying you?
translate: 你是谁给的钱？

original: Let's dance!
translate: 我们来跳个舞吧！

original: You recognize them as the troupe who ‘relieved’ you of the Santa Fury idol

original: You?

translate: 告诉我，你真的那么渴望死亡？

original: What are we waiting for?

original: How about I just take the idol of your hands?

original: Enought talk!
translate: 谈话到此为止！

original: Time to die!

original: Carylla lets out a sound somewhere between a snort and a laugh

original: Pray tell, why would I do that?

original: For all her bravado, there is something
translate: 尽管她表现出色，但还是有些

original: The slightest hint of doubt

original: Hand it over and I'll let you live

original: One of the lackeys look pleadingly at her but Carylla is adamant

original: You don’t understand do you?

original: There are forces at work far more powerful and much darker than you can fathom

original: Your threats pale in comparison to what they would do

original: The group quickly and quietly slinks off into the forest leaving you behind with the idol

original: As you remove it from the sack and gaze upon the grotesque form, a ringing rises in your ears

original: This is no mere mundane item - of that you have no doubt
translate: 这绝不是一件普通的物品 - 你毫无疑问

original: As you stow it in your pack, you can’t help but wonder if Carylla’s final words were true
translate: 当你把它收进背包时，你不禁怀疑萨莉拉的最后话语是否为真

original: Have you drawn the ire of other, darker forces?
translate: 你惹怒了其他更黑暗的力量吗？

original: One of the men leans in, speaking to Carylla

original: Cary, he’s onto something yeah?
translate: 萨莉，他好像发现了什么，是吧？

original: Cary, she’s onto something yeah?
translate: 加里，她想到了什么？

original: Let’s get out of here and leave that bleedin’ thing for them?
translate: 我们走吧，把那该死的东西留给他们？

original: Let them deal with it!
translate: 让他们去处理吧！

original: Carylla swallows hard
translate: 卡莉拉咽了咽口水

original: Then throws you a sack with something heavy in it
translate: 然后把一个装着沉重东西的袋子扔给你

original: Have the fucking thing!
translate: 拿走那该死的东西吧！

original: Maybe I’ll finally get to sleep now
translate: 或许我现在终于可以睡觉了

original: But hear me
translate: 但是听我说

original: Men will be coming for that
translate: 会有男人来找那东西

original: Men far more powerful than me and my lot
translate: 比我强大得多的男人

original: So you best sleep with one eye open from now on
translate: 所以你最好从现在开始睁一只眼闭一只眼睡觉

original: If you’re able to sleep at all, that is
translate: 至少你还能睡得着的话

original: Take the idol
translate: 拿走那雕像

original: #SpiderCaveSon
translate: #蜘蛛洞穴之子

original: Ol’ mother Katak’s cottage lies to the north-east
translate: 老卡塔克的小屋在东北方向

original: Has a great big tree growing through it so you can’t miss it
translate: 有一棵大树穿过它，所以你不会错过

original: Ol’ lady’s a bit strange but she knows things!
translate: 那老太婆有点奇怪，但她知道事情！

original: Potions and herbs and such
translate: 有药剂和草药之类的

original: Might even have some to sell you
translate: 甚至可能有你要卖的

original: Anything else?
translate: 还有其他需要的吗？

original: Aye!
translate: 是的！

original: There’s a bit of marshland north of the big oak
translate: 大橡树北边有一片沼泽地

original: I’d stay out of there
translate: 你最好别去那边

original: There’s lizards and such and they say even a single bite is enough to kill ya on account of the disease they carry in their mouths!
translate: 那里有蜥蜴之类的，据说一口就能把你咬死，因为它们嘴里带有疾病！

original: Thanks!
translate: 谢谢！

original: I'll get going then
translate: 那我就出发了

original: Tombs bless you!
translate: 坟墓保佑你！

original: If... when you find my dar, tell him I’ll be waiting for him at home!
translate: 如果……当你找到我的爱人时，请告诉他我会在家里等他！

original: The boy sets off into the woods and once more, the forest is quiet
translate: 令你惊讶的是，一名年轻人从前方的灌木丛中冲出

original: To your surprise, a young man crashes through the undergrowth ahead of you
translate: 他……求救！

original: His face is red and he’s panting heavily as he spots you
translate: 他……快帮帮我！

original: He... help!
translate: 他被抓走了！

original: They took ‘im!
translate: 抓走谁了？

original: They took who?
translate: 我的爱人！

original: My dar!
translate: 我们在木材营工作时，他们突然从树林里冲出来！

original: We were working at the lumber-camp when they just burst out of the trees!
translate: 我的爱人用斧头朝他们挥了一记，叫我快跑！

original: My dar took a swing at em with ‘is axe an told me to run!
translate: 男孩崩溃了，开始啜泣

original: The boy breaks down and sobs
translate: 但我看到他们抓走了他，并把他拖进了森林！

original: But I saw ‘em take ‘im and drag ‘im into the forest!
translate: 你父亲是被什么带走的？

original: What took your father?
translate: 你父亲是被什么带走的？

original: I couldn’t tell you because they kind of hid in the undergrowth!
translate: 我说不上来，因为他们躲在灌木丛里了！

original: But they were large as hounds and all I saw was the gleam from their terrible eyes!
translate: 但是它们体型和猎犬一般大，我只看到了它们那可怕眼睛里反射的光芒！

original: Please
You have to go look for 'im!
translate: 你必须去看看他！

original: He’s all I got left since ma died!
translate: 自从妈妈去世后，他就是我唯一剩下的亲人了！

original: I'll try
translate: 我会试试

original: Camp’s to the east of here!
translate: 露营地点在东边！

original: Just go past the big oak and then you’ll eventually see our lean-to and campfire!
translate: 只需经过那棵大树，然后你会看到我们的简易棚和篝火！

original: Please hurry!
translate: 请快点！

original: Anything else of note in the area?
translate: 这个区域还有其他值得注意的地方吗？

original: #SpiderCaveSurvivor
translate: #蜘蛛洞幸存者

original: I’ll make my own way out
translate: 我会自己出去

original: Surely my boy is waiting
translate: 我的儿子肯定还在等着

original: Fare thee well and be careful - These are dark times
translate: 一路平安，小心些 - 这是黑暗的时期

original: The man bows deeply and leaves
translate: 那人深深地鞠了一躬，然后离开了

original: You recoil in shock as the cocoon shifts under your hands!
translate: 你震惊地后退，因为蚕茧在你手中移动！

original: Whatever is inside is still alive
translate: 里面的东西仍然活着

original: As you stand there dumbstruck, you can hear faint moaning
translate: 当你呆呆地站在那里时，能听到微弱的呻吟声

original: Cut open the cocoon
translate: 切开蚕茧

original: You carefully cut open the cocoon and a large man stumbles out
translate: 你小心翼翼地切开蚕茧，一个大汉踉跄着走了出来

original: No doubt shaken and disoriented from the ordeal, the poor fellow looks at you with wide eyes
translate: 毫无疑问，经历了一番折腾，这可怜的家伙用惊恐的目光看着你

original: What
translate: 什么

original: Who
translate: 谁

original: Where?
translate: 哪里？

original: Your son sent me to look for you!
translate: 你儿子派我来找你！

original: Recollection creeps back into the man’s eyes
translate: 回忆开始回到那人的目光中

original: So
translate: 所以

original: So Lon’s alive?
translate: 所以隆还活着？

original: He made it!?
translate: 他成功了！？

original: Thank the Golden!
translate: 谢天谢地！

original: And you
translate: 而你

original: You risked your own life to save me?
translate: 你冒着生命危险来救我？

original: How can I ever repay you?
translate: 我怎么能报答你？

original: No reward is necessary
translate: 不需要任何报酬

original: Surely you have something?
translate: 你总该有点东西吧？

original: In that case, you have my eternal gratitude my Lord!
translate: 那么，我的大人，我将永远感激你！

original: In that case, you have my eternal gratitude my Lady!
translate: 那么，我的女士，我将永远感激你！

original: Here
translate: 这里

original: Take my axe!
translate: 接我的战斧吧！

original: It's as well crafted as they come and I'm sure it'll fetch you a pretty penny at the market!
translate: 这把斧头做工精良，我相信在市场上一定能卖个好价钱！

original: Thank you!
translate: 感谢！

original: # Chapter_1_Glen
translate: # 第一章 格伦谷

original: #Chapter1ArrivalInGlen
translate: # 第一章 到达格伦谷

original: You shield your face from the cold winds and icy drizzle as you survey the area
translate: 你用盾牌遮挡着脸，抵御着寒冷的风和冰冷的细雨，环视着四周。

original: In the secluded valley that lies ahead, you spot the unmistakable, shaggy white forms of a flock of goats
translate: 在前方隐秘的山谷中，你看到了一群明显的、长着蓬松白毛的山羊。

original: You’re just about to make your way towards them when a strange undulating howl echoes through the small valley
translate: 你正要朝它们走去时，山谷中回荡起一种奇怪的起伏的嚎叫。

original: There's more than goats in this area
translate: 这里不仅仅有山羊。

original: #Chapter1Shepherd
translate: # 第一章 牧羊人

original: The pale-faced youth looks at you with desperation
translate: 这个面色苍白的年轻人看着你，眼中充满了绝望。

original: What about them?
translate: 他们怎么样？

original: I talked to your dad
translate: 我和你父亲谈过了。

original: We're to take the goats to camp
translate: 我们要带山羊去营地。

original: These goats are going to the camp
translate: 这些山羊要去营地。

original: Never mind
translate: 别管了。

original: I have some questions
translate: 我有一些问题。

original: I have to go
translate: 我得走了。

original: Stay here for now
translate: 先留在这里。

original: The boy lets out a pathetic yelp as he swings his staff at you!
translate: 那个男孩发出一声可怜的尖叫，挥舞着法杖朝你攻击！

original: Before you can step aside, Roland’s fist shatters the boy’s jaw
translate: 在你还能退步之前，罗兰的拳头粉碎了那男孩的下巴

original: He tumbles to the ground and with a sickening crack, his skull smashes open against a large rock
translate: 他向地面滚去，伴随着一声令人作呕的破裂声，他的头骨撞在一块大石头上，碎裂开来

original: His swing goes wild and he tumbles to the ground
translate: 他的挥击失去了准头，他向地面滚去

original: There her remains, sobbing
translate: 她在那里，抽泣着

original: You fail to get another word out of him and decide it’s best to be on your way
translate: 你无法从他那里得到更多的信息，决定最好还是离开

original: Lead the animals away
translate: 把这些动物带开

original: He clings to his blanket with trembling fingers
translate: 他颤抖着手指紧紧抓住他的毯子

original: I...I don't know
translate: 我……我不知道

original: Nothin' on Idra should be able to make a sound like that
translate: 在伊德拉岛上，没有任何东西应该发出那样的声音

original: Whatever it is, it ain't human
translate: 无论那是什么，都不是人类

original: I never see 'em
translate: 我从没见过它们

original: Every night the mist rolls in, and then shapes appear just outside the circle of my fire
translate: 每晚雾气涌来，然后在火堆的圆圈之外出现了形状

original: And then I...I can feel 'em!
translate: 然后我……我感觉到它们了！

original: The boy starts to sob
translate: 那男孩开始抽泣

original: I know they're there, but no matter how terrified I am, I can't stay awake!
translate: 我知道它们在那里，但无论我多么害怕，我都无法保持清醒！

original: I always fall asleep, and when I wake up the next morning
translate: 我总是会睡着，然后第二天早上醒来时

original: The boy drops his head into his trembling hands
translate: 那男孩将头埋进颤抖的手掌中

original: I never see 'em do it, but every mornin' there are fresh marks on my goats...on me
translate: 我从没见过它们这么做，但每天早上我的山羊……还有我身上都有新的痕迹

original: They're feeding on us, I know they are!
translate: 它们在吸食我们，我知道它们在这么做！

original: The goats suddenly get to their feet, bleating nervously
translate: 那些山羊突然站了起来，紧张地咩咩叫着

original: Their gazes are fixed on something beyond the grey sea-mist that constantly blanks Idra
translate: 他们的眼神聚焦在灰蒙蒙的海雾之外的某物上，这种海雾终年不散，遮蔽着伊德拉。

original: The youth sinks to the ground and begins sobbing loudly
translate: 那个年轻人跪倒在地，开始大声哭泣。

original: You don’t get any more sense out of him and there is nothing left to do but lead the animals away
translate: 你从他那里得不到任何有用的信息，唯一的办法就是带着这些动物离开。

original: Huddled inside a hollow mountain crevice is a young man surrounded by half a dozen goats
translate: 在一座山洞的凹陷处蜷缩着一个年轻人，周围有六七只山羊。

original: He is shivering violently beneath a worn blanket, his gaunt face pale in the dim light
translate: 他蜷缩在破旧的毯子下，苍白的脸庞在昏暗的光线下显得更加憔悴。

original: The goats look no healthier
translate: 这些山羊看起来也不健康。

original: W-w-who goes there!?
translate: 谁在那里！？

original: Keep away - I've got nothing for you!
translate: 保持距离 - 我没有给你准备任何东西！

original: Who are you?
translate: 你是谁？

original: You're Jakub's boy, I presume?
translate: 你是雅库的儿子，没错吧？

original: The boy looks up at you with wide, too-trusting eyes
translate: 那个男孩用一双惊恐且过于信任的眼睛看着你。

original: M-my name is Aiden
translate: 我叫艾登

original: I live at a farm just outside of Horryn
translate: 我住在霍ryn城外的一个农场里

original: Dar trusts me to
translate: 达尔信任我

original: Why are you out here?
translate: 你为什么在这里？

original: It isn't safe
translate: 这里不安全

original: I
translate: 我

original: I'm doin' my part for the family!
translate: 我在为家庭尽一份力！

original: An inhuman shriek once again cuts through the mountains
translate: 又是一声非人的尖叫声划破了山峦。

original: The boy freezes in terror
translate: 那个男孩被吓呆了。

original: What was that?
translate: 什么声音？

original: The shepherd eyes you suspiciously
translate: 牧羊人怀疑地盯着你

original: I m-might be
translate: 我…我可能可以

original: Did he
translate: 他

original: Before he can finish an inhuman shriek once again cuts through the mountains
translate: 在他还能发出一声非人的尖啸之前，声音再次穿透山峦

original: Working as fast as you can, you get the ragged flock moving and set off towards the camp
translate: 尽你最快的速度，让这群疲惫的羊群动起来，然后向营地出发

original: No, wait!
translate: 不，等等！

original: Aiden looks suddenly terrified
translate: 伊登突然显得极为恐惧

original: I...I can't go!
translate: 我…我不能去！

original: My dar told me if I bring the goats back to the farm, the chamberlain will slaughter them for food and it'll be the end for ma and dar!
translate: 我的爸爸告诉我，如果我把山羊带回到农场，管家会把它们杀掉吃肉，那我和爸爸就完了！

original: What if I talk to your father?
translate: 如果我去找你爸爸呢？

original: It makes no difference
translate: 没有任何区别

original: I'm taking these goats to camp
translate: 我要把这些山羊带到营地

original: The young man shudders in relief
translate: 年轻人松了一口气

original: I know of hidden trails - we'll be in the camp in no time!
translate: 我知道一些隐秘的小径，我们很快就能到营地了！

original: The goats start bleeting
translate: 山羊开始咩咩叫

original: But we must hurry!
translate: 但我们必须快点！

original: Lead the way
translate: 你带路

original: I’m not going to let you do that!
translate: 我不会让你这么做的！

original: The scrawny teen struggles to his feet brandishing his shepherd's staff
translate: 身材瘦弱的少年挥舞着牧羊杖站了起来

original: If I lose these animals my dar’ll kill me!
translate: 如果我失去了这些动物，我的主人会杀了我！

original: Don't do anything stupid now
translate: 别做傻事了

original: I need to rethink this
translate: 我需要重新考虑一下

original: Fine by me
translate: 我同意

original: attack
translate: 攻击

original: The boy shivers from cold and exhaustion
translate: 小孩因寒冷和疲惫而颤抖

original: Wh… what now?
translate: 哦……现在该怎么办？

original: Why haven't you just left?
translate: 你为什么没有直接离开？

original: About the animals
translate: 关于这些动物

original: I need to go
translate: 我需要走了

original: The boy somehow looks even paler than he did last time you saw him
translate: 这次你看到他时，他看起来比之前更苍白

original: I don’t know how much longer we can take it
translate: 我不知道我们还能坚持多久

original: We need to talk?
translate: 我们需要谈谈吗？

original: The boy is clearly heartbroken, but he makes no effort to move
translate: 这个小孩显然心碎了，但他没有任何移动的意图

original: Alright, if that's what dar wants
translate: 好吧，如果这是我的主人想要的

original: You'd do that for me?
translate: 你会为了我做这件事？

original: Oh, Golden Dead bless you!!
translate: 哦，金色亡灵保佑你！

original: I'll be back soon
translate: 我很快就回来

original: My dar would kill me
translate: 我的主人会杀了我

original: He sent me up here to keep the goats safe and I’m not leaving until he permits it!
translate: 我被派上来保护山羊的安全，直到他允许我离开，我不会离开的！

original: The lad’s eyes water up
translate: 那少年的眼泪涌了出来

original: # Chapter_1_Horryn
translate: # 第一章 好瑞恩

original: #HorrynAmbush
translate: # 好瑞恩伏击

original: The men whirl around at the sound, and elation spreads across their faces as they spot you
translate: 听到声响，众人转过身来，脸上洋溢着欣喜，看到你后更是如此

original: Dragging their captives along, the reavers fan out around you with moronic grins and weapons drawn
translate: 把俘虏拖着，掠夺者们围着你散开，脸上带着愚蠢的笑容，武器也已拔出

original: One of them makes a piercing whistle and it's echoed by another behind you - a new group of six reavers file into the street, cutting off any chance you had at a retreat
translate: 其中一人发出尖锐的哨声，你身后有人回应，又有六名掠夺者进入街道，切断了你撤退的可能

original: You spring stealthily out of hiding, determined to get within killing range before your foes spot you
translate: 你敏捷地从隐蔽处跃出，决心在敌人发现你之前接近到致命距离

original: Your heart pounds in your chest as you prepare to strike the first blow!
translate: 心脏在胸腔中狂跳，你准备发动第一击！

original: But a piercing whistling cuts through the silence and stops you dead in your tracks
translate: 但尖锐的哨声划破寂静，让你停下了脚步

original: You whirl around to see another group of six reavers file into the street behind you, cutting you off from your escape route
translate: 你转身看到另一组六名掠夺者进入街道，将你困在了原地，无法逃脱

original: Elated laughter sounds from the first group as they notice the prey now caught between them and their comrades
translate: 第一组人发出欣喜的笑声，注意到现在你们之间夹着猎物

original: The reavers fan out around you, dragging their captives along, with moronic grins and weapons drawn
translate: 抢夺者们围着你散开，拖着俘虏，脸上带着愚蠢的笑容，武器也已拔出

original: An 'end'?
translate: 结束了吗？

original: There are no ends here!
translate: 这里没有结束！

original: Only new beginnings... new life!
translate: 只有新的开始……新的生命！

original: The men roar with laughter
translate: 众人发出狂笑

original: I am not
translate: 我不是

original: But He is waiting for you
translate: 但他正在等你

original: He has so much to show you
translate: 他有很多东西要向你展示

original: When you're ready
translate: 当你准备好了

original: We've come to put and end to you!
translate: 我们来结束这一切吧！

original: The man's breathing deepens in perverse delight as he pulls his hostage's head back by her long, auburn hair
translate: 那个男人深吸一口气，露出邪恶的快意，用力拉扯人质的长金色头发，将她的头往后扳

original: A thousand young will heed her call!
translate: 一千个年轻人将响应她的召唤！

original: He places the knife across the woman's throat
translate: 他将刀放在女人的脖子上

original: A THOUSAND YOUNG WILL HEAR HER CALL!
translate: 一千个年轻人将响应她的召唤！

original: Stop!!
translate: 停止！

original: Before you can react, the big man slits the poor woman's throat
translate: 在你反应过来之前，那个大汉割开了可怜女人的喉咙

original: Blood gushes forth as she stumbles towards you with utter panic in her eyes!
translate: 她跌跌撞撞地向你走来，眼中充满了绝望的恐慌！

original: Driina lunges towards her and frantically begins the hopeless task of stopping the bleeding
translate: 德里娜扑向她，疯狂地开始徒劳地止血

original: In the ensuing chaos, half of the wicked pack falls upon you from behind as the leader and a handful of his lackeys slip away with the surviving hostages
translate: 在随后的混乱中，恶徒们的一半从背后冲向你，首领和几个手下带着幸存的人质逃走了

original: As you approach the city-square, panicked cries of fear, pain and despair echo across the plaza
translate: 当你接近城市广场时，恐惧、痛苦和绝望的喊声在广场上回荡

original: You move closer and spy a large group of reavers rounding up and binding villagers
translate: 你走近，发现一群海盗正在搜捕并捆绑村民

original: The poor souls are bloodied and abused and the reavers tie them in ranks as though they intend to march them away
translate: 那些可怜的灵魂满身是血，受到虐待，海盗们将他们排成一列，仿佛要将他们带走

original: Call to the reavers
translate: 向海盗们喊话

original: The brute stares at you for a moment, then smiles
translate: 那个野蛮人盯着你片刻，然后露出了笑容

original: He stabs his dagger into the woman’s thigh and she screams in shock and pain
translate: 他将匕首刺入女人的大腿，她惊恐地尖叫起来

original: Blood sprays uncontrollably from the wound as he pushes her roughly towards you
translate: 血液不受控制地喷出，他粗暴地将她推向你

original: She stumbles into your arms, her face a mask of pleading and terror
translate: 她跌入你的怀抱，脸上满是祈求和恐惧的表情

original: The wound is deep but she may yet be saved
translate: 伤口很深，但她可能还能够得救

original: Attempt to bind her wounds!
translate: 尝试包扎她的伤口！

original: You cannot threaten me
translate: 你无法威胁我

original: All that can change now is just how many vessels Father will offer up to Her by the day's end
translate: 现在能改变的只是父亲今天结束前会献祭多少灵魂

original: Can't you see?
translate: 你看不懂吗？

original: This is your chance to be part of something so much bigger than yourself!
translate: 这是你参与比自己更大的事情的机会！

original: Fine - take them!
translate: 好吧，你带走他们吧！

original: Take the rest but leave the auburn woman
translate: 带走剩下的，但留下那个红发女子

original: You're all insane!
translate: 你们都疯了！

original: The wound is too deep and the bleeding too severe
translate: 伤口太深，出血也太严重

original: The woman bleeds out in your arms
translate: 那女子在你怀中流血过多，最终停止了呼吸

original: As you look around the pack of reavers have fled with their hostages and the plaza now lies empty
translate: 当你环顾四周时，掠夺者带着人质逃走了，广场现在一片空旷

original: Driina holds the dead woman's hand as she recites a prayer under her breath
translate: 德里娜握着死者的手，低声念诵着祷告

original: The wound has cut one of the large blood vessels in her thigh and the situation is dire
translate: 伤口切中了她大腿的一条大血管，情况危急

original: Acting quickly, you loosen your belt and wrap it around her leg
translate: 迅速行动，你松开腰带，将其绑在她的腿上

original: Using a stick you craft a tourniquet and manage to apply enough pressure to halt the bleeding
translate: 用一根棍子制作了一个止血带，并成功施加了足够的压力来止血

original: The woman’s life has been saved
translate: 那女子的生命得以挽救

original: You sit with the woman and catch your breath
translate: 你坐在女子身旁，喘息着

original: Out of the fog, coming from the Fisherman’s Gate, a thin wretch of a man limps into view
translate: 从迷雾中，从渔夫门传来，一个瘦弱的男人一瘸一拐地出现

original: Natia!!
translate: 内蒂亚！！

original: By the Golden Dead: you saved her!
translate: 金色亡者之名：你救了她！

original: Philip rushes to her side with tears streaming down his face
translate: 菲利普泪流满面地冲到她身边

original: No doubt, the poor man followed you into the city to look for his wife
translate: 毫无疑问，那个可怜的男人跟着你进了城，来找他的妻子

original: She needs a safe place to rest!
translate: 她需要一个安全的地方休息！

original: Our old home is nearby
translate: 我们的老家就在附近

original: It will have to do!
translate: 就这样吧！

original: Philip picks up his wife and leads you a short way through the mist to a meager home
translate: 菲利普抱起妻子，穿过迷雾，领着你走了一段路到一个简陋的家

original: As you follow Driina places a hand on your shoulder and offers a soft smile
translate: 当你跟着德里娜时，她把手放在你的肩膀上，露出温柔的笑容

original: A small reprieve amongst all this suffering, no
translate: 在这一切苦难中，这也算是一丝慰藉，不是吗？

original: One of the struggling captives manages to break free
translate: 一个挣扎中的俘虏终于挣脱了束缚

original: She is swiftly caught and her throat slit for the trouble
translate: 她很快被抓回，喉咙被割开作为惩罚

original: The other captives cry out in terror
translate: 其他俘虏惊恐地尖叫

original: Laughing, the reavers pull the rest to their feet and make for the opposite side of the square, towards the keep that looms over Horryn
translate: 嘲笑着，掠夺者把其他人扶起，向广场的另一边走去，朝霍林城上空矗立的堡垒进发

original: We must act now, or all will be lost!
translate: 我们必须现在行动，否则一切都完了！

original: Driina hisses
translate: 德里娜嘶嘶地低语

original: Stay hidden
translate: 保持隐蔽

original: As the cries of the captives echo across the empty square, you tread cautiously back the way you came
translate: 当俘虏们的哭喊声在空旷的广场上回荡时，你小心翼翼地沿着来时的路返回

original: A whistle cuts painfully through the eerie silence
translate: 一声尖啸刺破了诡异的寂静

original: You whirl around to see another group of six reavers file into the street behind you, cutting off your retreat
translate: 你猛地转身，看到另一组六名掠夺者正从你身后的小巷中走进街道，切断了你的退路

original: Elated laughter spills from the first group, as they turn back to exult in their freshly caught quarry
translate: 第一组的狂笑声溢出，他们转身庆祝他们刚刚捕获的新猎物

original: As the cries of the captives being dragged away echo in the empty square, Driina looks you straight in the eyes, measuring your resolve
translate: 当俘虏被拖走的喊叫声在空旷的广场上回荡时，德里娜直视着你的眼睛，衡量着你的决心。

original: Before you can muster a response, she steps from your hiding place
translate: 你还没来得及回应，她就从你的藏身之处走了出来。

original: Her voice booms across the square
translate: 她的声音在广场上回响。

original: By the Golden Dead - stand and answer for your crimes!
translate: 金死神在上——站出来为你的罪行负责！

original: The man's voice rises, speaking as much to the other reavers as to you
translate: 那个男人的声音提高了，既是对其他掠夺者也是对你说的。

original: We stand at the dawn of a new age - of old masters, reclaiming their rightful thrones!
translate: 我们站在新时代的黎明——旧主人正在重新夺回他们应得的王座！

original: And you will all play your part in ushering it in
translate: 而你们都将扮演各自的角色，迎接它的到来。

original: The hooded man smiles cruelly at Driina
translate: 那个蒙面男人阴险地笑着看着德里娜。

original: The reavers close in around you
translate: 掠夺者们围拢过来。

original: This ends now!
translate: 这一切现在就结束！

original: What now?
translate: 现在怎么办？

original: Steady on
translate: 别慌。

original: Roland whispers as he grabs your wrist, pulling you back into the shadows
translate: 罗兰低声说，他抓住你的手腕，把你拉回阴影中。

original: There's plenty more of them than us - attacking head on is a poor bet even for me
translate: 他们比我们多得多，正面攻击对我们来说都是个糟糕的选择，即使是对我也是如此。

original: Wait till they move and we'll take their rear
translate: 等他们移动时，我们攻击他们的后方。

original: Might even the odds before they know what's hit 'em
translate: 甚至可以在他们反应过来之前改变战局。

original: We'll wait!
translate: 我们要等待！

original: We attack now!
translate: 我们现在就攻击！

original: Not in a rush to die anymore Roland?
translate: 还不是急于求死了，罗兰？

original: Roland scowls
translate: 罗兰皱起了眉头。
