original: I may be shitty company, but that doesn't mean I'm happy to let my comrades throw their lives away on a whim
translate: 虽然我可能是个糟糕的同伴，但这并不意味着我会开心地看着我的同伴们心血来潮地冒险丧生

original: The man points his blade at you
translate: 那个男人将刀指向你

original: We will meet again soon!
translate: 我们很快就会再见面的！

original: He whistles loudly and the pack sets off at a run, driving the hostages before themselves like pigs to the slaughter
translate: 他大声吹了一声口哨，狼群开始奔跑，像赶猪一样驱赶着人质

original: Roland puts a heavy hand on your shoulder
translate: 罗兰重重地拍了拍你的肩膀

original: If we had fought them it would have been the end of the hostages
translate: 如果我们和他们战斗，人质们就完了

original: Now, at least, we may yet have a chance to rescue them
translate: 至少现在，我们或许还有机会救出他们

original: Behind you Driina sinks to her knees and sobs from rage and helplessness
translate: 你背后，德莉娜跪倒在地，因愤怒和无力而哭泣

original: You tell yourself that combat would certainly have resulted in the death of the hostages
translate: 你告诉自己，战斗肯定会导致人质们的死亡

original: At least now you may yet find a second chance to rescue them
translate: 至少现在，你们或许还有第二次机会救出他们

original: A hulk of a man steps to the fore, dressed only in ragged trousers and a half hood
translate: 一个魁梧的男人走到前面，只穿着破旧的裤子和半遮脸的斗篷

original: His swollen barrel chest is covered in sailor tattoos
translate: 他肿胀的桶状胸膛上满是水手纹身

original: He hefts a rusty serrated dagger, and drags a terrified woman behind him by her auburn hair
translate: 他挥舞着一把生锈的锯齿状匕首，拖着一个吓得发抖的金发女子

original: He smiles serenely as he approaches, revealing a few remaining, yellow teeth
translate: 他缓缓地接近，面带平和的笑容，露出几颗残存的黄牙

original: You have no idea how glad I am to see you here!
translate: 看到你在这里，我真是高兴极了！

original: There is no scorn or malice in his voice
translate: 他的声音里没有轻蔑或恶意

original: Only genuine joy
translate: 只有真正的喜悦

original: You're truly blessed to be a part of this
translate: 你真是有福气能成为我们中的一员

original: He slowly, almost tenderly places the knife against the womans throat as he speaks
translate: 他缓缓地，几乎带着怜悯，将刀抵在女子的喉咙上

original: Are you the one they call 'Father'?
translate: 你是他们所说的‘父亲’吗？

original: A part of what?
translate: 部分是什么？

original: The man's breathing deepens in perverse delight as he pulls his hostage's head back by her long auburn hair
translate: 那个男人在扭曲的快感中深呼吸，他用力拉扯人质的长红发，将她的头往后扯

original: We bring these children to Father’s flock
translate: 我们把这些孩子带到父亲的羊群中

original: You are free to roam and frolic with my brothers and sisters
translate: 你可以自由地与我的兄弟姐妹们嬉戏玩耍

original: I’m sure Oleg or Kala will welcome you with open arms!
translate: 我敢肯定奥列格或卡拉会张开双臂欢迎你！

original: Let the villagers go!
translate: 让村民们走吧！

original: Not a chance!
translate: 没门！

original: #HorrynReaverChief1
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长1

original: Oh the Butcher’s a good boy but he’s truly gone astray
translate: 那屠夫是个好孩子，但他真的走偏了

original: Blood-drunk I say
translate: 血狂热者我说

original: I’ve seen it before
translate: 我见过这种情况

original: Once you taste the flesh and blood and guts of the weak, your hands just start going by themselves
translate: 一旦你品尝过弱者的肉、血和内脏，你的手就会不由自主地去杀人

original: Becomes like gutting fish
translate: 就像是剖鱼一样

original: Knife in - knife out
translate: 刀入 - 刀出

original: Oleg smiles broadly as he imitates a sawing motion with his hand
translate: 奥列格露出了灿烂的笑容，模仿锯动的动作

original: But the Father still needs him - The tablets are whispering it to me!
translate: 但父亲仍然需要他 - 碑文在向我低语！

original: Seek him out in front of the temple, over in the western part of town, and tell that to him!
translate: 在神殿前找他，在镇子西边的部分告诉他！

original: I have some other questions
translate: 我还有一些其他的问题

original: About the other chieftains
translate: 关于其他酋长

original: A shadow falls over Oleg’s face
translate: 奥列格的脸上掠过一丝阴影

original: Father is a great man
translate: 父亲是个伟大的人

original: I was the one to receive the word from the Deep but Father was the one who was truly chosen
translate: 我接到了来自深渊的信息，但父亲才是真正被选中的

original: I won’t lie
translate: 我不会撒谎

original: I was jealous!
translate: 我嫉妒他！

original: I hated him for it!
translate: 我恨他！

original: The tablets came to me after all!
translate: 神谕最终还是降临到我身上了！

original: Why was he the one to receive the gift?!
translate: 为什么是他得到这份礼物？！

original: What is his 'work'?
translate: 他的‘工作’是什么？

original: He sighs
translate: 他叹了口气

original: Then again, his work is so important
translate: 但他的工作确实非常重要

original: So… beautiful even I cannot begin to comprehend it
translate: 所以……美丽到我无法理解

original: And we must all play our part in it
translate: 我们都要在其中扮演自己的角色

original: My siblings will fall in line and you have been chosen for the task
translate: 我的兄弟姐妹们会听从安排，你被选中来完成这项任务

original: Oh do not worry!
translate: 别担心！

original: You’ll meet him soon enough and all will be made clear
translate: 你会很快见到他的，一切都会变得清晰

original: It is whispered
translate: 有人低语

original: Sweet little sister Kala!
translate: 甜美的小妹妹卡拉！

original: She and her brood caught more of the prey than any other!
translate: 她和她的后代捕获的猎物比任何人都多！

original: Sniffed them out from their cellars and attics and cupboards and sent them to Father!
translate: 从地窖、阁楼和橱柜中嗅出他们，然后将他们送到父亲那里！

original: Though he only takes the fit
translate: 虽然他只接受健康的猎物

original: The very young and very old were left for her to play with
translate: 她被留下与非常年幼和非常年老的生物玩耍

original: Oleg chuckles genially
translate: 奥列格愉快地笑着

original: I fear she’s grown bored and lazy now that there’s hardly more prey to be had
translate: 我担心她现在变得无聊又懒惰了，因为几乎没有什么猎物可供捕猎

original: She just sits around and stews over in the pack-house on the docks now
translate: 她现在只是坐在码头的货仓里发泄不满

original: It’s time she was reminded that she has a role to play yet!
translate: 是时候让她意识到她还有角色要扮演了！

original: Prey?
translate: 猎物？

original: Do you mean people?
translate: 你是说人类吗？

original: The old man smiles serenely and appears to either not hear or not comprehend your question
translate: 老者平静地微笑，似乎既没有听到也没有理解你的问题

original: The filthy pack of robed and hooded mad-men roar in insane anger and charge towards you as they draw strangely curved blades and cruel looking axes!
translate: 那群肮脏的披袍戴兜帽的疯子怒吼着冲向你，他们抽出奇怪弯曲的刀刃和看起来很残酷的斧头！

original: Tell me about Kala!
translate: 告诉我关于卡拉的事吧！

original: Tell me about the Butcher!
translate: 告诉我关于屠夫的事吧！

original: Tell me about the Father!
translate: 告诉我关于父亲的事吧！

original: I have other questions
translate: 我还有其他问题

original: The band of madmen file out of the lodge and into the city
translate: 那群疯子从木屋中走出，进入城市

original: Keeping your distance, you follow them as they set up an ambush in the plaza
translate: 保持距离，你跟着他们，在广场上设下埋伏

original: Like mangey, starving wolves they fidget with the anticipation of bloodshed
translate: 像患皮肤病的、饥饿的狼一样，他们兴奋地期待着血腥的屠杀

original: Finally their quarry arrives
translate: 终于，他们的猎物到了

original: The Butcher and his filthy brood prowl into the square with weapons drawn
translate: 屠夫和他的肮脏同伙手持武器，游荡进广场

original: An arrow is loosened and then mad cries from the ambushers fill the air as a furious melee erupts!
translate: 一支箭被拉满，然后埋伏者疯狂的喊叫在空中回荡，激烈的混战爆发了！

original: Savage blades make bloody work
translate: 残酷的刀刃制造出血腥的杀戮

original: Intestines spill, blood pours and limbs are torn from bodies
translate: 内脏流出，鲜血四溅，肢体从尸体上被撕扯下来

original: Screams of pain and terror mix with the howls and snarls of men utterly lost to insane bloodlust
translate: 疼痛和恐惧的尖叫声混杂着那些彻底丧失理智、疯狂嗜血的人的嚎叫和嘶吼

original: The Butcher finds Oleg on the field and with a mighty swing the old man is slain
translate: 屠夫在战场上找到了奥列格，一记沉重的挥击，老人倒下了

original: As the fiend tears his ‘brother’s’ hearth from his chest, he howls in triumph
translate: 当邪魔从“兄弟”的胸膛中扯出火炉时，他得意地嚎叫着

original: As the screams die down and all the savagery is sated, the ground is slick with blood
translate: 当尖叫声渐渐平息，所有的暴行得到满足，地面上满是鲜血

original: Hulking and dark with grime and gore the Butcher stands panting in the center of the battlefield surrounded by his few surrounding men
translate: 他身躯庞大，浑身沾满污垢和血污，喘息着站在战场中央，周围只有寥寥数人

original: In the darkness his eyes burn like white hot coals
translate: 在黑暗中，他的眼睛如同燃烧的白煤般炽热

original: As he raises his bloody axe towards you, an inhuman scream echoes across the plaza
translate: 当他举起沾满鲜血的战斧向你砍来时，一声非人的尖叫声回荡在整个广场

original: It seems the mad-man has one more sacrifice yet to make!
translate: 看来那个疯子还有一名牺牲者要献祭！

original: Attack!
translate: 攻击！

original: What?!
translate: 什么？！

original: My patience is limited!
translate: 我的耐心是有限的！

original: About your tablets
translate: 关于那些石板

original: Regarding the other chieftains
translate: 关于其他酋长

original: I'm here to end you!
translate: 我来这里就是要结束你的生命！

original: It's time I left
translate: 到了我离开的时候了

original: An old man,graying but endowed with a physique sculpted by a lifetime of hard manual labor, looks up at you as you approach
translate: 一位老人，虽然头发灰白但身体因一生的繁重体力劳动而显得健壮，正抬头望着你

original: A smile of genuine surprise spreads warmly across his face in a manner that stands in stark contrast to the grotesque surroundings
translate: 他脸上露出真诚的惊喜，笑容温暖，与周围的怪异景象形成鲜明对比

original: Ah!
translate: 啊！

original: You came!
translate: 你来了！

original: You were expecting me?
translate: 你是在期待我吗？

original: Your coming was whispered
translate: 你的到来是悄悄传开的

original: Such are the blessings of the Depths
translate: 这是深渊的恩赐

original: Cast your nets and receive the bounty
translate: 撒下你的渔网，收获丰饶

original: All my life I’ve been at sea
translate: 我的一生都在海上度过

original: Wind and rain and frozen fingers
translate: 风雨和冻僵的手指

original: And let me tell you
translate: 让我告诉你

original: Them Imperial hymns never did me any good
translate: 那些帝国的颂歌对我毫无益处

original: Twasn't afore we started using the old incantations that the Deep started rewarding us
translate: 不是直到我们开始使用古老的咒语，深渊才开始眷顾我们

original: And rewarded me it did
translate: 并且它眷顾了我

original: The Whispering Tablets came to me
translate: 低语的石板向我显现

original: That’s where we first received the deep word and that’s where I heard of your coming
translate: 那就是我们首次听到深渊的话语，也是我得知你到来的地方

original: Whispering tablet?
translate: 低语的石板？

original: The Butcher has stolen your tablets!
translate: 屠夫偷走了你的石板！

original: Aye
translate: 是的

original: The words of the Deep - written in stone
translate: 深渊的话语 - 刻在石头上

original: Given to me and me alone
translate: 只赐予我一人

original: Those two upstarts, Kala and that butcher, covet it and even the Father himself pretends he no longer needs it
translate: 那两个冒失鬼，卡拉和那个屠夫，觊觎它，甚至父亲本人也假装不再需要它

original: No longer needs me
translate: 不再需要我

original: A flash of anger comes across the face of the kindly old man
translate: 和蔼的老人脸上闪过一丝愤怒

original: But I’ll remind him
translate: 但我会提醒他

original: I’ll make the Father remember
translate: 我会让父亲想起

original: How?
translate: 如何？

original: Sister Kala and brother Butcher have lost their way
translate: 姐姐卡拉和哥哥屠夫迷失了方向

original: All the bloodshed has gone to their heads and they’ve strayed!
translate: 所有的流血让他们头脑不清，他们已经走偏了！

original: Lost their way!
translate: 迷失了方向！

original: Meanwhile, the Father has gone to the keep to begin the holy work
translate: 同时，父亲已经去了要塞开始神圣的工作

original: He’s left it to me to put my wayward siblings right
translate: 他把纠正走偏的兄弟姐妹的任务交给了我

original: Or put them down
translate: 或者把他们击倒

original: Like diseased dogs
translate: 像患病的狗一样

original: And you think I'll help you?
translate: 你以为我会帮你？

original: It does not matter what I think
translate: 我的想法无关紧要

original: The tablets whispered and here you are
translate: 法典低语，而你在这里

original: Before this is over you will have more blood on your hands
translate: 在这一切结束之前，你手上的血会更多

original: So much more blood
translate: 更多的鲜血

original: Go to them
translate: 去找他们

original: Tell them to return to the family or suffer the consequences
translate: 告诉他们回到家族，否则会有后果

original: The Butcher is culling the flock in front of the temple and you’ll find Kala holding court at the east-end of the docks
translate: 屠夫正在神殿前屠杀羊群，你会在码头东端找到卡拉主持法庭

original: Begone now and do not return until you are done
translate: 现在离开，直到完成任务后才回来

original: Not so fast
translate: 不要这么快

original: I have questions!
translate: 我有问题！

original: Oleg pauses a moment and then smiles conspiratorily
translate: 奥列格停顿了一下，然后诡秘地笑了笑

original: Kala!
translate: 卡拉！

original: Together we’ll slay brother Butcher and once we feast on his putrid entrails, she’ll make a fine consort for old Oleg!
translate: 我们一起去杀掉那个屠夫兄弟，等我们饱餐了他的腐烂内脏后，她会成为奥列格老爹的好伴侣！

original: Go to her!
translate: 去找她！

original: Tell her that together we shall put an end to the Butcher’s obstinance and win Father’s favor!
translate: 告诉她，我们要一起结束屠夫的顽固，赢得父亲的青睐！

original: What do you want?
translate: 你想干什么？

original: I have some questions!
translate: 我有问题！

original: The robed cultists stop dead in their tracks as they spot you
translate: 穿着长袍的邪教徒们突然停下了脚步，看到你后

original: You
translate: 你！

original: You're not supposed to be here!
translate: 你不应该在这里！

original: Come here so I can gut you!
translate: 来吧，我要剖开你的肚子！

original: Oleg sent me!
translate: 奥列格派我来的！

original: INTERLOPER!
translate: 闯入者！

original: DIE!
translate: 死吧！

original: The Reavers appear taken aback, not knowing what to say
translate: 破坏者们显得有些惊讶，不知道该说什么

original: Instead they say nothing, whirl around and clamber up the ladder leading to the surface
translate: 他们什么也没说，转身攀上了通向地表的梯子

original: What in the depths are you doing back here?!
translate: 在深渊里，你为什么要回来？！

original: To arms lads!
translate: 准备战斗，伙计们！

original: Yes?
translate: 什么？

original: I've taken the tablets for myself!
translate: 我已经把石板据为己有！

original: Can I see them?
translate: 我能看看吗？

original: Tell me more about them!
translate: 给我讲讲它们的事！

original: The man eyes you suspiciously
translate: 那人怀疑地盯着你

original: They’re none of your fucking business is what they are!
translate: 这不关你们屁事！

original: They came to me and me alone!
translate: 它们只属于我一个人！

original: It was MY nets that caught them and my boat that carried them ashore!
translate: 是我，只有我，用我的渔网捕获了它们，用我的船将它们带回岸边！

original: Not the Butcher, not Kala and not even Father himself!
translate: 不是屠夫，不是卡拉，甚至不是我自己父亲！

original: ME!
translate: 我！

original: Oleg wipes a drop of sweat from his brow
translate: 奥列格擦了擦额头的汗水

original: Now, you best get going
translate: 现在，你最好快点离开

original: He offers a polite, slight smile
translate: 他露出礼貌的微笑

original: I have more questions!
translate: 我还有问题！

original: Oleg chuckles fatherly
translate: 奥列格慈爱地笑了

original: Oh my, no
translate: 哦天哪，不

original: They are for me and me alone
translate: 它们只属于我一个人

original: They lie in darkness; safe and untouched by the filth of my wayward siblings
translate: 它们藏在黑暗中，安全无恙，不受我那些叛逆兄弟的玷污

original: What can you tell me about them?
translate: 你能告诉我关于它们的事吗？

original: I had some other questions
translate: 我还有一些其他问题

original: The man’s eyes widen in shock and rage
translate: 那人的双眼因震惊和愤怒而放大

original: What have you done!?
translate: 你到底做了什么！

original: You’re unraveling the thread!
translate: 你正在拆解命运的线！

original: Are you mad??!
translate: 你疯了吗？！

original: You’ll pay for this!
translate: 你会为此付出代价！

original: Oleg instinctively senses the truth in your words and his eyes widen in shock and terror
translate: 奥列格本能地感觉到你话语中的真相，他的眼睛因震惊和恐惧而放大

original: Then, utter rage
translate: 然后，怒火中烧

original: That upstart!
translate: 那个不知天高地厚的家伙！

original: I gave him a chance to come to my side and he betrays me instead?!
translate: 我给他机会加入我这边，他却背叛了我？！

original: And now you say he intends to make an offering of me?!
translate: 而现在，你说他打算把我当作祭品？！

original: We shall see who’s bones will be laid out in the sun to dry come dawn!
translate: 看看黎明时分，谁的骨头会在阳光下晒干！

original: Children, sharpen your blades!
translate: 孩子们，磨快你们的刀！

original: We’ll get the jump on the upstart yet!
translate: 我们还能给他一个措手不及！

original: Watch them leave
translate: 观察他们离开

original: What if you ask Kala to ally with you?
translate: 如果你请求卡拉与你结盟呢？

original: #HorrynReaverChief1GateGuard
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长1号门卫

original: The men lick their lips in greedy anticipation
translate: 男人们贪婪地舔着嘴唇

original: To arms!
translate: 准备战斗！

original: they bellow
translate: 他们吼道

original: Yes you will
translate: 你一定会

original: Oleg is waiting for you inside
translate: 奥列格在内等着你

original: The man offers a toothless grin
translate: 那人露出了没有牙齿的笑容

original: You spot a pair of reavers dressed in a bizarre assortment of ragged robes, hoods and antlered masks guarding the gate to what appears to be a decrepit villa
translate: 你注意到两排奇装异服的掠夺者，他们穿着破烂的长袍，戴着兜帽和角状面具，守卫着一座破败别墅的大门

original: The pair notices you and they grin cruelly as they heft their weapons before suddenly stopping
translate: 这两排人注意到你，他们恶毒地笑了笑，然后举起了武器，但突然停了下来

original: The antlered man leans in and whispers in the hooded one's ear
translate: 穿着角状面具的人凑近，对着戴兜帽的人耳语

original: Their grins fade
translate: 他们脸上的笑容消失了

original: You’re welcome to our lodge!
translate: 欢迎光临我们的小屋！

original: He’s been expecting you
translate: 他一直在等你

original: What?
translate: 什么？

original: Iben looks tense and whispers out of the corner of his mouth
translate: Iben显得紧张，低声在角落里说道

original: We got lucky before
translate: 我们之前侥幸逃过了一劫

original: These madmen are not to be trifled with and we will do well to employ some cunning in dealing with them
translate: 这些疯子不可小觑，我们最好用一些智谋来对付他们

original: Roland chimes in
translate: Roland插了一句

original: Little man's right
translate: 小个子说得没错

original: I’m not afraid to get my hands dirty but we are few and we don’t know their true numbers yet
translate: 我不怕弄脏手，但我们人不多，还不知道他们的确切人数

original: We shall see
translate: 我们会看看情况

original: Oleg’s a great man!
translate: Oleg是个伟大的人！

original: The Father might have forgotten it but he is the oldest of us
translate: 老师可能忘记了，但他是我们中最年长的

original: Was him who pulled the tablets out of the depths and he’s still their keeper
translate: 是他从深渊中取出了石板，至今仍是它们的守护者

original: And as long as he is, his word carries more weight than any of us!
translate: 只要他还活着，他的话比我们任何一个人都有分量！

original: The Father would do well not to forget that!
translate: 老师最好不要忘记这一点！

original: Tablets?
translate: 法典？

original: The man smiles serenely
translate: 那人平静地笑了

original: No need
translate: 没有必要

original: Oleg hisself is waiting for you inside
translate: 奥列格自己在裡面等你

original: Go to him now
translate: 你现在去找他吧

original: I had some more questions
translate: 我还有一些问题

original: The men look puzzled
translate: 那些人显得困惑

original: Why would we?
translate: 为什么我们会？

original: Oleg says not to and his words come from the depths themselves
translate: 奥列格说不要，他的话语来自最深处

original: He had the tablets even before the father came to us
translate: 甚至在他父亲来找我们之前，他就已经有了那些法典

original: What tablets?
translate: 哪些法典？

original: Tell me more about Oleg!
translate: 告诉我更多关于奥列格的事！

original: You mustn't tarry
translate: 你不能耽搁

original: Oleg very much wishes to speak with you
translate: 奥列格非常希望和你交谈

original: Tell me more about this Oleg!
translate: 告诉我更多关于奥列格的事！

original: Why are you not attacking me?
translate: 你们为什么不攻击我？

original: I have no time for you madmen!
translate: 我没有时间和这些疯子浪费时间！

original: The whispering tablets
translate: 低语的法典

original: Ones that came up in our nets
translate: 在我们的渔网中出现的那种

original: From the deep and the Mother herself!
translate: 来自深渊和母亲本身！

original: The ones that make you
translate: 让你感到恐惧的

original: The other reaver grabs his arm and he catches himself
translate: 另一个掠夺者抓住了他的手臂，他稳住了自己

original: Best you see Oleg
translate: 最好你见到奥列格

original: He’ll tell you all you needs to know
translate: 他会告诉你所需要知道的一切

original: #HorrynReaverChief2
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长2

original: The woman snarls and bares her fangs as she draws a wickedly curved blade and lunges at you!
translate: 女人发出嘶嘶声，露出獠牙，她抽出一把弯曲的利刃向你扑来！

original: The woman in front of you is tall and sinewy
translate: 你面前的女人身材高大，肌肉紧绷

original: Her face is painted and bloody and her teeth have been filed into fangs
translate: 她的脸被涂得血红，牙齿被磨成了獠牙

original: She licks her lips greedily as you approach
translate: 当你走近时，她贪婪地舔着嘴唇

original: So what have we here?
translate: 那么，这是什么情况？

original: Fresh playthings for the brood?
translate: 群魔的小玩具？

original: Come to taste the blade?
translate: 来尝尝这把刀？

original: The Butcher has stolen the tablets from Oleg
translate: 肉食者从奥列格那里偷走了石板

original: Oy!
translate: 哦！

original: Don’t you know who you’re talking to?
translate: 你不知道你是在和谁说话吗？

original: One of the flanking reavers spit in your direction
translate: 一个侧翼的掠夺者朝你吐了口唾沫

original: This is Queen Kala herself and you’re about to have the honor of being gutted by her!
translate: 这是女王卡拉本人，你即将有幸被她剖腹！

original: The assembled reavers howl and jeer
translate: 所有聚集的掠夺者发出尖叫声和嘲笑声

original: I'll be the one doing the gutting!
translate: 我将是那个剖腹的人！

original: Silence!
translate: 保持安静！

original: Kala yells in a voice that could cut glass
translate: 卡拉用能割裂玻璃的声音喊叫

original: The reavers scuttle fearfully into the shadows
translate: 这些掠夺者畏畏缩缩地躲进了阴影中

original: I am bored
translate: 我很无聊

original: You will entertain me; One way or another
translate: 你得取悦我，无论用什么方法

original: Did one of my 'siblings' send you?
translate: 是我的‘兄弟姐妹’之一派你来的吗？

original: Siblings?
translate: 兄弟姐妹？

original: Did Oleg’s tablets command him to send you?
translate: 奥列格的‘祈祷石’命令他派你来的吗？

original: Or was it the Butcher perhaps?
translate: 还是那个屠夫？

original: So busy with the slaughter that he sends others to do his knife-work for him?
translate: 忙于屠杀，派别人替他完成刀下的工作？

original: I bring word from Oleg
translate: 我带来奥列格的消息

original: He reminds you that he holds the Whispering Tablets and that you owe him your allegiance
translate: 他提醒你，他拥有低语祈祷石，你必须对他效忠

original: The woman flashes her disfigured teeth in a savage gesture
translate: 那女人露出了残缺的牙齿，做出了一种野蛮的手势

original: Oleg is king of shit
translate: 奥列格是粪堆之王

original: The old man’s teeth have gone soft and if the Father’s eye is still on any of us, it’s not on Oleg any more
translate: 老头的牙齿已经软化了，如果父亲的眼睛还在注视着我们，现在已经不盯着奥列格了

original: That’s for sure
translate: 没错

original: Kala picks her nails with a dagger for a moment
translate: 卡拉用匕首挑着指甲停顿了一下

original: But what do I care
translate: 可我管不了那么多

original: Butcher will sort him out soon enough and then he’ll become Fathers favorite
translate: 屠夫很快就会解决他，然后他将成为父亲的宠儿

original: The Butcher will kill Oleg?
translate: 屠夫会杀死奥列格吗？

original: She grins widely
translate: 她露出了灿烂的笑容

original: Oh there will be plenty of blood and guts
translate: 好吧，今晚肯定会有不少鲜血和内脏

original: Don’t you worry!
translate: 别担心！

original: But more than anything it’s those tablets Oleg has the Butcher wants
translate: 但最重要的是，屠夫想要奥列格手中的那些药片

original: Them ‘Whispering Tablets’
translate: 那些‘低语药片’

original: The Butcher knows the brethren will flock to him if he nabs them from Oleg
translate: 屠夫知道，如果他从奥列格手中抢到药片，兄弟们就会蜂拥而至

original: And he’s plenty strong to take them but he’s afraid Father will get mad if he makes too much of a mess getting them
translate: 他有足够的力量夺取药片，但怕父亲生气，如果弄得太乱的话

original: What are you saying?
translate: 你在说什么？

original: Father wants order in the flock and he wants the one with the tablet to enforce it
translate: 父亲希望羊群秩序井然，他希望持有药片的人来维持秩序

original: Thing is, Oleg is too weak
translate: 问题是，奥列格太弱了

original: The only one strong enough to force us all in line is the Butcher but he don’t have the tablets!
translate: 唯一能让我们都听话的人是屠夫，但他没有药片！

original: See?
translate: 看吧？

original: It’s the irony of the fates
translate: 这就是命运的讽刺

original: If the tablets were to fall into Butcher’s hands however… the bloodshed would be magnificent
translate: 但如果药片落入屠夫手中……鲜血将如潮水般涌出

original: Her eyes seem to glimmer for a moment
translate: 她的眼中似乎闪过一丝光芒

original: I think I'll just kill you!
translate: 我会杀了你！

original: I'll be leaving then
translate: 我要离开了

original: Kala erupts into cruel laughter
translate: 卡拉发出冷酷的笑声

original: Oh I'll join him and we’ll make a bloody mess of Oleg!
translate: 哦，我会加入他，我们一起把奥列格弄得血肉模糊！

original: And when the Butcher feasts on the old fool’s liver he’ll be so certain he’s won Father’s favor that he might not even feel my blade between his ribs
translate: 而当屠夫享用老愚者的肝脏时，他可能会如此确信自己赢得了父亲的青睐，以至于根本感觉不到我的刀刃插在他的肋骨间

original: There will be only one of us left standing tonight!
translate: 今晚，将只有我们两人站立！

original: Kala and her brood of reavers stalk their way into the main plaza of the city where they are met by the Butcher and his lot
translate: 卡拉和她的掠夺者幼崽们悄悄地进入城市的主广场，遇到了屠夫和他的手下

original: You follow from a distance and see the two reavers exchange words
translate: 你从远处跟随着，看到两个掠夺者交换了几句话

original: Then Kala slips into the mist and darkness and the Butcher forms his men up in a crude line
translate: 然后卡拉融入了雾气和黑暗之中，屠夫将他的手下们排成了一条简陋的队列

original: Soon, Oleg and his band approach from the east
translate: 很快，奥列格和他的伙计们从东方接近

original: Stalking cautiously into the plaza, towards the Butchers line, the two men exchange a few crude words before an arrow flies and carnage erupts
translate: 谨慎地潜入广场，朝着屠夫的队列前进，两个男人交换了几句粗鄙的话，随后一支箭矢飞出，随之而来的是血腥的屠杀

original: As the fiend tears his ‘brother’s’ heart from his chest, he howls in triumph
translate: 当恶魔从对方“兄弟”的胸膛中扯出心脏时，他发出胜利的嚎叫

original: Then from out of the shadows, Kala and her brood fall upon the remainder of Olegs men from the rear
translate: 然后，卡拉和她的幼崽们从阴影中跃出，从后方袭击奥列格剩余的手下

original: The slaughter is complete and total and not a soul from Oleg’s band is left standing
translate: 残酷的屠杀彻底结束了，奥列格手下没有一个人还站着

original: As the screams die down and all the savagery is sated, the ground is slick with blood and gore
translate: 当尖叫声渐渐平息，所有的暴行都得到了满足，地面上满是鲜血和残肢

original: Kala stalks the battlefield like a savage animal, making short work of the wounded while the Butcher stands panting in the center of the plaza
translate: 卡拉像一头野兽般在战场上徘徊，迅速解决着伤员，而屠夫则在广场中央喘息着

original: In the darkness their eyes fix upon you, burning like white hot coals
translate: 在黑暗中，他们的眼睛盯着你，如同炽热的煤炭

original: Kala raises her bloody sword towards you and lets out an inhuman scream
translate: 卡拉举起沾满鲜血的剑指向你，发出非人的尖叫

original: It seems they have one more sacrifice yet to make!
translate: 看来他们还差一个祭品

original: Butcher’s too strong for either of us to slay on our own, but if I join Oleg
translate: 屠夫太强大了，我们任何一个人都无法独自将其击败，但如果我加入奥列格

original: A smirk spreads across her face
translate: 她的脸上露出了一丝冷笑

original: Together we’ll lay that pile of fat low and then I’ll deal with Oleg myself!
translate: 我们一起将那堆肥肉打倒，然后我自己再解决奥列格

original: Father will finally see that, all along, it was little Kala who was deserving of his love!
translate: 父亲终于会看到，一直以来，真正值得他爱的，是小卡拉

original: Kala lets out a terrible war-cry and her brood joins her with weapons raised
translate: 卡拉发出可怕的战吼，她的幼崽们挥舞着武器加入她的行列

original: Kala and her band of reavers stalk their way into the main plaza of the city where they are met by Oleg and his lot
translate: 卡拉和她的掠夺者幼崽们悄悄地进入城市的主广场，遇到了奥列格和他的手下

original: Then Kala slips into the mist and darkness and the Oleg forms his men up in a crude line
translate: 然后卡拉融入了雾气和黑暗之中，奥列格将他的手下们排成了一条简陋的队列

original: Before long, the Butcher and his band approach from the west
translate: 不久，屠夫和他的团伙从西方接近

original: He gives a mighty bellow as he spots Oleg and charges head-long into the fray with his men at his heels
translate: 他发现奥列格后发出震耳欲聋的吼声，率领手下一头冲向战场

original: Then from out of the shadows, Kala and her brood fall upon the Butcher’s lot
translate: 然后，从阴影中，卡拉和她的族人扑向屠夫的队伍

original: With the reflexes of a serpent, Kala lunges at the Butcher and plunges her blade into his fat neck
translate: 像蛇一样敏捷，卡拉扑向屠夫，将刀刺入他的肥厚脖子

original: A killing blow for sure, but Kala’s eyes widen in terror as, instead of toppling over, the Butcher grabs her by the knife-arm
translate: 一击毙命，但卡拉的眼睛在屠夫抓住她的刀臂时放大了恐惧

original: She desperately tries to pry her arm loose but to no avail!
translate: 她拼命想挣脱手臂，但徒劳无功！

original: Blood sprays from the Butcher’s mouth as he strains from the effort and with a wet, sickening snap, Kala’s arm is torn from her body
translate: 血液从屠夫嘴里喷出，他用力挣扎，卡拉的胳膊在一声湿漉漉的、令人作呕的断裂声中从她身上被扯下

original: They both collapse - dead
translate: 他们俩都倒下了——死了

original: Suddenly all is quiet
translate: 突然，一切变得寂静

original: You’ve defeated the three Reaver chieftains
translate: 你们打败了三个掠夺者酋长

original: Now Father awaits
translate: 现在，父亲在等待

original: You?!
Out with it!
translate: 说吧！

original: Her eyes narrow
translate: 她的眼睛眯了起来

original: Yes!
translate: 是的！

original: I sense it!
translate: 我感受到了！

original: There is blood in the water and soon there will be blood in the streets!
translate: 水中有血腥气，很快街道上也会有血腥气！

original: Finally we will be done with this petty bickering and Father will let us join him in the keep!
translate: 终于，我们可以结束这些琐碎的争吵，父亲会让我们加入他的行列！

original: The Butcher wants you to join him in stamping out Oleg
translate: 屠夫想让你加入他，一起消灭奥列格

original: Oleg asks you to join him against the Butcher!
translate: 奥列格邀请你加入他，对抗屠夫！

original: #HorrynReaverChief3
translate: #霍林掠夺者酋长3

original: I’ll drink your marrow and tear your flesh!!!
translate: 我要喝你的骨髓，撕碎你的肉！

original: Give them to me!
translate: 给我！

original: His meaty hands tremble with excitement as he greedily takes the tablets from you
translate: 他贪婪地从你手中接过药片，肉乎乎的手颤抖着兴奋不已

original: Mesmerized, he traces the grotesque carvings with fat, blood-smeared fingers
translate: 他痴迷地用沾满鲜血的肥厚手指抚摸着那些怪异的雕刻

original: I hear you!
translate: 我听见了！

original: Your will shall be done!
translate: 你的意志将得到执行！

original: The assembled reavers gather around and begin a low, droning chant
translate: 所有的掠夺者聚集起来，开始低沉的吟唱

original: He looks up at you with black eyes
translate: 他用黑眼凝视着你

original: My ascent to Father’s side begins!
translate: 我的升天之旅开始了！

original: Soon I’ll join him in the keep
translate: 不久我将加入他，留在要塞中

original: All that is left is the sacrifice of the firstborn
translate: 剩下的只是第一个牺牲者的祭献

original: Go to Kala!
translate: 去找卡拉！

original: Tell her she will be at my side and together we’ll make an offering of Oleg and his pathetic little band!
translate: 告诉她她将站在我身边，我们将一起向奥列格和他的可怜小队献祭！

original: Tell her this is a knife night!
translate: 告诉她这是刀夜！

original: A red night!
translate: 这是一个红夜！

original: Now go!
translate: 现在去吧！

original: We must make ready!
translate: 我们必须做好准备！

original: A beast of a man, bald and covered in crude sailor’s tattoos stands wide legged on the stairs of the desecrated temple
translate: 一个光头的大汉，身上满是粗糙的水手纹身，站在亵渎的神殿台阶上，两腿分开

original: You come to the Butcher willingly?
translate: 你是自愿来见屠夫的吗？

original: Like some lamb crawling into the mouth of a wolf?
translate: 像一只羔羊钻进了狼的嘴里？

original: Perhaps there is something about you?
translate: 或许你有什么特别之处？

original: Tell me
translate: 告诉我

original: Why are you here?
translate: 你为什么在这里？

original: Oleg sent me to remind you that as long as he holds the Whispering Tablets you owe him allegiance
translate: 奥列格派我来提醒你，只要他手握低语石板，你就必须向他效忠

original: I am the butcher of the weak
translate: 我是弱者的屠夫

original: It has fallen to me to cull those that are too feeble to join Father in the keep
translate: 我的任务是清除那些太虚弱无法加入父亲城堡中的家伙

original: With cleaver and fire I do his bidding like an obedient son
translate: 用大刀和烈火，我像顺从的儿子一样执行他的命令

original: Or dog
translate: 或者狗

original: But he’ll call upon me soon enough and I’ll be at his side doing the holy work inside the keep!
translate: 但他很快就会召唤我，我将站在他的身边，在城堡中进行神圣的工作！

original: The Butcher’s eyes flicker to the tall walls of the keep to the south
translate: 屠夫的目光扫向南边高耸的城堡墙壁

original: I just have to bring my upstart siblings in line first
translate: 我只是首先要让那些得意忘形的兄弟姐妹们回到正轨

original: Father hates bickering
translate: 父亲讨厌争吵

original: How do you intend to do that?
translate: 你打算怎么做？

original: Kala and Oleg
translate: 凯拉和奥列格

original: He spits in disgust
translate: 他厌恶地吐了一口唾沫

original: Kala is fierce
translate: 凯拉很凶猛

original: Caught many of the weak and gave me the ones Father could not use
translate: 抓住了许多弱者，并给了我父亲无法使用的那些

original: I’ll not soon forget that
translate: 我不会很快忘记这一点

original: Her sin now is idleness
translate: 她现在的罪过是懒惰

original: She and her brood sit there in their rat hole on the docks bored and stewing
translate: 她和她的后代坐在码头上的老鼠洞里，无聊且心怀不满。

original: I’ll deal with her in time
translate: 我会慢慢处理她的。

original: Oleg is first
translate: 奥列格是第一个。

original: What of him?
translate: 他怎么样？

original: He’s the oldest of us - and the weakest
translate: 他是我们之中最年长的，也是最弱的。

original: However he was also the one to drag the Whispering Tablets from the seas
translate: 但他也是第一个从海中捞出低语石板的人。

original: Came up in his nets when he was fishing and he was the first to hear the word from the Deep
translate: 当他在捕鱼时，这些石板在他的渔网中浮现，他是第一个听到深渊之声的人。

original: He may have had his role to play but it’s over for him now
translate: 他可能有他的角色，但现在他的时代已经结束了。

original: It’s time the tablets came to their rightful owner
translate: 是时候让石板回到它们应有的主人手中了。

original: It’s time they came to me
translate: 是时候让它们回到我手中了。

original: And all the rest of the brethren will flock to me and Father will see I’m the one deserving of his love
translate: 其他所有的兄弟都会蜂拥而至，父亲会看到我是值得他爱的人。

original: Not that gray fool!
translate: 那个灰头发的傻瓜除外！

original: The Butcher’s eyes narrow predatorily
translate: 屠夫的眼睛狭长而凶残。

original: What are you thinking?
translate: 你在想什么？

original: The man’s laughter booms throughout the plaza
translate: 那人的笑声在整个广场回荡。

original: Is that what he said?
translate: 他说的是这个吗？

original: That decrepit old fool is owed nothing except my axe through his head
translate: 那个衰朽的老傻瓜，除了我砍下他的脑袋，他一无所有。

original: Father favors me and me alone and that piss-stinking old man shall be my offering to him
translate: 父亲偏爱我，只有我，那个尿骚味的老头将成为我的祭品献给他。

original: But I’ll give him this
translate: 但我会给他这个。

original: The Whispering Tablets do indeed hold the word from the Deep
translate: 低语石板确实承载着深渊之声。

original: The brethren will flock to whomever possesses them
translate: 同僚们会涌向拥有它们的人

original: And Father’s favor will follow
translate: 并且父亲的恩宠也会随之而来

original: You may have a role to play in this yet
translate: 你或许在其中扮演着某种角色

original: I see it in your face - around your eyes
translate: 我从你的脸上看到了——尤其是你的眼睛

original: Seek out the Whispering Tablets
translate: 寻找低语的石板

original: Oleg hoards them well but I know where
translate: 奥列格保管得很好，但我知道它们藏在哪里

original: There are tunnels under his lodge
translate: 他的小屋下面有地道

original: Deep tunnels
translate: 深层的地道

original: A canny cutter like you would do well in looking for the hidden entrance
translate: 你这种精明的刀客很适合寻找隐藏的入口

original: That is if you don’t mind wading through more shit
translate: 当然，如果你不介意再趟一次浑水的话

original: Could you be more clear?
translate: 你能说得更清楚些吗？

original: I already have the tablets!
translate: 我已经有了石板！

original: I've had enough of you madmen!
translate: 我受够了你们这些疯子！

original: You’ll find a way
translate: 你会找到办法的

original: I smell it on you
translate: 我从你身上闻到了那股气息

original: Go now!
translate: 现在就去！

original: Find the tablets and bring them to me - Quick and quiet
translate: 找到石板并带给我——迅速而安静

original: There will be plenty bloodshed but I will be the one spilling the blood once the tablets are safe in my hands
translate: 会有大量的流血，但一旦石板安全在我手中，流血的将是别人

original: Now, begone!
translate: 现在，滚开！

original: Have you talked to Kala?!
translate: 你已经和卡拉谈过了吗？！

original: You must go to her!!
translate: 你必须去找她！

original: Talk!
translate: 谈话！

original: I have the tablets!
translate: 我有那些石板！

original: #HorrynSpiral1
translate: #HorrynSpiral1

original: As you try to leave crabs swarm past you
translate: 当你试图离开时，螃蟹群涌过你身边

original: They consume the strange symbol ravenously
translate: 它们贪婪地吞噬着那个奇怪的符号

original: They leave
translate: 它们离开了

original: Entering what appears to be a fishmongers' hall, your noses are immediately assaulted by a putrid stench far beyond the expected nautical aromas
translate: 进入一个看起来像是鱼贩子的厅堂，你立刻被一种令人作呕的恶臭所侵袭，远远超过了预期的海味香气

original: The room is but dimly lit, and as shadows dance in the corners it becomes apparent that the floor in front of you is covered in parts and innards from fish and other creatures of the sea
translate: 房间里光线昏暗，随着角落里的阴影在舞动，你发现你面前的地板上铺满了鱼和其他海洋生物的残骸和内脏

original: As your eyes slowly adjust, you discern that the heaps of fetid offal have been carefully arranged into a peculiar shape
translate: 你的眼睛逐渐适应了光线，你发现那些腐烂的内脏被精心排列成一个奇特的形状

original: Examine the shape more closely
translate: 更仔细地观察那个形状

original: Retching and gagging, you immediately leave
translate: 呕吐和干呕，你立刻离开了

original: YOU PICK UP THE ITEM
translate: 你捡起了这个物品

original: However, the clacking noises have become louder and more insistent
translate: 然而，咔嗒声变得更加响亮和紧迫

original: The slick, gleaming carapaces of enormous crabs suddenly flood the room
translate: 光滑、闪耀的螃蟹壳突然充满了整个房间

original: No doubt drawn in by the smell
translate: 毫无疑问，被那气味吸引而来

original: OR SOMETHING ELSE
translate: 或者是其他什么东西

original: Prepare for combat!
translate: 准备战斗！

original: Striving to avoid slipping on the blood-slicked floor, you fully enter the hall and investigate the overall shape of the piles of fish guts with a discerning eye
translate: 尽力避免滑倒，你完全进入了大厅，用敏锐的目光仔细检查那些鱼内脏堆成的整体形状

original: The parts are clearly arranged into a massive spiral - an ancient symbol of fertility and the sea
translate: 那些残骸显然被排列成一个巨大的螺旋——一个古老的生育和海洋的象征

original: At the center of the spiral sits a particularily bloated and decayed octopus, its arms splayed outwards in all directions
translate: 在螺旋的中心，坐着一只特别臃肿和腐烂的章鱼，它的触手向四周伸展。

original: You can hear faint clacking
translate: 你能听到轻微的咔嗒声。

original: Something seems to be moving nearby
translate: 似乎有什么东西在附近移动。

original: Further examine the octopus
translate: 更仔细地检查一下章鱼。

original: Leave, quickly
translate: 快走，离开这里。

original: Like a monstrous egg, the swollen and very dead octopus sits at the center of the disgusting spiral
translate: 像一个巨大的怪蛋，这个肿胀且非常腐烂的章鱼坐在令人作呕的螺旋中心。

original: A swift kick upends it, revealing something beneath: a large, rusty key!
translate: 一个迅速的踢踏让它翻倒，露出下面的东西：一把巨大的生锈钥匙！

original: Pick up the key
translate: 拾起钥匙。

original: Striving to avoid slipping on the blood-slicked floor, you fully enter the hall and investigate the overall shape of the piles of fish guts
translate: 尽量避免滑倒，你完全进入大厅，调查一堆鱼肠的总体形状。

original: After a few moments it strikes you - they are arranged, obviously with great care and effort, into a massive spiral
translate: 几分钟后，你突然意识到——它们显然是经过精心和努力地排列成一个巨大的螺旋。

original: Why, you have no idea
translate: 你完全不知道为什么。

original: #HorrynSurvivorCora
translate: #霍里恩幸存者科拉

original: You cautiously begin to search for any potential hiding places but have no luck
translate: 你小心翼翼地开始寻找任何可能的藏身之处，但没有发现。

original: Kat sighs, her expression troubled “What a shame
translate: 卡特叹了口气，表情忧虑，“真可惜。

original: She looked like she could have used our help
translate: 她看起来需要我们的帮助。

original: Give up and leave
translate: 放弃并离开。

original: You cautiously begin to search for any potential hiding places
translate: 你小心翼翼地开始寻找任何可能的藏身之处。

original: The girl must be here somewhere
translate: 这个女孩肯定在这附近。

original: You startle as a cry of pain echoes behind you
translate: 你吓了一跳，因为一声痛苦的叫声从你身后传来。

original: You little shit!
translate: 你这个小王八蛋！

original: Roland shouts, clutching his hand to his chest as he backs away from a pile of trash
translate: 罗兰大喊着，用手捂住胸口，向后退去，避开一堆垃圾

original: The girl darts out a second later, trying to slip between you
translate: 女孩在你身后的一秒后冲出，试图从你中间溜走

original: Kat throws herself at the girl and grabs hold of her before she can escape
translate: 卡特扑向女孩，抓住她，阻止她逃脱

original: Determined not to be outmaneuvered again, you grab hold of the girl’s arm before she can make her escape
translate: 决定不再被她再次甩开，你抓住她的手臂，阻止她逃跑

original: Sharp teeth dig into the flesh of your hand as you reach into a pile of rags
translate: 锋利的牙齿咬入你的手，当你伸手抓向一堆破布时

original: The girl dashes from her hiding place, trying to slip away again
translate: 女孩从藏身之处冲出，试图再次溜走

original: The girl struggles against your grip, snarling at you as you attempt to speak with her
translate: 女孩挣扎着摆脱你的束缚，怒视着你，你试图跟她说话时

original: She can be no older than 13 winters, but her emaciated frame and grime-covered skin make it hard to tell
translate: 她顶多不过13岁，但她瘦弱的身躯和满是污垢的皮肤让人难以判断

original: The girl glares up at Kat with wide, scared eyes
translate: 女孩用惊恐的大眼睛瞪着卡特

original: Poor thing,
translate: 真可怜，

original: Kat says, patting her arm, “you must be starving
translate: 卡特拍拍她的胳膊说，“你一定饿坏了

original: Are you hungry?
translate: 你饿吗？

original: offer some food
translate: 给她一些食物吧

original: I don't think I can help you right now
translate: 我现在可能帮不了你

original: You give chase through the narrow alleyways, scrambling to keep up with the agile girl, but she is too fast; she disappears into the shadows before you can catch up to her
translate: 你们在狭窄的巷弄间追逐，努力跟上敏捷的女孩，但她太快了；在你追上她之前，她已经消失在阴影中

original: Search the alley
translate: 搜索巷弄

original: Give up
translate: 放弃

original: It doesn’t take long for you to catch up to the girl in the maze of back alleys
translate: 不久，你们在错综复杂的后巷中追上了女孩

original: Cornered, she glares at you, her lips curling in a feral snarl
translate: 被逼到角落，她怒视着你，嘴角露出野兽般的冷笑

original: Don’t harm her!
translate: 别伤害她！

original: Kat whispers as she moves towards the girl slowly with her hands up in front of her in a disarming gesture
translate: 卡特轻声细语，慢慢靠近那个女孩，双手举在前方，做出解除武装的动作

original: As you pass the darkened alley, you feel the eyes of someone watching you
translate: 当你走过昏暗的巷子时，感觉有人在注视着你

original: Peering into the shadows, you can just make out the form of what appears to be a little girl in dirty, torn clothing
translate: 你窥视着阴影，勉强能辨认出一个穿着肮脏破烂衣服的小女孩的身影

original: Before you can get a closer look, the girl flees, disappearing into the darkness beyond
translate: 在你靠近之前，女孩逃走了，消失在更远处的黑暗中

original: Kat grabs your cloak
translate: 卡特抓住你的斗篷

original: We have to follow her!
translate: 我们必须跟着她！

original: Ignore it and move on
translate: 置之不理，继续前进

original: The girl seems unwilling to talk
translate: 这个女孩似乎不愿意说话

original: Perhaps if she had some food in her belly?
translate: 或许如果她肚子里有食物的话？

original: You look around the alley, ears straining for any sign of reavers nearby
translate: 你环视着巷子，耳朵努力捕捉任何附近掠夺者的迹象

original: The thought of leaving the girl behind is not a comfortable one, but it is wiser than trying to drag her through hostile territory
translate: 把这个女孩丢下并不是一个令人舒服的想法，但比起试图在敌对领土中拖着她走，这更为明智

original: For now, she is as safe as she can be
translate: 暂时，她已经尽可能安全了

original: Once the Reavers started fighting amongst themselves, they blocked off the streets
translate: 一旦掠夺者开始内斗，他们就封锁了街道

original: Made it real hard to get around unseen, but I'm no fool
translate: 使得在不被发现的情况下移动变得非常困难，但我可不是傻瓜

original: Cora smiles mischievously
translate: 科拉诡秘地微笑

original: I suspect not
translate: 我怀疑不是

original: She seems pleased at the compliment
translate: 她似乎对这个赞美感到满意

original: It's too dangerous and hard to travel the streets, but under them is another thing
translate: 街道太危险，难以通行，但下面却另有他物

original: There’s tunnels all under the city and if you don't mind the stench and avoid the beasties, they’ll take you wherever you need to go!
translate: 整个城市下面都有隧道，如果你不介意恶臭并且避开那些怪物，它们会带你去你想去的任何地方！

original: Clever girl
translate: 聪明的女孩

original: The girl still seems hesitant as she looks up at you. “....Cora,
translate: 小女孩仍然显得犹豫，她抬头看着你。“....科拉，

original: she says, her voice low
translate: 她说，声音低沉

original: But I hate it, so everybody calls me Cory. ‘Cept my ma, that is
translate: 但我讨厌这个名字，所以大家叫我科里。除了我妈妈

original: And where's she now
translate: 她现在在哪里

original: As soon as the question leaves your lips you realize the mistake
translate: 话音刚落，你就意识到自己的错误

original: You don’t push for the answer and Cora does not offer one: the silence says everything
translate: 你没有追问答案，科拉也没有给出回应：沉默已经说明了一切

original: Kat gently strokes the child’s hair
translate: 凯特轻轻抚摸着孩子的头发

original: The girl snatches the food from you like a frightened animal and wolfs it down
translate: 小女孩像受惊的动物一样从你手中抢过食物，狼吞虎咽地吃起来

original: More!
translate: 再来点！

original: she growls
translate: 她咆哮道

original: Ah, so the girl has a tongue after all!
translate: 哦，原来这个小女孩还有舌头呢！

original: Kat offers the girl a small, reassuring smile
translate: 凯特给小女孩一个小小的、安慰的微笑

original: Don’t worry, girl
translate: 别担心，小女孩

original: You can have as much as you like
translate: 你想吃多少都行

original: Are you ready to answer some questions?
translate: 你准备好回答一些问题了吗？

original: The girl absentmindedly fiddles with something, but her eyes are sharp and watchful
translate: 小女孩漫不经心地摆弄着什么东西，但她的眼睛锐利而警觉

original: No doubt she knows a lot about the town having survived here for so long
translate: 毫无疑问，她在这么长时间里生存下来，一定对这个城镇有很多了解

original: What's your name?
translate: 你叫什么名字？

original: Tell me about the Reavers?
translate: 给我讲讲掠夺者？

original: How have you been moving around?
translate: 你是怎么移动的？

original: The girl looks up at you with large, tear-filled eyes
translate: 这个女孩用一双大大的、充满泪水的眼睛看着你

original: They mostly come out at night
translate: 他们大多数都在晚上出现

original: Mostly
translate: 大多数

original: she hugs her arms around herself
translate: 她环抱着自己的手臂

original: At least... they used ta
translate: 至少……他们曾经

original: I don’t see ‘em as much anymore
translate: 我现在见不到他们了

original: Not since they started fightin’ each other
translate: 自从他们开始互相战斗之后

original: Fighting each other?
translate: 互相战斗？

original: She nods, her gaze distant
translate: 她点点头，目光显得很遥远

original: One day they just turned on each other
translate: 有一天他们突然开始互相攻击

original: Started killin’ their own instead of huntin’ people….now, though, they seem to be holed up in different parts of the town
translate: 开始杀戮自己的同类，而不是去猎杀人类……不过现在，他们似乎分散在城镇的不同区域

original: Almost as if…as if they’re waitin’ for somethin’
translate: 好像……好像他们在等待着什么

original: One group seems to stay on the docks
translate: 有一个团伙似乎一直待在码头上

original: They’re led by a woman named Kala I think
translate: 他们由一个名叫卡拉的女人领导

original: I saw ‘er, once
translate: 我见过她一次

original: Never knew women could look so cruel
translate: 我从未想过女人会看起来如此残忍

original: she pauses, worrying at her lower lip
translate: 她停顿了一下，咬着下唇

original: Beside’ them, there’s another band holed up in that old walled house over there - ” she points to the north-east
translate: 在他们旁边，还有一个团伙躲在那边那座老城墙房子里面——她朝东北方向指了指

original: A gray-haired man called Oleg leads them
translate: 一个留着灰发的男人奥列格领导他们

original: Are there more?
translate: 还有其他的吗？

original: There are men outside the temple, led by someone they call ‘the Butcher’
translate: 神殿外面有一些人，他们自称‘屠夫’

original: They…they’ve been doing horrible things
translate: 他们……他们做了些可怕的事情

original: Burning
translate: 焚烧

original: she trails off before shaking her head
translate: 她停顿了一下，然后摇了摇头

original: They’ve blocked off the streets leading to the temple, so those men don’t come to this part of the city anymore
translate: 他们已经封锁了通往神殿的街道，所以那些人不再来到这座城市的一部分

original: Cora offers you a slight smile
translate: 科拉微微对你笑了笑

original: Her cheeks have regained a modcium of colour; it seems getting some food in her belly seems to have done her a world of good
translate: 她的脸颊恢复了一些血色；看来填饱肚子对她大有裨益

original: I have some questions for you!
translate: 我有一些问题要问你！

original: Cora is huddled in the corner, her stick-thin arms wrapped around her knees
translate: 科拉蜷缩在角落里，她那瘦骨嶙峋的胳膊抱住了膝盖

original: She slinks further into the shadows at the sight of you
translate: 她看到你后，缩回了阴影中

original: Offer some food
translate: 给她一些食物

original: #HorrynSurvivorNatia
translate: #霍里恩幸存者娜蒂亚

original: Natia is pale and drawn
translate: 娜蒂亚脸色苍白，显得疲惫不堪

original: She must have lost a lot of blood
translate: 她肯定失血很多

original: However, her wound is securely bound and she is in relative safety
translate: 但她伤口包扎得很牢固，处于相对安全的状态

original: If it is within her to recover, she will
translate: 如果她能恢复，一定会恢复的

original: Do you think you could answer some questions for me?
translate: 你认为你能回答我一些问题吗？

original: I'll help you as best I can
translate: 我会尽我所能帮助你

original: What can you tell me of the men who took you?
translate: 你能告诉我那些带走你的人的情况吗？

original: It's time to go!
translate: 是时候出发了！

original: Farewell!
translate: 再见！

original: Natia looks tired and pale but nonetheless in much better shape than when you first met her
translate: 纳蒂亚看起来疲惫而苍白，但比你们第一次见面时要好得多

original: She offers a weak smile as a greeting
translate: 她勉强露出一个微笑作为问候

original: I had some questions for you!
translate: 我有一些问题要问你！

original: I just wanted to check in on you!
translate: 我只是想检查一下你的状况！

original: I did hear something!
translate: 我确实听到一些事情！

original: The man who stabbed me was taking us to the keep - to ‘meet Father’
translate: 伤我的那个人把我们带到了要塞——去‘见父亲’

original: But he was angry that the Reavers in the city itself had taken to infighting
translate: 但他对城市中的掠夺者开始内斗感到愤怒

original: Split up into groups they had
translate: 他们分成几组

original: Fighting over ‘tablets’ or some such items he said
translate: 争斗的是‘石板’或某些类似物品

original: And what’s more, I heard him say that the tablets were currently in the possession of a Reaver he called Oleg
translate: 更糟糕的是，我听到他说那些石板目前由他称之为奥列格的掠夺者持有

original: Oleg the Gray or something to that effect
translate: 奥列格灰烬之类的

original: Thank you for your help
translate: 谢谢你的帮助

original: #HorrynSurvivorPhilip
translate: #霍里恩幸存者菲利普

original: Thank you so much for saving Natia’s life
translate: 谢谢你救了纳蒂亚的命

original: I could not have gone on without her
translate: 没有她，我无法继续下去

original: Please, take this as a token of my gratitude!
translate: 请收下这个作为我感激的象征吧！

original: Philip produces a gold ring and offers it to you
translate: 菲利普拿出一枚金戒指递给你

original: Accept the ring
translate: 接受这枚戒指吧

original: Keep it!
translate: 保留它！

original: Decline reward
translate: 拒绝奖励

original: The man looks stunned for a moment then smiles and bows to you in gratitude
translate: 那人愣了片刻，然后对你微笑并鞠躬表示感谢

original: You're a fool to turn down pay for a job well done
translate: 你真是个傻瓜，拒绝接受辛苦工作的报酬

original: Roland grumbles behind you
translate: 你身后罗兰嘟囔着

original: I have some questions before we go
translate: 在我们出发之前，我有一些问题要问

original: Farewell
translate: 再见

original: Ask me anything you like and I'll help you if I can!
translate: 你可以问我任何问题，如果我能帮到你的话，我一定会帮忙！

original: Will you be safe here?
translate: 你在这里安全吗？

original: Is there anything more you can tell me about the Reavers?
translate: 关于掠夺者，你还知道些什么？

original: I need to get going
translate: 我得出发了

original: Not much!
translate: 没有多少事情！

original: The ones you met were part of Father’s lot
translate: 你遇到的那些人是父亲手下的成员

original: The ones holed up in the Keep
translate: 藏身于要塞中的那些人

original: But you should ask Natia!
translate: 但是你应该问问娜蒂亚！

original: She might have heard something while they held her
translate: 她在被他们关押期间可能听到了些什么

original: Philip seems to have regained some of the color in his face
translate: 菲利普的脸色似乎恢复了一些血色

original: He gently wipes Natia’s brow with a wet piece of cloth
translate: 他用一块湿布轻轻擦拭着娜蒂亚的额头

original: It is good to see you again!
translate: 很高兴再次见到你！

original: I needed to ask you some questions!
translate: 我需要问你一些问题！

original: Just wanted to check in
translate: 只是想来检查一下

original: Goodbye!
translate: 再见！

original: The city is far from safe but Natia is too severely wounded to travel
translate: 这座城市并不安全，但Natia伤得太重，无法继续前行。

original: Besides, from what you tell me, it seems nowhere is safe on this blasted island
translate: 此外，从你告诉我的情况来看，这个该死的岛上似乎哪里都不安全。

original: Besides, the Reavers seem to be holed up in their separate parts of town for now
translate: 此外，掠夺者们现在似乎各自躲在了城里的不同区域。

original: I pray the Golden Dead will grant you the strength to prevail against them
translate: 我祈求金死灵会赐予你战胜他们的力量。

original: Good!
translate: 好的。

original: The man bows deeply as he gives you the ring
translate: 那人深深地鞠了一躬，将戒指递给你。

original: There are no doubt countless golden rings in your future
translate: 你的未来肯定会有无数枚金色的戒指。

original: I doubt the same can be said of these people
translate: 我怀疑这些人的说法并非如此。

original: Driina offers in a lecturing tone
translate: Driina以教训的口吻说道。

original: #ReaverZombieScene
translate: #掠夺者僵尸场景

original: Driina walks up to one of the wretches and examines her grimy face
translate: Driina走近其中一个可怜虫，仔细检查她肮脏的脸庞。

original: I know this woman
translate: 我认识这位女士。

original: She used to live in Horryn
translate: 她曾经住在霍里恩。

original: By the Golden it is as if their minds are broken
translate: 金死灵啊，仿佛她们的精神已经破碎。

original: The woman offers no sign of understanding and simply shambles away
translate: 那位女士没有任何理解的迹象，只是蹒跚着走开。

original: The wretch stares at you with vacant eyes and mouth half agape
translate: 这个可怜虫空洞地盯着你，嘴巴半张。

original: Kill
translate: 杀掉他们。

original: You emerge into a large, natural cavern and your senses are immediately assaulted by the stench of human filth
translate: 你走进一个巨大的天然洞穴，立刻被人类污秽的气味所侵袭。

original: Ahead, in the darkness of the cave, you see dozens of shambing forms milling purposelessly about
translate: 在洞穴的黑暗中，你看到数十个蹒跚的身影毫无目的地走动。

original: They don’t appear to notice you
translate: 他们似乎没有注意到你

original: At the far side of the roiling mass of filthy bodies you spot another barred door and from beyond it a strange lambent glow seems to be emitting
translate: 在那团污秽之躯翻滚的远处，你发现了一扇带栅栏的门，从门后传来一种奇异的光芒

original: # Chapter_1_HorrynCrypt
translate: # 第一章_霍林密室

original: #HorrynCryptBloom
translate: # 霍林密室之花

original: You awaken with a start
translate: 你猛然惊醒

original: You are lying sprawled on the cold stone floor of the tomb
translate: 你躺在墓室冰冷的石地板上

original: There is no telling how long you’ve been there, but the irritation in your eyes and lungs has subsided
translate: 你不知道自己在那里躺了多久，但眼睛和肺部的不适已经减轻

original: Kat grabs your arm, wild-eyed and tears streaming
translate: 卡特抓着你的胳膊，眼神狂乱，泪水横流

original: She tries to say something, then gives up
translate: 她试图说些什么，但最终放弃了

original: Get up
translate: 起来

original: Driinas face is wet from sweat as she continually and wordlessly recites some prayers
translate: 德里娜的脸被汗水打湿，她不停地默念着祈祷词

original: As you address her, she stops suddenly and fixes you with her gaze
translate: 当你跟她说话时，她突然停下，凝视着你

original: This is madness given form
translate: 这是疯狂的实体化

original: And in this, the most sacred of places
translate: 而且是在这里，最神圣的地方

original: The home of the dead!
translate: 死者的家园！

original: She draws her breath and seems to compose herself
translate: 她深吸一口气，似乎整理了一下思绪

original: We must venture to stamp out this foulness
translate: 我们必须冒险去扑灭这种恶臭

original: What can we do?
translate: 我们能做些什么？

original: This city is built on ancient foundations
translate: 这座城市建在古老的地基之上

original: There are crypts below that are far more ancient than this
translate: 那下面的密室远比这座城市更加古老

original: That must be where this abomination is being spawned
translate: 那一定是这个怪物诞生的地方

original: Then again, this is no coincidence
translate: 再说，这绝非巧合

original: Whatever madness has befallen Idra, this is all part of that same curse
translate: 无论伊德拉发生了怎样的疯狂，这一切都是同一种诅咒的一部分

original: And for now, there are still living that need our aid!
translate: 而现在，我们还有活着的人需要我们的帮助！

original: As much as it pains me to leave this foulness alive in the crypt, we must press onwards and through to the castle
translate: 尽管我痛恨让这股恶臭在密室中存活，但我们必须继续前进，穿过这座城堡

original: All I ask is this
translate: 我只希望这样

original: Once we retake the city, we will come back here and restore the sanctity of this place!
translate: 一旦我们夺回这座城市，我们就会回来这里，恢复这个地方的神圣性！

original: I'm with you Driina!
translate: 我和你，德里娜！

original: As you scramble to your feet, you have a chance to take in the strange growths that fill the chamber for the first time
translate: 当你挣扎着站起身时，你有机会第一次观察到这个房间中充满的奇怪生长物

original: Examine the tentacles
translate: 检查触手

original: Alien, tentacle-like roots burst obscenely from the floor before branching off into a myriad of smaller partitions that seem to spread throughout the entire complex
translate: 外星的、触手状的根系从地板上突兀地爆开，然后分叉成无数更小的分支，似乎遍布整个建筑群

original: The growths seem to writhe with peristaltic motion and as you draw near, strands lift up and reach greedily towards you
translate: 这些生长物似乎在蠕动，当你靠近时，触手的丝状物抬起，贪婪地向你伸来

original: You've seen this before
translate: 你之前见过这种东西

original: In the well near the farmhouse where you landed on Idra
translate: 在你降落伊德拉的农舍附近的井里

original: {PLAYER}, lets be on our bloody way yeah?
translate: {PLACEHOLDER_0}，让我们赶紧上路吧，行吗？

original: Kat spits as she backs away towards the door
translate: 卡特吐了一口唾沫，向门口退去

original: Examine the tentacles more closely
translate: 更仔细地检查触手

original: You fail to learn anything new about the strange organism
translate: 你未能从这个奇怪的生物身上学到任何新的东西

original: The growths seem to shudder with anticipation
translate: 这些生长物似乎在期待中颤抖

original: Perhaps you have read of this before?
translate: 你之前可能听说过这种东西？

original: Have you encountered this in nature somewhere?
translate: 你曾在自然中遇到过这种东西吗？

original: Driina, what is happening here?
translate: 德莉娜，这里发生了什么？

original: A fine dust whirls up as you progress through the chamber, filling your eyes and nose with a burning sensation that sends you into an uncontrollable fit of sneezing and eventually, retching
translate: 你穿过房间时，一阵细尘扬起，眼睛和鼻子被灼烧感充斥，最终引发一阵无法控制的打喷嚏，随后干呕不止

original: The sound booms in the echoing chamber and makes your ears ring as stars flash before your eyes
translate: 声音在回响的房间中轰鸣，耳鸣不已，眼前还闪现着星点

original: As you reel to escape the invasive spores, you end up crawling on hands and knees towards the exit
translate: 你摇摇晃晃地试图逃离侵入性的孢子，最终只能四肢着地爬向出口

original: A mist seems to be filling the room, or is it simply your vision fading to black?
translate: 房间里似乎充满了雾气，或者只是你的视线逐渐模糊？

original: Fight the sensation
translate: 抵抗这种感觉

original: This organism defies any known taxonomy
translate: 这种生物违背了任何已知的分类学

original: But there are books
translate: 但是有书籍

original: Forbidden books, that speak of such things
translate: 禁书，讲述着这样的事情

original: Algion of Yrr wrote of how he saw vast squirming masses shift in the pale light of distant stars
translate: Yrr的阿吉翁写道，他在遥远星光的苍白光芒中看到巨大的蠕动着的群体

original: And certain, unspeakable Shaddu-Wahit texts talk of the “crawling doom” that came to Errawhan
translate: 某些不可言说的Shaddu-Wahit文献中提到了“爬行的厄运”降临到埃拉瓦罕

original: You shudder - it is best not to think of such things
translate: 你颤抖了一下——最好别去想这些

original: Strangely, through the dim veil, you see something
translate: 透过朦胧的帷幕，你似乎看到了一些东西

original: Basalt towers loom across a dead landscape
translate: 玄武岩塔楼矗立在一片荒凉的景象中

original: A strange piping reverberates through all your being
translate: 一种奇怪的管乐在你的整个身体中回响

original: As you crawl on hands and knees, you can clearly feel the cold tile floor of the crypt
translate: 四肢着地爬行时，你清晰地感觉到墓穴冰冷的石板地板

original: Yet you find yourself... elsewhere
translate: 但你发现自己……在别处

original: Now a wind blows across the blasted desolation
translate: 现在一阵风吹过这片荒芜之地

original: Standing just ahead of you, yet impossibly far away, is a tall figure dressed in flowing tattered robes
translate: 你前方不远处，却仿佛遥不可及，站着一个高大的身影，穿着飘逸的破旧长袍

original: It raises its hand towards its face and again the strange piping sounds
translate: 它将手举到脸上，再次发出那奇怪的笛声

original: All is black
translate: 周围一片漆黑

original: You manage to cover your face with a piece of clothing and as you shield your face from the impossible vista in the mist, you struggle to gain control of your breathing
translate: 你用一块布料遮住脸，试图从雾中的不可能景象中保护自己，同时努力控制呼吸

original: A howling wind mixes with the piping and for a moment you hear the fluttering of tattered robes
translate: 喧嚣的风声与笛声交织，你听到了破旧长袍的窸窣声

original: Instinctively you continue covering your eyes
translate: 你本能地继续遮住眼睛

original: Then, cutting through the maddening noise you hear a voice as clear as crystals
translate: 然后，从令人疯狂的噪音中，你听到了一个如水晶般清澈的声音

original: Drinna is reciting a prayer
translate: 德琳娜正在念诵祷文

original: Then, as suddenly as it started, all is silent
translate: 就像它突然开始的那样，一切又突然安静下来

original: Relief floods through you as you look up and find yourself still in the darkened tomb chamber
translate: 如释重负的感觉涌上心头，你抬头望向四周，发现自己仍然在黑暗的墓室中

original: Kat grabs your arm with wild-eyes
translate: 卡特抓着你的胳膊，眼神狂乱

original: She looks as if she's going to say something, then gives up
translate: 她似乎要说什么，但最终放弃了

original: You do not know what to make of the strange organism before you
translate: 你对眼前的奇异生物感到困惑不解

original: It most closely resembles some strange fungal growth, but even that is only in the most general of terms
translate: 它最接近某种奇异的菌类生长物，但即使如此，也仅是大体相似

original: You have never seen anything like it before
translate: 你从未见过这样的东西

original: In fact, you feel certain that this “thing” is utterly alien to our world
translate: 事实上，你确信这个“东西”完全与我们的世界格格不入

original: From whence it came however, you can only guess
translate: 关于它来自何方，你只能猜测

original: #HorrynCryptEmbalming
translate: #霍林地穴木乃伊

original: Driina begins searching through a pile of tomes on a nearby table
translate: 德琳娜开始在附近桌子上的几卷书上翻找

original: Her face, still ashen-grey, pales even further as her attention turns to the corpse in the center of the room
translate: 她的脸色本已灰暗，随着注意力转向房间中央的尸体，脸色更是变得苍白。

original: Driina, what is this room?
translate: Driina，这是什么房间？

original: Driina presses her palms lightly against her face before removing them in a gesture that reminds you of an unmasking
translate: Driina轻抚着脸颊，然后移开手，动作让你想起了卸下面具。

original: An embalming chamber
translate: 一个防腐间。

original: This is where our acolytes preserve the sacred flesh of our dead
translate: 这里是我们的教徒保存逝者圣洁之躯的地方。

original: Driina does not look at you as she speaks, her attention already reclaimed by one of the tomes
translate: Driina说话时没有看你，她的注意力已经被一本法典吸引。

original: For those touched by the Reticulum, the veil between the living and the dead is thinner
translate: 对于那些受到Reticulum影响的人来说，生与死之间的帷幕更薄。

original: Though the flesh may die, an….echo persists
translate: 肉体或许会死亡，但……回声却依旧存在。

original: With a shake of her head, Driina slams the book shut
translate: Driina摇摇头，用力合上了书本。

original: This is not the time for theology
translate: 这不是讨论神学的时候。

original: We must press on
translate: 我们必须继续前进。

original: Stepping into this room, you are at once terrified and awestruck by the alien-ness mixed with sanctity
translate: 踏入这个房间，你同时被其中的异域感和圣洁所震撼，感到既恐惧又敬畏。

original: A room not meant for common eyes where the imperial priesthood plies it's strange and sacred rituals
translate: 一个不属于凡人窥视的房间，帝国祭司在这里进行着奇怪而神圣的仪式。

original: The room before you is like none you have ever seen
translate: 你眼前的房间是前所未见的。

original: A creeping sensation tingles down your spine as you take in the terrifying array of ancient tomes, jars filled with strange liquids, and what appears to be a corpse wrapped in stiff, white cloth
translate: 你感到脊背一阵刺骨的寒意，面对着那些古老的法典、装满奇怪液体的瓶子，以及用僵硬白布包裹的尸体。

original: #HorrynCryptEnterFinalRoom
translate: #HorrynCryptEnterFinalRoom

original: As you approach the entrance to the large vault, you can’t help but notice the slightest of drafts in the otherwise stale air of the crypt
translate: 当你靠近大库房的入口时，你不禁注意到墓穴中原本死寂的空气中有一丝微弱的气流。

original: The secret tunnel must lie somewhere inside
translate: 秘道肯定藏在某个地方。

original: #HorrynCryptEntrance
translate: #HorrynCryptEntrance

original: The corpse belongs to a young man with sunken cheeks and a shaved head
translate: 这具尸体属于一个颧骨凹陷、头顶光秃的年轻人。

original: A faded tattoo on his forehead marks him as an acolyte of the temple
translate: 他前额上褪色的纹身表明他是神殿的信徒

original: His face is a mask of pain, terror or, more likely, both
translate: 他的脸上是一副痛苦或恐惧的表情，更可能是两者兼而有之

original: As you carefully shift him, intestines spill out with a wet squelch
translate: 当你小心翼翼地移动他时，肠子伴随着湿漉漉的声响流出

original: Try to determine the cause of death
translate: 尝试确定死亡原因

original: Driina steps away from the corpse and whispers a prayer beneath her breath
translate: Driina 走开尸体，低声祈祷

original: Her eyes are wide with fear as she takes in the mangled display before her
translate: 她的眼中充满了恐惧，看着眼前的残骸

original: This is not the work of Reavers…. something else is afoot
translate: 这不是掠夺者所为……似乎有其他事情在发生

original: This man tended the sacred flesh of the dead
translate: 这个男人照料着逝者的圣体

original: These tombs
translate: 这些墓穴

original: she trails off, and then, as if deciding something, gives a sharp shake of her head
translate: 她停顿了一下，然后似乎做出了决定，摇了摇头

original: Come
translate: 来吧

original: We must find the cause of this carnage
translate: 我们必须找出这场屠杀的原因

original: In the fluttering light of the tomb you can tell her face has turned ashen gray
translate: 在墓室摇曳的光线中，你可以看出她的脸色变得灰白

original: Let's be on our way
translate: 我们走吧

original: Where to now?
translate: 接下来去哪儿？

original: The youth is too mangled to determine a cause of death, but it is clear from the sheer amount of blood at your feet that this was not a quick and painless end
translate: 这个年轻人被严重撕裂，无法确定死亡原因，但从你脚下的鲜血可以看出，这不是一个快速而无痛的终结

original: After examining the corpse, you are horrified to discover the youth’s abdomen has been torn apart by claws or…fingers?
translate: 经过尸体的检查，你被发现年轻人的腹部被爪子或……手指撕裂，这令你感到震惊

original: Stranger still are the thin, purple strands festering inside of the wound
translate: 更奇怪的是，伤口内部有细长、发紫的脓疮

original: As you enter the dimly lit crypt, your senses are immediately assaulted by the scent of fresh carnage
translate: 当你进入昏暗的墓室时，你的感官立刻被新鲜屠杀的气味所侵袭

original: The scent is still faint enough that you are sure whatever awaits you below has not been dead for long
translate: 这种气味仍然很淡，你确信等待你的东西还没有死去很久

original: Your suspicions are soon confirmed; at the foot of the stairs ahead of you lies the mangled remains of a man in white, bloodstained robes
translate: 你的怀疑很快得到证实；在你面前的台阶脚下，躺着一个身穿白袍、满身是血的男子，已经面目全非。

original: Examine the corpse
translate: 检查尸体

original: With one final glance at the corpse, you push aside your fear and delve into the blackness ahead
translate: 你最后看了一眼尸体，推开了心中的恐惧，向着前方的黑暗深处探索。

original: The shadowy expanse of the crypt stretches before you
translate: 阴暗的墓穴展现在你面前。

original: Whatever is happening here, you must venture deeper into the darkness if you wish to find your way into the Keep above
translate: 不管这里发生了什么，如果你想找到上方要塞的路，就必须深入黑暗。

original: Driina peers into the darkness ahead
translate: Driina 向前方的黑暗处望去。

original: I am unsure of the tunnel’s exact location, save that it lies somewhere in the deep crypts to the south
translate: 我不确定隧道的确切位置，只知道它位于南边深处的墓穴中。

original: However, given what we have discovered here, I would advise we explore this level for clues before moving on
translate: 但是鉴于我们在这里发现的一切，我建议我们先在这一层寻找线索，然后再继续前进。

original: #HorrynCryptFinal
translate: #HorrynCryptFinal

original: The Wight King emits a roaring scream as, one by one, the lids of the surrounding sarcophogi fly open
translate: 僵王发出一声咆哮，周围石棺的盖子一个接一个地飞打开来。

original: In the lingering dust, five gaunt, yellow-fanged creatures emerge from their graves
translate: 在弥漫的尘埃中，五只瘦削、黄牙的生物从坟墓中爬了出来。

original: Wishing to put an end to the tomb’s horrifying curse, you give the ancient sword to the King
translate: 为了终结这座墓穴可怕的诅咒，你将古老的宝剑交给了国王。

original: He takes it from you eagerly, and then, with a final sigh that echoes eerily throughout the crypt, the ancient creature returns once more to his slumber
translate: 他迫不及待地接过宝剑，然后发出一声回荡在整个墓穴中的幽怨叹息，古老的生物再次沉入了沉睡。

original: Standing atop the stone dais is the emaciated form of what appears to have once been a King
translate: 石台之上站着一个瘦骨嶙峋的影子，似乎曾是一位国王。

original: Rust has long since destroyed much of its royal armor, and what little flesh remains on its skeletal form is covered in the same crawling, purple fungus that seems to infect these tombs
translate: 锈蚀早已毁坏了大部分王室盔甲，他那骷髅般的身躯上覆盖着同样的蠕动着紫色霉菌，似乎感染了这些墓穴。

original: DIE ABOMINATION!
translate: 死灵！

original: I command you to bring me the usurper’s blade
translate: 我命令你带给我篡位者的宝剑。

original: Return without it and your life is forfeit
translate: 如果你没有带回宝剑，你的命就没了。

original: The undead King has not moved from his place atop the dais
translate: 僵王依旧站在石台上纹丝不动。

original: The fungus growing within him seems to writhe with renewed vigor at your approach
translate: 他体内的霉菌在你接近时似乎更加活跃地蠕动起来。

original: Why have you returned?!
translate: 你为什么回来了！

original: I have your sword!
translate: 我有你的剑！

original: I've come to end you!
translate: 我来终结你！

original: You present the sword taken from Joran the Usurper’s tomb
translate: 你拿着从暴君约兰的墓中取来的剑。

original: Is this the sword that was stolen from you?
translate: 这就是被偷走的剑吗？

original: The Wight King surges forward
translate: 鬼王冲了上来！

original: The Lake Blade!
translate: 湖刃！

original: Giiiivveee iiittt ttooo mmee!
translate: 给我！给我！给我！

original: I'll keep it for myself
translate: 我要自己留着。

original: Take it!
translate: 你拿去！

original: You do not know?
translate: 你不知道？

original: the wight bellows
translate: 鬼王怒吼。

original: I am Enar
translate: 我是恩纳。

original: All-King, Lord of Idra, Wielder of the mighty Lake Blade!
translate: 全王，伊德拉的主宰，强大的湖刃持有者！

original: And why do you linger here?
translate: 你在这里徘徊干什么？

original: The wight emits a pained moan as he reaches for the empty sheath at his waist
translate: 鬼王伸手腰间的空剑鞘，发出痛苦的呻吟。

original: I shall not rest until I have reclaimed the blade Joran the Usurper stole from me!
translate: 我不会安息，直到夺回暴君约兰从我这里偷走的剑！

original: I have your blade!
translate: 我有你的剑！

original: #HorrynCryptJunction
translate: #霍里恩密室岔口

original: The terrifying sight of their clawed, bloodied fingers reaching toward you conjures the image of the torn-apart corpse at the crypt’s entrance
translate: 他们爪子上沾满鲜血的手指朝你伸来，让你想起入口处被撕裂的尸体。

original: You steel yourself, determined you will not meet the same end
translate: 你坚定地steel yourself，决心不会重蹈覆辙

original: Driina peers into the blackness straight ahead
translate: Driina凝视着前方的黑暗

original: These corridors lead to the crypt’s tombs, where we shall find the entrance we seek
translate: 这些走廊通向陵墓，那里我们将找到我们寻找的入口

original: Alas, I know not which path is the correct one, and which may lead us to….whatever madness lies ahead
translate: 然而，我不知道哪条路是正确的，哪条可能会引导我们……前往……前方的疯狂之地

original: Furthermore, the gate ahead appears to be locked
translate: 此外，前方的门似乎被锁住了

original: The shuffling of bare feet on stone sounds from down the corridor to your left
translate: 石头上传来赤脚的拖动声，从你左边的走廊传来

original: You are not alone
translate: 你并不孤单

original: Vague shapes linger just at the edge of darkness
translate: 模糊的身影停留在黑暗的边缘

original: Who goes there?
translate: 谁在那里？

original: Driina shouts
translate: Driina喊道

original: An unmistakable tremble has crept into her voice
translate: 她的声音中明显带着颤抖

original: You arrive at a dimly lit junction with an intricate mosaic at its center
translate: 你来到一个昏暗的岔路口，中心镶嵌着复杂的马赛克

original: Four paths lay before you
translate: 你面前有四条路

original: As you take in your surroundings, you notice fresh smears of blood leading into the eastern tunnel
translate: 当你环顾四周时，注意到有新鲜的血迹沿着东边的隧道流淌

original: The path ahead is barred by a locked gate
translate: 前方的道路被一扇锁着的门阻挡

original: Moving closer, you notice the faint flicker of movement out of the corner of your eye
translate: 走近时，你注意到眼角有微弱的动静

original: Slowly, the shadows moving toward you morph into familiar, humanoid shapes
translate: 慢慢地，向你移动的阴影变成了熟悉的、人形的轮廓

original: Survivors?
translate: 生还者？

original: Or perhaps assailants?
translate: 或者可能是袭击者？

original: You just manage to catch a glimpse of emaciated flesh and sharp, yellow fangs before the creatures are upon you
translate: 在怪物们扑向你之前，你只来得及瞥见瘦削的皮肉和尖利的黄牙

original: #HorrynCryptLongCrypt
translate: #霍林暗穴长暗穴

original: LOREM IPSUM
translate: LOREM IPSUM

original: An exit!
translate: 一个出口！

original: #HorrynCryptSecretTunnel
translate: #霍林暗穴秘密地道

original: #HorrynCryptSwordTomb
translate: #霍林暗穴剑冢

original: Who drags me from the black stars!?
translate: 谁将我从黑星中拖出！？

original: screams the skeletal figure
translate: 骷髅身影嘶吼着

original: As it emerges from the billowing dust, its regal, ancient armour seems to glimmer in the faint light
translate: 当它从翻腾的尘土中浮现时，其皇家般的古老盔甲在微弱的光芒中似乎闪烁着

original: A thousand curses are too few!!!
translate: 一千句诅咒远远不够！！！

original: The creature raises its sword in the air as it charges toward you!
translate: 这个生物高举着剑向你冲来！

original: Pushing as hard as you can, you are met with an unnatural resistance, almost as if something is holding the lid shut from within
translate: 你使出全身力气，却遇到了一种不自然的阻力，仿佛有什么东西从内部阻止着盖子合上

original: Perhaps there is another way of opening this tomb?
translate: 或许有其他方法可以打开这座陵墓？

original: You are met with an unnatural resistance, almost as if something is holding the lid shut from within
translate: 你遇到了一种不自然的阻力，仿佛有什么东西从内部阻止着盖子合上

original: Straining with all your might, you overpower the unknown force and stumble forward as the lid suddenly shifts
translate: 你用尽全力克服了未知的力量，踉跄着向前，盖子突然移动了

original: There is little time to catch your breath, for something is emerging from the newly opened tomb
translate: 没有时间喘息，因为什么东西正从新打开的陵墓中浮现

original: The beautifully carved sarcophagus before you features an effigy depicting a man with sharp aquiline features and a stern gaze
translate: 你面前精雕细琢的石棺上，有一尊雕像描绘着一个鹰钩鼻、神情严肃的男人

original: Open the sarcophagus
translate: 打开石棺

original: Shouting the name, your voice echoes inside the vaulted crypt
translate: 喊出名字，你的声音在拱形的墓穴中回荡

original: For a moment, all is silent
translate: 有一段时间，四周一片寂静

original: And then, with a booming crack, the lid is violently flung open
translate: 然后，伴随着轰隆一声巨响，盖子被猛烈地掀开了

original: The momentum sends you tumbling to the floor, leaving you desperately scrambling to regain your footing as something begins to emerge from the newly opened tomb
translate: 力量将你抛向地面，你拼命地试图重新站稳脚跟，与此同时，从新打开的陵墓中开始有东西显露出来

original: The lid begins to slide off as you push against it until, suddenly, a hissing screech emits from the interior of the sarcophagus
translate: 你用力推着棺盖，突然，从棺材内部传来嘶嘶尖啸声

original: The lid trembles violently as it is forced back into place by some unholy force within
translate: 棺盖剧烈颤抖，被某种不洁的力量推回原位

original: Someone or something is pitting its will against you!
translate: 有人或什么东西正在与你抗争！

original: Attempt to force it open
translate: 尝试将其打开

original: Call out to "Joran the Usurper
translate: 向“Joran the Usurper”呼喊

original: # Chapter_1_HorrynSewers
translate: # 第一章 哈里恩下水道

original: #HorrynReaverAltar
translate: # 哈里恩掠夺者祭坛

original: This tablet has claimed many minds
translate: 这块石板夺走了许多人的理智

original: The Reavers were once sane men
translate: 曾经，掠夺者们是正常的男子汉

original: Now they are murderous beasts and I know in my blood, this helped spark their madness
translate: 现在他们变成了凶残的野兽，我知道，这帮助点燃了他们的疯狂

original: She spits on the tablet
translate: 她吐了一口唾沫在石板上

original: I wonder... did they catch it in their nets by chance?
translate: 我想……他们是不是偶然间捕获了它？

original: Or were there deeper, darker forces at work?
translate: 或者，有更深层、更黑暗的力量在运作？

original: Loot the altar
translate: 探索祭坛，搜刮财宝

original: Examine the artifact more closely
translate: 更仔细地观察这件神器

original: A hideous simulacrum of an altar stands before you
translate: 你面前站着一个可怖的祭坛的复制品

original: The large stone slab is smeared with blood and feces, and obscenely decorated with the rotted eggs of sea birds and the bones of small creatures
translate: 大块的石板上沾满了鲜血和排泄物，还被海鸟的腐烂蛋和小生物的骨头装饰得不堪入目

original: A small pile of coins and precious stones have been placed upon it as well
translate: 它上面放着一小堆硬币和珍贵的宝石

original: Its most striking feature, however, is the weathered, greenish stone tablet that serves as a centerpiece
translate: 然而，最引人注目的特征是一块风化、带有绿色的石板，它作为中心装饰物

original: Leaning in and in the dim light, you can make out line upon line of faint carvings and grotesque imagery covering the tablet
translate: 贴近一看，在昏暗的光线下，你可以辨认出石板上一行又一行模糊的雕刻和怪异的图案

original: It seems to writhe and contort in impossible ways and for a moment you can almost hear whispering
translate: 它似乎以不可能的方式扭曲着，有一瞬间你几乎能听到低语声

original: Pull Away
translate: 拉开

original: You pull back from the hideous artifact and for some reason your mind resounds with a single thought
translate: 你从那可怕的法器旁退开，不知为何你的脑海中响起了一个念头

original: The tablet came from the unknowable depths of the sea
translate: 这块石板来自深不可测的海底

original: No doubt an item of power and value... to the right person
translate: 毫无疑问，是一件强大的宝物，对某些人来说价值连城

original: Driina shudders
translate: 德琳娜颤抖着

original: This is an artifact of pure evil
translate: 这是一件纯粹邪恶的法器

original: Driina, what is this thing?
translate: 德琳娜，这是什么东西？

original: You carefully place the tablet in your bags before picking through the offal covering the rest of the altar for what precious items you find there
translate: 你小心翼翼地将石板放入背包，然后翻找祭坛上其余部分的内脏，寻找有价值的物品

original: Your bags feel heavy as you heft them over your shoulder
translate: 你提起背包，感觉它们沉甸甸的

original: You force yourself to scan the tablet and its hideous carvings
translate: 你强迫自己再次审视石板及其可怕的雕刻

original: The scripture makes little sense to you but there are images as well
translate: 这些文字对你来说毫无意义，但还有一些图像

original: Suggestive images
translate: 带有暗示意味的图像

original: However, you decide that you lack the required knowledge to make sense of them and quickly look away
translate: 然而，你决定自己缺乏解读它们所需的知识，迅速移开了目光

original: Taking a deep breath, you force yourself to look upon the hideous carvings again
translate: 深吸一口气，你再次强迫自己注视那些可怕的雕刻

original: You fail to make any further sense of the writing but your eyes linger on the crude renditions of humanoid figures
translate: 你无法再理解这些文字，但你的眼睛停留在那些粗略描绘的人形图像上

original: Some appear to be men, or at least man-like
translate: 有些看起来像是男人，或者至少是人类的模样

original: Small and pathetic, they kneel in worship of others, much larger and monstrous figures
translate: 他们矮小而可怜，跪在地上崇拜那些更大、更可怕的生物

original: In another series of images, the subject matter becomes more disturbing still
translate: 在另一系列的图像中，主题变得更加令人不安

original: Squatting obscenely, the larger horrors embrace the smaller men and in a grotesque imitation of lovers, it appears as if they are kissing deeply
translate: 他们猥琐地蹲着，较大的恐怖生物拥抱较小的人类，以一种畸形的爱侣模仿，似乎在深深地接吻

original: You feel nausea rising up and look away from the hideous tablet
translate: 你感到恶心上升，移开目光，不再看那丑陋的石板

original: #HorrynSewerJack
translate: #霍里恩下水道术士

original: My badge indeed!
translate: 我的徽章果然在！

original: The sewerjack grabs the badge and tries to wipe some of the grime off of it
translate: 下水道术士抓起徽章，试图擦去上面的部分污垢

original: For a moment there I thought I was in real trouble
translate: 有一会儿，我真以为自己陷入了真正的麻烦

original: Don’t you come closer now!
translate: 你别靠近！

original: The man cautioned as he brandished a mace
translate: 那人挥舞着战锤警告道

original: He’s covered with grime from top to toe and looks oddly at home in the muck and filth of the sewers
translate: 他从头到脚都沾满了污垢，却在下水道的污秽中显得格外自在

original: The odd man squints as he raises his lantern to get a better look at you
translate: 那个奇怪的人眯起眼睛，举起灯笼更仔细地打量你

original: Though you’re certainly not one of those mad-men!
translate: 但你绝对不是那些疯子中的一个！

original: Begging your pardon my Lord but one can’t be careful enough these days
translate: 请原谅我，大人，但这些日子谨慎总是没错的

original: Begging your pardon my Lady but one can’t be careful enough these days
translate: 请原谅我，夫人，但这些日子谨慎总是没错的

original: I'm glad you can tell the difference
translate: 我很高兴你能分辨出来

original: Spend too much time down here and your mind begins playing tricks on you
translate: 待在这里时间太长，你的思维开始变得不正常

original: Such is the life of a sewerjack I suppose
translate: 这大概就是下水道术士的生活吧

original: Not that I’m much of one; having lost my badge of office and all!
translate: 虽然我自己也不是什么下水道术士；因为我已经失去了我的职务徽章！

original: Badge of office?
translate: 职务徽章？

original: Do you mean this?
translate: 你是这个意思吗？

original: Offer badge
translate: 出示徽章

original: A brass badge that us sewerjack wear
translate: 一枚黄铜徽章，这是我们下水道工人的标志

original: Tis’ a badge of our authority you know!
translate: 你知道，这可是我们权力的象征！

original: The man puffs out his chest in the slightest
translate: 那人微微挺了挺胸膛

original: But as I said, mine’s lost
translate: 但是正如我所说，我的已经丢了

original: Must have dropped it when I scuffled with that pack of vermin near those side tunnels to the east of here
translate: 我想是和那群害虫搏斗时掉的，就在东边那些侧隧道附近

original: The man half-turns and shows you a large bloody gash torn across his back
translate: 那人半转身，让你看到了他背上一道长长的血痕

original: I think I've already found it!
translate: 我认为我已经找到了！

original: I'll keep an eye out
translate: 我会留意的

original: But do you mind answering some questions first?
translate: 但你先回答几个问题可以吗？

original: These here sewers are a bit of a maze until you get to know them
translate: 这些下水道一开始有点迷宫的感觉，直到你熟悉了它们

original: But for the most part, as long you stay away from the beasties and muck, you can’t really get too lost
translate: 但总的来说，只要避开那些怪兽和污泥，你不会那么容易迷路

original: All tunnels loop back to the central cisterns one way of another
translate: 所有隧道最终都会以这样或那样的方式回到中央蓄水池
