original: And if you’re real clever-like, you can use the tunnels to get almost anywhere in the city
translate: 如果你够聪明，可以利用这些隧道几乎到达城市中的任何地方

original: There are three outlets that empty into the harbor
translate: 有三个出口通向港口

original: The westernmost of them has planks that allow you to sneak out onto the docks
translate: 最西边的那个有木板，可以让你偷偷溜到码头上

original: And if you need to get to the area by the temple, now that it’s blocked off and all, there is a side tunnel in the western part of the sewers that leads into a cellar near the temple
translate: 而如果你需要去神殿附近，现在那里被封锁了，下水道西边有一个侧隧道，可以通向神殿附近的地窖

original: Finally, in the south-eastern tunnels, you might come across a staircase leading down into the Underhalls
translate: 最后，在东南部的隧道中，你可能会遇到通往地下大厅的楼梯

original: All kinds of queer folk can be found there
translate: 那里可以找到各种奇怪的人

original: Thieves and cutthroats and the like
translate: 盗贼、杀手以及其他流窜犯

original: They¨'re not Reavers though, mind you
translate: 但他们可不是掠夺者，你懂的

original: I hear they even have some kind of market down there where all kinds of wares can be had
translate: 我听说他们那里甚至有个市场，各种货物应有尽有

original: But I’d give them a wide berth if I were you
translate: 但我还是建议你尽量避开他们

original: Best not take any chances
translate: 最好别冒险

original: Ask away!
translate: 请问有什么可以帮忙的吗？

original: What's a 'sewerjack' exactly?
translate: “污水工”究竟是什么意思？

original: What's the layout of this place?
translate: 这里的布局是怎样的？

original: Any Reavers down here?
translate: 这里有掠夺者吗？

original: I have to get going
translate: 我得走了

original: They do come down here from time to time!
translate: 他们确实会时不时下来！

original: It seems they’ve barricaded the city above off into sections and it seems using the sewers might be the easiest way to move between areas
translate: 看起来他们把城市上方分成了几个区域，使用下水道可能是移动到不同区域最便捷的方式

original: A small group of them came through here a few days ago
translate: 几天前有一小队他们从这里经过

original: I shadowed them for a bit but then they rounded a corner and before I could catch up to them they were gone
translate: 我跟踪了他们一阵，但后来他们转了个弯，等我追上去时，他们已经不见了

original: Just like that
translate: 就这样消失了

original: For the life of me, I don’t understand where they could’ve gone
translate: 我真的不明白他们去了哪里

original: I lost their trail north east of here, in the bend where the fungus-patches grow
translate: 我在离这里东北方向的弯道，长满菌斑的地方，失去了他们的踪迹

original: You’re back!
translate: 你回来了！

original: Good to see you’ve kept your wits about you down here!
translate: 很高兴看到你还保持着清醒的头脑！

original: I need to ask you some questions!
translate: 我需要问你一些问题！

original: I found your badge
translate: 我找到了你的徽章

original: Now listen, I don’t have anything of value on me except what’s in my noggin
translate: 现在听好了，我身上除了脑袋里的东西外，没有其他有价值的东西

original: Noone knows these sewers better than me, see, and the least I can do for you is give you this
translate: 没有人比我更熟悉这些下水道了，所以至少我可以给你这个

original: He pulls out a piece of paper, scribbles some notes on it and hands it to you
translate: 他掏出一张纸，潦草地记下了一些东西，然后递给你

original: It appears to be a map of the sewers
translate: 看起来是一张下水道的地图

original: This should make it easier for you to find your way around here
translate: 这应该会让你更容易在这儿找到方向

original: I have some questions now
translate: 我现在有一些问题

original: They pay us to keep the sewers free of vermin
translate: 我们靠清理下水道里的害虫赚钱

original: Human and otherwise!
translate: 包括非人类的！

original: The man chuckles
translate: 那个男人笑了笑

original: Used to be it was fine work if you could stand the smell!
translate: 以前这工作还不错，如果你能忍受那味道的话！

original: But not lately
translate: 但最近不太行了

original: Sewers been overrun with beasties!
translate: 下水道被野兽占领了！

original: Overgrown, cruel, dangerous… monsters!
translate: 越来越庞大，残忍，危险……怪物！

original: I slew a leech the size of my leg the other day and a pack of rats nearly ended me just hours ago
translate: 我前几天杀了一条和我腿一样大的吸血虫，一群老鼠差点要了我的命，就在几个小时前

original: What's causing it?
translate: 造成这种情况的原因是什么？

original: Causing it?
translate: 造成这种情况的原因是什么？

original: the man says dreamily as if he’d never stopped to consider it before
translate: 那个男人若有所思地说，仿佛他从未考虑过这个问题

original: Sometimes… sometimes I wonder if… if it’s not been like this all along?
translate: 有时……有时我会想，如果……如果它一直都是这样呢？

original: I mean, it hasn’t
translate: 我的意思是，它并不是这样的

original: As I said: the darkness plays tricks on you down here
translate: 正如我所说：这里的黑暗会欺骗你

original: Why are you still down here?
translate: 你为什么还待在这里？

original: The man seems to collect his thoughts again
translate: 那个人似乎又整理了一下思绪

original: I know these tunnels like the back of my hand and with the carnage going on above, this place is as safe as any I reckon
translate: 我对这些隧道了如指掌，上面闹得那么乱，这里大概是最安全的地方了

original: Those Reavers are dangerous people and I’d rather take my chances down here for now
translate: 那些掠夺者很危险，我宁愿暂时待在这里

original: #HorrynSewersEntrance
translate: #霍林下水道入口

original: You peer into the dark depths below
translate: 你朝下方黑暗的深处望去

original: The stench of raw sewage assaults your olfactory organs with such force that you struggle to keep your last meal down
translate: 刺鼻的下水道恶臭让你难以忍受，你努力不让刚吃下的食物吐出来

original: Kat looks up at you pale-faced
translate: 卡特苍白着脸望向你

original: You can’t be seriou…“ Before she manages to finish the sentence she whirls around and vomits
translate: 你不是在…“话没说完，她猛地转身呕吐起来

original: Rolands laughter booms
translate: 洛兰的笑声震耳欲聋

original: What's wrong girl?
translate: 你怎么了，女孩？

original: Lost your appetite for adventure?
translate: 你对冒险已经失去胃口了吗？

original: You clamber down the grimy ladder and emerge into a series of vaulted tunnels
translate: 你攀下肮脏的梯子，钻入一系列拱形的隧道

original: A thick bubbling greenish-brown stew lazily floats by you
translate: 一股浓稠的绿褐色汤水缓缓从你身边流过

original: A river of filth expertly channeled away by the city-spanning sewer-system
translate: 这条肮脏的河流被城市规模庞大的下水系统巧妙地引导着

original: I wonder if the craftsmen of today still possess the knowledge to build tunnels such as these?
translate: 我不知道现在的工匠们是否还能建造出这样的隧道？

original: Iben muses
translate: 伊本沉思着说

original: The Gallian Empire has become an empire of caretakers
translate: 加利安帝国已经成为一个看护者帝国

original: A ‘custodial empire’ who no longer builds
translate: 一个‘监护帝国’，不再建造东西了

original: Only frantically tries to fight off that great conqueror ‘decay’
translate: 只是疯狂地试图抵抗那位伟大的征服者“腐化”

original: No?
translate: 不是吗？

original: You doubt the builders and craftsmen of today are even capable of such feats of engineering anymore
translate: 你怀疑现在的建造者和工匠们甚至无法再完成这样的工程壮举

original: Continue on your way
translate: 继续前行

original: #HorrynSewersMap
translate: #霍里恩下水道地图

original: Sewer Map
translate: 下水道地图

original: The hand-drawn map has the following legend on the back
translate: 手绘地图背面有以下图例

original: Were we met. 2 - Something strange is going on near the fongos. 3 - Tunnels to underhalls
translate: 在我们相遇的地方。2 - 好像在fungos附近发生了奇怪的事情。3 - 向地下厅的通道

original: Watch out for thives. 4 - Outlet to harbor. 5 - Leds to cellar near tempel
translate: 当心盗贼。4 - 出口通往港口。5 - 通往神殿附近地窖的楼梯

original: X - Ladder to surfes
translate: X - 通往surves的梯子

original: # Chapter_1_HorrynUnderhalls
translate: # 第一章 霍里恩地下厅

original: #Chapter1Smugglers
translate: #第一章 拐骗者

original: We've been holed up in these bloody caves for too long - a little bloodshed might do us good
translate: 我们在这该死的洞穴里待得太久了 - 也许来点流血事件对我们有好处

original: The furthest warriors draw their bows, as the lead figure strides towards you, blade in hand
translate: 最远的战士拉开了弓，带头的战士手持刀剑朝你走来

original: Roland, any ideas?
translate: 罗兰，你有什么主意吗？

original: I yield!
translate: 我投降！

original: None the less, trouble's found you
translate: 不过，麻烦已经找上你了

original: And you're not leaving until she says so
translate: 你不会离开，直到她说可以

original: So put down your weapons, or these tunnels are about to get very slippery
translate: 所以放下武器吧，否则这些隧道就要变得非常滑了

original: You want them?
translate: 你要它们吗？

original: Come get them
translate: 来拿吧

original: Fine!
translate: 好吧！

original: We'll yield
translate: 我们投降

original: Smugglers
translate: 贩运者

original: Hold it!
translate: 停下！

original: Comes a shout from the shadows ahead
translate: 前方阴影中传来一声喊叫

original: Move any closer and you'll move no more
translate: 再靠近一点，你就再也动不了了

original: You can just make out the faint silhouettes of a group of armed warriors
translate: 你根本不知道在和谁打交道

original: Forgive me - I'll leave!
translate: 请原谅，我要离开了！

original: You have no idea who you're messing with
translate: 你不知道自己在招惹谁

original: We're the kind of folks who prefer to be left well alone
translate: 我们是那种宁愿被忽视的人

original: The kind who don't brook no interference from strangers
translate: 不喜欢陌生人干涉我们

original: The figures creep slowly out of the murk
translate: 那些身影慢慢从黑暗中走出

original: Being able to see them better does not reassure you
translate: 看得更清楚一点，并没有让你感到安心

original: We're here to offer our services
translate: 我们是来提供服务的

original: If you want a fight, I'm happy to oblige?
translate: 如果你想战斗，我很乐意奉陪

original: We're not looking for trouble
translate: 我们不想惹事

original: Truly
translate: 确实如此

original: Oh, it's not really that easy now is it?
translate: 哦，现在可没那么容易哦？

original: You know we're here now
translate: 你们现在在这里

original: And you could be anyone
translate: 你也可以是任何人

original: The voice trails off, and one of the figures makes a high-pitched chuckle
translate: 声音渐渐消失，其中一个身影发出尖细的笑声

original: You want to bleed?
translate: 你想流血？

original: Just ask!
translate: 只管说！

original: Listen, we're not looking for trouble
translate: 听着，我们可不是来找麻烦的

original: You don't say?
translate: 你可真会说

original: The voice coos
translate: 声音呢喃

original: Tell me, little lamprey, do you know who you're dealing with here?
translate: 告诉我，小灯鱼，你知道自己在跟谁打交道吗？

original: Please enlighten me
translate: 请让我开开眼

original: I don't care
translate: 我不在乎

original: You all bleed the same
translate: 你们都一样会流血

original: I'm sure you are but the Queen will be the judge of that
translate: 当然，但女王会做最终裁决

original: Now drop your fucking weapons and come with me!
translate: 现在放下你们的该死武器，跟我来！

original: If you want my weapons, come and get them!
translate: 如果你想拿我的武器，那就来拿吧！

original: I'll yield
translate: 我会投降

original: There's a staccato laugh from the darkness
translate: 黑暗中传来断断续续的笑声

original: I can't deny we're in dire need of fresh blood, thanks to these interesting times
translate: 我们的确急需新鲜血液，多亏了这些有趣的时代

original: I'd be happy to introduce you to the Queen herself - I'll even vouch for your enthusiasm
translate: 我很乐意把女王本人介绍给你——甚至可以担保你的热情

original: But by the Mother of Maelstroms, I can't let you go armed
translate: 但凭风暴之母的名义，我不能让你带着武器离开

original: Guests!
translate: 客人们！

original: I would see you in my quarters
translate: 我希望你能到我的住处来

original: Do not keep me waiting
translate: 不要让我久等

original: And Armand - let them keep their weapons
translate: 而阿曼德 - 让他们保留武器吧

original: Any decent assassin would have shut you up long ago
translate: 任何一个合格的刺客早就把你干掉了

original: Aye aye m'lady
translate: 是的，女士

original: Armands offers a shallow bow
translate: 阿曼德行了一个浅浅的鞠躬

original: You heard the lady
translate: 女士的话你听见了

original: Make yourself at home in our little corner of luxury
translate: 在我们的小天地里，让自己感到自在些

original: Armand gestures towards the tunnels beyond with a theatrical gesture
translate: 阿曼德用戏剧性的手势指向远处的隧道

original: A womans voice rings through the caves with such authority that the would-be combatants stop dead in their tracks
translate: 一个女人的声音在洞穴中回荡，带着如此权威的语气，让即将交战的双方都停下了脚步

original: Armand!
translate: 阿曼德！

original: What is this nonsense?
translate: 这些胡言乱语是什么意思？

original: You'd add dead guests to the list of curses befalling us?
translate: 你会把死客人们也加入到降临时的诅咒名单上？

original: Fool!
translate: 狂徒！

original: Armand
translate: 阿曼德

original: A deep voice rings out through the caves
translate: 一个低沉的声音在洞穴中回荡

original: Then, backlit by torches, you notice a woman overlooking the scenes from a high ledge
translate: 然后，在火把的映照下，你注意到一个女人从高处的平台俯瞰着这一切

original: We have guests, I see
translate: 我们有客人，我看到了

original: I think it would behoove us to treat them with what hospitality we can muster, no?
translate: 我们最好尽可能地款待他们，不是吗？

original: You hear the shadowy sentinels immediately sheathe or stow their weapons
translate: 你一听到阴影中的哨兵立刻收起或收好武器

original: Aye, m'lady!
translate: 是的，女士！

original: the man called Armand calls back respectfully
translate: 被称为阿曼德的男人恭敬地回应

original: Roland strides towards the oncoming assailant, his figure looming over him, making him seem more beast than man,
translate: 洛兰大步走向迎面而来的袭击者，他的身影笼罩在对方之上，让他看起来更像是野兽而非人类，

original: Your archers might get me but I'll make damn sure you and I go together little man
translate: 你的弓箭手可能会射中我，但我保证我们会一起离开，小个子

original: The shadowy figure stops dead in his tracks as Roland's voice rumbles menacingly through the tunnel
translate: 阴影中的身影突然停下了脚步，洛兰的声音在隧道中威吓般地回荡

original: As you disarm, you find yourself at the mercy of the shadowy figures
translate: 当你解除武装时，你发现自己处于阴影中身影的掌控之下

original: Even through the darkness, you can make out the white teeth of the leader's cruel grin
translate: 即使在黑暗中，你也能看出首领阴险的笑容中露出的白牙

original: This was a bad idea
translate: 这是个坏主意

original: Out of the corner of your eye, you can see Iben shift ever so slightly to put you between him and your would be assailants
translate: 你眼角瞥见伊本微微移动，将你置于他和潜在的袭击者之间

original: #HorrynIagoCaptured
translate: #霍里尼阿戈被捕

original: Sitting on the cold floor is a man in heavy chains
translate: 冷冷的地板上坐着一个戴着沉重铁链的男人

original: As you approach, he looks up and from underneath his long unkempt hair his eyes glint and the vaguest outline of a smile flashes across his face
translate: 当你走近时，他抬起头，从他长长的、凌乱的头发下，他的眼睛闪烁着，脸上闪过一丝模糊的笑容

original: Finally!
translate: 最后终于来了！

original: I thought you’d never get here!
translate: 我以为你永远不会来了！

original: You are my ticket out of this hole!
translate: 这是我逃离这个洞穴的通行证！

original: And not a moment too soon I might add!
translate: 而且我必须说，正是时候！

original: The man shuffles to his feet and dusts himself off as if preparing to leave
translate: 那个男人蹒跚着站了起来，拍了拍身上的尘土，仿佛准备离开

original: First of all I have no idea what you’re talking about and secondly, surely you realize you’re chained up?
translate: 首先，我不知道你在说什么，其次，你难道没有意识到自己被锁链束缚了吗？

original: A minor inconvenience!
translate: 一件小麻烦！

original: The Blind Maiden has brought you thus far and no doubt the rest of the solution to this little conundrum is about to present itself
translate: 盲眼少女已经将你带到这一步，剩下的谜题答案想必很快就会揭晓。

original: Iago zha Droma is not fated to spend the rest of his life rotting away in chains
translate: Iago札德拉并不注定要在这铁链中腐烂余生。

original: If the Blind Maiden favors you so, how did you end up in this hole?
translate: 如果盲眼少女如此偏爱你，那你又是如何落入这陷阱中的？

original: The Maiden merely deals us our hands of cards; it is for us to play them
translate: 盲眼少女只是发给我们手中的牌，剩下的就看我们怎么玩了。

original: I, perhaps, played my last hand poorly
translate: 我或许是我最后的牌出得不好。

original: A small lover’s quarrel stemming from a simple misunderstanding led to a series of unfortunate events that landed me here
translate: 一场小小的恋人争吵，源于一个简单的误会，导致了一系列不幸的事件，最终将我困在这里。

original: He rattles his chains as if to emphasize his plight
translate: 他摇晃着铁链，似乎在强调他的困境。

original: But the Maiden kisses me again and here you are
translate: 但盲眼少女再次亲吻了我，然后你来到了这里。

original: My rescue!
translate: 我的救援！

original: Oh, is that so?
translate: 哦，是这样吗？

original: All I ask of you is that you intercede on my behalf to the Queen
translate: 我只希望你能为我向女王求情。

original: Though she certainly loves me madly, she has also decided that I am to meet my end chained up in this oubliette shit-hole
translate: 尽管她确实疯狂地爱着我，但她也决定要将我困在这间地牢的阴沟里。

original: For the briefest of moments Iago loses his composure and the slightest hint of desperation creeps into his voice
translate: 在最短的一刻，Iago失去了冷静，他的声音中透出一丝绝望。

original: Hold on, I have some questions first
translate: 等一下，我先有几个问题。

original: Iago looks at you impatiently
translate: Iago不耐烦地看着你。

original: Why exactly are you chained up here?
translate: 你究竟为何被锁在这里？

original: Why should I help you?
translate: 为什么要帮我？

original: I'll be back
translate: 我会回来的。

original: Has the Blind Maiden ordained my freedom yet?
translate: 盲眼少女已经为我预定了自由了吗？

original: Not yet but I have some questions first!
translate: 还没有，但我先有几个问题要问！

original: Not yet
translate: 还没有

original: There is not a sea on Warda untouched by Ombarian hulls
translate: 在瓦尔达，没有一片海域未曾被奥姆巴里安的船触碰过

original: I do not deny that we whisper tales of such things when we are safe on dry land with a cup of wine in our hands
translate: 当我们在陆地上安全地举杯喝酒时，确实会说起这样的事情

original: Of things older than time that dwell in the unfathomable depths of the seas
translate: 比时间还要古老的生物，居住在海洋深处无法测量的深渊中

original: But to hear of one in this age, and to encounter it no less!
translate: 但在这个时代听到这样的传闻，并且亲身遭遇，这真是不可思议！

original: Such things should not be
translate: 这样的事情不该存在

original: It is madness given form
translate: 这是疯狂，赋予了实体

original: A shadow passes over the man’s face
translate: 阴影掠过男子的脸庞

original: Where is your ship now?
translate: 你现在在哪里？

original: I had some other questions for you
translate: 我还有一些其他的问题要问你

original: We limped into a safe haven in one of this island’s excellent more ‘private’ coves
translate: 我们在一艘岛上优秀的更‘私密’的海湾中一个安全的避风港里一瘸一拐地靠岸了

original: My crew awaits there as we make repairs and forage for supplies
translate: 我的船员在那里等待，我们正在修理船只并搜寻补给

original: Let’s just say there is a reason Idra is so prized amongst those who fly the black sails
translate: 用一句话来说，伊德拉是那些悬挂黑帆的人中最受珍视的

original: Iago winks at you
translate: Iago 向你眨了眨眼睛

original: So you’re a smuggler then?
translate: 所以你是走私者？

original: Kat blurts out with not a little awe in her voice
translate: Kat 用略带敬畏的声音脱口而出

original: Iago fixes her with sultry gaze
translate: Iago 用魅惑的目光注视着她

original: Why 'smuggler' is such a vulgar term
translate: 为什么‘走私者’这个词如此粗俗

original: I am a gentleman, a zhenor of the seas
translate: 我是一个绅士，一个海上的尊者

original: 'Flying black sails' is a common euphemism for smugglers in the Empire
translate: “飞行的黑帆”是帝国中走私者常用的委婉说法

original: What were you carrying?
translate: 你携带了什么？

original: Do not think me a petty criminal for carrying proscribed goods
translate: 不要因为我携带违禁品就认为我是个小偷

original: There are men and women in this Empire who yearn for freedom from the yoke of their eunuch masters
translate: 这个帝国中有男女渴望摆脱阉人主子的枷锁

original: Freedom costs blood
translate: 自由是要付出鲜血的

original: As well as steel and other, more… exotic wares
translate: 以及钢铁和其他……更……异域的货物

original: Men such as me provide them
translate: 诸如我这样的人会提供给他们

original: As does the ‘Queen’ in her own way
translate: 她本人也会以她自己的方式提供帮助

original: We needed supplies and since she and I are old friends I made my way here to parlay a deal
translate: 我们需要补给品，既然我和她是老朋友，我就来这儿商谈交易

original: No doubt I overestimated our friendship
translate: 我肯定高估了我们之间的友谊

original: Ah why indeed!
translate: 哦，为什么呢！

original: Iago’s laughter comes out strained
translate: 伊阿哥的笑声变得有些勉强

original: As I said: ‘tis nothing but a lover’s quarrel!
translate: 正如我所说：这不过是情人间的争吵！

original: A trifle
translate: 无关紧要

original: I assure you
translate: 我保证

original: I am certain, if you intercede on my behalf to the Queen, and make sure to tell her I’m terribly regretful, she will see reason and let me be on my merry way
translate: 如果你为我向女王求情，并确保告诉她我非常后悔，她会理智行事，让我平安离开

original: I'm not sure I believe you
translate: 我不确定我是否相信你

original: Because Iago zha Droma is the finest captain to ever grace the Outer Isles with his sails
translate: 因为伊阿哥·卓玛是外群岛有史以来最优秀的船长

original: Besides, if you find another captain, brave or stupid enough to venture out to sea in these dire times, I shall dance on my mother’s grave!
translate: 而且，如果你能找到另一个足够勇敢或愚蠢，敢于在这危难时刻出海的船长，我将在我母亲的坟头上跳舞！

original: Iago leans in and his voice drops
translate: 伊阿哥凑近了，声音压低了

original: Horror stalks the depths around Idra
translate: 恐怖在伊德拉的深处徘徊。

original: I have seen it with my own eyes!
translate: 我亲眼见过它！

original: I know
translate: 我知道。

original: It sunk our ship as we came in!
translate: 当我们靠近时，它沉没了我们的船只！

original: Then you know what I speak of. ‘The Terror of Idra’
translate: 那么你也知道我说的是什么。‘伊德拉的恐怖’。

original: Many a ship must have shared your fate in these last, dark weeks
translate: 在这最后几周的黑暗中，可能有很多船只和你一样遭遇了同样的命运。

original: It fell upon us as well when we passed Sylo’s Teeth
translate: 当我们经过西洛之牙时，它也降临在我们身上。

original: Many of my men were swept off deck and large gouges were torn from the sides of my beautiful ship
translate: 许多我的士兵被卷下甲板，我的美丽船只的两侧被撕开了巨大的缺口。

original: What happened?
translate: 发生了什么？

original: Were it not for the grit of my crew and the blessed ship-wrights who shaped the magnificent hull of the ‘Oruda’ we would have met our end as you did
translate: 要不是我的船员们坚韧不拔，以及那些神圣的造船匠们精心打造了‘奥达’这艘壮丽的船体，我们早就和你们一样遭遇了同样的命运。

original: Instead we were able to slip from its grasp and make our way past the reefs and into shallower waters where the behemoth could not follow
translate: 相反，我们设法摆脱了它的控制，绕过了暗礁，进入了更深的水域，那里巨兽无法跟随。

original: What is the nature of this behemoth?
translate: 这个巨兽的本质是什么？

original: And where is your ship now?
translate: 而你现在的小船在哪里？

original: #HorrynRatMaze
translate: #霍林迷宫

original: A circular chamber with three exits
translate: 一个圆形的房间，有三个出口。

original: The one to the west opens up into a larger, lit passage
translate: 向西的出口通向一个更大的、照明的通道。

original: North
translate: 北面。

original: East
translate: 东面。

original: Exit west into the underhalls
translate: 向西穿过地下走廊。

original: A bend in the tunnel leads south or east
translate: 隧道的一个弯道通向南方或东方。

original: Drawn on the wall is a vulgar graffiti of two naked male forms that appear to be... wrestling
translate: 墙上画着两具裸体的男性形象，似乎在进行摔跤。

original: South
translate: 南方

original: This room is a dead end
translate: 这个房间是个死胡同

original: Written on the wall in chalk is the graffiti
translate: 墙上用粉笔写着涂鸦

original: Esteban is a donkey-fucker!
translate: Esteban是个驴蛋子！

original: Besides the checkerboard patterned floor, this is an otherwise inconspicuous chamber with exits leading north and west
translate: 除了棋盘格的地板，这个房间除此之外没有什么特别之处，有通往北方和西方的出口

original: West
translate: 西方

original: A fairly large, vaulted chamber with four exits
translate: 这是一个拱形的宽敞房间，有四个出口

original: The floor seems sticky with some kind of slimy mold that appears to be spreading from a large drain
translate: 地板上似乎粘着某种黏滑的霉菌，似乎是从一个大排水口蔓延开来的

original: A junction where three tunnels converge
translate: 三条隧道在此交汇

original: The Rat Queen rules here!
translate: 这里是鼠后统治的地方！

original: The exit to the east smells faintly of sewage
translate: 东方的出口隐约散发着下水道的气味

original: This is a dead end
translate: 这是个死胡同

original: Nothing to see here
translate: 没有什么可看的

original: A large square chamber with four central pillars
translate: 这是一个大的方形房间，中央有四根柱子

original: A skeletal corpse sits leaning up against one of the pillars
translate: 有一具骷髅尸体倚靠在一根柱子上

original: Tunnels lead off into all four cardinal directions
translate: 四个方向的隧道都通向这里

original: A large, octagonal chamber with four exits
translate: 这是一个大的八角形房间，有四个出口

original: The one leading north stinks of sewage and leads back to the sewer tunnels
translate: 通往北方的出口散发着下水道的气味，最终回到下水道的隧道

original: A chalk arrow is drawn on the wall leading west
translate: 墙上用粉笔画着指向西方的箭头

original: Exit north into the sewers
translate: 向北穿过下水道离开

original: A chamber where the worked stone of the easter wall has collapsed causing dirt and rocks to spill into the room
translate: 一个房间，东墙的石块已经坍塌，泥土和岩石倾泻而入

original: The wet stench of mold hangs thick in the air
translate: 空气中弥漫着浓重的霉味

original: Tunnels exit to the north and west
translate: 隧道向北和向西延伸

original: A tall chamber with a tapering ceiling
translate: 一个高大的房间，天花板逐渐变窄

original: A beam of light shines down from above, illuminating a piece of chalk graffiti
translate: 一束光线从上方照下，照亮了一块粉笔涂鸦

original: Magi have no balls - but fuck us nonetheless!
translate: 术士们没有胆量——但他们依然折磨我们！

original: Exits lead south and west and the one towards the west stinks of sewage
translate: 出口向南和向西，向西的那个散发着下水道的恶臭

original: You have emerged into the underhalls of Horryn
translate: 你们已经进入了霍林的地下走廊

original: Faint music can be heard ahead and the air smells of spice and perfume
translate: 前方隐约传来微弱的音乐声，空气中弥漫着香料和香水的味道

original: The narrow tunnels of the Rat-Raze opens up into the rancid sewers underneath Horryn
translate: 狡猾的老鼠迷宫在霍林的恶臭下水道中展开

original: The Rat Maze
translate: 鼠之迷宫

original: The tunnel leads back into “The Rat Maze
translate: 隧道再次回到了“鼠之迷宫”

original: Enter at your own risk!
translate: 自愿前行！

original: The tunnel ahead is dark and narrow and seems to be of pre-imperial construction
translate: 前方的隧道黑暗而狭窄，似乎是帝国之前的建筑

original: Rats scuttle in and out and ahead you can see it branching in multiple directions
translate: 老鼠进进出出，前方可以看到它向多个方向分支

original: If you proceed, you must keep your wits, and sense of direction, about you
translate: 如果继续前行，你们必须保持清醒和方向感

original: #HorrynRatQueenScene
translate: #霍林鼠后场景

original: SOmething about C
translate: 关于C的一些事情

original: More about C
translate: 关于C的更多事情

original: Finally the last part about C
translate: 最后关于C的部分

original: How curious: you're clearly not from Idra; you've not made the mistake of attacking us; you appear not to know me
translate: 好奇的是：你显然不是来自伊德拉；你没有攻击我们；你似乎不认识我

original: I seek answers
translate: 我寻求答案

original: I seek fortune
translate: 我寻求财富

original: I doubt you’ll find much in these halls
translate: 我怀疑你在这些大厅里找不到多少东西

original: Nonetheless, you are welcome to enjoy my hospitality and... business
translate: 不过，你仍然可以享受我的款待和……生意

original: So long as your blade stays in your sheath and your tongue remains courteous
translate: 只要你的剑留在剑鞘里，你的言辞保持礼貌

original: The queen takes a long draw from a hookah pipe as she stares intently at you
translate: 女王从烟斗中深深吸了一口，然后紧紧盯着你

original: Thank you m'lady
translate: 多谢您，女士

original: May I ask you some questions?
translate: 我可以问您一些问题吗？

original: I'll go where I like
translate: 我可以去我想去的地方

original: For now, I have questions!
translate: 现在，我有问题要问！

original: Retrieve the harbormaster’s ledger for me
translate: 请帮我取来港务长的账本

original: Look for it in the eastern sea-tower
translate: 在东边的海塔里找找看

original: You can find it by following the eastern jetty all the way around to the entrance of the harbor
translate: 你可以沿着东边的码头一直走到港口的入口

original: Do that, and I shall consider sparing that fool Iago’s life
translate: 做完这件事，我会考虑饶了那个愚蠢的伊戈的性命

original: You hand the ledger to the Queen who in turn hands it off to one of her lackeys without even looking
translate: 你把账本递给女王，女王随后把它交给一个随从，连看都没看一眼

original: The man flips through it and offers the queen a short nod
translate: 那人翻阅了一下，向女王点了点头

original: She waves her hand in an uninterested gesture and a burly pair of gentlemen slink off into the shadows
translate: 女王不耐烦地挥了挥手，两个魁梧的男子便悄悄隐入阴影之中

original: One of them is carrying a large ring of keys
translate: 其中一人正背着一大串钥匙

original: What about it?
translate: 有什么事吗？

original: What was I supposed to do again?
translate: 我刚才说的是什么来着？

original: I have the ledger!
translate: 我有账本！

original: The men standing around roar in laughter and jeers
translate: 围绕着的那些人发出阵阵笑声和嘲讽。

original: Iago bows deeply and backs away
translate: 伊阿哥深深地鞠了一躬，然后退了出去。

original: He grabs you by the arm as you leave
translate: 你刚离开时，他抓住了你的胳膊。

original: You are looking for a captain, yes?
translate: 你在找船长，对吧？

original: Well, you’ll find no better suited ship or crew than the Weathermaiden
translate: 好吧，你找不到比‘风暴女巫’号更合适的船和船员了。

original: I’ll go ahead and rejoin them in the sea-cave to the north-west of here
translate: 我会先去西北方向的海洞与他们汇合。

original: Make your preparations and then seek me out once you are ready
translate: 一切准备就绪后，再来找我。

original: Together we will bid a fond farewell to this barren rock
translate: 我们将一起告别这座荒凉的岩石。

original: Iago tips his non-existent hat and leaves
translate: 伊阿哥摘下并不存在的帽子，离开了。

original: At some point you may find yourself in search of a ship, no?
translate: 你可能会在某个时候寻找一艘船，不是吗？

original: Once my ship is ready to sail again we shall make our way off this barren rock
translate: 等我的船再次启航，我们就离开这座荒凉的岩石。

original: Someone throws an overripe fruit
translate: 有人扔了一个烂水果。

original: As he does so he whispers to you “I think it is best we make ourselves scarce
translate: 在扔的同时，他低声对你说：“我觉得最好我们赶紧离开这里。

original: The natives seem to be getting restless
translate: 居民们似乎变得不安起来。

original: You amuse me
translate: 你很有趣。

original: I shall lend my ear
translate: 我会倾听。

original: For now
translate: 暂时。

original: About that ledger
translate: 关于那本账簿

original: I met Iago
translate: 我遇到了伊阿哥

original: What is this place?
translate: 这是什么地方？

original: How did you end up here?
translate: 你是怎么来到这里的？

original: The queen’s eyes flash at you and for a moment you feel as if lightning is about to strike
translate: 女王的目光在你身上闪烁，你感觉好像即将遭到雷击

original: Then she relaxes back into her self-assured pose
translate: 然后她放松下来，恢复了自信的姿态

original: That man is nothing to me
translate: 那个男人对我来说一文不值

original: He is to rot at my pleasure
translate: 他将在我的意愿下腐烂

original: What is his crime?
translate: 他的罪行是什么？

original: The queen cast a brief glance at a young man standing nearby
translate: 女王迅速瞥了一眼 nearby 站立的年轻男子

original: His face reddens and a faint smile plays across his lips
translate: 他的脸红了，嘴角浮现出一丝淡淡的微笑

original: That is, until he realizes the hot water he’s in and remembers an important task that needs doing somewhere else before scuttling off
translate: 直到他意识到自己处境的危险，并想起一个重要的任务需要在别处完成，然后匆匆离去

original: Iago is a worm whose appetite is too big for his own good
translate: 伊阿哥是个胃口过大的小虫子

original: Nothing else
translate: 就是这些

original: What is your interest in him?
translate: 你对他有什么兴趣？

original: He's asked me to put in a good word for him to you
translate: 他让我为你说说好话

original: Has he now?
translate: 他真的这么做了吗？

original: Well, he is clever when that mood strikes him and you’ll certainly find no finer captain in the outer isles
translate: 好吧，当他心情好的时候，他确实很聪明，你肯定会在外岛找不到更好的船长

original: For old times sake, I shall offer him this much
translate: 为了旧日的情谊，我愿意给他这个机会

original: The Harbormaster of Horryn is no doubt food for the crabs
translate: 哈罗因的港务长无疑将成为螃蟹的食物

original: Or at least for those beasts that roam the streets above
translate: 或者至少是那些在街道上游荡的野兽

original: However, he kept meticulous journals and ledgers
translate: 然而，他却保持着详尽的日记和账簿

original: Ledgers full of information that reflect poorly on my associates
translate: 装满信息的账簿，这些信息对我的同伴们不利

original: It would be a shame, albeit not unlikely, that these ledgers might have been lost in the calamities that have swept Horryn
translate: 虽然不太可能，但这些账簿在霍林的灾难中遗失了，这也是一件憾事

original: Where should we look for them?
translate: 我们应该去哪里寻找它们？

original: The Harbormaster kept a storage of his records in the eastern tower that flanks the entrance to the harbor
translate: 港口管理员在他的记录储存在港口入口东侧的塔楼里

original: Just follow the eastern jetty, along the sea-wall until you arrive at the tower
translate: 沿着东侧的码头，沿着海堤，直到到达那座塔楼

original: With the current chaos that reigns above, I’m sure it’s as easy as walking in and walking out again
translate: 当前上面一片混乱，我相信这就像走进去再走出来那么简单

original: Do this for me, and I’ll consider sparing the life of that wretch of a manling
translate: 你帮我做这件事，我会考虑饶过那个男人的性命

original: I already have them!
translate: 我已经拿到了它们！

original: I'll consider it
translate: 我会考虑的

original: I had some more questions first though
translate: 但首先我还有些问题

original: The pair return with Iago dangling comically between them and forcefully deposit him on the stone floor at the queen’s feet
translate: 这对人将雅戈悬挂在中间，强迫他落在王座前的石地板上

original: He slowly and painfully stumbles to his feet while rubbing his sore wrists
translate: 他慢慢地、痛苦地站了起来，揉着受伤的手腕

original: The Blind Maiden has delivered
translate: 盲眼少女已经完成了使命

original: My dear queen, I am ever your
translate: 我敬爱的女王，我永远是您的

original: The Queen’s retort cut’s like a rapier
translate: 女王的回击如匕首般锐利

original: Not another word out of your mouth lest I geld you
translate: 你若再出言，我必阉割你

original: {PLAYER}, I thank you for your service but it is time for you to be on your way
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__，感谢你的服务，但现在你该启程了

original: Seeing this scoundrel before me makes my men and me salivate for roasted peacock and I assure you
translate: 看到这个无赖，我的手下和我都在垂涎烤孔雀，我保证

original: That would not be a pretty sight
translate: 那将是一副可怕的景象

original: Iago, I don't want you joining me
translate: 伊阿哥，我不想你加入我

original: You return
translate: 你回来了

original: I have some more questions
translate: 我还有一些问题

original: About that quest
translate: 关于那个任务

original: A place for free spirits and the free flow of enterprise
translate: 一个自由灵魂的栖息地，商业自由流通之地

original: The Empire would call us thieves, smugglers and brigands but the same Empire would rather starve thousands to death than upset the delicate balance of their taxes and tariffs
translate: 帝国会称我们为盗贼、走私者和强盗，但同样的帝国宁愿让成千上万的人饿死，也不愿破坏他们税收和关税的微妙平衡

original: So instead, we scuttle about like rats in dark places
translate: 所以我们像老鼠一样在黑暗中四处游荡

original: We gnaw at the foundations of that swollen corpse
translate: 我们侵蚀着那个膨胀尸体的根基

original: But for all our mischief, they cannot help but love us
translate: 尽管我们做了许多坏事，但他们仍然无法不喜爱我们

original: They writhe in our muck!
translate: 他们在我们的污泥中痛苦挣扎！

original: In the rare spices, fine oils, exotic magicks and potent poisons that flow into the Heartlands thanks to those like me
translate: 通过像我这样的人，心腹之地流入了稀有的香料、优质的油、异域魔法和强烈的毒药

original: So please
translate: 所以请

original: Cavort in pleasures most carnal while you are here
translate: 尽情享受最肉欲的快乐吧

original: No secrets ever leave these halls
translate: 这里从不泄露秘密

original: The queen offers a telling smile
translate: 女王露出意味深长的微笑

original: #HorrynSmugglerAlchemistScene
translate: #HorrynSmugglerAlchemistScene

original: A tall, hook-nosed man with eyes like glowing coals and a thick mane of shaggy, black hair is intently staring at a snake wrapped around his forearm as he slowly lowers a small mouse towards its gaping maw
translate: 一个高个子、鹰钩鼻的男子，眼睛如同燃烧的煤炭，浓密的黑色乱发覆盖在头上，正专注地看着一条缠绕在他前臂上的蛇，他缓缓地将一只小老鼠靠近蛇的血盆大口

original: Ahem
translate: 咳咳

original: The man gives a start and both he and the snake hisses annoyed at you
translate: 男子一惊，他和蛇都对你发出不满的嘶嘶声

original: Insolent!
translate: 肆无忌惮！

original: Can’t you see I’m busy?!
translate: 你看不到我正忙着吗？！

original: As he talks, he palms the mouse and in a feat of prestidigitation, it seems to disappear
translate: 在他说话的同时，他把小鼠藏在手中，通过巧妙的戏法，它似乎消失了

original: The snake tastes the air greedily and slithers into the sleeve of his robe and up his arm
translate: 那条蛇贪婪地嗅着空气，然后滑入他袍子的袖子，沿着他的手臂爬了上去

original: I just came to trade
translate: 我只是来交易的

original: Not until you finish your task
translate: 你必须先完成你的任务

original: Now be off and do not return until you have a bag of disgusting fungi for me!
translate: 现在滚开，直到你给我带来一袋恶心的菌类，否则不要回来！

original: Not so quickly
translate: 别这么快

original: The man’s eyes narrow as a menacing smile creeps across his pale face
translate: 那人的双眼眯起，苍白的脸上露出威胁性的微笑

original: Seeing as you are new here, your value is slightly above nil
translate: 既然你是新手，你的价值几乎等于零

original: I’ll say this much
translate: 我只说这么多

original: If you wish to peruse my wares you must first perform the smallest of tasks for me
translate: 如果你想浏览我的商品，你必须先为我完成一件微不足道的任务

original: I require a rare and highly toxic alchemical ingredient that grows in these underhalls
translate: 我需要一种稀有且极具毒性的炼金材料，生长在这地底的洞穴中

original: The caps from the ‘Calivexis’ fungus - Commonly known as ‘vomit cups’
translate: ‘卡利维西斯’菌类的菌盖 - 常被称为‘呕吐杯’

original: Beyond being a prized ingredient for poison-makers, it also stinks like nothing you’ve ever encountered
translate: 不仅是毒药制作者珍视的原料，它的气味也令人闻所未闻

original: That sounds unpleasant
translate: 听起来很不愉快

original: Oh it is indeed!
translate: 确实如此！

original: That is part of the reason I’m asking you to do it!
translate: 这正是我要求你去做它的原因之一

original: The other reason is they’ve become more difficult to harvest
translate: 另一个原因是因为它们变得越来越难以采集

original: You see, they grow in caves right outside these very halls
translate: 你看，它们就生长在这些洞穴外面的岩洞中

original: That’s indeed why I have momentarily taken up residence here
translate: 的确如此，所以我暂时住在这里

original: But
translate: 但是

original: But the caves connect to domains lorded over by one of these ‘Reaver’ chieftains
translate: 但是这些‘掠夺者’酋长统治的领域与洞穴相连

original: That Oleg fellow
translate: 那个奥列格家伙

original: To keep things civil, the Queen has sealed off the cave and forbidden anyone to enter it
translate: 为了保持礼貌，女王已经封锁了洞穴，并禁止任何人进入

original: She would be most irate if I were to disobey her
translate: 如果我违背她的命令，她会非常生气

original: You however are free to feign the fool’s innocence
translate: 但是你可以假装自己是傻瓜

original: How do I get to these caves?
translate: 我怎么才能到达这些洞穴？

original: The entrance to the caves is a barred gate at the end of a long hall of columns
translate: 洞穴的入口是一个铁栅栏门，位于一排柱子长廊的尽头

original: It lies just west of the Queen’s court
translate: 它就在女王宫廷的西边

original: There is a sentry patrolling the area and you’ll do well to avoid him
translate: 有人在巡逻这个区域，最好避开他

original: Once you pass the gate and enter the cave, you’ll find a flooded chamber with exits leading left and right
translate: 一旦你通过铁栅栏门进入洞穴，你会发现一个被水淹没的房间，有通往左右的出口

original: Take the left one!
translate: 左边的路！

original: The right one leads to Olegs domain and I dare say it’s best avoided
translate: 右边的路通向奥列格的领地，我敢说最好避开那里

original: I'll see what I can do
translate: 我会尽力而为

original: Run along now!
translate: 快走吧！

original: I require a small bag of them
translate: 我需要一小袋

original: Indeed, if you are fast and discreet, I’ll even throw in a small bag of gold
translate: 如果你动作快且谨慎，我甚至会送你一小袋金币

original: Off you go now!
translate: 你快去吧！

original: Marvelous!
translate: 太棒了！

original: You’ve proven most useful
translate: 你证明了自己的价值

original: Esteban gingerly places the fungi in an airtight jar and throws you a small purse of gold
translate: Esteban小心翼翼地将菌类放入密封罐中，然后递给你一个小钱袋

original: And remember
translate: 而且记住

original: Not a word to the queen of rodents about our little agreement
translate: 不要对啮齿类女王提起我们之间的秘密协议

original: The snake hisses at you
translate: 蛇对你嘶嘶作声

original: I wish to see your wares now
translate: 现在我想看看你的货品

original: I'll be on my way then
translate: 那我就先走了

original: The man is apprehensively poking a pile of papers with a stick
translate: 那人紧张地用棍子戳着一堆文件

original: Where’d that little bastard go?
translate: 那个小混蛋去哪儿了？

original: Let me see your wares!
translate: 让我看看你的货品！

original: I have your vomit cups!
translate: 我有你的呕吐杯！

original: I have only the finest wares
translate: 我只有最好的货品

original: #HorrynSmugglerArmandScene
translate: #霍里恩走私商阿曼德场景

original: The fuck do you want?
translate: 你想要什么？

original: Armand’s eyes narrow threateningly as you approach
translate: 当你靠近时，阿曼德的双眼威胁性地眯了起来

original: What's the fastest way out of the rat maze?
translate: 离开这个鼠穴最快的方式是什么？

original: Afraid of the dark are you?
translate: 你害怕黑暗吗？

original: Don’t like the rats nipping at your heels?
translate: 不喜欢老鼠在你脚后跟咬吗？

original: Well I suggest you get the fuck back to whereever you came from
translate: 我建议你快滚回你来的那个地方

original: Go north, east, north, east and then north again
translate: 往北，东，北，东，然后再往北

original: And don’t come back!
translate: 别想再回来了！

original: #HorrynSmugglerArtPeddlerScene
translate: #霍林走私商贩场景

original: Ah, surprised to find a man of such taste in a place like this, are you?
translate: 哦，没想到在这个地方会遇到一个品味如此高雅的男子。

original: He chuckles sadly
translate: 他悲伤地笑了笑。

original: I once sold my wares in the Silver Halls of Vauul
translate: 我曾经在瓦乌尔的银厅里兜售我的商品。

original: Only the very richest would even be allowed across the threshold of my establishment
translate: 只有最最富有的人才会被允许踏入我店铺的门槛。

original: Alas, for some reason I cannot fathom, the Empire took a dislike to the way I conducted my business, and I had to find a more…discreet location
translate: 可怜的是，不知为何，帝国对我经商的方式产生了反感，我不得不寻找一个更加……隐秘的地方。

original: The man clears his throat nervously
translate: 那人紧张地清了清喉咙。

original: Put simply, the Underhalls are the perfect venue for a man of my caliber to blossom without the prying eyes of tax-collectors and Inquisitors
translate: 简单来说，地下厅是适合我这种身份的人展示才华的完美场所，无需担心税务官和审问者的窥探。

original: The scenery isn’t exactly ideal, but I am resigned to suffer in silence!
translate: 场景并不理想，但我只能默默忍受了！

original: Mind if I ask some more questions?
translate: 请问还有其他问题想问吗？

original: You come across a conspicuously well-dressed man selling what appear to be an odd assortment of precious items and pieces of art
translate: 你遇到了一个明显衣着考究的男子，他正在兜售一些看起来很奇特的珍贵物品和艺术品。

original: He looks remarkably out of place amongst the shadows of the Underhalls
translate: 他显得格外格格不入，与地下厅的阴影格格不入。

original: Hail and well met!
translate: 欢迎光临！

original: He proclaims, tipping his hat at you
translate: 他向你敬礼，大声说道。

original: Tis plain to me that you are people with a keen understanding of the finer things!
translate: 从你身上可以看出，你们是懂得欣赏美好事物的人。

original: What say you to peruse some of the finest art in all-the Empire?
translate: 你们愿意欣赏帝国所有最精美的艺术吗？

original: Even the most superficial of examinations reveals that most of these “art pieces” are barely competent knock-offs and forgeries, a fact that the art dealer seems utterly unashamed by
translate: 即使是最浅显的观察也能看出，这些所谓的“艺术品”大多只是勉强合格的仿制品和伪造品，而这位艺术品商似乎对此毫不羞愧。

original: His place here makes a lot more sense now
translate: 现在我明白了他在这里的原因。

original: I might have some questions for you!
translate: 我可能有一些问题要问你！

original: The dealer tips his hat once more
translate: 经理再次摘下帽子

original: I would be most delighted to assist!
translate: 我非常乐意帮忙！

original: What would you like to know?
translate: 想知道些什么？

original: Let me see if I have any artifacts for you
translate: 让我看看我有没有适合你的宝物

original: I wish to see your wares!
translate: 我想看看你的货品！

original: What do you do here beyond selling fake art?
translate: 除了卖假艺术品，你们还在这里做什么？

original: If it isn’t my favorite soon-to-be customers!
translate: 哦，我的最爱即将光顾的客人！

original: How may I assist you?
translate: 有什么可以帮到你的吗？

original: Let's talk a bit
translate: 我们可以聊一聊

original: An athame
translate: 一把巫刀

original: The man whispers as he carefully strokes the blade
translate: 那个男人轻柔地抚摸着刀刃低声说

original: We can only begin to imagine the acts that have been performed with this blade!
translate: 这把刀肯定被用来干过无数勾当！

original: How does 1200 sound?
translate: 1200金币怎么样？

original: Deal!
translate: 成交！

original: No thanks
translate: 不用了，谢谢

original: Suit yourself
translate: 由你

original: Do you have anything else?
translate: 还有其他的东西吗？

original: I have this!
translate: 我有这个！

original: Show the Nautical Guild Seal
translate: 展示航海公会的印记

original: How about this?
translate: 这个怎么样？

original: Show the idol from the Santa Fury treasure
translate: 展示从圣怒宝藏中找到的偶像

original: Look at this!
translate: 看这个！

original: Show the black dagger from under the lighthouse
translate: 展示灯塔下面的黑匕首

original: Not for now
translate: 现在还不行

original: Let's talk a bit instead
translate: 我们先聊一会儿吧

original: Could these be worth something?
translate: 这些东西可能会有价值吗？

original: Show the Reaver Tablets
translate: 展示掠夺者石板

original: I’d be more than happy to see any curios you might be carrying!
translate: 任何奇珍异宝你都愿意让我看看！

original: The merchant rubs his hands together
translate: 商人搓了搓手

original: Extraordinary!
translate: 真是太棒了！

original: The man’s eyes seem to glitter with an unnatural sheen for a moment
translate: 那个人的眼睛在一瞬间散发出不自然的光芒

original: Now this is the type of item I came here to find
translate: 这正是我来这里寻找的物品

original: It’s… uncanny
translate: 这……真是诡异

original: He turns it slowly over in his hands
translate: 他慢慢转动着手中的物品

original: I must have it! 1500 gold!
translate: 我一定要得到它！1500金币！

original: Ahh, I know this!
translate: 啊，我知道这个！

original: The man eagerly examines the seal
translate: 那个人急切地检查着封印

original: This is a Captain’s seal from the Nautical Guild
translate: 这是海事公会船长的封印

original: They are quite protective of these, you know
translate: 他们对这些东西保护得很严密

original: I’ll give you 1000 gold for it!
translate: 我给你1000金币！

original: The man traces the intricate carvings with his fingertips
translate: 那人用指尖触摸着复杂的雕刻图案

original: This is ancient, you know
translate: 这是古老的，你知道

original: Carved in a time before
translate: 雕刻在那些时光之前

original: No, it’s best not to think of such things
translate: 不，最好不要去想这些事情

original: What I can tell you is that there are certain collectors who would pay a great deal for these!
translate: 我能告诉你的是，有一些收藏家愿意为这些物品支付一大笔钱！

original: How does 1000 gold sound?
translate: 1000金币听起来怎么样？

original: You have a gut feeling these might still prove useful!
translate: 你有一种直觉，这些可能仍然会很有用！

original: The dealer lets out a dramatic sigh
translate: 唉，我的一些商品可能来源……有些可疑……但请不要误解，我不是骗子！

original: Alas, some of my wares may be of…questionable origin…but make no mistake, I am no con-artist!
translate: 我只是一个对奇异和不寻常物品充满热情的人！

original: I am simply a man with a passion for strange and unusual objects!
translate: 而且外岛恰好充满了它们！

original: And the Outer Isles just so happens to be rife with them!
translate: 探险者们发现它们，然后卖给我，我确保它们以……公平的价格到达大陆上的买家手中

original: Explorers find them, sell them on to me, and I make sure they reach buyers on the mainland for a… fair price
translate: 这合法吗？

original: Is that legal?
translate: 让我看看我有没有什么

original: Let me see if I have anything
translate: 并不是真的

original: Not exactly
translate: 但报酬很好，而且能让我的客户满意，所以如果你在旅行中发现任何奇怪的物品，一定要带给我！

original: But it pays well and keeps my customers happy, so if you find any strange items on your travels, be sure to bring them to me!
translate: 他环顾四周，神秘兮兮地

original: He looks around conspiratorially
translate: 当然，要保密

original: Discreetly, of course
translate: 当然要保密

original: #HorrynSmugglerBlacksmithScene
translate: #霍林走私铁匠场景

original: Eh, when yer mother squeezes you out in the shit and mud of the back-streets of Adler’s and leaves ya fer dead, yer fucked for choices ...I was lucky enough ta be taken in by the Queen herself
translate: 唉，当你母亲把你丢在艾德勒后街的粪土和泥泞中，把你丢弃不管，你就没有选择的余地了……我有幸被女王本人收留

original: Saw something in me did she
translate: 她看中了我

original: Probably wouldn’t be standin’ ere if not for ‘er!
translate: 要不是她，我恐怕站都站不稳！

original: His gaze goes distant in the way that teen boys sometime do
translate: 他的眼神变得遥远，就像青少年男孩有时会有的那样

original: You were saying?
translate: 你在说什么？

original: Anyway, seens as I am ‘ere an all, if ya happen across any weapons ya ain’t partial to on your travels, make sure to drop by, eh?
translate: 话说回来，既然我在这里，如果你在旅途中遇到任何不喜欢的武器，记得来我这里看看，好吗？

original: I’m sure to have sumthin’ more your style
translate: 我肯定会有更符合你口味的东西

original: You stop before a slightly disheveled young man selling a variety of weapons and armor in a dimly lit corner of the hall
translate: 你们停在了一个略显凌乱的年轻男子面前，他正在昏暗的大厅一角出售各种武器和防具

original: ‘Ello there, free-sword!
translate: 哦，你好，无剑客！

original: He flashes you a wasteland of spice-stained teeth in what passes for a smile
translate: 他露出一口满是香料污渍的牙齿，勉强算是笑了笑

original: Fancy takin’ a look at some of ma wares?
translate: 想看看我这里的一些货色吗？

original: Come back any time, free-sword!
translate: 无剑客，随时欢迎回来！

original: An remember, there ain’t no better way of getting respect than what cold steel buys ya!
translate: 记住，没有什么比冷兵器能赢得更多的尊重了！

original: I'd like to ask some questions
translate: 我想问一些问题

original: What can I do for ya, free-sword?
translate: 无剑客，有什么可以为你效劳的吗？

original: Welcome back, Free-sword!
translate: 再见了，无剑客！

original: Need something to stick someone with?
translate: 需要一些能刺穿人的东西吗？

original: #HorrynSmugglerFoodScene
translate: #霍林走私者食物场景

original: She offers you another kind smile
translate: 她再次露出一个友善的笑容

original: You may ask whatever you wish!
translate: 你可以问你想问的任何问题！

original: Is this really safe to eat?
translate: 这真的安全可以吃吗？

original: Show me your wares!
translate: 展示你的货物！

original: Of course it is!
translate: 当然可以！

original: she replies hastily as you stare at the food with no small amount of dubiousness
translate: 她连忙回答，而你则带着不小的怀疑盯着食物看

original: Everythin’ you see here is the finest, almost-fresh grub the Empire has to offer!
translate: 这里所有的东西都是帝国最新鲜的佳肴！

original: Almost-fresh?
translate: 新鲜？

original: She shifts uncomfortably
translate: 她有些不自在地挪动了一下

original: Well, no ones ever lived to complain, if that’s what yer worried about!
translate: 好吧，如果你担心他们没活下来抱怨，那就不用担心！

original: The scent of foreign spices and not-quite-familiar meats assaults your senses as you approach what appears to be a food stall
translate: 当你走近一个似乎摆着食物摊位时，一股异域香料和不太熟悉的肉味扑鼻而来

original: Your interest is noted by a red-faced woman who welcomes you with a wide, genuine smile
translate: 一个满脸通红的女人注意到了你的兴趣，她用真诚的笑容迎接你

original: Fine day for some grub, wouldn’t you say?
translate: 今天是个吃东西的好日子，不是吗？

original: she grins, gesturing to the array of ‘mysterious’ meats on display
translate: 她笑着，指着展示的各种“神秘”肉类

original: I’ve got somethin’ for everyone, from the delectable richness of city-pork to the more comforting subtlety of the finest roof-chicken!
translate: 从城市猪肉的美味丰富到最精致的屋顶鸡的温婉可口，应有尽有！

original: And people actually eat this?
translate: 真有人吃这些？

original: Like ravenous rats!
translate: 像饥饿的老鼠一样！

original: Trick is, if you season it just right, it all tastes like chicken anyways
translate: 关键是，如果你调味得当，它们尝起来都像鸡肉

original: So they keep filling my purse and I keep filling their bellies
translate: 所以他们不断给我钱，而我不断给他们填饱肚子

original: Hmm, if you say so
translate: 嗯，你说的有道理

original: Welcome back!
translate: 欢迎回来！

original: Need somethin’ to fill yer belly for the road ahead?
translate: 需要一些食物填饱肚子，准备上路吗？

original: #HorrynSmugglerSentrySpotted
translate: #霍林走私哨兵发现

original: Hey!
translate: 嘿！

original: You’re not welcome in this part of the underhalls!
translate: 你不被允许进入这个地方！

original: Queen’s orders
translate: 国王的命令

original: Get out of here and don’t let me catch you here again!
translate: 离开这里，别让我再抓到你！

original: The guard firmly escorts you out of the area and deposits you in the guard-room by the entrance
translate: 士兵们坚定地将你从区域中带出，并把你安置在入口附近的守卫室里

original: #HorrynSmugglerTrinketsScene
translate: #HorrynSmugglerTrinketsScene

original: The stall before you is crammed full of various trinkets and knick-knacks precariously balanced atop of one another
translate: 你面前的摊位堆满了各种各样的小饰品和奇珍异宝，它们被小心翼翼地堆叠在一起

original: As you approach, a wiry young man with a horribly pock-marked face offers you an excited grin
translate: 当你走近时，一个瘦削的年轻人，脸上布满了可怕的痘疤，向你露出兴奋的笑容

original: On the hunt for some treasure, my fellow-adventurer
translate: 寻找一些财宝，我的同伴

original: Then you’ve come to the right place!
translate: 你来对地方了！

original: Everythin’ you see here has been carefully collected by yours truly!
translate: 你看到的一切都是我精心收集的！

original: he gestures to the stall
translate: 他指向摊位

original: You wouldn’t believe the stuff just left layin’ around out there!
translate: 你绝对无法想象外面散落着的东西！

original: Only the other day, I found a one-of-a-kind-necklace just discarded in the mud….it was next to a corpse, mind, but it was in no condition to argue if ya know what I mean!
translate: 就在几天前，我在泥泞中发现了一条独一无二的项链……而且旁边还有一具尸体，但那东西显然没有争论的余地！

original: It is clear from the merchant’s ramblings that his way of securing his wares isn’t exactly legal
translate: 从商人的唠叨中可以看出，他获取货物的方式并不合法

original: But what down here is?
translate: 但这里有什么是合法的呢？

original: You suppose it won't hurt to find out more
translate: 你猜也许弄清楚更多情况也没什么坏处

original: Ah, the life of an adventurer is a dangerous one, but it’s worth it for loot like this!
translate: 噢，冒险者的生涯是危险的，但为了这样的财宝，这一切都是值得的！

original: He gestures enthusiastically to his stall
translate: 他兴奋地指向他的摊位

original: I’ve braved some of the most disgusting sewers and dug through the trash of some of the finest men in the Empire in order to obtain such coveted wares!
translate: 我曾冒过一些最恶心的下水道的风险，并且在帝国最优秀的男人们丢弃的垃圾中挖掘，才获得了如此珍贵的货物！

original: That sounds...interesting
translate: 听起来……挺有趣的

original: Sadly, I can’t always be out explorin’...especially not during the day
translate: 可惜我不能总是在外面探险……尤其是白天

original: he coughs awkwardly
translate: 他尴尬地咳嗽了一声

original: So if you’ve got any treasures of your own you’d be happy partin’ with, make sure to pay me a visit!
translate: 所以如果你有自己想要出手的财宝，记得来找我哦！

original: The young rogue excitedly licks his lips
translate: 年轻的盗贼兴奋地舔了舔嘴唇

original: Want to know more about my treasures, do you?
translate: 你想了解更多关于我的财宝吗？

original: I’d be happy to tell you anything you want to know!
translate: 我愿意告诉你你想知道的一切！

original: Where did you come across these 'treasures'?
translate: 这些‘财宝’你是从哪里找到的？

original: Let's see what you have!
translate: 让我们看看你有什么吧！

original: The young rascal is picking intently at a bloody scab when he excitedly notices you
translate: 年轻的小淘气正专注地抠着一个血痂，突然兴奋地注意到你

original: Welcome back, fellow-adventurer!
translate: 欢迎回来，同行的冒险者！

original: Found worthwhile loot?
translate: 发现有价值的战利品了吗？

original: #RatQueensArmor
translate: #RatQueensArmor

original: An exquisitely crafted set of armor that no doubt belongs to the queen of the underhalls
translate: 一套工艺精美的盔甲，毫无疑问属于地下迷宫的女王

original: Kat’s eyes seem to sparkle as she admires it
translate: 卡特的眼睛似乎闪烁着光芒，她欣赏着盔甲

original: Take the armor
translate: 拿走盔甲吧

original: You carefully remove the beautiful set of armor from the stand and stash it in your backpack
translate: 你小心翼翼地将这套美丽的盔甲从展架上取下，收进了背包

original: #UnderhallsFungusCluster
translate: #UnderhallsFungusCluster

original: A cluster of giant 'vomit cup' fungi grow in these cave
translate: 这些洞穴里长着一大簇巨大的‘呕吐杯’菌类

original: They emit an odor so foul you would only touch them if you were paid to do so
translate: 它们散发出一种极其难闻的气味，除非有人付钱，否则你绝不会碰它们的

original: Carefully gather some of the caps for Esteban
translate: 仔细收集一些埃斯泰班的帽子

original: You slice off a few of the larger caps and place them in a bag
translate: 你切下几顶较大的帽子，放入一个袋子里

original: The stench is almost overwhelming
translate: 恶臭几乎让人难以忍受

original: The stench is overwhelming and leaves you stricken with nausea
translate: 恶臭令人难以忍受，让你感到恶心

original: # Chapter_1_HorrynWalls
translate: # 第一章_霍林城墙

original: #EnteringHorryn
translate: #进入霍林

original: The gates stand conspicuously open, and you step carefully through into the ghost-town
translate: 门敞开着，你小心翼翼地走进这个鬼镇

original: As if in greeting, a swarm of vermin pours out of every doorway and crevice towards you, covering the street in a mangy, skittering carpet
translate: 就像在欢迎你一样，成群的害虫从每一个门道和缝隙中涌出，覆盖了街道，形成了一层肮脏、爬行的地毯

original: You set your feet, ready to meet the living tide - but the rats part, scurrying past you and out beyond the gates
translate: 你稳住脚步，准备迎接这活生生的潮水——但老鼠们让开了，迅速从你身边穿过，穿过大门

original: Sewer rats
translate: 下水道的老鼠

original: So why are they all above ground?
translate: 为什么它们都在地面上？

original: And in such a hurry
translate: 而且还在这么急匆匆地跑

original: Roland asks as he stomps on a stray rodent
translate: 罗兰踩着一只流浪的老鼠问道

original: Driina wades unperturbed into the tide of vermin
translate: 迪莉娜毫不在意地踏入了害虫的潮水

original: Our path leads through this sea of filth!
translate: 我们的路穿过这片污秽的海洋！

original: Onwards!
translate: 前进！

original: From the stink of them, you guess they're sewer rats
translate: 从它们的恶臭中，你猜测它们是下水道的老鼠

original: You wonder what could have driven them above ground in such numbers
translate: 你好奇是什么驱使它们以如此多的数量出现在地面上

original: #HorrynFishermanGates
translate: #霍林渔夫大门

original: For the refugees in the camp, hunger and disease is the greatest danger for now
translate: 对于营地中的难民来说，饥饿和疾病现在是最大的威胁

original: Until we find a way to enter the city, we must do what we can to deal with the problems at hand
translate: 在我们找到进入城市的办法之前，我们必须尽我们所能解决眼前的问题

original: Finding food and medicine
translate: 寻找食物和药品

original: I say we return to the camp and offer our help Marcus the chamberlain
translate: 我说我们应该返回营地，向马库斯财政大臣提供帮助

original: He's holed up in the stable
translate: 他躲在马厩里

original: People are dying inside as we stand here
translate: 就在这儿，人们正在里面死去

original: I swore an oath to fight for those who cannot and every second we waste here I desecrate that oath
translate: 我发誓要为那些无法自保的人而战，而我们在这里浪费的每一秒都在亵渎我的誓言

original: There are people dying outside these walls as well
translate: 城墙外也有人们在死去

original: What do we suggest we do?
translate: 我们建议怎么做？

original: A large, worn steel gate bars this entrance
translate: 一扇巨大的、磨损的铁门挡住了这个入口

original: You shake it and find it securely locked with no visible way of forcing it open
translate: 你摇晃它，发现它被牢牢锁住，没有任何明显的办法可以强行打开

original: Looking around, you take in the battlements of the walled city
translate: 四处看看，你注意到城墙上的雉堞

original: For a city this size, they are impressive
translate: 对于这样一个规模的城市来说，它们非常 impressive

original: As if reading your mind Roland offers laconically
translate: 罗兰仿佛猜到了你的想法，简短地说

original: These walls were built to keep people out
translate: 这些城墙是为阻止人们进入而建造的

original: They seem to be doing a good job
translate: 看起来它们做得很好

original: It may prove more difficult than you originally thought to find a way into the city
translate: 要找到进入这座城市的方法可能比你最初想象的要困难得多

original: Though you feel certain that clues to Embla’s fate lie inside the beleaguered city, it seems that for now, fate has conspired to place an insurmountable obstacle in your way
translate: 尽管你确信埃姆bla的命运线索可能就藏在被围困的城市里，但现在看来，命运似乎已经设下了一道无法逾越的障碍

original: Until a solution presents itself, you must look elsewhere for purpose and surely there are many on this accursed island whose life will depend on your resolve
translate: 在找到解决方案之前，你们必须另寻目的，肯定在这该死的岛屿上还有许多人的生命依赖于你们的决心

original: Driina lets out an uncharacteristic scream of rage as she kicks the door heavily before slumping down against the wall
translate: 德里娜发出一阵不寻常的愤怒尖叫，重重地踢了踢门，然后瘫倒在墙上。

original: As in response to her anger, somewhere deep inside the beleaguered city a manic laughter cackles briefly
translate: 作为对她的愤怒的回应，这座被围困的城市深处传来一阵狂喜的尖笑声。

original: Are you okay?
translate: 你还好吧？

original: What do we do now?
translate: 现在我们要怎么办？

original: Driina looks up and casts a sorrowful gaze out across the ocean
translate: 德里娜抬起头，悲伤地凝视着远方的大海。

original: Foaming surfs beat the shore and gulls cry greedily overhead
translate: 泡沫翻腾的海浪拍打着海岸，海鸥在上空贪婪地嘶叫着。

original: She sniffles and wipes her eyes as her face stiffens into a resolute mask
translate: 她抽泣着擦去眼泪，脸上绷紧了一副坚定的表情。

original: You’re right
translate: 你说得对。

original: The poor wretches huddling in the camp are hardly better off
translate: 那些蜷缩在营地里的可怜人处境也好不到哪里去。

original: For now, we need to do what we can for them
translate: 现在，我们必须尽力帮助他们。

original: What do you suggest we do?
translate: 你有什么建议？

original: #HorrynGates
translate: #霍里恩之门

original: The gates to Horryn loom before you
translate: 霍里恩的城门矗立在你面前。

original: The massive portcullis is down, however, and there's no way to open it from this side
translate: 然而，巨大的吊桥已经放下，从这里无法打开它。

original: On the other side, you see the dead, piled atop one another, up against the portcullis
translate: 对面，你可以看到一具具尸体堆叠在一起，紧靠着吊桥。

original: They must have died trying to escape the town, caught between the gates and whatever assailants were in the town with them
translate: 他们一定是试图逃离小镇时死在这里的，被吊桥和镇上的袭击者夹在中间。

original: Driina's face is ashen
translate: 德里娜的脸色苍白。

original: I knew these people
translate: 我认识这些人。

original: I delivered their children and cared for their dead
translate: 我接生过他们的孩子，照料过他们的死者。

original: To see them like this
translate: 看到他们变成这样，

original: I will have vengeance
translate: 我要复仇

original: She sets her jaw
translate: 她紧咬牙关

original: There is another way
translate: 还有另一条路

original: The Fisherman's Gate
translate: 渔夫之门

original: We follow the walls east, and then south
translate: 我们沿着城墙向东，然后向南行进

original: The town beyond the gate seems entirely still, and empty
translate: 城门之外的小镇似乎完全寂静，空无一人

original: But you doubt you've seen an end to the horrors within
translate: 但你怀疑自己并未看到内部恐怖的终结

original: In any case, you must find another way in
translate: 无论如何，你必须找到另一条进入的方法

original: #HorrynHogs
translate: #霍里恩野猪

original: The small farmhouse seems desolate and abandoned
translate: 这座小农舍显得荒凉而废弃

original: The only sign of life is a pack of grotesquely swollen hogs, feeding greedily on something deep in the mud
translate: 唯一的生机动向是一群异常肿胀的野猪，在泥泞中贪婪地觅食

original: When you catch a glimpse through a brief break in the frenzy, you realize it's the corpses of what must have been their former owners
translate: 当你在狂乱中瞥见时，你意识到它们正在啃食那些显然是它们前任主人的尸体

original: Infernal swine
translate: 炼狱野猪

original: Driina spits behind you
translate: 德里娜在你身后吐了一口唾沫

original: These hogs look like more than a handfull
translate: 这些野猪看起来不止一群

original: Best be careful lest we all end up with a tusk in the gut
translate: 最好小心，否则我们都可能中弹肠穿

original: Roland grumbles
translate: 洛兰嘟囔着

original: The grotesquely hulking swine look like they'd happily make you their next meal, if you were to disturb them
translate: 这些异常庞大的野猪看起来会很乐意将你当作它们的下一餐，如果你打扰到它们

original: Carry on
translate: 继续前进

original: #HorrynSpiral1
translate: #霍里恩螺旋1

original: #HorrynSurvivor
translate: #霍林幸存者

original: That's what the Reavers call 'im
translate: 那是掠夺者们叫他的名字

original: Far as I know, he became the head of the Fishermen's Lodge
translate: 就我所知，他成了渔民协会的首领

original: Must be the one who turned 'em to reavin'
translate: 一定是那个把他们变成掠夺者的家伙

original: But I aint never seen 'im afore and I've been in Horryn my whole life
translate: 但我这辈子从没见过他，而且我整个生活在霍林

original: He must be an outsider
translate: 他一定是外人

original: I had another question
translate: 我还有一个问题

original: We must be on our way!
translate: 我们必须出发了！

original: When the Reavers went amok, they butchered folks in the street where they found them
translate: 当掠夺者们肆虐时，他们在街上找到的人被屠杀

original: But that was only in the beginning
translate: 但那只是开始

original: Once they had control of the city, they started dragging people from their houses, roundin' 'em up
translate: 一旦他们控制了城市，就开始从人们的家中拖人，把他们聚集起来

original: Only the eldest and youngest were... finished off first
translate: 年长者和年幼者……首先被……处理了

original: I can't get my head around it
translate: 我无法理解这一切

original: One of the Reavers made 'em let me go
translate: 有一个掠夺者让我放了他

original: Tore me from her grasp, and told me to run to the camp north of town to tell the folks there that their loved-ones would be waitin' for 'em at the keep with
translate: 他从她的手中挣脱，告诉我跑到镇北的营地，告诉那里的人们，他们的亲人会在堡垒等着他们

original: Father
translate: 父亲

original: If we don't get her back before they reach the keep, she'll be dead or worse on the morrow
translate: 如果我们不能在他们到达堡垒之前把她带回来，她明天就会死或者更糟

original: I need some information first
translate: 我需要一些信息

original: A gaunt figure shambles out of the fog towards you
translate: 一个瘦削的身影从雾中蹒跚着向你走来

original: The man is emaciated and covered in filth
translate: 那个男人瘦骨嶙峋，浑身污秽

original: He looks with exhausted eyes and stops dead in his tracks as he notices you
translate: 他疲惫地瞪着双眼，注意到你时突然停下了脚步

original: His eyes wide in terror but his body too frail to flee
translate: 他眼中满是恐惧，但身体太虚弱无法逃跑

original: Please, don't kill me!
translate: 求求你，别杀我！

original: the withered looking man cries out, as he cowers before you
translate: 那个枯瘦的男人喊叫着，颤抖着跪在你面前

original: I'm Philip!
translate: 我是菲利普！

original: Just a fisherman
translate: 只是一个渔夫

original: Please, help me, my wife is still trapped inside the city, and... and
translate: 求求你，帮我，我妻子还在城里，还有...

original: And what?
translate: 还有什么？

original: What is going inside the walls?
translate: 城墙里发生了什么事？

original: I beg of you, find Natia
translate: 求求你，救救娜蒂亚

original: She's all I got since our boy passed!
translate: 自从我们儿子去世后，她就是我唯一的依靠！

original: And she yet lives... you'll know by her green dress and long, auburn hair
translate: 她还活着……你可以通过她绿色的裙子和长长的红棕色头发认出她

original: If there are survivors left inside Horryn, it is my duty to save them
translate: 如果霍林城内还有幸存者，我的职责就是去拯救他们

original: Driina says, as you turn to go
translate: 达里娜说，当你转身离去时

original: Survivors or not - this stinks of a trap
translate: 无论有没有幸存者——这里充满了陷阱的味道

original: Roland interjects
translate: 洛朗插话道

original: As if to echo the man's woe, a lone wail rings out from somewhere behind the city walls
translate: 仿佛在回应男人的悲痛，一声孤独的哀嚎从城墙上空某个地方传来

original: The Fishermen's Lodge!
translate: 渔夫会堂！

original: Some of my fellows joined - to share in the catch and ensure none went hungry!
translate: 我的一些同伴加入了——为了分享收获，确保无人挨饿！

original: I thought about joining myself, as their nets seemed overflowing as of late
translate: 我也想过加入，因为他们的渔网最近似乎总是满的

original: Since Father took charge, I been told
translate: 自从父亲接手以来，我被告知

original: But how can the Lodge go from sharing fish to reaving their own kin?
translate: 但酒馆怎么会从分享鱼肉变成掠夺自己的亲人呢？

original: The man frets uncomfortably
translate: 那人不安地皱眉

original: Reavers?
translate: 掠夺者？

original: Father?
translate: 父亲？

original: The keep?
translate: 防御塔？

original: Lodges?
translate: 酒馆？

original: I need to move on!
translate: 我需要离开这里！

original: How can men reach such cruel lows?
translate: 人们怎么会堕落到如此残忍的地步？

original: I known some of 'em for years, good, honest fishermen - now they've gone mad!
translate: 我认识他们中的一些人好多年了，他们是诚实的渔民——现在他们疯了！

original: It's this 'Father' I tell you!
translate: 就是这位父亲！

original: Him and his outsiders brought this upon us and poisoned the lodges!
translate: 他和他的外乡人把这一切带到了我们身上，并且污染了酒馆！

original: Now they hold the whole bloody city!
translate: 现在他们掌控了整个该死的城市！

original: That is, it’s bloody bedlam in there!
translate: 那是说，里面乱成了一锅粥！

original: Seems to me a few of them, the meanest and hardest are the ones who answer directly to the Father
translate: 看来，那些最凶残、最硬朗的人直接听命于父亲

original: They’re the ones who took Natia and they seem to be holed up in the keep
translate: 他们就是绑架娜蒂亚的人，现在似乎躲在防御塔里

original: Only going outside to get more bodies!
translate: 只有出去找更多的人质！

original: The man shudders
translate: 那人浑身颤抖

original: The ones that still roam the streets ‘ave all lost their minds it seems!
translate: 看起来，那些还在街头游荡的人全都疯了！

original: All of a sudden they started fighting each other and for a while, it seemed they were more concerned with killing each other instead of razing the city!
translate: 突然之间，他们开始互相战斗，有一段时间，他们更关心的是互相残杀而不是摧毁城市！

original: Now they’re all holed up in each their corner of the city it seems
translate: 现在他们似乎都躲在了城市各自的角落里

original: Did you find Natia!?
translate: 你找到娜蒂亚了吗!？

original: What news inside the walls?!
translate: 城墙之内有什么消息!？

original: Philip asks, trembling
translate: 菲利普颤抖着问道

original: Have you found Natia yet?
translate: 你找到娜蒂亚了吗？

original: Please!
translate: 请！

original: I fear it might be too late already!
translate: 我恐怕已经来不及了！

original: I have some questions first
translate: 我先有几个问题

original: Those that are taken were dragged to the keep, and all the remains of 'em are screams... such screams
translate: 被带走的人被拖到了要塞，只剩下他们的尖叫……如此尖锐的尖叫

original: My wife an' I hid fer days with no food or water
translate: 我和妻子藏了几天，没有食物和水

original: By this morning, we couldn't take it no more and made a run for it
translate: 到了今天早上，我们再也忍受不了，决定逃出去

original: They got us before we even got within sight of the gate
translate: 他们甚至在我们看到城门之前就抓住了我们

original: They beat us like mangy dogs, even my Natia... told us Father was waiting for us
translate: 他们像恶狗一样鞭打我们，甚至我的娜蒂亚……告诉我们要等父亲

original: Bloody, forsaken bastards - they'll be dragging her away as we speak!
translate: 该死的，你必须为我救她！

original: By the dead, you have to save her for me!
translate: 为了死去的灵魂，你必须为我救她！

original: She's beautiful!
translate: 她很美丽！

original: She’s got long auburn hair!
translate: 她有一头长长的红发！

original: But you got away?
translate: 你逃出来了？

original: The Governors keep!
translate: 总督的要塞

original: Lies in the south-western part of town
translate: 位于镇西南部

original: You enter it from the docks
translate: 你从码头进入

original: But they have it all sealed up now!
translate: 但他们现在把它都封起来了！

original: Ain’t no way yer getting in there now!
translate: 现在你根本进不去那里！

original: That’s why you have to get to my Natia before they take her there!
translate: 所以你必须在我把娜蒂亚送到那里之前先把她弄走！

original: Please, we’ve wasted too much time already!
translate: 请，我们已经浪费了太多时间了！

original: # Chapter_1_Landing
translate: # 第一章 登陆

original: #Chapter1IdraLandingLuggage
translate: # 第一章伊德拉登船行李

original: Better yet
translate: 更好的是

original: The combination lock remains sound, meaning the content of the chest is likely still unmolested
translate: 组合锁完好无损，这意味着箱子里的东西很可能没有被动过

original: You best not be getting any ideas with my property, little fishy
translate: 你最好别打我财产的主意，小鱼儿

original: Basilo growls as he eyes you suspiciously
translate: 基西洛警惕地盯着你，低吼道

original: I think you mean MY property?
translate: 我想你是说我的财产？

original: Wha.. wha… what’cha mean?
translate: 哦……哦……你是说……

original: That just ‘cause she made you live, now you’re somehow entitled to Basilo’s treasures?
translate: 这仅仅因为你让她给了你生命，你就突然有权要求基西洛的财宝了？

original: Basilo’s the Mother’s chosen!
translate: 基西洛是母亲的宠儿！

original: Not you!
translate: 不是你！

original: Now fuck off and get me that teliscope if you want yer bleeding box!
translate: 现在滚开，老家伙，如果你想拿回你那破箱子，就给我把望远镜拿来！

original: I choose violence you old fool!
translate: 我选择暴力，你这个老糊涂！

original: Basilo looks surprised and stutters incoherently
translate: 基西洛显得惊讶，结结巴巴地说个不停

original: The man’s eyes tear up
translate: 那人的双眼湿润了

original: There’s truth in that!
translate: 这话有道理！

original: Basilo knows it in his bones!
translate: 基西洛骨子里就知道这件事！

original: Pox on you: there’s truth in it!
translate: 该死，这话有道理！

original: Have yer bleeding box
translate: 给你这该死的箱子

original: Basilo goes off to sulk in a corner
translate: 基西洛跑到角落里生闷气去了

original: Open the chest
translate: 打开箱子

original: The chest ahead of you is wet and covered in seaweed
translate: 你面前的箱子湿漉漉的，上面覆盖着海藻

original: It also looks familiar
translate: 而且看起来很熟悉

original: Instantly, you realize this is your luggage from the Zephyr
translate: 立刻，你意识到这正是你从‘疾风’号上托运的行李

original: It had been stowed too well to get to during the mutiny but by some miracle, it made it to shore where it must have been “salvaged
translate: 在叛乱期间，它被妥善地存放，无法在混乱中拿到，但不知怎的，它到了岸边，想必是被“打捞”上岸了

original: What old Mother Maelstrom saw fit to bequeath upon me, I’s keeps
translate: 这是暴风雨之母认为适合赠予我的东西，我会保留它

original: Basilo’s eyes narrow as he fiddles the strap of his club
translate: 基西洛眯起眼睛，摆弄着棍子上的皮带

original: Then again, that’s not to say I mightn’t be willing to make a deal with ya?
translate: 另一方面，也未尝不可能和你达成交易？

original: What did you have in mind?
translate: 你有什么打算？

original: See there’s this man, a stargazer he is, came here a few days ago
translate: 有这么一个人，是个观星者，前几天来到这里

original: Perched hisself on that cliff right over there
translate: 他坐在那边的悬崖上

original: Basilo points to the cliff that rises over the beach to the east
translate: 基西洛指向东边海滩上方高耸的悬崖

original: Thing is, he was carrying something I can hardly put into words
translate: 实际上，他携带的东西难以用言语形容

original: Is like a tube with glass in it that you use to look at the stars and such!
translate: 像一根装着玻璃管的东西，你可以用它来看星星什么的！

original: A telescope?
translate: 望远镜？

original: That’s what he called it!
translate: 他就叫它这样！

original: Old Basilo would love to have it if you can get your way up to where he made camp!
translate: 如果你能弄到老巴西洛扎扎营地的位置，他一定会喜欢这个东西的！

original: There’s meaning in the stars you see - Old wisdom and such
translate: 你在看星星中有意义的东西——古老的智慧之类的。

original: And don’t fret!
translate: 别担心！

original: Basilo saw big ol’ fat crows circling near the camp
translate: 老巴西洛扎看到一群大而肥的乌鸦在营地附近盘旋。

original: I’ll bet Basilo’s eye that the Stargazer’s dead and rotting and his teliscope’s just waiting to be salvaged!
translate: 我敢打赌，巴西洛扎的眼睛，星象家已经死了，腐烂了，他的望远镜正等着被回收呢！

original: I’d rather you just hand my things over
translate: 我宁愿你直接把我的东西给我。

original: Mother Maelstrom’s favored and all
translate: 暴风雨之母最宠爱的就是我。

original: As you hand the telescope over to the wreck-picker his eyes light up in a not wholly sane manner
translate: 当你把望远镜交给废墟拾荒者时，他的眼睛以一种不太正常的方式亮了起来。

original: Chest’s yours little fish!
translate: 胸口是你的了，小家伙！

original: Basilo shouts over his shoulder as he rushes out into the yard with his new prize
translate: 巴西洛扎在院子里冲着你喊，一边匆忙地拿着他的新战利品。

original: If you be nosing around Basilo’s treasures you best have something for me!?
translate: 如果你在巴西洛扎的财宝周围乱逛，最好给我点东西！

original: Basilo barks at you
translate: 巴西洛扎对你吼叫。

original: I have the telescope
translate: 我有那个望远镜。

original: #Chapter1Landing
translate: 第一章 登陆

original: The Shores of Idra
translate: 爱德拉的海岸

original: Slowly, you drag yourself from the cold water onto the relative safety of solid rock
translate: 你慢慢从冰冷的水中爬到相对安全的岩石上。

original: You try, and fail, to stagger forwards as exhaustion washes over you in a great, black wave
translate: 你试图踉跄着向前走，但疲惫像一股巨大的黑色波浪般席卷而来，让你失败了。

original: Oblivion takes you before you hit the rocky ground
translate: 消失在你触碰到坚硬地面之前

original: You're awoken by the cacophonous cries of gulls circling you
translate: 你被周围盘旋的海鸥嘈杂的叫声唤醒

original: Your body is a mass of pain and exhaustion - covered in a thousand cuts and scrapes
translate: 你的身体遍布疼痛与疲惫，满是千疮百孔

original: The large white birds gather around you in eager anticipation
translate: 大群白色的海鸟围绕在你身边，充满期待

original: What a magnificent feast your bloated corpse would make
translate: 你的肥厚尸体会是一顿丰盛的美餐

original: Not today
translate: 不是今天

original: Minutes or perhaps hours pass as you lay unmoving - trying desperately to will some warmth back into your body
translate: 你静静地躺在那里，数分钟或许数小时过去了，努力想要重新温暖你的身体

original: Finally you manage to force your eyes open
translate: 终于，你勉强睁开了眼睛

original: By some miracle you are not only alive, but you find yourself on the shores of the cursed island of Idra
translate: 你奇迹般地活了下来，而且发现自己身处被诅咒的伊德拉岛的岸边

original: Strewn around you is the wreckage of the Zephyr
translate: 周围散落着“西风号”的残骸

original: You see no other survivors
translate: 你没有看到其他幸存者

original: Lest you find equipment and companions soon, you may have cheated death in vain
translate: 你可能只是徒劳地逃过了死神的魔爪

original: #Chapter1LandingCrabCave
translate: #Chapter1LandingCrabCave

original: Large, mis-shapen crabs emerge from the water all around you!
translate: 大大小小、形状扭曲的螃蟹从水中涌出！

original: Intentionally or not, the seemingly mindless beasts have lain an ambush for you!
translate: 无论有意还是无意，这些看似无脑的生物已经为你设下陷阱！

original: Fight
translate: 战斗

original: They took the bodies of the drowned!
translate: 他们夺走了溺水者的尸体！

original: Men and women I’ve known for years!
translate: 我认识多年的男男女女！

original: All blue and swollen
translate: 全身发青，肿胀不堪

original: Dragged them into this cave
translate: 把他们拖进了这个洞穴

original: Crabs as big as horses!
translate: 蟹有马那么大！

original: How can such a thing be?
translate: 这怎么可能？

original: What’s wrong with this place?
translate: 这里有什么不对劲？

original: It occurs to you that the wretch either does not recognize you from the Zephyr or he is too desperate to care
translate: 你意识到那个家伙要么不认识你，要么已经绝望到不在乎

original: In any case, I was too weak to fight back when I landed and they must have thought I was dead
translate: 无论如何，当我落地时我太虚弱无法反抗，他们肯定以为我死了

original: Dragged me into the darkness
translate: 把我拖进了黑暗中

original: But when I heard those sounds, claws rending dead flesh, something awoke in me!
translate: 但当我听到那些声音，爪子撕裂腐肉的声音时，我的斗志被唤醒了！

original: I kicked and screamed as best I could and they let me go!
translate: 我尽可能地踢蹬和尖叫，他们才放了我！

original: I ran as fast as I could but I took a turn in the darkness and ended up here!
translate: 我尽可能快地跑，但在黑暗中转了个弯，结果到了这里！

original: I could hear them moving about in the caves around me and I didn’t dare try to make it out
translate: 我听到周围的洞穴里有动静，不敢尝试逃出去

original: If you hadn’t come here I’d have died from thirst!
translate: 如果你不来，我恐怕会渴死！

original: The way out should be clear for you now!
translate: 你应该能找到出去的路了！

original: A Foul Cave
translate: 一个恶臭的洞穴

original: Eons worth of the sea’s ravage upon the land has given birth to this cave
translate: 无数岁月海洋的侵蚀造就了这个洞穴

original: From its depths, a stench of seaweed and rotting flesh rises
translate: 从它的深处，传来海藻和腐肉的恶臭

original: So foul is it, that it feels like some evil entity attempting to force its way through the pores of your skin, into the core of your being
translate: 恶臭到仿佛有什么邪恶的存在试图通过毛孔侵入你的灵魂深处

original: Try to not vomit
translate: 尽量不要呕吐

original: Your breathing becomes rapid and shallow as your mind is flooded by the image of foul things in the darkness, feasting on the spilling entrails of swollen sea-corpses
translate: 你的呼吸变得急促而浅薄，脑海中充斥着黑暗中恶心事物的画面，它们正在吞噬膨胀的海尸内脏

original: The chamber around you spins and you vomit explosively
translate: 周围的房间开始旋转，你猛烈地呕吐起来

original: Feeling utterly empty, you regain your composure after a few minutes
translate: 感觉空虚至极，你花了几分钟时间重新恢复镇定

original: The narrow passages of the cave ahead seem foreboding
translate: 前方狭窄的洞穴通道似乎充满了不祥之感

original: Steeling your resolve, you manage to calm your breathing
translate: 勉强稳住心神，你设法平复了呼吸

original: Though the stench persists, you manage to push the image of foul things in the darkness, feasting on the spilling entrails of swollen sea-corpses, from your mind
translate: 尽管恶臭依旧，你还是设法将黑暗中那些吞噬肿胀海尸内脏的恶心景象从脑海中驱逐出去

original: You carry on into the darkness
translate: 你继续前行，踏入黑暗之中

original: The corpses of the doomed crew of the Zephyr are arranged around the chambers central column
translate: 被诅咒船队“西风号”船员的尸体围绕着洞室中央的石柱排列着

original: A pale light shines down from an aperture in the vaulted cave ceiling above, illuminating their bloated features and pale blue skin
translate: 从拱顶洞穴天花板上的一个开口中透出微弱的光芒，照亮了他们肿胀的面容和苍白的蓝皮肤

original: Is there a form of artistry to their arrangement?
translate: 这些尸体的排列是否蕴含某种艺术之美？

original: For a brief moment you almost find it… beautiful?
translate: 你几乎在一瞬间就感受到了……那是一种美？

original: The thought comes into your mind unbidden
translate: 这个念头不请自来

original: An interloper
translate: 一个闯入者

original: Stepping between the corpses, you spot a man who you immediately recognize as the Zephyr’s first mate
translate: 踩着尸体之间，你发现了一名你立刻认出是“西风号”大副的男子

original: Around his neck, a sturdy chain glimmers and you carefully fish out a strange octagonal amulet, richly filigreed and with the navigational roset of the Nautical Guild carved on it
translate: 他的脖子上挂着一条坚固的链子，你小心翼翼地从他身上取下一块精美的八边形护身符，雕刻着航海公会的航海玫瑰图案

original: This is no doubt the Captain’s Seal and is apparently an item that the guild will pay handsomely to have returned to them
translate: 这肯定就是船长的徽记，毫无疑问，航海公会会为此支付巨额报酬

original: As you pocket the amulet, you become aware of movement in the waters around you
translate: 当你将护身符收进口袋时，你注意到周围水域中似乎有了动静

original: Strange stalked eyes regard you as several of the chitinous horrors emerge
translate: 奇怪的长眼睛注视着你，几只甲壳怪物从水中浮现

original: No doubt, the abominations have come to feed on the flesh of the dead
translate: 毫无疑问，这些怪物是来吞噬死者的肉身的

original: Or the living
translate: 也可能是为了吞噬活人的

original: Attempt to sneak away
translate: 尝试悄悄逃离

original: Attack the beasts
translate: 攻击这些怪物

original: The abominable creatures snap their claws greedily as they advance towards you!
translate: 这些可怖的生物贪婪地张开利爪，向你逼近！

original: No doubt intending to make you part of their gruesome display!
translate: 毫无疑问，它们打算把你变成他们那恐怖展示的一部分！

original: You carefully step away from corpse and begin to try and make your way out of the horrid chamber
translate: 你小心翼翼地避开尸体，开始尝试着从这个可怕的房间中逃出去。

original: Curse me, I have to get out of this hole!
translate: 着急了，我必须从这个洞里出去！

original: I don’t even know how long I’ve been in here?
translate: 我甚至不知道自己在这里待了多久？

original: It’s like time doesn’t pass right but I’ve not died from thirst yet so it can’t be that long!
translate: 时间似乎停滞不前，但我还没有渴死，所以时间可能没有过去很久！

original: I just need to get out!
translate: 我只需要出去！

original: Explain the way to the exit
translate: 请解释通向出口的路

original: Hold on
translate: 等一下

original: A strangely haunting piping can be heard from the caves ahead
translate: 前方洞穴中传来一种诡异的呜咽声

original: Surely it must be the wind?
translate: 当然，那一定是风吧？

original: Then again, it rises and falls with an eerie sense of musicality that does nothing to set your mind at ease
translate: 但那声音忽高忽低，带着一种令人不安的音乐感，让你的心更加不安

original: Forge ahead
translate: 前进吧

original: You had nearly grown accustomed to the foul stench that lingers in these caves, but now it once more assaults your senses with renewed vigor!
translate: 你几乎已经习惯了这些洞穴中弥漫的恶臭，但现在它再次以更加强烈的势头侵袭你的感官！

original: Rolling out of the eastern passage like so many black tendrils probing for a way into the very core of your being
translate: 像无数黑色的触须从东方通道滚出，探向你灵魂的核心
