original: Whatever lies ahead must be at the center of the rot that permeates this pit
translate: 无论前方有什么，都一定是这个坑中腐烂之源的中心

original: Forge ahead!
translate: 前进吧！

original: You vomit violently and the sounds of your retching echoes through the chamber around you
translate: 你剧烈呕吐，呕吐的声音在房间中回荡

original: With each spasm, your gasping draws in another lung-full of the tainted air until you feel permeated by the foulness
translate: 每一次痉挛，你喘息着吸入更多被污染的空气，直到你感到被恶臭彻底包围

original: Where do you end and the filth begin?
translate: 你和污秽之间，到底有什么界限？

original: Through grit alone, you refuse to let the foulness find purchase and you fight down the nausea that wells up inside you
translate: 仅凭坚韧，你拒绝让那污秽之物找到立足之地，与涌上心头的恶心感抗争

original: A Survivor
translate: 幸存者

original: Who... who goes there?
translate: 谁……谁在那里？

original: A haggard man dressed in the livery of the Nautical Guild huddles apprehensively in the corner of the small chamber you’re standing in
translate: 一个面容憔悴、穿着航海公会制服的男人蜷缩在你所在的小房间角落里，显得十分紧张

original: His lips are dry and cracked and he appears to be parched
translate: 他的嘴唇干裂，看起来极度口渴

original: Please tell me you’ve found a way out of this pit!
translate: 请告诉我，你已经找到逃出这个坑道的方法了！

original: I have!
translate: 我找到了！

original: What are you doing here?
translate: 你在这里做什么？

original: The desperate man wastes no time scrambling past you and towards fresh air and relative safety
translate: 那个绝望的男人毫不犹豫地从你身边爬过，奔向新鲜空气和相对的安全

original: That was Ari!
translate: 那是阿里！

original: Kat seems flustered
translate: 凯特似乎很慌乱

original: Poor bastard
translate: 真可怜

original: Sounds like he’s losing his mind the way he was talking!
translate: 听他说话的样子，简直像是疯了！

original: Trapped down here for days?
translate: 被困在这里好几天？

original: He’s an arse but he didn’t deserve that
translate: 他确实是个混蛋，但他不配受到那样的对待

original: None of them did
translate: 他们都不配

original: Andry
translate: 安德里

original: Thanks for finding a way out of that bloody cave!
translate: 谢谢你找到了逃出那个该死的洞穴的方法！

original: If them crabs hadn't gotten me, the thirst would have
translate: 要不是那些螃蟹，就是口渴会要了我的命

original: Can you imagine?
translate: 你能想象吗？

original: Slowly going insane in the darkness
translate: 慢慢地在黑暗中变得疯狂

original: All alone and dying?
translate: 孤身一人，即将死去？

original: Thank you so much!
translate: 非常感谢！

original: I'll live to see another day!
translate: 我还要活到明天！

original: By the Golden Dead I’ll be mending my wicked ways if I make it out of here!
translate: 金死神在上，如果我能活着出去，我一定会改邪归正！

original: No more dice and whoring!
translate: 再也不要骰子和妓女了！

original: #Chapter1LandingFarm
translate: #第一章登岛农庄

original: Derelict Farm
translate: 荒废农庄

original: The small farm is overgrown and derelict and it appears to be abandoned
translate: 这个小农庄杂草丛生，荒废已久，看起来已经被遗弃了

original: At one point, you muse, this must have been a quaint place
translate: 你不禁思索，曾经这里一定是个宁静的地方

original: A good spot to raise a family perhaps?
translate: 或许是个抚养家庭的好地方？

original: Suddenly, as if summoned by your very thoughts, the faint but unmistakable sound of children’s laughter is carried on the wind
translate: 突然，仿佛被你思绪召唤，微弱却清晰可辨的孩童笑声随风传来

original: The sound is oddly distorted with a strange echoing quality and for some reason it chills you to your bones
translate: 声音有些扭曲，带着奇怪的回响，不知为何让你浑身一寒

original: The sound is interrupted by a woman’s cry of pain, or perhaps sorrow
translate: 声音被女人痛苦的尖叫声打断，或许是一阵哀嚎

original: #Chapter1LandingKat
translate: #第一章登岛凯特

original: Are you sure?
translate: 你确定吗？

original: I would have thought it safer to not go alone
translate: 我原以为独自行动不太安全

original: On second thought, let's travel together
translate: 再想想，我们还是同行吧

original: Yes, I'm sure
translate: 是的，我确定

original: I would have thought it wiser to stick together but I’ll not twist your arm
translate: 我原以为一起行动更明智，但不会勉强你

original: I’ll see if I can’t find that farm north of here
translate: 我会看看北边那边有没有那家农场

original: You’ll find me there
translate: 你在那里就能找到我

original: Stay safe!
translate: 注意安全！

original: Kat nimbly makes her way along the rocky shoreline and into the fog
translate: 凯特敏捷地沿着岩石海岸线行走，然后走进了浓雾中

original: Wading out of the freezing surf you lose your footing on the slick stones and fall heavily to the ground
translate: 涉水而出，你脚下一滑，从冰冷的海浪中重重摔到了地上

original: There is a sudden blur of movement in the corner of your eye and as you frantically try to get to your feet you slip again
translate: 你眼角突然闪过一抹模糊的影子，你拼命想站起来，却又一次滑倒了

original: Standing above you on a large rock is a young woman dressed in Nautical Guild livery
translate: 你脚下站着一个身穿航海公会制服的年轻女子

original: Wet, auburn hair clings to her face in the cold wind
translate: 她湿漉漉的红发在冷风中紧贴着脸庞

original: So I would say, that cave to the west is where we should start looking
translate: 所以我认为，我们应该从西边的洞穴开始寻找

original: You ready to go?
translate: 你准备好了吗？

original: Let's go!
translate: 我们出发吧！

original: I prefer to travel alone
translate: 我更喜欢独自旅行

original: I have some questions first!
translate: 我先有几个问题！

original: Magi’s balls!
translate: 魔法师的蛋！

original: I was sure I was the only one to make it ashore
translate: 我以为我是唯一一个能上岸的人

original: The woman leaps from the rocks and helps you back on your feet
translate: 那女子从岩石上一跃而下，帮你重新站稳

original: Looking you up and down, she fetches a wineskin from her belt and offers it to you
translate: 她上下打量着你，从腰间取下一个皮酒囊递给你

original: The skin is nearly empty save for a last mouthful of brandy
translate: 酒囊几乎空了，只剩下最后一口朗姆酒

original: You drink it down greedily and slowly you feel a modicum of warmth creep into your bones
translate: 你贪婪地喝下了它，慢慢地，你感觉到一丝温暖开始渗入你的骨髓

original: You recognize the young woman’s face now
translate: 现在你认出那女子的脸了

original: She must have served on the Zephyr
translate: 她一定曾在疾风号上服役。

original: She has an arrow cocked on a shortbow and as you squint up at her she draws the string back
translate: 她的短弓上已经上弦，你眯着眼睛看她，只见她拉紧了弓弦。

original: Give me one good reason not to end you right now!
translate: 给我一个现在就结束你的理由！

original: You recognize the young woman’s face
translate: 你认出这个年轻女子的脸庞。

original: Mercy!
translate: 求求你！

original: It was nothing personal
translate: 这并非个人恩怨。

original: The girl scoffs at you
translate: 女孩轻蔑地对你一笑。

original: You’re just like the rest of them
translate: 你和他们一样。

original: Step on any neck so long as it gets you a leg up
translate: 只要能往上爬，我踩谁的脖子都无所谓。

original: That it?
translate: 就这样？

original: She’s red faced with anger
translate: 她气得满脸通红。

original: I was when they sold me to the Nautical Guild
translate: 当他们把我卖给航海公会时，我也是那样的。

original: Did you know I’m listed in their records as an asset?
translate: 你知道我在他们的记录中被列为一项资产吗？

original: A bleeding commodity to use and trade away as they will!
translate: 一个流血的交易品，任由他们使用和买卖！

original: How many nights have I spent dreaming of that bloody ship sinking so I could get away
translate: 我花了多少个夜晚梦见那艘该死的船沉没，好让我逃走。

original: But now that it’s happened
translate: 但现在它发生了。

original: You were a slave?
translate: 你是个奴隶？

original: Who sold you?
translate: 谁把你卖了？

original: Shut your bleeding mouth before I put an arrow through your neck!
translate: 在我射穿你的脖子之前，闭上你那该死的嘴！

original: She draws the string back even further and for a long moment you think she’s going to let loose
translate: 她甚至拉得更紧，有一段时间你认为她真的要射出箭矢。

original: Instead she sighs deeply and lowers her bow
translate: 她却深深地叹了口气，放下了弓

original: One way or another, you did buy me my freedom and I’d be a cursed woman for putting you down as thanks
translate: 总之，你买下了我的自由，我不会因为这点恩情而看扁你

original: Even if I’m stuck here on this bloody island for now
translate: 就算我现在还被困在这该死的岛上

original: I’ll tell you what, help me get away from here and I’ll consider us even?
translate: 好吧，帮我离开这里，我们就两清了

original: You can start by telling me your name
translate: 你先告诉我你的名字吧

original: Katyana’s my name
translate: 我叫凯塔娜

original: The crew calls me Kat
translate: 大家都叫我凯特

original: Or rather they did I suppose
translate: 或者说，他们以前这样叫

original: She looks up and down the beach with a furrowed brow
translate: 她上下打量着海滩，眉头紧锁

original: Listen, you have to get up
translate: 听着，你必须站起来

original: We need to get off this beach before you freeze
translate: 我们必须离开这个海滩，否则你会冻僵的

original: Or worse
translate: 或者更糟

original: Worse?
translate: 更糟？

original: Captain’s seal
translate: 船长的徽记

original: It’s a medallion of sorts that is carried on every guild vessel
translate: 这是一种类似徽章的东西，每艘公会的船只上都会携带

original: It’s not just for show either
translate: 这不仅仅是用来装饰的

original: They say the seals are forged by the Magi and that they have secret powers but I don’t know nothing about that
translate: 有人说这些徽记是由法师打造的，拥有神秘的力量，但我不清楚这些细节

original: All I know is the guild pays well to have one returned if a ship is ever lost
translate: 我只知道，如果船只沉没了，公会会出高价赎回它

original: It's always worn by one of the officers, but I don't think the Captain had it on him when the fight broke out
translate: 这个徽记总是由一名军官佩戴，但我觉得在战斗开始时，船长并没有佩戴它

original: Might have been the First Mate was carrying it and I think he was still alive when the ship sank
translate: 我想可能是大副在携带它，而且我还记得他在船沉没时还活着

original: We need supplies and shelter first
translate: 我们首先需要补给和栖身之处

original: There might be salvage to be had among the wreckage on the beach
translate: 海滩上的残骸中或许有可利用的物资

original: I also think I spotted the chimney of a house just north of the cliffs
translate: 我还觉得在悬崖北边似乎看到了一栋房子的烟囱

original: A warm fire and some food would go a long way
translate: 一炉温暖的火和一些食物会大有帮助

original: Kat offers you her hand and drags you to your feet
translate: 卡特伸出手把你拉了起来

original: She looks pensively towards the west
translate: 她朝西方若有所思地看了一眼

original: Also, as I said there’s a cave west of here
translate: 正如我说的，西边有一处洞穴

original: I think the crabs dragged off most of the corpses there but what if
translate: 我想螃蟹拖走了大部分尸体，但万一

original: What if they’re not all dead?
translate: 万一他们并非全部已死？

original: Might be other survivors like you and me
translate: 可能还有像你我一样的幸存者

original: What's more, there's a chance one of the officers was carrying the seal when the boat sank
translate: 更重要的是，当船只沉没时，有可能有军官身上带着那枚封印

original: If we can find it, the Nautical Guild would give anything to have it returned to them
translate: 如果我们能找到它，海港公会愿意付出任何代价将其归还

original: Seal?
translate: 封印？

original: There’s something wrong about this place
translate: 这地方有些不对劲

original: Can’t you feel it?
translate: 你感觉到了吗？

original: Like a taste in your mouth
translate: 就像口中的一种味道

original: And there are beasts
translate: 还有野兽

original: Huge sea creatures I ain’t never seen afore
translate: 我从未见过的庞大海洋生物

original: I saw them dragging the dead crew-men into a cave west of here
translate: 我看到它们把死掉的船员拖进了西边的洞穴

original: At least I hope they were dead
translate: 至少我希望他们已经死了

original: Kat shudders
translate: 卡特颤抖了一下

original: What do you suggest?
translate: 你有什么建议？

original: Good
translate: 好的

original: I found this bow in a cargo crate
translate: 我在货箱里找到了这把弓

original: We best find you a weapon too as soon as possible
translate: 我们最好尽快给你找一把武器

original: I suspect we’ll need it before long
translate: 我怀疑我们很快就会用到它

original: Together you begin to move, off the beach and towards whatever darkness dwells in the island’s interior
translate: 你们俩开始一起行动，离开海滩，朝岛上内部的黑暗走去

original: There’ll be plenty more time for that once we get off the beach
translate: 等我们离开海滩后，我们还有很多时间

original: Are you ready?
translate: 你准备好了吗？

original: You're not coming with me
translate: 你不会跟我一起去

original: You’re back?
translate: 你回来了？

original: I see the beasts that roam the shoreline didn’t get the better of you!
translate: 我看到那些在岸边游荡的野兽没有把你怎么样！

original: Let's travel together!
translate: 我们一起出发吧！

original: I’ll go with you
translate: 我会跟你一起去

original: Let’s gather what weapons and equipment we can and make for the inland
translate: 让我们收集能拿到的武器和装备，然后向内陆进发

original: #Chapter1LandingMarita
translate: #第一章登陆玛里塔

original: Kneeling in the grass, you notice a satchel lying where Martita was kneeling
translate: 蹲在草地上，你注意到玛里塔曾经蹲过的地方放着一个背包

original: You get a feeling it was left there for you
translate: 你感觉它似乎是留给你的

original: Slowly, you regain your composure and get to your feet
translate: 你慢慢恢复了镇定，站了起来

original: Shambling away from the well, you suddenly stiffen
translate: 拖着脚步离开井边，你突然僵住了

original: Did you just hear something?
translate: 你刚刚听到什么声音了吗？

original: A child's voice perhaps?
translate: 或许是孩子的声音？

original: Or was just the wind?
translate: 还是只是风声？

original: The woman rocks slowly back and forth as she stares blankly at the well in front of her
translate: 那女人空洞地盯着面前的水井，缓慢地前后摇晃着身体

original: What has happened?
translate: 发生了什么事？

original: It took them
translate: 这件事让他们

original: Called out to them
translate: 向他们呼喊

original: I heard it
translate: 我听到了

original: Funny thing is
translate: 有趣的是

original: I heard it calling with my voice
translate: 我听到了它用我的声音呼唤

original: Oleg and Anja live in the well now
translate: 奥列格和安雅现在住在水井里

original: They’re calling for me to join them
translate: 它们在召唤我加入它们

original: Can I help?
translate: 我能帮忙吗？

original: It will never stop
translate: 这个声音永远不会停止

original: It will multiply until it covers all the lands and all the seas
translate: 它会繁殖，直到覆盖所有的土地和海洋

original: And when we are all dead and bones, the conqueror mold will dress our corpses in black mourning veils
translate: 等到我们都成了枯骨，征服者菌类会用黑色的丧葬面纱包裹我们的尸体

original: Her voice is flat and monotone and the strange words almost seem to come from somewhere else
translate: 她的声音平淡而单调，那些奇怪的话语似乎来自另一个地方

original: She then lets out a deep sigh
translate: 然后她深深地叹了口气

original: But if I had my children’s bones to bury, it would give me some respite
translate: 但如果我能埋葬孩子们的骨头，这会给我一些慰藉

original: A moment of silence, then the sickening sound of children’s laughter once again rises from the well
translate: 一阵沉默后，水井里再次传来了令人作呕的孩子们的笑声

original: The skeletal figure of Marita sits in front of the well, rocking silently back and forth
translate: 马丽塔的骷髅身影坐在井边，无声地前后摇晃着

original: I have your children's bones
translate: 我有你孩子的骨头

original: Marita looks up at you and blinks as if waking from a dream
translate: 马丽塔抬头看着你，仿佛从梦中醒来般眨了眨眼睛

original: Without a word, she gingerly takes the small bundle of bones in her arms as if it was a swaddled infant
translate: 她默默接过怀中的小骨包，动作轻柔，仿佛抱着一个襁褓中的婴儿

original: She cradles it for a moment and then looks up at you with grateful eyes
translate: 她抱着它片刻，然后用感激的眼神看着你

original: She gently strokes your cheek once and then turns and wanders into the fog
translate: 轻轻抚摸你的脸颊一下，然后转身消失在雾中

original: You’ve set her free
translate: 你让她重获自由

original: Falling to your knees, you retch violently
translate: 跪倒在地，你剧烈呕吐

original: If it is from the conqueror mold or the emotional moment you can’t quite tell
translate: 你分不清是从征服者模具中来的，还是某个情感的瞬间

original: #Chapter1LandingTelescope
translate: #第一章登陆望远镜

original: You steel yourself and gaze back into the cosmic aberration
translate: 你鼓起勇气，再次凝视那宇宙的异变

original: A moment stretches into hours, days, eons
translate: 一瞬拉长成小时，日月，甚至永恒

original: Stars are birthed and die; collapsing in on themselves in cataclysms that shake the very foundations of creation
translate: 星星诞生又消亡，在 cataclysms 中坍塌，撼动着造物的根基

original: Open your mind
translate: 打开你的思维

original: As you come to, you are sitting befuddled in the grass near the telescope
translate: 当你醒来时，你困惑地坐在望远镜附近的草地上

original: You have no idea of how much time has passed but you feel like you have traveled impossible distances
translate: 你不知道过去了多久，但感觉像是穿越了不可想象的距离

original: For a fleeting moment, you sense profound realizations as they flee your mind like dreams upon waking
translate: 在短暂的一刻，你感到深刻的顿悟，就像梦醒时分的瞬间

original: With a ringing head and a deep feeling of dread creeping in, you vow never to gaze into that accursed telescope again
translate: 头晕目眩，恐惧感油然而生，你发誓再也不看那个该死的望远镜了

original: Dread fills you as you realize that in the far recesses of your mind, thoughts are now lurking that originated elsewhere
translate: 你意识到，脑海中深处潜藏着一些异域的思绪

original: Unbidden and utterly alien, their greeting is a droning echo
translate: 这些思绪不请自来，完全陌生，它们的问候如同嗡嗡回响的声音

original: The eyes of the Dragon are opening
translate: 龙的眼睛正在睁开

original: You vow to never peer through that accursed telescope again
translate: 你发誓再也不用那个该死的望远镜了

original: A finely wrought telescope used for astronomical observations
translate: 一把做工精美的望远镜，用于天文观测

original: Its lenses are no doubt the product of some of the Empire’s finest Hyalomancers and allows stars to be observed even in full daylight
translate: 它的镜片无疑是帝国最优秀的光系法师所制作的，即使在白天也能观察到星星

original: Examine the seas
translate: 观察海洋

original: Examine the sky in general
translate: 一般观察天空

original: Examine the southeastern quadrant of the sky
translate: 仔细观察东南方的天空

original: Take telescope
translate: 拿起望远镜

original: You cannot bring yourself to look in that accursed telescope again
translate: 你无法再次将目光投向那个该死的望远镜

original: You look out upon the churning, gray roil that surrounds the windswept shores of Idra
translate: 你凝视着伊德拉风蚀海岸周围翻腾的灰暗波涛

original: Far out there, among the great waves and beating winds you swear you momentarily see a great glistening shape shifting just beneath the surface
translate: 在远处，巨大的波浪和猛烈的风中，你发誓一瞬间看到了一个巨大的闪耀形状在表面下移动

original: Whatever madness has befallen this island you are certainly safer here than on any ship out there
translate: 无论这座岛屿上发生了什么疯狂的事情，这里显然比任何出海的船只都要安全

original: Use the telescope further
translate: 继续使用望远镜

original: You point the telescope skywards, and after a few moments of searching, you find a gap where the stormy skies have parted just enough to allow you to examine the stars in their firmament
translate: 你将望远镜对准天空，经过一番搜寻后，你发现风暴中的天空出现了一个缝隙，足以让你观察到天穹中的星星

original: Examine it more closely
translate: 更仔细地观察它

original: A moment of confusion washes over you as you find yourself utterly disoriented in a sky you should know as well as the back of your hand
translate: 一瞬间的困惑涌上心头，你发现自己对这片你应该了如指掌的天空感到完全迷茫

original: The poor astronomer was right
translate: 那个可怜的天文学家是对的

original: Somehow the stars you see in the sky are utterly alien to you
translate: 你发现天空中的星星完全陌生，令你感到惊恐

original: The realization leaves you chilled to your bones
translate: 这种认识让你寒毛直竖

original: Instinctively you look away from the strange stellar vista
translate: 不自觉地，你移开了目光，离开了那片奇怪的星象景象

original: Look back at the sky
translate: 回头望向天空

original: Use the telescope for something else
translate: 把望远镜用在其他地方

original: Though you realize your knowledge of astronomy is quite lacking, you are nonetheless left with a feeling of wrongness that you can’t quite explain
translate: 虽然你意识到自己对天文学了解甚少，但你仍感到一种说不出的不妥，仿佛有什么不对劲

original: Training the telescope on the southeastern quadrant of the sky your eyes are immediately drawn to what appears to be something akin to a small reddish cluster of stars
translate: 将望远镜对准东南方的天空，你的眼睛立刻被一个类似小红星团的东西吸引

original: Though, at first the tiny speck is hardly noticeable, it seems to grow larger as you regard it
translate: 虽然最初那颗小点几乎看不见，但随着你注视，它似乎变得越来越大

original: At once you're struck with the terrible realization that as you are watching it, it is gazing back
translate: 你突然意识到，你在看它，它也在看你

original: Tear your eyes away
translate: 眼睛移开

original: Hold the gaze
translate: 保持凝视

original: As you feel tendrils of something utterly alien grasping at your consciousness, you tear yourself away from the telescope in panic
translate: 当你感受到某种完全陌生的存在试图抓住你的意识时，你惊慌地从望远镜前移开

original: You turn away from the accursed apparatus and decide to never again use it
translate: 你转身离开这个该死的装置，并决定再也不会使用它

original: #Chapter1LandingWell
translate: #第一章着陆良好

original: One by one, you pry loose the bones from the writhing of the ganglion
translate: 你一个接一个地将骨骼从神经节的蠕动中分离出来

original: Its motions become more and more agitated as you work and a wave of relief washes over you as the last piece comes loose
translate: 你的动作越来越快，神经节的运动也越来越激烈，当最后一块骨头脱落时，你感到一阵如释重负

original: Now you must make your way out of this death-trap
translate: 现在你必须设法逃离这个死亡陷阱

original: Mold
translate: 塑形

original: As you descend deeper into the earthy cave, you realize that the black mold covers most of the walls
translate: 随着你深入地下的洞穴，你意识到黑色霉菌几乎覆盖了所有的墙壁

original: Even the air is thick with floating black specks
translate: 空气中弥漫着无数漂浮的黑色小点

original: Here and there, the mold seems to form nodules
translate: 墙壁上偶尔会形成一些结节

original: Your mind fills with images of the nodules bursting open in an obscene mockery of birth and black, worm-like tendrils of mold spilling forth into the world
translate: 你的脑海中浮现出结节破裂的景象，那是对出生的荒诞模仿，黑色的、像虫子一样的霉菌触须涌向世界

original: An irrational urge to touch the nodes begin to grow inside you
translate: 一种莫名想要触碰这些结节的冲动在你心中逐渐增强

original: Move on
translate: 继续前进

original: Touch nodes
translate: 触碰节点

original: Perhaps it’s the thickness of the air, or the sickly miasmas that fill this part of the cave, but stars flash before your eyes
translate: 或许是这里的空气过于浓重，或者被这洞穴中弥漫的病态瘴气所影响，你眼前闪过星辰

original: Your mind is assaulted with images of alien landscapes
translate: 你的脑海中充斥着异世界的景象

original: Cities?
translate: 城市？

original: No, giant living structures, almost like the coral that the traders from the Sea-Gates sometimes peddle
translate: 不，是巨大的活体建筑，几乎就像来自海门的商人有时兜售的珊瑚

original: But large
translate: 但它们很大

original: So large it almost touches the sky
translate: 大到几乎触及天空

original: Then you see it
translate: 然后你看到了它们

original: The structures themselves writhe with obscene life
translate: 这些建筑本身扭曲着令人作呕的生命

original: Innumerable black worm-like tendrils of black mold cover them
translate: 无数条黑色的蠕虫状触须覆盖其上

original: They beckon you
translate: 它们在召唤你

original: Give in to them
translate: 向它们屈服

original: Let them take hold
translate: 让它们占据你

original: In the sky above you something massive shifts
translate: 你上方的天空中，某物在剧烈变化

original: Carry on!
translate: 继续前进！

original: Give In
translate: 屈服

original: The Sanctum
translate: 圣所

original: You feel as if you’re dragged under and into the crushing blackness to unfathomable depths
translate: 你感觉像是被拖入了无尽的黑暗深渊

original: Stars flash before your eyes again and you once more see the impossible landscapes
translate: 星辰再次在你眼前闪烁，你再次看到了那些不可能存在的景观

original: Cyclopean edifices of writhing black shapes
translate: 巨大的 cyclopean 建筑扭曲成黑色的形状

original: An age of worms
translate: 蠕虫的时代

original: You understand now
translate: 你现在明白了

original: This is not some alien dream-scape
translate: 这不是什么外星梦境

original: This is Warda
translate: 这是瓦达

original: This is home
translate: 这是你的家

original: And you?
translate: 你呢？

original: You are a high-priest!
translate: 你是一位高级祭司！

original: The god-regent of a perfect world!
translate: 世界的神君！

original: And now it is time!
translate: 而现在，是时候了！

original: The sky sunders!
translate: 天空裂开了！

original: SEVEN EYES SEE!
translate: 七眼看见！

original: IT COMES!
translate: 它来了！

original: GIVE YOURSELF TO IT!
translate: 投身于它！

original: Gathering all your willpower, you wrest back control of your faculties and forge ahead
translate: 聚集你所有的意志力，你重新夺回了对自身能力的控制，并继续前进

original: On the wall ahead you spot it
translate: 在前方的墙上，你看到了它

original: A festering ganglion of black ichor with two small human skulls leering from it
translate: 一个腐烂的黑色黏液团，里面有两个小人头在嘲笑

original: The Children
translate: 孩子们

original: The two diminutive shapes materialize as if from the very walls themselves
translate: 这两个微小的身影仿佛从墙壁中浮现而出

original: Bodies alive with writhing mold, their blank, idiotic faces stare up at you in a grotesque imitation of life
translate: 身体上爬满了蠕动的霉菌，它们空洞、愚蠢的脸孔向上注视着你，扭曲地模仿着生命

original: Your blood runs cold as organs that should never shape human voices spill forth the sound of children laughing
translate: 你感到血液凝固，因为那些本不应发出人类声音的器官发出孩童笑声

original: A loud shriek escapes from the horrors and in a maelstrom of writhing blackness, the two pathetic creatures, reshape into lean forms that tower over you
translate: 恶魔发出尖锐的尖叫，一团扭曲的黑色旋涡中，那两个可怜的生物化作了高大的身影，远远地俯视着你

original: They do not intend to let you leave
translate: 他们不想让你离开

original: Try to dash past them and escape
translate: 尝试从它们身边冲过去逃跑

original: Abominations!
translate: 畸形生物！

original: You attempt to slip past the monstrosities but they have you boxed in
translate: 你试图从这些怪兽身边溜走，但它们已经将你包围

original: The only way out is now through them
translate: 唯一的出路就是从它们中间穿过

original: Stand your ground
translate: 站住

original: Feigning left and dashing right, you manage to slip past the mindless creatures and before they manage to regain their bearings, you have clambered up the ropes and escaped the well
translate: 虚构左冲，实际右突，你成功地从这些无知的生物身边溜过，在它们反应过来之前，你已经攀上绳索，逃出了井底

original: As you flop over the rim of the well and onto the ground, a faint “Mother!
translate: 你从井沿翻滚到地面上，下面传来一个微弱的“妈妈！

original: escapes from below
translate: 的声音

original: The Ganglion
translate: 脉球

original: The mass of glistening mold pulsates with a grotesque peristaltic motion as you approach it
translate: 那团闪耀着光泽的霉菌团以一种怪异的蠕动方式颤动着，你靠近它时

original: Embedded in it is a collection of small animal bones
translate: 它里面嵌着一些小动物的骨骼

original: Nonetheless, you have no problems identifying two complete, small human skeletons
translate: 不过，你很容易辨认出两具完整的小型人类骷髅

original: Grab the bones
translate: 捏住骨头

original: Oblivion
translate: 虚无

original: You dig your fingers into the black, substance and breathe deeply in tainted air, welcoming the pulsating presence that surrounds you to invade your flesh
translate: 你将手指深深插入那黑色的物质中，吸入被污染的空气，欢迎那股脉动的存在侵入你的肉体

original: It does not hesitate and the warmness of unity fills your very being as new life beings
translate: 它毫不犹豫，一股温暖的融合感充盈着你的每一个细胞，新的生命由此诞生

original: Stars align and the Dragon stirs in the void
translate: 星辰对齐，龙在虚空中苏醒

original: Haruma
translate: 哈鲁马

original: HARUMA!
translate: 哈鲁马！

original: Become one
translate: 成为其中之一

original: A Well
translate: 一口井

original: The well seems ordinary enough until you examine it more closely
translate: 你仔细观察这口井，发现它看似普通，直到你更仔细地查看

original: A thin layer of slimy black mold seems to cling to its walls and a heavy odor of filth rises from its depths
translate: 井壁上似乎附着一层薄薄的粘滑黑色霉菌，一股浓重的污秽气味从井底升起

original: You could swear you heard something splash around in the shallow waters
translate: 你几乎可以肯定自己听到了浅水中的什么东西在扑腾

original: A ladder has been placed in the well-shaft and you could easily descend if you wanted to
translate: 井中放着一个梯子，如果你想的话，很容易就能下去

original: Descend
translate: 下去

original: A woman sits in the grass ahead of you with the well looming over her
translate: 你前方的草地上坐着一名女子，井就在她身后

original: She is emaciated, ragged and covered in grime
translate: 她骨瘦如柴，衣衫褴褛，满身污垢

original: How long has she been sitting here?
translate: 她在这里坐了多久？

original: Weeks?
translate: 几周？

original: She rocks back and forth
translate: 她来回摇晃

original: Almost catatonic
translate: 几乎处于植物人状态

original: Then, suddenly you hear it again
translate: 然后，突然间你又听到了

original: The clear sound of playful children’s laughter rises from the well
translate: 清晰的孩童嬉笑声从井中传来

original: The woman wails
translate: 女子发出悲鸣

original: #Chapter1LeavingLanding
translate: #第一章离开着陆

original: Emerging from the rocky shores, you survey the dreary interiors of Idra
translate: 从岩石岸边走出，你环顾着德拉灰暗的内部

original: Rolling hills and moors cover much of the surrounding areas and tall, jagged mountains rise towards the north
translate: 周围地区遍布起伏的丘陵和荒原，而北边则矗立着高耸险峻的山脉。

original: East of you, a lighthouse can be seen; Its faint light flickering against the gloom
translate: 东边，可以看到一座灯塔，它的微弱光芒在昏暗中闪烁。

original: Beyond that lies a bay and from its far shore the wind carries the foul stench of burning corpses
translate: 超过那片区域，是一片海湾，从远处的岸边传来腐烂尸体燃烧的恶臭。

original: Something is deeply wrong on this island and though you have survived this far, you are still poorly equipped and alone
translate: 这座岛屿上出了大事，尽管你们已经平安走到了这里，但你们仍然装备不足且孤立无援。

original: Nevertheless, you’re here for a reason and according to lord Cato, Embla’s last known location was the township of Horryn
translate: 不过，你们来这里是有原因的，根据卡托爵士的说法，埃姆bla最后的行踪是在霍里恩镇。

original: Whilst your road leads to Horryn eventually, you must also explore your surroundings well
translate: 虽然你们的路最终会通向霍里恩，但你们也必须仔细探索周围的环境。

original: You need to re-equip and find allies if you are to survive
translate: 如果你们想生存下去，就必须重新装备并找到盟友。

original: As you set out across the blasted landscape, you have a growing feeling that whatever horrific fate has befallen this region it's somehow inexorably tied to your quest
translate: 当你们穿越这片荒芜的大地时，越来越感觉到，无论这片地区发生了多么可怕的灾难，它似乎与你们的使命息息相关。

original: Something dark and vast is slowly spreading throughout the Outer Isles, tentacles grasping greedily as if searching for something
translate: 一股黑暗而庞大的力量正在外岛蔓延，触手贪婪地伸展，仿佛在寻找什么。

original: Great adventures may lie ahead but so does great terror
translate: 前方可能有伟大的冒险，但也可能有巨大的恐怖。

original: Of that you are absolutely certain
translate: 你们对此绝对确信无疑。

original: There’s something wrong here on this island
translate: 这座岛屿上出了问题。

original: Something really bad
translate: 问题还很严重。

original: Kat suppresses a shiver
translate: 凯特抑制住打寒颤的冲动。

original: You came here for a reason right?
translate: 你们来这里是有原因的，对吧？

original: With mercenaries and all
translate: 还有雇佣兵呢。

original: Had to have been something important?
translate: 肯定有什么重要的事情。

original: I was hired to find somebody
translate: 我是受雇来找某个人的。

original: Kat listens intently as you tell her about your quest to find Embla Berryn
translate: 凯特专注地听着你讲述寻找埃姆bla·贝林的使命。

original: Girl’s lucky to have family care for her
translate: 这个女孩很幸运，有家人照顾她。

original: Kat mumbles
translate: 凯特嘟囔着

original: So the old man told you she was last seen in Horryn right?
translate: 所以老人才告诉你，她最后出现在霍里恩对吧？

original: Well, I’ve been to Horryn
translate: 好吧，我去过霍里恩

original: Landed there on our last run
translate: 我们上次任务的时候在那里着陆的

original: I could tell something felt off about the place, but nothing like this
translate: 我能感觉到那地方有些不对劲，但不像现在这样

original: Here’s how I see it, Horryn isn’t far - Just a day’s march to the east around the bay
translate: 我看这样，霍里恩不远 - 就是向东一整天的路程，绕过海湾

original: However, I think we need to be all clever-like about this
translate: 但是我认为我们应该聪明一点

original: Make sure we re-arm and maybe even try to pick up a few allies
translate: 确保重新武装，甚至可能试着找几个盟友

original: If we rush in and end up dead we’re not doing this Embla any good’s what I’m trying to say
translate: 如果我们贸然冲进去结果死了，对埃姆拉可没什么好处，这就是我想说的

original: So, we should explore around a bit right?
translate: 所以，我们应该先探索一下对吧？

original: Gather a bit o’ intelligence and what-not
translate: 收集一些情报之类的东西

original: We need to take it step by step
translate: 我们需要一步一步来

original: I'd prefer it if you leave the strategy to me
translate: 我更希望由我来负责策略

original: Yeah just like that
translate: 就是那样

original: Kat nods
translate: 凯特点了点头

original: See over there?
translate: 看那边？

original: Kat points towards the lighthouse to the east,
translate: 凯特指向东方的灯塔，

original: Lighthouse’s still lit so it’s bound to be manned
translate: 灯塔还亮着，肯定有人守着

original: If we make our way there we might find out more about what’s going on
translate: 如果我们去那里，可能会了解到更多情况

original: Might even scrounge up a hot meal
translate: 甚至还能找到一顿热乎的饭菜

original: Let's get a move on
translate: 我们快点走吧

original: Any other suggestions?
translate: 还有其他建议吗？

original: Alright, alright!
translate: 好吧，好吧！

original: I didn’t mean to overstep
translate: 我不是有意冒犯

original: Just don’t get us killed is what I’m saying
translate: 我的意思是，别让我们送命就行

original: Kat looks at her feet
translate: 凯特看着自己的脚

original: So, where to then?
translate: 那接下来去哪儿？

original: I'll work something out
translate: 我会想办法的

original: Kat looks around, squinting against the wind
translate: 凯特环视四周，眯着眼睛抵抗着风

original: She nod’s her head towards the northern shore
translate: 她朝北方的海岸点点头

original: I suppose any other survivors and wreckage from the Zephyr would be washed up on shore north-west of where we landed, right?
translate: 想来在我们登陆地点西北方向的海岸上，应该会漂来其他幸存者和“西风号”的残骸，对吧？

original: Might be worth a look-see?
translate: 值得去看看吗？

original: Let's head out then!
translate: 那我们就出发吧！

original: #Chapter1SealFollowUp
translate: #Chapter1SealFollowUp

original: Snapping out of it, you force your mind back to the issue at hand
translate: 回过神来，你强迫自己把注意力集中在手头的问题上

original: For now, there is little to be done about the amulet and you best be on your way
translate: 暂时对这枚法印束手无策，你最好还是上路吧

original: No doubt the information stored inside this device is its true value to the Nautical Guild
translate: 毫无疑问，这个装置内部存储的信息才是它对航海公会真正的价值所在

original: The Zephyr was sunk by some unknown horror and the Guild would pay dearly to learn more about such a dire threat to its operations
translate: “西风号”是被某种未知的恐怖生物击沉的，公会会不惜代价去了解这种对它们运营构成巨大威胁的信息

original: Then again, you did play some role in the ship's demise as well and that information might also be gleaned from the device
translate: 另一方面，你也参与了这艘船的沉没，装置中的信息也可能揭示你的角色

original: Carefully examining the device you discover it has a complex mechanical inner working
translate: 仔细检查这个装置，你发现它内部有着复杂的机械结构

original: In part, that mechanism seems to allow the user to perform complicated navigational calculations
translate: 这个机制似乎允许用户进行复杂的导航计算

original: But more so, the device seems to have a core of mnemonic runes
translate: 但更重要的是，这个装置似乎有一个记忆符文的核心

original: Perhaps it serves as a form of captain’s log?
translate: 或许它是一种船长日志的形式？

original: This artifact is not mundane and you’re inclined to agree with Kat that it might be worth something to the Nautical Guild
translate: 这件神器不平凡，你倾向于同意凯特的看法，它可能对航海公会有价值

original: Or someone else
translate: 或是其他人

original: Beyond that, the strange amulet is beyond your ken
translate: 超出你理解的，这件奇怪的法印非常神秘

original: Stepping into the fresh air you pull the strange octagonal Guild Seal from your pocket and examine it more closely
translate: 走出新鲜的空气，你从口袋里掏出那枚奇怪的八边形公会印记，仔细端详

original: The dark metallic surface is covered in intricately carved lines and symbols
translate: 深色的金属表面刻满了精细的线条和符号

original: It reminds you of a mix between a compass and an astrolabe
translate: 这让你想起了罗盘和天球仪的结合

original: Try to think if you've heard about something like this before
translate: 尝试回想是否听说过类似的东西

original: Try to examine its inner workings
translate: 尝试检查它的内部构造

original: You feel the weight of the strange device in your hands
translate: 你感受到手中这件奇怪装置的重量

original: For a moment you're back on the deck of the Zephyr
translate: 有一刻，你仿佛又回到了海风号的甲板上

original: Monstrous tentacles rise above the ship like strange alien towers
translate: 巨大的触手像奇异的外星塔一样从船上升起

original: Terrified screams fill the air
translate: 恐怖的尖叫声回荡在空气中

original: You shudder
translate: 你浑身一抖

original: Kat’s voice snaps you out of it
translate: 凯特的声音将你从回忆中唤醒

original: If we ever get off this bloody island and back to the mainland, the Guild will pay well to have that returned
translate: 如果我们能从这个该死的岛屿上脱身回到大陆，公会会出高价要回这件物品

original: All I ask is you remember who told you about it
translate: 我只希望你能记得是谁告诉你的

original: Don't worry
translate: 别担心

original: We'll split the coin
translate: 我们分一半金币吧

original: You can keep the coin
translate: 金币你留着吧

original: All I want is to be done with the Guild
translate: 我只想尽快了结与公会的恩怨

original: Be free to wander as I like
translate: 随便去哪里都随我心意

original: Maybe wander up to my brother and stick a knife in his fat gut
translate: 或许可以去找哥哥，然后在他肥硕的肚皮上捅一刀

original: Your brother?
translate: 你哥哥？

original: Twas my older brother who sold me off to the Guild
translate: 是我哥哥把我卖给公会的

original: I was bloody twelve!
translate: 我当时才十八岁出头！

original: Twenty years is what I owe them on account of that bastard
translate: 因为那个混蛋，我欠他们二十年

original: I’ve already wasted 10 years
translate: 我已经蹉跎了十年光阴

original: Her voice breaks for a moment before steel creeps back into her otherwise soft features
translate: 她的声音微微颤抖，随后钢铁般的意志又回到了她原本柔和的面容上

original: Like I said; gutting the bastard will go a long way towards setting things right
translate: 正如我所说，捅了那个混蛋，会让他们知道厉害

original: And the amulet will help you somehow?
translate: 那个护身符能帮你什么？

original: Sure, I’m free enough for now, but the Guild doesn’t like to let their assets go and they have a way of catching up with those who jump ship
translate: 当然，我现在还算自由，但公会不会轻易放走他们的资产，他们有办法追捕叛徒

original: Even someone as lowly as me
translate: 即使像我这样卑微的人

original: Dangling a recovered captain’s seal in front of them is exactly the kind of thing that might sway them
translate: 向他们展示一枚找回的船长徽章，或许能打动他们

original: We'll do what we can!
translate: 我们能做的，我们都会做！

original: I’m liking you more and more
translate: 我越来越欣赏你了

original: Let’s start by getting off this bloody island alive!
translate: 首先，我们要活着离开这个该死的岛屿

original: Kat’s eyes narrow slightly as if she tries to get a read on you
translate: 卡特的眼神微微眯起，似乎在试图洞察你

original: Let’s just get moving
translate: 我们还是快点出发吧

original: We might have our work cut out just getting off this bloody island
translate: 我们可能得费一番功夫才能离开这座该死的岛屿

original: You have indeed heard about this type of device before
translate: 的确有人提过这种装置

original: As you understand it, it allows the officers of a Nautical Guild ship to operate the vessel’s complicated navigational instruments
translate: 按照你的理解，它能让海港公会船只的船员操作复杂的导航仪器

original: But more than that, it also serves as a device that records the captain’s log
translate: 除此之外，它还是一种记录船长日志的装置

original: #Chapter1WreckPicker
translate: #第一章残骸拾荒者

original: The man looks at you, eyes wide in genuine surprise and shock
translate: 那人看着你，眼中满是真诚的惊讶和震惊

original: Then a mask of pure rage falls across his face
translate: 然后他的脸上蒙上了一层纯粹的怒意

original: You shouldn't be all healthy and like!
translate: 你看起来不应该这么健康！

original: Mother Maelstrom offered you up for me!
translate: 暴风之母把你献给我了！

original: Basilo will make you stop squirming little fish!
translate: 基西洛会让你停止挣扎，小鱼儿！

original: Marita's little runts
translate: 马丽塔的小崽子们

original: Oleg and Anja I think
translate: 我想是奥列格和安雅

original: Spends most of their time playing with their mother in the well
translate: 大部分时间都在和妈妈在井里玩耍

original: Oh no
translate: 哦不

original: Don't worry!
translate: 别担心！

original: Little ones are right as rain!
translate: 小家伙们没事的！

original: Sometimes I even hear them laughing and singing rhymes all night down in the well!
translate: 有时候我甚至能听到他们在井里整晚笑个不停，还唱着儿歌！

original: Crabs and critters and such
translate: 螃蟹和小生物之类

original: Growing large and... strange this time of year
translate: 这时候长得又大又……奇怪

original: Get your leg in their clippers and they'll lob it right off
translate: 让你的腿进入它们的剪刀中，它们就会直接砍下来

original: So you best be careful!
translate: 所以你最好小心些！

original: But not to worry
translate: 但不用太过担心

original: Basilo's always given them the laugh - even when he was wee
translate: 基西洛总是能让它们笑 - 即使他很小的时候也是如此

original: Must'a been just as big back then
translate: 那时候肯定也一样高大

original: Though it doesn't really feel that way
translate: 虽然现在并不觉得

original: The old man's brows furrow and for a moment he is lost in deep thought
translate: 老人皱起眉头，片刻间陷入了深深的沉思

original: In any case
translate: 无论如何

original: The old man reaches into the leather pouch and pulls out a handful of strange coins that look nothing like standard Imperial coinage
translate: 老人伸手进皮质的钱袋，掏出一把奇怪的硬币，看起来完全不像帝国的标准货币

original: Though they are no doubt valuable, they’re covered in greenish grime that make them almost look more like sea-shells than coins
translate: 尽管它们肯定很有价值，但上面覆盖着一层绿色的污垢，几乎让人觉得它们更像是贝壳而非硬币

original: Bounty from the deep!
translate: 深海的悬赏！

original: Handed down from me da’ who got it from me granda’
translate: 从我父亲那里传下来，他又是从祖父那里得到的

original: He used to say granda’ was so strong in the old faith that Mother Maelstrom would let him go down into the deep and visit with them who live there
translate: 他常说祖父在古老的信仰中如此强大，暴风雨之母允许他下到深海，与那里的居民见面

original: Came back with sacks of this he did
translate: 他带回了满满一袋子的东西

original: Nice a place as ever you'll see!
translate: 这里是你见过的最美好的地方！

original: Warm fire, roof over your head
translate: 温暖的火光，头顶有遮蔽

original: Marita’s good to old Basilo letting him stay here
translate: 马里塔对基西洛很好，让他住在这里

original: Take care of her in return Basilo does
translate: 基西洛会好好照顾她

original: She spends all her time playing in the yard with her kids these days and she forgets to eat
translate: 她现在把所有时间都花在院子里和孩子们一起玩耍，以至于忘了吃饭

original: Some days I have to feed her to make sure she don’t waste away
translate: 有些日子我不得不喂她，以免她营养不良

original: The old man smiles warmly
translate: 老人微笑着看着你

original: There are children here?
translate: 这里有孩子？

original: The fireplace casts a warm glow across the piles of old fishbones, broken furniture and strange trinkets that litter the ruined home
translate: 火炉的温暖光芒洒在一堆堆旧鱼骨、破家具和奇怪的小玩意上，它们散落在这座破败的家园中

original: Basilo hums contently to himself
translate: 巴西洛哼着歌，满意地自言自语

original: Let's trade
translate: 我们来交易吧

original: Where did you get all that coin?
translate: 你从哪里弄来这么多金币？

original: What's wrong with the well?
translate: 井出了什么问题？

original: What happened to this place?
translate: 这里发生了什么？

original: I've choosen to end you!
translate: 我选择结束你！

original: The Wreck Picker
translate: 废墟拾荒者

original: A lanky man with skin like sun-dried leather stares slack-jawed at you
translate: 一个瘦长的男人，皮肤像晒干的皮革，张大嘴巴盯着你

original: He’s dressed in rags and with a wide brimmed hat and a large bundle of scrap slung over his shoulder
translate: 他穿着破烂的衣服，戴着宽边帽，肩上背着一大捆废料

original: Do Basilo’s eyes deceive him?
translate: 巴西洛的眼睛欺骗了他？

original: More ghosts?
translate: 还有鬼魂？

original: Or did the sea spit you back out alive?
translate: 或者大海把你吐了出来，你还活着？

original: Not many are that lucky!
translate: 不多见这么幸运的人！

original: Your eyes fall on the crude spiked club that hangs in his belt
translate: 你的目光落在他腰带上挂着的粗糙带刺棍棒上

original: Basilo makes his living picking at what the mother of maelstroms does not swallow
translate: 巴西洛靠捡拾海怪未吞下的东西为生

original: And it’s been rich pickings as of late
translate: 最近收获颇丰

original: Crates and barrels and even the odd fleshy morsel!
translate: 箱子、桶，甚至偶尔还有些肉质的小块！

original: The man bares a row of blackened teeth in what you assume is a smile
translate: 这个男人露出一排焦黑的牙齿，你猜那是微笑。

original: Rich pickings?
translate: 丰厚的战利品？

original: What's the club for?
translate: 这个俱乐部是干什么的？

original: Listen here; Basilo has a proposal for you!
translate: 听好了；巴西洛有一个提案给你！

original: The man smiles in greedy anticipation
translate: 这个男人贪婪地期待着，露出了笑容。

original: Shore’s bursting with bounty today!
translate: 今天岸边满是收获！

original: Man can make a fortune if he sets his mind to it
translate: 只要他下定决心，人可以赚到一大笔财富。

original: Basilo will be warming his bones up at the old abandoned farm house right behind us
translate: 巴西洛会在我们身后那座废弃的老农舍里取暖。

original: Find me there!
translate: 去那里找我！

original: I had some questions
translate: 我有一些问题。

original: The club is caked in dried blood and of crude design
translate: 这个俱乐部沾满了干涸的血液，设计十分粗糙。

original: It has the look of a tool used well and often
translate: 它看起来像是一个使用频繁且得心应手的工具。

original: Basilo offers up a chuckle that is chillingly out of place as he pats it
translate: 巴西洛发出的笑声令人觉得格格不入，他拍打着它。

original: Every now and then, Mother Maelstrom offers up little fish that have a bit of fight left in them
translate: 母亲风暴偶尔会提供一些还有些反抗力的小鱼。

original: All Basilo does is help put them to rest
translate: 巴西洛只是帮助它们安息。

original: How many 'fish' did you put to sleep today?
translate: 今天你让多少‘鱼’安息了？

original: He looks taken aback by the question
translate: 他被这个问题惊呆了。

original: Basilo did them all nice
translate: 巴西洛把它们都处理得很好。

original: Just like father taught him!
translate: 正如父亲教给他的那样！

original: Anyone still squirming gets a knock on his shell till he’s good and floppy
translate: 任何还在挣扎的家伙都会被敲打到软绵绵为止。

original: Not to worry
translate: 别担心

original: Been doing it for years
translate: 做了好几年了

original: Used to help my da’ hold em down while he did the knocking
translate: 以前我父亲做敲门工时，我帮他守着门

original: Quick as you like
translate: 你想要的速度

original: Basilo offers an eager smile as if to reassure you that he’s very good at what he does
translate: 基西洛露出渴望的笑容，仿佛在向你保证他非常擅长这份工作

original: You murder survivors to steal their belongings?
translate: 你杀害幸存者，只是为了抢夺他们的财物？

original: You monster!
translate: 你这个怪物！

original: Basilo fidgets in obvious discomfort at not understanding what you’re trying to get at
translate: 基西洛明显感到不适，因为他不明白你在说什么

original: The drowned men belong to Mother Maelstrom!
translate: 被淹死的人属于暴风雨之母！

original: Doesn’t matter if a few of them manage to wriggle onto shore for a last gulp of air
translate: 即使有几人侥幸爬上岸，最后还能吸一口空气

original: They’re drowned men nonetheless and all Basilo is doing is sending them back to where they belong
translate: 他们仍然是被淹死的人，基西洛只是将他们送回该去的地方

original: That’s the way we used to do on these islands
translate: 这就是我们这些岛屿上过去的做法

original: Now, most folk have forgotten
translate: 现在，大多数人都已经忘记了

original: But not me
translate: 但不是我

original: Not Basilo
translate: 也不是基西洛

original: My family has been here for a long time
translate: 我的家族在这里已经很久了

original: You deserve death!
translate: 你该死！

original: The man slinks off into the fog, heading north
translate: 那个男人悄悄融入雾中，向北方走去

original: As his form dissolves into the nothingness of the mist, you can hear him muttering to himself excitedly
translate: 当他的身影在雾气中消失时，你还能听到他自言自语的声音

original: No need for Basilo to risk his hide!
translate: 基西洛不需要冒险！

original: You seem fit enough and I’ve got coin!
translate: 你看起来不错，我手头有金币！

original: I’ll buy whatever you bring me
translate: 无论你带什么，我都会买下

original: Might even have a piece or two to sell if you’re interested
translate: 如果你感兴趣，我甚至可能有几件东西可以卖给你

original: Just beware them clippers
translate: 只是当心那些剪刀手

original: Clippers?
translate: 剪刀手？

original: I'd rather end you right here!
translate: 我宁愿现在就结果了你！

original: Not here out in the cold!
translate: 不要在外面的寒风中！

original: Find Basilo up by the farmhouse
translate: 基西洛在农舍那边

original: Might even have some soup cooking for you
translate: 甚至可能为你煮了些汤

original: There's the one who cheated Mother Maelstrom!
translate: 那就是那个欺骗玛埃尔斯特龙母亲的人！

original: And loaded with trinkets for old Basilo perhaps?
translate: 也许还带着一些小玩意给老基西洛？

original: There might be some fine coin in it for you
translate: 你可能会从中得到一笔不错的金币

original: The old man shakes a worn leather pouch at you that clinks with the sound of coins
translate: 老人晃动着一个磨损的皮革钱袋，里面发出叮当作响的声音

original: Stay as long as ye like
translate: 你可以待多久都行

original: Just don’t drink the water in the well
translate: 只是不要喝井里的水

original: Best not drink the water there
translate: 最好不要喝那里的水

original: Tastes funny and gives you strange dreams
translate: 味道怪异，还会做奇怪的梦

original: Besides, the children mostly use it for their games these days
translate: 而且，现在孩子们大多用它来玩了

original: #IdraLandingHowl
translate: #伊德拉着陆嚎叫

original: A blood-curdling howl cuts through the fog
translate: 一声令人毛骨悚然的嚎叫穿透了雾气

original: Whatever its source, it’s not far away and it sounds dangerous
translate: 无论其来源如何，它都不远，并且听上去很危险。

original: It may be unwise to proceed if you are still alone and poorly armed
translate: 如果你仍然孤身一人且装备简陋，贸然前行可能不是明智之举。

original: # Chapter_1_Lighthouse
translate: # 第一章 灯塔

original: #Chapter1DeadSailors
translate: # 第一章 死亡水手

original: The stench of rotting flesh fills your nostrils
translate: 腐肉的恶臭充斥着你的鼻孔。

original: Ahead of you, grotesquely misshapen crustacean horrors feast greedily on the corpses of the dead crew of the Zephyr
translate: 在你前方，畸形的甲壳类生物贪婪地啃食着“信风号”船员的尸体。

original: Blasted horrors!
translate: 疯狂的怪物！

original: Kat spits through gritted teeth!
translate: 卡特咬紧牙关，吐出唾沫！

original: What manner of force has spawned these creatures?
translate: 是什么力量孕育了这些生物？

original: #Chapter1IdraLighthouseCave
translate: # 第一章 伊德拉灯塔洞穴

original: The weathered box crumbles as you touch it, revealing an ancient knife of exquisitely carved greenish stone
translate: 你触碰那个破旧的盒子时，它碎裂开来，露出一把精雕细琢的绿石古刀。

original: With trembling hands you pick it up and for a moment the air around you seems to become charged with eldritch energies
translate: 你颤抖着手拿起它，周围的空间似乎充满了神秘的力量。

original: Sounds die down and your nostrils fill with the metallic tinge of ozone
translate: 声音渐渐平息，你的鼻孔里充满了臭氧的金属味道。

original: No doubt this is the object Mathias the lighthousekeeper asked you to retrieve
translate: 毫无疑问，这正是灯塔看守人马修斯让你取回的物品。

original: No doubt the blade is an object of strange and ancient magics
translate: 毫无疑问，这把刀是奇异而古老的魔法之物。

original: A sickly, wet bubbling sound snaps you back into focus
translate: 一股病态的、湿漉漉的咕噜声让你重新集中注意力。

original: All around you, the clay jars begin to stir and then, one after another, they burst with loud cracks as a thick substance pours from them
translate: 周围的陶罐开始摇晃，然后一个个在巨大的裂响声中爆开，浓稠的物质从它们里面倾泻而出。

original: To your horror, the viscous substance begins to move of its own volition towards you!
translate: 令你惊恐的是，那浓稠的物质竟然自主地向你移动！

original: Driina slowly walks around the slab, taking in the strange sight
translate: 德里娜缓缓绕着石板走动，仔细观察着这奇怪的景象

original: There is ritual at work here
translate: 这里正在进行某种仪式

original: Though nothing like the Imperial rites of Sepulcation
translate: 虽然与帝国的葬礼仪式完全不同

original: This is something different
translate: 这是完全不同的东西

original: There is a sense of technicality to it
translate: 这种仪式显得非常技术化

original: Like children observing a parent practicing some complex craft and trying to emulate it
translate: 像是孩子们在观察父母练习某种复杂的工艺，并试图模仿

original: She shudders
translate: 她颤抖着

original: It terrifies me
translate: 这让我感到恐惧

original: The dead stare indignantly at you with empty eye sockets as you examine their naked forms
translate: 你看到那些死者空洞的眼窝中瞪着你，赤裸的身躯显得十分荒诞

original: You find several lesions on them - no doubt caused by the strange instruments that surround them
translate: 你发现他们的身上有几个病灶——毫无疑问是那些奇怪的器具造成的

original: As to the purpose of the cuts, you have no idea
translate: 关于这些切割的目的，你毫无头绪

original: As you look more closely it becomes clear to you that these are not the incisions that are commonly associated with the removal of organs for embalming
translate: 越仔细观察，你越清楚这些不是通常用于器官取出的防腐处理的切割

original: In fact, from what you can tell, the corpses’ organs are still intact
translate: 实际上，从你所能看到的，这些尸体的器官似乎仍然完好无损

original: This ritual seems to have served another purpose
translate: 这种仪式似乎还有其他目的

original: Though what, you cannot possibly guess
translate: 但具体是什么，你完全猜不到

original: Carefully brushing away dust and cobwebs you survey the oddly shaped instruments
translate: 轻轻拂去尘土和蛛网，你审视着这些奇怪形状的器具

original: Their shapes vary from small blades to hooks and other, stranger forms
translate: 它们的形状从小小的刀片到钩子，再到其他更奇怪的形态

original: You have no idea as to their purpose
translate: 你完全不知道它们的具体用途

original: As you stand there pondering the strange scene before you, your eyes fall on a small wooden box
translate: 当你在那里沉思这奇怪的场景时，你的目光落在一个小木盒上

original: Examine the box
translate: 检查木盒

original: Even a cursory examination reveals that these instruments were likely used on the corpses but as far as you can tell they do not seem to be embalming tools
translate: 即使是粗略的检查也表明这些乐器可能是用于尸体上的，但从你所能看到的来看，它们似乎不是防腐工具。

original: Instead they seem more like primitive imitations of the tools Imperial surgeons use
translate: 相反，它们看起来更像是帝国外科医生使用的工具的原始模仿品。

original: An Ancient Corpse
translate: 一具古老的尸体

original: Two desiccated corpses lie carefully placed on a carved stone slab
translate: 两具干瘪的尸体被仔细地放在雕刻的石板上。

original: There is a deliberateness in their arrangement that gives the strong impression of forgotten secrets and ancient rituals
translate: 它们的排列方式显示出一种被遗忘的秘密和古老仪式的强烈暗示。

original: Scattered about the corpses are several strange looking metal instruments
translate: 尸体周围散落着几件奇怪的金属工具。

original: Examine the corpses
translate: 检查尸体。

original: Driina, what do you make of this?
translate: Driina，你对此有什么看法？

original: Examine the instruments
translate: 检查这些工具。

original: Sprawled on the ground ahead of you lies the mangled body of a man
translate: 你面前地上躺着一个被严重扭曲的男子尸体。

original: Stacked high against the walls behind the poor fellow are crates of goods and you have a feeling you've stumbled upon a smuggler's hideout
translate: 贫穷的家伙身后，高高的堆着装有货物的箱子，你有一种闯入了走私者藏身之处的感觉。

original: One that has seen fairly recent use
translate: 一个近期被使用过的藏身之处。

original: You enter into the larger chamber ahead and the temperature drops noticeably
translate: 你进入前方更大的房间，温度明显下降。

original: As the swirling dust and ghostly vapors subside, you make out the intimidating form of an ancient, carved monolith
translate: 当旋涡状的尘埃和鬼魅般的雾气消散后，你认出了那令人畏惧的古老雕刻巨石。

original: Painted on its face, you immediately recognize the crude spiral sign you saw on the standing stones above ground
translate: 巨石的表面，你立刻认出了在地面上竖立的石碑上看到的粗糙螺旋符号。

original: Painted on its face, you can make out the crude shape of a red spiral
translate: 巨石的表面，你勉强辨认出一个粗糙的红色螺旋形状。

original: Carefully arranged before the monolith lies two diminutive, desiccated corpses and along the edges of the chamber stand strange urns of unknown design
translate: 在巨石前，仔细排列着两具小型、干瘪的尸体，房间边缘立着一些设计奇特的陶罐。

original: The chamber has an aura of age beyond comprehension and your head begins to spin as you realize you may be the first to set foot in it for millennia
translate: 这个房间有一种难以理解的古老气息，你开始头晕，意识到自己可能是数千年间第一个踏入这里的人。

original: We shouldn't be here
translate: 我们不该在这里。

original: Kat whispers behind you
translate: Kat 在你身后低语。

original: The Tunnel
translate: 迷宫

original: Creeping through the narrow and cobweb covered tunnel it occurs to you that you’re likely the first to use it in decades
translate: 穿过狭窄且布满蜘蛛网的隧道，你意识到这可能是几十年来第一次有人使用它

original: It appears that neither the smugglers, nor whoever lies on the other end of the tunnel, knew of its existence
translate: 看来，无论是走私者，还是隧道另一端的那个人，都不知道它的存在

original: The wall ahead is no doubt another door and you put your shoulder to it
translate: 前方的墙壁无疑是一扇门，你用肩膀顶了上去

original: Expecting the massive slab of rock to be heavy, you're surprised to find it easily swings open and you nearly stumble into the room ahead
translate: 你本以为这巨大的岩石门会很沉重，没想到它竟然轻易地开了，你差点绊倒在前面的房间里

original: It occurs to you that given the doors clever design, there would likely have been no way of finding this door from the other side
translate: 你意识到，考虑到这扇门的设计巧妙，从另一端是根本找不到它的

original: #Chapter1Lighthouse
translate: #第一章灯塔

original: Mathias seems troubled by the questions and shifts uncomfortably
translate: 马蒂亚斯似乎被这些问题困扰，不安地挪动着身体

original: Had an assistant
translate: 有个助手

original: Caspar
translate: 卡斯帕

original: Went mad, the fool did!
translate: 疯了，那个蠢货！

original: Had a head full of grand ideas and I kept telling him
translate: 脑子里充满了宏伟的想法，我一直告诉他

original: This here is a place for the quiet mind
translate: 这里是安静心灵的地方

original: Threw himself from the tower
translate: 从塔上跳了下来

original: Found him broken on the cliffs
translate: 发现他在悬崖上奄奄一息

original: I can’t be blamed!
translate: 我不能被责怪！

original: Mathias’ jaw quivers and his eyes water over
translate: 马蒂亚斯的下颚颤抖，眼睛湿润

original: Mathias begins sobbing
translate: 马蒂亚斯开始啜泣

original: I should have known
translate: 我本应该知道

original: Gotten him off this rock
translate: 让他离开这座岛

original: When he started talking about the cave and something about a blade calling him I should have known
translate: 当他开始说起洞穴，还有什么东西召唤他时，我就应该知道

original: I could have saved him but I couldn’t bear the thought of being alone again
translate: 我本可以救他，但我不愿再独自一人

original: The silence is unbearable!
translate: 这种沉默让人无法忍受！

original: Ask about the cave and blade
translate: 问起洞穴和刀刃

original: He would babble about the cave underneath here for hours
translate: 他会不停地唠叨这个下面的洞穴，一说就是好几个小时

original: I’d tell him those were smuggler’s caves and that he was to leave them alone!
translate: 我会告诉他那是走私者的洞穴，让他别去招惹它们

original: Smugglers keep to themselves but no telling what they’ll do if you bother em
translate: 走私者自成一派，但你要是打扰他们，谁也不知道会发生什么

original: As to the 'blade' he talked about, that must’ve been the ravings of a mad man?
translate: 至于他所说的‘刀刃’，那一定是疯子的胡言乱语吧？

original: A soul lost to drink and loneliness!
translate: 一个因酗酒和孤独而迷失灵魂的人！

original: Oh poor boy
translate: 哎，可怜的孩子

original: Mathias wipes his eyes and exhales wearily
translate: 马修斯擦了擦眼睛，疲惫地叹了口气

original: Then again
translate: 再说

original: What if it is down there?
translate: 如果它真的在下面呢？

original: The black blade
translate: 黑色的刀刃

original: Hidden in some ancient recess, glistening in the dark
translate: 隐藏在某个古老的隐秘之处，在黑暗中闪烁

original: Mathias’ gaze grows distant for a moment
translate: 马修斯的目光暂时变得遥远

original: If it is, we needs to retrieve the blasted thing and destroy it!
translate: 如果是这样，我们就需要去取回那个该死的东西，并将其摧毁！

original: And that's where I come in?
translate: 而我就是来帮忙的？

original: Would you help an old man set things right?
translate: 你会帮助一个老人纠正这一切吗？

original: I’ll make it worth your while!
translate: 我会让你得到回报的！

original: Find that black blade and bring it here
translate: 找到那把黑刃，带到这里来

original: I needs to see the thing that took Caspar at least once before we destroy it!
translate: 在摧毁的桥梁下方的沟壑里，我至少得先看一眼那件东西，然后再毁掉它！

original: The entrance to the cave lies in the gully underneath the broken bridge
translate: 洞穴的入口位于摧毁的桥梁下方的沟壑里

original: Be careful!
translate: 谨慎些！

original: I think I've already found the blade in question
translate: 我认为我已经找到了那把黑刃

original: You mentioned smugglers?
translate: 你提到走私者了？

original: I should get going
translate: 我该出发了

original: Go to the smuggler-caves beneath the lighthouse and seek the blade that Caspar saw in his dreams
translate: 前往灯塔下的走私者洞穴，寻找卡斯帕梦中看到的黑刃

original: You’ll find the cave entrance underneath the broken bridge but once inside I know nothing save that the blade lies in deepest darkness
translate: 你会在摧毁的桥梁下方找到洞穴入口，但一旦进入，我只知道黑刃藏在最深的黑暗中

original: Show the ancient dagger
translate: 展示那把古老的匕首

original: I had a few more questions!
translate: 我还有一些问题要问！

original: Show it!
translate: 展示它！

original: the old man stammers excitedly
translate: 老人激动地结巴着

original: As you reveal the blade to him, his eyes widen and he tentatively reaches out for it
translate: 当你将黑刃展示给他时，他的眼睛瞪大了，他小心翼翼地伸出手去

original: It’s… beautiful
translate: 这……很美

original: Then his jaw clenches in determination and he recoils in apparent disgust
translate: 然后他的下颌紧绷，决心坚定，似乎厌恶地后退

original: But it’s evil
translate: 但这邪恶

original: Cursed I tell you!
translate: 我告诉过你，被诅咒了！

original: Don’t you feel it?
translate: 你没感觉到吗？

original: It has power!
translate: 它有力量！

original: And hunger
translate: 并且饥饿

original: I want nothing to do with this
translate: 我不想管这件事

original: Take it and bring it far away from here
translate: 拿去，把它远远地带离这里

original: Destroy it!
translate: 破坏它！

original: All I would ask is you don’t throw it in the ocean
translate: 我唯一的要求是不要把它扔进海洋

original: There are beings there that would wield it
translate: 那里有能够驾驭它的生物

original: In any case, I promised to make it worth your while and I will
translate: 无论如何，我承诺会让它值得你一试，我会做到的

original: Take this!
translate: 拿这个！

original: The old man hands you an amulet
translate: 老人递给你一个护符

original: This’ll serve you well on your journeys
translate: 这个在你的旅程中会很有帮助

original: It’ll keep your body strong and free of disease!
translate: 这能让你的身体保持强壮，远离疾病！

original: That being said, I would ask another thing of you
translate: 至于其他，我还想再请你做一件事

original: Horryn went dark, about the same time the animals ran amok
translate: 希罗恩变得黑暗，大约是在动物们开始失控的时候

original: There was smoke on the wind - and screams too, I could swear it
translate: 风中弥漫着烟雾——还有尖叫声，我发誓我听到了战斗的声音

original: Sounded like battle
translate: 或者更确切地说，是屠杀

original: Or perhaps slaughter is more like it
translate: 但我想镇子北边可能有一个营地

original: But I think there is a camp of sorts just north of town
translate: 破旧的帐篷之类的

original: Ragged tents and such
translate: 也许有生还者？

original: Survivors perhaps?
translate: 我曾想过亲自去那里看看

original: I thought about going there to see for myself
translate: 我曾想过亲自去那里看看

original: But I changed my mind
translate: 但我改变主意了

original: The old man hangs his head dejectedly, before continuing in a whisper
translate: 老人垂下头，沮丧地叹了口气，然后低声继续说

original: Safer here
translate: 这里更安全

original: Tending to the light
translate: 照顾那束光

original: As you enter the lighthouse gallery, a haggard face peers out at you from the gloom
translate: 当你进入灯塔画廊时，一抹憔悴的脸庞从黑暗中望向你

original: Moving closer, you see it belongs to an old man, who clutches a makeshift spear tightly to his chest
translate: 走近一看，你发现那是一张老人的脸，他紧紧抱着一根临时制作的长矛

original: Somehow he looks both fearful yet greatly relieved to see you
translate: 他看起来既害怕又明显松了一口气，见到你

original: Mother of maelstroms!
translate: 暴风雨之母啊！

original: The man croaks
translate: 那人嘶哑着嗓子说

original: Who are ye, then?
translate: 你是谁？

original: Who did I summon?
translate: 我召唤的是谁？

original: Come, sit, you must be weary
translate: 来，坐下，你一定很疲惫了

original: Sit!
translate: 坐下！

original: The man gestures frantically to a battered chair in the corner
translate: 那人急切地朝角落里一把破旧的椅子示意

original: Travellers
translate: 旅人

original: Nothing more
translate: 就是这样

original: I was shipwrecked here
translate: 我在这里触礁沉船了

original: By something foul
translate: 是某种邪恶的东西

original: Either way, the tides have brought ye to me!
translate: 不管怎样，潮汐将你带到了我这里！

original: I knew my signals and prayers would be answered
translate: 我知道我的信号和祷告终会得到回应

original: The mother of maelstroms is a cruel mistress, it must be said, it's only fit she repays me in such a darkened hour
translate: 暴风雨之母是个残酷的女主人，确实如此，她只配在这样的黑暗时刻偿还我。

original: What happened here?
translate: 发生了什么事？

original: We were shipwrecked
translate: 我们遭遇了海难。

original: By a leviathan
translate: 是一条独眼巨兽。

original: Something foul is growing on Idra
translate: 在伊德拉，有什么邪恶的东西在滋生。

original: A taint on the land!
translate: 土地被玷污了！

original: There are lights!
translate: 有光！

original: Lights as you've never seen; like those sailors from the high north talk of
translate: 你从未见过这样的光芒；就像北方水手们谈论的那种。

original: But the colors
translate: 但是那些色彩

original: It's like they bleed into your very dreams!
translate: 它们仿佛渗入了你的梦境！

original: If you can manage to sleep that is
translate: 如果你能睡得着的话。

original: It got to the animals first though
translate: 它先是影响了动物。

original: Warped them in both mind and body!
translate: 在心灵和身体上都扭曲了它们！

original: Made 'em cruel and dangerous
translate: 使它们变得残忍而危险。

original: I ain't never seen nothing like it!
translate: 我从未见过这样的东西！

original: It's unnatural I tell you!
translate: 这是不自然的！

original: But worse still, Horryn is dead as a tomb!
translate: 更糟糕的是，霍里恩已经死得像坟墓一样了！

original: Was a right bedlam of cries and screams two days ago - then nothing!
translate: 两天前这里是一片混乱，满是哭喊声，然后就什么都没有了！

original: Not as much as a lit candle at night!
translate: 甚至没有一根点燃的蜡烛的光芒！

original: Only the deep itself knows the truth of these happenings, but I can tell you this: the island is doomed!
translate: 只有深渊本身才知道这些事件的真相，但我可以告诉你：这座岛屿注定要灭亡！

original: The sea itself will rise to claim us!
translate: 海水本身将会上涨，将我们吞噬！

original: I need some information
translate: 我需要一些信息。

original: Foolish superstition
translate: 荒谬的迷信。

original: I need proper information!
translate: 我需要准确的信息！

original: There are all manner of beasts in the deep oceans of our world, but never have I seen anything like this!
translate: 我们的深海中有各种各样的野兽，但我从未见过如此可怕的东西！

original: A horror from beyond the natural it was, that pulled down that ship!
translate: 那艘船被从自然之外的恐怖拉下了水！

original: I saw it all from my tower I did
translate: 我是从我的塔楼里看到这一切的。

original: Though I wish I did not have to bear such a sight
translate: 虽然我不愿目睹这样的景象。

original: I can hardly belive that anyone could survive such a nightmare
translate: 我简直难以相信有人能从这样的噩梦中幸存。

original: I did
translate: 我做到了。

original: It matters not
translate: 这无关紧要。

original: How then did the tides release you, when so many others were claimed?
translate: 那么潮汐是如何将你释放，而其他人却被卷走的呢？

original: The keeper leans in and fixes you with an unwavering gaze
translate: 看门人凑近你，用坚定的目光注视着你。

original: Are you blessed?
translate: 你是被祝福的吗？

original: Or perhaps cursed is more like it?
translate: 或者说，更可能是被诅咒的？

original: Cursed?
translate: 被诅咒的？

original: Neither, I think
translate: 不是的，我认为不是。

original: Now, what happened here?
translate: 那么，这里发生了什么？

original: Oh you have more important matters to deal with?
translate: 哦，你还有更重要的事情要处理？

original: Well, I must keep watching...seeing
translate: 好吧，我必须继续观察……见证。

original: The old man trails off, eyes unfocusing
translate: 老人停了下来，眼神变得茫然

original: Forgive me for not being of more help
translate: 对不起，没能提供更多帮助

original: We really need to go
translate: 我们真的需要走了

original: You're a fool to go!
translate: 你真是个傻瓜去那里！

original: There is nothing beyond the light but despair!
translate: 在光芒之外只有绝望！

original: And
translate: 而且

original: The old man sighs
translate: 老人叹了口气

original: But, I'll be here waiting here for you
translate: 但是，我会在这里等你

original: For when you return
translate: 当你回来的时候

original: As I must
translate: 就像我必须做的那样

original: Anything, ye may ask!
translate: 任何事情，你可以问我

original: We're safe as can be here
translate: 这里是最安全的地方

original: The old man seems eager at the prospect of conversation
translate: 老人对于交谈显得非常渴望

original: Ask about the Santa Fury
translate: 问问关于圣 fury 的事情

original: How long have you been alone?
translate: 你独自一人多久了？

original: There are smugglers on Idra?
translate: 在伊德拉有走私者？

original: Tell me about Horryn
translate: 告诉我关于霍林的事情

original: What did you need me to do again?
translate: 你让我再做什么？

original: Remind me what you needed!
translate: 提醒我你需要什么！

original: Actually, I should make ready to leave
translate: 其实，我应该准备离开了

original: This here beacon is all's keeping the horrors of this island from my throat!
translate: 这个信号灯塔正防止着岛上的恐怖事物靠近我的喉咙！

original: Thing is, oil is running low and I got nary a drop left in storage
translate: 问题是，油快用完了，我储藏室里连一滴都没有了。

original: I need you to find me some oil afore darkness takes us!
translate: 你需要帮我找到一些油，否则黑暗将吞噬我们！

original: Thing is, the oil was coming from the mainland on ships through Horryn
translate: 油是从霍林通过船只从大陆运来的。

original: Then things went dark and now there’s no way for me to get to it
translate: 然后一切变得黑暗，现在我无法到达那里。

original: If it’s still in Horryn, there’s a good chance it’ll be sitting in one of the warehouses in the harbor
translate: 如果油还在霍林，有很大可能它会放在港口的某个仓库里。

original: I'll do my best
translate: 我会尽力而为。

original: Show oil
translate: 展示油。

original: That’s all I ask
translate: 这就是我所要求的全部。

original: I’ll be waiting here for you, tending the fire as best I can
translate: 我会在这里等你，尽我所能地守护着火堆。

original: I’m running out of oil!
translate: 我快用完油了！

original: I suspect the shipment is stuck in a warehouse in Horryn and I need you to search for it there
translate: 我怀疑货物被卡在霍林的某个仓库里，需要你去那里寻找。

original: You’ll likely find it in one of the warehouses on the waterfront
translate: 你很可能会在港口边的某个仓库里找到它。

original: Give oil
translate: 给我油。

original: Blessed Dead, I knew you could do it!
translate: 圣灵保佑，我知道你能做到！

original: If nothing else, seeing the light still burning bright is bound to give people hope!
translate: 至少，看到灯光依然明亮，会给人带来希望！

original: Emperor’s Light and all!
translate: 帝国之光万岁！

original: Let's hope so!
translate: 希望如此！

original: All I have to offer in way of reward is my old sword
translate: 我能提供的报酬只有我的旧剑了。

original: It once served me well but it's getting too heavy for me now
translate: 它曾经为我效过力，但现在对我来说太重了。

original: Mathias produces an old, but well-crafted broadsword wrapped in cloth
translate: 莫塔西斯拿出一把旧但做工精良的长剑，剑身包裹着布料

original: I'll be on my way now
translate: 我这就出发

original: Ye're back
translate: 你们回来了

original: I knew ye'd seek safe harbor once more, drawn to the light like lost moths
translate: 我知道你们会再次寻求安全的港湾，就像被吸引的飞蛾一样

original: Well then; Sit, rest, make yourself at home
translate: 那就请坐，休息一下，让自己感觉自在些

original: There might still be some stew left
translate: 还剩下一些炖菜

original: I found the black blade
translate: 我找到了那把黑剑

original: I have oil for you!
translate: 我有油给你！

original: I don't have time to linger!
translate: 我没时间停留！

original: I can't say I've ever heard about a ship by that name
translate: 我从未听说过有这样一艘船

original: And let me tell you, I've worked this lighthouse for a man’s age and I’ll say this much
translate: 而且让我告诉你，我已经在这个灯塔工作了大半辈子，我可以这么说

original: There’s no ship to be found around here as far as I know!
translate: 以我所知，附近根本找不到任何船

original: Idra's thick with them
translate: 希德拉到处都是

original: Carrying wares to the mainland for the Freythen
translate: 为弗雷then运输货物到大陆

original: Island’s riddled with caves and they use them to store their contraband and whatnot
translate: 岛上布满了洞穴，他们用来储存走私物品之类的东西

original: But they keep to themselves and I want no trouble so I let them be
translate: 但他们彼此保持距离，我不想惹麻烦，所以让他们继续

original: #Chapter1LighthouseMisc
translate: #第一章灯塔杂项

original: For all its alienness, you still recognize the arcane machinery
translate: 尽管这机器看起来很陌生，但你仍然能认出它的法术装置

original: An ancient Imperial reticular node
translate: 一个古老的帝国网状节点

original: You suspect this lighthouse was once fueled by reticular energy and that this machine was part of its operation
translate: 你怀疑这个灯塔曾经使用过网状能量，并且这台机器是其运作的一部分

original: The stillness and layer of dust, however, tell you that it's long since fallen into disrepair and that the lighthouse is likely now fueled by common oil
translate: 然而，这里的寂静和积尘表明它早已荒废，灯塔现在很可能使用的是普通油料。

original: As you stand there, beholding the strange machine, you become aware of the scraping of tiny claws in the darkness
translate: 当你站在那里，凝视着那台奇怪的机器时，你察觉到黑暗中传来细微爪子的刮擦声。

original: Then chittering
translate: 然后是吱吱声。

original: As you reach for your weapon the strange harmonics of the chittering converge and for the briefest of moments you could have sworn you heard words formed
translate: 当你伸手取武器时，那奇怪的吱吱声合奏在最短的一瞬间，你几乎听到了话语的形成。

original: Half a dozen beasts launch at you from the dark corners of the room with fangs bared!
translate: 半打怪兽从房间的黑暗角落冲向你，獠牙毕露！

original: Creeping through the moldy lighthouse cellar you round a corner and stop dead in your tracks
translate: 沿着发霉的灯塔地窖悄悄前行，你转过一个弯，突然停下了脚步。

original: Rising up through the core of the tower, is a grotesque-looking metallic monstrosity
translate: 在塔心处，耸立着一个畸形的金属怪物。

original: The strangely organic shapes and odd geometries seem to writhe in the dim light and the burnished sylver coating casts a ghostly reflection on the walls
translate: 奇怪的有机形状和奇异的几何图形在昏暗的光线下扭曲着，镀银的表面在墙壁上投下幽灵般的反射。

original: #Chapter1LighthouseQuest
translate: #第一章灯塔任务

original: There is nothing more you can do for me right now
translate: 目前你无法再为我做更多了

original: What of it?
translate: 有什么问题吗？

original: What can I do to help?
translate: 我能做些什么来帮助？

original: About that job
translate: 关于那份工作

original: Remind me what you need
translate: 提醒我你需要什么

original: I have the oil!
translate: 我有油料！

original: Glad to help
translate: 很高兴能帮忙

original: Mathias stares absent mindedly into the fire
translate: 马蒂亚斯茫然地盯着火堆。

original: I was wondering about something else
translate: 我在想其他事情

original: It's time to leave
translate: 是时候离开了

original: #Chapter1UWMaze
translate: #第一章UW迷宫

original: You utter an underwater scream of pain and terror but before you can act further, the creature has retreated back into one of the holes
translate: 你发出一声水下痛苦和恐惧的尖叫，但在你能进一步行动之前，生物已经退回到一个洞穴中

original: Swim south
translate: 向南游

original: Quickly rummaging through the poor fellows belongings, you try not to think about your own dwindling air supply
translate: 迅速翻找这个家伙的随身物品，你尽量不去想自己日益减少的空气供应

original: In a pouch on his belt you find a handful of coins and a key
translate: 在他腰带上的一个袋子中，你找到了一把硬币和一把钥匙

original: Now, you’ve lingered too long already and you must move on
translate: 现在，你已经停留得太久了，必须继续前进

original: Tunnels lead to the north and west
translate: 向北和向西有隧道

original: Swim north
translate: 向北游

original: Swim west
translate: 向西游

original: You break the surface and find yourself back in the cave system where you started
translate: 你冲破水面，发现自己回到了起点的洞穴系统

original: For all its bleakness, you nonetheless feel a sense of relief at returning to this area
translate: 尽管这里一片荒凉，但你还是感到一种回到这个区域的解脱感

original: You break the surface and emerge into an alien world
translate: 你冲破水面，进入一个陌生的世界

original: The air is stale and damp and the walls are so covered in algae and fungus that they almost appear to writhe
translate: 空气陈旧潮湿，墙壁上覆盖着藻类和菌类，几乎显得在蠕动

original: In the faint bioluminescence of the cave's bizarre underwater flora, you make out three passages
translate: 在洞穴奇特水下植物发出的微弱生物光线下，你辨认出三条通道

original: North and east takes you further into the cave system whilst west leads back to the surface
translate: 向北和向东带你进一步深入洞穴系统，而向西则回到地表

original: Swim east
translate: 向东游

original: A large domed chamber
translate: 一个巨大的穹顶大厅

original: Writing sea-weed covers the floor and reaches up towards you like groping tentacles
translate: 海藻覆盖着地面，向上伸展，如同摸索的触手

original: You shudder as one of the slimy tendrils brush your skin
translate: 你颤抖着，因为一条黏滑的触手轻触你的皮肤

original: Three tunnels lead out of this chamber
translate: 这个大厅有三条通道通向外面

original: East, west and south
translate: 向东、向西和向南

original: The tunnel narrows somewhat here before opening up into a slightly larger chamber with two exits
translate: 这里的隧道稍微狭窄了一些，然后开阔成一个略大的房间，有两个出口

original: West and south
translate: 西边和南边

original: The bioluminescence is so faint in this chamber that you almost fail to spot the tunnels leading north and east
translate: 这个房间里的生物发光非常微弱，几乎让你没注意到通往北边和东边的隧道

original: Suspended in the middle of this chamber is the corpse of a young man
translate: 这个房间中央悬挂着一名年轻男子的尸体

original: His features are softened by the sickly glow of the algae growing here but there is no mistaking the mask of terror that froze on his face as he drowned
translate: 他脸上的特征被这里的藻类发出的病态光芒柔和了，但你无法忽视他脸上因溺水而凝固的惊恐表情

original: A bend where the tunnel leads east or south
translate: 这里是通往东边或南边的拐角

original: Sharp limpet-like growths cover the wall and you take care not to cut yourself as you squeeze past
translate: 墙上长满了尖刺状的突起，你小心翼翼地挤过去，以免划伤自己

original: This chamber is flat with a low ceiling and three tunnels leading north, east and west
translate: 这个房间地面平坦，天花板很低，有三条隧道分别通往北边、东边和西边

original: The walls of this bulbous chamber are pockmarked with a dozen smaller tube-like holes leading deeper into the bedrock
translate: 这个球状房间的墙壁上布满了十几个小管状孔洞，通向更深处的岩层

original: As you contemplate the folly of sticking your hand into one of them, an eel-like creature darts from one of the holes and bites into your flesh with tiny, razor sharp fangs
translate: 当你考虑把手伸进其中一个孔洞时，一条鳗鱼状的生物从其中一个孔洞中窜出，用细小而锋利的獠牙咬住了你的皮肤

original: This chamber is bathed in a greenish glow coming from the eastern tunnel that leads to the surface
translate: 这个房间被来自东边通往地表的隧道发出的绿光所笼罩

original: The western exit leads deeper into the cave system
translate: 西边的出口通向更深的洞穴系统

original: Underwater Tunnel
translate: 水下隧道

original: You find yourself at the opening of a narrow underwater tunnel and wonder how long you can hold your breath
translate: 你发现自己站在一条狭窄的水下隧道入口，开始思考自己能憋多长时间的气

original: Do you dive in?
translate: 你要潜入隧道吗？

original: Dive into the tunnel
translate: 潜入隧道

original: This narrow underwater tunnel serves as the only exit from this cave
translate: 这条狭窄的水下隧道是通往这个洞穴的唯一出口

original: You hope you remember the way back
translate: 希望你能记得回去的路

original: #SantaFury
translate: #SantaFury

original: Carylla
translate: Carylla

original: A sinewy, armored woman with a shield slung on her back and a broadsword at her side stands by a small campfire
translate: 一位身手矫健、身披铠甲的女子背着盾牌，腰间挂着一把阔剑，站在一个小营火旁

original: She’s grunting and cursing under her breath as she clumsily tries to bind a wound on her arm
translate: 她低声咒骂着，笨拙地试图用她的左手给自己的手臂包扎伤口

original: Dried blood and mud cakes her face and armor and she looks haggard
translate: 干涸的血液和泥巴糊住了她的脸和铠甲，她看上去疲惫不堪

original: She freezes as she sees you emerge from the fog
translate: 她突然僵住了，看到你从雾中走出

original: A suspicious frown falls over her face
translate: 她脸上露出一个怀疑的表情

original: Let me help you!
translate: 让我来帮你！

original: she growls as she finishes the tourniquet using her good arm and teeth
translate: 她低吼着，用她的好手和牙齿完成了止血带的绑扎

original: Bless you for offering but I can manage
translate: 你的好意我心领了，但我能应付

original: I would kill for some water though!
translate: 要是有口水喝就好了！

original: Offer her a drink from your waterskin
translate: 从你的水囊中给她喝口水

original: Name’s Carylla
translate: 我叫卡莉拉

original: Used to call myself captain of our little mercenary company
translate: 我过去曾是那支小佣兵公司的队长

original: Some rich trader from Adler’s paid us well to come here and look for the Fury
translate: 有个来自阿德勒的富商给我们丰厚的报酬，让我们来这里寻找怒焰

original: Things went to shit quickly
translate: 事情很快就变得糟糕起来

original: I’ve been losing my crew one by one
translate: 我一个接一个地失去了我的手下

original: Nillas and Pieter ‘got their coins’ yesterday
translate: 尼拉和皮特昨天“拿走了他们的报酬”

original: Torn to pieces by those fucking hounds
translate: 被那些该死的狗撕成了碎片

original: It’s just me now
translate: 现在我一个人了

original: What’s the Fury?
translate: 怒焰是什么？

original: Carylla packs up her gear and begins to carefully make her way through the mist until she’s gone
translate: 卡莉拉收拾好行装，小心地穿过雾气，直到消失不见

original: I would hate to see you spill your guts on this bloody island looking for some ghost-ship
translate: 我可不想看到你在这片血腥的岛屿上寻找幽灵船时累得精疲力尽。

original: Then again, you might have better luck then me and my
translate: 再说，你也许比我和我的同伴们更有运气。

original: Carylla stops briefly and her eyes water up
translate: 卡里拉停顿了一下，眼中泛起了泪光。

original: Just be careful
translate: 只是小心点。

original: Idra’s not peaceful any more and I suspect there are things out in the mist far worse than the hounds
translate: 伊德拉已经不再平静，我怀疑在那片迷雾中，有比猎犬更可怕的东西。

original: Honestly I don’t know where to start
translate: 实话说，我不知道从何说起。

original: There were lights in the sky
translate: 天空中有光芒。

original: Flashes and orbs
translate: 闪电和光球。

original: Some over Horryn and others over the island’s interior
translate: 有些在霍里恩上空，还有一些在岛屿内部。

original: Minor quakes even
translate: 甚至还有轻微的地震。

original: And then things went real bad
translate: 然后情况变得糟糕起来。

original: People lost their minds and animals started changing
translate: 人们精神失常，动物也开始发生变化。

original: What terrifies me is I can’t even tell you how long that was ago!
translate: 最可怕的是，我甚至不知道那到底是多久以前的事了！

original: Her voice rises in an anxious tone
translate: 她的声音带着焦虑的语气。

original: I just need to get away from here!
translate: 我只想尽快离开这里！

original: Off this fucking rock!
translate: 离开这个该死的岛屿！

original: What will you do now?
translate: 你现在打算怎么办？

original: I’ll try to make my way east, around the bay
translate: 我打算向东走，绕过海湾。

original: Maybe there are larger groups of survivors there and perhaps even someone with a way of getting away from here
translate: 或许那里有更大的幸存者群体，也许还有人知道逃离这里的方法。

original: And if you ever find that bloody treasure, buy me a drink next time we run into each other
translate: 而如果你真的找到了那该死的财宝，下次我们再见面的时候给我买杯酒。

original: A Painting
translate: 一幅画

original: Hanging on the wall, you see a dramatic but not particularly artful painting of a ship with torn sails caught in a terrible storm
translate: 墙上挂着一幅描绘一艘帆破浪中的船的戏剧性但不特别有艺术感的画

original: Your mind wanders to the Zephyr and its grizzly fate and you shudder
translate: 你的思绪飘向塞斐尔及其悲惨的命运，你不禁打了个寒颤

original: Look closer
translate: 看得更仔细些

original: Leaning in you notice that there is a name painted on the side of the ship
translate: 仔细一看，你注意到船侧有名字被画了出来

original: The Santa Fury
translate: 圣 fury 号

original: Could this be it?
translate: 这就是它吗？

original: Is this what the rumor that the Santa Fury could be found near the lighthouse on Idra meant?
translate: 这是不是那个关于圣 fury 号可能在伊德拉灯塔附近被发现的谣言所说的？

original: Examine the painting even closer
translate: 更仔细地检查这幅画

original: Examining the painting more carefully reveals nothing
translate: 更仔细地检查这幅画并没有发现什么

original: Not until you turn it over!
translate: 直到你把它翻过来！

original: Written in faint lettering in the lower left corner of the painting's backside you can clearly make out a poem of sorts
translate: 在画的背面左下角，用模糊的笔迹清晰地写着一首诗

original: The Poem
translate: 诗

original: From the center of the three, The Santy Fury made her flight
translate: 在三者中间，圣 fury 号开始了它的航行

original: Setting out to hide her booty, All within the lighthouse's sight
translate: 出发去隐藏她的战利品，都在灯塔的视线之内

original: leagues south began her trip, "5 east" the Captain cried. 4 more north, our valiant ship, Our plunder we shall hide!
translate: 向南航行了数个海里，“5个东边”，船长喊道。再向北航行4个海里，我们勇敢的船，我们的战利品我们将隐藏起来！

original: Land ahoy!
translate: 岬角在望！

original: went up the roar
