translate: 声音越来越大

original: We'll lay our treasure there!
translate: 我们将在那里埋藏我们的财宝！

original: Into the rising sun: 3 more, Then dig and have no fear!
translate: 向上升起的太阳：再航行3个海里，然后挖掘，不要害怕！

original: You hastily take down the poem in your journal
translate: 你匆匆在日记本上记下这首诗

original: Excitement washes over you as you realize that you may in fact be on the trail of something more than an old sailor’s tale!
translate: 你心中涌起激动，意识到自己可能正在追寻的不仅仅是一个老水手的故事！

original: If you can make sense of the poem that is
translate: 如果你能理解这首诗的话

original: A wise call
translate: 非常明智的选择

original: You may go far yet
translate: 你或许还有机会

original: But a friendly piece of advice between colleagues
translate: 这是同事之间的一条善意的建议

original: Don’t search for us
translate: 不要寻找我们

original: Forget this ever happened and move on
translate: 忘记这一切，继续前行

original: She offers a short bow before the group dissolves back into the fog with the idol in hand
translate: 她向队伍微微鞠了一躬，然后带着偶像消失在浓雾中

original: Silence descends around you as you pick up the jewelry left behind
translate: 周围陷入沉默，你捡起地上的珠宝

original: It will certainly fetch a nice purse
translate: 这定能换来一笔不错的财富

original: Yet you cannot shake the image of that grotesque idol from your mind
translate: 但你无法摆脱那个畸形偶像的形象

original: Part of you prays you never see it again whilst another knows with absolute certainty you will
translate: 一方面你祈祷永远不要再见到它，而另一方面你确信自己一定会再次见到它

original: What!
translate: 什么！

original: Never heard of the Santa Fury?
translate: 从未听说过圣· fury？

original: She was an Ombarian treasure-ship, they say
translate: 据说她是一艘奥姆巴里安的财宝船

original: Disappeared around 40 cycles ago and it’s said she was laden heavy when she went
translate: 据说她大约四十年前就消失了，而且据说她离开时载满了财宝

original: People been looking for her ever since
translate: 人们一直在寻找她

original: Me, I never put any stock in the legend
translate: 而我从来都不相信这个传说

original: Sailor’s tale
translate: 水手的故事

original: But then this rich fop from Adler’s up and offered to pay me and my company to go here and look for it
translate: 但随后，来自阿德勒的那位富有的花花公子竟然主动提出要支付我们和我们的同伴，去这里寻找它

original: Well, 'easy money' we thought
translate: 我们当时想，这可是轻松赚一笔

original: Idra’s not huge and according to the trader, rumor had it she lay on dry land near the lighthouse
translate: 伊德拉并不是很大，据商人说，据说她就躺在灯塔附近的干地上

original: And there’s only one lighthouse on Idra see, so sounded easy enough
translate: 而且伊德拉只有一个灯塔，听起来似乎很简单

original: No reason to expect any bloodshed either
translate: 也没有理由期待有什么流血事件

original: Idra used to be nice and peaceful
translate: 伊德拉曾经很美好，也很宁静

original: Our steel was mostly in case we did find it and needed to guard any treasure
translate: 我们的武器主要是为了以防万一，如果我们真的找到了它，并需要保护任何财宝

original: Needless to say, that’s not how it went
translate: 用不着说，事情并没有按我们想的那样发展

original: You didn’t find anything?
translate: 你们什么都没找到吗？

original: Not a scrap
translate: 一点都没有

original: We've searched every inch of this island and let me tell you
translate: 我们已经搜遍了这个岛上的每一个角落，让我告诉你

original: The Santa Fury’s not here!
translate: 圣怒号不在这里！

original: It bloody can’t be!
translate: 这怎么可能！

original: A fucking ship on dry land?
translate: 一艘该死的船竟然在干地上？

original: And near the lighthouse nonetheless?
translate: 而且就在灯塔附近？

original: It does not exist!
translate: 它根本就不存在！

original: Mind if I give it a go?
translate: 我可以试一试吗？

original: Buried Treasure
translate: 隐藏的财宝

original: Digging through the rocky soil, you’re almost ready to give up then your shovel suddenly strikes something metallic
translate: 在岩石土壤中挖掘，你几乎要放弃了，然后你的铲子突然碰到了什么东西金属的

original: A small but sturdy strong-box
translate: 一个小巧但坚固的铁箱

original: Though it appears to have something inside, this is far from the fabled mountains of gold that Ombarian treasure-ships were said to carry
translate: 尽管看起来里面似乎有东西，但这远不是奥姆巴里安传说中的装满黄金的山脉。

original: Open the box
translate: 打开盒子

original: The box swings open without difficulty
translate: 盒子轻而易举地打开了

original: Inside lies a small pile of strange and exotic looking jewelry
translate: 盒子里躺着一堆奇怪且异域风情的珠宝

original: And underneath it: an artifact wrapped in rough linen
translate: 而在下面：一件用粗糙亚麻布包裹的法器

original: As you reach for it, a ringing rises in your ears and you go light headed
translate: 当你伸手去拿时，耳中响起了铃声，你感到一阵晕眩

original: Excitement?
translate: 兴奋吗？

original: Something else
translate: 还是别的东西

original: The bundle tumbles from your hands and as it does, it becomes unwrapped
translate: 你手中的包裹滚落，同时它也解开了

original: Laying on the ground in front of you is a hideous idol carved from some unknown greenish-black rock
translate: 地上摊开的是一件令人作呕的雕像，雕刻在一种未知的绿黑色岩石上

original: An amorphous shape of eyes, mouths and tentacles that manages to convey a sense of immensity in spite of the effigy’s small size
translate: 一个不成形的形状，由眼睛、嘴巴和触手构成，尽管雕像很小，却给人一种宏大的感觉

original: Hand over the idol
translate: 交出雕像

original: The voice cuts through the mist like a dagger
translate: 声音如同匕首般穿透了雾气

original: You turn around to see Carylla and a handful of other shapes approaching threateningly with weapons drawn
translate: 你转身看到卡莉拉和其他几个人形生物手持武器，威胁地朝你走来

original: I can’t bloody believe it!
translate: 我简直不敢相信！

original: It worked!
translate: 成功了！

original: I told you all it would
translate: 我早就告诉过你们会成功

original: one of the men flanking Carylla rants excitedly before she cuts him off with a poisonous glance
translate: 卡莉拉身旁的一名男子激动地嚷嚷着，但她用一个毒辣的眼神打断了他

original: Shut your bloody trap Pieter!
translate: 闭上你那该死的嘴，皮特尔！

original: You!
translate: 你！

original: she points her sword towards you
translate: 她将剑指向你

original: Hand over the idol!
translate: 把雕像交出来！

original: Kick it over
translate: 踢开它！

original: Not going to happen!
translate: 绝对不可能！

original: The men I work for
translate: 我工作的那些人

original: They will go so much further than just spilling your blood to get what they seek
translate: 他们不仅仅是为了获取你所寻求的东西而流你的血，他们会走得更远

original: A smile, strangely sympathetic, flashes over her face
translate: 她脸上闪过一抹奇怪的同情微笑

original: Then she clicks her tongue and the men flanking her charge!
translate: 然后她吧嗒吧嗒舌头，两侧的男子冲了上来！

original: # Chapter_1_RefugeeCamp
translate: # 第一章 流民营地

original: #Chapter1Chamberlain
translate: # 第一章 官员

original: From what I hear, these men were bands of local fishermen and sailors!
translate: 听说，这些人是当地渔民和水手组成的团伙！

original: But why would they do something like this?
translate: 但他们为什么要这么做？

original: Horryn was their home and for all his shortcomings, there were few Imperial officials as lenient as the governor!
translate: 好瑞恩是他们的家，尽管他有许多缺点，但总督是帝国官员中最宽容的！

original: Where is the governor now?
translate: 现在总督在哪里？

original: I didn't see him as we fle
translate: 我们逃跑时没看到他

original: I mean 'made our strategic retreat'
translate: 我的意思是我们战略性地撤退了

original: I can only assume he died in the chaos
translate: 我只能假设他在混乱中死了

original: And the cruelest joke of all
translate: 最残忍的玩笑莫过于此

original: That leaves me the ranking Imperial Official on the island
translate: 这样一来，我就只剩下岛上的帝国官员之位了

original: Farewell for now
translate: 暂时告辞

original: Driina scowls at you
translate: Driina对你皱起了眉头

original: Markus shakes his head dejectedly
translate: Markus沮丧地摇着头

original: I’m certainly not going to beg you for aid
translate: 我当然不会向你求援

original: But I’ll say, if there exists a way to retake the city, I believe it is contingent on the survival of this camp
translate: 但是，如果真的有办法重新夺回城市，我相信这取决于这个营地的存续

original: Beyond that, I bid you go to whatever fate awaits you
translate: 除此之外，愿你去往命运的安排

original: What can I do to help then?
translate: 那我还能做些什么来帮助呢？

original: The color drains from Markus' face
translate: Markus的脸色变得苍白

original: But… but Driina are you leaving as well?
translate: 但是……但是Driina，你也打算离开吗？

original: I need you here in camp
translate: 我需要你留在营地里

original: We've already discussed this!
translate: 我们已经讨论过了！

original: I cannot do this without you!
translate: 没有你，我做不到！

original: I'm not a leader - I'm a glorified scribe!
translate: 我不是领导者，只是一个虚有其表的书记官！

original: Who will keep their spirits up?
translate: 谁能鼓舞士气？

original: And what am I going to do when people start dying from the outbreak?
translate: 而当人们因为疫情开始死亡时，我又该做什么？

original: All the blood and shit and
translate: 所有的鲜血和污秽

original: You will find your strength, my old friend
translate: 我的老朋友，你会找到力量的

original: The Golden Dead will guide you
translate: 金死灵会引导你

original: Besides, we both know that nothing will be solved by me waiting here in camp
translate: 而且，我们都知道，我在这里等待并不能解决问题

original: We must try to seize the initiative in whatever way we can
translate: 我们必须尽可能争取主动

original: Driina puts her hand on his shoulder
translate: 德里娜把手放在他的肩膀上

original: Markus lets out a deep sigh before looking up
translate: 马库斯叹了口气，然后抬起头来

original: You are right, Driina
translate: 你说得对，德里娜

original: As always
translate: 就像往常一样

original: Clear your throat
translate: 清清嗓子

original: Driina, perhaps you should stay here after all
translate: 德里娜，或许你还是留在这里吧

original: Driina motions towards you,
translate: 德里娜朝你示意，

original: Gallian himself may have provided for us
translate: 甘利亚自己或许已经为我们做了准备

original: Markus looks up at you, seemingly having forgotten you were in the tent
translate: 马库斯抬头看向你，似乎忘了你还在帐篷里

original: I'm looking for a way into Horryn
translate: 我在寻找进入霍瑞恩的方法

original: Driina's gaze could shatter stone
translate: 德里娜的目光足以碎石

original: The decision is mine to make And I have made it
translate: 这个决定由我来做，我已经决定了

original: Now, we have tarried for too long
translate: 现在，我们已经耽搁得太久了

original: Markus, tell our friend here of Horryn’s fate
translate: 马库斯，告诉这位朋友霍瑞恩的情况

original: I fear out path leads there eventually
translate: 我担心我们的道路最终会导向那里

original: Go there if you will but entering Horryn may indeed prove a tall order
translate: 如果你愿意去的话，但进入霍瑞恩确实可能是个艰巨的任务

original: Township’s been overrun by madmen!
translate: 整个镇已经被疯子占领了！

original: Hundreds lie dead in the street and those who remain cling to life on this barren plot of farmland!
translate: 成百上千的人倒在街头，幸存者们在这片荒凉的农地上苟延残喘！

original: As for the city gates, they have been sealed and our attackers have left us with no way back into the city
translate: 至于城门，它们已经被封锁，我们的攻击者也给我们留下了没有返回城市的道路

original: But what happened?
translate: 但是发生了什么？

original: It started some days ago
translate: 这些事情发生在几天前

original: I was awoken in the middle of the night by the governor's guards
translate: 我在半夜被总督的卫兵唤醒了

original: They told me we were under attack and that packs of crazed brigands were already roaming the streets, spilling blood by the river-full!
translate: 他们告诉我我们正受到攻击，成群的狂暴匪徒已经在街上横行，河边流满了血！

original: I never saw such chaos before
translate: 我从未见过如此混乱的情景

original: The dead lay strewn in the streets and we had to sneak from corner to corner just to get away with our lives!
translate: 街道上横七竖八地躺着尸体，我们只能从角落到角落地躲藏，才得以保全性命！

original: By some stroke of luck, we came upon Driina and a handful of other guards and managed to make our way to the gate with what survivors we could find!
translate: 侥幸的是，我们遇到了德里娜和其他几名卫兵，设法带着幸存者来到了城门！

original: We set up this camp whilst we
translate: 我们在等待增援到来的同时安营扎寨

original: Well frankly I don't know
translate: 实话说，我也不知道

original: All I can do is try to keep us alive till tomorrow
translate: 我能做的只是尽量让我们活下去，直到明天

original: It sounds like you're about to plead for help?
translate: 听起来你打算求援？

original: I'd say no
translate: 我说不

original: Iben the ranger is keeping the city under watch and he reports that the Reavers have sealed its gates
translate: 游侠伊本正在监视这座城市，他报告说掠夺者已经封锁了城门

original: We’ve found no other way of entering it
translate: 我们找不到其他进入城内的方法

original: Though what you expect to find in there save a gruesome death is beyond me
translate: 而且，你指望在那儿找到什么，除了惨死，我实在无法理解

original: But what do you intend to do then?
translate: 那你打算怎么做呢？

original: Sit here and wait for death?
translate: 坐在这里等死？

original: Certainly not!
translate: 绝对不行！

original: But with the state this camp is in, it’s all we can do to keep death from our throats
translate: 但是，考虑到营地的状况，我们能做的就是尽量避免死亡

original: If we are ever to hold out until reinforcements arrive, much less retake the town, then we must do what we can to gather our strength!
translate: 如果我们想要坚持到增援到来，甚至夺回城镇，就必须设法增强实力！

original: For now that means food and medicine
translate: 现在意味着食物和医药

original: Regarding that
translate: 关于这一点

original: I best be on my way then
translate: 那么我最好启程了

original: The Chamberlain
translate: 财政大臣

original: The man before you has the look of a high-ranking Imperial bureaucrat
translate: 你面前的这个人有着帝国高级文官的气质

original: However, there is little pomp left in him now
translate: 然而，他现在已没有多少威严了

original: His robes are ragged; his cheeks hollowed; his spectacles cracked
translate: 他的长袍破旧；脸颊凹陷；眼镜片破裂

original: He mumbles to himself as he despondently pores over stacks of papers and maps
translate: 他沮丧地翻阅着一叠叠文件和地图，自言自语

original: He looks up at you with a start
translate: 他突然抬起头看着你

original: What's this, then?
translate: 这是什么情况？

original: More mouths to feed?
translate: 还有更多需要养活的嘴巴？

original: Or, by some miracle, do you come laden with supplies, medicine and men-at-arms?
translate: 或者，奇迹般地，你带来了补给、医药和士兵？

original: Driina gives the man a strict look
translate: Driina 用严厉的目光看着这个人

original: Markus, we’re in no position to turn allies away
translate: Markus，我们现在没有拒绝盟友的余地

original: Common courtesy will go a long way
translate: 常人的礼貌会大有帮助

original: Careful, little man
translate: 小心点，小个子

original: The man sighs and sinks further back in his seat
translate: 这个人叹了口气，身体往后靠在椅子上

original: Forgive me
translate: 对不起

original: I'm not myself
translate: 我不是我自己

original: The world seems to be coming undone and I am left holding the pieces
translate: 世界似乎在崩解，而我只能拿着碎片勉强支撑

original: He wipes his balding head with a piece of cloth
translate: 他用一块布擦去头顶稀疏的头发

original: Markus Stonehold at your service
translate: 马库斯·石握柄，为您效劳

original: Chamberlain to the most glorious office of the Governor of Idra
translate: 伊德拉总督最荣光的政务参事

original: He makes a sharp little bow, his words dripping sarcasm
translate: 他微微鞠躬，话语中充满了讽刺

original: How may I be of assistance?
translate: 有什么可以为您效劳的吗？

original: I'm trying to get to Horryn
translate: 我想前往霍林

original: I've come to offer my assistance!
translate: 我来提供帮助！

original: We are in need of aid
translate: 我们需要援助

original: Me?
translate: 我？

original: Aid you?
translate: 帮助我们？

original: The man scoffs incredulously
translate: 男子难以置信地嗤之以鼻

original: At present, we'll be blessed by the Dead if we survive another night or two!
translate: 目前，如果我们再熬过一两个晚上，就谢天谢地了！

original: But I need to get to Horryn!
translate: 但我必须前往霍林！

original: Markus blinks bewildered
translate: 马库斯困惑地眨了眨眼睛

original: He gestures to his papers
translate: 他指了指自己的文件

original: With the governor missing and the camp overflowing, things are chaotic, to say the least
translate: 由于总督失踪，营地人满为患，情况混乱不堪，至少可以说是混乱

original: Any assistance you can offer will surely help me avoid an early grave
translate: 您能提供的任何帮助都将帮助我避免过早的死亡

original: Driina offers a sympathetic smile
translate: 德里娜露出同情的微笑

original: If I... we can help - we will
translate: 如果……我们可以帮助 - 我们会的

original: Nonetheless, I do not know you and though your motives may be pure, I’ve learned a long time ago to be wary of sellswords
translate: 不过，我不认识你，尽管你的动机可能纯洁无瑕，但多年的经验让我学会了警惕雇佣兵

original: Tell me, why are you here in the first place?
translate: 告诉我，你们最初为什么来到这里？

original: The people are starving around us
translate: 周围的人都在挨饿

original: Already the very young and the very old have begun to pass and soon none of us will have the strength to fight should the reavers come for us
translate: 已经有非常年幼和非常年老的人开始离开我们，很快我们就没有足够的力量去抵抗掠夺者了

original: In other words, we need food and we need it fast
translate: 换句话说，我们需要食物，而且要快

original: Talk to Frantzo
translate: 去找弗朗佐

original: He’s serving as our cook and quartermaster and he might know where to start
translate: 他现在担任我们的厨师兼补给官，或许他知道从哪里开始

original: You’ll find him just outside this barn
translate: 你可以在这个谷仓外面找到他

original: And you mentioned a disease outbreak?
translate: 你提到过疾病爆发？

original: Indeed
translate: 的确如此

original: Disease is spreading in camp
translate: 疾病正在营地里蔓延

original: Hierophant Drahl has set up a makeshift infirmary in the main house, but so far he’s had little luck in combating the infection
translate: 高阶祭司德拉尔在主屋内临时设立了一个医疗站，但到目前为止，他在控制感染方面成效甚微

original: Help him and you will have helped us all
translate: 帮助他，你就帮助了我们所有人

original: Talk to Frantzo regarding the dwindling food supplies and Drahl regarding the disease outbreak
translate: 询问弗朗佐关于食物短缺的问题，询问德拉尔关于疾病爆发的情况

original: And do hurry
translate: 而且要快

original: People are dying as we speak
translate: 人们正在我们说话的时候死去

original: Markus sits where you left him
translate: 马库斯坐在你离开时的位置

original: Grimly pouring over lists, manifests and maps
translate: 严肃地翻阅着名单、清单和地图

original: Pushing his broken spectacles up his nose, he peers up at you
translate: 他推了推断掉的鼻托，抬头看着你

original: You're back
translate: 你回来了

original: I hope for good news!
translate: 我希望你带来的是好消息！

original: Markus sighs deeply
translate: 马库斯深深地叹了口气

original: If there is nothing else, my migraine needs tending to...amongst other things
translate: 如果没有其他事的话，我的偏头痛需要治疗……还有其他的事情需要处理

original: The Chamberlain gestures to the piles of papers surrounding him
translate: 宫相示意他周围堆满的文件

original: What do you want to know?
translate: 想要知道些什么？

original: Is there no way of getting into Horryn?
translate: 没有进入霍里恩的方法了吗？

original: Any idea who the mad-men who attacked Horryn are?
translate: 攻击霍里恩的疯子们是谁，你有什么线索吗？

original: Regarding work
translate: 关于工作

original: Nothing for now
translate: 暂时没有

original: He lets out a sigh
translate: 他叹了口气

original: Oh, where to start?
translate: 哪里开始说呢？

original: This camp is a disaster!
translate: 这个营地一团糟！

original: There is no medicine for the sick and wounded while mad-men and beasts bay for our blood at the gates!
translate: 而且营地里没有治疗伤病的药物，门外的疯子和野兽却在叫嚣着要我们的血！

original: The haggard man wipes his brow
translate: 瘠瘦的男人擦了擦额头

original: Anything I can do to help?
translate: 有什么我可以帮忙的吗？

original: What did you need again?
translate: 你刚才说需要什么来着？

original: #Chapter1Cook
translate: #第一章 厨师

original: Frantzo listens to your description of Embla and strokes his beard
translate: 弗朗佐听着你对伊姆bla的描述，摸着下巴

original: I might have seen her, but this hunger is making me hazy
translate: 我可能见过她，但这饥饿感让我有些迷糊

original: Help us find something to eat and chances are it'll clear my memory too
translate: 帮我们找点吃的，这样也许能让我恢复记忆

original: Fair enough
translate: 没问题

original: The name rings a bell
translate: 这个名字听起来有些熟悉

original: Hmm, yes, I remember the girl!
translate: 嗯，是的，我记得那个女孩！

original: She arrived at my inn a few weeks ago, booked a room for two weeks and payed up front
translate: 几周前她来到我的旅店，预订了两周的房间，并提前付了房费

original: She was polite, kept to herself mostly
translate: 她很有礼貌，大部分时间都保持沉默

original: Far as I could tell, she was making trips towards the northern coastline
translate: 就我所知，她一直在向北方海岸线方向旅行

original: She never gave up any hints as to why, though
translate: 她从未透露过任何原因的线索

original: The room was still in her name when the doom came - but I remember thinking I hadn't seen her for days beforehand
translate: 她的房间名字还在，但在我意识到之前，我已经好几天没见到她了

original: I wager she was either already dead, or safely on one of her excursions the night everything ended
translate: 我打赌，她要么已经死了，要么安全地在某次旅行中，就在一切都结束的那个晚上

original: If you're looking for her and have a death wish, she was staying in the 'Sunset Suite', on the second floor
translate: 如果你们在找她并且有送命的打算，她当时住在二楼的‘落日套房’

original: My inn, 'The Haven' is...was just off the main square
translate: 我的旅店‘避风港’……现在就在主广场旁边

original: Where are they?
translate: 他们在哪儿？

original: They are waiting in the enclosure behind you!
translate: 他们就在你后面的围栏里等着！

original: They are being kept in a glen up in the foothills!
translate: 他们被关在山脚下的一片山谷里！

original: Frantzo is thoughtfully peeling onions as he hums a tune in some foreign language
translate: 弗朗佐正仔细地剥着洋葱，同时哼着一首外文歌

original: Good to see you!
translate: 很高兴见到你！

original: You approach a haggard looking man wearing a threadbare cook's apron
translate: 你走近一个面容憔悴的男人，他穿着一件破旧的厨师围裙

original: I don't know what you heard, but there's no food here for you, or anyone
translate: 我不知道你听到了什么，但这里没有食物，连给你的也没有

original: he growls
translate: 他低吼道

original: Complain to the chamberlain if you want, just leave me alone
translate: 如果你想投诉，就去找总管吧，但别烦我

original: The chamberlain said you needed help
translate: 总管说你需要帮助

original: Likewise
translate: 同样

original: The cook's eyes meet yours for the first time
translate: 厨师的目光第一次与你相遇

original: Honestly, the situation is beyond dire
translate: 说实话，情况已经到了无法挽回的地步

original: People are starving by the day and we have no supplies
translate: 人们每天都在挨饿，而我们却没有补给

original: The old, the sick the young; they'll all be dying off at this rate
translate: 老弱病残，照这个速度，都会死去

original: Got any ideas?
translate: 你有什么想法吗？

original: Well, none of us have the strength or courage left to venture out of sight of the camp to hunt and forage
translate: 恐怕我们都没有足够的体力和勇气离开营地去狩猎和采集

original: The cook looks you up and down
translate: 厨师上下打量了你一番

original: But you look capable enough
translate: 但你看起来还是挺有能耐的

original: You could go beyond the walls and look for something more substantial?
translate: 你可以越过城墙，去寻找更实在的东西吗？

original: These people can’t live on vegetable broth alone
translate: 这些人不能光靠蔬菜汤活下去

original: They need meat and fat
translate: 他们需要肉类和脂肪

original: Especially if there’s fighting to be had
translate: 尤其是如果有战斗的话

original: Any idea where I should look?
translate: 我知道应该去哪里找

original: I do indeed
translate: 的确如此

original: Frantzo leans in
translate: 弗朗佐凑近了

original: Old Jakub owns this farm
translate: 老雅各布拥有这片农场

original: It might not seem like much to a mainlander but here on Idra, this farm here is large enough
translate: 对于一个外地人来说，可能并不显眼，但在伊德拉，这片农场已经算是相当大了

original: You see, Jakub and his family had a large flock of goats when the calamities started
translate: 你知道，当灾难开始时，雅各布和他的家人拥有一群绵羊

original: Right over there in the enclosure behind us
translate: 就在我们后面的围栏里

original: Now, the old man told the chamberlain that the beasts bolted when the calamities started
translate: 现在，老者告诉掌管者，当灾祸开始时，野兽们逃走了

original: That it drove them all insane and that they scattered into the hills
translate: 它们全都疯了，然后四散逃入山中

original: Well, that may be rightly so but I have my suspicions
translate: 嗯，也许确实如此，但我有些怀疑

original: You're saying he hid the animals away?
translate: 你是说他把动物藏起来了？

original: Look, I can’t say I blame the man
translate: 看来，我不能怪罪那个人

original: Us refugees have made a mess of his farm
translate: 作为难民，我们已经把他的农田弄得一团糟

original: And if we find hands on those animals we’ll surely fall upon them like locusts
translate: 而如果我们找到那些动物，我们一定会像蝗虫一样扑上去

original: It would ruin him and truly it would be a shame if the man lost his livelihood
translate: 这会毁了他，如果那个人因此失去生计，那真是可惜

original: But better that than having to see children starve
translate: 但比起看着孩子们挨饿，这样更好

original: Now you best get going
translate: 现在你最好快点行动

original: I see people have started eying the rats
translate: 我看到人们已经开始盯着老鼠了

original: If what you say is true, you have a chance to save a lot of people here
translate: 如果你所说的属实，你有机会拯救这里很多人

original: All you have to do is to herd them back to camp
translate: 你只需要把它们赶回营地即可

original: If you don’t tread carefully though there might be trouble with Jakub and his lad but better that than having to see children starve
translate: 但如果你不小心，可能会和雅各布和他的儿子发生争执，但比起看着孩子们挨饿，这样更好

original: I knew it!
translate: 我就知道会这样！

original: I bloody knew it!
translate: 我真的就知道会这样！

original: And you led them right to us I see!
translate: 我看到你把它们带到了我们这里！

original: By the Maidens this will do these poor people good
translate: 为了这些可怜的人，这真是大好事

original: Though I fear for old Jakub if people find out he was hoarding his livestock whilst others were dying
translate: 虽然我担心老雅各布，如果人们发现他囤积牲畜而其他人却在饿死

original: In any case, we have food now to last us a while and it is all thanks to you
translate: 无论如何，我们现在有了足够的食物可以撑一段时间，这一切都多亏了你

original: I had some questions first
translate: 我先有几个问题

original: Bye
translate: 再见

original: With impeccable timing, the work party of sailors arrives carrying the crates of supplies
translate: 时机绝佳，一群水手带着装满补给的箱子来到了工作现场

original: Frantzo slaps his meaty palms together
translate: 弗朗佐拍了拍他那粗壮的手掌

original: I knew you could do it {PLAYER}!
translate: 我就知道你能做到，{PLAYER}！

original: You’ve saved a lot of lives today
translate: 你今天救了很多人的命

original: Not to mention what people would have done to Jakub if it turned out he had been hiding livestock from them
translate: 更不用说如果他们发现雅库布隐藏了牲畜会对他做什么

original: I'll see you around
translate: 我会在这附近见你

original: Well
translate: 嗯

original: What's eating you?
translate: 你怎么了？

original: The cook chuckles darkly
translate: 厨师阴森地笑了

original: What's your story?
translate: 你的故事是怎样的？

original: Ask about Embla
translate: 问问艾姆bla的情况

original: Goodbye
translate: 再见

original: The cook's eyes widen in hope
translate: 厨师的眼睛充满希望地睁大了

original: So, what news, did you find anything I can put in folk's bellies?
translate: 那么，有什么消息？你找到可以填饱人们肚子的东西了吗？

original: I found supplies!
translate: 我找到了补给品！

original: Good to see you again {PLAYER}!
translate: 很高兴再次见到你，{PLAYER}！

original: My story is similar to most folk around here; sudden ruin
translate: 我的故事和这里大多数人的一样；突如其来的衰败

original: I had an inn, respectable place, right on the main square it was
translate: 我有一家客栈，一个体面的地方，就在主广场上

original: So even if I survive this place - seems like I have nothing to go back to
translate: 就算我从这里活下来——似乎也没什么可回去的了

original: I'm sorry to hear that
translate: 听到这个消息我很难过

original: By the maidens tell me it is so!
translate: 请女妖们告诉我，确实如此！

original: Don’t wave food in front of the starving!
translate: 别在饥肠辘辘的人面前挥动食物！

original: Where did you find it?
translate: 你是在哪儿找到的？

original: We found Jakub's goats!
translate: 我们找到了雅库的山羊！

original: I purchased supplies from smugglers!
translate: 我从走私者那里购买了补给品！

original: #Chapter1DriinaIntro
translate: #第一章滴莉娜介绍

original: In the center stands a formidable, armored woman
translate: 中间站着一位强大且身披铠甲的女性

original: She carries an unmistakable air of authority and the insignia on her armour marks her as a cleric of the Order of Sepulchites
translate: 她身上散发着不可忽视的权威气息，铠甲上的徽章表明她是塞普丘特教团的牧师

original: The tattered band of refugees surrounding her are agitated and shouting over one another
translate: 围绕在她周围的破烂难民群情绪激动，互相喊叫

original: But there are so few of us!
translate: 但我们这么少的人！

original: Horryn was home to two hundred and we're but a few score left!
translate: 哈罗林曾经有两百人，现在只剩下这么几个人了！

original: cries a ragged man with tears in his eyes
translate: 一个满眼泪水的破衣人喊道

original: By the Golden Corpses, there must be survivors!
translate: 请金尸人作证，一定有生还者！

original: beseeches another
translate: 另一个人恳求道

original: And who are we to send?
translate: 而我们派谁去呢？

original: Half of us won't live through next Marketday and the other half ain't fit to hold 's much as a stick!
translate: 半数人撑不到下一个集市日，另一半人连一根棍子都拿不起来！

original: an old crone interjects, panic quivering in her voice
translate: 一个年老的妇人插话道，声音中带着恐慌

original: The crowd erupts in a cacophony of desperate appeals
translate: 群众发出一片绝望的呼喊声

original: The cleric raises her arms and the crowd falls silent
translate: 牧师举起双手，人群顿时安静下来

original: Her sonorous voice rings out
translate: 她的声音洪亮，回荡在空气中

original: We may indeed be cursed
translate: 我们确实可能被诅咒了

original: But Aldon is right - there may yet be survivors in Horryn, and it's my duty to go to their aid
translate: 但阿德伦说的没错，在霍林还有可能幸存下来的人，这是我的职责，要去帮助他们

original: Or, at least, to learn what fate befell them
translate: 或者至少，去了解他们的命运如何

original: The assembly errupts again - some blessing the cleric in tears of hope, others clinging to her robes while pleading for her to not risk her life
translate: 会场再次沸腾起来——一些人热泪盈眶地为牧师祝福，另一些人则紧紧抓住她的斗篷，恳求她不要冒险

original: Through the crowd, the woman catches sight of you, and nods curtly
translate: 穿过人群，那个女人注意到了你，冷冷地点了点头

original: She turns away and begins to load up on supplies, no doubt intent on making good on her promise to the panicked refugees
translate: 她转身开始装载物资，显然打算履行对惊慌失措的难民们的承诺

original: Entering the ragged camp, you notice a small crowd nearby, arranged in an inward looking ring
translate: 进入破败的营地，你注意到附近有一群人，他们围成一个向内看的圆圈

original: #Chapter1DriinaMain
translate: #Chapter1DriinaMain

original: The reavers came from inside the town
translate: 掠夺者是从镇子里来的

original: I recognized some of them as sailors, fishermen and whalers
translate: 我认出其中一些人是水手、渔民和捕鲸者

original: Locals, mostly from old Idran families
translate: 大部分是本地人，来自古老的伊德兰家族

original: Perhaps they belonged to one of the lodges
translate: 或许他们属于某个行会

original: Driina
translate: Driina

original: The imposing cleric holds up a palm in greeting
translate: 那位威严的牧师举起手掌致意

original: Welcome to our new home, stranger
translate: 欢迎来到我们新的家园，陌生人

original: The people of this island know me as Driina
translate: 这座岛屿上的人都叫我Driina

original: I serve the Golden Dead and this camp - these people - are under my protection
translate: 我效忠于金色亡灵，这个营地——这些人们——都受到我的保护

original: What brings you here?
translate: 你来这里是为了什么？

original: I was heading to Horryn
translate: 我正前往霍里恩

original: I'm searching for someone
translate: 我在寻找某人

original: A terror from the deep claimed our ship
translate: 深渊中的恐怖生物夺走了我们的船只

original: Driina nods and smiles to a passing refugee, before leaning in close to you, and asking in a low voice, "and what business did you have in Horryn?
translate: 德里娜点点头，微笑着向一位路过的难民点头，然后凑近你低声问道：“你在霍里恩有什么事？”

original: We lost our supplies
translate: 我们失去了补给

original: I'd hoped to re-stock
translate: 我希望能重新补给

original: I had hoped to recruit new sword arms
translate: 我希望能招募新的战士

original: I was looking for someone
translate: 我在寻找某人

original: She leans back, her eyes still flinty
translate: 她往后一靠，眼睛依然锐利

original: Are you not aware of the situation here?
translate: 你难道不知道这里的情况吗？

original: These people say the island is surely doomed
translate: 这些人说这个岛屿注定要毁灭

original: Her eyes bore into you - gauging your reaction
translate: 她的目光直视着你，试图判断你的反应

original: And what say you?
translate: 你对此有何看法？

original: I couldn't care less for your troubles
translate: 我对你的麻烦毫不在意

original: Here on Idra?
translate: 在伊德拉？

original: That may prove to be a difficult task, given the tempest that's engulfed this island
translate: 在这场席卷岛屿的风暴面前，这可能是一项艰巨的任务

original: Driina fidgets with a heavy looking ring on her finger while she listens to your description of Embla
translate: 德里娜在听你描述埃姆拉时，不安地摆弄着手指上一枚看起来很沉的戒指

original: She's certainly not in the camp and I can't say I remember seeing her in Horryn
translate: 她肯定不在营地里，而且说实话，我也不记得在霍里恩见过她

original: But perhaps that bodes well for your quest
translate: 但这对你这次任务来说也许是个好兆头

original: One of the primary tasks of my order is to care for the dead
translate: 我们教团的主要任务之一就是照顾死者

original: And I can say with certainy that I didn't lay to rest anyone matching her description before the fall of Horryn
translate: 我可以肯定地说，在霍里恩沦陷之前，我没有安葬任何符合她描述的人。

original: Do you have any suggestions where to look?
translate: 你有没有什么建议，去哪里找找？

original: Beyond travelling to Horryn, you may want to ask around here in camp
translate: 除了前往霍里恩，你们或许可以问问营地里的人。

original: A few of the merchants survived - perhaps she visited one during her stay
translate: 有几个商人幸存了下来——或许她在逗留期间拜访过其中一位。

original: We need answers!
translate: 我们需要答案！

original: Driina gestures at the refugees languishing in the camp before continuing
translate: 德里娜示意着营地里那些流离失所的难民，然后继续说道。

original: And it's my duty to seek them out, if they exist
translate: 而且，如果她们存在的话，我有责任去寻找她们。

original: I must venture to find a way back into Horryn
translate: 我必须冒险找到回到霍里恩的方法。

original: And thence somewhere darker, I fear
translate: 而且，恐怕会更黑暗一些。

original: Failing that, the situation here in camp is getting untenable
translate: 如果不行的话，这里营地的情况会变得无法忍受。

original: Anything that can be done to improve it will be a small victory
translate: 任何能改善现状的事情都将是一场小小的胜利。

original: Are you planning to go alone?
translate: 你打算独自行动吗？

original: Why not wait for reinforcements?
translate: 为什么不等一等增援？

original: I care not for this fools errand!
translate: 我不在乎这个愚蠢的任务！

original: If I must
translate: 如果我必须的话。

original: Doomed or not, it's all dust in the end and I intend to die in armor
translate: 即使注定失败，最终也只是一抔黄土，我打算穿着盔甲死去。

original: But, from what I can tell, we must both tread the same terrible path
translate: 但从我目前所知，我们恐怕必须并肩走这条可怕的路。

original: Though our reasons may differ, surely there is safety to be had in numbers?
translate: 尽管我们的理由不同，但人数众多或许能带来安全？

original: Let's join forces
translate: 让我们联合起来吧。

original: There is no room for you in my company, but I'll help nontheless
translate: 你没有我队伍的位置，但我还是会帮助你。

original: I care not for helping
translate: 我不在乎帮忙

original: One way or another, Horryn must be investigated, but I cannot be in two places at once and perhaps I can do more good here in camp after all
translate: 无论如何，霍林都必须接受调查，但我不能同时在两个地方，或许在这里营地里我能做得更多

original: If you go there - please, bring word of what you find
translate: 如果你们去了，请务必带来你们发现的消息

original: However grim those tidings may be
translate: 无论消息多么令人沮丧

original: I can do that
translate: 我能做到

original: I'm not promising anything
translate: 我不保证什么

original: Some people only care for their own skin
translate: 有些人只关心自己的利益

original: But look around you - if some measure of compassion for these people touches your heart, I will be here for a short while yet
translate: 但看看四周，如果你对这些人有一点同情心，我还会在这里待一会儿

original: On second thought, you should join me
translate: 想起刚才的话，你还是加入我吧

original: I'll consider helping, but I don't want you to join me
translate: 我会考虑帮忙，但我不想你加入我

original: Our graveyards have been overflowing as of late with stranger killing stranger for no good reason
translate: 最近我们的墓地里尸体堆积，陌生人无缘无故地互相残杀

original: And worse, I think, brother and brother, husband and wife
translate: 更糟糕的是，我认为兄弟对兄弟，夫妻对夫妻

original: It's become a tide of ruin
translate: 这已经成为一场毁灭的洪流

original: I implored the Governor to intervene and investigate, but as usual he did nothing but cower in his villa and peer over his walls
translate: 我恳求总督介入调查，但一如既往，他只是躲在别墅里，透过围墙窥视

original: The Governor?
translate: 总督？

original: There is always hope - in this life or beyond it
translate: 总有希望——在这世外或彼岸

original: However, I have seen things these last days that I cannot readily explain or reconcile with my faith
translate: 但最近几天，我看到了一些无法轻易解释或与我的信仰相协调的事情

original: Then, a few nights ago, pandemonium erupted
translate: 然后，几天前，混乱爆发了

original: Bands of armed men and women roamed the town, hacking down anyone they came across
translate: 一群武装男女在镇上横冲直撞，砍倒他们遇到的任何人

original: Some folks claim those that did not die on the spot were dragged away, to suffer some unknown fate
translate: 有些人声称那些当场没死的人被拖走，遭受某种未知的命运

original: My order and I joined what sane guardsmen remained in the chaos and tried to stem the tide - but we were driven from the city in the panicked exodus that followed
translate: 我和我的队伍在混乱中加入了剩下的理智的守卫，试图阻止局势恶化——但我们被恐慌的难民潮驱逐出了城市

original: We considered retaking the town, but we had scores of wounded
translate: 我们曾考虑重新夺回那个城镇，但我们的伤员实在太多

original: So we retreated, better to save the lives not yet lost
translate: 所以我们撤退了，这样可以保住尚未失去的生命

original: We set up this camp to regroup and to care for the wounded, but a shadow hangs over us
translate: 我们扎营是为了整顿队伍并照顾伤员，但阴影笼罩着我们

original: The wounded do not recover, and those still on their feet slowly lose their mind, or hearts
translate: 伤员无法康复，那些还能站立的人也逐渐失去理智或生命

original: What do you intend to do now?
translate: 你现在打算怎么做？

original: Driina's face lights for an instant
translate: 德里娜的脸庞闪过一丝光芒

original: These people - my people - I feel their pain
translate: 这些人——我的人——我能感受到他们的痛苦

original: And we will mourn together, later
translate: 之后我们会一同哀悼

original: For now, they deserve answers
translate: 现在，他们值得得到答案

original: And by the Emperors' bones, I will get them some
translate: 而且，为了帝国的骨骸，我一定会给他们一个答案

original: Then that is the course laid out for us
translate: 那就是我们接下来的路

original: I pray your resolve may help you through the darkness that lies ahead
translate: 我祈求你的决心能帮助你度过即将到来的黑暗

original: I will not barter for what should be an act of compassion, given freely, if that is what you're implying
translate: 我不会用同情心来交换，如果你的意思是这样

original: Either way, I wish you luck
translate: 不管怎样，祝你好运

original: I both look forward to and dread seeing you again
translate: 再次见到你，我既期待又害怕

original: I have questions
translate: 我有疑问

original: A drunken buffoon in my estimation
translate: 在我看来，他是个醉醺醺的愚人

original: He did not deserve to die however, and I don't think he made it out of Horryn
translate: 他本不应死去，而且我认为他没有从霍林逃出来

original: Markus, his chamberlain did however
translate: 但他的家臣马库斯却逃了出来

original: I suppose he's the closest we're to a leader at the moment - though he may wish it were not so
translate: 我想他是目前我们最接近一个领导者的了——尽管他可能希望并非如此

original: What happened next?
translate: 接下来发生了什么？

original: Let's be off!
translate: 我们出发吧！

original: The Golden Dead watch over you
translate: 金色亡者守护着你

original: Then we have nothing to dicuss!
translate: 那么我们没有什么好讨论的了！

original: Begone!
translate: 退下！

original: The cleric turns her back on you and continues her preparations
translate: 牧师背对你，继续她的准备

original: There are long traditions on Idra for the fishermen and sailors to band together in fellowships known as lodges
translate: 在伊德拉，对于渔民和水手来说，有悠久的传统让他们结成同会，称为行会

original: From what I understand, they serve mainly as combines for fair distribution of the day's catch
translate: 按我所知，他们主要作为公平分配当日捕获的渔获的联合组织

original: But there are persistent rumors of them serving other purposes too
translate: 但有关于他们还有其他用途的持续传言

original: Rumors?
translate: 传言？

original: Our Order is an Imperial one - the locals would be loath to discuss such things with us - but I've always suspected they practiced pre-Imperial customs of ocean-worship, including offerings to ensure safe travel and bountiful catches
translate: 我们的组织是一个帝国组织——当地人不会轻易与我们讨论这些事情——但我一直怀疑他们实行着帝国之前的海洋崇拜习俗，包括献祭以确保航行安全和丰收的渔获

original: Driina looks expectantly at you, one brow arched
translate: 德莉娜期待地看着你，眉毛微微上扬

original: Ask Driina about Embla
translate: 询问德莉娜关于埃姆拉

original: Who do you think attacked Horryn?
translate: 你觉得是谁袭击了霍林？

original: It's time to go
translate: 是时候出发了

original: Before we leave we should seek out Markus - our leader of sorts
translate: 在我们离开之前，我们应该找马库斯——我们的某种领导者

original: He's holed up in the stable trying to organize this mess of a camp
translate: 他躲在马厩里，试图整理这混乱的营地

original: Holy Ashes, no one tries harder than him, but the task at hand is monumental and he needs help
translate: 圣灰啊，没有人比他更努力了，但手头的任务巨大无比，他需要帮助

original: If you feel the calling, you should seek out Markus - our leader of sorts
translate: 如果你感到召唤，你应该去找马库斯——我们的某种领导者

original: Reinforcements?
translate: 增援？

original: From whence?
translate: 来自何方？

original: Even if the Imperial Augers are aware of our plight, relief will still be weeks away if it arrives at all
translate: 即使帝国的占卜者们已经意识到了我们的困境，如果他们真的来救援的话，也至少要再等几周时间

original: No, our fate is in our own hands and I fear I must bear the brunt of the hardships ahead
translate: 不，我们的命运掌握在我们自己手中，我恐怕必须承担即将到来的艰难困苦

original: And you would venture out alone?
translate: 你竟然打算独自冒险？

original: Driina looks up at you with steely eyes and offers a curt greeting
translate: 德里娜用坚毅的目光看着你，并简短地问候了一句

original: Golden Dead watch over you
translate: 金色亡者保佑你

original: I have some questions for you
translate: 我有几个问题想问你

original: I want you to join me!
translate: 我想让你加入我！

original: You speak of the leviathan
translate: 你提到那头海怪

original: The fishermen first saw it about a week before the fall of Horryn
translate: 那些渔民大约是在霍林沦陷前一周第一次见到它的

original: I do not know what black depths spawned it, but the natural order of things is fast becoming undone
translate: 我不知道那些黑暗深渊中孕育了它，但自然秩序正在迅速瓦解

original: Tell me, why did you come to this accursed island?
translate: 告诉我，你为何来到这个该死的岛屿？

original: I'm lookong for someone
translate: 我在寻找某个人

original: I was bound for Horryn
translate: 我原本打算前往霍林

original: #Chapter1Farmer
translate: #第一章 农夫

original: What of them?
translate: 他们怎么样了？

original: I found them up in the glen
translate: 我在山坳里发现了他们

original: What happened to them?
translate: 他们发生了什么事？

original: The man mutters something under his breath and spits as a group of refugees pass
translate: 那个男人低声嘟囔着什么，吐了一口唾沫，一群难民经过

original: As he notices you lingering he fixes you with a bitter frown
translate: 他注意到你徘徊，便用一副苦涩的表情盯着你看

original: More leeches come to bleed me?
translate: 又来了些吸血虫来吸我的血？

original: Is this your farm?
translate: 这是你的农场吗？

original: He scoffs
translate: 他嗤之以鼻

original: If you can still call it that!
translate: 如果你还敢这么叫它的话！

original: It's ruined
translate: 破败不堪

original: All my crops are trampled and my goats are gone!
translate: 我所有的庄稼都被践踏了，我的山羊也不见了！

original: We're going to starve next year thanks to this catastrophe!
translate: 谢天谢地，多亏这次灾难，我们明年就要挨饿了！

original: Still seems you're better off than the people living in the camp
translate: 看来你比营地里的人要好一些

original: Spare me the sob-story
translate: 别给我讲这悲惨的故事

original: A balding man with a hard, wrinkled face the texture of old leather, stands leaning against the wall of the farmhouse
translate: 一个秃顶的男人，脸上布满皱纹，皮肤像旧皮革一样粗糙，靠在农舍的墙上站着

original: He’s thoughtfully chewing a straw as he dejectedly surveys the muddy chaos that was once his well-kept farm
translate: 他若有所思地嚼着一根稻草，沮丧地审视着曾经打理得井井有条但现在一片泥泞的农场

original: Approach
translate: 请靠近

original: He scoffs and turns his back to you
translate: 他嗤之以鼻，背对着你

original: Wait, I have some questions
translate: 等一下，我有几句话想问

original: The man's eyes narrow
translate: 男人的眼睛眯了起来

original: He begins to whittle away at a stick and won't look directly at you
translate: 他开始削一根木棍，但不会直视你

original: It's clear he knows what you're talking about
translate: 很明显他知道你在说什么

original: You can't keep hiding such a large herd while the camp starves
translate: 你不能在营地的人都饿肚子的时候还藏着这么一大群牲畜

original: Your boy is begging to come home
translate: 你的孩子已经哭着要回家了

original: I'll keep your herd a secret for a price
translate: 我会为你保守羊群的秘密，但代价是不菲的

original: Begging?
translate: 求求你？

original: The boy's soft
translate: 这个男孩很娇嫩

original: If he wants to come home he needs to prove himself!
translate: 如果他想回家，就必须证明自己！

original: I'm doing this for his own good
translate: 我这么做是为了他好

original: Is it gold you're after then?!
translate: 你是要金币吗？！

original: The man’s face goes red as he takes a step towards you
translate: 那人脸红了，向你走近一步

original: He stands there for a moment trembling with rage before looking around and becoming aware that the other people of the camp are watching
translate: 他站了一会儿，怒不可遏地颤抖着，然后环顾四周，意识到营地里的其他人正在注视着他

original: You’re cruel indeed to fleece an old man so close to his skin
translate: 你真残忍，竟然要剥一个快要脱光的老头的皮

original: But I can’t lose my animals
translate: 但我不能失去我的牲畜

original: Take this, and may your bones be ground to dust
translate: 接过这个，愿你的骨头被碾成粉末

original: He presses a small pouch of 50 gold into your hand
translate: 他将一个装有50金币的小袋子按在你手上

original: Get out of here before I let my axe do the talking!
translate: 在我让你的斧头说话之前，赶紧滚开！

original: I'm bringing the animals to the camp one way or another
translate: 我无论如何要把牲畜带到营地

original: I want no part in this
translate: 我不想参与这件事

original: The man's face reddens
translate: 那人脸红了

original: I can and I will!
translate: 我能做到，而且我会做到！

original: It's their fault we're in this mess!
translate: 是他们把我们带进这个困境的！

original: Dead
translate: 已死

original: They must be
translate: 他们必须是

original: Ran off into the forest when the sky fell, and nothing survives in that emperor's-foresaken place for long
translate: 当天空坠落时，他逃进了森林，而那皇帝遗弃的地方，长久以来 nothing 生存下来

original: Are you lying to me?
translate: 你在骗我吗？

original: Tell me the truth or I'll be forced to make you
translate: 告诉我真相，否则我只能强迫你

original: The old man shifts uncomfortably
translate: 老人不安地挪动了一下

original: He looks down at his feet and sighs
translate: 他低头看着自己的脚，叹了口气

original: I know it ain't right, but we borrowed hard from the Free-Lenders Guild to build this farm, and my goats...they're all I have left
translate: 我知道这样不对，但我们向自由放贷人公会借了钱来建造这个农场，而我的山羊...它们是我仅剩的一切

original: If I lose them too, I'm done for
translate: 如果我也失去了它们，我就完了

original: Me, my wife and son, indenturement for the lot of us!
translate: 我，我的妻子和儿子，我们全家都成了他们的债务奴隶！

original: Where are the animals now?
translate: 现在动物在哪里？

original: The old man looks at you unflinchingly
translate: 老人直视着你，毫不动摇

original: I am telling you the truth
translate: 我在告诉你真相

original: The farmer hesitates for a moment and then his face hardens
translate: 农民犹豫了一下，然后他的表情变得坚决

original: Fuck you and fuck this rotten pack of beggars and thieves
translate: 你去你的，还有你们这群该死的乞丐和强盗

original: I’ll die before I tell you
translate: 我绝不告诉你们

original: That can be arranged
translate: 这是可以安排的

original: The man's eyes narrow and you can see his jaw-muscles tensing
translate: 男人的眼睛眯了起来，你能看到他的下巴肌肉绷紧

original: How do you feel about the camp?
translate: 你对营地有什么看法？

original: About your animals
translate: 对于你的动物呢？

original: Bloody wretches
translate: 糟透了的家伙

original: They could have gone anywhere!
translate: 它们可以去任何地方！

original: But my farms were closest and now they've picked me clean and trampled my fields
translate: 但是我的农田最近，现在他们已经把我洗劫一空，践踏了我的田地

original: We're ruined!
translate: 我们破产了！

original: The farmers eyes flare with rage and defiance
translate: 农民的眼睛怒火中烧，充满反抗

original: The people of this camp need the food
translate: 这个营地的人需要食物

original: Perhaps you can get a fair price from the chamberlain?
translate: 也许你可以从财政大臣那里得到一个公平的价格？

original: The animals will die in those mountains
translate: 这些动物会死在那些山里

original: It's better to slaughter them now and put the meat to good use
translate: 最好现在宰了它们，把肉好好利用起来

original: This herd is coming back one way or another!
translate: 这群牲畜迟早会回来的！

original: I need to think about this
translate: 我需要考虑一下

original: The man’s grim mask gives way to deep sadness
translate: 那人的冷酷面具下露出深深的悲伤

original: You win
translate: 你赢了

original: We’re done for
translate: 我们完了

original: Could you at least go help my boy and make sure they make it to camp safely?
translate: 你能至少去帮我儿子，确保他们安全到达营地吗？

original: I wanted to ask you some questions
translate: 我想问你一些问题

original: The old man’s eyes seem to go black with rage
translate: 那老人的眼睛似乎被愤怒染黑

original: You think you can threaten me?!
translate: 你以为你能威胁到我吗？！

original: Get out of my sight before I plant my ax in your skull!
translate: 走开，否则我用斧头劈开你的脑袋！

original: You have no doubt he means it
translate: 你毫无疑问地知道他说的是真的

original: #Chapter1FarmersWife
translate: 第一章 农妇

original: The woman looks at you apprehensively for a bit
translate: 那女人犹豫了一会儿，不安地看着你

original: Not as long as these people are on our land
translate: 不要超过这些人在我们领地上的时间

original: Aiden has to keep the goats safe
translate: 艾丹必须确保羊群的安全

original: Up in the hidden glen
translate: 在隐藏的山谷上方

original: I could go check on him?
translate: 我可以去看看他吗？

original: She wipes a tear of relief
translate: 她擦去了一滴欣慰的眼泪

original: Thank you so much
translate: 非常感谢

original: Go to the old goat enclosure east of our house and find the hole in the fence to the north
translate: 去我们房子东边的老羊圈，找到北边围栏上的缺口

original: If you look careful you’ll find some tracks
translate: 如果你仔细看，你会发现一些踪迹

original: Follow them and they should take you right to the glen
translate: 沿着它们走，应该直接带你到山谷

original: And please don’t tell Jakub I’ve talked to you
translate: 请不要告诉雅库布我跟你说过

original: He only cares for the animals and he has a horrible temper
translate: 他只关心动物，而且脾气非常暴躁

original: The Farmer's Wife
translate: 农妇

original: The woman looks tired and sad as she wanders around the farmhouse aimlessly
translate: 那个女人看起来疲惫而悲伤，漫无目的地在农舍周围徘徊

original: My poor boy
translate: 我可怜的孩子

original: she mutters under her breath
translate: 她低声喃喃自语

original: What's wrong with your boy?
translate: 你儿子怎么了？

original: Poor Aiden’s stuck outside in the rain and fog
translate: 贫穷的艾丹被雨和雾困在了外面

original: Jakub won’t let him come home
translate: 雅库布不允许他回家

original: Not as long as
translate: 不要超过

original: As long as?
translate: 为什么？

original: #Chapter1GenericRefugee
translate: 第一章难民

original: A soldier dressed in the ragged remains of what you assume is the livery of Horryn
translate: 一个士兵穿着你认为是霍林家族仆人服装的破烂衣服

original: He looks hungry, shaken and on edge
translate: 他看起来饿了，受惊了，而且紧张兮兮的

original: Talk to the chamberlain over in the barn if you want something - Just leave me alone!
translate: 如果你想吃点东西，就去谷仓那边找管家吧——别管我！

original: #Chapter1GoatTracks
translate: 第一章羊群之路

original: Trekking a few hours into the mountainous highlands of Idra’s north-western region, you find yourself standing at the mouth of a narrow valley nestled between tall mountains
translate: 沿着崎岖的山路徒步几个小时，你来到了伊德拉西北部地区的一个狭窄山谷入口，两座高山之间

original: The tracks do not lie
translate: 跟踪的迹象没有误导你

original: There are goats nearby
translate: 附近有羊群

original: You fail to make out any additional details about the prints
translate: 你无法辨认出更多的细节

original: Looking closer, you can clearly make out a set of human footprints as well
translate: 仔细观察，你可以清楚地看到一串人类脚印

original: It seems clear that these animals were herded out of the enclosure
translate: 看起来这些动物是被赶出了围栏

original: Dozens of cloven hooves have churned a path trought the mud heading north into the foothills behind the camp
translate: 跟随这些足迹直到它们穿过一片裸露的岩石

original: Follow directions to the hidden glen
translate: 你失去了踪迹，经过短暂的搜寻后，你决定放弃并返回营地

original: Try to follow the tracks
translate: 你必须通过其他方式找到这些踪迹的目的地

original: Examine the tracks more closely
translate: 羊群似乎被赶出了营地，向西北方向而去

original: Trecking throught the rugged foothills, you follow the tracks until they pass over a portion of bare rock
translate: 在崎岖的山脚下，你跟随踪迹直到它们穿过一片裸露的岩石

original: You lose the trail and after a brief period of searching you decide to give up and return to camp
translate: 你失去了踪迹，经过短暂的搜寻后，你决定放弃并返回营地

original: You must discover the destination of these tracks some other way
translate: 你必须通过其他方式找到这些踪迹的目的地

original: The flock seems to have been driven out of camp, towards the north-west
translate: 羊群似乎被赶出了营地，向西北方向而去

original: Across rocky grounds and soggy marshes, you manage to stay on the trail
translate: 在崎岖的地面和泥泞的沼泽上，你设法保持在踪迹上前进

original: #Chapter1GraveDigger
translate: 第一章 骷髅掘墓者

original: With trembling hands you cut into the pallid flesh and expose the entrails of the corpse
translate: 你颤抖着双手切开苍白的肉，暴露了尸体的内脏

original: Driina leans in over your shoulder
translate: 德莉娜凑到你耳边

original: Those entrails don't look
translate: 这些内脏看起来

original: Her words are cut short as the 'entrails' whip out of the wound in a mass of squirming, eyeless worms!
translate: 她的话被突然射出的一团蠕动的无眼虫打断了！

original: Panicked, you frantically scuttle away from the tiny snapping orifices when Roland charges past you with the shovel raised
translate: 惊慌之下，你疯狂地向后爬去，避开那些小孔发出的咔嚓声，这时罗兰挥舞着铲子从你身边冲过

original: Panicked, you frantically scuttle away from the tiny snapping orifices till your hand instinctivly finds the shaft of the shovel!
translate: 惊慌之下，你疯狂地向后爬去，避开那些小孔发出的咔嚓声，直到你的手本能地抓住了铲子的把手！

original: Just as you are about to abandon your grizzley task, when the 'entrails' whip out of the wound in a mass of squirming, eyeless worms!
translate: 就在你要放弃这个艰巨的任务时，那团蠕动的无眼虫从伤口中射出！

original: The shovel makes short work of the tiny terrors, until both corpse and monster is reduced to a pulpy mass
translate: 铲子很快解决了这些小恐怖，直到尸体和怪物都被削减成一团烂泥

original: Ashen-faced from horror, you push the broken corpses into their graves and quickly begin piling dirt onto them
translate: 恐惧得脸色苍白，你将破碎的尸体推入坟墓，并迅速开始填土

original: As you work, Driina begins chanting
translate: 你在工作时，德莉娜开始吟唱

original: Finish the work
translate: 完成这项工作

original: I'd rather have you lend a hand Driina
translate: 德莉娜，你愿意帮忙吗

original: Your words offer comfort
translate: 你的话带来了安慰

original: There are two corpses wrapped in linen before you
translate: 你面前有两具用亚麻布包裹的尸体

original: Their graves have been dug but they still need to be filled in
translate: 坟墓已经挖好了，但还需要填埋

original: Examine corpses
translate: 检查尸体

original: The corpses are a man and a woman
translate: 这两具尸体是一个男人和一个女人

original: Perhaps they were once man and wife
translate: 也许他们曾经是夫妻

original: They look well fed and there is no apparent cause of death
translate: 他们看起来营养良好，没有明显的死因

original: Driina looks stoically at the pair
translate: Driina 沉默地注视着这对人

original: They are with the Emperors now
translate: 他们现在与皇帝在一起了

original: Though I wonder what killed them
translate: 虽然我怀疑是什么杀死了他们

original: Investigate corpses more closely
translate: 更仔细地检查尸体

original: Bury the corpses
translate: 葬礼这些尸体

original: Place the corpses in their graves
translate: 将尸体安放在坟墓中

original: They look well fed and there is no apperant cause of death
translate: 他们看起来营养良好，没有明显的死因

original: Harvest meat from the corpses
translate: 从尸体上收获肉

original: As you look the corpses over, you notice that their abdomens seem distended beyond that of simple corpse gas
translate: 当你仔细检查尸体时，你注意到他们的腹部膨胀得远超普通的尸体气体

original: You apprehensively poke at the swelling and to your horror, the mass begins to squirm and shift!
translate: 你犹豫地触碰肿块，令你惊恐的是，那团东西开始蠕动和移动！

original: Hastily bury the corpses
translate: 赶快埋葬这些尸体

original: Cut open the corpses
translate: 切开这些尸体

original: You examine the pair more closely but don't learn anything of interest
translate: 你更仔细地检查这对人，但没有学到什么有趣的东西

original: You carve several large slabs of flesh from the well-fed corpses
translate: 你从营养良好的尸体上切下几块大块的肉

original: You cannot help but think about how hungry you are
translate: 你不禁想到自己有多饿

original: Bury corpses and leave
translate: 葬礼这些尸体然后离开

original: Driina looks at the man with a sad smile
translate: Driina 用悲伤的微笑看着那名男子

original: The dead must be put in the ground lest disease run rampant
translate: 必须将死者埋葬，以免疾病泛滥

original: But take comfort: tending to the dead is holy work
translate: 但请放心：料理死者是神圣的工作

original: You'll have earned the grace of the Golden Tomb
translate: 你将获得金墓的恩典

original: The man looks down in shame
translate: 那人羞愧地低下了头

original: It's just that it doesn't feel like it is all
translate: 就是感觉不太对劲

original: Driina says we need to bury the dead lest disease runs rampant and how it's holy work
translate: Driina 说我们必须埋葬死者，以免疾病肆虐，而且这是神圣的工作

original: You mentioned hounds?
translate: 你说的是猎犬吗？

original: Have you lost your mind?
translate: 你是不是疯了？

original: I'd die before I'll let you deface these corpses!
translate: 我宁死也不会让你玷污这些尸体！

original: The camp needs food and these are more well fed than most!
translate: 集团需要食物，这些家伙比大多数人都更健壮！

original: Waht are you talking about?
translate: 你在说什么？

original: I'm sorry I don't know what came over me
translate: 对不起，我不知道自己怎么了

original: The flesh of the dead is sacred!
translate: 死者的肉是神圣的！

original: I'm oath-sworn to protect and care for it and necrophagia is among the foulest of sins!
translate: 我宣誓要保护和照料它，而食尸罪是最污秽的罪行之一！

original: We will feast on flesh!
translate: 我们要以肉为食！

original: You reget is genunine
translate: 你的后悔是真诚的

original: I forgive your transgression
translate: 我原谅你的过失

original: It is this island - it turns our thoughs unsound
translate: 这是这座岛，它让我们思绪失常

original: Let's just bury these wretches and be done with it
translate: 让我们把这些不幸者埋葬了，事情就结束了

original: Bury corpses
translate: 埋葬尸体

original: You have lost your mind!
translate: 你疯了！

original: It is just as well we meet our end here
translate: 我们在这里结束是最好的

original: Driina charges at you!
translate: Driina 冲向你！

original: You wipe the grime from your face as you finish the grim task
translate: 你擦去脸上的污垢，完成了这令人不悦的任务

original: Sadly, you suspect these are far from the last graves that will be made for the poor refugees of Horryn before this is over
translate: 惋惜的是，你怀疑这些绝不是在这件事结束前，霍ryn的难民们最后的墓穴

original: You place the corpses in their graves and quickly fill them in
translate: 你将尸体放入墓穴，迅速填埋

original: It is hard work and the rugged widlerness around you looms threathningly
translate: 这是艰苦的工作，你周围的崎岖荒野似乎充满了威胁

original: As you work, Driina stands above you, chanting
translate: 在你工作时，迪里娜站在你上方，念诵着咒语

original: Your words offer comfort to living and dead both
translate: 你的言语为生者和死者都带来了安慰

original: So many have died the last days without proper burial or recieving their Rites of Sepulcation
translate: 这些天来，有太多人没有得到适当的安葬或接受墓葬仪式

original: I need to do this
translate: 我必须这么做

original: You finish the work in silence
translate: 你默默地完成了工作

original: Driina smiles slightly
translate: 迪里娜微微一笑

original: This offers me some small peace of mind
translate: 这让我获得了一些心灵上的慰藉

original: The darkness of night is pressing in around you and as you prepare to leave you notice movement just past the edge of the darkness
translate: 黑夜正渐渐压来，你准备离开时，注意到黑暗边缘有动静

original: Before you manage to call out, slavering horrors charge at you!
translate: 在你叫出声之前，流口水的恐怖生物冲向你！

original: Haven't you seen 'em?
translate: 你没看到它们？

original: Bloody monsters roam the hills in packs!
translate: 糟糕的怪物成群地在山丘上游荡！

original: I ain't never seen hounds like these before
translate: 我从没见过这样的狗

original: Hulking and diseased-looking
translate: 巨大且病态地看起来

original: Come at night they do
translate: 它们在夜晚出没

original: Dig up the graves I dig and eat the dead right out of their very graves!
translate: 挖开我挖的坟墓，直接从坟墓里吃掉尸体！

original: Driina whispers a few words under her breath
translate: 迪里娜低声念了几句话

original: The dead?
translate: 死者？

original: In the distance a howl sounds and the man straightens up like some prey animal sensing a predator
translate: 在远处传来一声嚎叫，那人像猎物察觉到捕食者般挺直了身子

original: He briefly squints into the perpetual twilight that covers the island before grabbing his shovel and redoubling his efforts towards finishing his work
translate: 他短暂地眯着眼睛望向笼罩岛屿的 perpetual twilight，然后拿起铲子，加倍努力地完成自己的工作

original: Run back to camp - I'll finish the job
translate: 回到营地 - 我来完成这项工作

original: Well you better hurry up then
translate: 那你最好快点

original: You approach a man sweating profusely and caked in dirt
translate: 你接近一个满身大汗、浑身泥土的男人

original: He's hunched over and panting, seemingly winded from the hard work of digging graves
translate: 他佝偻着身子，喘着粗气，显然因为挖坟的辛苦活累得不行

original: Who goes there!
translate: 你是谁！

original: The man jolts to hefting his shovel as a weapon
translate: 那人猛地举起铲子当作武器

original: I'm not looking for trouble
translate: 我不是找麻烦

original: Why so jumpy?
translate: 你这么紧张干什么？

original: Why so jumpy he asks!
translate: 他问你为什么这么紧张！

original: Well since you ask, I drew the short straw and it's fallen upon my wretched shoulders to bury the dead
translate: 好吧，既然你问了，我抽到了倒霉的签，不得不承担这可悲的任务，埋葬死者

original: He shoots Driina a sulking glance
translate: 他用不满的眼神看了迪里娜一眼

original: And if I don't get back to it, I'll be food for the fell-hounds afore you know it!
translate: 要是我不赶紧回去，很快就会成为恶犬的食物了！

original: He looks around nervously
translate: 他紧张地环顾四周

original: Why so jumpy she asks!
translate: 你这么紧张干什么！

original: Fell-hounds?
translate: 恶犬？

original: The man looks at you with slight confusion then pushes his shovel into your hands
translate: 那人带着一丝困惑看着你，然后把铲子塞到你手里

original: He thanks you profusely and runs back to camp
translate: 他感激涕零地跑回营地

original: Driina nods in approval
translate: 德里娜点头表示赞同

original: That was a good deed
translate: 这是一件好事

original: Get to work
translate: 开工吧

original: The grave-digger looks up with a nervous look on his eyes
translate: 一名看起来有些紧张的墓地挖掘工抬起头看着你

original: Let me help you
translate: 让我来帮你

original: The poor gravedigger looks at you with a grateful smile
translate: 这名可怜的墓地挖掘工感激地对你微笑

original: He seems to have made no attempt at removing some of the grime that covers him
translate: 他似乎没有尝试去除覆盖在他身上的污垢

original: No doubt he realizes he'll be back to work before long
translate: 毫无疑问，他知道自己很快就会回到工作岗位上

original: #Chapter1IagoMessenger
translate: #第1章伊戈使者

original: A man with leather-like skin covered in sailor’s tattoos approaches you
translate: 一个皮肤像皮革般，身上满是水手纹身的男人走近你

original: Greetings m’Lord
translate: 向您问好，大人

original: Greetings m’Lady
translate: 向您问好，女士

original: Name’s Donovan, ‘Dono’ for short and I’m here looking for someone a lot like you!
translate: 我叫多诺，简称多诺，我是来找一个和你很像的人的！

original: Well, begging your pardon but you look less covered in shit than the rest of this lot and able to carry a blade m’Lord
translate: 原谅我这么说，但您身上的污垢比这群人少，而且还能持刀，大人

original: Well, begging your pardon but you look less covered in shit than the rest of this lot and able to carry a blade m’Lady
translate: 原谅我这么说，但您身上的污垢比这群人少，而且还能持刀，女士

original: I serve on the vessel ‘Weathermaiden’ and I’m here on the orders of my first-mate Zhara
translate: 我在‘风暴女巫’号上服役，并奉我的大副札拉的命令前来

original: I've already talked to Zhara!
translate: 我已经见过札拉了！

original: Dono offers a clumsy bow before making his way out of camp, heading north-west
translate: 多诺笨拙地行了一礼，然后走出营地，朝西北方向走去

original: The man blinks in relief
translate: 那人松了一口气，眨了眨眼睛

original: Well in that case it seems I’ve done my job exceptionally well!
translate: 那么在这种情况下，看来我做得非常出色！

original: May the Mother of Maelstroms guide you in finding Captain Iago!
translate: 让风暴之母引导你在寻找伊阿哥船长的途中吧！

original: Better you talk to her yourself!
translate: 你自己去和她谈谈吧！

original: We’re holed up in a large sea-cave west of here while the ‘maiden’ is undergoing repairs
translate: 我们暂时躲在西边的海底洞穴里，‘处女’正在接受修理。

original: Zhara will be waiting for you there
translate: 札拉会在那里等你。

original: Here, I’ll show you on your map
translate: 这里，我来在你的地图上指给你看。

original: Dono indicates the position 66 by 91 on your map of the Outer Isles
translate: Dono在你外岛地图上标出了位置，是66号和91号。

original: I must ask you do not delay
translate: 我必须请求你不要耽搁。

original: #Chapter1Iben
translate: 第一章：伊本

original: The Reavers are fierce, but they are a poorly organized lot
translate: 剥夺者凶猛，但组织得很差。

original: With a small troupe of hungry and fearful guardsmen I was able to fight my way to the square and slay many of their numbers
translate: 带着一小队饥饿而恐惧的卫兵，我得以冲到广场并杀死了他们很多人。

original: If this is a trap, I believe it to be a poorly laid one
translate: 如果这是陷阱，我相信这陷阱布置得很差。

original: And what did you have in mind?
translate: 你有什么打算？

original: The situation inside the city is still unclear but what we do know is that the Reavers have formed factions
translate: 城里的局势仍然不明朗，但我们知道的是，剥夺者已经形成了派系。

original: Though some are doubtlessly still rabid, others may be open to parlaying
translate: 虽然有些肯定还是狂热的，但也有可能有人愿意谈判。

original: If this is so, we might be able to use that to our advantage
translate: 如果真是这样，我们或许可以利用这一点来获得优势。

original: In other words, we fight when we must but if we can use cunning instead I’m certain the Dead will favor us!
translate: 换句话说，我们必须战斗，但如果我们能用智谋代替，我相信亡者也会站在我们这边！

original: Venture forth!
translate: 勇敢前行！

original: Now pay close attention!
translate: 现在请仔细听！

original: Iben leans in intently
translate: 伊本凑近了身体。

original: You’ll enter Horryn by the Fishermen’s Gate to the south east
translate: 你们将从东南方向的渔夫门进入霍里恩。

original: Once inside you must seek out each of the three Reaver chieftains and put an end to them one way or another
translate: 一旦进入，你们必须找到三位劫掠者酋长，并以某种方式终结他们

original: We must be careful with a frontal assault
translate: 我们必须谨慎行事，进行正面攻击

original: But I suspect there is little cohesion and much infighting among the Reavers
translate: 但我怀疑劫掠者之间缺乏凝聚力，内部争斗频繁

original: Perhaps that can be used to our advantage
translate: 或许这对我们有利

original: As long as the Reavers hold the city and port, they will eventually starve us out
translate: 只要劫掠者控制着城市和港口，他们最终会让我们饿死

original: They were able to take it because they had surprise on their side!
translate: 他们之所以能占领那里，是因为他们有出其不意的优势！

original: And now: they rule by terror!
translate: 而现在：他们通过恐吓统治！

original: So long as we sit here, fearful and hungry, they will eventually fall upon us!
translate: 只要我们坐在这里，恐惧和饥饿缠身，他们最终会对我们发动攻击！

original: I say we shit on that!
translate: 我说，我们让他们尝尝我们的厉害！

original: I have a way into Horryn!
translate: 我有一条进入霍里恩的途径！

original: Let us venture forth and attempt to free her from these savages!
translate: 让我们冒险前进，试图从这些野蛮人手中解救她！

original: We have men and women here, willing and able to bear arms if called upon
translate: 我们这里有愿意并能够拿起武器的男女

original: A small band of strong swords could slip in using the Fishermen’s Gate, sow chaos among the ranks of the Reavers and open the main gate from inside!
translate: 一支小队手持强剑，可以利用渔民之门进入，制造混乱，从内部打开主城门！

original: If this was done, I am certain we stand a chance at retaking the city!
translate: 如果这样做，我相信我们有机会重新夺回城市！

original: How would we sow chaos?
translate: 我们如何制造混乱？

original: From what we learned, the Reavers in the city have formed splinter groups around three chieftains
translate: 根据我们所学，城中的劫掠者围绕三位酋长形成了分裂的小团体

original: Red Kala rules the docks, Oleg the Gray is holed up in the old Fisherman’s Lodge and someone they call ‘the Butcher’ holds his court on the steps of the temple
translate: 红卡拉统治着码头，奥列格·灰影藏身于旧渔民小屋，有人称他为‘屠夫’，在神殿台阶上主持法庭

original: While those three mad-men still draw breath, the Reavers are still a danger
translate: 只要那三位疯子还活着，劫掠者仍然是一个威胁

original: We must put an end to them
translate: 我们必须终结他们

original: Either by force of arms or subterfuge
translate: 或者通过武力或诡计

original: I am certain a way may be found to pit the fools against each other
translate: 我确信一定有办法让这些蠢货互相争斗

original: Iben’s eyes glimmer with lust for adventure
translate: 伊本的眼睛闪烁着对冒险的渴望

original: Or is it bloodthirst?
translate: 还是嗜血的欲望？

original: So what say ye?
translate: 你们怎么看？

original: Shall we make a tale worthy of the skalds?
translate: 我们要创作一个足以让吟游诗人传唱的故事吗？

original: Let's do it!
translate: 我们就做吧！

original: I'll do it but we don't need company
translate: 我会去做，但不需要同伴

original: That the situation is dire but not hopeless
translate: 局面危急但并非绝境

original: By chance or design, the Fishermen’s Gate to the south-east has been opened
translate: 无论是偶然还是有意，东南方的渔夫门已经被打开了

original: My party and I were able to make it all the way to the square before we encountered reavers
translate: 我的队伍和我，在遇到掠夺者之前，顺利抵达了广场

original: I lost men, but we cut their band down before we retreated
translate: 我失去了士兵，但在撤退前我们还是斩杀了他们

original: If we move fast, we may yet be able to take advantage of the gate!
translate: 如果我们迅速行动，或许还能利用这个门的优势！

original: That sounds like a trap!
translate: 这听起来像是陷阱！

original: For the first time you notice the green-clad man lingering there
translate: 这是你第一次注意到那个穿着绿色衣服的男人在附近徘徊

original: He steps into the light as he takes a long drag from his pipe
translate: 他从烟斗中深深吸了一口，然后走进了光亮

original: Get some food Markus
translate: 马库斯，去弄点食物

original: You're no good to any of us if you starve yourself to death
translate: 如果你饿死，对我们都没有任何帮助

original: Soon enough old friend!
translate: 不久，老朋友！

original: {PLAYER}, this is Iben
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__，这是伊本

original: He is a most useful individual and served the governor well before the calamities befell us
translate: 他是个非常有用的人，在灾难降临之前，他为总督服务得很好

original: Iben’s eyes sparkle and as he puffs a ring of smoke a smile plays across his face
translate: 伊本的眼睛闪烁着光芒，当他吐出一串烟雾时，脸上露出了微笑

original: It is good to see I’m not the only useful individual to be found in these times
translate: 看来我不是唯一一个在这个时代还能发挥作用的人

original: Iben takes another pull on his pipe as he studies you
translate: 伊本又抽了一口烟斗，仔细打量着你

original: The man’s skin is the texture of well-worn leather and his dark eyes have the keen-ness of a predator
translate: 这人的皮肤就像磨得光滑的皮革，而他那深邃的眼睛如同捕食者的目光

original: More than anything, this man reminds you of some well-made tool
translate: 这个人让你想起了一件做工精良的工具

original: Or perhaps a weapon?
translate: 或者是一件武器？

original: So, what did you learn in Horryn?
translate: 那么，在霍里恩你学到了什么？

original: The smell of cooking food fills the camp and mixes with the sounds of cheers and blessings coming from the ragged lot of starving refugees
translate: 烹饪食物的香味弥漫在营地中，与那些衣衫褴褛的饥饿难民发出的欢呼和祝福声交织在一起

original: You enter the makeshift office of Markus to tell him the good news and find him agitatedly pacing back and forth
translate: 你走进马克乌斯临时的办公室，告诉他这个好消息，却发现他焦急地来回踱步

original: {PLAYER}, I heard the news!
translate: 马库斯，我听到这个消息了！

original: That is amazing!
translate: 太棒了！

original: You’ve given us a fighting chance!
translate: 你给了我们一个战斗的机会！

original: And in the Emperor’s time it seems!
translate: 而且是在皇帝的时代！

original: Iben here has returned from scouting the city and he comes bearing curious news
translate: 这里，伊本刚从侦察城市回来，他带来了一些奇怪的消息

original: Iben, tell {PLAYER} what you just told me!
translate: 伊本，告诉马库斯你刚才告诉我的！

original: The recent excitement has evidently taken more than expected out of the plump man and Markus slumps heavily into his chair
translate: 最近的兴奋显然超出了这个丰满男子的预期，马克乌斯重重地瘫坐在椅子上

original: He gestures absent-mindedly to an unlit corner of the room as he catches his breath
translate: 他喘着气，不自觉地朝房间的一个未点亮的角落做了个手势

original: That will also work!
translate: 这样也行！

original: There is much to do here in camp to get those able to bear arms ready to storm the gate!
translate: 在营地里，还有很多事情要做，让那些能够拿起武器的人做好攻城的准备！

original: I will lead them through once the signal is given and we will clasp hands over the corpses of our foes!
translate: 信号一响，我就带领他们穿过，我们会将双手搭在敌人的尸体上！

original: Then woe to those who stand against us!
translate: 那些与我们为敌的人将自寻死路！

original: Iben slaps Markus on the back so briskly that his hat flies off
translate: 伊本用力拍了马库斯的后背一下，马库斯的帽子差点飞了出去。

original: As Markus recovers, he begins nervously poring over papers
translate: 马库斯恢复过来后，开始紧张地翻阅文件。

original: I need to begin the mustering!
translate: 我得开始召集人马了！

original: They’ll also need supplies and arms for the civilians, and we need to prepare to receive more wounded!
translate: 也需要为平民准备物资和武器，我们还得准备接收更多的伤员！

original: I best get to it!
translate: 我最好快点行动！

original: Markus dips his quill in ink and starts scribbling
translate: 马库斯蘸了蘸墨水，开始潦草地写着。

original: Ask now, while you have the chance!
translate: 赶紧问吧，机会难得！

original: Could there still be survivors in the city?
translate: 城里还有幸存者吗？

original: How should we eliminate the Reaver chieftains?
translate: 我们应该如何消灭掠夺者酋长？

original: Is there a way to open the main gate?
translate: 能不能打开城门？

original: Iben is humming a low tune as the thoughtfully chews his empty pipe when he notices you
translate: 伊本一边哼着低沉的曲子，一边若有所思地抽着空烟斗，注意到你时停下了。

original: Ho there {PLAYER}!
translate: 哦，{PLAYER}！

original: What news?
translate: 有什么消息吗？

original: Shall we join forces?
translate: 我们要不要结成联盟？

original: We shall indeed!
translate: 当然要！

original: I dare say, great deeds lie ahead of us
translate: 我想说，伟大的事迹就在我们面前。

original: There are two gates in the city
translate: 这座城市有两个城门。

original: The main gate to the north and one to the south, leading to the harbor
translate: 北边是主城门，南边有一个通往港口的城门。

original: Both are heavy portcullises and the only way to raise them is to find the nearby mechanism that operates them
translate: 两个城门都是重弩门，唯一的办法是找到附近的装置来操作它们。

original: Survivors may be hiding in barricaded houses and perhaps cellars!
translate: 幸存者们可能躲在了加固的房屋里，甚至地下室里！

original: What’s more, the city has a large sewer system and if I were trapped inside with Reavers at my heels, I would certainly consider finding shelter there!
translate: 更重要的是，这座城市有一个庞大的下水道系统，如果我被困在里面，被掠夺者追杀，我一定会考虑在那里寻找庇护！

original: #Chapter1Maija
translate: #第一章梅雅

original: I can't say I remember seeing her
translate: 说实话，我不记得见过她

original: Doesn't mean I didn't - my emporium was always busy
translate: 这并不意味着我没有见过——我的商行总是很忙

original: Frantzo, the camp cook, used to own the main inn - you'll find him near the stables - if anyone saw her, it'd be him
translate: 弗朗佐，营地的厨师，以前是主要的旅店老板——你可以在马厩附近找到他——如果有人见过她，那一定是他

original: I wish I could tell you
translate: 我真希望能告诉你

original: Things have felt queer on Idra for a while
translate: 伊德拉最近感觉怪怪的

original: Folks in Horryn started changing
translate: 希罗恩村里的村民开始变了

original: People I'd known for years became mean, hard
translate: 我认识了好几年的人变得冷酷无情

original: Violence and cruelty grew so common we stopped noticing it
translate: 暴力和残忍变得如此普遍，以至于我们都习以为常

original: Just last week, my neighbour... her children
translate: 就在上周，我的邻居……她的孩子

original: Maija's voice falters and her eyes begin to glisten with tears
translate: 梅雅的声音颤抖起来，眼中闪烁着泪光

original: A few days ago, I was out of town, taking supplies to one of the whaling vessels
translate: 几天前，我外出，给捕鲸船补给物资

original: On the way back, at sunset, I spotted a clutch of people, tearing towards us on foot from the outskirts of Horryn, covered in blood and shrieking
translate: 返回途中，日落时分，我看到一群人在从希罗恩郊区向我们狂奔而来，身上沾满了血迹，尖叫着

original: My mare was so spooked that she bolted and broke her leg in the halflight
translate: 我的马被吓得不轻，狂奔起来，结果在黎明前摔断了腿

original: Poor old Aga - I had to help her pass on
translate: 贫穷的阿加——我不得不帮助她安详地离开人世

original: When the townsfolk reached us, they regained their senses, and told us such terrible stories
translate: 当镇上的居民赶到我们这里时，他们恢复了理智，向我们讲述了那些恐怖的故事

original: Stories of raving madmen rampaging across the town by night
translate: 关于夜晚狂暴的疯子们横扫整个城镇的故事

original: They...let's just say, not even children were spared
translate: 他们……怎么说呢，连孩子都不放过

original: But they didn't kill everyone - some were taken - to who knows where
translate: 但他们并没有杀光所有人——有些人被带走了——去了谁也不知道的地方

original: We heard screams on the wind for days afterwards
translate: 之后好几天，我们都能听到风中的尖叫声

original: It was clear there was no going back
translate: 很明显，已经没有回头路了

original: There was something else
translate: 还有其他东西

original: Hope to see you soon
translate: 希望很快能再见

original: Stay safe
translate: 保重

original: The woman before you has the rugged and vital look of a life lived on the frontier
translate: 你面前的女子有着在边疆生活过的坚韧而充满活力的外表

original: Though her clothes are rich and tailor-made, she wades through ankle-deep mud with rolled up sleeves, hefting heavy crates of goods off a broken cart
translate: 尽管她的衣服华丽且量身定制，但她挽起袖子，踩在齐踝的烂泥中，从一辆破旧的手推车上搬下沉重的货物

original: Do you need help?
translate: 你需要帮助吗？

original: Do nothing
translate: 什么也不做

original: Greetings!
translate: 你好！

original: The woman spins around as you greet her
translate: 你问候她时，女子猛然转身

original: What's this then?
translate: 这是什么？

original: See a lady in distress and thought you'd lend a hand did you?
translate: 见到一位陷入困境的女士，你认为会出手相助吗？

original: The woman snaps at you
translate: 女子对你怒斥

original: By the Golden Dead, can't this bloody wait?
translate: 该死的金死神，这能等吗？

original: It's not like I'm open for business!
translate: 我可不是随时待命的！

original: she snaps at you
translate: 她对你怒斥

original: And then the poor lonely woman would owe you a debt of gratitude?
translate: 那可怜的孤独女子会欠你一个人情？

original: Is that it?
translate: 就这些吗？

original: she snarls
translate: 她咆哮着

original: I'm doing this by myself or not at all!
translate: 我要么独自完成，要么根本不做！

original: The woman notices you observing her
translate: 那女人注意到你在观察她

original: Enjoying the show are we?
translate: 观看表演吗？

original: Or are you just lame in the head?
translate: 还是脑子有问题？

original: In either case, come any closer and I'll have your balls!
translate: 无论哪种情况，再靠近一步，我就让你尝尝我的拳头！

original: The woman snarls
translate: 那女人咆哮着

original: Are you daft, or drunk, girl?
translate: 你是傻了还是喝醉了，女孩？

original: Lend me a hand!
translate: 借我一臂之力！

original: The woman hefts the crate back onto the cart with a sigh
translate: 那女人叹了口气，把箱子重新放到手推车上

original: Forgive me, I'm not myself - there's not been much rest for me amid the chaos
translate: 对不起，我不是我自己 - 在混乱中，我几乎没有休息过

original: All this jabbering about 'the end of all mankind!'
translate: 这么多关于“人类的终结”的废话

original: is starting to wear on me
translate: 正变得令我厌烦

original: In any case, I am Maija
translate: 无论如何，我是梅贾

original: I run - or ran - an emporium in Horryn
translate: 我在霍里恩经营着一家商店 - 或者曾经经营着

original: But you are not from Horryn, are you?
translate: 但你不是霍里恩的人，对吧？

original: Maija's eyes light up with suspicion
translate: 梅贾的眼睛闪烁着怀疑的光芒

original: What brings you to Idra, hmm?
translate: 你为什么来到伊德拉，哼？

original: I was heading for Horryn
translate: 我正要去霍里恩

original: We were shipwrecked just off the coast
translate: 我们在海岸附近遭遇了海难

original: A rescue mission
translate: 一项救援任务

original: I'll ask no more, but it seems my merchant's intuition was right
translate: 我不再多问了，但看来我的商人口感不错

original: Either way, we may yet be of help to one other
translate: 无论如何，我们或许还能互相帮助

original: Maija hefts the last of her crates off the damaged cart and into her makeshift tent
translate: 赛玛将最后一箱货物从损坏的手推车上搬进了她临时搭建的帐篷

original: And I still have a modest selection of wares with me
translate: 而我身上还有一些不错的货物

original: My tight-fisted husband - probably still clutching at pennies when the lights went out - saved all our money in a bank on the mainland
translate: 我那吝啬的丈夫——可能在灯灭时还在攥着便士——把我们所有的钱都存到了大陆上的银行里

original: The damn bank dealt only with him - I need to retrieve the letters of credit to have any chance of accessing the funds
translate: 那该死的银行只和他打交道——我得拿到信用证，才有机会取到资金

original: They should still be in whatever is left of our old store
translate: 它们应该还在我们旧店剩下的部分里

original: I understand
translate: 我明白了

original: So?
translate: 那呢？

original: What's it to be?
translate: 你打算怎么办？

original: What have you got for sale?
translate: 你有什么货物出售？

original: Ask about work
translate: 问问有没有工作

original: What happened in Horryn?
translate: 哈罗因发生了什么事？

original: I must be on my way
translate: 我必须启程了

original: Maija
translate: 赛玛

original: Good to see you back!
translate: 很高兴你回来了！

original: Only what I had with me when Horryn fell - but I'd be delighted to show you
translate: 只有哈罗因沦陷时我身上的东西——但我很乐意带你去看看

original: They're still the same quality goods I'm known for!
translate: 它们还是我闻名的优质商品！

original: Show me!
translate: 带我看看！

original: #Chapter1Marsa
translate: #第一章火星

original: You and Marsa face each other and you can help but feel a little out of place as you engage in the clapping game with the small girl
translate: 你和火星面对面，你不禁觉得有些格格不入，随着小女孩一起参与拍手游戏

original: Right
translate: 左

original: Left
translate: 右

original: Both
translate: 左右

original: Skip
translate: 跳过

original: I don't have time for this!
translate: 我没时间玩这个！

original: Great!
translate: 太棒了！

original: And now?
translate: 现在呢？

original: Keep the rythm!
translate: 保持节奏！

original: Almost there!
translate: 差不多了！

original: Aaaand...?
Marsa rolls her eyes
translate: 火星翻了个白眼

original: Frogger says you're not very good at this
translate: 蝾螈说你不太擅长这个游戏

original: The movements are 'left, left, both, right, both, skip'!
translate: 动作是“左，左，左右，右，左右，跳过”！

original: Let my try again!
translate: 让我再试一次！

original: I guess I'm too old for games
translate: 我想我太老不适合玩这些了

original: It's a rhyme!
translate: 这是个押韵！

original: All the kids in my street play it - or at least we used to I guess
translate: 我街上的孩子们都玩这个——或者至少我们以前都玩过

original: She hesitates for a moment before proceeding with renewed vigor
translate: 她犹豫了一下，然后重新振作起来继续进行

original: Let's try them first and then we can add the words!
translate: 先试试看，然后再加词！

original: Let's try!
translate: 先试试看！

original: You did it!
translate: 你做到了！

original: Now let's add in the words!
translate: 现在再加词吧！

original: Just say them after me!
translate: 跟着我说！

original: You and Marsa proceed to repeat the pattern - this time the girl begins to recite a rhyme
translate: 你和玛尔萨重复这个模式——这次女孩开始背诵押韵的句子

original: Hurry!
translate: 快点！

original: He doesn't like to be alone - he's afraid of the hounds!
translate: 他不喜欢独自一人——他害怕猎犬！

original: Marsa
translate: 玛尔萨

original: The child is ragged and muddy and crying in great big sobs
translate: 孩子衣衫褴褛，满身泥泞，抽泣不已

original: As you approach, she wipes her nose and looks up at you, her eyes widening somewhat at the sight of Roland
translate: 当你走近时，她擦了擦鼻子，抬头看着你，看到罗兰后眼睛睁大了一些

original: Hrm
translate: 嗯

original: I'd prefer we just got on with our work
translate: 我们还是直接开始工作吧

original: Roland grunts
translate: 罗兰哼了一声

original: As you approach, she wipes her nose and looks up at youwith teary eyes
translate: 当你走近时，她擦了擦鼻子，抬头看着你，眼中含泪

original: What's wrong?
translate: 你怎么了？

original: Marsa looks up at you
translate: 玛尔萨抬头看着你

original: Did you find him?
translate: 你找到他了吗？

original: Did you find Froggert?
translate: 你找到弗戈特了吗？

original: Is this the reptilian rascal?
translate: 这就是那个爬行类的小混蛋吗？

original: Give her the stuffed animal
translate: 给她一个毛绒玩具
