original: Then what are you doing here?
translate: 那你来这里做什么？

original: These records are Imperial property and I’m not letting you have them!
translate: 这些记录是帝国财产，我不会让你带走它们的！

original: Now back away!
translate: 现在后退！

original: It's pretty safe out there now
translate: 现在外面很安全

original: You can leave if you want to
translate: 如果你想离开，可以走了

original: The chamberlain sends orders
translate: 宰相发出了命令

original: It's safe out there now and you can leave
translate: 现在外面很安全，你可以离开了

original: Lie
translate: 说谎

original: About what?!
translate: 关于什么？！

original: It's pretty safe out there now!
translate: 现在外面很安全！

original: The young man brandishes his weapon with trembling hands
translate: 那个年轻人颤抖着手挥舞着武器

original: Halt!
translate: 停下！

original: I need to talk to you
translate: 我需要和你谈谈

original: As if to confirm your words, the shouts of the boy's comrades echo from the plaza
translate: 就在他说话的时候，广场上传来了那男孩同伴们的喊叫声，仿佛在证实他的话

original: A wave of relief washes over the his face
translate: 他的脸上闪过一丝宽慰

original: Golden bless me!
translate: 金光闪闪，真是幸运！

original: He pushes past you and flees into the city without looking behind
translate: 他从你身边挤过，不回头地逃进了城市

original: #HorrynReaverChief1
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长1

original: Oleg smiles broadly as he imitates a sawing motion with his hands
translate: 奥列格满脸笑容，模仿着锯东西的动作

original: Savage blades do bloody work
translate: 残酷的刀刃洒满了鲜血

original: The Whispering tablets came to me
translate: 低语的石板向我显现

original: Begon now and do not return until you are done
translate: 现在去吧，直到完成任务不要回来

original: #HorrynReaverChief1GateGuard
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长1守卫

original: He had the tablets even before the Father came to us
translate: 在父亲来到我们这里之前，他甚至已经得到了石板

original: #HorrynReaverChief2
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长2

original: My patience is running low
translate: 我的耐心快用完了

original: I just wanted to ask some questions
translate: 我只是想问几个问题

original: Hmm, I see
translate: 嗯，我明白了

original: And when the Butcher feast’s on the old fool’s liver he’ll be so certain he’s won Father’s favor that he might not even feel my blade between his ribs
translate: 等到屠夫在老愚者的肝脏上大宴宾客时，他或许会如此确信得到了父亲的恩宠，以至于连我插入他肋骨间的刀刃都感觉不到

original: Blood sprays from the Butcher’s mouth as the strains from the effort and with a wet, sickening snap, Kala’s arm is torn from her body
translate: 屠夫的口中喷出鲜血，随着努力的挣扎和一声湿漉漉的、令人作呕的断裂声，卡拉的胳膊从她的身体上被扯了下来

original: #HorrynReaverChief3
translate: #霍里恩掠夺者酋长3

original: Mesmerized, he traces the grotesque carvings with fat, blood smeared fingers
translate: 他被迷住了，用沾满鲜血的肥厚手指触摸着那些怪异的雕刻

original: WHat now?
translate: 现在怎么办？

original: #HorrynSpiral1
translate: #霍林螺旋1

original: #HorrynSurvivorCora
translate: #霍林幸存者科拉

original: Tell me about the reavers?
translate: 告诉我关于掠夺者的事情？

original: Figthing each other?
translate: 相互战斗？

original: #HorrynSurvivorNatia
translate: #霍林幸存者娜蒂亚

original: #HorrynSurvivorPhilip
translate: #霍林幸存者菲利普

original: Besides the reavers seem to be holed up in their separate parts of town for now
translate: 除此之外，这些掠夺者现在似乎各自躲在了镇上的不同区域

original: #ReaverZombieScene
translate: #掠夺者僵尸场景

original: # Chapter_3_Horryn
translate: #第三章 霍林

original: #HorrynBlacksmithScene
translate: #霍林铁匠铺场景

original: Good bye!
translate: 再见！

original: You meet someone for the first time
translate: 你第一次遇到某人

original: More intro exposition
translate: 更多介绍性背景

original: You have formed a first impression and are ready to act
translate: 你已经形成了第一印象，准备采取行动

original: So, what will it be?
translate: 那么，接下来呢？

original: Show me your wares
translate: 让我看看你的货物

original: I have only the finest wares!
translate: 我只有最好的货品！

original: #HorrynChiefsDead
translate: #霍里恩酋长已死

original: You stand dazed, surveying the carnage around you
translate: 你呆呆地站在原地，环视四周的惨状

original: The three Reaver chieftains lie dead
translate: 三个掠夺者酋长已死

original: Now the one they call Father awaits you inside the still occupied keep
translate: 现在，他们称之为父亲的人在你进入仍然被占领的要塞内等待

original: The sound of footsteps interrupt your thoughts and you whirl around ready for another melee
translate: 脚步声打断了你的思绪，你猛然转身，准备应对另一次混战

original: To your surprise you see the surviving soldiers of the Horryn guard bolstered by armed refugees!
translate: 令你惊讶的是，你看到幸存的霍里恩卫兵得到了武装难民的支持！

original: Moving methodically from house to house, they begin the task of retaking the ravaged town
translate: 他们有条不紊地从一户人家到另一户人家，开始收复这片被破坏的小镇

original: Cries of jubilation mix with the anguished cries of people finding the corpses of former loved ones
translate: 欢呼的喊声与人们发现逝去亲人的痛苦呼喊交织在一起

original: Nonetheless, it does not take long for life to creep back into the desolate streets
translate: 不过，不久之后，生活开始在这荒凉的街道上重新复苏

original: One of the soldiers approaches you
translate: 一名士兵走近你

original: {PLAYER}, I bring word from the chamberlain!
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__，我从执事那里带来消息！

original: He’s requested you find him at the tavern over by the temple
translate: 他要求你到神殿附近的酒馆去找他

original: He asks you make haste
translate: 他催促你尽快行动

original: The young man offers a short bow and continues on his way
translate: 年轻人向你微微鞠了一躬，然后继续前行

original: #HorrynClothierScene
translate: #霍里恩裁缝场景

original: #HorrynFirgolQuestGiverScene
translate: #霍里恩菲戈尔任务给予者场景

original: A grimy woman with a haggard look on her face approaches you
translate: 一个满脸污垢、面容憔悴的女人走近你

original: You get the impression she would normally be quite beautiful but starvation, disease and constant fear has erased that from her features
translate: 你感觉她本应非常美丽，但饥饿、疾病和持续的恐惧已经从她的面容上抹去了这一点

original: Perhaps for good
translate: 或许，这将永远如此

original: Please, they say you are looking for a way off of this island!
translate: 请，他们说你正在寻找离开这个岛屿的方法！

original: I’m Julia
translate: 我是朱莉娅

original: My sister, Ylia, lives in a small village called Firgol on the island north of here
translate: 我的姐姐，伊莉亚，住在这个岛屿北边的一个叫做费戈尔的小村庄里

original: I was supposed to travel to her before this all broke out and she must be worried sick that I have not arrived yet
translate: 我原本打算在这一切发生之前去她那里，她肯定非常担心我还没有到达

original: She wrings her hands
translate: 她绞着双手

original: I’m in no condition to travel now and so should your travels take you to Firgol, would you please seek out Ylia
translate: 现在我没有条件旅行，所以如果你的旅途带你去费戈尔，麻烦你去找伊莉亚

original: Tell her that I’m still alive and not to worry?
translate: 告诉她我仍然活着，不要担心？

original: I’m sure they have all kinds of troubles themselves up there and I wouldn’t want her to spend time worrying about me as well
translate: 我确信他们自己也有各种各样的麻烦，我不想让她再为我担心

original: I'll see if I can't find her
translate: 我会试着找到她的

original: May the Golden bless you
translate: 金色的神恩赐你

original: I’m sure my sister can spare a few coins once you tell her the good news
translate: 我确信我的姐姐听到这个好消息后会给你一些零钱

original: A few tears of joy leave streaks on her soot-covered face
translate: 几滴喜悦的泪水在她满是烟熏痕迹的脸上留下痕迹

original: Hello there!
translate: 哦，你好！

original: Looking for something?
translate: 你在找什么吗？

original: Are you Ylia?
translate: 你是伊莉亚吗？

original: Do you have a sister in Horryn?
translate: 你在霍林有姐姐吗？

original: Why yes that’s me!
translate: 哦，是的，就是我！

original: My sister you say?
translate: 你说的是我的姐姐？

original: You must mean Julia?
translate: 你一定是说朱莉娅？

original: I’m expecting her to visit me any day now!
translate: 我随时都在期待她来拜访我！

original: She apologies for being late but at least she’s still alive
translate: 她抱歉来晚了，但至少她还活着

original: Tell Ylia about Horryn
translate: 告诉伊莉亚关于霍里恩的情况

original: Ylia looks more surprised than horrified
translate: 伊莉亚看起来更惊讶而不是惊恐

original: Are you sure you’re not mistaken?
translate: 你确定没有搞错吗？

original: Julia is not late at all
translate: 朱莉娅并没有迟到

original: In fact she’s still not due until a day or two!
translate: 实际上，她甚至还要再晚一天或两天才会到达！

original: And what’s this you’re saying about Horryn?
translate: 你到底在说什么关于霍里恩的事？

original: We’ve had no news of any calamities!
translate: 我们没有收到任何灾难的消息！

original: I can assure you I’m not mistaken
translate: 我可以保证我没有搞错

original: Well, I’m not sure what to say about this
translate: 我不确定该说什么

original: I suppose that it’s good my sister is safe if we are indeed talking about the same person
translate: 我想如果确实是我们说的同一个人，我妹妹平安无事也是好的

original: Thank you in any case
translate: 无论如何，谢谢

original: I was promised payment
translate: 我被承诺过报酬

original: As the woman goes about her chores you meet Embla’s eyes
translate: 当这个女人忙于家务时，你与埃姆bla的目光相遇

original: The woman was late for her arrival two days before she even supposed to set out?
translate: 这女人在她预计出发的两天前就已经迟到了？

original: A misunderstanding perhaps?
translate: 可能是误会吧？

original: Though I fear this is just another expression of the madness that grips these isles
translate: 虽然我担心这只是这些岛屿上疯狂的表现

original: Ylia looks slightly taken aback
translate: 伊莉亚略显惊讶

original: Oh
translate: 哦

original: Yes I suppose you’re right
translate: 是的，我想你是对的

original: I don’t have much but here are a few gold-pieces at least
translate: 我没有什么，但至少有几枚金币

original: Now goodbye
translate: 现在再见吧

original: #HorrynFlopHouseScene
translate: #霍里恩浮屋场景

original: A matronly woman with red cheeks and impressively bad teeth gives you a suspicious look
translate: 一位脸颊通红、牙齿令人怀疑的中年妇女给了你一个怀疑的眼神

original: You’re either looking for a bed and a bowl of stew or you ain’t got nuffin to do here!
translate: 你要么在找床位和一碗炖菜，要么这里什么也做不了！

original: Let's see what you have to offer!
translate: 让我们看看你有什么可以提供的！

original: #HorrynFrantzo
translate: #霍里恩弗朗佐

original: You say goodbye and leave
translate: 你说再见然后离开了

original: Have a look!
translate: 查看一下吧！

original: Rooms are being cleaned and we even have warm food on the stove
translate: 房间正在打扫，甚至炉灶上还有热腾腾的食物

original: Finally the last part about Menu
translate: 最后关于菜单的部分

original: You may ask some questions!
translate: 你可以问一些问题！

original: Show me your list of services!
translate: 展示你的服务清单！

original: Ask about Rumors
translate: 询问关于谣言

original: Something about Rumors
translate: 关于谣言的一些内容

original: More about Rumors
translate: 更多关于谣言的内容

original: Finally the last part about Rumors
translate: 最后关于谣言的部分

original: #HorrynGallian
translate: #霍里恩加利安

original: Driina sighs
translate: 德里娜叹了口气

original: Truly there are many things you do not understand about this world
translate: 确实，你对这个世界的许多事情都不理解

original: It nourishes me to stand in this hall and find its altar unmolested by the madness that has engulfed this island
translate: 它滋养着我站在大厅中，发现这座祭坛未被笼罩在这座岛屿上的疯狂所侵扰

original: Tenderly, she touches the base of the statue and offers a whispered prayer
translate: 她温柔地触摸着雕像的基座，并低声祈祷

original: Why is he masked?
translate: 他为什么戴着面具？

original: He looks so frail
translate: 他看起来如此虚弱

original: You worship a corpse
translate: 你们崇拜一个死尸

original: Madness
translate: 疯狂

original: It symbolizes the sacrifices he made when he built the world we see around us today
translate: 它象征着他建造我们今天所见的世界时所做出的牺牲

original: The cost of all those touched by the reticulum is indeed steep in the end
translate: 所有被回路网触及的人最终付出的代价的确很高昂

original: We must never forget that
translate: 我们永远不能忘记这一点

original: But why is he masked?
translate: 但为什么他戴着面具？

original: The elegant marble statue looms over you
translate: 这尊优雅的大理石雕像矗立在你面前

original: Unblemished and pristine
translate: 未受损且纯净无瑕

original: An emaciated form, dressed in ragged robes frozen mid-gesture while unmasking
translate: 一个瘦弱的身影，穿着破旧的长袍，动作定格在卸下面具的瞬间

original: Gallian - the first Emperor - presides over the serene temple interior
translate: 加利安——第一位皇帝——统治着宁静的神殿内部

original: Driina reverently presses her palms lightly against her face and then removes them in a gesture reminding you of the statue
translate: 德里娜虔诚地轻按着自己的脸颊，然后移开手，这个动作让你想起了雕像

original: Driina?
translate: 德里娜？

original: The Emperors are very old
translate: 皇帝们非常古老

original: Often several hundred years
translate: 往往几百年

original: They are also beyond powerful - one with the Reticulum
translate: 他们也极其强大——与回路网融为一体

original: One can only imagine the effect it has on their physical form
translate: 只能想象这对他们的身体造成了怎样的影响

original: Perhaps it is best that the common folk never have to see the price of such power
translate: 或许普通人永远不必看到这种力量的代价是最好的

original: For a moment, a shadow falls over the room - then it passes
translate: 有一瞬间，房间内投下了一道阴影，然后它消失了

original: You must be on your way
translate: 你最好启程了

original: Nothing
translate: 没有

original: They are our Golden Dead and we must give praise that they watch over us
translate: 他们是我们的黄金死者，我们必须赞美他们为我们守望

original: Driina offers a comforting smile
translate: Driina露出一个安慰的微笑

original: Shall we be on our way?
translate: 我们现在启程吗？

original: Emperors don masks when they ascend to the throne
translate: 皇帝登基时会戴上面具

original: Being amongst the oldest and most powerful of the Magi, they are already more-than-human
translate: 作为最古老和最强大的法师之一，他们已经超越了人类的范畴

original: When they don the mask, it symbolizes that they have risen beyond even their brethren
translate: 当他们戴上面具时，象征着他们已经超越了兄弟们

original: And they are never seen without it?
translate: 他们从来不戴吗？

original: The Emperor is never seen without their mask save by the Excubitors of the Imperial Palace
translate: 除了帝国皇宫的卫兵，皇帝从不摘下面具

original: The silence hangs for a moment
translate: 沉默持续了一刻

original: There is something unsaid
translate: 有些话没有说出口

original: #HorrynGuardCaptainScene
translate: #HorrynGuardCaptainScene

original: I’m ashamed to say me and a handful of my lads ended up captured by Reavers
translate: 我羞愧地说我和几个手下被海盗俘虏了

original: They started killing us off one by one
translate: 他们一个接一个地杀死了我们

original: Real slow while the rest were forced to watch
translate: 一个接一个地，其余的人被迫观看

original: Or even
translate: 或者甚至

original: Her eyes grow glassy then she shakes her head defiantly
translate: 她的眼睛变得空洞，然后她坚定地摇了摇头

original: Then the mad-men suddenly started infighting!
translate: 然后那些疯子突然开始内斗了！

original: Like bloody animals!
translate: 像一群该死的野兽！

original: But at least we managed to flee
translate: 至少我们设法逃出来了。

original: And who are you?
translate: 你是谁？

original: Best of luck and stay safe
translate: 祝你好运，保重。

original: She holds up her hands in apology
translate: 她举起双手表示歉意。

original: I’m sorry!
translate: 对不起！

original: Without your aid, we’d all be dead
translate: 没有你的帮助，我们全都死了。

original: It’s just that me and the boyos missed most of the fighting and it pains me to see we had to rely on mercenaries to keep Imperial citizens safe
translate: 只是，我和那些小子们大部分时间都没有参与战斗，看到我们不得不依靠雇佣兵来保护帝国公民的安全，我感到很痛心。

original: Indeed, I don't remember seeing you on the battlefield
translate: 的确，我确实不记得在战场上见过你。

original: As I said, people are streaming back into town
translate: 正如我所说，人们正蜂拥回到小镇。

original: A lot more people than were at the refugee camp in fact!
translate: 实际上比难民营地里的人还要多得多！

original: Isn't that a good thing
translate: 这不是一件好事。

original: Yes it is
translate: 是的，是好事。

original: A lot of people did what I did and hid until the terror passed
translate: 很多人像我一样，直到恐怖过去才藏起来。

original: But not this many
translate: 但不是这么多人。

original: Let me ask you this
translate: 我想问你一件事。

original: Once a Reaver washes off the paint and blood and shit and puts regular clothing back on, is he still a Reaver
translate: 一旦掠夺者洗掉身上的油漆、血迹和污物，穿上普通衣服，他还是不是掠夺者？

original: Are you saying Reavers are hiding amongst the regular people
translate: 你是在说掠夺者们混在普通人群中吗？

original: That’s the thing, isn’t it
translate: 这不就是问题所在吗？

original: The Reavers were regular people
translate: 破帆者们原本是普通百姓

original: Friends and neighbors
translate: 朋友和邻居

original: Family even
translate: 甚至家人

original: Most of them lie dead now or have fled Horryn
translate: 大部分人现在都已死去，或者逃离了霍林

original: But not all
translate: 但并非全部

original: I think some of them just took off their rags and just went right back to being ordinary people
translate: 我认为他们只是脱下了破烂的衣服，重新过起了普通人的生活

original: Food for thought
translate: 值得深思

original: What did you need?
translate: 你需要什么？

original: How did you say you survived the Reavers?
translate: 你是怎么在破帆者手下生存下来的？

original: How are things going in Horryn?
translate: 霍林的情况如何？

original: Look lively boys
translate: 起来吧，孩子们

original: The savior of Horryn graces our halls!
translate: 救世主霍林的恩人光临了我们的大厅！

original: A tall woman dressed in platemail with a greatsword on her back offers a short bow
translate: 一位身穿platemail的高大女性背着一把大剑，微微鞠躬

original: You’re unsure if she’s being sarcastic or not
translate: 你不确定她是在讽刺还是真心如此

original: How about some gratitude?
translate: 一些感激之情如何？

original: I didn't see you out there, fighting!
translate: 我没看到你在外面战斗！

original: Who are you, loudmouth?
translate: 你这个大嗓门是谁？

original: I trust all is well?
translate: 我希望一切安好？

original: We hid under the docks like bloody rats
translate: 我们像见鬼的耗子一样躲在码头下

original: For days we hunkered down
translate: 我们躲在那儿好几天了

original: Ate limpets and drank salt water
translate: 吃了海螺，喝了盐水

original: Had no weapons and my men were all exhausted or hurt so we just stayed there
translate: 没有武器，我的手下也都疲惫不堪或受伤，所以我们只能待在那里

original: I suppose surviving doesn’t make you a hero
translate: 活下来并不意味着你就是英雄

original: But here we are and I intend to make the most out of it
translate: 但我们现在在这里，我打算充分利用这个机会

original: That's all for now I guess
translate: 恐怕就这些了

original: She sighs
translate: 她叹了口气

original: And you are?
translate: 你是谁？

original: Name’s Vivian Laruto
translate: 我叫维维安·拉鲁托

original: I’m the newly minted captain of the city-guard
translate: 我是新任的城市守备队长

original: It would appear the city’s stock of officers is running low indeed
translate: 看来城市的军官储备确实很紧张

original: You don't sound too sure of yourself?
translate: 你听起来不太自信？

original: Put me on the street to wrestle with thugs and drunkards any day!
translate: 把我派到街上与暴徒和醉汉搏斗，我随时奉陪！

original: But this - being captain - is a bit of a change of pace for me
translate: 但这个——当队长——对我来说确实是个不小的转变

original: A lot more responsibility as you can probably guess
translate: 你可以猜到，责任会重得多

original: Especially now with the city in ruins and people streaming back in to pick up the pieces of their lives
translate: 尤其是现在城市一片废墟，人们纷纷回来重建生活

original: I can imagine
translate: 我可以想象

original: That reminds me
translate: 这提醒了我

original: With more people streaming in, you’ll find the streets a bit more busy
translate: 随着更多人涌入，街道会更加繁忙

original: Even more businesses are open as well now and I recommend you spend some time looking around before you continue on your travels
translate: 现在有更多的店铺开门营业，我建议你花点时间四处看看再继续你的旅程

original: At least be sure to get a hot meal and a warm bed!
translate: 至少要确保吃上一顿热饭，睡个暖和觉！

original: I'll do that
translate: 我会去做

original: Noted
translate: 已经记下了

original: #HorrynHierophant
translate: #霍里恩主教

original: The old man gives you a determined nod before producing a large key from his robes
translate: 老人给你一个坚定的点头，然后从袍子里掏出一把大钥匙

original: Inserting it into the main door’s keyhole, he turns it with great effort until something clicks inside
translate: 他把钥匙插入大门的锁孔中，费力地转动，直到里面传来一声轻响

original: The perfectly balanced doors of the temple swing open soundlessly
translate: 神殿那完美平衡的大门无声地缓缓打开

original: The temple’s pristine interior lies in stark contrast to the rest of the town and something about the aura of silence feels off
translate: 神殿那洁净的内部与镇上的其他部分形成了鲜明对比，那种寂静的氛围让人感觉有些不对劲

original: Enter
translate: 进去

original: Do you have anything for sale?
translate: 你有什么东西要卖吗？

original: The desecrated temple stands as a sad reminder of the last days’ calamities
translate: 被亵渎的神殿是最近灾难的悲惨象征

original: Standing in front of the main gates with eyes closed in prayer is Hierophant Drahl
translate: 眼睛闭着祈祷的主教德拉尔站在大门口前

original: As you approach you can make out a simple prayer of gratitude to the long line of deceased Emperors that now watch over the Gallian people
translate: 当你走近时，可以听到他对长眠的历代皇帝表示简单的感激之情，那些皇帝现在守护着加利安人民

original: For all their savagery, it seems the mad-men were not able to breach the gates of the temple
translate: 尽管他们野蛮，但似乎疯子们无法突破神殿的大门

original: Drahl’s voice is a mixture of gratitude and disbelief
translate: 德拉尔的声音中混合着感激和难以置信

original: He opens his eyes and looks at you for the first time
translate: 他睁开眼睛，第一次看着你

original: A small miracle perhaps?
translate: 或许这是一个小小的奇迹？

original: Markus sent me
translate: 马库斯派我来的

original: And he could have found no better hero for what lies ahead!
translate: 而他显然为即将到来的挑战找到了最合适的英雄！

original: You seek a way into the keep and in their infinite wisdom, I believe our forefathers have provided for us
translate: 你们寻找进入要塞的方法，而我们的先祖显然已经为我们准备好了

original: As Markus no doubt told you, it is said that a tunnel exists between the keep and the temple
translate: 正如马库斯可能告诉你的，据说要塞和神殿之间存在一条隧道

original: I’ve always considered it a bit of a myth and in any case we’ve never had cause to search for it
translate: 我一直认为这只是一个传说，而且我们之前也从未有理由去寻找它

original: Until now that is
translate: 但直到现在

original: Where do you suggest we search?
translate: 你建议我们去哪里寻找？

original: If the tunnel does indeed exist, I can say with absolute certainty that its entrance lies in the catacombs beneath the temple
translate: 如果地道确实存在，我可以肯定地说，它的入口就在神殿下的墓穴中

original: In the crypts of the deepest, oldest portions would indeed be where I would place my faith
translate: 在最深、最古老的部位的墓室中，那才是我所信任的地方

original: Then that is where I will search!
translate: 那我将去那里寻找！

original: Have you found a way into the keep yet?
translate: 你已经找到进入要塞的路了吗？

original: As I said
translate: 正如我所说

original: Seek out the tombs in the deepest part of the crypt!
translate: 去寻找最深处的墓室吧！

original: Blessed Dead watch over you!
translate: 圣者保佑你！

original: I wish to talk
translate: 我想谈谈

original: I do indeed!
translate: 我确实想谈！

original: It’s not much given the circumstances but I have a selection of potions and concoctions in addition to my healing services
translate: 在这种情况下不多，但我有一些药剂和药水，除了治疗服务外还有其他选择

original: #HorrynMaija
translate: #霍里恩梅雅

original: Ask about Wares
translate: 询问货物

original: Ask about Something
translate: 询问某物

original: Something about Wares
translate: 某物关于货物

original: Something about Something
translate: 某物关于某物

original: More about Something
translate: 更多关于某物

original: Finally the last part about Something
translate: 最后一部分关于某物

original: #HorrynOuterRetakenChamberlain
translate: #霍里恩外围夺回室的长官

original: Markus is standing by the inn’s fireplace warming his frozen fingers when he sees you
translate: 马库斯正站在客栈的壁炉旁，用火烤着冻僵的手指，当他看到你时，他的脸亮了起来。

original: His face lights up
translate: 你好，{PLAYER}！

original: Hail {PLAYER}!
translate: 霍里恩的救星！

original: The savior of Horryn!
translate: 他的声音在问候一半时中断了，一阵咳嗽接踵而至。

original: His voice breaks half way through the greeting and a coughing fit overcomes him
translate: 我可能感冒了。

original: I think I’ve caught a cold
translate: 尽管考虑到我们所经历的一切，我认为自己应该感到幸运。

original: Though considering what we’ve been through I think I should count myself lucky
translate: 来，和我一起坐在火边，我们谈谈。

original: Come, join me by the fire while we talk
translate: 谢谢你的勇敢，我们已经夺回了霍里恩的大部，现在我们有了补给和庇护。

original: Thanks to your bravery, we’ve retaken most of Horryn and we now have access to supplies and shelter
translate: 难民们正从营地源源不断地返回。

original: The refugees have been streaming back in from the camp
translate: 他们迫切想知道亲人的命运或被遗弃的财产。

original: They’re desperate to learn the fate of loved ones or property that was left behind
translate: 这是可以理解的。

original: Understandably so
translate: 然而，如果不是因为我会面临哗变的话，我会让他们暂时留在营地。

original: He lets out a sigh and leans in
translate: 他们在这里比想象中要危险得多。

original: However, were it not for the fact that I would have a mutiny on my hands, I would have kept them in the camp for now
translate: 据我的士兵报告，内城的掠夺者似乎已被消灭或赶走。

original: Things are much more dangerous here in Horryn than they realize
translate: 然而，他们中被称为‘父亲’的家伙仍然占据着港口西南角的要塞。

original: As far as my men report, the Reavers in the inner city seem to have been slain or driven off
translate: 他带着剩余的同伙把自己困在里面，但这还不是最糟糕的。

original: However, the one they call… ‘Father’ still occupies the keep in the south-west corner of the harbor
translate: 报道说，有几十名平民被掠夺者活捉，并被带到了要塞。

original: He’s barricaded himself inside with the remainder of his pack and that’s not the worst of it
translate: 报道说，有几十名平民被掠夺者活捉，并被带到了要塞。

original: Reports are coming in that dozens of townsfolk were taken alive by the Reavers and taken to the keep
translate: 报道说，有几十名平民被掠夺者活捉，并被带到了要塞。

original: I dread even contemplating what they are going through if they are still alive
translate: 我甚至不敢想象如果他们还活着，他们正经历着什么

original: We must purge Horryn of this remaining ‘infestation’ and, if the Holy Tombs will it, rescue the captives
translate: 我们必须清除霍林城中剩余的‘寄生虫’，如果圣墓愿意的话，还要解救被俘虏的人质

original: A frontal assault is out of the question
translate: 正面攻击是不可能的

original: The keep is well defended when held by a determined enemy and I have not the man-power to attempt it
translate: 当敌人坚决防守时，堡垒的防御非常坚固，我没有足够的兵力尝试攻城

original: There is hope however
translate: 但是，还是有希望的

original: Hierophant Drahl, shared an ancient legend with me
translate: 神圣祭司德拉赫分享了一个古老的传说给我

original: When the current temple was constructed, a secret tunnel between it and the keep was reportedly build
translate: 当前的神殿建造时，据说在它和堡垒之间建有一条秘密地道

original: It served the purpose of allowing the governor in the keep to escape through the temple in case of a siege or, alternatively, it made it possible for the clergy to seek shelter inside the keep if need be
translate: 这条地道的用途是在围城时，允许堡垒中的总督通过神殿逃脱，或者在必要时，让神职人员寻求庇护进入堡垒

original: Ironically, the tunnel was constructed centuries ago and since Horryn has seen very little warfare, it’s never been used
translate: 事实上，这条地道是在几个世纪前建造的，而霍林城很少发生战争，因此它从未被使用过

original: In other words, it’s very existence is… less than ensured
translate: 换句话说，它的存在……可以说是岌岌可危

original: Markus offers a sheepish smile
translate: 马库斯露出尴尬的微笑

original: Nonetheless, at this time the secret tunnel is our best bet
translate: 不过，目前秘密地道是我们最好的选择

original: Hierophant Drahl is waiting for you outside the temple
translate: 神圣祭司德拉赫在神殿外等着你

original: Meet him there and he’ll fill you in
translate: 你去见他，他会给你详细说明

original: Also, among the refugees returning were Maija and our blacksmith
translate: 此外，返回的难民中包括梅亚和我们的铁匠

original: Both have opened their stores for you if you need to resupply
translate: 他们已经打开了店铺，如果你需要补给，可以去那里

original: And lastly {PLAYER}
translate: 最后 __PLACEHOLDER_0__

original: Please be careful
translate: 请小心

original: I fear dangers ahead, far exceed those behind you
translate: 我担心前方的危险远远超过你们身后的

original: May the Golden Dead lend you strength
translate: 金色亡者愿赐予你力量

original: Talk to Hierophant Drahl at the temple
translate: 到神殿找赫里福先知德拉赫谈谈

original: He'll tell you about the secret entrance!
translate: 他会告诉你关于秘密入口的消息！

original: #HorrynPilgrimLeaderScene
translate: #霍里恩朝圣者领袖场景

original: There isn’t much to do!
translate: 这里没什么可做的！

original: They say no ships are coming or going and in any case the region seems far too dangerous for us to venture into for now
translate: 据说没有船只来往，而且无论如何，这片地区对我们来说似乎太危险了，不适合我们现在冒险

original: It would seem we’re stuck here for now
translate: 看来我们现在只能待在这里了

original: That's a shame
translate: 真遗憾

original: A group of weather-beaten travelers, clad in ragged robes, occupy the innermost beds of the flophouse
translate: 一群饱经风霜的旅者，穿着破旧的长袍，占据了旅店最里面的床位

original: One of them smiles dejectedly at you
translate: 其中一人沮丧地对你微笑

original: Hello there brother
translate: 你好啊，兄弟

original: I’m Thomas
translate: 我是托马斯

original: I lead this little troupe on our pilgrimage to the Outer Isles
translate: 我带领这个小团体前往外岛朝圣

original: That is, until all this madness started
translate: 直到这一切疯狂的事情开始

original: Hello there sister
translate: 你好啊，姐妹

original: Pilgrimage?
translate: 朝圣？

original: How did you manage to survive the reavers?
translate: 你是怎么幸存下来对抗海盗的？

original: Driina shakes her head in disapproval
translate: 德里娜摇摇头表示不赞成

original: All I can say is that I promise it’s worth the toil
translate: 我只能说，我会保证这一切值得你付出努力

original: You’ll feel like a new man by the end
translate: 到最后你会觉得自己焕然一新

original: Then again, if you don’t have the heart for it there’s little I can say or do to change your mind
translate: 再说，如果你没有那份勇气，我也没什么能说或做的来改变你的想法

original: You’ll feel like a new woman by the end
translate: 到最后你会觉得自己焕然一新

original: Hmm
translate: 嗯

original: Indeed!
translate: 的确如此！

original: We came by boat from the mainland to see the five shrines of the Outer Isles
translate: 我们乘船从大陆而来，目的是拜谒外群岛的五座神殿

original: It’s a lesser known route and it takes you far from any inn
translate: 这是一条鲜为人知的路线，会让你远离任何客栈

original: That is perhaps why I feel it can be such a powerful experience
translate: 或许正因为如此，这次旅程才会如此强大

original: To complete the route requires true devotion
translate: 完成这条路线需要真正的虔诚

original: Not that it matters now
translate: 不过现在这已经不重要了

original: It seems my comrades and I are stuck in Horryn
translate: 看来我和我的同伴们被困在霍林了

original: What do you indend to do now?
translate: 你现在打算做什么？

original: Aha!
translate: 哈！

original: I think I've seen one of the pilgrim shrines!
translate: 我认为我看到了一座朝圣者的神殿！

original: Thomas suddenly looks you over for a moment
translate: 托马斯忽然打量了你一番

original: You have the look of a mercenary about you
translate: 你身上带着雇佣兵的气息

original: Perhaps you’d be interested in taking on the pilgrimage?
translate: 或许你会对这次朝圣感兴趣？

original: It would fortify both your mind and your body and it would help make the sites safe for the rest of us when we’re finally able to travel again
translate: 这不仅会强化你的身心，还能帮助我们在最终能够再次旅行时，确保这些圣地的安全

original: Hmm, perhaps
translate: 嗯，或许可以考虑一下

original: We have nothing to offer you as compensation but I swear that fulfilling the pilgrimage will be worth it
translate: 我们没有什么可以作为报酬给你，但我发誓，完成这次朝圣是值得的

original: That is, if you have the stamina to see it through
translate: 当然，前提是你要有足够的毅力坚持下去

original: Driina grabs your elbow softly
translate: 德里娜轻轻地握住了你的胳膊

original: I really think we should listen to the man
translate: 我真的认为我们应该听从那个人的建议

original: What exactly does it entail?
translate: 具体是什么内容？

original: As I said, there are five shrines scattered throughout the Outer Isles
translate: 正如我所说，在外岛散布着五座神殿

original: To complete the pilgrimage, you must visit each of them and spend no less than 8 hours at each site in deep meditation while you recite the Pilgrim’s Prayer
translate: 完成朝圣需要访问每一座神殿，在每个地点进行至少8小时的冥想，同时诵读朝圣祷告

original: Pilgrim’s Prayer?
translate: 朝圣祷告？

original: We’ll teach you the prayer before you go and note down the general directions to each of the shrines in your journal
translate: 我们会在你出发前教你祷告，并在你的日记中记录下前往每一座神殿的大致方向

original: You should consult it before setting out
translate: 出发前最好查阅一下

original: And don’t worry
translate: 别担心

original: You can complete the pilgrimage in any order!
translate: 你可以按照任何顺序完成朝圣！

original: This all sounds like a lot of work!
translate: 这听起来真是劳心劳力啊！

original: Thomas looks invigorated at the prospect of sending you off on the pilgrimage and smiles warmly at you whilst placing his hands on your shoulders
translate: 托马斯对即将开始朝圣感到精神焕发，他微笑着拍拍你的肩膀

original: Brother, there is nothing more for me to say
translate: 兄弟，我已经没有什么话要说的了

original: If the will to complete the pilgrimage lives within you, it will be so
translate: 如果你内心有完成朝圣的意志，它就会实现

original: Now, be on your way and best of luck!
translate: 现在，你去吧，祝你好运！

original: Driina bows respectfully to the weatherbeaten man
translate: 德里娜恭敬地向这位饱经风霜的男人行礼

original: Sister, there is nothing more for me to say
translate: 姐妹，我已经没有什么话要说的了

original: Thomas smiles warmly at you
translate: 托马斯微笑着看着你

original: You have the look of enlightenment upon you
translate: 你脸上带着觉悟的光芒

original: It gladdens my heart to see
translate: 这让我感到非常高兴

original: I pray that my comrades and I shall soon follow
translate: 我祈祷我的同伴们也很快能够跟随你

original: Thomas looks at you and squints slightly
translate: 托马斯看着你，微微眯起了眼睛

original: You’ve not completed the pilgrimage yet I see
translate: 我看你还没有完成朝圣之旅

original: I can always tell who has and who hasn’t
translate: 我总是能分辨出谁来过，谁没来过

original: Don’t give up!
translate: 别放弃！

original: You may have
translate: 你可能有

original: One of the shrines is right here on Idra!
translate: 其中一座神殿就在伊德拉这里！

original: Oh, I was really hoping to see them all again
translate: 哦，我真的很希望再见到它们

original: What’s more, I had hoped to be able to bring my companions there as well
translate: 更重要的是，我还希望能带我的同伴们一起去

original: Thomas sighs deeply
translate: 托马斯深深地叹了口气

original: So what do you plan to do now?
translate: 那你现在打算怎么办？

original: Thomas nods towards the proprietor
translate: 托马斯朝酒馆老板点了点头

original: We would all be dead were it not for the lady of the house
translate: 要不是那位宅邸的女士，我们全都死了

original: She hid us under the floorboards when the Reavers came and we were able to ride out the worst of it
translate: 她在海盗来临时把我们藏在地板下，我们得以熬过最糟糕的部分

original: And you said you're pilgrims?
translate: 你说你们是朝圣者？

original: # Chapter_3_HorrynCastle
translate: # 第三章 哈罗因城堡

original: #ChamberlainCastleTaken
translate: # 宰相城堡被攻陷

original: No news of our missing citizens?
translate: 没有我们失踪市民的消息？

original: I beg you make haste to Gradla
translate: 我恳求你尽快赶到格拉尔达

original: And if you’ve not already done so, stop by the armory before you go!
translate: 要不去武器库转转再出发？

original: #Chapter2HorrynCastleMainHall
translate: #第二章霍林城堡大厅

original: Ahead, three figures clad in tattered robes sit bound and kneeling
translate: 前方，有三名穿着破旧长袍的人被绑着跪在那里

original: One is sobbing loudly and the second sits trembling in a puddle of his own piss
translate: 其中一人正在大声哭泣，另一人则蜷缩在自己尿液形成的水洼中发抖

original: The third however, face covered by a hood, seems more composed - and familiar
translate: 然而，第三个人的面庞被斗篷遮住，看起来更加镇定——而且有些熟悉

original: Slowly, from the shadow something emerges
translate: 慢慢地，从阴影中something emerged

original: Twice the size of a man yet oddly graceful the being is utterly alien in every fashion
translate: 这个生物比人高大两倍，却出奇地优雅，无论从哪个角度看都显得异常陌生

original: You have no doubt you, at last, find yourself in the presence of ‘Father’
translate: 毫无疑问，你终于站在了‘父亲’面前

original: The Father-beast stalks over to the first captive, all the while breathing heavily and wheezing as if not accustomed to breathing air
translate: 父亲生物走向第一个俘虏，一边走一边喘息，好像不习惯呼吸空气

original: Slowly, its four-fingered hand reaches out towards the man’s head, grasping it as easily as a grown man would grasp an apple
translate: 它的四指手掌缓缓伸向那个人的头部，就像一个成年男子伸手去拿苹果一样轻易

original: It pulls the poor wretch close and for a moment, its horrible yellow eyes seem to peer into the man’s mind
translate: 它将可怜的俘虏拉近，片刻间，它那可怕的黄色眼睛似乎窥视着那个人的内心

original: The creature emits a strange trilling sound and then, with terrifying ease, crushes the man’s skull like an egg
translate: 这个生物发出一种奇怪的颤音，然后以令人恐惧的轻松，将那个人的头颅压碎如蛋壳

original: The creature moves down the line and the process repeats
translate: 这个生物沿着队伍继续前进，重复着这个过程

original: Once again, it gazes deeply into the eyes of the terrified prisoner almost as if it is looking for something
translate: 它再次凝视着惊恐的囚犯的眼睛，仿佛在寻找什么

original: Cry out
translate: 大声呼救

original: But once again the wretch is found wanting
translate: 但这一次，那个可怜的人还是失败了

original: Fragments of brain and skull, spray across the hall
translate: 大脑和头骨的碎片在大厅中四散飞溅

original: Your attempt to cry out sticks in your throat
translate: 你试图呼救，但声音卡在了喉咙里

original: 'Father' stalks down the line to the final victim
translate: 父亲生物走向最后一个受害者

original: The beast lets out a strange trilling sound as it fixes its gaze on the third person
translate: 这个生物发出一种奇怪的颤音，将目光锁定在第三个人身上

original: For the first time you notice that unlike the others, she’s not bound at the wrists
translate: 这是你第一次注意到，她与其他人的不同之处在于，她的手腕并没有被束缚。

original: With steady hands she pulls back her hood and even with all the years past you immediately recognize her
translate: 她的手稳稳地抬起兜帽，即使岁月流逝，你还是立刻认出了她。

original: Embla
translate: 伊姆布拉

original: As if sensing your presence, she turns her head slightly towards you
translate: 好像感应到了你的存在，她微微转头望向你。

original: Even in the dim light you get a feeling that she’s smiling
translate: 即使在昏暗的光线中，你也能感觉到她似乎在微笑。

original: Then the creature looms over her
translate: 然后，那个生物俯视着她。

original: The creature’s eyes go wide as it reaches towards her
translate: 那个生物的眼睛猛地放大，它伸出手向着她。

original: If it was searching for something, it must have found it!
translate: 如果它在寻找什么，那么它肯定找到了！

original: Roaring in triumph, it lunges but at the moment of impact the room instead explodes with white light
translate: 它得意地咆哮着扑了上去，但在接触的瞬间，整个房间却爆发出耀眼的白光。

original: The heavy metallic smell of ozone mixes with the stench of burned flesh as the creature staggers backwards clutching its eyes in pain!
translate: 金属般的臭氧味混杂着烧焦肉的气味，随着生物痛苦地后退，它紧紧捂住双眼。

original: Embla collapses on the floor as the surrounding cultists howl in shock and terror
translate: 伊姆布拉倒在地上，周围的邪教徒们惊恐地嚎叫着。

original: Most flee in wild panic whilst a handful instead scramble for weapons to stand in defense of their wounded master
translate: 大多数人惊慌失措地逃窜，而少数人则急忙抓起武器，为他们的受伤主人奋勇辩护。

original: The creature may have been temporarily blinded but flailing wildly in insane rage, it’s mad with rage and none the less formidable
translate: 尽管暂时失明，那生物却疯狂地挥舞着，怒火中烧，依然不可小觑。

original: #HorrynCastlePrisoners
translate: #霍里恩城堡囚犯

original: A hush falls over the crowd
translate: 一片寂静笼罩着人群。

original: I know her
translate: 我认识她。

original: says the woman
translate: 那女人说。

original: They took her in the last group
translate: 她是上次那批被抓走的。

original: She’s with ‘Father’ now
translate: 她现在和‘父亲’在一起了。

original: I need to go but let me try picking these locks first
translate: 我得走了，但先让我试着开这些锁。

original: Now!
translate: 现在！

original: Moans and soft sobs mix with the stench of unwashed bodies and rotting corpses
translate: 哀嚎和低弱的抽泣声混杂着未洗澡的身躯和腐烂尸体的恶臭

original: Packed densely in the castle's cells stand rows and rows of men and women
translate: 紧密地挤在城堡的地牢里，一行行男女站立着

original: No doubt those who were taken alive when Horryn fell
translate: 毫无疑问，霍林沦陷时被俘虏的人

original: At first they recoil in terror at the sight of you
translate: 刚开始他们见到你时惊恐地后退

original: Then, as they realize you’re not their cruel captors, madness overcomes them as they grasp desperately at you through the bars
translate: 然后，当他们意识到你不是他们的残酷囚禁者时，疯狂占据了他们，他们拼命地通过铁栅栏抓住你

original: Water!
translate: 水！

original: comes the cry from parched throats
translate: 口渴的喉咙喊道

original: Calm yourselves!
translate: 平静下来！

original: I'll try to help as best I can!
translate: 我会尽我所能帮助你们！

original: You find a bucket of water and a ladle and quickly distribute water as best you can to the desperate prisoners
translate: 你找到一个水桶和一个勺子，迅速尽可能地给那些绝望的囚犯分发水

original: A haggard woman who looks like she’s aged a decade in the last days grabs your hand and kisses it
translate: 一个憔悴的女人抓住你的手，吻了吻

original: The Golden Dead has sent you!
translate: 金色亡者派你来的！

original: We’ll be free soon - I can feel it in my bones!
translate: 我们很快就会自由了——我能从骨子里感觉到！

original: What's happening here?
translate: 这里发生了什么？

original: We were dragged from our homes!
translate: 我们被从家中拖走了！

original: When the Reavers went mad, they went from house to house
translate: 当掠夺者发疯时，他们一家家地搜查

original: Killing some and taking others
translate: 杀死一些人，带走另一些人

original: It was like they knew exactly who to take and who to kill
translate: 仿佛他们知道该带走谁，该杀死谁

original: It was insanity
translate: 那是疯狂

original: Pure insanity!
translate: 纯粹的疯狂！

original: I’ll never forget the screams and cries
translate: 我永远不会忘记那些尖叫声和哭喊声

original: Her hand begins to tremble
translate: 她的手开始颤抖

original: Another woman places her arms around her in a comforting gesture and continues
translate: 另一名女子用安慰的姿势搂住她，并继续说

original: They’ve been keeping us here for days with no food and little water
translate: 他们已经把我们关在这里好几天了，没有食物，几乎没有水

original: But in the last hours they’ve been coming and taking groups of three or four
translate: 但在最后几个小时里，他们开始来并带走三四个一组的人

original: Up to see ‘Father’
translate: 去见‘父亲’

original: Those who go… don’t come back
translate: 那些人去了……就再也没有回来

original: I'm looking for someone
translate: 我在找一个人

original: A woman named Embla
translate: 一个名叫艾姆拉的女子

original: To the dismay of the desperate prisoners you fail to pick the massive locks
translate: 令那些绝望的囚犯们失望的是，你们未能打开那些巨大的锁

original: These people must be left to their own devices for now
translate: 现在，这些人必须自己想办法了

original: Perhaps another way of freeing them can be found ahead?
translate: 或许前方能找到另一种释放他们的方法？

original: With great difficulty, you manage to pick the massive locks
translate: 经过极大的努力，你们终于打开了那些巨大的锁

original: Slowly the exhausted prisoners exit their cells and make their way towards the secret exit
translate: 累得精疲力尽的囚犯们慢慢地从牢房里出来，朝着秘密出口走去

original: Whatever comes next, you have at least done some good
translate: 无论接下来会发生什么，至少你们已经做了一些好事

original: #HorrynCastleQuartermaster
translate: #霍里恩要塞军需官

original: An aging guard is muttering annoyed to himself as he compares the stocks of the armory with the content of a list
translate: 一名年老的守卫在自言自语，不满地将军械库的库存与一份清单的内容进行对比

original: As you enter the armory he’s quite unable to hide his annoyance
translate: 你们一进入军械库，他便无法掩饰自己的不满

original: Yes, yes!
translate: 嗯，嗯！

original: The saviors of Horryn are to be given all possible aid - I know!
translate: 荒伦的救世主们将得到所有可能的援助——我知道！

original: Is there a problem here?
translate: 这里有问题吗？

original: Not for you
translate: 不是给你的

original: I’m the one left sorting out this mess of a supply situation
translate: 我是唯一一个在处理这混乱的补给问题的人

original: I’ve been ordered to assist you as best I can
translate: 我被命令尽可能地帮助你

original: Here’s the best I can
translate: 这是我能提供的最好帮助了

original: There should be some gear laying around that I haven’t gotten around to inventorying yet
translate: 我还有一些装备没有来得及清点，应该还有一些

original: Take it and use it as you please
translate: 拿去用吧

original: Secondly, I am to sell you supplies at a ’favorable’ rate
translate: 其次，我被命令以一个‘优惠’的价格向你出售补给

original: The quartermaster shudders at the very thought
translate: 仓库管理员一想到这事就打寒战

original: Let's see what you have then!
translate: 现在看看你有什么吧！

original: You need something?
translate: 你需要什么吗？

original: #HorrynCastleRetaken
translate: #荒伦城堡夺回

original: Markus smiles at you with an optimism that is utterly malplaced given the gravity of the situation
translate: 马库斯用一种完全不切实际的乐观态度对你微笑

original: Then it is decided!
translate: 那就这么决定了！

original: Aid is not long for the people of Horryn!
translate: 援助即将降临给荒伦的人民！

original: Before you go, be sure to visit the armory in the western part of the keep
translate: 在你离开之前，一定要去要塞西部的军械库看看

original: If there is any material aid we can offer, you shall have it!
translate: 如果我们能提供任何实质性的援助，你一定会得到！

original: May the Golden Dead keep their hand over you!
translate: 金色亡者保佑你！

original: Iago bow deeply
translate: 伊阿哥深深地鞠了一躬

original: M’lady
translate: 露女士

original: I, Iago zha Droma, shall answer your call for aid!
translate: 我，伊阿哥·扎·德拉马，将响应您的求助！

original: You could never ask for a better ship and crew to carry us all to our dooms than my ‘Weathermaiden’
translate: 没有比我的‘风暴女’号和船员更适合带我们所有人前往死地的船了

original: If indeed this is to be, there is much work to be done
translate: 如果这真是如此，那么还有很多工作要做

original: If you will allow it, I shall return to my crew and begin preparations
translate: 如果您允许的话，我将返回我的船员那里，开始准备

original: And where was that again?
translate: 那个地方又是哪里？

original: My crew is currently lying in hiding in a large cave north-west of here while the ‘Maiden’ undergoes repairs
translate: 我的船员目前正藏身于西北方向的一个大洞穴中，而‘女主人’号正在进行修复

original: In case you’ve not already been there, I shall note down the position in your journal
translate: 如果您还没有去过那里，我将在您的日志中记录下位置

original: Join us there when you are ready to set sail
translate: 准备好了就来那里与我们一同启航吧

original: Iago shakes you hand, nods to Embla and makes haste to rejoin his ship and crew
translate: 伊阿哥握了握你的手，向埃姆bla点了点头，急忙返回他的船和船员

original: We'll meet again soon!
translate: 我们很快再会！

original: Your head reels and your body aches
translate: 你的头眩晕，身体疼痛

original: For the first time in a long while you allow yourself to acknowledge how truly exhausted you are
translate: 长久以来，你第一次允许自己承认自己是多么的疲惫

original: Nonetheless, a cloud appears to have lifted ever so slightly with the death of the fell creature
translate: 然而，随着那邪恶生物的死亡，乌云似乎稍稍散去了一点

original: It is as if the feeling of wrongness that pervades the island is diminished - though certainly not gone
translate: 岛屿上弥漫的不祥感似乎有所减弱——尽管肯定还没有完全消失

original: Painfully you get to your feet
translate: 你痛苦地站了起来

original: There, in front of you lies the scion you were sent to find
translate: 那里，在你面前，就是你被派来找的继承人

original: Embla of House Berryn
translate: 埃姆bla，伯林家族的

original: Go to her
translate: 去找她

original: Markus stammers as he searches for words
translate: 马库斯结结巴巴地寻找着合适的词语

original: He gets up, calls for one of the guards, then changes his mind, turns around sharply and produces a piece of paper and a quill but ultimately fails to think of anything useful to do with it
translate: 他站起身，叫了一名守卫，然后又改变主意，猛地转身，拿出一张纸和一支羽毛笔，但最终还是没能想出有什么有用的事情可以做

original: Ultimately he turns back to you and Emlba with a mask of utter dejection on his face
translate: 最终，他带着一脸彻底的沮丧，转过身来面对你和艾姆巴

original: Gradla
translate: 格拉拉

original: Embla looks at the corpse of the Father for a moment then back at Markus
translate: 艾姆巴看了一会儿父亲的尸体，然后看向马库斯

original: Though there is much I do not know yet, I will say this much
translate: 虽然还有很多我不知道的事情，但我会说这些

original: Chaos engulfs the Outer Isles and the force that drives it is rising
translate: 外岛陷入了混乱之中，驱动这一切的力量正在上升

original: For whatever reason, Gradla lies at the center of this conjunction
translate: 不管出于什么原因，格拉拉正位于这场会合的中心

original: The Empire will not come for us and, though we cannot escape the outer isles, I believe a fast ship and a skilled captain could make it to the shores of Gradla
translate: 尽管我们无法逃离外岛，但我想一艘快速的船只和一位技艺高超的船长可以带我们到达格拉拉的海岸

original: If we can force a landing, we may have a chance at stopping the conjuncture before the Outer Isles are lost forever
translate: 如果我们能强行登陆，或许还有机会在外岛彻底失去之前阻止这场会合

original: Rescue the lost souls of Horryn and at the same time deal with this ‘conjuncture’!
translate: 营救霍里恩的亡魂，同时解决这个‘会合’问题！

original: Embla says nothing
translate: 艾姆巴没有说话

original: But if no help is coming from the mainland, we have no one to turn to but you {PLAYER}
translate: 但如果得不到来自大陆的帮助，我们只能依靠你了 __PLACEHOLDER_0__

original: Truly, we cannot ask this of you!
translate: 确实，我们不能要求你这样做！

original: I have neither men nor much equipment to offer!
translate: 我没有士兵也没有多少装备可以提供！

original: There is no doubt you speak the truth Embla
translate: 毫无疑问，你说的是实话，艾姆巴

original: I came here to bring you back to the mainland Embla - nothing more
translate: 我来这里是为了把你带回大陆，艾姆巴 —— 没有其他目的

original: You're insane
translate: 你疯了

original: Embla sits up slowly
translate: 艾姆巴慢慢地坐了起来

original: She’s pale and sick-looking
translate: 她脸色苍白，看起来病态极了

original: The raw expenditure of Reticular energy took its toll on her
translate: 蕴含拉基塔尔能量的直接消耗对她造成了很大的影响

original: I knew it was going to be you
translate: 我知道这次一定是你

original: It’s always you
translate: 你每次都这样

original: And I’m glad every time
translate: 每次见到你我都感到很高兴

original: What do you mean 'every time'?
translate: 你是什么意思“每次”？

original: We’ve been here before a thousand times and we’ll be here again and again until the universe itself ends
translate: 我们已经在这里出现了一千次，直到宇宙本身终结，我们还会一次又一次地出现

original: Slowly and unsteadily, Embla gets to her feet
translate: 慢慢地，埃姆拉站了起来，动作有些摇晃

original: For the first time she looks you in the eyes
translate: 她第一次直视着你的眼睛

original: A tired smile comes across her face
translate: 她的脸上浮现出疲惫的微笑

original: {PLAYER}, it really is good to see you
translate: {PLACEHOLDER_0}，见到你真好

original: Your father dispatched me
translate: 你父亲派我来的

original: You are here because you have to be
translate: 你在这里是因为你必须在这里

original: As am I
translate: 就像我一样

original: We always have and we always will
translate: 我不明白？

original: Here, on the ship… under the Priory
translate: 突然，她的脸上掠过一丝困惑

original: She looks at you intently
translate: 对不起

original: Almost pleadingly, as if willing you to recall a memory so old it all but faded
translate: 我……忘记了我们所在的地方

original: I don't understand?
translate: 我不明白？

original: Suddenly a look of confusion falls over her face
translate: 我不明白？

original: I’m sorry
translate: 我不明白？

original: I… forgot where we were
translate: 我不明白？

original: When we were
translate: 当我们

original: {PLAYER}, there is something so wrong here
translate: __PLACEHOLDER_0__，这里有什么地方不对劲

original: And much worse than you realize
translate: 而且比你想象的还要糟糕

original: That thing, the ‘Father’!
translate: 那东西，‘父亲’！

original: The people and animals changing!
translate: 人们和动物正在变化！

original: Even… even time is wrong
translate: 甚至……甚至时间都错了

original: I don’t fully understand it but something is causing it
translate: 我不太明白，但有些东西导致了这一切

original: Drawing it here
translate: 把它画下来

original: Drawing… us here
translate: 画……把我们画下来

original: This isn't making sense
translate: 这一切都不通

original: Embla draws a deep breath and closes her eyes
translate: 伊姆布拉深吸一口气，闭上了眼睛

original: For a moment she is quiet
translate: 有一刻她沉默了

original: Forgive me - I know
translate: 宽恕我——我知道

original: I’m only beginning to understand it myself
translate: 我只是开始理解它

original: For now, I’ll tell you what you
translate: 现在，我会告诉你你需要知道的

original: Suddenly the heavy tramp of armored feet echo throughout the keep as the beleaguered remnants of the Horryn city guard make their way to the main hall
translate: 突然，沉重的铁甲脚步声在整个要塞中回响，霍里恩城的残余守卫正前往大厅

original: Ineptly brandishing a sword, Markus is bringing up the rear
translate: 手无缚鸡之力地挥舞着一把剑，马库斯殿后

original: The former chamberlain and now de-facto leader of Horryn looks even more thin and drawn then when you first met him but nonetheless, there is a small glimpse of triumph in his eye
translate: 从前的财政大臣，现在实际上的霍里恩领导人看起来比你第一次见到他时还要瘦弱憔悴，但眼中却有一丝胜利的光芒

original: Markus!
translate: 马库斯！

original: You’ve done it!
translate: 你做到了！

original: We’ve
translate: 我们已经

original: He’s cut short as his gaze falls upon the grotesque corpse of the ‘Father’
translate: 他的目光落在‘父亲’那扭曲的尸体上，动作戛然而止

original: By Gallian the Great, protect us all!
translate: 伟大的加利安，保佑我们所有人！

original: How can such things exist?
translate: 这些东西怎么可能存在？

original: Where did it
translate: 它是从哪里来的？

original: He tires, and fails to fight back the nausea
translate: 他感到疲惫，无法抵抗恶心的感觉

original: While Markus retches in disgust, Embla meets your eyes
translate: 马库斯因厌恶而干呕，而埃姆bla则与他的目光相遇

original: It is clear that she has much to say but now is not the time or place
translate: 很明显，她有很多话要说，但现在不是时候也不是地点

original: Wordlessly you agree that both questions and answers will have to wait for now

original: Then I shall give the order!
translate: 然后我将下达命令！

original: My crew and I will maneuver the ‘maiden’ out and into open waters and await you there
translate: 我的船员和我将操纵‘少女号’驶出海洞，等待你们在那里

original: Board when you are ready and, though we may be sailing towards our doom we are certainly sailing towards great adventure
translate: 你们准备好就上船吧，虽然我们可能正驶向死亡，但至少我们正驶向伟大的冒险

original: The Weathermaiden is expertly guided out of the sea-cave and now lies at anchor awaiting your arrival
translate: ‘少女号’由一位技艺高超的船长引领，已经驶出海洞，并且现在正停泊在锚地，等待你们的到来

original: #SailingBehemothAttack
translate: #SailingBehemothAttack

original: You're ship is attacked by the Behemoth
translate: 你的船只被Behemoth袭击

original: You die
translate: 你死了

original: #ZharaIagoReturned
translate: #ZharaIagoReturned

original: A tall, muscular woman, beautiful but for a scar across the cheek, stands looking over papers whilst apparently counting under her breath
translate: 一位身材高大、肌肉发达的女子，虽然脸上有一道伤疤，但她看起来依然美丽，正在翻阅文件并似乎在低声数着什么

original: Her flamboyant outfit marks her not only as a southerner but likely also an officer
translate: 她华丽的装扮不仅表明她是南方人，还很可能是一名军官

original: So it's you we have to thank for our captain's return?
translate: 难道就是你让我们队长回来的？

original: Well, the Weathermaiden is in your gratitude
translate: 好吧，‘少女号’就交给你了

original: She grins revealing a golden tooth
translate: 她露出了笑容，露出了一颗金牙

original: I’m at your service - but if it’s all the same to you I have much to do
translate: 我随时为您服务，不过如果您不介意的话，我还有很多事情要做

original: #ZharaScene
translate: #Zhara场景

original: Be careful out there!
translate: 谨慎些！外面可不安全！

original: He is the finest sea-captain from here to the Sea-Gates
translate: 他是从这里到海门最出色的海船船长

original: If you’ve not heard of him it is because he prefers it so
translate: 你可能没听说过他，因为他喜欢这样

original: Such is the nature of our vocation
translate: 这就是我们职业的本性

original: Vocation?
translate: 职业？

original: As I said, our cargo is often less than legal
translate: 就像我说的，我们的货物往往不合法

original: There is trouble brewing in the Freymark and plenty of people looking to acquire goods outside the Imperial trade network
translate: 在弗雷姆克地区正酝酿着麻烦，很多人都在寻找帝国贸易网络之外的商品

original: We carry it and people like the Rat Queen sell it
translate: 我们运送这些货物，而像鼠后这样的人都在兜售它们

original: Ah - I see sell-swords have come to answer the maiden’s plea!
translate: 哦——我看到佣兵来回应少女的请求了！

original: Her smile however, does not quite reach her eyes
translate: 然而，她的微笑并未触及她的眼睛

original: We met your man Dono in the refugee camp
translate: 我们在难民营地遇到了你们的男子唐诺

original: I am Zhara
translate: 我是札拉

original: First mate of the illustrious Weathermaiden
translate: 无畏少女号的二副

original: She gestures grandly to the anchored ship
translate: 她挥动着手，指向停泊的船只

original: As she proceeds a shadow falls over her face
translate: 就在她继续说话时，她的脸上投下了一抹阴影

original: We were on our way to the mainland when we encountered… something ancient
translate: 我们正准备前往大陆，遇到了……一些古老的东西

original: We lost many a good man and the ship was gravely damaged
translate: 我们失去了许多好手，船只也严重受损

original: However, by the grace of the Blind and our captain's good fortune, we outran the beast and made it to the shallows
translate: 然而，靠上盲神的恩赐和船长的好运，我们摆脱了那怪物，抵达了浅水区

original: It did not pursue us there and we suspect it will not stray too far from deeper waters
translate: 它在那里没有追击我们，我们怀疑它不会远离深水区太远

original: Thankfully, we were close to the sea-cave and we’ve been holed up here since
translate: 谢天谢地，我们离海洞很近，一直躲在这里。

original: The Behemoth
translate: 眼魔

original: It sunk our ship as well as we attempted to land
translate: 我们的小船也被它沉了，我们在尝试登陆时。

original: Behemoth indeed
translate: 眼魔确实如此。

original: What a strange fate that we should both be survivors of something so deadly
translate: 真是奇怪的命运，我们俩都成了如此致命事物的幸存者。

original: In our case we made as good an escape as can be had against such a horror
translate: 在我们的情况下，我们尽可能地逃离了这场恐怖。

original: The ‘Maiden’ is fast but more so, our captain, Iago zha Droma, is the finest captain to sail these waters
translate: “玛琳”号速度很快，但更重要的是，我们的船长伊阿哥·扎·德拉马是这些水域中最出色的船长。

original: Be their sails black or white
translate: 无论他们的船帆是黑是白。

original: And where is your Captain now?
translate: 你的船长现在在哪里？

original: That is where I hope you might be of assistance
translate: 我希望你能帮助我们。

original: While we await repairs, our cargo is rotting in our holds
translate: 在等待修理的同时，我们的货物在船舱里腐烂。

original: The Captain decided to venture into Horryn and seek out the Rat Queen and her black market in a bid to offload what he could
translate: 船长决定冒险进入霍林城，寻找老鼠女王及其黑市，试图卸下他能卸下的货物。

original: I advised him against it as the ‘Queen’ is cruel and fickle
translate: 我劝他不要这么做，因为“女王”是残忍且善变的。

original: Black market?
translate: 黑市？

original: As you may have surmised, our operation is less than sanctioned by the Empire
translate: 如你所料，我们的运营并未得到帝国的正式许可。

original: We must ply our trade in the shadows and we deal with those we can, I suppose
translate: 我们必须在暗处行动，与我们能交易的人打交道。

original: In any case, you no doubt know as well as I what has befallen this island
translate: 无论如何，你和我都知道这座岛屿发生了什么。

original: Horryn is overrun by mad-men and I fear that the Captain was still inside its walls when the city fell
translate: 霍林城被疯子占领，我担心船长还在城内时城市沦陷了。

original: In any case we have not seen him for days and I fear the worst
translate: 无论如何，我们已经几天没有见到他了，我担心最坏的情况。

original: A slight hint of desperation creeps into her voice
translate: 她的声音中带着一丝绝望。

original: And now you want me to look for him?
translate: 而现在你却让我去寻找他？

original: If you can make it inside the walls, you would be doing a favor to the finest captain in the Outer Isles if you could venture to rescue him
translate: 如果你能进入城内，你将为外群岛最出色的船长效劳，如果你能冒险去救他的话

original: Surely that must be worth something?
translate: 当然，这肯定有价值吧？

original: I'll keep an eye out for him
translate: 我会留意他的

original: Zhara looks relieved
translate: 芝拉看起来松了口气

original: That is all I ask!
translate: 这就是我所要求的全部！

original: I would begin the search at the Rat Queen’s court
translate: 应该从老鼠女王的宫廷开始搜寻

original: I’ve never seen it myself but I hear it lies deep in the sewers under the city
translate: 虽然我自己从未见过，但我听说它位于城市下水道的深处

original: Just be careful and trust no one - least of all the Rat Queen
translate: 只是小心点，不要相信任何人——尤其是老鼠女王

original: Zhara spits in contempt
translate: 芝拉轻蔑地吐了一口唾沫

original: Where did you say I should look for Iago?
translate: 你说我应该去哪里找伊戈？

original: Tell me more about your Captain
translate: 你能告诉我更多关于你的船长的情况吗？

original: How long until you can take to sea again?
translate: 再过多久你们才能出海？

original: The ‘maiden’ took quite a beating and we’ll be here for quite some time yet
translate: ‘处女号’受了不少伤，我们还得在这里待一段时间

original: And in any case, we’re not leaving until we learn Iago’s fate
translate: 而且无论如何，我们不会离开，直到弄清楚伊戈的下落

original: That being said, monster or no monster, we’re not staying a moment more than we need on this accursed island
translate: 话虽如此，不管有没有怪物，我们都不会在这该死的岛上多待一秒

original: There is something… wrong here
translate: 这里有些……不对劲

original: I feel it in my bones
translate: 我感觉到了

original: Do you think you can outrun the creature again?
translate: 你认为你能再次逃脱那个怪物吗？

original: If there is one captain and one ship that could, it's Iago at the helm of the ‘Maiden’
translate: 如果有哪位船长和哪艘船能做到，那一定是伊戈驾驶‘处女号’

original: We may need to be cautious and stay close to shore but I’m willing to roll those dice
translate: 我们可能需要谨慎行事，靠近岸边，但我愿意掷骰子试试运气

original: The Blind has her hand over us
translate: 盲眼女士的手一直罩着我们

original: What news of Captain Iago?
translate: 关于伊阿哥船长的消息如何？

original: As I said, he made his way towards the black markets that lie under Horryn
translate: 就像我说的，他朝霍里恩下面的黑市走去

original: All I know is that they can be entered via the sewers that lie under the city
translate: 我只知道可以通过城市下面的下水道进入

original: Though the black market is no doubt a nest of vipers, I fear the biggest problem for now is finding a way into the city itself
translate: 虽然黑市无疑是毒蛇的巢穴，但我现在最担心的是找到进入城市的方法

original: Perhaps allying yourself with the survivors in the refugee camp is a wise course of action?
translate: 或许与难民营地的幸存者结盟是一个明智的选择？

original: # Chapter_4_AdlersHelm
translate: # 第4章 阿德勒斯海姆

original: #AdlersHelmBossScene
translate: #阿德勒斯海姆Boss场景

original: Thank you for all your help so far
translate: 谢谢你迄今为止的帮助

original: Be sure to talk to Doron and Arra before you go
translate: 在你离开之前，一定要和多伦和阿拉谈谈

original: I’m sure they’ll help you in any way they can
translate: 我相信他们会尽可能帮助你

original: It all began when we found the stairs leading up to the plateau in the mines
translate: 一切都始于我们在矿井中发现通往高原的阶梯

original: Stairs like you’ve never seen before; Cut right into the mountain itself and going straight up
translate: 你从未见过的阶梯；直接切进山体，直直向上

original: Stairs you say?
translate: 你说的是阶梯？

original: We climbed them and found they made it possible to reach the plateau above us
translate: 我们爬了上去，发现这些阶梯让我们能够到达上方的高原

original: If I were to guess, I’d say we were the first to set foot up there for hundreds, or even thousands of years!
translate: 如果我猜测的话，我估计我们可能是几百甚至几千年来第一个踏上那里的脚印！

original: And that’s saying something about the age of the stairs
translate: 这对于阶梯的年代来说，意义重大

original: What happened then?
translate: 然后发生了什么事？

original: I dispatched a small party up onto the plateau to look around a bit but we’re not really equipped for exploration
translate: 我派了一个小队上到高原上侦察一下，但我们并不适合探险

original: So we did what the company would expect
translate: 所以我们做了公司期望的事情

original: Send a report to the mainland and return to normal operations
translate: 报告大陆并恢复正常的运营

original: So you found something up on the plateau?
translate: 你在高原上发现了什么东西？

original: Aye we did
translate: 是的，我们发现了

original: The team reported seeing buildings up there in the ice
translate: 小队报告说在冰层上看到了建筑物

original: Old but Imperial from what they could tell
translate: 从他们看来是古老的帝国建筑

original: Which is strange because the company has as good maps as any of Gradla and nowhere are there records of Imperial structures
translate: 这很奇怪，因为公司有最好的地图，而格拉达任何地方都没有记录到帝国结构

original: Least of all up on that Magi-forsaken plateau!
translate: 更不用说那个被魔法诅咒的高原了！

original: And did the company respond to the reports?
translate: 公司对报告有什么反应？

original: That’s the strange part
translate: 这才是奇怪的地方

original: The response came almost immediately - Almost as if the company was expecting the find or something
translate: 反应几乎立刻就来了——就像公司预料到会发现什么一样

original: We were to make ready to receive an expedition that was to explore the plateau
translate: 我们需要准备好迎接一支要探索高原的考察队

original: Until then, we were told to keep quiet about the find and stay away from the plateau
translate: 在那之前，我们被告知要保密，远离高原

original: They even closed down mining operations!
translate: 甚至关闭了采矿作业！

original: I’ve never heard of anything remotely similar happening before
translate: 我从未听说过任何类似的事情

original: So what happened?
translate: 然后发生了什么？

original: Expedition arrived by ship in no time and set off the next day up onto the plateau
translate: 考察队很快乘船到达，并在第二天出发前往高原

original: That’s the last we saw of them
translate: 之后我们就再也没有见过他们

original: Whatever they found up there, I know in my bones it’s what caused the madness that’s been gripping Adler’s Helm
translate: 无论他们上面发现了什么，我直觉告诉我，那正是导致阿德勒霍姆被疯狂笼罩的原因。

original: Embla shoots you a knowing glance
translate: 伊姆布拉投给你一个了然于胸的眼神。

original: We need to get going
translate: 我们得赶紧出发。

original: You… you did it?
translate: 你……你做到了？

original: Your eyes, there’s something about them
translate: 你的眼睛，有些不同寻常。

original: I’d say you’ve seen things no man or woman should ever have to!
translate: 我敢说，你见识过男人和女人永远不该见到的恐怖之事！

original: I don’t want to know what you faced down there in the dark, but tell me this
translate: 我不想知道你在黑暗中面对了什么，但告诉我这些。

original: What of my crew?
translate: 我的船员怎么样？

original: Are they gone?
translate: 他们走了吗？

original: There's no one else coming out of those mines alive
translate: 没有人能活着从那些矿井中出来。

original: Lorn trembles and his eyes water up
translate: 洛恩颤抖着，眼中泛起了泪光。

original: The man has lived through horrors untold, hiding for days and days like an animal to stay alive
translate: 那个人经历了难以言说的恐怖，像动物一样躲藏了好几天，只为活下来。

original: You feel bad you weren’t at least able to bring him better news
translate: 你感到遗憾，至少没能给他带来更好的消息。

original: They were good men and women
translate: 他们都是好心人。

original: The Golden Dead will protect them now
translate: 金棺木会保护他们。

original: I want to know what happened here!
translate: 我想知道这里发生了什么！

original: Something about Plateau
translate: 有关高原的某些事。

original: More about Plateau
translate: 更多有关高原的信息。

original: Finally the last part about Plateau
translate: 最后关于高原的部分。

original: Something about Priory
translate: 有关修道院的某些事。

original: More about Priory
translate: 关于修道院的更多信息

original: Finally the last part about Priory
translate: 最后关于修道院的部分

original: Whatever you need
translate: 你需要什么就说什么

original: Tell me again what happened here?
translate: 再告诉我一次这里发生了什么？

original: Ask about Plateau
translate: 询问关于高原的情况

original: Ask about Priory
translate: 询问关于修道院的情况

original: #AdlersHelmMerchantScene
translate: #AdlersHelm商贩场景

original: I think it’s safe to say you’ve saved our lives
translate: 我想说你们救了我们的命

original: Or at least prolonged them!
translate: 至少延长了它们的寿命！

original: Say, would you be in need of supplies?
translate: 说起来，你们需要补给品吗？

original: I was pretty well stocked when things went bad and the least I can do is trade with you at a reasonable rate
translate: 我在事情变糟之前储备得相当充足，至少我能以合理的价格和你们交易

original: Sure!
translate: 当然！

original: Let's trade!
translate: 我们现在就交易吧！

original: Looking to trade?
translate: 想要交易吗？

original: #AdlersHelmPilotScene
translate: #AdlersHelm飞行员场景

original: I’ll be waiting for you right here whenever you’re ready!
translate: 你们准备好后，我会一直在这里等着你们！

original: You set out from Adler’s Helm by one of the surviving light boats and Doran expertly guides you through the narrow straits
translate: 你们乘坐一艘幸存的轻舟从Adler’s Helm出发，Doran熟练地引导你们穿过狭窄的海峡

original: In no time you find yourself back on the shores which you landed
translate: 不一会儿，你们发现自己又回到了登陆的海岸

original: With Doran joining the crew of the Weathermaiden it should now be possible to sail all the way directly to Adler’s Helm
translate: 随着Doran加入Weathermaiden的船员，现在应该可以直接航行到Adler’s Helm了

original: An exhausted-looking young man smiles and bows as you approach
translate: 一个看起来很疲惫的年轻人朝你们走来，微笑着鞠了一躬

original: Emperor’s bones, it will be good to get out of here
translate: 帝王的遗骨，这里待久了可不是个好主意

original: Say, did you come here by ship?
translate: 嗯，你是乘船来的吗？

original: Yes but we had to land on the southern shores
translate: 是的，但我们只能在南部海岸登陆

original: I see!
translate: 我明白了！

original: Well, Doran’s my name and the company hired me on as a pilot
translate: 我叫多兰，公司雇我担任船长

original: I sail with ships making the passing up the bay towards Adler’s to help them navigate the underwater rocks and reefs
translate: 我驾驶船只航行在海湾，帮助阿德勒的船只避开水下的岩石和珊瑚礁

original: Could you do that for us as well?
translate: 我们也能一起做吗？

original: That I could indeed!
translate: 当然可以！

original: We could travel together to where your ship is, then I’ll stay on and help your captain navigate to and from Adler’s all safe and sound
translate: 我们可以一起前往你的船所在的地方，然后我会留下帮助你的船长安全地航行到阿德勒

original: It’s the least I could do to thank you!
translate: 这是我能为你做的最少的事了！

original: I’m ready to go when you are
translate: 我随时准备出发

original: We’ll take one of the light boats and I’ll get us down to the southern shore and your ship in no time
translate: 我们可以乘坐一艘轻舟，我会尽快带我们到南部海岸和你的船旁

original: Not yet!
translate: 还不行！

original: I have some things to do first
translate: 我还有一些事情要处理

original: Doran looks at you expectantly
translate: 多兰期待地看着你

original: Being holed up like this isn’t for me!
translate: 待在这里可不是我的风格！

original: #GradlaMinesAmbush1
translate: #Gradla矿洞伏击1

original: You enter a larger chamber and are struck by the temperature of the air
translate: 你们进入了一个更大的房间，空气的温度让你感到震惊

original: It appears to be getting unnaturally warm the deeper you venture into the mines
translate: 越往矿洞深处走，空气似乎变得异常温暖

original: Suddenly, the shifting of stones captures your attention and you become aware of large eyes regarding you from the darkness
translate: 突然，石头的移动引起了你的注意，你意识到黑暗中有一双巨大的眼睛在注视着你

original: As you take an apprehensive step backwards, the horrors step into the dimness of the chamber
translate: 当你小心翼翼地向后退步时，那些恐怖生物则步入了房间昏暗的角落

original: The hulking horrors from the deep, move with deadly grace as they slowly fan out in an attempt to encircle you
translate: 来自深渊的庞大恐怖生物以致命的优雅移动，缓缓散开试图将你包围

original: Suddenly one of them lunges - Its arms outstretched and fingers splayed!
translate: 突然，其中一个生物扑了过来——它的双臂伸展开来，手指张开！

original: Are they trying to take you alive?
translate: 它们是在试图活捉你吗？

original: Charge!
translate: 冲上去！

original: #GradlaMinesAmbush2
translate: #Gradla矿洞伏击2

original: As you enter the room you walk into a wall of warm, damp air
translate: 当你走进房间时，迎面而来的是一股温暖潮湿的空气

original: The stifling atmosphere causes your clothing to stick to your body and your head goes light
translate: 窒息的气氛让你的衣服紧贴身体，头也开始晕眩

original: You try to push ahead but halt once again as stars flash before your eyes and a ringing rises in your ears
translate: 你试图继续前进，但又一次停下了脚步，眼前闪烁着星光，耳中响起了嗡嗡声

original: Embla squints into the darkness
translate: 伊姆拉眯着眼睛望向黑暗

original: We are getting close
translate: 我们快到了

original: A presence
translate: 有一种存在

original: Ancient
translate: 古老的

original: Powerful
translate: 强大的

original: Suddenly Embla cries out in pain as she sinks to her knees
translate: 突然，伊姆拉发出痛苦的叫声，跪倒在地

original: As you rush to aid her, a horrid clicking noise sounds from the darkness
translate: 当你冲上去帮助她时，黑暗中传来可怕的咔哒声

original: Embla, get up!
translate: 伊姆拉，快起来！

original: Hulking shapes emerge from the darkened tunnels around you
translate: 巨大的身影从你周围的黑暗隧道中浮现

original: One of them steps into the dim circle of light
translate: 其中一个生物踏入了昏暗的光圈

original: It regards you with huge, yellow eyes full of alien intellect
translate: 它用充满异界智慧的巨大黄色眼睛注视着你

original: To your horror, organs never meant for human speech croak forth words
translate: 令你惊恐的是，那些原本不适合人类发声的器官却发出嘶哑的话语

original: More vesselsss come to usssss!
translate: 更多的容器向我们涌来！

original: Sheee will be pleasssssed!
translate: 她会非常满意！

original: Die you foul beasts!
translate: 死掉，你这些可恶的生物！

original: #GradlaMinesMainChamber
translate: #Gradla矿井主厅

original: You take a step toward the massive creature and as she rears up and bellows, the utter futility of attempting to fight her dawns on you!
translate: 你向那庞大的生物迈出一步，只见她昂起头发出震耳的怒吼，你突然意识到试图与她战斗是徒劳的！

original: Flee
translate: 逃命

original: Your pathetic attempt at bravery comes to a sudden and terrible end as you are torn limb from limb by the ancient and terrible creature
translate: 你那可怜的勇敢尝试以一种突然而可怕的结局告终，你被那古老的可怕生物撕成了碎片

original: Your quest has ended
translate: 你的任务结束了

original: You spin on your heel and flee the breeding chamber as fast as you can
translate: 你转身飞快地逃离孵化室

original: It is too late however
translate: 然而，为时已晚

original: The Queen’s ire is up and with surprising grace and agility the ancient beast gives chase through the narrow tunnels of the mine
translate: 女王的怒火已燃，这古老的生物以惊人的优雅和敏捷穿过狭窄的矿道追击你

original: Make for the exit
translate: 向出口前进

original: Turn and charge at her instead
translate: 相反，转身冲向她

original: Run towards the trapped tunnel
translate: 向那个被封住的隧道跑去

original: Sprinting blindly through the winding tunnels, panic takes you
translate: 盲目地穿过蜿蜒的地道，恐惧笼罩着你

original: There is no way to outrun this creature and nowhere to hide
translate: 你无法逃避这只生物，也无处可藏

original: Relentlessly, the ancient Queen chases you down and tears you limb from limb
translate: 古老的女王毫不留情地追击你，将你撕成了碎片

original: Looming menacingly above you, the Queen positions herself between you and her cocooned ‘vessels’
translate: 女王威风凛凛地站在你面前，挡在你和她囚禁的“容器”之间

original: You can’t help but notice that beyond her, to the north, is another chamber where you can barely make out what appears to be a robed figure
translate: 你不禁注意到，在她身后，向北是一个隐约可见的房间，里面似乎有一个穿着长袍的身影

original: Attack the Queen
translate: 攻击女王

original: Carefully sneak away
translate: 谨慎地撤离

original: You emerge into a large natural cave
translate: 你出现在一个巨大的天然洞穴中

original: The atmosphere here is tropical and strange writhing growths cover the walls
translate: 这里的气氛热带而诡异，奇形怪状的植物覆盖着洞壁

original: Slowly, you make your way towards one of the nodules and become aware of a strange wheezing sound
translate: 慢慢地，你朝其中一个结节走去，并意识到一个奇怪的喘息声

original: Could it be… breathing?
translate: 难道是……呼吸？

original: As light falls on the first of the cocoons you realize, to your horror, that you’ve found the lost citizens of Horryn
translate: 当第一枚茧被光线照射时，你惊恐地发现，你找到了霍林失落的居民

original: You carefully lean in to examine one of the hapless victims but nearly cry out in alarm when the poor man opens his eyes
translate: 你小心翼翼地凑近一个不幸的受害者进行观察，但几乎惊叫起来，因为那可怜的人睁开了眼睛

original: He moans and looks around with confused swimming eyes
translate: 他呻吟着，眼神迷茫地四处张望

original: As he fixes on you, his mouth moves as if to speak
translate: 当他定睛看你时，嘴型似乎在说话

original: Slowly and painfully two words escape him
translate: 慢慢地，两个字从他口中艰难地吐出

original: Kill me
translate: 杀了我

original: At that very moment, the low growl of a massive creature reverberates through the tunnels
translate: 就在这一刻，一个巨大的生物低沉的咆哮声在隧道中回荡

original: She’s here
translate: 她来了

original: Embla whispers in a tone half reverence and half terror
translate: 埃姆拉的声音半是敬畏半是恐惧地低语

original: The ground shakes as the huge beast slowly moves towards you
translate: 地面在巨大的生物缓缓向你靠近时颤抖

original: What was first mercifully obscured by darkness now comes into view
translate: 最初被黑暗遮蔽的部分现在清晰可见

original: Standing more than twice as tall as the Deep-Ones you have battled before, this creature is enormous and no doubt lethal beyond compare
translate: 这个生物比你之前遇到的深海生物高出了两倍多，体型巨大，毫无疑问极其致命

original: Now revealed in all her glory, it becomes clear to you
translate: 在她完全展现其辉煌的身姿后，你明白了

original: She is a queen-mother and you are standing in her breeding chamber
translate: 她是女王，而你正站在她的繁殖室里

original: You reemerge into the horrid breeding-chamber, and once again the giant Queen emerges from the darkness
translate: 你重新出现在那可怖的繁殖室中，巨人女王再次从黑暗中现身

original: You hold your breath in terror as you carefully take a step backwards
translate: 你屏住呼吸，小心翼翼地向后退了一步

original: The beast-queen watches you intently but it seems you are in luck
translate: 那兽后女王盯着你，但似乎你有些幸运

original: The instinct to remain with her brood is stronger than the instinct to kill
translate: 保护她后代的本能比杀戮的本能更强

original: Realizing you can never outrun her, you have but one chance
translate: 你意识到永远无法逃脱，你只剩下一次机会

original: The trapped tunnel!
translate: 困住的隧道！

original: The creature is nearly at your heels as you round the last corner and spot the trigger-rope
translate: 当你转过最后一个拐角，看到触发绳索时，那生物几乎已经到了你的脚后跟

original: Your lungs are on fire from breathing the thick, dust-laden air and with a final spasm of effort you lunge for the rope
translate: 你从浓重的尘土中呼吸困难，最后用力一拉，向绳索扑去

original: Pull the rope!
translate: 拉那根绳索！

original: And catch it as you slide along the floor
translate: 然后在滑行中抓住它

original: The beam snaps like a twig and instantly gravity asserts its dominance over rock!
translate: 横梁像树枝一样断裂，瞬间，重力重新支配了岩石！

original: Countless tons crash down in an instant, utterly turning the body of the gargantuan abomination into so much gore
translate: 成吨的岩石瞬间倾泻而下，将那庞然大物的躯体化为一片血肉模糊

original: Falling rocks pummel you and then a huge billowing cloud of choking dust fills the remaining tunnel
translate: 岩石砸向你，然后是一片巨大的、令人窒息的尘土

original: Couching madly and stumbling about in the dark you nonetheless manage to get your bearings
translate: 你疯狂地蜷缩着，摸索着方向

original: Slowly, you make your way to the exit and into fresh air
translate: 慢慢地，你朝出口走去，来到新鲜的空气中

original: For now you must recover from the ordeal and wait for the dust to settle
translate: 现在你必须从这场劫难中恢复过来，等待尘埃落定

original: #GradlaMinesSpottedExit
translate: #格拉玛矿山出口

original: I’m not sure
translate: 我不确定

original: I suspect the Deep-Ones never made it to the plateau
translate: 我怀疑深海生物从未到达过那片台地

original: They are creatures of the sea and though they are dangerous enough on land, their reach is limited
translate: 他们是海洋生物，尽管在陆地上也够危险的，但他们的影响力是有限的

original: Perhaps that is why they were breeding with humans?
translate: 恐怕就是因为这个，他们才与人类交配？

original: To make hybrids?
translate: 为了培育混血儿？

original: What other dangers could be waiting for us then?
translate: 那么，还有哪些危险在等待着我们？

original: Embla’s voice drops to a whisper
translate: 伊姆拉的声音几乎变成了耳语

original: The seven eyes of the Dragon are fixed on the Priory
translate: 龙的七眼注视着修道院

original: I can feel it
translate: 我能感觉到

original: It writhes in the void, coveting that which lies below the Priory
translate: 它在虚空中扭曲，觊觎着修道院下方的东西

original: Its tendrils are grasping!
translate: 它的触须正在抓住！

original: Your head spins and for an instance you again imagine hearing the chanting of some long dead language in the darkness
translate: 你的头开始晕眩，一瞬间你又仿佛听到了某种早已消逝的语言的吟唱声在黑暗中回响

original: Let's not speak of such things here in the darkness
translate: 我们在这里的黑暗中不要谈论这些事情

original: Let’s move on
translate: 我们继续前进吧

original: The statues of two robed figures loom ominously over a doorway carved directly into the mountain with uncanny precision
translate: 两尊穿着长袍的雕像矗立在直接雕刻在山体中的门框上，显得异常阴森

original: Beyond, a narrow stair with oddly proportioned steps ascends steeply
translate: 门后，狭窄的阶梯上有着比例奇特的台阶，陡峭地向上延伸

original: The faintest of wisps of cool mountain air can be felt coming down through the shaft
translate: 通过管道，可以感觉到一丝微凉的山风从上面吹下来

original: These stairs are not part of the mines
translate: 这些阶梯并不是矿井的一部分

original: says Embla as she stares up at the statues in reverence
translate: 伊姆拉看着那些雕像，虔诚地说道

original: They were built by those who built the Priory
translate: 它们是由建造修道院的人建造的

original: So they lead up to the plateau?
translate: 那么，它们通向那片高原？

original: Yes, I believe they do
translate: 是的，我相信是的

original: Once we ascend, we’ll be within striking distance of the Priory
translate: 一旦我们攀上阶梯，就会接近修道院，距离已经很近了

original: For all we have faced so far, I suspect there is yet much danger ahead
translate: 尽管我们已经经历了这么多，我怀疑前方还有更多的危险在等待着我们

original: In other words, we must be well prepared before we set out
translate: 换句话说，我们必须在出发前做好充分的准备

original: Danger?
translate: 危险？

original: From the Deep-Ones?
translate: 来自深渊生物？

original: #GradlaTownEnter
translate: #Gradla镇入口

original: Something about DeepOnes
translate: 有关深渊生物的一些事情

original: More about DeepOnes
translate: 更多关于深渊生物的事情

original: Finally the last part about DeepOnes
translate: 最后关于深渊生物的部分

original: I need to be on my way
translate: 我得走了

original: We’ll stay here and for now you can bloody well find your own place to hide
translate: 我们会待在这里，现在你可以自己找个地方躲藏

original: Come back once it’s safe and we’ll see if we can’t scrounge up some supplies and a warm bed for you
translate: 等到安全了再回来，我们可以想办法给你弄些补给和温暖的床位

original: Also
translate: 另外

original: Be careful and don’t lead those bloody things here if things go bad!
translate: 要小心，如果情况恶化，可别把那些该死的东西引来！

original: World's gone mad!
translate: 整个世界都疯了！

original: All began with us finding those odd stairs leading up to the plateau with those strange ruins
translate: 一切始于我们发现那通往高原的奇怪阶梯和那些奇怪的遗迹

original: The Company sent an expedition here to investigate it and all
translate: 公司派遣了一支探险队来调查这一切

original: They set off up onto the plateau and then - nothing
translate: 他们出发前往高原，然后——没有消息

original: That is until the ‘events’ started!
translate: 直到‘事件’开始！

original: Events?
translate: 事件？

original: Started with my crew getting these strange dreams
translate: 从我的船员开始做这些奇怪的梦开始

original: Then we saw lights dance up over the plateau and heard strange sounds
translate: 然后我们看到光在 plateau 上跳跃，还听到了奇怪的声音

original: Howls almost
translate: 哀嚎几乎

original: Then came the ‘things’ from the sea
translate: 然后从海里来了那些‘东西’

original: The man’s voice shakes with terror
translate: 那人的声音因恐惧而颤抖

original: What 'things'?
translate: 什么‘东西’？

original: Things that should not be
translate: 不该存在的东西

original: Scaled things that walk like men
translate: 鳞片覆盖的东西，行走方式像人

original: They fell upon us in the night and we didn’t stand a chance
translate: 夜晚它们突然袭击我们，我们毫无招架之力

original: I’m not ashamed to say, the only reason I’m still alive is I hid like a frightened child
translate: 我不羞于承认，我之所以还活着，是因为像害怕的孩子一样躲了起来

original: Emperor’s bones I even pissed myself
translate: 帝王的骨头，我都尿裤子了

original: Strange thing is, it seems the monster tried to drag people away alive if they could
translate: 有趣的是，怪物似乎试图把能拖走的人活着带走

original: Dragged them right into the mines if you can believe it
translate: 真的把他们拖进了矿井，你简直难以置信

original: There were screams at first
translate: 最初有尖叫声

original: Such horrible screams
translate: 那种可怕的尖叫声

original: But they stopped soon enough
translate: 不久就停了下来

original: We almost thought they’d left and that we could make a run for it!
translate: 我们几乎以为他们离开了，我们可以趁机逃跑

original: Then the ships started arriving
translate: 然后船开始到达

original: Mad-men sailing all manners of vessels!
translate: 疯子们驾驶着各种各样的船只！

original: Was like they didn’t even try to land properly
translate: 好像他们根本没打算好好登陆

original: They just beached the ships or ran them onto the reef but that didn’t matter
translate: 只是把船搁浅或者撞上珊瑚礁，这都不重要

original: The sea-creatures emerged from the mine to claim the offerings the madmen had brought
translate: 海怪从矿井中涌出，要夺取那些狂人带来的祭品

original: Fresh captives
translate: 新的俘虏

original: What happened to the captives?
translate: 俘虏们发生了什么事？

original: The madmen chanted as the captives were dragged into the mine, same as my crew
translate: 狂人们在俘虏被拖进矿井时吟唱着咒语，就像我们船员一样

original: We heard them scream as well
translate: 我不敢想象矿井深处发生了什么

original: I shudder to think what’s going on down there in the darkness
translate: 你能否告诉我关于矿井的情况？
