original: What can you tell me about the mines?
translate: 当你进入采矿营地时，迎接你们的是惨状

original: As you enter the mining camp you are greeted by the sight of carnage
translate: 你们进入采矿营地时，首先看到的是满地的尸体和动物，唯一的生机是一只孤独的狗

original: Dead horses and animals litter the small plaza and the only visible sign of life is a lone dog
translate: 我们见过这种情况

original: We’ve seen this before
translate: 伊姆拉仔细环视四周

original: Embla looks around thoughtfully
translate: 你们进来时看到了那些被毁的船只，对吧？

original: You saw the wrecked ships as we came in, right?
translate: 至少其中一些来自霍里恩，这意味着至少有可能遇到海盗

original: At least some of them came from Horryn and that means there may at least be Reavers about
translate: 哟！

original: Pst!
translate: 喂！

original: Hey you!
translate: 附近建筑物里传来一个大声低语的声音

original: a voice whispers loudly from the nearby building
translate: 金光万岁！

original: By the Golden!
translate: 救援队来了！

original: Company’s mounted a rescue!
translate: 一个眼神狂乱的男子透过门缝中的缝隙盯着你们

original: A wild-eyed man is peering at you through a slit in the door
translate: 是哪支救援队？

original: What company?
translate: 是哪支救援队？

original: The… the Gildendelve Mining Charter!
translate: 炼金掘洞矿权契约！

original: Do you mean to say the company didn’t send you?!
translate: 你意思是说公司没派你来？！

original: Well, aren’t we all fucked then
translate: 那我们全都完了。

original: Big Lorn, they called me
translate: 大洛恩，他们叫我来的。

original: I’m the foreman here at the mines
translate: 我是这里的矿长。

original: Or, I used to be is more like it
translate: 或者，更准确地说，我是曾经的矿长。

original: Crew’s all dead or taken into the mines!
translate: 整个队伍都死了或者被带进了矿洞！

original: Me and a handful of others have been hiding here for days but all the rest are gone!
translate: 我和几个人藏在这里好几天了，但其他人全都走了！

original: And begging your pardon, we’re staying right where we are until help arrives!
translate: 而且，我们在这里待着，直到有人来救援！

original: What, you won't let me in?
translate: 你不会让我进去？

original: I shouldn’t even be talking to you!
translate: 我甚至不应该和你说话！

original: It’ll draw them here and they’ll drag us into the mines as well!
translate: 这会把他们引来，他们会把我们也拖进矿洞！

original: We’re not coming out until it’s safe and that’s that!
translate: 我们不会出来，直到安全为止，就这么定了！

original: The man begins to slide shut the hatch in the door
translate: 门开始关上。

original: I need more information!
translate: 我需要更多信息！

original: Ore mines
translate: 矿石矿洞

original: It’s an older mine that the Company reclaimed
translate: 这是个公司重新开发的老矿

original: We were expanding the western tunnels when we broke into an older part of the cave
translate: 我们正在扩展西部的矿道时，意外闯入了矿洞的更古老部分

original: That’s where we found the stairs
translate: 就在那里我们发现了阶梯

original: Stairs?
translate: 阶梯？

original: Listen, I don’t want to talk anymore about this right now
translate: 听我说，我现在不想再讨论这个问题了

original: We found the stairs, Company sent their expedition up onto the plateau and whatever they found, things went to shit!
translate: 我们找到了阶梯，公会派遣他们的探险队上到高原，他们发现的东西让情况变得一团糟！

original: Kill those things in the mine and I’ll be a lot more talkative
translate: 在矿井里杀死那些东西，我就会多说几句

original: I'd best get going then
translate: 那我最好出发了

original: Well, be quick about it!
translate: 好吧，快点！

original: They could be back any time!
translate: 他们随时都可能回来！

original: What's happened here?
translate: 发生了什么事？

original: Who are 'they'?
translate: 他们是谁？

original: The hatch in the door slides open and a pair of haggard eyes stare out apprehensively
translate: 门上的插销滑开了，一双疲惫的眼睛警觉地望出来

original: You’re still alive?
translate: 你还活着？

original: Is it safe to come out?
translate: 安全了吗？

original: Not yet but I need to talk!
translate: 还不安全，但我需要说话！

original: #MineExit
translate: #矿井出口

original: You stand at the foot of the stairs for a moment
translate: 你站在阶梯的底部，停顿了一下

original: It’s as if something is holding you back
translate: 仿佛有什么东西在阻碍你

original: If you take even the first step, events will be set in motion that can never be undone
translate: 如果你迈出第一步，事情就会被启动，再也无法改变

original: Then the strangest thought strikes you
translate: 然后一个奇怪的想法突然闪过

original: You’ve always been climbing these stairs and you will keep climbing them until the universe ends
translate: 你一直都在爬这些阶梯，直到宇宙终结，你都会继续爬

original: Take the first step
translate: 踏出第一步

original: The morbid thought is soon dispelled by the endless monotony of the climb
translate: 这个令人毛骨悚然的想法很快就被无尽单调的攀爬所驱散

original: The shaft goes straight forwards and up at a steep angle
translate: 通道笔直向上，角度非常陡峭

original: There is no bend or curve
translate: 没有弯曲或拐弯

original: Just the same infinitely ascending stairs perfectly carved through the heart of the mountain
translate: 只是同样的无限上升的阶梯，完美地雕刻在山心之中

original: For the longest time, the only change is the drop in temperature as you get higher
translate: 最长的一段时间里，唯一的变化就是温度逐渐下降

original: Then, finally you catch the first glimpse of natural light in a long time
translate: 然后，你终于看到了久违的自然光线

original: The exit is in sight!
translate: 出口就在眼前！

original: The exhilaration fills you with energy and rejuvenates your aching thighs
translate: 激动的情绪让你充满能量，重新振作起酸痛的大腿

original: With a final exertion, you make it to the top and emerge onto the barren plains of the interior plateau
translate: 最后一次努力，你终于到达顶端，走出到内部高原的荒芜平原

original: The Black Priory awaits you
translate: 黑色修道院在等待你

original: #MineFaultyBeam
translate: #矿井故障横梁

original: The support-beam appears to be close to giving in
translate: 支撑横梁似乎快要承受不住了

original: It seems that if this beam breaks, this whole section of tunnel will collapse
translate: 看起来如果这条横梁断裂，整个隧道这一段都会坍塌

original: If you have some rope, you might be able to take advantage of this to rig a trap of sorts
translate: 如果你有一些绳子，或许可以利用这一点设置某种陷阱

original: Use rope to rig trap
translate: 使用绳子设置陷阱

original: A makeshift trap
translate: 一个临时的陷阱

original: If you had a reason to do so, you could cause this section of tunnel to collapse - crushing anyone inside under tons of rock
translate: 如果你有理由这么做，可以导致这一段隧道坍塌，压垮里面的所有人

original: You carefully tie the rope around the beam in such a way that if you give it a good tug, the beam will cause the tunnel ahead to collapse
translate: 你仔细地将绳子绑在横梁上，这样如果用力拉，横梁就会导致前面的隧道坍塌

original: #MineSecretDoor
translate: #矿井秘密门

original: This section of wall appears to be close to collapsing
translate: 这一段墙似乎快要坍塌了

original: If you have a pick-axe you could likely break through to the other side
translate: 如果你有铁镐，很可能可以破墙而出，到达另一边

original: Use pick-axe!
translate: 使用铁镐！

original: You make short work of the wall and in no time it collapses to reveal that you have just linked up to the mine entrance
translate: 你很快就破开了墙壁，没过多久，墙壁崩塌，露出了通往矿井入口的通道

original: This will no doubt serve as a handy short-cut should you have the need to return to Adler’s Helm
translate: 这肯定能为你下次返回阿德勒之盔提供一个便捷的捷径

original: # Chapter_4_Embla
translate: # 第4章_埃姆拉

original: #EmblaExplains1
translate: #埃姆拉解释1

original: Heresy
translate: 异端

original: There are powerful men who would burn us alive at the very mention of it
translate: 有人只要一提到这个词，就会烧死我们

original: They have known about it for a long time, the courts of the Magi
translate: 长久以来，魔法法庭就知道这件事

original: It is the nightmare they want to close their eyes and pretend doesn’t exist
translate: 这是他们想闭上眼睛假装不存在的噩梦

original: Not here
translate: 不在这里讨论

original: We’ve already lingered for too long and I've said too much
translate: 我们已经停留得太久了，我也说太多了

original: We better move on for now and talk more once we leave Idra behind
translate: 我们最好暂时离开，等离开了伊德拉后再详细讨论

original: As mankind has ever ruled the land, there are far older and more sinister things that rule the depths of the ocean
translate: 自人类统治这片土地以来，深海中存在着更为古老和邪恶的事物

original: Ancient things with utterly alien minds
translate: 古老的生物，拥有完全异化的思维

original: The Deep-Ones are drawn here, like flies to carrion, and now they too have their terrible eyes fixed on Gradla
translate: 深海之子被吸引到这里，就像苍蝇被腐肉吸引，现在它们也把可怕的目光投向了格拉德拉

original: Is that why the Reavers were sending people to Gradla?
translate: 这就是掠夺者派人在格拉德拉的人吗？

original: The Reavers serve the gods that their ancestors worshiped here in the Outer Isles
translate: 掠夺者侍奉着他们的祖先在这里外岛崇拜的神祇

original: A faith that had lain dormant for millennia
translate: 一种已经沉睡了数千年之久的信仰

original: As the conjunction approached, they were reminded of old allegiances and old, terrible ways
translate: 当结合临近时，他们想起了旧日的盟约和那些可怕的过往

original: Conjunction?
translate: 结合？

original: What does that mean?
translate: 这是什么意思？

original: Embla smiles
translate: 艾姆拉微笑

original: I promise there will be time for more questions once we are safe
translate: 我保证等我们安全之后，再回答你们更多的问题

original: For now, I’m truly happy it’s you by my side here at the edge of madness
translate: 现在，我真的很高兴是你在我身边，身处疯狂的边缘

original: Now, let’s finish gathering supplies and then make our way to Iago
translate: 现在，让我们先收集完物资，然后前往伊阿哥

original: Time unfortunately, is working against us
translate: 不幸的是，时间正在与我们作对

original: Now, we must make haste in finding a ship and crew to bear us to Gradla
translate: 现在，我们必须尽快找到一艘船和船员，带我们去格拉尔达

original: And you ventured forth
translate: 而你毅然前行

original: Lord Cato offered me a substantial amount of money to rescue you
translate: 卡托大人给了我一大笔钱，让我来救你

original: That is all
translate: 就这些了

original: You know as well as I, my family has a debt of honor to yours
translate: 你们也知道，我们家族对你们有荣誉上的债务

original: I’ve known you since we were small children
translate: 我们从小就是朋友

original: How could I not come?
translate: 我怎么会不来？

original: I’m sure that if we make it back, my dear father will indeed drown you in gold
translate: 我相信，如果我们能平安归来，我亲爱的父亲一定会用金子把你淹死

original: For now, some answers will do!
translate: 现在，一些答案就够了！

original: Embla’s face becomes severe
translate: 艾姆拉的脸变得严肃

original: Your family is tied to mine but believe me when I say, it is not by duty
translate: 你们家族与我们家族有联系，但请相信我，这并非出于义务

original: There are forces at work here that I’m only beginning to understand
translate: 这里有我正在逐渐理解的力量在起作用

original: You have to give me something!
translate: 你得给我点东西！

original: I appreciate that old friend
translate: 我很感激那位老朋友

original: Nonetheless, I would say we are always going to end up standing here
translate: 不过，我们还是会站在这里

original: We have before and we will again
translate: 我们之前是，以后也会是

original: There you go again!
translate: 又来了！

original: What does that even mean?
translate: 这是什么意思？

original: I need some answers
translate: 我需要一些答案

original: Unceremoniously, Embla sets off at a brisk pace
translate: 无礼地，艾姆拉快步离开了

original: We should venture to be as well prepared as possible before leaving Idra
translate: 在离开伊德拉之前，我们应该尽可能做好准备

original: Any supplies we need, now is the time to get them
translate: 我们需要的补给，现在就是时候去获取了

original: A bizarre thought crosses your mind
translate: 一个奇怪的想法闪过你的脑海

original: It’s like she’s an actor playing out a scene she’s performed a hundred times before
translate: 她就像在演一个自己已经演过上百次的场景

original: We need to put all our effort into finding a captain that will take us off the island
translate: 我们必须全力以赴，找到一个愿意带我们离开岛屿的船长

original: Markus talked about the sea-cave on the island’s north-western coastline
translate: 马库斯提到了岛屿西北海岸的海洞

original: What, no 'thank-you'?
translate: 什么，没有“谢谢”？

original: Embla, stop!
translate: 艾姆拉，停下！

original: I'm not leaving until I get some answers
translate: 我不会离开，直到得到答案

original: And we have much to talk about
translate: 我们还有很多事情要讨论

original: Though I may have fewer answers than you would have preferred
translate: 虽然我给出的答案可能不如你期望的多

original: Worse yet, I fear what answers I do have, you will wish you had never gotten
translate: 更糟糕的是，我担心你得到的答案会让你后悔要问这些问题

original: Embla looks around
translate: 伊姆拉环顾四周

original: Her voice drops
translate: 她的声音压低了

original: Sadly, we are much less safe here in Horryn than Markus would like to believe
translate: 可悲的是，在霍里恩，我们比马克乌斯想象的要安全得多

original: I’ll answer what I can now but most things should wait until we are far away from here
translate: 我现在能回答的就这些，但大多数事情最好等到我们远离这里再说

original: Are you still afraid of the Reavers?
translate: 你还是害怕掠夺者吗？

original: Them least of all
translate: 更不用说你了

original: But there are other forces far older and more powerful than the Reavers with their eyes fixed on the Outer Isles
translate: 但还有其他力量，比掠夺者更古老、更强大，它们的目光正盯着外岛

original: Let’s just be careful
translate: 我们还是小心点

original: Embla turns around and blinks
translate: 伊姆拉转过身，眨了眨眼睛

original: For a moment it’s almost as if she’s seeing you for the first time
translate: 有一会儿，仿佛她第一次看到你

original: My mind is a bit scattered these days
translate: 这些天我的思绪有点乱

original: Your resourcefulness in finding me never ceases to amaze me
translate: 你找到我的机智令我惊讶不已

original: Then again it’s always been that way
translate: 而且一直都是这样

original: She offers a tired smile
translate: 她疲惫地笑了笑

original: Day-dreamer
translate: 白日梦者

original: Star-Child
translate: 星之子

original: I’ve no time for sentimental dribble!
translate: 我没时间听这些感伤的废话！

original: I want answers!
translate: 我要答案！

original: Lord Cato summoned me
translate: 卡托大人召见了我

original: Told me you were missing
translate: 告诉我说你失踪了

original: Without you I would be left in the darkness of the keep to suffer an infinite number of gruesome fates
translate: 没有你，我会被留在要塞的黑暗中，遭受无尽的恐怖命运

original: Over and over
translate: 一遍又一遍

original: You’re the only one who can find me and drag me back into the light
translate: 只有你能找到我，把我拉回光明之中

original: It has to be you - and for that I am glad… ‘Day-Dreamer’
translate: 这必须是你——为此我感到高兴……‘白日梦者’

original: I don’t understand! ‘Infinite’?
translate: 我不明白！‘无限’？

original: Reality itself is becoming undone around us
translate: 我们周围的现实本身正在崩解

original: We cannot escape it so instead we must seek the eye of the storm
translate: 我们无法逃避，所以必须寻找风暴之眼

original: There is something there that beckons
translate: 有些东西在召唤我们

original: Embla interrupts herself and looks around suspiciously
translate: 伊姆拉打断了自己，警惕地环视四周

original: And that 'Father' thing?
translate: 那个‘父亲’是什么意思？

original: Terror stalks the seas around Idra and I suspect you have seen it as well
translate: 恐怖笼罩着伊德拉周围的海域，我相信你也看到了

original: I believe a fast ship and a skilled captain can allow us to move around within the Outer Isles but there is no way for us to brave the high seas and reach the mainland
translate: 我认为一艘快速的船只和一位技艺高超的船长可以让我们在外岛游弋，但无法冒险穿越大海抵达大陆

original: What’s more
translate: 更重要的是

original: Embla looks towards the sky
translate: 伊姆拉抬头望向天空

original: Stars aren’t right
translate: 星辰都不对劲

original: Embla mumbles almost to herself
translate: 伊姆拉几乎自言自语地嘟囔着

original: I’m not even sure it would be possible to reach
translate: 我甚至不确定那是否可能

original: She shakes her head as if clearing out unwelcome thoughts
translate: 她摇摇头，仿佛在驱散不愉快的想法

original: The point is moot
translate: 这一点已经无关紧要

original: We must reach Gradla or perish trying
translate: 我们必须到达格拉达，否则只能葬身于此

original: What is happening here?
translate: 这里发生了什么？

original: I don't understand it!
translate: 我不明白！

original: Then let's get going
translate: 那我们就出发吧

original: So, ask what you will but mind your surroundings
translate: 所以，你问吧，但要注意四周的情况

original: What’s really going on here Embla?
translate: 伊姆拉，这里到底发生了什么？

original: We should just find a ship and make for the mainland!
translate: 我们最好找艘船，直接驶向大陆！

original: Let's just get going
translate: 我们就出发吧

original: You remembered
translate: 你记得了

original: Then again, this is like those times back at my father’s villa
translate: 再说，这就像在我父亲的别墅里那些时候一样

original: You chasing me through the maze
translate: 你追着我穿过迷宫

original: Her face darkens
translate: 她的脸色变得阴沉

original: At least then, we always knew what lay at the center
translate: 至少在那时，我们总能知道中心到底是什么

original: I have so many questions
translate: 我有太多问题

original: #IdraOpenWaters
translate: #IdraOpenWaters

original: The rise of the Cabal is the surest sign that the power of the Magi-Emperors is waning
translate: 卡巴尔的崛起是最明确的迹象，表明魔法皇帝的权力正在衰落

original: Even a decade ago, such consolidation of power into lay-hands would be unthinkable
translate: 即使十年前，这样的权力集中到世俗手中也是不可想象的

original: The Cabal is shrouded in secrecy and will go to any lengths to keep it that way
translate: 卡巴尔笼罩在秘密之中，他们会不惜一切代价保持这种状态

original: What few rumors I have heard claim that certain lay-nobles and freelenders are prominent amongst their ranks
translate: 我听说的少数谣言声称，某些世俗贵族和平民领主在他们中占据重要地位

original: Men and women of great wealth and even greater ambition
translate: 富有且野心勃勃的男女

original: I cannot tell you what their ultimate design is, but these people are no amatuers to power
translate: 我无法告诉你他们的最终计划是什么，但这些人对权力绝不是门外汉

original: They no doubt realize what lies beneath the Priory and the impact its recovery will have on the course of the Empire
translate: 他们肯定意识到了修道院下面隐藏的秘密，以及其恢复将对帝国的未来产生怎样的影响

original: I also believe that if they were to achieve their end-goal, it would spell disaster for us all
translate: 我也相信，如果他们达到了目的，那将对我们所有人都造成灾难性的后果

original: Enough for today
translate: 今天就说到这里吧

original: We'll talk again later
translate: 我们以后再谈

original: Embla sighs and picks her nails thoughtfully
translate: 埃姆拉叹了口气，仔细地修剪着指甲

original: The corpse buried underneath the Priory, it… it calls out to me
translate: 修道院下面埋着的尸体……它……在召唤我

original: I cannot tell you exactly when it began but the beckoning intensified greatly once the tomb seals were broken
translate: 我不能确切地说出它何时开始的，但是一旦墓室的封印被打破，召唤变得异常强烈

original: Now it’s almost unbearable and… it’s growing stronger by the day
translate: 现在几乎无法忍受，而且……它在一天天变得更强

original: But why you?
translate: 为什么是我？

original: There are things I’m not ready to talk about
translate: 有些事情我还来不及和你讨论

original: Things from my past - from when we were young together
translate: 一些关于我们年轻时的事情——那些被时间尘封的记忆

original: What I will say is that I sense certain things
translate: 我要说的是，我感觉到某些东西

original: Things that are hidden to most other people
translate: 这些东西对大多数人来说都是隐藏的

original: Some Magi see them too but I think that, unlike them, I was born with the ability
translate: 有些法师也能看到这些，但我认为，与他们不同，我天生就具备这种能力

original: I believe this is why the corpse calls out to me
translate: 我相信这就是尸体召唤我的原因

original: I'm not sure I understand
translate: 我也不确定我是否理解

original: To be honest, I’m not sure I understand it myself
translate: 实话说，我自己也不完全理解

original: What I do know is that the calling I feel is real
translate: 我知道的是，我感受到的召唤是真实的

original: Reaching the Priory before the region succumbs to the conjunction is critical
translate: 在地区陷入天象之前到达修道院至关重要

original: In fact, I fear the survival of the entire Empire hangs on it
translate: 事实上，我担心整个帝国的命运都取决于此

original: I know this and so did the Cabal
translate: 我知道这一点，邪教徒也知道

original: Tell me more about the Cabal!
translate: 告诉我更多关于邪教徒的事情！

original: When powerful magi pass, their corpses retain much of their reticular attunement
translate: 当强大的法师经过时，他们的尸体保留了大部分的网状共鸣

original: Emperors are amongst the most powerful of all magi and needless to say, their corpses are a source of great power
translate: 皇帝是所有法师中最强大的，不用说，他们的尸体是巨大的力量源泉

original: It’s not without reason the Imperial Corpses of the Eternity Vale are guarded for so jealously by the Sepulchites
translate: 因此，永恒谷的帝国尸体被塞普丘特斯如此严密地守护，绝非偶然

original: But an Emperor?
translate: 但是一位皇帝？

original: Buried on Gradla?
translate: 埋葬在格拉达？

original: It sounds incredible, but as I said before, there are corpses from the earlier dynasties that have been lost to history
translate: 听起来难以置信，但正如我之前所说，历史上确实有来自早期王朝的遗体失踪了

original: There were Emperors that were proscribed by the Magi
translate: 有一些被法师禁止的皇帝

original: It may indeed be the corpse of one of these ‘forgotten’ Emperors that has been found on Gradla
translate: 这可能是被发现的这些‘被遗忘’皇帝之一的遗体

original: But there’s more
translate: 但还有更多

original: I'm almost afraid to ask
translate: 我几乎不敢问

original: Latter day Emperors are but a shadow of the rulers of old in terms of power
translate: 晚期的皇帝在权力上只是昔日统治者的影子

original: If this is truly an Emperor of the Primarian Dynasty, and it has lain undisturbed for all these millennia, the power contained within it will be immense
translate: 如果这真的是原生王朝的皇帝，而且它已经沉睡了数千年，其中蕴含的力量将是巨大的

original: Enough to remake the Empire itself - or topple it utterly
translate: 足以重塑帝国本身——或者彻底推翻它

original: Powerful enough to rend reality itself?
translate: 足以撕裂现实本身？

original: So it seems
translate: 看来如此

original: My belief is that the conjuncture is caused directly by the discovery of the holy corpse
translate: 我认为这种结界是由圣洁遗体的发现直接引起的

original: Its raw power has drawn the attention of ‘that which lingers in darkness’ and now its tentacles are slowly closing in around us
translate: 它的原始力量吸引了‘黑暗中徘徊者’的注意，现在它的触手正缓缓向我们逼近

original: For a moment you think you hear crude chanting in the darkness
translate: 你几乎能听到黑暗中粗犷的咒语

original: It must have been the wind
translate: 这一定是风

original: How do you fit into all of this?
translate: 你在这其中扮演什么角色？

original: Embla leans back and massages her temples
translate: 伊姆布拉向后靠，按摩着太阳穴

original: I’m here for you when you need to talk but I agree
translate: 我在这里等你说话，但我同意

original: Let’s say it’s enough for today
translate: 今天就到这里吧

original: She stands up slowly
translate: 她慢慢地站了起来

original: I’m going to go lie down
translate: 我要去躺下

original: Ship-travel does not agree with me
translate: 船行让我感到不适

original: The ship is alive with nervous energy as the crew scuttles back like pieces of some well-crafted machinery
translate: 船上弥漫着紧张的能量，船员们像一些精密机械的零件一样匆忙地来回奔走

original: Though your journey is bound to be fraught with danger, there is little doubt that being back at sea has done the crew well
translate: 虽然你的旅程注定充满危险，但毫无疑问，重返大海对船员们大有裨益

original: Not for the monastery itself
translate: 不是为了那座修道院本身

original: But what was said to lie underneath it
translate: 但关于它下面隐藏的东西

original: Embla grasps your wrist and leans in while her voice drops ever so slightly
translate: 伊姆布拉抓住你的手腕，凑近你耳边，声音微微压低

original: The monks built the Priory to guard something
translate: 修道士们建造修道院是为了守护某样东西

original: A grave
translate: 一座坟墓

original: An ancient tomb from the earliest days of the Empire
translate: 一座远古的陵墓，来自帝国最古老的年代

original: And if the Priory’s existence was truly lost to history, it means that at some point, the very Empire itself must have aided in the conspiracy of silence
translate: 如果修道院的存在真的被历史遗忘，这意味着在某个时刻，帝国本身必定参与了沉默的阴谋

original: But who could be buried there to warrant such extreme measures?
translate: 但谁埋在那里，值得采取如此极端的措施？

original: I cannot tell you exactly how I know this, but I have not a single shred of doubt
translate: 我不能确切告诉你我是怎么知道的，但我一点怀疑都没有

original: What lies buried under that priory is the corpse of a Magos-Emperor
translate: 那座修道院下面埋葬的，是一位魔导皇帝的尸体

original: Not only that, but it must be one of the first and oldest of the line
translate: 不仅如此，它还必须是这条血脉中最早和最古老的成员之一

original: That can't be!
translate: 不可能！

original: It can and it is!
translate: 可以，而且就是这样！

original: Not all of the corpses of the first Emperors can be accounted for and interment in the Eternity Vale did not begin until centuries after Gallian’s Ascension
translate: 并非所有第一位皇帝的遗体都能被解释和安葬在永恒谷，而永恒谷的安葬仪式直到加利安升天数个世纪之后才开始

original: The Cabal knew it to be true and as do I
translate: 神秘会和我知道这是真的

original: Their expedition arrived at the island of Gradla a few months ago
translate: 他们的探险队几个月前抵达了格拉德拉岛

original: I suspect they breached the tombs underneath the temple a few weeks later
translate: 我怀疑他们在几周后突破了神殿下的陵墓

original: Whatever they found there, its reticular reverberations were powerful enough to throw all of the Outer Isles into madness
translate: 无论他们在那里发现了什么，其网状回响足以将外群岛推向疯狂

original: And now we're sailing into the heart of madness?
translate: 而我们现在正驶向疯狂的中心？

original: Embla smiles weakly
translate: 埃姆拉勉强笑了笑

original: He’s calling out to me
translate: 他在呼唤我

original: I feel it in every ounce of my being
translate: 我感觉得到，每一寸身体都在回应

original: Unfortunately, I’m not the only one to hear the call
translate: 不幸的是，不止我一个人听到了召唤

original: Like sharks drawn to blood in the water, ‘other’ things are drawn to it as well
translate: 就像鲨鱼被水中的血腥吸引，其他东西也被吸引过来

original: Things from outside
translate: 来自外界的东西

original: Embla swallows hard and her voice drops to a whisper
translate: 埃姆拉咽了咽口水，声音低了下来

original: The Dragon
translate: 龙

original: It’s awakening and its seven eyes are fixed on the Outer Isle
translate: 它正在苏醒，它的七眼正盯着外群岛

original: On the Black Priory!
translate: 黑色修道院！

original: The nearby lanterns flicker
translate: 附近的灯笼闪烁起来

original: Crawling tendrils of madness stretch greedily towards the Priory
translate: 狂乱的藤蔓贪婪地向着修道院蔓延

original: It hungers for the holy corpse and if it reaches it
translate: 它渴望着圣洁的遗体，如果它能够触及

original: Embla halts, and for a moment struggles to control her breathing
translate: 埃姆拉停下了脚步，努力控制着自己的呼吸

original: You know I’m right
translate: 你知道我说的是对的

original: You can feel it in your guts
translate: 你心里清楚

original: There is no other path out of the Outer Isles except that which leads to the Black Priory and the secrets it holds
translate: 除了通往黑修道院及其所藏秘密的道路，外群岛没有其他出路

original: Embla slumps and sighs
translate: 埃姆拉瘫软下来，叹了口气

original: She looks exhausted and for a moment you see her as the quiet and aloof youngling you once knew
translate: 她看起来筋疲力尽，有一瞬间你仿佛看到了曾经那个安静而孤僻的年轻学徒

original: True to his idiom, Iago swings in on a rope in dramatic fashion, landing elegantly next to you
translate: 确如他所说，伊阿戈以戏剧性的动作从绳索上荡来，优雅地落在你身边

original: It is good to feel the wind on our faces, no?
translate: 感受着海风拂面，感觉如何？

original: We are about to leave the fjord and from there we may set our course north towards Gradla
translate: 我们即将离开峡湾，从那里我们可以向北航行，前往格拉尔达

original: Iago scans the horizon ahead
translate: 伊阿戈扫描着前方的地平线

original: The leviathan no doubt stalks us so we must be careful from now on
translate: 那头 Leviathan 肯定在跟踪我们，所以我们必须从现在起加倍小心

original: We must keep to coastal waters and pray to the Maidens that our speed will keep us safe
translate: 我们必须沿岸航行，并祈求少女们保佑我们的速度能够确保安全

original: Nonetheless, we must take every precaution
translate: 不过，我们必须做好一切防范

original: For now, I have posted double look-outs and I’ll be manning the helm myself
translate: 现在，我已经安排了双倍的瞭望哨，并且我自己也会亲自掌舵

original: I trust we are in the best of hands
translate: 我相信我们正处在最好的保护之下

original: Indeed you are
translate: 的确如此

original: {PLAYER}, come see me in my quarters below later if you wish to talk further
translate: {PLACEHOLDER_0}，如果你愿意进一步交谈，稍后可以到我下面的住处来找我

original: Iago bows and leaves
translate: 伊阿戈行了一礼，然后离开了

original: It is out there
translate: 它就在外面

original: I feel it
translate: 我感觉到它了

original: You turn to see Embla standing behind you
translate: 你转身看到艾姆拉站在你身后

original: The leviathan
translate: 海怪

original: It hungers
translate: 它在觅食

original: I suspect the Deep Ones called it here
translate: 我怀疑深海人把它召唤到这里

original: Though, who is the master and who is the servant I cannot tell
translate: 虽然我不清楚谁是主人，谁是仆人

original: It is certainly older than them
translate: 它肯定比他们古老得多

original: You owe me answers, Embla
translate: 艾姆拉欠我一个解释

original: Idra is behind us and I need to know why we’re risking our lives on this fool's errand
translate: 伊德拉就在我们身后，我需要知道我们为什么要冒生命危险去做这场愚蠢的任务

original: I do and now is as good a time as any
translate: 我有，现在就是最好的时机

original: Embla takes you below deck and you find a small corner in the hold that is as close to privacy as can be found on the cramped vessel
translate: 艾姆拉带你到船舱下面，你们找到了货舱里一个还算私密的小角落

original: She takes a deep breath, as if she is about to plunge into freezing water, and begins talking
translate: 她深吸一口气，仿佛要跳入冰冷的水中，然后开始说话

original: Two years ago I was, let’s say, put on the trail of a rumor that an expedition had been mounted to the Outer Isles
translate: 两年前，我被一条谣言所吸引，据说有一支远征队前往外岛

original: More accurately, to an island north of Idra by the name of Gradla
translate: 更准确地说，是前往伊德拉北边名为格拉尔达的一座岛屿

original: It’s a cold and barren place but it is allegedly the location of an ancient monastery referred to as “the Black Priory
translate: 那是一个寒冷荒凉的地方，但据说那里有一个名为“黑修道院”的古老修道院

original: The Black Priory?
translate: 黑修道院？

original: Though you’ve never heard the name before, it echoes in your mind as if stirring old memories
translate: 虽然你从未听说过这个名字，但它在你脑海中回响，仿佛唤醒了旧日的记忆

original: The site was built a full age into the past and for millennia it stayed unnoticed and far removed from the affairs of the empire
translate: 那个地方建于遥远的过去，数千年里一直未被注意，远离帝国的纷争

original: So much so, in fact, that it virtually passed out of the historical record centuries ago
translate: 事实上，它甚至在几个世纪前几乎从历史记录中消失了

original: No small feat in an Empire built on the backs of its archivists and record keepers
translate: 在一个建立在档案管理员和记录保存者背上的帝国，这并非难事

original: And thus it would have remained if it wasn’t for the boundless ambition of a group of powerful men known as the Cabal
translate: 如果不是因为一个名为“密谋者”的强大团体无尽的野心，它本会如此

original: I don’t know who it was that whispered in their ear but something convinced them that the Black Priory was not forgotten
translate: 我不知道是谁在他们耳边低语，但有件事让他们相信，黑修道院并未被遗忘

original: It was willfully expunged
translate: 它是故意被抹去的

original: Ask!
translate: 询问！

original: Now is the time
translate: 现在正是时候

original: What if it's the corpse of an Emperor?
translate: 如果是帝国皇帝的尸体呢？

original: What more can you tell me of the Cabal?
translate: 你还能告诉我更多关于密谋者的事情吗？

original: Do you know anything else about the Black Priory?
translate: 你知道黑修道院的其他事情吗？

original: Do we stand a chance at rescuing the people who were taken from Horryn?
translate: 我们有没有可能解救从霍林被带走的人们？

original: I suspect they are already dead… or worse
translate: 我怀疑他们已经死了……或者更糟

original: You lied to Markus?
translate: 你欺骗了马库斯？

original: Would you rather I was as blunt to him as I am to you?
translate: 你宁愿我像对你说的一样直接对他吗？

original: Better they have a sliver of hope
translate: 比起绝望，他们更需要一丝希望

original: There are still trials ahead for Markus and the Horrynites and it would do them no good to face it with a broken heart
translate: 对马库斯和霍林人来说，前方仍然有许多考验，让他们带着破碎的心去面对这些考验毫无意义

original: # Chapter_4_Firgol
translate: # 第四章 富戈尔

original: #FirgolBarkeepScene
translate: # 富戈尔酒馆场景

original: He rubs his hands together in glee!
translate: 他双手搓动，显得非常高兴！

original: Oh yes!
translate: 哦，是的！

original: It’s an old tradition that goes back as far as anyone can remember where the Baron of Firgol invites all us common folk up to the manor to feast
translate: 在费戈尔男爵的领地上，有一个可以追溯到人们能记住的最远年代的传统，他邀请所有普通百姓去那里共进盛宴。

original: If you go up there and ask around a bit I’m sure you could come too!
translate: 如果你去那里打听一下，我相信你也能够参加！

original: If you offer to lend a hand that is
translate: 如果你愿意帮忙的话。

original: Manor lies north-west of the village - just across the river
translate: 领地位于村庄西北方向，就在河的另一边。

original: And you said something about cider?
translate: 你说的是关于苹果酒？

original: Ari, the brewer, makes the best cider this side of the Sea-Gates!
translate: 亚里，酿酒师，是这边海门镇最好的苹果酒酿造者！

original: His brewery is up behind the general store
translate: 他的酿酒厂在杂货店后面。

original: Though he might be a bit on the busy side with the Carnivale and all
translate: 虽然现在正忙着筹备狂欢节。

original: Carnivale?
translate: 狂欢节？

original: It’s been quiet as ever and that’s the way we like it here
translate: 这里一直很平静，这才是我们想要的。

original: Well unless you count the Carnivale preparations of course
translate: 当然，除非你指的是狂欢节的准备工作。

original: So no unrest here?
translate: 所以这里没有不安定的情况？

original: Well we did have Mary’s goat run off and knock over that pail of milk last week if that’s what you mean?
translate: 嗯，上周玛丽的山羊跑掉了，把一桶牛奶打翻了，如果你指的是这个。

original: But that was mostly funny, mind you
translate: 但那主要是很有趣。

original: A jovial, red-faced man greets you enthusiastically
translate: 一个满脸红润、兴高采烈的男人热情地迎接你。

original: Hello-hello and welcome to Firgol!
translate: 嗨，欢迎来到费戈尔！

original: Bernard’s my name!
translate: 我叫伯纳德！

original: I’ve not seen your face around here!
translate: 我还没有见过你的脸。

original: Come for the Carnivale?
translate: 是来参加狂欢节的吗？

original: Or perhaps the cider?
translate: 或许是苹果酒？

original: I just had some questions
translate: 我只是有几个问题

original: Cider?
translate: 苹果酒？

original: Coming right up!
translate: 即刻奉上！

original: So, how are things in Firgol?
translate: 所以，菲戈尔那边怎么样？

original: Let's see what's on the menu!
translate: 让我们看看菜单上有什么！

original: Have you heard about something called the 'Tower of Ash'?
translate: 听说过什么叫做‘灰塔’吗？

original: What can I get you?
translate: 我能为您做什么？

original: Lets talk a bit!
translate: 我们聊一会儿吧！

original: I have indeed!
translate: 的确如此！

original: It lies north of here, on the other side of the bay
translate: 它位于北方，就在海湾的另一边

original: Strange old hermit lives there, they say
translate: 据说那里住着一位古怪的老隐士

original: He keeps away from us so we keep away from him
translate: 他们说他避开我们，我们也避开他

original: #FirgolBarmaidScene
translate: #菲戈尔酒馆场景

original: #FirgolBaronesseScene
translate: #菲戈尔贵族场景

original: Kat lets out a small squeal of joy
translate: 凯特发出一声小小的欢呼

original: I knew you couldn’t turn down a chance for some fun!
translate: 我就知道你抵挡不住乐趣的诱惑！

original: The Dead knows we could all do with something to take our mind off all the bleakness!
translate: 死神知道我们都需要一些事情来转移注意力，远离这无尽的阴霾！

original: Even Roland, it seems, can’t help but smile at the prospect of a night of some light debauchery
translate: 甚至罗兰也无法抗拒夜晚轻浮享乐的诱惑，脸上露出了笑容

original: The Baroness exclaims contently
translate: 贵妇人满意地说道

original: With you to aid us, we shall be done in no time!
translate: 有你的帮助，我们很快就能完成任务！

original: Now, pay attention!
translate: 现在，注意听！

original: Embla offers a tired smile in return
translate: 伊姆拉拉返回一个疲惫的微笑

original: We have much work to do and Gradla beckons me
translate: 我们还有很多工作要做，格拉拉召叫我

original: But perhaps
translate: 也许

original: Perhaps a small bit of respite would do us good before we press on?
translate: 也许在继续前进之前，我们能稍微休息一下？

original: Just so long as we don’t tarry for too long
translate: 只要我们不要停留太久

original: Roland?
translate: 罗兰？

original: We'll help!
translate: 我们会帮忙的！

original: Roland sighs
translate: 罗兰叹了口气

original: So much death and dying
translate: 这么多的死亡和丧生

original: I’m tired
translate: 我累了

original: If we are to venture into the jaws of madness, I’d like to be able to get shit drunk at least once before we go
translate: 如果我们要踏入疯狂的深渊，我至少希望在出发前能痛饮一番

original: Oh my
translate: 哦天哪

original: I dare say things are as they have always been, no?
translate: 我敢说一切如常，不是吗？

original: Are you sure this isn’t just the grumblings of a few malcontents?
translate: 你确定这不只是少数不满者的抱怨？

original: It didn't seem like 'grumblings' when Horryn was razed
translate: 当霍林被摧毁时，那显然不是抱怨

original: You m'lady, are off your rockers
translate: 女爵大人，你疯了

original: Well, if things are indeed a bit on the busier side as of late, I’d venture that there’s nothing people need more than a party to take their minds off the drab monotony of everyday-life
translate: 如果最近确实有些忙碌，我猜测人们最需要的可能就是一场派对，来摆脱日常生活的单调乏味

original: Wouldn’t you say?
translate: 你不这么认为吗？

original: Perhaps you're right
translate: 或许你说得对

original: How's the planning going?
translate: 计划进行得如何？

original: So what you’re saying is you and your friends would eat and feast while the peasantry suffers?
translate: 所以你的意思是你们会吃喝玩乐，而农民们却在受苦？

original: You must hurry up my dear!
translate: 亲爱的，你必须快点！

original: The Carnivale is contingent upon your diligence
translate: 招商节取决于你的勤奋

original: Do think of the children!
translate: 请为孩子们想想！

original: Your task is simple
translate: 你的任务很简单

original: Our Carnivale is dependent on the work of some of our beloved villagers
translate: 我们的招商节依赖于我们心爱的村民们的劳动

original: They may have clever hands but they are a bit on the lazy side
translate: 他们可能手艺不错，但有点懒惰

original: She chuckles
translate: 她咯咯地笑了

original: And you want me to offer them my aid?
translate: 而你想让我去帮助他们？

original: Talk to Ari the brewer, Camilla the weaver and Klara the cook
translate: 去找酿酒师阿里、织布工卡米拉和厨师克拉拉

original: Offer them your help so we might expedite their tasks
translate: 请给他们提供帮助，以便我们能加快他们的进度

original: Give them my warmest greetings and remind them that the Carnivale is nigh
translate: 给他们我最温暖的问候，并提醒他们招商节就要到了

original: Oh, and do try not to mention anything about the surprise
translate: 哦，而且别提那个惊喜

original: I positively can’t wait to see their faces!
translate: 我真的迫不及待要看他们的脸了！

original: Now my lovely, be on your way!
translate: 现在我的宝贝，快去吧！

original: We shall await your return
translate: 我们会等待你的归来

original: An elderly noble woman and a robed, portly man stand in front of the villa’s gate, discussing enthusiastically
translate: 一位年长的贵族妇人和一位穿着长袍、身材肥胖的男子站在别墅门口，兴奋地讨论着

original: And we shall flank the road with torches for the procession!
translate: 而我们将用火炬夹道欢迎游行队伍！

original: And as they enter the grounds, my hand-maidens shall place wreaths upon their heads!
translate: 而当他们踏入这片土地，我的侍女们会为他们戴上花环！

original: And they shall have their libations as soon as they enter!
translate: 他们一踏入，就能享用祭品！

original: Not a throat shall be dry for the Carnivale!
translate: 没有人会因为狂欢节而口渴！

original: The man vigorously nods and takes notes
translate: 这个男人用力地点点头，并开始做笔记。

original: Yes m’lady!
translate: 是的，夫人！

original: Splendid idea!
translate: 真是个绝妙的主意！

original: Well, well Henry, what have we here?
translate: 哈，哈，亨利，我们这里有什么有趣的事情呢？

original: More revelers come to partake in our great Carnivale!
translate: 更多的狂欢者来参加我们的盛大狂欢节！

original: Grrrreetings my adorable vagabonds!
translate: 嘿嘿，亲爱的流浪者们！

original: I bid thee welcome to the estates of the Baron of Firgol
translate: 欢迎你们来到费戈尔男爵的领地！

original: I am his wife, the Baroness Griselda, and this sweet-cake of a man is our majordomo
translate: 我是他的妻子，格里赛尔达女爵，这位英俊的先生是我们家的管家。

original: Henry Flagstone
translate: 亨利·弗拉什顿

original: Henry offers several enthusiastic bows
translate: 亨利礼貌地鞠躬。

original: Do you mean to say you are not here for the Carnivale?
translate: 你是说你们不是来参加狂欢节的？

original: Oh what delicious irony!
translate: 哈，多么美妙的讽刺！

original: The Baroness offers a snorting laugh that seems oddly out of place for a lady of her station
translate: 女爵发出一声鼻音重的笑声，听起来似乎与她的身份不太相符。

original: You see, my dear husband and I have taken it upon ourselves to arrange a magnificent feast
translate: 你看，亲爱的丈夫和我，我们自作主张地安排了一场壮丽的盛宴。

original: A Carnivale where one might eat and drink and say farewell to the sufferings of the flesh!
translate: 一个可以吃喝，告别肉体痛苦的狂欢节！

original: There is even an added surprise this year that is sure to elevate the spirits and enlighten the minds of all those who are fortunate enough to attend!
translate: 今年还有额外的惊喜，一定会让所有有幸参加的人精神振奋，心灵启迪！

original: The Outer Isles are thrown into chaos and you throw a party?
translate: 外岛陷入混乱，而你却举办了一场派对？

original: How delightful!
translate: 多么愉快！

original: Tell me more!
translate: 再告诉我一些吧！

original: Typical nobles
translate: typical 贵族

original: Eating and feasting while the peasantry starve!
translate: 贵族们在吃喝玩乐，而农夫们却在挨饿！

original: Surprise?
translate: 惊喜？

original: The Baroness puts on a face of exaggerated sadness
translate: 那位女伯爵脸上露出夸张的悲伤表情

original: My dear traveler
translate: 我亲爱的朋友

original: There is a patina of world-weariness over you
translate: 你身上似乎有一丝饱经风霜的气息

original: A certain odor one might even say
translate: 有一种气味，甚至可以说

original: Won’t you please reconsider?
translate: 你确定不重新考虑一下？

original: I'll help!
translate: 我会帮助你！

original: Kat steps between you and the baroness
translate: 凯特站在你和女伯爵之间

original: Are you not hearing this?
translate: 你难道没有听到吗？

original: Food!
translate: 食物！

original: Drink!
translate: 饮料！

original: Entertainment!
translate: 娱乐！

original: We’ve been up to our knees in blood and shit and filth and, by the Magis’ balls, who knows when we’ll have a chance like this again!
translate: 我们已经浸在血、屎和污秽中，魔法之神的蛋，谁知道什么时候才能再有这样的机会！

original: Kat grabs you by the shoulders and leans in
translate: 凯特抓住你的肩膀，凑近你

original: Make
translate: 制作

original: This
translate: 这

original: Happen
translate: 发生

original: My dear, is your head made of marzipan?
translate: 我亲爱的，你的脑袋是不是用杏仁膏做的？

original: An adorable little marzipan piglet with a marzipan head made from eggs and almonds and powdered sugar?
translate: 一个可爱的小杏仁膏小猪，脑袋是由蛋、杏仁和糖粉做成的？

original: I can’t be bothered to repeat myself - surely you keep a journal?
translate: 我不想再重复自己了——你总该记日记吧？

original: Greetings little one
translate: 亲爱的小家伙，你好

original: Have you come to call upon me?
translate: 你来找我有什么事吗？

original: Are your tasks done?
translate: 你的任务完成了吗？

original: Not yet but I'm working on it!
translate: 还没有，但我正在努力！

original: The woman looks taken aback
translate: 那女人显得有些惊讶

original: My dear, you misunderstand!
translate: 我亲爱的，你误解了！

original: My husband adores the peasantry of this island!
translate: 我丈夫非常喜欢这个岛上的平民百姓！

original: Salt of the earth he calls them
translate: 他称他们是大地的盐

original: This feast is for the common folk of Firgol and they're invited one and all
translate: 这场盛宴是为菲戈尔的普通民众准备的，所有人都被邀请参加

original: It’s a tradition that goes back for generations
translate: 这个传统已经延续了好几代

original: Once a year the Baron of Firgol would always invite the commoners for a night of feasting and drinking!
translate: 每年一次，菲戈尔的伯爵都会邀请普通民众参加一场夜宴和饮酒的盛宴！

original: I dare say, this year will be a feast to remember - with the surprise and all
translate: 我敢说，今年的盛宴一定会让人难忘——尤其是有惊喜的情况下

original: A night of feast and drink sounds just about right
translate: 一场盛宴和饮酒的夜晚听起来刚刚好

original: Kat mutters under her breath
translate: 卡特低声嘀咕着

original: So how is the planning going?
translate: 那计划进行得怎么样了？

original: A surprise indeed!
translate: 真是个惊喜！

original: Oh, but I cannot help myself but give you a little morsel - Do promise not to tell anyone!
translate: 哦，但我忍不住要给你一点小爆料——请务必保密哦！

original: The lady leans in conspiratorially
translate: 女士凑近来神秘兮兮地说

original: My dear husband is putting on a play for the Carnivale!
translate: 我亲爱的丈夫要在狂欢节上演一出戏！

original: He himself will play the lead role
translate: 他自己将会扮演主角

original: Oh he has such wonders to show us
translate: 他有太多奇妙的东西要展示给我们

original: I’ve never seen him so enthusiastic about anything before
translate: 我从没见过他如此热衷于任何事情

original: What kind of play?
translate: 是什么类型的戏？

original: It will be a grand comedy in three acts!
translate: 这将是一部三幕大喜剧！

original: Or… a drama
translate: 或……悲剧

original: Or… well I can’t exactly remember but it will be spectacular in any case!
translate: 或……好吧，我确切记得，但无论如何，这将是一场令人惊叹的演出！

original: And how is the planning going?
translate: 而策划进展如何？

original: Well, as it turns out organizing the Carnivale is quite time-consuming
translate: 原来，组织狂欢节相当耗时

original: In fact I’m a bit overwhelmed with the amount of preparation remaining
translate: 实际上，我有点被剩下的准备工作压得喘不过气来

original: As the Baroness dramatically wafts herself with a fan you can’t help but notice that her majordomo rolls his eyes
translate: 伯爵夫人挥舞着扇子戏剧性地飘过，你不禁注意到她的管家已经翻了白眼

original: But perhaps the fates have provided for us after all, Henry?
translate: 但或许命运最终还是眷顾了我们，亨利？

original: Oh, isn’t it obvious?
translate: 哦，这难道不明显吗？

original: You seem like a most resolute ragamuffin and I’m sure that if you were to lend a hand, the Carnivale would be under way in no time!
translate: 你看起来是个最坚定的流浪儿，我相信如果你愿意帮忙，狂欢节很快就能开始！

original: And you would of course join us in the festivities
translate: 而且，你当然会加入我们的庆祝活动

original: The food and drink will be marvelous!
translate: 食物和饮料将会非常美妙！

original: Isn’t that just a marvelous idea Henry?
translate: 这不是个绝妙的想法，亨利？

original: She excitedly claps her hands and Henry agrees so strongly that his jowls flap
translate: 她兴奋地拍着手，亨利赞同得如此强烈，以至于他的下巴都在晃动

original: I really don't know if I have time for this
translate: 我真的不知道是否有时间来做这件事

original: What do you say?
translate: 你有什么建议？

original: #FirgolBeeHive
translate: #费戈尔蜂巢

original: This hive is dead and abandoned
translate: 这个蜂巢已经死亡且被遗弃

original: Neither bees, nor honeycombs can be found within
translate: 蜜蜂和蜂巢踪迹全无

original: You realize the best way of avoiding the little fiends is to dive into the nearby lake
translate: 你意识到避开这些小恶魔的最好方法是潜入附近的湖中

original: Clever thinking!
translate: 聪明的想法！

original: Your strategic retreat turns into a route as you are hunted down by the swarm in enraged insectoids
translate: 你们的战略撤退变成了逃跑，因为一群愤怒的昆虫群追上了你们

original: Though you eventually outrun them, you are left stung and woozy from the sheer amount of poison pumped into your system
translate: 虽然最终你们逃了出来，但你们因吸入的大量毒素而浑身发麻

original: You are, however, still alive
translate: 你们仍然活着

original: You carefully lift the top off the hive and peer inside
translate: 你小心翼翼地揭开蜂巢的盖子，往里看

original: Immediately a swarm of angry bees fly out and within seconds you feel the burn of several stings!
translate: 立刻，一群愤怒的蜜蜂飞了出来，几秒钟后，你感到了几处蜇伤的灼热感！

original: They DO sting!
translate: 他们确实蜇了！

original: I hate bees!
translate: 我讨厌蜜蜂！

original: Iben slaps his neck and brushes his face furiously
translate: 伊本拍了拍脖子，用力地擦着脸

original: Reach inside for the honey
translate: 去里面拿蜂蜜

original: Use smoke on the bees
translate: 用烟雾驱赶蜜蜂

original: Reconsider and leave
translate: 再考虑一下，离开

original: Reaching deep into the hive, you pull out a gorgeous honeycomb dripping with rich golden-yellow honey
translate: 你深入蜂巢，拉出了一块闪耀着丰富金色蜂蜜的美丽蜂巢

original: As the smoke effect on the bees begins to wear off, you find it best to make off with your prize
translate: 当蜜蜂身上的烟雾效果开始消散，你发现最好还是带着你的战利品离开

original: The hive begins to aggressively buzz as you approach
translate: 当你接近蜂巢时，蜂巢开始变得异常活跃

original: The honey inside suddenly seems much less attractive
translate: 蜂巢内的蜂蜜突然变得不那么诱人了

original: Well, the cook did say that Firgol bees do not sting, yes?
translate: 嗯，厨师确实说过费戈尔蜜蜂不会蜇人，对吧？

original: Iben sounds uncharacteristically hesitant
translate: 伊本的声音出奇地犹豫

original: Then again, the cook did say that the bees of Firgol do not sting
translate: 再说，厨师确实说过费戈尔的蜜蜂不会蜇人

original: Try to harvest the honey
translate: 尝试采集蜂蜜

original: Gingerly, you attempt to reach in
translate: 谨慎地，你试图伸手进去

original: Suddenly something large shifts in the depths of the hive and swarms of large soldier-bees swarm out to attack
translate: 突然，蜂巢深处传来巨大的动静，成群的大型工蜂蜂拥而出攻击

original: Each sting feels like a red-hot needle and you can’t help but panic!
translate: 每一蜇都像一根灼热的针刺入你的皮肤，你不禁恐慌起来！

original: Where can you run to get away from the buzzing horde?
translate: 你能跑到哪里躲避嗡嗡作响的蜂群？

original: Flee towards the village
translate: 躲向村庄

original: Flee towards the lake
translate: 躲向湖边

original: Play dead
translate: 装死

original: Playing dead is a terrible way of escaping hundreds of murderous insectoids
translate: 装死是逃离数百只凶猛昆虫的糟糕方式

original: Your fate is death by acute anaphylactic shock
translate: 你的命运将是急性过敏性休克导致的死亡

original: Bursting out from the pile of smoke-stricken bees, comes a single gargantuan individual
translate: 从烟熏蜜蜂的堆中冲出的是一只巨大的个体

original: A large swollen body clad in vibrant yellow chitin, iridescent wings and a face that looks unlike any insect you’ve ever seen before
translate: 它的身体庞大而肿胀，覆盖着鲜艳的黄色甲壳，闪烁着金属般的翅膀，脸上长着你从未见过的昆虫面孔

original: This must be a queen!
translate: 这一定是蜂后！

original: The creature lets out a tiny albeit terrifying screech and snaps at your fingers with its jaws
translate: 这个生物发出一声微小但可怕的尖叫声，用它那锋利的颚咬向你的手指

original: Ignore queen and get the honey
translate: 忽略女王，取蜂蜜

original: Squash the queen
translate: 压碎女王

original: Swiftly you grasp the creature
translate: 你迅速抓住了这个生物

original: It easily fills up your entire hand and squirms as you tighten your grip around its thorax
translate: 它很容易填满你的整个手掌，并在你紧握它的胸甲时挣扎

original: Snapping jaws first hiss and then emit a kind of pained wail as the chitin begins to give way
translate: 破裂的颚先嘶嘶作响，然后发出一种痛苦的哀嚎，因为甲壳开始松动

original: Crushing the creature takes a surprising amount of strength until the exoskeleton collapses with a wet squelch
translate: 压碎这个生物需要超出预期的力量，直到外骨骼在湿软的声响中崩塌

original: Gore splatters your face
translate: 咬伤溅到了你的脸上

original: Take the honey
translate: 取蜂蜜

original: You approach the hive and a slight buzzing rises from within
translate: 你靠近蜂巢，里面传来轻微的嗡嗡声

original: Even with your limited knowledge of bees however, you get a strong impression that there is something wrong with the hive
translate: 尽管你对蜜蜂了解有限，但你强烈感觉到蜂巢中有些不对劲

original: Examine the hive
translate: 检查蜂巢

original: Slowly lifting off the top of the hive, you’re able to look inside
translate: 缓缓掀开蜂巢的盖子，你得以窥见里面的情况

original: There are still plenty of bees left, however they seem slow and lethargic
translate: 蜜蜂仍然很多，但它们显得迟缓而慵懒

original: Furthermore, there is no honey in sight
translate: 更重要的是，根本看不到蜂蜜

original: Examine the bees
translate: 检查蜜蜂

original: Looking around more closely you find several dead bees
translate: 更仔细地观察，你发现有几个死去的蜜蜂

original: Some clearly belong to the hive in question
translate: 其中一些显然属于这个蜂巢

original: A handful of others however, look foreign
translate: 但是一小部分蜜蜂看起来很陌生

original: Larger and with a vibrant yellow color
translate: 它们更大，且带有鲜艳的黄色

original: If you were to guess, you’d say these bees have been fighting bees from another hive
translate: 如果要猜测，你认为这些蜜蜂在与其他蜂巢的蜜蜂战斗

original: Who are you kidding?
translate: 你在愚人？

original: You know nothing about bees
translate: 你对蜜蜂一无所知

original: Smartly using the bee smoker, you fill the hive with calming fumes
translate: 你巧妙地使用了蜂烟，将蜂巢填满了镇静的烟雾

original: Before you know it, the buzzing has subsided and you feel confident enough to reach for the honeycombs
translate: 不久，嗡嗡声渐渐平息，你感到足够自信，伸手去摘蜂巢

original: Reach in
translate: 伸手进去

original: #FirgolBeeKeeperScene
translate: #菲戈尔养蜂场景

original: Please don’t hurt me!
translate: 请不要伤害我！

original: I’ll give you the bloody smoker
translate: 我会给你那把血腥的蜂烟

original: Just promise you won’t tell anyone
translate: 只是答应不要告诉任何人

original: Pert sobs
translate: 哽咽的抽泣

original: Driina shakes her head
translate: 德里娜摇摇头

original: That was uncalled for
translate: 这未免太过分了

original: Don’t you think this poor fool’s had enough misery?
translate: 你不觉得这个可怜的家伙已经够惨了吗？

original: Hand it over
translate: 把它交出来

original: No reason to worry about that!
translate: 没有必要担心那个！

original: Firgol bees don’t sting
translate: 菲戈尔的蜜蜂不会蜇人

original: Now, please, just leave me alone!
translate: 现在，请你，就让我一个人待着吧！

original: Listen, there's something wrong with your bees
translate: 听着，你的蜜蜂有问题

original: They seem to be killing each other
translate: 它们似乎在互相残杀

original: If you tell me how I can harvest the honey safely, I'll see if I can't help save your hives as well
translate: 如果你能告诉我如何安全地采集蜂蜜，我会看看能不能帮你拯救你的蜂巢

original: Well, I’m here helping the Baroness organizing the Carnivale and I can only do that if you tell me how to get to the honey
translate: 好吧，我在这里帮助伯爵夫人筹备狂欢节，你得告诉我怎么去蜂蜜产地。

original: You better help me or I'll be forced to make you!
translate: 你最好帮我，否则我只能逼你了！

original: I get going then
translate: 我这就出发。

original: The man’s lips tremble and his eyes water up
translate: 那人的嘴唇颤抖，眼睛湿润起来。

original: I ‘spose you’re right
translate: 我想你是对的。

original: But you have to promise not to tell anyone I helped you!
translate: 但是你必须答应不会告诉任何人我帮你了！

original: I promise
translate: 我答应你。

original: Firgol bees do not sting!
translate: 菲戈尔蜜蜂不会蜇人！

original: And that's the end of it!
translate: 事情到此为止！

original: Please just leave me alone!
translate: 请让我一个人待着！

original: You better help me or I'll be forced to hurt you!
translate: 你最好帮我，否则我只能伤害你了！

original: Pert looks around again
translate: 彭特再次环顾四周。

original: Oh, I shouldn’t be doing this
translate: 哦，我本不该做这件事。

original: He sets off at a run and before you know it, he’s gone
translate: 他飞快地跑起来，转眼间就不见了。

original: Yes m'lord!
translate: 是的，大人！

original: I can assure you, Firgol honey is the best in the land
translate: 我可以保证，菲戈尔蜂蜜是全国最好的。

original: Please, go right ahead - the hives are over there
translate: 请，随便吧——蜂巢在那里。

original: Let me know if you need any help!
translate: 如果你需要帮助，请告诉我。

original: Yes m'lady!
translate: 是的，女士！

original: But how do I avoid getting stung?
translate: 但是我要怎么避免被蜇呢？

original: I better be on my way then!
translate: 我最好出发了！

original: Before you stand one of the ugliest men you have ever seen
translate: 你面前站着一个你见过的最丑的男人

original: Already cursed at birth, the man’s appearance is not improved by the numerous bee stings that mar his face
translate: 他生来就遭诅咒，脸上满是蜂刺的痕迹，更显得面目全非

original: His face contorts into something passing for a smile and he croaks
translate: 他的脸扭曲成勉强算作微笑的样子，然后嘶哑着嗓子说

original: Greetings m'lord
translate: 陛下好

original: How can I serve?
translate: 在下有何效劳之处？

original: Greetings m'lady
translate: 陛下好

original: I'm Pert m'lord
translate: 我是佩特，陛下

original: I’m the bee-keeper here in Firgol
translate: 我是这里的养蜂人，名叫佩特

original: I tend the Baron’s bees
translate: 我负责照料伯爵的蜜蜂

original: He gestures towards the nearby hives and you can’t help but notice that, like his face, his hands are also swollen with bee stings
translate: 他朝附近的蜂箱做了个手势，你不禁注意到，就像他的脸一样，他的手也肿满了蜂刺

original: I'm Pert m'lady
translate: 我是佩特，殿下

original: Tough job?
translate: 这份工作很辛苦？

original: Hello m'lord
translate: 陛下好

original: Hello m'lady
translate: 殿下好

original: I need to get honey!
translate: 我需要蜂蜜！

original: You need to tell me how I'm going to avoid getting stung
translate: 你得告诉我怎么才能避免被蜇

original: The man wrings his swollen hands while he thinks
translate: 那人揉着肿胀的手，思索着

original: If I give you the smoker, you might be able to… help my bees?
translate: 如果我给你烟熏器，你或许能……帮我照料蜜蜂？

original: Well, I suppose I can give you the smoker if you promise not to tell anyone!
translate: 好吧，如果你答应不告诉别人，我就把烟熏器给你！

original: The man looks around nervously and hands you a small tin can with a handle and a spout
translate: 这个男人紧张地环顾四周，然后把一个带把手和出嘴的小铁罐递给你

original: This is a bee smoker, see
translate: 这是一个蜂烟筒，你看

original: You just mix kindling with some wet grass and light a fire
translate: 你只需要把一些干柴和湿草混在一起点个火

original: Not too hot mind you!
translate: 别太热了！

original: You only want a bit of smoke
translate: 你只需要一点烟雾

original: Just open the hive carefully and let the smoke settle inside and the bees will go all drowsy
translate: 只要小心打开蜂巢，让烟雾在里面停留，蜜蜂就会昏昏欲睡

original: But please
translate: 但是请

original: Don’t tell anyone I use the bee smoker
translate: 一定不要让任何人知道我用了蜂烟筒

original: Firgol bees don’t sting!
translate: 菲哥尔蜜蜂不会蜇人！

original: Oh no!
translate: 哦不！

original: Not in the slightest m'lord
translate: 一点也不，大人

original: Firgol bees don’t sting you see!
translate: 菲哥尔蜜蜂不会蜇人，你看

original: They’re as docile as cows
translate: 它们比牛还温顺

original: And that’s good because the Baroness wouldn’t want it any other way
translate: 而且这样很好，因为伯爵夫人不希望有任何其他方式

original: Not in the slightest m'lady
translate: 一点也不，夫人

original: They don't look docile!
translate: 它们看起来不温顺！

original: Point to his stings
translate: 请指指他的蜇刺

original: In fact I'm helping out the Baroness
translate: 其实我在帮助伯爵夫人

original: I've come ot fetch honey!
translate: 我是来取蜂蜜的！

original: The man half averts his face in shame as you point out his stings
translate: 你指着他的蜇刺，这个男人羞愧地半转过脸

original: It’s as the Baroness says
translate: 这正如那位女伯爵所说

original: And if they do then it’s my own bloody fault!
translate: 而如果真是那样，那也是我自己惹的祸！

original: That’s all there’s to be said about that
translate: 关于这一点，就说到这里吧

original: Well, I'm here for some honey
translate: 好吧，我来这里是为了买蜂蜜

original: Well, I best be going
translate: 好吧，我最好还是走了

original: #FirgolBrewerScene
translate: #费戈尔酿酒场景

original: Of course!
translate: 当然了！

original: My lad sells it by the bottle in front of the general store
translate: 我那小伙子会在杂货店前面按瓶出售

original: Oh, and Bernard might even have a few bottles left over at the inn
translate: 哦，对了，本杰明可能在旅店里还有一些剩余的瓶子

original: The man can’t help but hide his disappointment
translate: 那人忍不住掩饰住自己的失望之情

original: Oh… well, suit yourself I suppose
translate: 哦……好吧，随你的便

original: What can I do for you then?
translate: 那我有什么可以为你效劳的吗？

original: A pot-bellied man hums to himself as he pours a clear, golden liquid from glass to glass, swirling it around and then tasting it
translate: 一个大腹便便的男人边哼着歌边将清澈的金色液体从一个玻璃杯倒入另一个，旋转着，然后品尝起来

original: He thoughtfully sloshes it around in his mouth a few times and then spits it into a bucket
translate: 他意味深长地在嘴里搅动了几下，然后吐进一个桶里

original: Taste funny?
translate: 味道不对劲吗？

original: Oh my no!
translate: 哦，不！

original: This cider is my best batch yet
translate: 这款苹果酒是我迄今为止最好的一批

original: He looks at you with a roguish smile
translate: 他对你露出狡黠的笑容

original: Only problem is my wife gets a bit on the sour side if I come home red-cheeked after tasting the wares all day
translate: 唯一的问题是，如果我整天品酒回家时脸颊通红，妻子就会有点不高兴

original: The man chuckles and offers his hand
translate: 那人笑着伸出手来

original: I’m Ari, I run the local brewery
translate: 我是艾瑞，经营着当地的酿酒坊

original: I’d wager you’ll find no finer cider in all of the Northern Empire - And certainly not in the outer isles
translate: 我打赌在整个北方帝国，你找不到比这里的苹果酒更出色的了——当然，外岛就更不用说了

original: Here!
translate: 这里！

original: Have a try!
translate: 试一试吧！

original: Ari offers a glass of the golden cider
translate: 艾瑞端来一杯金色的苹果酒

original: Accept
translate: 接受

original: No thank you
translate: 谢谢，不用了

original: Did she now?
translate: 她是这么说的吗？

original: Aye, she’s ordered the beverages for the Carnivale for me
translate: 嗯，她为嘉年华订购了所有的饮料

translate: 丰富的苹果酒味道让你脸颊泛红，头脑轻飘飘的

original: You cannot help but laugh
translate: 你情不自禁地笑了起来

original: Loud and uninhibited
translate: 笑声大而无所顾忌

original: You laugh because there is no evil in the world
translate: 你笑是因为世界上没有邪恶

original: Or perhaps because there is so much of it and yet, here you stand?
translate: 或许是因为邪恶如此之多，而你却站在这里？

original: The table overflows with the treats from Klara’s kitchen
translate: 桌子上堆满了克拉拉厨房里的美味佳肴

original: Your mouth waters as you stand momentarily paralyzed by the abundance of choice
translate: 你站在那里，片刻间被选择的丰富性所震撼，口水直流

original: The urge to partake is almost primal
translate: 想要品尝的冲动几乎是本能的

original: A sublime piece of stuffed pastry
translate: 一件精美的馅饼

original: Lying there alone, a vibrant platonic ideal, almost beckoning you
translate: 独自躺在那里，它仿佛是生动的柏拉图理想，几乎在召唤你

original: Gingerly you pick it up
translate: 你小心翼翼地拿起它

original: It’s feather-light
translate: 它轻若鸿毛

original: Wolf it down!
translate: 快把它吃完！

original: Biting into the pastry, its perfect crust yields up the soft crumb-flesh with a satisfying crunch
translate: 咬下馅饼，酥脆的外皮发出令人满意的咔嚓声，露出柔软的馅料

original: The jam-filled interior bursts in your mouth; Apples, sugar, cinnamon - a touch of lemon
translate: 果酱充盈的内馅在口中爆裂；苹果、糖、肉桂——还有一丝柠檬

original: Ecstasy
translate: 极乐

original: This is the best stuffed pastry you’ve ever had
translate: 这是你吃过的最好吃的馅饼

original: Resplendently attired and with her handmaidens in tow, the baroness emerges from the manor
translate: 穿着华丽的服饰，带着侍女，女爵从庄园中走出

original: The music dies down
translate: 音乐渐渐消散

original: Beloved guests!
translate: 亲爱的宾客们！

original: The second act is upon us!
translate: 第二幕即将开始！

original: My beloved husband asks that you take your places in front of the stage
translate: 我亲爱的丈夫希望你们在舞台前就座

original: The time has come for the evening's surprise
translate: 今晚的惊喜时刻到了

original: And for all our rosy-cheeked little crumplins there is a special surprise
translate: 为所有红扑扑的小精灵们，我们准备了一个特别的惊喜

original: My lovely ladies and I have prepared a scavenger hunt!
translate: 我可爱的女士们和我为你们准备了一个寻宝游戏！

original: There will be whimsy and prizes and sweets!
translate: 会有奇思妙想、奖品和糖果！

original: The children clap their pudgy hands as they squeal with joy
translate: 孩子们拍着手，高兴地尖叫着

original: Is there one among you with the courage to brave the manor and find the treasure within?
translate: 在你们中间，有没有人有勇气闯入庄园，找到其中的宝藏？

original: Come one - come all!
translate: 来吧，来吧！

original: The children stream past the baroness into the manor while the adults begin to file towards the rows of benches placed in front of the stage
translate: 孩子们鱼贯穿过女伯爵，进入庄园，而成年人则开始向舞台前排的长凳走去

original: It is time for you to take your place
translate: 是时候你上场了

original: The music filling the air is raw and primal
translate: 填满空气的音乐原始而原始

original: Its beat is the pulse of something vast waiting to be born
translate: 它的节奏是某种巨大事物的脉搏，等待着诞生

original: The piper at the gates of dawn
translate: 朝晨之门吹奏的乐师

original: It drives you
translate: 它驱使你

original: Carries you
translate: 把你带走

original: A howl builds inside
translate: 一声嚎叫在心中酝酿

original: You give in to it
translate: 你任由它控制

original: Dance like no one’s watching
translate: 就像无人注视般跳舞

original: You sway and leap and whirl to the mesmerizing beat
translate: 你摇摆、跳跃、旋转，随着令人着迷的节奏

original: For a moment you are one with something
translate: 有一刻，你与某物融为一体

original: With everything or nothing
translate: 与一切或无物

original: There really isn't a difference
translate: 实际上并没有区别

original: Stars wheel overhead and by the time the trance ends it takes a moment for you to remember where, or even when, you are
translate: 星辰在头顶旋转，等你从恍惚中回过神来，才意识到自己身处何地，甚至身处何时

original: #FirgolCassildaScene
translate: #费戈尔卡西莎场景

original: A young woman dressed in the manner of a wandering minstrel stands alone looking out across the small lake
translate: 一位年轻女子身着流浪吟游诗人的装束，独自站在湖边，凝视着这片小湖

original: She hums softly to herself - stopping and starting over as if trying to think of words for a song
translate: 她轻声哼唱，时断时续，仿佛在努力构思歌词

original: Are you Cass?
translate: 你是卡西吗？

original: The woman blinks in surprise
translate: 那女人惊讶地眨了眨眼

original: What, you’ve heard of me then?
translate: 哦，那你倒是听说过我？

original: Wait, is this about that bar-tab?
translate: 等等，这和那酒馆的账单有关？

original: As I’ve already told Bernard, I’ll pay him the moment I have the coin on hand
translate: 像我已经告诉伯纳德的那样，我会在手头有硬币的时候付给他

original: It’s just that I’ve been a bit preoccupied
translate: 只是最近有点心神不宁

original: Cass looks at her feet
translate: 凯斯看着自己的脚

original: Camilla asked me to talk to you
translate: 卡米拉让我来找你

original: A pained expression falls across her face
translate: 她痛苦的表情浮现在脸上

original: Please don’t say she’s angry with me
translate: 请不要说她生我的气

original: She's sad you weren't interested in her
translate: 她只是因为你对她没兴趣而感到伤心

original: Not interested?!
translate: 没有兴趣？！

original: I’m crazy for her
translate: 我对她疯狂着呢

original: Finding her note made me happier than words can describe
translate: 找到她的便条，我比言语所能表达的还要开心

original: Then why didn't you respond?
translate: 那你为什么不回应呢？

original: Because I couldn’t find the words
translate: 因为找不到合适的词

original: Can you believe it?
translate: 你能相信吗？

original: Me, a bard, at a loss for words!
translate: 我，一个吟游诗人，竟然词穷了！

original: I’ve been trying to put my feelings into verse
translate: 我一直在试着把我的感情写成诗

original: A song
translate: 一首歌

original: I’m nearly there, but over and over, the words escape me
translate: 我快完成了，但一遍又一遍，词还是脱口而出

original: I don’t understand it
translate: 我不明白

original: It feels like I’m grasping at tendrils of mist
translate: 我感觉自己像是在抓住雾气般的触须

original: Can I hear what you have so far?
translate: 我能听到你目前为止听到的内容吗？

original: The song Cass reads to you is sad and beautiful
translate: 卡斯读给你的这首歌悲伤而美丽

original: It brings to mind images of far and wondrous shores
translate: 让人想起遥远而奇妙的海岸

original: Stranger yet, is the fact that try as you might, you have never been able to recall the first three verses she recounted to you
translate: 更奇怪的是，无论你如何努力，你都无法回忆起她讲述的前三节歌词

original: Only the first line of the last verse remains
translate: 只剩下最后一节的第一行了

original: Song of my soul, my voice is dead
translate: 我灵魂之歌，我的声音已死

original: That’s exactly it
translate: 就是这个

original: I can’t get past that
translate: 我过不去这里

original: Nor can I change it
translate: 我也无法改变它

original: It has to be that line!
translate: 就必须是这一行！

original: But what comes next?
translate: 但是接下来呢？

original: It’s like I’m deaf to my own inner voice!
translate: 我仿佛听不到自己的内心之音！

original: Cass repeats the line, now with a slight hint of panic in her voice
translate: 卡斯重复着那行话，现在她的声音中带着一丝恐慌

original: Die thou, unsung, as tears unshed
translate: 你未歌者，无声而逝，如泪未落

original: Cass squeezes your hand and offers a warm but slightly sad smile before walking off
translate: 卡斯握了握你的手，露出一个温暖但略带悲伤的笑容，然后走开了

original: You’re left with the note for Camilla
translate: 你留下的是一封给卡米拉的信

original: The woman appears lost in thought as she mumbles the verse of some half-composed song to herself over and over
translate: 那位女士似乎陷入沉思，一遍又一遍地喃喃自语着一首半成形的歌曲的歌词

original: The words flow from your mouth and fits the song like a key fits a lock
translate: 话语从你口中流出，恰如钥匙落入锁孔般契合歌曲

original: You spoke more words as well, but like the rest of the song, they too are lost in the void of time
translate: 你说了更多的话，但就像歌中的其他部分一样，这些话也随着时间的流逝而消失在了时光的长河中

original: What you do remember however, is Cass scribbling the words down as tears of joy streamed down her face
translate: 然而，你所记得的是卡斯在她脸上流下喜悦泪水的时候匆匆记下了歌词

original: That’s it!
translate: 就是这样！

original: I have it
translate: 我有了

original: A song for Camilla
translate: 一首献给卡米拉的歌

original: She folds the piece of paper containing the words of the song neatly and writes in beautiful cursive
translate: 她将那张写有歌词的纸折得整整齐齐，并用优美的行书写下了内容

original: To Camilla - From Cassilda
translate: 给卡米拉 - 从卡西尔达

original: With trembling hands she offers you the folded note
translate: 她颤抖着手将折好的纸条递给你

original: Would you do me one last favor
translate: 你能为我做最后一个请求吗

original: Take this note to Camilla
translate: 请把这个纸条带给卡米拉

original: It will explain everything to her
translate: 这会向她解释一切

original: And please
translate: 请告诉她，她可以来找我参加狂欢节

original: Would you tell her to come find me at the Carnivale?
translate: 告诉她，我们会一起跳舞

original: Tell her we’ll dance together then
translate: #FirgolCiderMerchantScene

original: #FirgolCiderMerchantScene
translate: 伯爵和伯爵夫人正在安排呢！

original: The Baron and Baroness are arranging it!
translate: 他们会提供食物和饮料，甚至还有惊喜！

original: It’ll have food and drink and even a surprise they say!
translate: 如果你还没有去的话，你应该去找伯爵夫人，提出帮忙

original: If you haven’t already done so, you should go talk to the Baroness and offer to help!
translate: 我敢肯定，如果你帮忙，她会让你参加的

original: I’m sure she’ll let you attend if you help out
translate: 你瞧，我父亲会提供饮料！

original: My da’s supplying the drinks, you see!
translate: 你瞧，我父亲会提供饮料！

original: The boy beams with pride and excitement
translate: 那个男孩充满自豪和兴奋地笑了

original: A party?
translate: 一个队伍？

original: When the Outer Isles flow with blood?
translate: 当外岛流淌着鲜血的时候？

original: Ah, I see
translate: 哦，我明白了

original: The boy’s eyes water over
translate: 男孩的眼睛湿润了

original: I’m sorry I don’t know anything about any blood or any such
translate: 对不起，我对任何鲜血或类似的事情一无所知

original: I’m just looking forward to the party
translate: 我只是期待那个队伍

original: It’s not often us common folk get to experience something like that
translate: 我们这些普通人不常有机会体验那样的事情

original: Well the Carnivale of course!
translate: 当然，是狂欢节！

original: I can’t wait!
translate: 我等不及了！

original: They say it’s going to be one for the ages!
translate: 他们说那将是史无前例的狂欢节！

original: My da’ might need a hand!
translate: 我的父亲可能需要帮忙！

original: He’s been a bit flustered about getting his shipment of cider ready for the Carnivale and all
translate: 他一直在忙着为狂欢节准备苹果酒，有点紧张

original: Something about moles in the orchard
translate: 有关于果园里的鼹鼠

original: I’m sure you’ll find him in the brewery somewhere
translate: 我肯定能在酿酒厂找到他

original: In the warehouse maybe?
translate: 或者在仓库里？

original: I'll go talk to him then!
translate: 那我去找他！

original: A smiling young lad with a shock of yellow hair calls out to you
translate: 一个带着一头黄色头发的微笑少年向你喊道

original: Greetings traveler!
translate: 旅者，你好！

original: Can I interest you in some fine Firgol cider?
translate: 想尝尝芬戈尔苹果酒吗？

original: I promise, you’ll not get it fresher of better anywhere in the Outer Isles!
translate: 我保证，在外岛任何地方都找不到比这更新鲜、更好的了！

original: Sounds like a local specialty?
translate: 听起来像是当地的特色？

original: It doesn’t get more local than this!
translate: 没有什么比这更本地了！

original: My da’ makes it right here at the family brewery!
translate: 我父亲就在这里的家庭酿酒厂里亲手制作！

original: He motions to the buildings behind him
translate: 他朝他身后的建筑指了指

original: Now what will it be?
translate: 接下来你要点些什么？

original: Can I interest you in a few bottles?
translate: 我可以请你喝几瓶吗？

original: Perhaps later but I had some questions first!
translate: 或者稍后，但我先有几个问题要问！

original: Can I buy some cider?
translate: 我可以买些苹果酒吗？

original: What's going on here in Firgol?
translate: 在费戈尔这里发生了什么事？

original: Hi there!
translate: 你好！

original: Back for more cider?
translate: 又来喝苹果酒了吗？

original: #FirgolEnter
translate: #费戈尔酒馆

original: As Roland slinks off, Iben walks up to you
translate: 作为罗兰悄悄离开，伊本走到你面前

original: Cruel deeds scar those who perform them as much as their victims and Roland is a man with many scars
translate: 残忍的行为不仅会伤害受害者，也会伤害施行者，罗兰身上有很多伤痕

original: As you approach the small cluster of quaint houses you can’t help but be struck by a feeling of calm and peace you’ve not felt in a long time
translate: 当你走近那几栋小巧的房屋时，你不禁感到一种久违的平静与安宁

original: By the grace of the Golden Dead, it would appear a small sliver of life as it once was in the Outer Isles has survived
translate: 金死者的恩赐之下，外岛曾经的生命似乎在这里留下了一丝痕迹

original: Driina says with a sad smile
translate: 德里娜带着悲伤的微笑说道

original: Ahead on your right, lies a tavern that looks exactly like the kind of tavern where the meals are hearty and the ale cooled just right
translate: 在你右手前方，有一家看起来就像那种饭菜丰盛、麦酒冰镇得刚刚好的酒馆

original: Your stomach growls at the thought
translate: 一想到这些，你的肚子就开始咕咕叫了

original: Kat stares, mouth agape, first at the tavern and then at you pleadingly
translate: 卡特张大嘴巴，先是盯着酒馆，然后恳求地看向你

original: We’re stopping by there whether you want to or not!
translate: 无论你喜不喜欢，我们都要去那里！

original: You continue on your way, and for a moment an irrational fear passes over you
translate: 你继续前行，一瞬间，一种莫名的恐惧掠过心头

original: Will you be able to return to the cold, brutal world at large if you spend too much time in this quite little piece of bliss?
translate: 如果你在这种宁静的小天地待得太久，能否回到那冰冷残酷的外面世界？

original: Looking around, you notice Roland has fallen behind the group and now stands, seemingly transfixed, a few steps behind you
translate: 四下看看，你注意到罗兰落在队伍后面，现在站在你身后几步远的地方，似乎被什么东西深深吸引住了

original: What's wrong Roland?
translate: 罗兰，你怎么了？

original: Is it a trap?
translate: 这是陷阱吗？

original: No time to linger
translate: 没时间停留了

original: He blinks a few times with watery eyes and an expression that is hard to place
translate: 他几次眨着眼睛，眼睛有些红肿，表情难以捉摸

original: Families
translate: 家人

original: Children
translate: 孩子们

original: Feeling homesick?
translate: 你开始想家了吗？

original: He looks down and for a moment you could have sworn he looks ashamed
translate: 他低下头，你几乎以为他显得有些羞愧

original: Let's just get some bloody ale
translate: 我们还是先弄点血红的麦酒吧

original: His voice breaks in a way that is uncharacteristic for the laconic brute
translate: 他的声音带着一种不常见的哽咽，与那个寡言的粗犷形象不符

original: #FirgolGeneralGoodsScene
translate: #菲戈尔杂货店场景

original: Ask about Firgol
translate: 询问关于菲戈尔的信息

original: Ask about Help
translate: 询问帮助

original: Show me your goods!
translate: 展示你的货物！

original: Something about Firgol
translate: 有关菲戈尔的一些事情

original: More about Firgol
translate: 关于费戈尔更多内容

original: Finally the last part about Firgol
translate: 最后关于费戈尔的部分

original: Something about Help
translate: 关于帮助的一些事情

original: More about Help
translate: 更多关于帮助的内容

original: Finally the last part about Help
translate: 最后关于帮助的部分

original: #FirgolInnCookScene
translate: #费戈尔客栈厨师场景

original: Their line has ruled over Firgol for a long time
translate: 他们已经统治费戈尔很久了

original: They live in the villa north-west of the village
translate: 他们住在村庄西北的别墅里

original: Just across the stream
translate: 就在小溪对面

original: I’m sure the Baroness would appreciate it if you called upon her
translate: 我相信伯爵夫人会很高兴你们去拜访她

original: She’s eccentric but she means well - loves the children of the village
translate: 她有些古怪，但心地善良 - 爱着村庄的孩子们

original: I had some other things I wanted to ask you
translate: 其实我还想问你们一些事情

original: In fact, the Baroness told me to ask if you needed help!
translate: 事实上，伯爵夫人让我问问你们是否需要帮助！

original: Well, the Carnivale is nigh, right?
translate: 嗯，狂欢节就要到了，对吧？

original: That means plenty of extra work for me but the thing is, there’s still the inn to take care of!
translate: 这意味着我将有更多额外的工作要做，但问题是，客栈还需要照顾！

original: Who’s going to cook for the guest, you know?
translate: 谁来为客人做饭呢，你们知道的

original: Well, the Baroness told me to ask if you needed help!
translate: 事实上，伯爵夫人让我问问你们是否需要帮助！

original: The Carnivale is the time to feast and drink and dance
translate: 狂欢节是宴饮和跳舞的时刻

original: It’s the Baron and the Baroness’ way of showing their love for us common folk
translate: 这是伯爵和伯爵夫人向我们这些普通人表达爱意的方式

original: Baron and the Baroness?
translate: 伯爵和伯爵夫人？

original: Besides the Carnivale?
translate: 除了狂欢节？

original: Nothing - and that's just the way we prefer!
translate: 没有 - 而且我们就是喜欢这样！

original: Really?
translate: 真的？

original: Nothing?
translate: 没有？

original: Idra was nearly overrun by Reavers and Horryn was all but sacked!
translate: 伊德拉几乎被掠夺者攻占，霍里恩也几乎被洗劫一空！

original: Well, I ain’t seen no ‘Reavers’ here and if I do, I’ll be sure to show them the back of my hand!
translate: 好吧，我这里没有看到什么掠夺者，如果有的话，我会让他们知道我的厉害！

original: Let's talk about something else
translate: 我们还是谈谈别的吧

original: A woman bustles about the kitchen, stirring pots, adding spices and tending fires
translate: 一个女人在厨房里忙活着，搅拌锅里的东西，添加香料，照顾火源

original: I beg your pardon, but I’m not really in any position to talk right now!
translate: 对不起，我现在真的没有时间聊天！

original: Why so busy?
translate: 为什么这么忙？

original: Please, I just had a few questions!
translate: 请，我只是有几个问题要问！

original: Well, come to think of it, there is actually something you could help me with
translate: 想起来确实，你其实可以帮我一个忙

original: Name it!
translate: 什么忙？

original: See, the Baroness has asked me to prepare something special for the children of the feast
translate: 其实，女伯爵让我为宴会的孩子们准备一些特别的东西

original: My famed honey cakes
translate: 我著名的蜂蜜蛋糕

original: Only problem is, I’m still waiting on the honey
translate: 只是问题在于，我还在等蜂蜜

original: Perhaps you could be a dear and run over to the beehives and fetch it for me?
translate: 也许你可以帮我一个忙，去蜂巢取一些蜂蜜？

original: Will any honey do?
translate: 任何蜂蜜都可以吗？

original: It needs to be honey from our own hives
translate: 必须是我们自己蜂巢里的蜂蜜

original: There’s nothing quite like it
translate: 没有什么比这更好的了

original: And where do I find these beehives?
translate: 而这些蜂巢在哪里呢？

original: The bee-hives lie to the west of the village
translate: 蜂巢位于村庄的西边

original: Just cross the bridge and continue straight ahead and you’ll see them on your left-hand side eventually
translate: 只需过桥后一直向前走，你会在左边看到它们

original: I think even a single honeycomb should do it!
translate: 我认为一个蜂巢的蜂巢板就足够了！

original: See if you can’t find Pert the beekeeper
translate: 尽量找到佩特这位养蜂人吧

original: He’ll help you
translate: 他会帮助你的

original: But how will I avoid getting stung?
translate: 但我要怎么避免被蛰呢？

original: Klara chuckles a heart laugh and slaps her knee
translate: 克拉拉咯咯地笑了起来，拍着膝盖

original: Oh I wouldn’t worry about that!
translate: 哦，你不用担心这个！

original: We wouldn’t want the children to not get their honey-cakes!
translate: 我们可不想让孩子们得不到蜂蜜蛋糕！

original: I'll do my best!
translate: 我会尽力的！

original: I need you to fetch at least five honey-combs for me from the beehives west of town
translate: 我需要你从镇西边的蜂巢里至少取五个蜂巢板给我

original: Just cross the bridge and continue straight ahead until you see them on your left-hand side
translate: 只需过桥后一直向前走，直到看到它们在左边

original: Look at these honey-combs!
translate: 看这些蜂巢板！

original: Have you ever seen honey this golden?
translate: 你见过如此金黄的蜂蜜吗？

original: The children will love this
translate: 孩子们一定会喜欢的

original: Oh, the Baroness is going to be so pleased
translate: 哦，女伯爵一定会非常高兴

original: Now, the cakes are for the children but I’ll tell you what
translate: 现在，蛋糕是给孩子们的，但我要告诉你一件事

original: I baked one too many apple-pies for the feast
translate: 我为宴会多烤了几个苹果派

original: It’s yours if you want it
translate: 如果你想的话，这个就是你的了

original: Klara winks at you and hands you a fresh apple pie
translate: 克拉拉对你眨了眨眼，递给你一块新鲜的苹果派

original: Now, off you go!
translate: 现在，你去吧！

original: I have the honey!
translate: 我有蜂蜜！

original: Go on then!
translate: 去吧！

original: Can you teach me a few recipes?
translate: 你能教我几道菜谱吗？

original: What's going on in Firgol?
translate: 菲戈尔发生了什么事？

original: Want to learn how to cook eh?
translate: 你想学做饭吗？

original: Well I can’t blame you
translate: 我也不怪你

original: Nothing soothes the soul like a home-cooked meal
translate: 没有什么比家常菜更能抚慰心灵了

original: Have a look in my recipe-book
translate: 查看一下我的食谱书吧

original: I’ll teach you for a few coins per recipe!
translate: 我会每道菜谱收你几枚硬币作为学费！

original: Browse Recipes
translate: 浏览菜谱

original: Klara rushes back and forth, red-faced and sweating but with movements that seem so choreographed and intentional that she appears more like a dancer than a cook
translate: 克拉拉来回奔忙，满脸通红，满头大汗，但她的动作却如此有条不紊，仿佛是一名舞者而非厨师

original: You are truly watching a master at work here
translate: 你在这里真是见证了一位大师的工作

original: Let's talk for a bit!
translate: 我们聊一会儿吧！

original: #FirgolManorEnter
translate: #菲戈尔庄园入口

original: The scene before you is one of utter insanity
translate: 你面前的场景简直疯狂至极

original: The Baroness presides over it with a look of exhausted contentment on her face
translate: 伯爵夫人脸上带着疲惫却满足的表情，主宰着这一切

original: I’m so glad to see you here
translate: 很高兴你来了

original: The great work is nearly done and I couldn’t have done it without you
translate: 这伟大的工作即将完成，没有你，我无法做到

original: It’s only fitting you should be here at the finale
translate: 你理应在终幕中在此现身

original: She produces a long dagger from her sleeve
translate: 她从袖中抽出一把长匕首

original: Put down the dagger!
translate: 放下匕首！

original: Beyond hope and reason you see that the children are still alive - albeit paralyzed in some kind of trance
translate: 你看到孩子们依然活着——尽管处于某种恍惚的状态，无法动弹

original: The Baroness begins laughing but the sound morphs into a wailing cry of sorrow and anger
translate: 那夫人开始大笑，但笑声逐渐变成了悲伤与愤怒的哀嚎

original: They are mine now!
translate: 它们现在是我的了！

original: Why shouldn’t I have one as well!
translate: 我为什么不能拥有一个呢！

original: Every fucking cow with a cunt in the village can squeeze one out SO WHY CAN’T I?!
translate: 村里每头有奶头的牛都能挤出一个，为什么我不能！？

original: She screams and lunges for the nearest child
translate: 她尖叫着扑向最近的一个孩子

original: #FirgolManorFinal
translate: #费戈尔庄园终幕

original: Sitting in silent majesty upon the throne, is the desiccated corpse of what must have been the Baron of Firgol
translate: 坐在宝座上的是一个干瘪的尸体，曾经可能是费戈尔的男爵

original: Tattered, yellow robes hang loosely from the body and around the head, a thin crown of ivy has grown
translate: 破旧的黄袍松松垮垮地挂在尸体上，头顶上长着一顶细长的常春藤王冠

original: A king out of time
translate: 一个与时间脱节的国王

original: Though similar, this figure cannot be the one that performed that horrid play
translate: 虽然相似，但这绝不是那个表演那场可怕剧目的人

original: And even as you stand here, the memory of it has begun to fade
translate: 就在你站在这里的时候，那段记忆已经开始模糊

original: Like a dream upon waking, you are left wondering if it even happened at all
translate: 就像梦醒时分，你不禁怀疑这一切是否真的发生过

original: No matter, there is nothing more here for you now
translate: 毕竟，对你而言，这里已经没有什么可留恋的了

original: Only bones dust
translate: 只剩下枯骨和尘土

original: You turn to leave
translate: 你转身离去

original: For a moment you imagine that you hear the flapping of tattered robes, but then it passes
translate: 你一度以为听到了破旧袍子的窸窣声，但那只是幻觉

original: #FirgolMoleBurrow
translate: #费里戈尔鼹鼠洞

original: You dig the shovel into the soft soil and easily collapse the burrow
translate: 你将铲子插入柔软的土壤中，轻易地塌陷了这个鼹鼠洞

original: After a few strokes however, the shovel-head comes up coated in dark blood
translate: 然而，几铲过后，铲头被一层深色的血液覆盖

original: You root through the soil and to your disgust find numerous, small, hairless blobs of flesh that have been hacked to death by the shovel’s action
translate: 你翻动土壤，恶心地发现有多个无毛的小肉块被铲子的动作砍得支离破碎

original: You can’t properly identify the strange things, nor do you want to, and quickly cover up the gruesome scene with dirt before moving along
translate: 你无法准确辨认这些奇怪的东西，也不想多看，迅速用泥土覆盖那令人作呕的场景，然后继续前进

original: More carefully this time, you set to work collapsing the second tunnel
translate: 这次更加小心，你开始工作，塌陷第二个隧道

original: The work progresses nicely until suddenly the earth shifts slightly as if something is moving underneath
translate: 工作进展顺利，直到突然地，地面微微震动，仿佛有什么东西在下面移动

original: Whatever it is, it grabs onto the shovel blade and tugs violently at it!
translate: 无论是什么，它抓住铲子的刀刃，用力拉扯！
