original: You yank back with all your might and manage to free the shovel from whatever lurks under the dirt
translate: 你用尽全力拉回铲子，成功将铲子从泥土下的东西中挣脱出来

original: Swinging wildly, you pummel the ground and walk away hoping you’ve seen the last of whatever lurks underneath this orchard
translate: 你挥舞着铲子，猛烈地击打地面，希望已经摆脱了下面的什么东西

original: Arriving at the third hole you feel an unease grow in your stomach
translate: 到达第三个洞穴时，你感到胃里涌起了一股不安

original: Carefully, you bend down and try to peer into the small, dark burrow
translate: 谨慎地，你弯下腰，试图窥视那个狭小黑暗的鼹鼠洞

original: To your horror, something glances back
translate: 令你惊恐的是，有什么东西回望你

original: A pair of eyes that appear far too intelligent than an animal has any right to be
translate: 一对远远超过动物应有的智慧的眼睛

original: Then, in an instance they are gone - retreated underground
translate: 然后，它们在一瞬间消失，退回到了地下

original: Perhaps your mind is playing tricks on you?
translate: 也许是你在胡思乱想？

original: You decide to not wait and find out and with a slight hint of panic, you utterly demolish the hole
translate: 你决定不等，直接摧毁那个洞穴，带着一丝恐慌

original: Your task is done and you should return to Ari
translate: 你的任务完成了，你应该返回艾瑞

original: You come across a freshly dug hole in the ground
translate: 你发现地面上有一个新挖的洞

original: Dig out the burrow
translate: 塌陷这个鼹鼠洞

original: #FirgolQuestOver
translate: #FirgolQuestOver

original: As you leave the grounds of the accursed manor, your head spins and nausea overcomes you
translate: 当你离开那个可诅咒庄园的范围时，你的头开始晕眩，恶心感涌上心头

original: The things you have seen linger in your mind like the after-images of some alien sun burned into your eyes
translate: 你所见到的一切在你的脑海中挥之不去，如同某些外星太阳在你眼中烙下的幻影

original: Try as you might you will neither be able to exorcize the memories, nor ever make sense of them
translate: 尽管你努力尝试，也无法驱散这些记忆，也无法理解它们的意义

original: Embla puts her hand on your shoulder
translate: 伊姆拉把手放在你的肩膀上

original: Are you alright?
translate: 你还好吧？

original: Somewhere, Kat alternates between crying and retching
translate: somewhere, 凯特在哭泣和干呕之间交替

original: I don't think I'll be 'alright' ever again
translate: 我再也不觉得我会‘好’起来

original: I suspect none of us ever will
translate: 我怀疑我们 none of us 也不会

original: The Dragon spreads its poison unto all the things it touches
translate: 那条龙将它的毒素施加在它所触及的一切事物上

original: There is nowhere safe
translate: 没有安全的地方

original: Not even this tiny little village
translate: 即使是这个小小的村庄也不例外

original: Now more than ever, I am certain that the only way forward is to the very heart of darkness
translate: 现在比以往任何时候都更确定，唯一的出路就是直面最黑暗的心脏

original: To Gradla and the Black Priory
translate: 直达格拉和黑修道院

original: Embla helps you up
translate: 伊姆拉帮你站起来

original: Indeed it would seem there is no going back
translate: 的确，似乎已经没有回头路了

original: #FirgolWeaverScene
translate: #FirgolWeaverScene

original: A young maiden stands looking at a pile of white canvas cloth
translate: 一个年轻的少女站在那里，凝视着一堆白色的帆布

original: She sighs deeply and appears to be lost in deep thought
translate: 她深深地叹了口气，似乎陷入了沉思

original: Is something wrong?
translate: 有什么不对劲吗？

original: Oh, I didn’t see you there
translate: 哦，我没看到你在那里

original: I’m sorry if I seem rude but I’d rather just be left alone
translate: 如果我显得粗鲁，我向你道歉，我宁愿独自一人

original: She offers a weak but apologetic smile
translate: 她勉强露出一个歉意的微笑

original: Camilla’s eyes tear up
translate: 卡米拉的眼睛湿润了

original: I’m
translate: 我是

original: I’m so ashamed
translate: 我如此羞愧

original: The Baroness was so kind to think of me for making the backdrops for their ‘surprise’
translate: 那位女伯爵如此善良地想到我，为他们的‘惊喜’制作背景

original: I thought I could do it
translate: 我以为我能做到

original: I have the canvases and everything
translate: 我有画布和其他一切

original: All she asked was that I paint her a ‘wondrous vista’
translate: 她只请求我为她画一幅‘奇妙的风景’

original: But I can’t bring myself to make the first stroke
translate: 但我无法让自己做出第一笔

original: Why not?
translate: 为什么呢？

original: Camilla blushes
translate: 卡米拉脸红了

original: I'm lost
translate: 我迷失了

original: My head, My heart
translate: 我的头脑，我的心灵

original: There’s a girl, Cass, and I have… feelings for her
translate: 有一个女孩，卡斯，我…对她有感觉

original: It was from a distance but I felt like there was something there
translate: 是从远处，但我感觉那里有某种东西

original: Me being me, I didn’t have the nerve to go talk to her
translate: 就是我这个样子，我没有勇气去和她说话

original: Instead I left a note for her explaining my feelings
translate: 相反，我给她留下了一张纸条，解释了我的感受

original: And then?
translate: 然后呢？

original: Nothing at all
translate: 一无所有

original: I’m just stupid and plain
translate: 我只是愚钝平凡

original: I write like a pig - How could I ever think my stupid note could sway someone like Cass
translate: 我写的像猪一样糟糕 - 我怎么可能认为我的愚蠢便条能让卡斯改变主意

original: Tears stream down Camilla’s face
translate: 卡米拉的眼泪顺着脸颊流下

original: She has such a way with words
translate: 她的话语中自有魅力

original: A bard, she is
translate: 她是一位吟游诗人

original: And me?
translate: 而我呢？

original: I’m just simple, plain, and common
translate: 我只是简单、平凡、普通

original: What if I talked to Cass for you?
translate: 如果我替你去找卡斯呢？

original: You would do that for me?
translate: 你会为我这样做？

original: I suppose it would let me know one way or another
translate: 这样至少能让我知道结果

original: But please, try to be subtle about it
translate: 但请尽量委婉一些

original: Don’t let her know I’m besides myself thinking about her
translate: 不要让她察觉我在为她神魂颠倒

original: She draws in a deep breath and her mood appears to lift ever so slightly
translate: 她深吸了一口气，情绪似乎微微好转

original: Cass is a free spirit and she loves the water
translate: 卡斯是一个自由的灵魂，她热爱水

original: I’d look for her along the small creek that runs west of here
translate: 我会在西边的小溪旁寻找她

original: Thank you so much for offering to help
translate: 谢谢你愿意帮忙

original: I'll return when I have news
translate: 我会在有消息时回来

original: Well, since you offered to help I would really appreciate it if you talked to Cass for me
translate: 既然你愿意帮忙，我真的希望你能替我去找卡斯

original: I need to know if she got my note and what her feelings are for me
translate: 我需要知道她是否收到了我的便条以及她对我的感情

original: Just look for her along the creek west of the village
translate: 只需在村庄西边的小溪旁寻找她

original: Camilla goes pale
translate: 卡米拉的脸色变得苍白

original: What… what did she say?
translate: 什么……她说什么了？

original: She doesn’t fancy me, right?
translate: 她不对我有意，对吧？

original: I just know it!
translate: 我就知道！

original: She asked me to give you this
translate: 她让我把这个给你

original: She accepts the note and slowly unfolds it
translate: 她接过纸条，缓缓展开

original: As she consumes the song, line by line, her eyes water and her hands tremble
translate: 当她逐行品味着歌声时，泪水在她眼中打转，双手也开始颤抖

original: By the end, she has to tear her eyes away from it
translate: 最后，她不得不将目光从纸条上移开

original: Such words
translate: 这样的言语

original: I’ve never read such words
translate: 我从未读过如此言语

original: Was there more?
translate: 还有更多吗？

original: Did she say anything?
translate: 她说了什么吗？

original: She told me she wanted to dance with you at the Carnivale
translate: 她告诉我她想在狂欢节上与你共舞

original: Camilla covers her mouth, smiling through tears of joy
translate: 卡米拉捂住嘴，泪水在笑容中闪烁

original: She then blinks a few times as if remembering something
translate: 然后她眨了几下眼睛，仿佛想起了什么

original: The backdrops for the Baroness!
translate: 伯爵夫人的背景！

original: I see it so clearly now
translate: 现在我看得一清二楚了

original: Cass’ song
translate: 凯斯的歌声

original: Oh, this will be amazing!
translate: 哦，这将太棒了！

original: Glad I could help!
translate: 很高兴能帮到你！

original: And now, if you’ll excuse me, I have to get to work
translate: 现在，我得去工作了，如果你不介意的话。

original: I’d rather you not see the result until at the Carnivale
translate: 等到嘉年华会上再看结果会更有震撼力！

original: It’ll be more impressive that way!
translate: 这样会更有震撼力！

original: Camilla smiles a secretive smile and grabs a ream of canvas and a pot of paint before hastily walking off
translate: 卡米拉神秘地笑了笑，拿起一叠画布和一罐颜料，匆匆走开了。

original: What about the quest?
translate: 关于任务呢？

original: I've talked to Cass
translate: 我和卡斯谈过了。

original: Hello again
translate: 再见了。

original: Camilla smiles timidly
translate: 卡米拉怯生生地笑了笑。

original: Oh, I’ve said too much
translate: 哦，我说得太多了。

original: The Baroness made me promise not to tell
translate: 那位女伯爵让我发誓不告诉任何人。

original: Please, you need to ask her if you want to know more
translate: 请，如果你想了解更多，你需要问她。

original: Not that it matters in any case
translate: 事实上，这无关紧要。

original: I’m getting nowhere with this
translate: 我对这个进展得一无所获。

original: She motions to the reams of canvas
translate: 她指了指那些画布。

original: And why is that?
translate: 为什么是这样？

original: # Chapter_4_Overland
translate: # 第四章 地面冒险

original: #GradlaSpotted
translate: # 卡德拉发现了

original: Land ho!
translate: 岸上！

original: sounds the cry from the crows nest
translate: 甲板上的瞭望员喊道

original: Iago offers you a spyglass
translate: Iago给你递来一只望远镜

original: There!
translate: 看！

original: Fogbanks to the north
translate: 北方的雾气

original: Try as you might you will neither be able to exorcise the memories, nor ever make sense of them
translate: 无论你如何努力，都无法驱散这些记忆，也无法理解它们的意义

original: If I remember correctly the coastline is littered with underwater reefs and dangerous to navigate
translate: 如果我记得不错的话，海岸线布满了水下暗礁，航行非常危险

original: I fear we cannot follow it without being forced into deeper waters and within grasp of the Behemoth
translate: 我担心我们如果不深入水域，就会被那头Behemoth发现

original: Embla, what now?
translate: 伊姆布拉，接下来怎么办？

original: Embla closes her eyes for a moment as if recalling some distant memory
translate: 伊姆布拉闭上眼睛，仿佛在回忆某个遥远的记忆

original: The Priory lies on the plateau of the mountain chain that dominates Gradla’s inland
translate: 僧院位于格拉达内陆山脉的山脊上

original: As far as I know, the Cabal expedition landed at a small mining-village called Adler’s Helm and proceeded from there
translate: 据我所知，卡巴尔探险队在名为阿德勒之盔的小采矿村登陆，并从那里出发

original: Iago, what do you recommend?
translate: Iago，你有什么建议？

original: Iago carefully scans the emerging shoreline
translate: Iago仔细扫描着逐渐显露的海岸线

original: I suspect we will not be able to reach Adler’s Helm without exposing ourselves to the dangers of the high seas
translate: 我怀疑我们如果不冒险穿越大海的危险，就无法到达阿德勒之盔

original: If you are to reach the village, you must land on the southern shore and then travel overland
translate: 如果你要到达那个村庄，就必须在南岸登陆，然后徒步前往

original: Let's make landfall!
translate: 让我们靠岸吧！

original: #GradlaSpottedVulcano
translate: #格拉达发现火山

original: Ahead, a volcanic peaks of mount Karaban rises steeply
translate: 前方，卡拉巴恩山陡峭的火山峰峦耸立

original: It lies there like some giant of titanic proportions that is thankfully still asleep
translate: 它静静地躺在那里，仿佛一位巨人，好在它仍然沉睡未醒

original: If it were to awaken however
translate: 然而，如果它真的苏醒过来

original: You shudder at the thought, thankful that your journey takes you in a different direction
translate: 你想到这一点不禁打了个寒颤，庆幸自己的旅程带你走向了另一个方向

original: #OverlandEnterBadland
translate: #穿越恶劣地形进入

original: Katabatic winds howl through the valley
translate: 涅斯托风在山谷中呼啸而过

original: To the north, great snow-covered peaks loom over you like the ramparts of some great, cosmic fortress
translate: 向北，巨大的雪山矗立在你面前，如同某个伟大宇宙要塞的城墙

original: Embla leans in and shouts over the wind
translate: 伊姆布拉凑近喊道，声音被风吹散

original: These are the interior mountains!
translate: 这是内陆山脉！

original: We must find a way to ascend them to reach the plateau and the Priory!
translate: 我们必须找到一条途径，攀登上去，抵达高原和修道院！

original: And we'll find that in Adler's Helm?
translate: 而且那就在阿德勒之盔那里？

original: All I know is that the Cabal expedition traveled there, and that means we must too
translate: 我只知道卡巴尔探险队曾去过那里，这意味着我们也必须前往

original: I’m sure once we get there, the way will somehow reveal itself
translate: 我相信一旦我们到达那里，道路会以某种方式显现出来

original: That's a lot to hope for
translate: 这希望实在太多

original: For now, let’s just try to get there in one piece
translate: 对于现在来说，让我们尽量安全抵达那里

original: From what I understand, Adler’s Helm lies somewhere near the north-eastern parts of this mountain-range
translate: 据我所知，阿德勒之盔位于这片山脉东北部的某个地方

original: If we follow its circumference, I believe we’ll eventually arrive there
translate: 如果我们沿着它的边缘行进，我相信最终会到达那里

original: # Chapter_4_Priory
translate: # 第四章 修道院

original: #PrioryCaveAncientRoom
translate: #修道院洞穴古室

original: Like the tons of stone that presses down from above, so does this chamber convey the weight of untold eons
translate: 就像从上方压下的巨石，这个房间也传达着无数年代的重量

original: Rows of embalmed corpses line the wall, sitting in perfect stillness with empty eye-sockets that stare into eternity
translate: 墙边排列着木乃伊般的尸体，它们静坐不动，空洞的眼窝直视着永恒。

original: How long have they been here?
translate: 他们在这里已经多久了？

original: These men and women came here to worship long before the first stone of the Empire was laid
translate: 这些人和女人在帝国第一块石头被铺设之前就已经来到这里崇拜了。

original: Their corpses were already ancient when Gallian landed on Erdahn’s shores
translate: 当加利安登陆厄达恩的海岸时，他们的尸体已经非常古老。

original: A strange thought occurs to you
translate: 一个奇怪的想法出现在你脑海中。

original: These corpses are ‘dreaming’
translate: 这些尸体在‘做梦’。

original: Waiting and dreaming
translate: 等待和做梦。

original: Waiting on what?
translate: 等待什么呢？

original: They… are ‘dreaming’
translate: 他们……在‘做梦’。

original: You turn and realize it was Kat who spoke
translate: 你转身发现是卡特在说话。

original: She looks surprised
translate: 她看起来很惊讶。

original: I don’t know why I said that
translate: 我不知道自己为什么会这么说。

original: The thought just came to me!
translate: 这个想法突然就冒了出来！

original: But, they ARE dreaming
translate: 但是，他们确实是在做梦。

original: Sharing the Sleeper’s dream
translate: 分享沉睡者的梦境。

original: Waiting for him to return to them
translate: 等待他回来。

original: Where are these thoughts coming from?!
translate: 这些想法是从哪里来的？！

original: Can we please leave?
translate: 我们能离开吗？

original: Yes, let's move
translate: 好的，我们走。

original: #PrioryCaveBossFight
translate: #修道院洞穴首领战斗

original: The strange construct rises menacingly above you
translate: 这个奇怪的机械体高高耸立在你面前，显得十分威吓。

original: As you approach, the fungal growths that cling to it writhe in greedy anticipation - clawing impotently at the portal set into the structure’s side
translate: 你走近时，附着在其上的菌类生长物在贪婪地扭动，徒劳地抓着结构侧面嵌入的门户。

original: You cannot easily discern the material used in its construction nor the hands that made it beyond the fact that there is an aspect about it that makes you think of the artifacts that the Magi sometimes employ
translate: 你难以轻易分辨出它的构造材料，也难以确定是哪双手制造了它，只是隐约觉得它有一种让人联想到法师有时使用的神器的特质。

original: Now, its outer skin is pockmarked and weathered by the shifting of stone over endless millennia
translate: 现在，它的外皮布满了坑洼，历经万世石变的侵蚀。

original: For the briefest moment you see it in your mind's eye, free of stone, moving over a landscape of jagged mountains and jungle-clad hills
translate: 在你脑海中，它暂时摆脱了石质的束缚，穿越着崎岖的山峦和丛林覆盖的丘陵。

original: Great ferns sway in the humid breeze, and in the distance you see great, singing towers
translate: 大型蕨类植物在潮湿的微风中摇曳，远处则矗立着巨大的歌塔。

original: A sudden tremor shakes you out of it
translate: 突然的震动让你从恍惚中清醒过来。

original: This one more violent than the previous ones
translate: 这次的震动比之前的更为强烈。

original: As you reel from the quake, Embla walks past you, moving towards the portal with her hand outstretched like a sleepwalker
translate: 你摇摇晃晃地从地震中站稳，艾姆拉走过了你身旁，像一个梦游者一样伸出手走向门户。

original: The air hums with energy that appears to be emanating from the portal itself
translate: 空气中弥漫着能量，似乎是从门户本身散发出来的。

original: The fungal tentacles begin to thrash wildly in anticipation
translate: 菌类触手开始疯狂地扭动，充满期待。

original: The tremors return, more powerful now, and around you stones fall from the cave’s roof
translate: 地震再次袭来，这次更为强烈，周围的岩石从洞顶掉落。

original: Embla, wait!
translate: 艾姆拉，等等！

original: She does not hear you and before you can grab her, she has touched the door
translate: 她没有听到你的呼喊，在你抓到她之前，她已经触碰到了门。

original: The effect is instant
translate: 效果立刻显现。

original: Strangely shaped glyphs set into the portal begin to glow with a light so bright it’s nearly blinding
translate: 嵌入门户的奇异符文开始发出几乎令人失明的光芒。

original: An undulating vibration that you feel in your bones rises and echoes through the cave and for a moment it sounds as if someone, or something is howling madly
translate: 一种让你感到骨骼震动的波动升起并回响在洞穴中，仿佛有人或什么东西在疯狂地嚎叫。

original: Then sudden silence
translate: 然后是突然的寂静。

original: What was
translate: 现在是什么

original: Before you can finish your sentence, the ground again shakes violently, knocking you to the ground
translate: 在你还没来得及说完这句话，地面再次剧烈震动，将你摔到了地上。

original: Rocks and debris explode outwards from the center of the cave and an inhuman roar so loud it causes your ears to bleed emits from the horror that emerges into the cave
translate: 洞穴中心的岩石和碎片向外爆裂，那是一种非人的咆哮声，震耳欲聋，以至于你的耳膜都感到疼痛，随之而来的是一只恐怖生物从洞穴中浮现。

original: Bursting forth from the depths below, it towers above you
translate: 它从下方的深渊中冲出，高高耸立在你面前。

original: A squirming mass of untold millions of strands of fungal growths animated into a gigantic, mawed worm-horror
translate: 一团蠕动着的菌类生长物组成的巨大生物，无数的菌丝在其中舞动，形成了一只巨大的口器怪。

original: Tentacles thrash wildly with enough force to break rock as the abomination claws its way out of the emergence hole and towards you
translate: 触手疯狂地挥舞，力量之大足以将岩石撕裂，怪物用这些触手从裂口处爬出，向你逼近。

original: Embedded into its roiling half-flesh are the forms and faces of men
translate: 它半是血肉的躯体中嵌入了人类的形态和面孔。

original: You know with certainty that these are indeed the final members of the Cabal expedition
translate: 你确信无疑，这些正是卡巴尔探险队的最后成员。

original: Stagger to your feet
translate: 你踉跄着站起身。

original: The creature lumbers towards you, emitting yet another terrible scream
translate: 这个怪物向你蹒跚而来，发出又一声可怕的尖叫。

original: Your heart sinks as you set to receive the charge
translate: 你的心沉了下去，准备迎接即将到来的冲击。

original: From around you echoes dozens of replies as its smaller siblings are called forth to the feast
translate: 四周回响着数十声回应，它的幼小兄弟们被召唤来参加这场盛宴。

original: #PrioryCaveSpottedShip
translate: #Priori洞穴发现船只

original: The cave expands into a vast chamber littered by the remains of what you deem to be the final resting-place of the Cabal expedition to the Black Priory
translate: 洞穴逐渐扩大成一个巨大的房间，满地散落着你认为是卡巴尔探险队在黑神殿最后的遗骸。

original: Large quantities of stone and dirt have been shifted in what appears like an attempt to excavate… what?
translate: 有大量的石块和泥土被移动过，似乎是在试图挖掘……到底是什么？

original: Your eyes strain in an attempt to make sense of the structure partially protruding from the rock
translate: 你努力地试图理解从岩石中半露出来的建筑结构。

original: Your mind reels at the thought that whatever this is, it must have been placed here thousands, nay, hundreds of thousands of years ago
translate: 你难以置信，这个东西显然被放置在这里数千年，甚至数百万年。

original: What’s more, despite seeing just a small segment of the structure, you feel certain that whatever is buried here is vast
translate: 更重要的是，尽管只看到了建筑的一小部分，你确信被埋藏在这里的东西是巨大的。

original: We’re here!
translate: 我们到了！

original: We’ve made it!
translate: 我们成功了！

original: All these years, this is what was buried under the Priory
translate: 所有这些年来，这就是被黑神殿掩埋的东西。

original: This is where the Sleeper awaits!
translate: 这里就是沉睡者等待的地方！

original: Emblas voice trembles like a prisoner who senses that freedom is finally within reach
translate: 埃姆布拉斯的声音颤抖着，仿佛一个感觉到自由终于触手可及的囚犯

original: T-this thing
translate: 这……东西

original: It cannot exist
translate: 它不可能存在

original: It should not!
translate: 它本不应该存在！

original: Who can build something like this?
translate: 谁能建造出这样的东西？

original: Driina’s voice is the closest to panic you’ve ever heard her
translate: 德里娜的声音几乎是你听过的最接近恐慌的

original: This is the very heart of madness itself
translate: 这就是疯狂本身的核心

original: Roland whispers to himself
translate: 洛兰德自言自语

original: The sleeper awaits
translate: 睡眠者在等待

original: #PrioryDreamChamber
translate: #修道院梦境室

original: I think the monks came down here to commune with him using those machines
translate: 我想，武僧们是用那些机器与他沟通下来的

original: Dreaming his dreams
translate: 在梦中体验他的梦境

original: You walk over to the shaft and peer down it
translate: 你走到竖井旁，向下望去

original: There is no end in sight
translate: 没有尽头

original: Whatever lies at the bottom, lies far below this level of the catacombs
translate: 无论竖井底部有什么，都远远超出了这层地穴的范围

original: The octagonal room has four throne-like machines arranged around a central aperture
translate: 八角形的房间中，四台类似王座的机器围绕着中央的一个开口排列

original: Thick, squirming tentacles spew forth from the shaft, and you can’t help but wonder where it terminates
translate: 厚重、蠕动的触手从竖井中喷涌而出，你不禁好奇它到底延伸到了哪里

original: A strange humming can be felt, rather than heard, coming from the center of the room
translate: 中心位置传来一种奇怪的嗡鸣声，而不是声音

original: Examine the machines
translate: 检查这些机器

original: Though no doubt some form of arcane machinery, it’s beyond your ken and you feel loath to examine it further
translate: 虽然毫无疑问是某种法术机械，但你对此一窍不通，也不愿进一步探究

original: Leaning in, you examine the indentation further and notice inlays of pure sylver radiating out from where the user’s skull would be
translate: 你凑近仔细查看，注意到这些凹槽中嵌入着纯净的银色，它们从使用者头骨所在的位置向外辐射开来

original: You follow the inlays, and find that they seem to converge towards the room’s central shaft
translate: 你顺着这些嵌入物追踪，发现它们似乎都汇聚向房间中央的竖井

original: Intricately wrought in a complex design that appears more like machinery than decoration, each throne has an indentation that would accommodate a human figure
translate: 每个王座都精雕细琢，设计复杂，看起来更像是机械装置而非装饰，每个王座上都有一个凹槽，可以容纳一个人的身形

original: If you were to guess, you’d say that this machinery somehow attunes and connects the user to Reticular vibrations emanating from the shaft
translate: 如果要猜测，你可能会说这些机械装置 somehow 调和并连接使用者与竖井中发出的 Reticular 振动

original: As to what is generating those vibrations
translate: 至于这些振动是由什么产生的

original: Could it be the holy corpse?
translate: 这具圣灵之躯可能是罪魁祸首吗？

original: #PrioryDungeonAmbush1
translate: #PrioriDungeonAmbush1

original: As you enter the hall, a mass of misshapen flesh and slavering jaws spill forth from shadows and darkened side-passages!
translate: 当你进入大厅时，一团畸形的肉块和流涎的利齿从阴影和黑暗的侧通道中涌出！

original: You can’t help but think that the glistening and slimy horrors before you look as if they were birthed into existence recently
translate: 你不禁想到，眼前的这些闪耀着光泽、黏滑的恐怖生物似乎是刚刚诞生的

original: No doubt they are now ravenously hungry
translate: 毫无疑问，它们现在饥肠辘辘

original: #PrioryDungeonAmbush2
translate: #PrioriDungeonAmbush2

original: Forces pull at you - driving you inexorably forwards
translate: 力量在拉扯你，驱使你不可阻挡地前进

original: You are, you are no doubt, nearing something
translate: 你确信，你正接近某样东西

original: What’s wrong?
translate: 有什么不对劲吗？

original: Why do we stop?
translate: 为什么我们停下？

original: Embla asks impatiently
translate: 伊姆拉不耐烦地问道

original: I have a strange feeling
translate: 我有种奇怪的感觉

original: A feeling we’re being watched!
translate: 我觉得有人在注视着我们！

original: snarls Roland as he turns to face the amorphous eye-things that glide silently down from the ceiling to prey upon you!
translate: 罗兰怒吼着转身面对从天花板上无声滑下的那些无形眼球生物，它们正准备猎杀你们！

original: Before you can finish the thought, movement catches your eye and you whirl around to face the amorphous eye-things that glide silently down from the ceiling to prey upon you!
translate: 你还没来得及说完这句话，就看到有动静，猛地转身面对从天花板上无声滑下的那些无形眼球生物，它们正准备猎杀你们！

original: #PrioryDungeonDarkness
translate: #修道院地牢黑暗

original: Our path takes us into peerless darkness then?
translate: 我们的路将带我们进入无与伦比的黑暗？

original: Iben rubs his chin thoughtfully
translate: 伊本摸着下巴，沉思着

original: We’ve survived countless horrors thus far but I dare say, we must keep our wits about us now and proceed with the utmost caution
translate: 我们到目前为止已经经历了无数恐怖的事物，但我敢说，我们现在必须保持警惕，行事要极其谨慎

original: I can think of few fates worse than being lost and waylaid in this morass of darkness
translate: 我能想到比在这片黑暗沼泽中迷失更糟糕的下场

original: You must keep your wits about you if you are to proceed
translate: 你必须保持警惕，才能继续前进

original: Take all precautions not to lose your way and ensure all possible preparations are made before you set forth
translate: 一定要采取所有预防措施，以免迷路，并确保在出发前做好所有可能的准备

original: The tunnel ahead is ancient, narrow and dark
translate: 前方的隧道古老、狭窄且黑暗

original: Walking down it, you cannot help but feel as if you are descending into some deeper abyss - far more ancient than the Priory and reluctant to give up its mysteries
translate: 走在其中，你不禁会感到自己正在向下深入某个更古老的深渊——远比修道院古老，且不愿放弃它的秘密

original: Nonetheless, you also cannot help but feel as if you are once more being pulled forwards
translate: 然而，你也无法抑制自己向前迈进的感觉

original: Something awaits you at the other end of these tunnels and it’s beckoning for you to proceed
translate: 这些隧道尽头等待着你，它在召唤你继续前进

original: You feel it too now don’t you?
translate: 你也感到了吗？

original: Embla attempts to peer into the darkness ahead
translate: 埃姆拉试图窥视前方的黑暗

original: This is the way
translate: 这条路是对的

original: The tomb-chamber was never what the Priory was built to protect
translate: 坟墓室从来不是修道院建造来保护的

original: There must be even older mysteries below
translate: 一定有更古老的秘密隐藏在下面

original: I suspect many of the monks themselves didn’t know of this
translate: 我怀疑许多僧侣自己都不知道这一点

original: Perhaps initiates offered praise to a false tomb for centuries while the Grandmasters kept the lie?
translate: 或许是初学者向一个虚假的坟墓祈祷了几个世纪，而大师们却在隐瞒真相？

original: Let's move onwards then
translate: 那么，我们继续前进吧

original: Not to interrupt your theosophic ramblings but there’s something you might want to see {PLAYER}
translate: 不要打断你的玄学沉思，但你可能想看看这里 __PLACEHOLDER_0__

original: Kat has walked up to the edge of the light and is carefully extending her arm into the darkness
translate: 卡特走到光的边缘，小心翼翼地将手臂伸向黑暗之中

original: The darkness will not yield to the light
translate: 黑暗不会被光明所驱散

original: It’s as thick as tar
translate: 黑暗如同沥青一般浓厚

original: Some kind of ward perhaps?
translate: 或许是一种防护法术？

original: I suspect we’ll need to navigate these tunnels blindly
translate: 我怀疑我们必须盲目地穿越这些隧道

original: You walk up to the edge of the light and realize that the darkness does not appear to lift no matter how much light is present
translate: 你走到光的边缘，发现无论光线有多强，黑暗似乎都不会消散

original: The tunnels appear to be kept in some kind of perpetual darkness and it seems you must navigate them blindly
translate: 这些隧道似乎一直处于一种永恒的黑暗之中，看来我们必须盲目地穿越它们

original: #PrioryDungeonGong
translate: #修道院地牢钟

original: You strike the gong a third time but as you utter the last name, the note sounds foul and discordant
translate: 当你第三次敲击钟时，说出最后一个名字时，钟声听起来十分刺耳且不和谐

original: Whatever you did you suspect it was somehow wrong
translate: 你怀疑自己做错了什么

original: Perhaps you should start over?
translate: 或许你应该重新开始？

original: A large, gilded gong that no doubt must have served some kind of ceremonial purpose
translate: 一个巨大的镀金钟，毫无疑问曾用于某种仪式

original: Etched into it in fine lettering is the following text
translate: 钟面上用细小的字体刻着以下文字

original: He who wishes to pass so bold, Speak the names of masters of old!
translate: 敢于通过者，请说出古贤之名！

original: And before the sleeper he beseech, Shall offer up a strike for each!
translate: 在沉睡者面前，恳求者需为每一下钟声献上一击！

original: Ring the Gong
translate: 敲响钟声

original: You speak the name
translate: 你说出名字

original: Strike again and say the name 'Rothrax'
translate: 再敲一下并说出名字“罗特拉克斯”

original: Strike again and say the name 'Carroleth'
translate: 再敲一下并说出名字“卡罗莱斯”

original: Strike again and say the name 'Kalamar'
translate: 再敲一下并说出名字“卡拉马尔”

original: You strike again and speak the second name
translate: 你再次挥击，并说出第二个名字

original: You strike the gong with the mallet and a pure, deep note reverberates through the complex
translate: 你用木槌敲击铜钟，清脆而深沉的声音在复杂的建筑中回荡

original: Say the name 'Rothrax'
translate: 说出名字“Rothrax”

original: Say the name 'Carroleth'
translate: 说出名字“Carroleth”

original: Say the name 'Kalamar'
translate: 说出名字“Kalamar”

original: You strike the gong with whatever is at hand and a dull note emanates from it
translate: 你随手敲击铜钟，发出沉闷的声音

original: You suspect only striking it with the correct tool will produce a proper note
translate: 你怀疑只有用正确的工具敲击才能发出正确的音符

original: You ring the gong a third time and speaks the last name
translate: 你第三次敲击铜钟，并说出最后一个名字

original: The sound echoes more strongly than before through the catacombs and the grinding of stones can be heard in the room ahead
translate: 声音比之前更强烈地回荡在墓穴中，前方的房间里传来了石块摩擦的声音

original: Whatever you did, you suspect it was the right thing
translate: 你怀疑自己做的是正确的

original: #PrioryDungeonPitTrap
translate: #修道院地牢陷阱

original: With a mechanical click, the floor gives way under your
translate: 机械的咔嗒声响起，地面在你脚下塌陷

original: Your short drop is arrested by the vicious spikes that cover the floor of the pit
translate: 你从坑底被尖锐的刺覆盖的地板上摔落，但被尖刺阻止了下坠

original: Your adventure has come to an end
translate: 你的冒险到此为止

original: #PrioryDungeonSpottenTomb
translate: #修道院地牢斑点墓穴

original: Embla points through the passage to the north
translate: Embla 指向北边的通道

original: A golden tomb!
translate: 一座金色的墓穴！

original: We must be close now
translate: 我们现在应该很接近了

original: Finally we shall know!
translate: 终于，我们将会知道真相！

original: What do we do if you're right?
translate: 如果你是对的，我们该怎么办？

original: I do not know
translate: 我不知道

original: But the answers will reveal themselves to us when we stand before the glorious corpse
translate: 但答案会在我们站在那辉煌的遗体前时揭晓

original: I just pray we’re not too late!
translate: 只希望我们还不算太晚！

original: The corpse of an Emperor?
translate: 皇帝的遗体？

original: In a place like this?
translate: 在这样的地方？

original: I refuse to believe it
translate: 我不愿相信

original: #PrioryEnterCave
translate: #PRIORYENTERCAVE

original: The air down here is thick with the metallic smell of ozone and a throbbing ache grows in your teeth
translate: 这里的空气充满了金属般的臭氧味，你的牙齿隐隐作痛

original: Each step down the narrow, winding tunnel takes you deeper and closer to… what?
translate: 每一步都让你在狭窄蜿蜒的隧道中更深入，更接近……什么？

original: But you have come this far, and you cannot help but feel a surge of determination at being so close to the end of your search
translate: 但你们已经走到了这一步，无法不感到一种接近终点的决然

original: It is so close now
translate: 现在就快到了

original: The call is almost too much to bear
translate: 这种召唤几乎让人无法承受

original: Embla touches her forehead and for a moment seems to sway
translate: 伊姆拉触碰额头，似乎有片刻的摇晃

original: Are you unwell?
translate: 你身体不适吗？

original: But there is but one way to cure it now
translate: 但现在只有一条路可走

original: We must proceed
translate: 我们必须继续前进

original: Embla straightens
translate: 伊姆拉挺直了身子

original: Driina’s eyes narrow
translate: 德里娜的眼神变得锐利

original: This place is not for us
translate: 这不是我们的地方

original: The deeper we go, the further I feel we are from the Golden Light
translate: 越往深处走，我感觉离金色光芒越远

original: We must go on!
translate: 我们必须继续前进！

original: Surely, we must go on?
translate: 当然，我们必须继续前进吗？

original: Iben insists with an uncharacteristic intensity
translate: 伊本以不寻常的强烈语气坚持着

original: We press on
translate: 我们继续前进

original: #PrioryEnterFirstFloor
translate: #PrioriEnterFirstFloor

original: The heavy wooden doors swing open slowly on ancient, rusted hinges and you apprehensively step inside the darkened halls of the grim edifice
translate: 沉重的木门在古老的生锈铰链上缓缓开启，你紧张地迈步走进这阴森建筑的黑暗走廊

original: Inside, you find the air thick with dust and particles of swirling matter and your eyes adjust slowly to the darkness
translate: 内部，空气中弥漫着尘土和旋转的微粒，你的眼睛逐渐适应了黑暗

original: There is more
translate: 还有更多

original: A strange feeling as if something is stirring in anticipation at your arrival
translate: 一种奇怪的感觉，仿佛有什么在期待你的到来而蠢蠢欲动

original: Driina’s voice interrupts your train of thought
translate: 德里娜的声音打断了你的思绪

original: This place is alien to me
translate: 这个地方对我来说很陌生

original: There is nothing here that marks this as an Imperial place of worship
translate: 这里没有任何东西表明这是一个帝国的崇拜场所

original: We must be on our guard
translate: 我们必须保持警惕

original: Embla points ahead
translate: 伊姆拉指向前方

original: Lumerods
translate: 光辉棒

original: They must have been set up by the Cabal expedition
translate: 一定是卡巴尔探险队布置的

original: Perhaps we can find some clue as to what fate befell them?
translate: 或许我们可以找到一些线索，看看他们遭遇了什么命运？

original: I’ll tell you what befell them
translate: 我会告诉你他们遭遇了什么

original: Roland growls
translate: 洛朗低吼道

original: Nothing good, is what
translate: 没有什么好事

original: #PrioryGanglion1
translate: #PrioryGanglion1

original: A large, pulasting sack grows from the side of the fungal infection
translate: 从菌类感染的一侧长出一个巨大的、膨胀的袋子

original: There is something inside it
translate: 里面似乎有什么东西

original: Cut it open
translate: 切开它

original: Leave it
translate: 留着它

original: To your disgust and horror, a rotting corpse riddled with fungi spills forth
translate: 令你作呕和恐惧的是，一个布满菌类的腐烂尸体倾泻而出

original: As it does, it drops a small journal
translate: 尸体倒下时，掉出一本小日记本

original: You pocket the book and move on
translate: 你收起书本，继续前进

original: #PrioryGroundsEnter
translate: #PrioryGroundsEnter

original: You enter the courtyard of the walled priory only to find it eerily quiet and surprisingly temperate
translate: 你进入修道院的庭院，发现这里异常寂静，而且出奇地温暖

original: Not even in Vauul are the Imperial gardens still heated in the winter
translate: 即使在瓦乌尔，帝国的花园在冬天也不会被加热

original: It is a sad thing to see for an Empire that was built on the subjugation of climate by man and magi, no?
translate: 对于一个建立在气候驯服之上的帝国来说，看到这种景象真是悲哀，不是吗？

original: The nearly imperceptible humming felt through the ground tells that an ancient environmental ward is miraculously still active
translate: 地面几乎察觉不到的嗡嗡声表明，一个古老的环境法术奇迹般地仍然活跃着

original: Truly a lost wonder of Imperial magical engineering
translate: 确实是帝国魔法工程中失传的奇迹

original: Strange vegetation bursts out of the ground in grotesque mockeries of trees and writhing tendrils of fleshy pseudopods creep obscenely forth from the well
translate: 奇怪的植被从地面突兀地冒出来，扭曲地模仿着树木，而肉质的伪足贪婪地从井中爬出

original: As you approach, the tentacles creep slowly but greedily in your direction
translate: 你靠近时，触手缓慢但贪婪地向你方向蠕动

original: Driina stomps the nearest tendril
translate: Driina 踹了最近的一根触手

original: That blasted infestation seems to grow like a cancer throughout these isles!
translate: 那该死的感染似乎在这片群岛中像癌症一样蔓延！

original: Wherever we set foot, we find it festering in some dark corner
translate: 无论我们走到哪里，都能在某个阴暗的角落里发现它在腐烂

original: she spits in disgust
translate: 她厌恶地吐了一口唾沫

original: Mesmerized, you allow it to slowly begin winding up your leg
translate: 你被迷住了，任由它缓缓缠上你的腿

original: A wave of disgust washes over you to snap you out of your reverie and you hurriedly step away
translate: 一股厌恶感涌上心头，将你从沉思中唤醒，你急忙退开

original: Embla, what is that thing?
translate: 伊姆布拉，那是什么东西？

original: It’s the fungi from outside
translate: 那是外面的真菌

original: It infests Warda, growing through the veil and into the very matter of the world
translate: 它侵袭着沃达，穿过屏障，深入世界的本质

original: Her voice drops to a whisper
translate: 她的声音几乎变成了耳语

original: It’s the herald of the Dragon
translate: 它是龙的使者

original: The tentacles squirm with increased fervor at the very mention of that blasted name
translate: 一提到那个该死的名字，触手便更加剧烈地蠕动

original: Stop it!
translate: 停下！

original: Embla seems frozen in fear for a moment before she nods weakly in agreement
translate: 伊姆布拉似乎在恐惧中僵住了片刻，然后无力地点了点头

original: You both feel it
translate: 你们俩都感到了

original: The horrid certainty that seven terrible eyes are now fixed on you
translate: 那七只可怕的双眼如今正盯着你们

original: Driina grabs your arm, her face a determined mask
translate: 德里娜抓住你的胳膊，她的脸上带着决然的表情

original: There are some things we must not discuss here
translate: 有些事情我们在这里不能讨论

original: #PrioryInteriorAmbush
translate: #修道院内突袭

original: As you pass through the ancient library, you cannot help but be awestruck by the number and age of the assembled volumes
translate: 当你穿过古老的图书馆时，不禁被汇集于此的书籍数量和年代所震撼

original: Surely there are texts here that exist nowhere else in the Empire
translate: 一定有在这里存在的文本，整个帝国都找不到

original: It’s a melancholy thought
translate: 这是一个令人伤感的想法

original: This priory is a time-capsule to an age that is long past and you cannot help but linger for a moment on all that has been lost over the long centuries of steady decline
translate: 这个修道院是时光胶囊，封存着远去时代的记忆，你不禁在漫长的世纪衰退中驻足，缅怀那些已经失去的一切

original: You draw out a random volume and examine it: ‘On the Reticular Properties of Salts’
translate: 你抽出一本随机的书籍，仔细端详：《关于盐的网状性质》

original: As you turn the beautifully bound volume over in your hands, you stop
translate: 当你手中翻转着这本精美装订的书籍时，你停下了动作。

original: Did you just see something move in the shadows?
translate: 你刚看到阴影中有什么东西在动吗？

original: You squint into the darkness and see only rows and rows of books
translate: 你眯起眼睛望向黑暗，只见一排排书籍。

original: Then, you see it again
translate: 然后，你又看到了。

original: It’s as if reality itself ripples
translate: 就好像现实本身在波动。

original: To your horror you realize that you are surrounded by a pack of some kind of chameleonic horrors!
translate: 你惊恐地意识到，自己被某种变色恐怖生物包围了！

original: #PrioryInteriorSpottedCamp
translate: #修道院内部分布营地

original: Crates of supplies, camp equipment and mining gear litter this room
translate: 这个房间散落着装有补给的箱子、营地装备和采矿工具。

original: It appears you’ve found the Cabal expedition’s base-camp
translate: 看来你们找到了卡巴尔探险队的基地营地。

original: I wonder what happened to them all?
translate: 想必他们究竟发生了什么？

original: Kat muses
translate: 凯特沉思道。

original: and what they left behind
translate: 以及他们留下了什么。

original: She absent-mindedly kicks an empty sack
translate: 她漫不经心地踢了一个空袋子。

original: The camp appears abandoned in a hurry and you wonder if the expedition may have left behind clues as to their fate
translate: 这个营地似乎匆忙撤离，你们猜测探险队可能留下了关于他们命运的线索。

original: Your eyes fall on the floor
translate: 你的目光落在地板上。

original: It’s covered by an intricate mosaic so life-like in its execution that the figures seem to shift
translate: 地板上铺着一幅精美的镶嵌图案，执行得如此逼真，以至于人物似乎在移动。

original: You stand mesmerized
translate: 你被深深吸引。

original: Embla hisses
translate: 伊姆拉嘶声道。

original: Did you hear something?
translate: 你听到什么了吗？

original: Look here
translate: 过来看看。

original: The floor
translate: 地板

original: Drinna walks into the chamber, kicking away dust from the intricate mosaic that is laid out before you
translate: 德林娜走进房间，踢开你面前精细镶嵌的图案地砖上的尘土

original: The imagery, there’s something wrong with it
translate: 图案中有些不对劲

original: Shh!
translate: 小声点！

original: Embla interrupts
translate: 埃姆拉打断了

original: Out of the shadows, grotesque forms lumber towards you
translate: 从阴影中，扭曲的形体向你缓缓逼近

original: These are not the desiccated forms of the ancient dead but fresh corpses swollen with squirming tentacles of the Fungi from Outside
translate: 这些不是古代亡者的干瘪遗体，而是充满蠕动触手的外来菌类膨胀的新鲜尸体

original: I’d wager we’ve found the expedition’s members!
translate: 我打赌我们找到了探险队的成员！

original: Roland snarls as he braces to receive the onslaught
translate: 罗兰怒吼着准备迎接即将到来的攻击

original: I seems you’ve found the expedition’s members
translate: 看来你们找到了探险队的成员

original: #PrioryOpenFakeTomb
translate: #修道院开启假墓

original: A cursory examination of the area reveals nothing
translate: 对该区域进行粗略检查，未发现任何异常

original: Nonetheless, your instinct tells you there is something here
translate: 然而，你的直觉告诉你这里隐藏着什么

original: You’ll need to examine the chamber inch by inch
translate: 你们需要仔细检查这个房间的每一个角落

original: You close your eyes and for a moment all is still
translate: 你闭上眼睛，片刻之间，一切归于寂静

original: Then you feel it
translate: 然后你感觉到什么

original: The faintest of drafts seems to be coming from the south-west corner of the chamber
translate: 轻微的气流似乎来自房间的西南角

original: There is no doubt
translate: 毫无疑问

original: There is another way out of here
translate: 这里还有另一条出路

original: My faith in the Golden Dead is unfailing and it screams at me that something here is not as it seems
translate: 我对金色亡灵的信仰坚定不移，它告诉我这里有些事情并不像表面上看起来的那样

original: But we’ve come this far and now that we stand before the tomb I say we get to the bottom of this charade
translate: 但我们已经走到这一步了，现在站在墓前，我说我们要揭开这场闹剧的真相

original: Embla, what about you?
translate: 伊姆布拉，你呢？

original: Open the tomb
translate: 打开墓穴

original: It still becons me
translate: 它依然召唤着我

original: Though… standing here now something feels off
translate: 虽然……现在站在这里，感觉有些不对劲

original: Nonetheless, as I see it there is only one way forward
translate: 不过，依我看，前方只有一条路可走

original: We must open the tomb
translate: 我们必须打开墓穴

original: Driina, how about you?
translate: 德里娜，你呢？

original: The golden tomb stands before you in all its glory
translate: 金色的墓穴矗立在你面前，光彩夺目

original: Have you arrived, at last, at the object of your quest?
translate: 你终于到达了你追寻的目标吗？

original: Embla, what are you thinking?
translate: 伊姆布拉，你在想什么？

original: Driina, what do you think?
translate: 德里娜，你怎么看？

original: It could be worse I suppose
translate: 毕竟，情况可能更糟

original: Kat adds as she pats your shoulder
translate: 卡特边拍着你的肩膀边说道

original: It could have been a trap
translate: 这可能是陷阱

original: But where to now?
translate: 那现在呢？

original: Scanning the room you can’t help but agree with Embla
translate: 扫视着房间，你不禁同意了伊姆布拉的看法

original: There is something about this chamber
translate: 这个房间有些不对劲

original: The taint of ancient secrets
translate: 古老秘密的污迹

original: Suddenly a massive portcullis slams down behind you and to your horror, thick greenish smoke billows into the chamber through unseen apertures
translate: 突然，巨大的吊桥从你身后重重落下，令你惊恐的是，一股浓绿色的烟雾从看不见的开口中涌入房间

original: Oh, that’s not good!
translate: 哦，这可不好！

original: Kat says as her eyes widen in terror
translate: 凯特说这话时，她的眼睛因恐惧而放大

original: If you do not find a way out of here, this will very quickly end up as your tomb as well
translate: 如果你找不到出去的路，这里很快就会变成你的墓穴

original: You brace yourself and push with all your strength but find that the lid slides back easily and locks into position with a slight click
translate: 你屏住呼吸，用尽全力推，却发现盖子滑动得很轻松，并且在轻轻的咔嗒声中锁紧了位置

original: It’s as if the lid has been designed to open and close
translate: 就好像这盖子是专门设计用来开合的

original: Nonetheless, the sarcophagus’ content now lies before you
translate: 不过，现在你面前就躺着木乃伊的遗物

original: Look inside
translate: 查看里面

original: You draw a collective gasp as the content is revealed
translate: 众人齐声倒吸冷气，木乃伊的遗物被揭露了

original: Nothing - The sarcophagus is utterly empty
translate: 没有东西 - 这具木乃伊的棺材完全空无一物

original: Roland’s laughter booms through the tomb
translate: 罗兰的笑声在墓穴中回荡

original: Roland’s laughter booms through the tomb and you can hear Driina offer a whispered prayer of relief
translate: 罗兰的笑声在墓穴中回荡，你可以听到德瑞娜低声祈祷，表达心中的宽慰

original: Embla, somehow, looks less than surprised
translate: 伊姆布拉不知为何，看起来并不怎么惊讶

original: Nothing but dust has ever lain here
translate: 从来只有尘土

original: What is this?
translate: 这是什么？

original: A false tomb
translate: 一个假墓

original: A decoy perhaps?
translate: 或许是个诱饵？

original: Like a chest with a false bottom?
translate: 就像一个有假底的箱子？

original: I suspect the true meaning of this tomb lies deeper than we first suspected
translate: 我怀疑这个墓穴的真实意义比我们最初想象的要深得多

original: Embla muses
translate: 伊姆布拉沉思道

original: There is something we’ve missed
translate: 我们似乎漏掉了什么

original: Some hidden secret
translate: 一些隐藏的秘密

original: #PrioryPuzzleStatue0
translate: #修道院谜题雕像0

original: You slowly rotate the statue until it faces east
translate: 你缓缓转动雕像，直到它面向东方

original: You feel certain the action of rotating this statue is somehow significant but at the moment no wider effect or change can be observed
translate: 你确信转动这座雕像的动作具有某种重要意义，但目前尚未观察到更广泛的影响或变化

original: Rotate statue towards the north
translate: 将雕像朝北方转动

original: Rotate statue towards the east
translate: 将雕像朝东方转动

original: Rotate statue towards the south
translate: 将雕像朝南方转动

original: Rotate statue towards the west
translate: 将雕像朝西方转动

original: You stand before a finely crafted statue of polished stone
translate: 你站在一座精细雕刻的抛光石质雕像前

original: As you examine it more closely, you realize that the statue is mounted on a rotating base
translate: 仔细观察后，你发现这座雕像安装在一个可以转动的底座上

original: With some effort you could turn it to face one of the cardinal directions
translate: 通过一些努力，你可以转动它，使其面向一个基本方向

original: You slowly rotate the statue until it faces north
translate: 你缓缓转动雕像，直到它面向北方

original: You slowly rotate the statue until it faces south
translate: 你缓缓转动雕像，直到它面向南方

original: The ground trembles as the sound of shifting stone reverberates throughout the complex
translate: 地面震动，石头移动的声音在整个建筑群中回响

original: Something large has moved - or perhaps opened?
translate: 有东西移动了——或者可能打开了？

original: You slowly rotate the statue until it faces west
translate: 你缓缓转动雕像，直到它面向西方

original: #PrioryPuzzleStatue1
translate: #修道院谜题雕像1

original: #PrioryPuzzleStatue2
translate: #修道院谜题雕像2

original: #PrioryPuzzleStatue3
translate: #修道院谜题雕像3

original: #PrioryShipEntrance
translate: #修道院船入口

original: As you approach the portal, a humming once more fills the air and strange, arcane sigils light up across its metallic skin
translate: 当你接近传送门时，空气中再次响起嗡嗡声，其金属皮肤上奇异的符文开始闪烁发光

original: As if reinvigorated by the resurgent energies filling the cave, the mangled piles of the fungi-worm things littered around you begin to knit together and reassemble
translate: 就像洞穴中重新涌现的能量让那些被撕碎的地菇怪残骸重新组合起来一样，它们开始重新编织在一起

original: Roland sits slumped against the wall next to you, breathing heavily
translate: 罗兰瘫坐在你旁边的墙上，喘息沉重

original: You best get that door open afore those things come at us again
translate: 你最好赶快把那扇门打开，否则那些东西还会再次攻击我们

original: I don’t think I can hold them for long
translate: 我觉得我撑不了多久

original: Time is running out
translate: 时间所剩无几

original: Tremors once more shake the cave and before your eyes, the gigantic Herald-thing re-knits itself together before rising up to even greater heights than before
translate: 洞穴再次震动，你眼前，那巨大的使者生物重新编织自己，然后比之前还要高大

original: It sways momentarily and then lets out an ear piercing scream
translate: 它摇晃了一下，然后发出刺耳的尖叫

original: Around it, untold multitudes of fresh minor horrors rise forth
translate: 围绕着它，无数新的小恐怖生物纷纷涌现

original: We have to go!
translate: 我们必须走了！

original: Emblas shout cuts through the din
translate: 埃姆拉斯的喊声穿透了嘈杂的声音

original: Run towards the portal
translate: 向传送门跑去

original: The portal shifts
translate: 传送门开始变化

original: Disassembling itself into its component panels like some strange flower opening its petals to welcome the Sun
translate: 它像一朵奇怪的花朵一样分解成它的组件板，张开花瓣迎接阳光

original: Soft, lambent light bathes you as the portal opens, revealing an interior of bizarre geometries and utterly alien proportions
translate: 柔和的光辉笼罩着你，传送门打开，内部是奇异的几何结构和完全陌生的比例

original: An odd thought enters your mind
translate: 一个奇怪的想法进入你的脑海

original: Home
translate: 家

original: Instinctively, you and Embla's hands find each other
translate: 你和埃姆拉的手本能地找到了对方

original: There is no turning back now
translate: 现在没有回头路了

original: The final chapter has begun
translate: 最终篇章已经开启

original: Venture Forth
translate: 出发吧

original: Clasping hands you pull the massive brute to his feet
translate: 握紧双手，你将巨大的野蛮人拉起

original: He winces in pain and a cough sprays blood down his chest
translate: 他痛苦地皱起眉头，一口鲜血喷洒在他的胸膛上

original: Don’t worry about me
translate: 别担心我

original: Roland offers a sad smile
translate: 罗兰露出悲伤的微笑

original: For the first time, you notice the stain bleeding through his tunic and armor
translate: 这是你第一次注意到他衬衣和铠甲下渗出的污渍

original: Surely this is no issue given the right magics?
translate: 给予正确的魔法，这肯定不是问题？

original: Examine the wound
translate: 检查伤口

original: You apprehensively lift his tunic to reveal his abdomen
translate: 你犹豫地抬起他的衬衣，露出他的腹部

original: A large gash rimmed by necrotic skin
translate: 一个巨大的伤口，边缘是腐烂的皮肤

original: And worse yet
translate: 更糟糕的是

original: Pushing out of the wound from within, are thick squirming tentacles
translate: 从伤口内部挤出的是蠕动的厚实触手

original: I think this is as far as I go
translate: 我认为这就到我的极限了

original: Besides, where you’re heading, I suspect you won’t need me
translate: 而且，你要去的地方，我怀疑你不需要我

original: Roland painfully gets to his feet
translate: 罗兰痛苦地站了起来

original: I'm not leaving you!
translate: 我不会丢下你的！

original: Young fool
translate: 年轻的傻瓜

original: I can only buy you seconds
translate: 我只能给你争取几秒的时间

original: Roland clasps the back of your neck and pulls you in until your foreheads touch
translate: 罗兰抓住你的后颈，把你拉近直到额头相触

original: No more words are necessary
translate: 再也没有多余的言语必要了

original: He lifts his weapon and turns, broad-legged and defiant, to face the onslaught of slavering jaws
translate: 他举起武器，大步转身，坚定地面对那排流着口水的利齿

original: Roland!
translate: 罗兰！

original: The soft touch of Embla’s hand on your elbow snaps you out of it
translate: 伊姆拉的手轻轻搭在你的胳膊上，让你回过神来

original: {PLAYER}, we have to go
translate: {PLACEHOLDER_0}，我们必须走了

original: Don’t let his sacrifice be for naught!
translate: 别让他的牺牲白费了！

original: # Chapter_4_TowerOfAsh
translate: # 第4章 灰烬之塔

original: #CaliperoScene
translate: # 卡利佩罗场景

original: My loyal apprentices
translate: 我忠诚的学徒们

original: Their joy in life is to serve
translate: 他们生活的乐趣在于服务

original: And they do serve me well, don’t you think?
translate: 而他们也确实很好地服侍着我，不是吗？

original: He pats one of them on the cheek only to have the man’s nose start bleeding profusely
translate: 他拍了拍其中一个人的脸颊，结果那人鼻血汹涌而出

original: They are a bit tired however
translate: 然而，他们确实有些疲惫

original: My absence has been a burden on them
translate: 我的缺席给他们带来了负担

original: I know how you repay these poor things
translate: 我知道你如何回报这些可怜的东西

original: Calipero’s face twists into a cruel smile
translate: 卡利佩罗的脸扭曲成一个残忍的笑容

original: Thankfully, my ‘sons’ do not have the capacity to question my actions
translate: 幸运的是，我的‘儿子们’没有能力质疑我的行动

original: Their greatest joy in life is serving their master and their ‘ascension’ is the greatest reward their limited minds can imagine
translate: 他们生活的最大乐趣在于服侍他们的主人，而‘升阶’是他们有限思维所能想象到的最大奖励

original: You're deranged
translate: 你疯了

original: I'll have none of this
translate: 我可不会容忍这种事

original: So, it was you who came to the aid of Calipero the Tempestuous
translate: 原来是你来援助了暴风雨之怒卡利佩罗

original: I will say this much
translate: 我要说的就这么多

original: You have done me a great service
translate: 你为我做了大好事

original: For that, I am eternally grateful
translate: 为此，我永远感激不尽

original: Here is a small token
translate: 这是一件小小的礼物

original: He gestures to one of his ‘apprentices’ who limps over to you and reverently hands you a large sack filled with coin
translate: 他朝他的‘学徒’之一做了个手势，那个学徒一瘸一拐地走到你面前，恭敬地递给你一个装满金币的大袋子

original: But there is more to you
translate: 但你还有其他的一面

original: Calipero muses
translate: 卡利佩罗沉思道

original: You are a traveler of sorts, yes?
translate: 你是个旅行者，是吗？

original: Someone on a quest?
translate: 一个在执行任务的人？

original: I may have much to offer you yet in terms of aid
translate: 我或许还能为你提供更多的帮助

original: You cannot help but notice that his gaze lingers for a moment too long on Embla standing behind you
translate: 你不禁注意到，他的目光在你身后站着的埃姆bla身上停留了太久

original: What kind of aid?
translate: 什么帮助？

original: I went there - dancing across the silver-void
translate: 我去了那里——在银色虚空中翩翩起舞

original: I saw only shadows but I saw enough
translate: 我只看到了阴影，但我看到了足够多的东西

original: There are secrets in the deep
translate: 深渊中有秘密

original: Ancient secrets
translate: 古老的秘密

original: Enough to draw the Seven Eyes there
translate: 足以吸引七眼者前往

original: That is all I can say
translate: 这就是我能说的全部

original: Whatever do you need?
translate: 你需要什么？

original: I'd like to buy some items from you
translate: 我想从你这里买些东西

original: About your apprentices
translate: 关于你的学徒

original: What happened in the summoning chamber?
translate: 召唤室发生了什么事？

original: What do you know about the Black Priory?
translate: 你对黑修道院了解多少？

original: Welcome back to the 'Tower of Ash'
translate: 欢迎回到‘灰塔’

original: Please, use my facilities as your own
translate: 请随意使用我的设施

original: I'd like to trade with you
translate: 我想和你交易

original: Calling forth that which lies beyond is no task for a lesser Magos
translate: 召唤超越之物并非凡人术士所能为

original: However, I am not a lesser Magos
translate: 但是，我不是凡人术士

original: The Aether serves at my will and there are very few secrets that the veil can keep from me
translate: 艾thereum 服从我的意志，凡 veil 也无法隐藏从我面前的秘密

original: Alas, it was not so this time
translate: 然而，这次并非如此

original: What answered my call was something different
translate: 回应我的召唤的并非如此

original: Something much more powerful than I expected
translate: 比我预料中强大得多

original: What went wrong?
translate: 出现了什么问题？

original: Calipero fixes you with an intense stare
translate: 卡利佩罗用严厉的目光注视着你

original: The conjunction is growing in strength. ‘It’ is much closer to our world
translate: 联合正变得越来越强大。‘它’离我们的世界更近了

original: So close in fact that it has begun to seep through
translate: 实际上非常接近，以至于已经开始渗透

original: But you already know this don’t you?
translate: 你不是已经知道了吗？

original: His gaze shifts to Embla
translate: 他的目光转向埃姆拉

original: You're talking about the Dragon
translate: 你在谈论那条龙

original: The apprentices howl in terror and cover their ears
translate: 门徒们惊恐地嚎叫着，捂住了耳朵

original: Its seven eyes are fixed on the Outer Isles
translate: 它的七只眼睛注视着外岛

original: Something has been found that was perhaps never intended to see the light of day again
translate: 有人发现了某种或许从未打算再次见到天日的东西

original: That is why you are traveling to the Black Priory
translate: 因此你正前往黑修道院

original: What can you tell me about the Black Priory?
translate: 你能告诉我关于黑修道院的情况吗？

original: Certainly
translate: 当然

original: My vaults hold countless wonders for you to peruse
translate: 我的藏室里有无数奇珍异宝供你浏览

original: His eyes glint in a way that does not appear wholly natural
translate: 他的眼睛闪烁着不完全自然的光芒

original: #MercuryPool
translate: #水银池

original: A single clear note rings out and for a moment the chirping of exotic birds dies down
translate: 一声清脆的音符响起，片刻之间，稀奇鸟儿的鸣叫声渐渐平息

original: Somewhere a metallic clang sounds and then the mercury begins to circle some unseen drain
translate: 什么地方传来金属碰撞的声音，然后水银开始围绕着某个看不见的下水道旋转

original: Slowly but surely steps come into view
translate: 慢慢地，脚步声开始显现

original: With a final gurgle, the last of the liquid is drained away and at the end of the descending stairways a door can now be seen
translate: 最后一声咕噜声后，液体被完全排干，从下降的阶梯尽头可以看到一扇门

original: The ‘down below’ awaits
translate: “下面”在等待着你

original: The strange pool ahead of you is filled with a silvery fluid that looks like liquid metal
translate: 你面前的那奇怪的水池里装满了银色的液体，看起来像是液态金属

original: Mercury perhaps?
translate: 或许是水银？

original: Play the Silver Flute
translate: 拉响银色长笛

original: #TowerOfAshElevator
translate: #灰烬之塔电梯

original: The elevator stands ready to take you up to the upper level of the dungeon
translate: 电梯已经准备就绪，可以带你们到地牢的上层

original: Ascend
translate: 升级

original: The plate set into the floor bobs slightly as you step onto it
translate: 你踏上地板上的金属盘，它微微摇晃了一下

original: It appears to be a kind of elevator leading down to the level below
translate: 看起来像是一个电梯，通往下一层

original: #WizardDungeonAlchemyBench
translate: #法师地下城炼金工作台

original: The device hums with life and you get the impression it’s ready for use
translate: 这个装置发出生命般的光芒，你感觉它似乎已经准备好使用了

original: Craft the Salts of Elthanyr
translate: 制作艾尔坦尼尔盐

original: Taking great care to place the ingredients into the catalyzer in the correct order, the process of transmutation begins
translate: 你小心翼翼地将材料按照正确的顺序放入催化器中，转化过程开始了

original: Loud mechanical noises and hisses of steam sound as the machine vibrates violently
translate: 伴随着巨大的机械噪音和蒸汽的嘶嘶声，机器剧烈震动

original: Then to your amazement a beaker emerges - filled with a cerulean substance that no doubt is the Salts of Elthanyr
translate: 然后，令你惊讶的是，一个烧杯出现了，里面装着一种蔚蓝色的物质，毫无疑问这就是艾尔坦尼尔盐

original: Take the salts
translate: 取走盐

original: It seems you have done what Calipero asked you to do
translate: 看来你已经完成了卡利佩罗让你做的事情

original: Now you must make your way down into the summoning chamber and prepare to face whatever you find there
translate: 现在你必须下到召唤室，准备面对那里的一切

original: This appears to be some form of exotic alchemical crafting device
translate: 这似乎是一种外域炼金工艺装置

original: However, at the moment it appears to be somehow inactive
translate: 然而，目前它似乎处于某种未知的不活跃状态

original: #WizardDungeonCloneRoom
translate: #法师地下城克隆室

original: The pathetic creatures howl in rage and terror and around them flickering reticular energies begin to form!
translate: 这些可怜的生物怒吼着，恐惧和恐怖在它们周围形成闪烁的网状能量

original: A handful of naked forms flail about the room, attacking with their bare hands the strange machines that fill it
translate: 几个赤身裸体的形态在房间里乱抓，用裸露的手攻击充满房间的奇怪机器

original: Their eyes are wild and staring and they drool as they bleat forth their non-verbal cries of fear and rage
translate: 它们的眼睛狂乱地瞪着，流着口水，发出非语言的恐惧和愤怒的嘶吼

original: Suddenly they spot you and as one they freeze in place with a mask of terror on their face
translate: 突然，它们发现了你，同时停止了动作，脸上带着恐惧的表情

original: Look at these machines!
translate: 看这些机器！

original: This is where he… creates these poor creatures?
translate: 这就是他……创造这些可怜生物的地方？

original: They must have escaped when their master somehow failed to attend to them
translate: 一定是他们的主人不知怎的没有来照顾他们，他们才得以逃走

original: Born into a world comprised solely of this subterranean nightmare
translate: 他们诞生在一个由这片地下噩梦构成的世界里

original: Embla looks around in wonder
translate: 埃姆拉环顾四周，满是惊奇

original: But that means
translate: 但这意味着

original: They’re like children?
translate: 他们就像孩子？

original: Kat adds
translate: 凯特补充道

original: Go!
translate: 快走！

original: Get out of here!
translate: 快离开这里！

original: Let's put them out of their misery!
translate: 让我们结束他们的苦难吧！

original: Wild eyed and confused, the pathetic creatures first hesitate and then, in a sudden burst of mad energy, bolt towards the exit to the overworld
translate: 瞳孔放大，神情困惑，这些可怜的生物先是犹豫了一下，然后在一阵疯狂的能量爆发中，冲向通向地表世界的出口

original: Bah!
translate: 嘿！

original: What chance do they stand out there?
translate: 他们在外面对抗有什么胜算？

original: Better we had put them to the sword and saved them their misery
translate: 我们本应将他们斩杀，为他们省去这份苦难

original: Roland scoffs
translate: 洛兰嗤之以鼻

original: As they flee, you cannot help but wonder what chance they stand out there
translate: 当他们逃走时，你不禁要问，他们在外面又有什么胜算

original: The feral apprentices seem less than intimidated by your display and instead a certain predatory aspect creeps into their stances
translate: 这些野蛮的学徒似乎并不害怕你的展示，反而一种特定的捕食者姿态悄悄渗入他们的姿态中

original: It occurs to you that they might not have eaten in a while
translate: 你意识到他们可能已经很久没有进食了

original: #WizardDungeonDrainage
translate: #法师地下城排水

original: Bracing your back against the wall of the chute you attempt to make a controlled descent
translate: 背靠管道的墙壁，你尝试着进行一次受控的下降

original: It proves more difficult than you had hoped however and you lose your grip and plummet into the dark cave below
translate: 然而，这比你想象的要困难得多，你失去了平衡，坠入了下方的黑暗洞穴

original: You splash roughly into a shallow pool of water and though the landing has shaken you, at least you’re still alive
translate: 你粗略地溅入一个浅水池中，虽然着陆让你有些摇晃，但至少你还活着

original: Bracing your back against the wall of the chute you make a controlled descent until the chute emerges into a larger natural cavern
translate: 你靠在滑道的墙上，控制着下降的速度，直到滑道进入一个更大的天然洞穴

original: A short drop remains but as the floor below is covered with water you take the chance and successfully drop into the chamber
translate: 剩下的只是短距离的下降，但因为下面的地面被水覆盖，你还是冒险跳了下去，并成功落入了这个房间

original: A large drain is set into the floor
translate: 地板上有一个大型的排水口

original: Though you cannot tell where the chute beyond leads, you could easily fit in should you dare
translate: 你无法确定滑道后面的出口通向哪里，但你勉强可以挤进去

original: Climb Down
translate: 请下到下面

original: #WizardDungeonElevatorBlocked
translate: #法师地牢升降机堵塞

original: The room ahead of you contains a large stone platform that appears to be hovering in some kind of shaft leading down
translate: 你面前的房间有一个巨大的石制平台，似乎悬浮在一个通往下方的竖井中

original: As you take your first step into the room however, the voice of Calipero booms throughout the chamber
translate: 然而，当你迈出第一步进入房间时，卡利佩罗的声音在整个房间中回荡

original: You’ve not crafted the Salts of Elthanyr!
translate: 你还没有炼制艾尔坦尼尔的盐！

original: You cannot enter the summoning chamber without it!
translate: 你没有炼制的艾尔坦尼尔的盐，无法进入召唤室！

original: Don’t tarry - I can’t hold much longer!
translate: 不要停留太久 - 我撑不了多久了！

original: #WizardDungeonGenerator
translate: #法师地牢生成器

original: The strange machine appears to hum with latent energy
translate: 这台奇怪的机器似乎在低沉地嗡鸣，充满潜在的能量

original: It appears to have been damage by the strange fire-creatures that occupied the room but you think you could probably reactivate it through some trial and error
translate: 看起来这台机器被那些奇怪的火焰生物破坏了，但你认为通过一些尝试和错误，应该可以重新激活它

original: Reactivate it
translate: 重新激活它

original: The droning hum coming from the machine rises in pitch and a subtle vibration can be felt through the floor now
translate: 机器发出的嗡嗡声越来越高，现在可以感觉到地板在轻微震动

original: You believe you’ve reactivated this device, though to what end you’re not certain
translate: 你认为你已经重新激活了这个装置，但它的具体用途还不清楚

original: Strange creatures seemingly composed of fire and molten lava stand around a large arcane machine of some sort
translate: 一些由火焰和熔岩组成的奇怪生物围绕着一台看起来很神秘的法术机器站立着

original: They appear to be swaying and you almost get the impression they’re drawing energy from the machine; almost as if feeding upon it
translate: 它们似乎在摇晃，你几乎能感觉到它们正在从那台机器中汲取能量；就像是在吞噬它一样

original: One of the creatures suddenly appears to notice you
translate: 其中一个生物突然注意到你了

original: One by one they turn to face you
translate: 一个接一个地，它们转向面对你

original: It seems they are protective of their food-source
translate: 看起来它们保护着自己的食物来源

original: The machine hums along with a low drone that reverberates throughout the dungeon
translate: 那台机器发出低沉的嗡嗡声，回响在整个地下城中

original: There is nothing more for you to do here
translate: 这里已经没有什么事情可以做了

original: #WizardDungeonQuest1
translate: #法师地下城任务1

original: I’ve not heard of these Salts of Elthanyr before
translate: 在此之前，我从未听说过这些艾尔坦尼尔盐

original: If we find his laboratory, perhaps we can find a recipe of sorts?
translate: 如果我们找到他的实验室，或许能找到某种配方？

original: Nonetheless, I say we press on and do what we can to aid this man
translate: 不过，我还是建议我们继续前进，并尽可能帮助这个人

original: As I’ve said before
translate: 如我之前所说

original: A Magos is not an ally to scoff at
translate: 一个魔导士可不是可以轻视的盟友

original: I cast my voice into your mind from my summoning chamber - deep beneath your feet
translate: 我从召唤室中将我的声音传入你的脑海中——就在你脚下很深的地方

original: I have become… detained there and it shall be your privilege to render your assistance in freeing me!
translate: 我被困在那里了，而你们将有幸帮助我脱困！

original: And how did you end up so detained?
translate: 你是怎么被困住的？

original: Through certain rites I was calling up that which lies beyond
translate: 通过某些仪式，我召唤了超越现实的存在

original: What came through however, was not… what I expected
translate: 但是，真正出现的却不是我所预料的

original: It tried to overpower me but I was faster
translate: 它试图压倒我，但我更快

original: By my immense willpower alone am I keeping my foe at bay
translate: 仅凭我巨大的意志力，我才能将敌人压制住

original: I can hold him for a long time - but not forever
translate: 我可以长时间地保持这种状态——但不是永远

original: But what can I do?
translate: 但是我能做什么？

original: The voice sounds strained now
translate: 这声音现在听起来很吃力

original: I need
translate: 我需要

original: I need Salts of Elthanyr
translate: 我需要艾尔than瑞的盐

original: It can be created in my laboratory
translate: 我可以在我的实验室里制作

original: You just need the three ingredients
translate: 你只需要三种材料

original: Find
translate: 找到

original: The voice cuts out
translate: 这声音突然中断了

original: Find what?!
translate: 找到什么？！

original: Just craft the Salts of Elthanyr and bring them to the summoning chamber below!
translate: 只要炼制艾尔than瑞的盐，并把它们带到下面的召唤室来！

original: Hurry
translate: 快点

original: Cannot ho
translate: 不能...

original: What do you make of it Embla?
translate: 伊姆bla，你对这个怎么看？

original: As you walk past the statue in the corridor a voice suddenly rings out from it
translate: 当你经过走廊中的雕像时，突然从雕像中传出一个声音

original: Sharp and terrible, like two metal bars being clanged together, it seems to resonate in your very bones
translate: 尖锐而可怕，就像两根金属条碰撞在一起，似乎在你的骨子里回响

original: Interloper!
translate: 闯入者！

original: You stand in the halls of Calipero the Tempestuous!
translate: 你站在暴风雨之王卡拉佩罗的大厅里！

original: Serve me well and I shall forgive you your transgression
translate: 为我效劳，我会原谅你的过失

original: Are... are you inside the statue?
translate: 你... 你在雕像里？

original: Serve you?
translate: 为我效劳？

original: What makes you think I want to serve you?
translate: 你认为我会愿意为你效劳？

original: I am no statue!
translate: 我可不是雕像！

original: You are talking to none other than
translate: 你正在和一位

original: Calipero the Tempestous!
translate: 卡利佩罗·暴风雨之子说话！

original: Once the court-master to the High Wizard of Freymark
translate: 他曾是弗雷姆克高魔法师的宫廷大师

original: But where are you talking to me from?
translate: 你却是在哪里和我说话？

original: And what makes you think I want to assist you?
translate: 你认为我会愿意帮助你？

original: Why?
translate: 为什么？

original: Insolent mortal!
translate: 不敬的凡人！

original: You shall serve because I ask it of you!
translate: 因为我说了算，你必须服侍我！

original: Besides
translate: 而且

original: I’ll pay well
translate: 我会给你丰厚的报酬

original: Just pay attention!
translate: 只要专心听讲！

original: My grip is failing!
translate: 我的魔力正在衰退！

original: What's happening?
translate: 发生了什么？

original: #WizardDungeonRecipeBook
translate: #法师地牢食谱书

original: The large book appears to be a collection of different, obscure alchemical recipes
translate: 这本大书似乎是一些不同且晦涩的炼金配方的集合

original: Flipping through it you eventually find the entry for ‘Salts of Elthanyr’
translate: 浏览其中，最终你找到了“艾尔坦尼尔盐”的条目

original: Read the Recipe
translate: 阅读配方

original: Summoning forth that which dwells beyond is one of the most dangerous tasks that a Magos can undertake
translate: 召唤那超越存在的东西是魔导士所能承担的最危险的任务之一

original: What comes through may not always be what was intended
translate: 通过的可能并非最初所想

original: The Salts of Elthanyr must always be kept at hand when attempting such rituals
translate: 在进行此类仪式时，必须随时携带埃尔thanyr的盐

original: It is antithetical to that which has been called forth
translate: 这与召唤出的东西完全相反

original: Strewing it in a circle around the summoning focus confines the outsider
translate: 在召唤焦点周围撒成一圈，可以限制外来者

original: Casting the salts upon the outsider utterly unmakes it
translate: 将盐撒在外来者身上，会彻底将其摧毁

original: The salts are difficult to create and may only be crafted in a Protoplasmic Catalyzer
translate: 制造这些盐非常困难，只能在原生质催化剂中制作

original: Three ingredients must be used and added in this precise order
translate: 必须使用三种成分，并且按此精确顺序添加

original: First, add Sylversalt
translate: 首先，加入银盐

original: Second, add Salamander’s Horn
translate: 其次，加入火蜥蜴角

original: Finally, add Lotus Petals
translate: 最后，加入莲花花瓣

original: #WizardDungeonSarcophagus
translate: #法师地下城石棺

original: You examine the sarcophagus as best you can but fail to make much sense of its purpose beyond it not appearing to be used for burial
translate: 你尽可能仔细地检查石棺，但除了它看起来并不用于安葬外，无法理解其用途

original: Pressing down on the bottom of the interior it appears to give ever so slightly - almost as if it was hinged in some way
translate: 按压石棺内部的底部，似乎微微有些下陷——仿佛有些铰链装置

original: Taking a step back you scan the area around the sarcophagus only to spot a stone tile that is polished almost smooth by years of wear
translate: 你退后一步，环视石棺周围，发现一块几乎被岁月磨平的石板

original: No doubt this is a switch of some sort
translate: 毫无疑问，这是一些开关

original: Press the switch
translate: 按下开关

original: In the middle of this room stands a large golden sarcophagus-like chest that is richly engraved with complex, arcane-looking symbols
translate: 在这个房间中央，矗立着一个大型金色石棺状箱子，表面雕刻着复杂的、看起来很晦涩的符文

original: Carved in beautiful letters on a lid of the sarcophagus is the following
translate: 在石棺盖上用美丽的文字刻着以下内容

original: For thy service to thy Lord, Ascension is thy sweet reward
translate: 为了你对主的效劳，升天是你甜蜜的奖赏

original: Open it
translate: 打开它

original: Examine the decorations
translate: 检查装饰

original: The lid of the sarcophagus slides open with surprising ease revealing an interior molded to the form of a human form
translate: 棺木的盖子出乎意料地轻松滑开，内部雕刻成人类的形状

original: All along the interior walls, more of the strange looking sigils are carved giving the sarcophagus the appearance of being some sort of ‘machine’
translate: 内壁上，更多的奇怪符号被雕刻出来，使棺木看起来像某种“机器”

original: Carefully pressing down on the switch with your foot, the effect is immediate
translate: 踩下开关，效果立刻显现

original: The false bottom of the sarcophagus swings to one side, opening up to a shaft below
translate: 棺木的假底向一侧滑动，露出下方的通道

original: As soon as it does, scorching jets of flame roar up the shaft
translate: 一滑动，灼热的火焰喷涌而上，直冲通道

original: Had someone been laying in the sarcophagus they would have been totally and utterly incinerated
translate: 如果有人躺在棺木中，他们会被瞬间焚烧殆尽

original: Reduces to ash in an instance
translate: 立刻化为灰烬

original: Driina’s eyes go wide with shock
translate: 迪莉娜的眼睛睁大了，震惊不已

original: Is this how those apprentices are repaid for their servitude?
translate: 这就是那些学徒为他们的奴役付出的代价吗？

original: He uses them and then disposes of them like leprous corpses when they can serve no more?
translate: 他利用他们，然后像对待麻风病患者一样丢弃他们，当他们不再有用时？

original: What monster could do such a thing?!
translate: 什么样的怪物会做这种事？！

original: You shudder at the implication
translate: 你对这种暗示感到寒毛直竖

original: How many of this man’s ‘apprentices’ have ended their life in this way?
translate: 这个男人的“学徒”中有多少人以这种方式结束了自己的生命？

original: The symbols carved into the sarcophagus appear to be magical in nature
translate: 刻在棺木上的符号看起来具有魔法性质

original: Beyond that however, you have no idea of their meaning or purpose
translate: 但是，你对它们的意义或目的一无所知

original: At first glance, the symbols carved into the sarcophagus appear to be magical in nature
translate: 初看上去，刻在棺木上的符号看起来具有魔法性质

original: This however, is only at first glance
translate: 但这只是初看上去

original: Further examination reveals that they are nothing but purely decorative patterns of no arcane significance
translate: 进一步检查后发现，它们只是纯粹的装饰图案，没有任何神秘意义

original: In fact, you feel certain that the gold-leaf covering the structure is fake as well
translate: 实际上，你确信覆盖在结构上的金箔也是假的

original: #WizardDungeonSummoningChamber1
translate: #法师地牢召唤室1

original: Howling winds scream through these halls
translate: 咆哮的风声在这些走廊中呼啸

original: Though you feel it clawing at your exposed skin there is something strange about it
translate: 尽管你感觉到它在抓挠你裸露的皮肤，但有些奇怪的地方

original: A ghost wind
translate: 一种幽风

original: Only partially of the material world
translate: 只是部分存在于物质世界

original: The other half coming from beyond
translate: 另一半来自彼岸

original: No doubt Calipero’s summoning chamber lies ahead
translate: 毫无疑问，卡拉佩罗的召唤室就在前方

original: #WizardDungeonSummoningChamberFinal
translate: #法师地牢召唤室最终

original: You fling the vial of salt at the horrid creature but a gust of that terrible witch-wind catches the bottle instead
translate: 你将装有食盐的瓶子扔向那可怖的生物，但一阵可怕的女巫风却将瓶子吹偏了

original: It misses its mark and shatters against the wall and the Salts of Elthanyr spread into the roiling vortex
translate: 它偏离了目标，撞在墙上摔碎了，埃尔坦尼尔的食盐洒进了翻滚的漩涡中

original: Each grain that strikes the pillar of smokes explodes into a tiny shower of sparks but it does not have the intended effect
translate: 每一粒击中烟柱的食盐都化作了一小簇火花，但并没有达到预期的效果

original: Instead something roars in the beyond and in an explosion of white light Calipero’s ward collapses
translate: 反而，从彼岸传来一声咆哮，伴随着一阵白光，卡拉佩罗的防护阵塌陷了

original: You have failed your quest
translate: 你已经失败了

original: The howling witch-winds rise as you push south into what must be the summoning chamber
translate: 咆哮的女巫风随着你向南推进，进入了必定是召唤室的地方

original: Emerging from the central pool is a great whirling plume of black smoke
translate: 从中央的水池中升起了一股巨大的旋涡黑烟

original: Bluish light flashes inside it like lightning and, for a few mercifully brief moments, illuminates something vast swimming inside the smoke
translate: 黑烟中闪现出蓝色的光芒，像闪电一样，照亮了烟雾中某种巨大生物的轮廓，持续了几秒钟

original: The thing claws at the threshold of reality, desperate to break through - like a drowning man trapped under the thinnest of ice-sheets
translate: 那东西在现实的边缘抓挠，渴望突破——就像一个溺水的人被困在薄冰之下

original: Standing in front of the hideous thing is a single robed human figure
translate: 那可怖的东西面前站着一个身穿长袍的人类身影

original: You fling the vial at the pillar of black smoke and watch in awe as the salt ignites, turning the pillar from a pillar of smoke to a pillar of multi-colored flame instead
translate: 你将瓶子扔向那团黑烟，惊叹地看到食盐点燃了，黑烟柱变成了多色火焰

original: Calipero no doubt
translate: 卡拉佩罗无疑

original: Encased in some glimmering sphere of force, Calipero’s form is utterly frozen in time
translate: 被某种闪烁的力场包裹，卡拉佩罗的身形完全被冻结在时间之中

original: Nonetheless, his statue-like form conveys superhuman effort
translate: 然而，他的石像般的身形传达出超人的努力

original: He has held the monstrosity from beyond at bay this long but his grip is no doubt failing
translate: 他一直将那来自异界的怪物挡在远处，但他的力量无疑正在衰竭

original: Throw the salt at the pillar of smoke
translate: 把盐扔向那团烟柱

original: The man who stands before you looks much like his apprentices
translate: 站在你面前的男人和他的学徒看起来很像

original: Or perhaps it is more accurate to say they look a lot like him for no doubt this is the original
translate: 或者更准确地说，他们看起来很像他，因为毫无疑问，这正是原本的主人

original: He regards you with cold eyes, head slightly cocked to one side, but says nothing
translate: 他用冰冷的眼神注视着你，头微微侧向一边，但却什么也没说

original: You open your mouth to speak and he snaps his fingers
translate: 你张开嘴准备说话，他却啪地一拍手指

original: A rush of air and sudden vertigo and then you are somewhere else
translate: 一阵空气的涌动和突然的眩晕，然后你出现在了另一个地方

original: A man dressed in the colorful garb of a traveling theater performer walks onto the stage and the crowd falls utterly silent
translate: 一个穿着旅行剧团服饰的男人走上舞台，观众们顿时陷入了沉默

original: Something screams in terror from beyond
translate: 超越时空的恐惧尖叫传来

original: At first the roar of some great beast then the whimper of a child
translate: 先是一声巨大的野兽咆哮，接着是一个孩子的啜泣

original: Then, suddenly, all is quiet and the thing is no more
translate: 然后，突然之间，一切都变得寂静，那东西也不复存在

original: You reel from the shock of the unmaking and for a moment your vision is obscured by the bright afterimages of the arcane light
translate: 你被解体的冲击弄得摇摇晃晃，片刻间，你的视野被法术光芒的明亮后影所遮蔽

original: Slowly, your eyesight readjusts to the now darkened chamber and you see the Magos rising slowly to his feet
translate: 慢慢地，你的视力重新适应了现在黑暗的房间，你看到魔导士缓缓站起身来

original: Calipero I presume?
translate: 卡拉佩罗是吧？

original: #WizardsTowerEnter
translate: #进入法师塔

original: You mind reels as you look around the lush interior of the tower
translate: 你惊愕地环顾四周，法师塔的内部装饰得如此繁复

original: Colorful, fragrant flowers abound and exotic songbirds sing in every bush
translate: 彩色的、芬芳的花朵随处可见，奇异的鸣鸟在每棵灌木丛中歌唱

original: Stranger still, the tower’s interior is somehow much larger than its exterior seems to allow
translate: 更加奇怪的是，这座塔的内部空间似乎比外部看起来要大得多

original: Kat looks around in awe
translate: 卡特惊叹地环视四周

original: This place is… impossible
translate: 这个地方……是不可能的

original: I wonder what hands could have shaped such beauty?
translate: 想必是某个术士的作品吧？

original: No doubt this is the work of some Magos, yes?
translate: 毫无疑问，这一定是某个术士的作品

original: Let’s not be blinded by the splendor
translate: 别被这些华丽所迷惑

original: Iben muses as he carefully prods at one of the orchids with his weapon
translate: 伊本一边仔细用武器触碰其中一朵兰花，一边沉思

original: Looking around, You cannot help but wonder what hands could have shaped such beauty
translate: 四处看看，你不禁会想，是什么双手塑造了如此之美

original: #WizardTowerQuestBegin
translate: #巫师塔任务开始

original: Embla strokes her chin
translate: 埃姆拉摸了摸下巴

original: The scent of the Reticulum is about this
translate: 这里弥漫着瑞提库姆的香气

original: I would wager much that this ‘Master’ he speaks of is a sorcerer of sorts
translate: 我敢打赌，他所说的‘大师’大概是个术士

original: A Magos even
translate: 甚至是个术士

original: Though time is against us, another Magos could be a powerful ally and our path to Gradla takes us past Eryll in any case
translate: 虽然时间紧迫，但另一个术士可以成为强大的盟友，而且我们的道路将带我们经过厄里尔

original: I say, we should at least investigate this further
translate: 我说，我们至少应该进一步调查一下

original: Let's be on our way for now
translate: 我们现在就出发吧

original: From his skin and nails to his jaundiced eyes and missing teeth, this young man appears to have been stricken by some disease
translate: 从皮肤和指甲到黄疸的眼睛和缺失的牙齿，这个年轻人似乎被某种疾病所困扰

original: Beyond that, you’ve never seen anything quite like it and have no idea how to classify it
translate: 除此之外，你从未见过这种东西，也不知道该如何分类

original: So, what is this about your master then?
translate: 那么，你所说的‘大师’是关于什么呢？

original: From his skin and nails to his jaundiced eyes and missing teeth, the young man’s condition is perplexing
translate: 从皮肤和指甲到黄疸的眼睛和缺失的牙齿，这个年轻人的情况令人费解

original: Some of these symptoms are similar to those suffered by Magi upon exposure to strong magics over time but this is far too severe - especially considering the man’s young age
translate: 其中一些症状与术士长期接触强大法术后所遭受的症状相似，但这种情况太过严重，尤其是考虑到这个年轻人的年龄

original: It’s as if he’s quite literally falling apart in front of your eyes
translate: 仿佛他真的在你眼前分崩离析

original: Strangest of all, it appears as if the man is oblivious to his condition
translate: 最为奇怪的是，这个男人似乎完全不知道自己的状况

original: That is why you are travelling to the Black Priory
translate: 这就是你前往黑修道院的原因

original: His tattered robes, bald head and unhealthy pallor reminds you of a magos, though this boy is surely too young?
translate: 他破旧的长袍、光秃的头和病态的肤色让你想起了一个魔导士，但这个男孩显然太年轻了？

original: He follows your passing with an idiotic smile draped over his round bland face
translate: 他带着愚蠢的笑容，圆而平淡的脸上跟着你走

original: Can I help you?
translate: 你需要帮助吗？

original: Ignore the man
translate: 忽略这个男人

original: We have come
translate: 我们来了

original: he stops for a long moment and thinks
translate: 他停下了脚步，沉思了一会儿

original: to beg for aid!
translate: 求助！

original: Our Master is missing down below and we are not allowed to enter and search for him
translate: 我们的主人在下面失踪了，我们被禁止进入寻找他

original: Something is wrong - we know it!
translate: 有什么不对劲的地方——我们能感觉到

original: A note of agitation, bordering on panic, creeps into his voice
translate: 他的声音中带着一丝焦躁，几乎接近恐慌

original: Suddenly he stops, choughs slightly, and then smiles again
translate: 突然，他停了下来，咳嗽了一下，然后再次笑了

original: Bloody drool runs down his chin along with one of the man’s teeth
translate: 他嘴边流下血污的唾液，还有一颗牙齿

original: What of your master?
translate: 你们的主人怎么样？

original: Help!
translate: 帮助！

original: the young man croaks as you pass him
translate: 这个年轻人在你经过时嘶哑地喊道

original: He blinks as if he was equally surprised as you at the outburst - all the while smiling moronically
translate: 他眨了眨眼睛，显然和你一样被这突然的喊叫惊呆了——同时愚蠢地笑着

original: Well!
translate: 好吧！

original: Speak up boy or you’ll get the back of my hand!
translate: 少废话，小子，不然我可要用我的手掌教训你了！

original: Roland grumbles at the man
translate: 罗兰对那人咕哝着

original: We beseech you
translate: 我们恳求你

original: Travel to Eryll
translate: 去一趟厄里尔

original: Seek out the Tower of Ash
translate: 寻找灰塔

original: Find us there and learn of our Master’s fate
translate: 去那里找我们，并了解我们主人的下落

original: But please, time is of the essence and for each second you tarry, hope fades
translate: 但请，时间紧迫，你每拖延一秒，希望就会淡一分

original: The words flow as if rehearsed and then, as he speaks the last words he lets out a deep sigh and sits down on the ground
translate: 话语流畅得仿佛事先排练过，说完最后一句话后，他深深地叹了口气，坐在地上

original: Eryll?
translate: 厄里尔？

original: Tower of Ash?
translate: 灰塔？

original: Why, I’ve never felt better
translate: 哪里，我从未感觉如此好

original: The man seems taken aback by the question
translate: 那人似乎被这个问题惊住了

original: Please, it is my master who needs help
translate: 请，是我主人需要帮助

original: Driinas eyes narrow as she grabs one of his hands with the skilled touch of a healer
translate: 德里娜眯起眼睛，熟练地握住他的手，如同一名治疗者

original: You’re not well at all
translate: 你根本不好

original: she mumbles to herself
translate: 她自言自语道

original: Let me just take a look at you none the less
translate: 让我再看看你也好

original: His eyes are glassy and distant
translate: 他的眼睛空洞而遥远

original: Find us there
translate: 他重复道，然后声音渐渐消失

original: he repeats before his voice trails off
translate: 他重复道，然后声音渐渐消失

original: Fool’s mind is gone
translate: 这家伙已经疯了

original: He’ll be food for crows come nightfall and it’ll be a mercy
translate: 夜幕降临时，他将成为乌鸦的食物，那将是一种慈悲

original: Roland mumbles
translate: 洛兰嘟囔着

original: Are you just going to sit there?
translate: 你只是打算坐在那里吗？

original: The man rolls over on his side - eyes staring stiffly ahead
translate: 那人翻了个身，眼睛僵硬地盯着前方

original: Though he still appears to be alive, no prodding or prompting raises any kind of response from him
translate: 尽管他似乎仍然活着，但任何刺激或提示都无法引起任何反应
